1b1(rnying rgyud): @##// rgya gang saM skr-i ta'i skadang / ti la kA pra pany+tsan pra ka Ta tan+t+ra ma hA ma/ bod skad du/ spos bral den gsal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po thams cad
1b2(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa'i sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas brtsegs pa med pa'i ba bzang chen po na/ lha yi dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba lha rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa/ 'khor
1b3(rnying rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rang rig rtogs pa mngon gyur rjerdo rje 'chang chen po de/ sku ye shes kyi rtsal snang la rang bzhin med pa/ sku mdog sna tshogs su bzhugs pa/
1b4(rnying rgyud): lugs mnyam pa'i skyil mo zung la/ phyag rgya chos 'chang ba'i tshul du mdzad pa/ ye shes kyi sku yin pa'i phyir/ zhal phyogs bcu kun tu ma 'gags par thal legasal ba/ gnas rang bzhin gyis rnam
2a1(rnying rgyud): par dag papa dmang dgasal zhes bya ba/ ye shes kyi rtsal 'od dum 'aklags par gar 'a las rgya thung ste 'dog lnga yis rgya byas/ dbyibs klu bzhir gyur pa/ rtsigs pa na pachi kha dog lngas byas pa/ bzang gam po/ 'khor la khyabs pan du blar byas bdang //
2a2(rnying rgyud): / bu med dang bcas pa/ bar khyams na mo dang ldan pa/ sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa/ 'dod yon gyi snam bu la mkha' 'gro ma sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ mtha' rdo rje'i drab pad mas bskor ba/ de dag sdang la rang bzhin med pa/ bar snang gi gzhal su/ de lta ba tu gzhal yas khang
2a3(rnying rgyud): chen sto/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das de rje 'chang chen po/ 'khor ba shes kyi rtsalam 'gags par gas lnga 'a ba dang / gzhan yang ye shes kyi rgyal ma 'gugs pa kyi las dpa' dang / sems ma dang // khro ba dang / rdzi ma dang / chub po'i 'khong gsang ba'i bdag po byu na rdo rje dang / lung
2a4(rnying rgyud): pa po'i 'khor dga' ra ba rdo rje dang / gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa lnga ste/ puN+Da nye bar zhi ba dang / rdo rje khro gdong ma dang / gtsug gi rgyan gcig ma dang / ro za na shwat+ti thod pa'i phreng ba can dang / rdo rje rgyang gi gshog pa can dang lta ste/ de'i rang rang nye 'khor na mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa
2a5(rnying rgyud): dang brtsas ngas bskor nas bdungs so// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos sna drangs te/ 'khor rnams kyis bskor ba lan 'dun byas te mdun du 'dug nas ston pa 'di skad zhus so// kye kye bcom ldanardo rdo rje 'chang chen po// rang dag don rtogs rtsalas dang thob pa// sru gsum ldan phung yongs
2a6(rnying rgyud): srung tshul du bzugs// dge ba smros dang brang bco sa srung rdzogs// 'a 'i tsa mi gag/ pas sbru srur 'char// snang par bad mi gling mongs sgra'i tshul// 'phrul tog gnyis kabs pangs bgra na 'jug/ dus phyogs ma dgal te bang tsho// thig dgu brjod pal//
2b1(rnying rgyud): lam ni klu thag dang // nyan mangs dug la chud la zhen tu sbyin// yid ljon lta ba gams kyang zla la chas// rang shing ltar len pa 'don rtogs nas// chal gnyis rnga ltar 'chang yang rang grol bab// yul gyis gnad ma nus pa'i gdams pag tu// chag gaslon mas nan ldan mtshon nas na/ d+ya
2b2(rnying rgyud): don 'brel pa'i gtan la pheb nges pa'i// bklags pas shes nas de yis don go zas// chos su cig car bstan pa'i gdams ngag tu// spos thal don gsal chud chen man ngag zhu// ma rig mun pas chos smra bsgribs la gan// rang rig sgron mas chos sgra bstan par su// zhe sdang me yis rang kyad bsregs
2b3(rnying rgyud): lags na// ye shes bdud rtsis me chen bsad par zhu// ma rig mun pas shes rab rmongs lags na// ye shes sgron mas gti mug bsal bar zhu// 'dod chags lan tsha'i chu yis gdung lags na// ye shes bdud rtsis gdung ba bsal bar du// nga rgyal ri bol 'ang rig ma na legs na// rang rig don rtogs ri
2b4(rnying rgyud): bsal bar zhu// phrag dog gtsang rongad lta bus bsdams lags na// spos bral don togs gcong dong bsal bar zhu// skye rgas na 'chi'i chu bo ma brgal na// ye shes glu yis chu bo bsgral bar zhu// srid pa'i la chen dag la ma bskal na// rang grol srid pa'i la las bsgral bar zhu// 'khor ba'i g.ye
2b5(rnying rgyud): thang chen por bskrod lags na// ye shes brtson 'grus rta yis bsgral bar zhu// gzung 'dzin lcogs sgrog rang rgyud bcings pa la// ye shes lde mig lcags sgrog dbye bar zhu// bdag tu lta ba'i btson dam por chud lags na// thugs rjes sgo dbye bdag 'dzin dgrol bar zhu// sa rtog
2b6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i 'dam gyis zan lags na// ye shes chu bos 'dam rdzab bkru bar bu// log rtogs 'dzin pa'i gcod nad zin pa na// ye shes sman pas gcong nad gdon par zhu// log rtog chad pa'i mtha' ru lhung ba la// ye shes gsal cha'i nga gi mtha' las gdon par zhu// theg dgus
2b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs rtogs yang dag dan matogs// yang dag don chen mnor bstan pa Ta// chos rnams ldam dgongs blolnga stong ba la// ngas don ca tshig dag tu bstan par zhu// rang ngom shes lta ba spyi ser las pa las// rang rig rang la cang log bstan par bu// log sdang rig par bsres pa'i rdza
3a1(rnying rgyud): // mthang la// srag sum N+Dal dang bcas pa'i man dag su// zhiganas mun pas ya shes 'thabra pa la// legs lhag mthang ldan ma 'dag pa baT// rtag da zug nad kyis can pa las// rang bzhin sbyang pas rtag pa gzhag par Ta// chag tshogs tha skar byed/
3a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa la// rtsa ba dang rig snying po bstan par zhu// tshig gi sgron mas don gyi dpeng mtshon nas// de rnams rtogs pa'i gdams ngag chen po ru// tshig dang don gnyis dus gcig ston pa yi// bklags pas shes shing bstan pas go ba'i chos// rin chen kun 'byur spros bral don gsal/
3a3(rnying rgyud): man dag bshad pa'i rgyud chen bshad par Ta// sbyang 'das nyag zab la sogs ston pa yis// rgyud drug nyon mongs kun ci gnyen po ru// theg dgu la sogs brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams// rig bcar 'og dag tu bstan pa med// rang rig car pogadag tu bstan par cu// thugs rje mnga' bdag rdo
3a4(rnying rgyud): chen gyis// dus kyi snyig ma'i gdul bya'i don ched du// thos bsam bsgom la rag ma las pa yis// rang rig snying po sbom dang bral ba'i don// cig char car phog dag tu bstan par zhu// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// gsang bdag la sogs 'dus pa'i tshogam rnams dang // ma 'ongs
3a5(rnying rgyud): gdul bya rnams kyi don ched du// rang rig rang rtogs rdo rje 'chang chen ngas// 'dus pa'i tshogs dang ma 'ongs don ched du// sngar bshad gzhan gyis bstan pa med pa yi// thos bsam bsgom par dag las med pa'i don// rang rig chos sku car phog bstan pa yi// tsheg chung don che go bar sla ba'i chos//
3a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa tsam gyis blo dman kun gyis rtogs// chos rnams kun gyi snying po dan chen yin// 'khor 'das theg pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// lung mdo man nga gcig char pa// rgyud kyi snying po rang rig car phog don// don 'dril mtha' gcod spros bral don chod bstan// zhes gsungs so// spros
3a7(rnying rgyud): bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // kye gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdorje/ rtse gcig gus pas ngal nyon// bar snang gi bo mgrub pa la/ gang zag la la la nam bsros/ la la la nyi ma shang / nam bsros pa ni snang ba gsal ba medan/

3b2(rnying rgyud): xxx
3b3(rnying rgyud): xxx
3b4(rnying rgyud): xxx
3b5(rnying rgyud): xxx
3b6(rnying rgyud): xxx
3b7(rnying rgyud): xxx
4a1(rnying rgyud): ngag bye brag mang du bstan gyis legs par yid la zhog/ grol dus longs skus gdul bya gzhan gyi don byas te// mtha' du chos skur thim dus bstan pa'o// brim lugs chos sku'i sa na gnas lugs 'di ltar yod// rang gi rig pa gsal bar ma rtog
4a2(rnying rgyud): dang // thim pa la ne ma blugs dang // yod la bdag tu 'dzin pa med// so sor ma 'dres yongs su 'byed pa med// mtha' rnams kun dang bral bas phyogs su lhung ba med// mya ngan sdug bsngal bral bas bde ba rkun mi chad// rang thung mtha' du 'dug pas rkyen gyis 'jig bral med//
4a3(rnying rgyud): 'thus bra ma na du byam pas dgas gnyis sa// ma bcwal kun gyis thabangs gzhan la gam las// 'phrul pa rnam par dag pas 'khong ba ldog mi myed // dag pa rgyal la gnas pas thams cad mkhyen par dang // ra ni bas tshu bas pag chags bsags med/
4a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa legs pa bzung zhig/ dang po gzhi yi gnas lugs bstan pa nas/ 'bras bu mthar thug pa'i bar du de ltar shes par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ spyi log bsdus pa mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / a a
4a5(rnying rgyud): a sarba dz+nyA na d+harma kA ya na ma/ nam mkha'i mtha' 'di spos dang bral ba la mun snang gnyis ka ma grub pa zhes bya ba ston te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// 'khor dang myang 'das gnyis ka'i gzhir gyur pa// dngos po'i gnas lugs ji ltar gnas pa'i
4a6(rnying rgyud): don// de las rtswa lo byung ji ltar 'byung ba'i rgya// de dag rgyas bshad ji ltar phyi la bshad// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang gis bshad par zhu// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i don// dang po gzhi yi gnas lugs bstan pa dang // gnyis pa gzhi las rtsal gyi 'byung lugs dang /
4a7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa gzhi la gyi theg bstan pa dang // bzhi gzhal mtshan dpe bstan pa dang // lnga pagazhi yi brjid cag bstan pa dang // drug pa gzhi yi mde bsdus bstan pa dang // bdun pa ga ni yongs bzung bstan pa'o// dang po gzhi la gnas rmugs bstan pa ni// 'khor 'ad ma rtogs
4b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul med pa gong ngol na// rgya rkyen gnyis las 'das parang thung ba// bdag shegs thugs rdzi dag las mabyung dang // sems can rnams kyi las kyis ma bskyed dang // phyi rol 'byung ba lnga yis ma bskyed dang // nang gi rnam tog dag las mthub dang // gang zag la ma da/
4b2(rnying rgyud): da mi ci mag la pa gas chog bskyed// dasal du rdzogs ga / mi gas rgyas dum thas rnaman zhen
4b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i dus dang sa kyi grub pa med// bzang ngan bla ro bsgrub cu gang yang med// mtha' dang dbus med phyogs dang ris su med// ngo bo ma bcos ma bslad gnyug mar gnas// so ma rang lugs ma byung ba skyes mo// gnyis med mnyam nyid bzung ngan gar mi 'byed// bden
4b4(rnying rgyud): me nga dbang yang bangan pad// bam med/ gzed rnamam pa 'das par// ngag gzug pa dang bu mtsha pa dang // gnam dang myig ni rna snyi mad// tag pya nga gcim dang snyam// dga' byed kyi thos pa 'dug su /
4b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang phyogs 'dzin gang yang med// rigs drag sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs dang // rgyal ba'i sku dang ye shes snang ba dang // rim dgu la sogs theg pa'i bye brag rnams// dngos po'i gnas lugs gzhi la grub pa med// ji bzhin pa bcos kun gyi gzhi yin te/
4b6(rnying rgyud): rang byung ldan grub kun gyi 'byung gnas de// ma bslad snying po kun la khyab pa'i don// rang gnas byang chub kun gyi gzhi ma yin// maphye mi 'byed rang gnas ngob ste// 'gro dang 'ong zhing 'byung 'jug kun las 'das// myang dang ma myang 'jug dang mi 'jug med// stor dang ma stong
4b7(rnying rgyud): med pas btsal mi dgos// dngos med kun gyi snying po kun gzhi ste// chags dang ma chags bya byed kun dang bral// skye med 'gra med snang ba'i yul las 'das// rang lus rang gnas ma bcos byang chub sems// gdod nas ldan grub rin chen kun gyi mdzod// rtog med mnyam nyid
5a1(rnying rgyud): gsam ma' la ga// shes pa na spang mdon nyams kyang da// 'a ba shA sa sanal ba dganas/ ga gapas pas spang ma 'byar// bas ma ma mdzin pa thalas das sa da 'byung bab na// mnazhal dam par dag spyod lan du
5a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// ti la 'brul sogs ma thu wA grub bzhin// snying po mig zhe sa la gnyis ldan gyis thab// rtogs dag she la gnyis ng+ga 'char// matogs gzham 'khor ba ra ba ma// zhes gsungs so// smras bral rigs mchen po'i rgyud las/ gzhing gas mang
5a3(rnying rgyud): laT ste gsum pa'o// / oM sa ra ta ma k+Sha ma/ nam mkha' rgya mtsho mo yong can gyi gnas gas 'om N+Dal gyen gro 'ang snyoms pa'i snying du/ rin po che'i mchod rten bri 'bang lnga pa/ shes gyi tha ma tog chen po'i nang na gnas pal/ rlung gi N+Di thos bdag po byed nga la na
5a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdug po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la med byas pa/ grong gsungs gzhi'i gnas lugs da lags na// rtsal 'chang gzhid dgagi snang don// 'dus pa'i dza lagasung du gsol// jirje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi ba rgyad thams cad dkyi na/ gzhi dang
5a5(rnying rgyud): gzhi snang chen po'i 'dug tu yang yis s+thA mis mnor yid lazung zhig/ ji nga nyid kyi snang bal/ ngon nyid kyi srur shar taM/ chos du tig le nyag gcigs bcad pa'i yul can/ snying po brgyad du 'dril ba/ dpe ma mkha' dang nyi me lta bur gnas so// glegs pa'ab dag phongs par
5a6(rnying rgyud): nga zhig/ ngo bo ny-id ge snang ba'i gra chos kya dbyings/ sa macas kyid pa sa rnam pa dag pa n+d+ha/ dri rnaM shA nga nga seMs sa/ smye phyogs gangs me nga/ dum dang na pa da pa/ dengos pa can gyi tshus yin pas ma ma rnam pa rtsam kyang pa/ btags na
5a7(rnying rgyud): byung / ga gas pa pa sa/ gsum / nga rgyas pa na mas/ tha pas sa sa yi nga/ tha
5b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad las 'das pa/ ma bcos pa sgro skur gyi mtha' thams cad las 'das pa/ ma bslad pa skyon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa/ dang po rgyu med pa/ bar du rkyen med pa/ tha ma gnyen po med pas mi 'gyur pa/ ma rig pa dang log par lta ba dang / ma dad pa dang le lo la sogs pa dri mar
5b2(rnying rgyud): ma gyur pa rtag chad kyi mtha' dang / yod med kyi mtha' dang / them rig dang gzung 'dzin gyi mtha' dang bral ba'o// 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi don gyi ngo bor gyur pa'o// shar ba ni ye shes dbyings las shad/ dbyings rig pa dang ldan/ mtha' rnam par mi 'byed/ shes
5b3(rnying rgyud): gud du mi gcad do// rig pas dbyings la khya ba/ ye shes kun tu brda la/ chos nyid rig par 'dus so// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba dang chos sku gnyis su brjod cing mchod kyang don gong ma bzhin du gnyis su med pas/ mtha bla na med pa'i skyabs su 'dus shing /
5b4(rnying rgyud): bas bla na med pas mtha' dbus yongs la khyab ste/ don gnyis med chos kyi sku thig le nyag gcig go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma bcad pa'i yul can yin pas so// de yang ma bcad pa'i rig pa la 'dzin rtog ma skyes te/ yul du yang ma bzung / gzung 'dzin gnyis su med
5b5(rnying rgyud): kyang / yul rang snang chen po de dang ldan pas/ ye shes bod du gsal nus te/ yul can zhes ldan tshig go// snying po bcud du dril ba ni/ dbyings kyi snying po rig pa'o// de'i snying po ni ye shes kyi rang gdangs lnga'o// de'i snying po ni ye shes kyi sku lnga'o// rigs kyi bu bcud dang
5b6(rnying rgyud): yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// dril ba ni sgyu ma lta bus ye shes kyi snang ba yin pas so// dpe ci lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o// rigs kyi bu ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba ni/ nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba lta bu'o// ngo bo nyid kyi sgra ni nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o// zhes don gyi
5b7(rnying rgyud): snying po dgos 'brel chen po dang sbyar nas gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ gzhi dang gzhi snang chen po'i 'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po gzhi'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
6a1(rnying rgyud): @rnams par zhugs sa// de nus yang gsang pa'i bdag pas zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang rten pa// gzhi la bye thagagasang du gsal// zhes zhus pas/ gzho ting 'dzin las bzhengs te/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bugazhi
6a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'o// nges tshig ni thams cad 'byung bas na gzhi'o// yang na 'khor 'das gnyis kyi rten du gyur pa'o// mtshan nyid ni ye shes lnga'o// dbye ba ni gsum ste/ ye don gyi kun gzhin yang dag pa'i gzhi'o// sna tshogs bsags pa'i kun gzhi ni bag chags dang 'dre
6a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i shes pa tshogs brgyad do// gnas lugs don gyi kun gzhi ni 'jug tshul brgyad kyi dpa'o// gzhanas la ni rig par 'dug pas bem po sel/ stong par 'dug pas dngos po sa la/ gnyis med yin pas gnyis snang sel/ rang byung yin pas rgya rkyen sel/ ldan grub yin pa
6a4(rnying rgyud): rero rodogs sel/ yang dag yin pas dri ma sel/ med pas yod pa'i rtag mna' sel/ yod pas med pa'i tshad mtha' sel/ kye rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ yang dag pa don gyi gzhi'i phyi mo ni/ rang dang rigs mthun pa las kyang log pa ste/ rig pa tsam du mthun
6a5(rnying rgyud): patshogs brgyad las thol lo// de yang ji ltar grol zhe na/ 'phel 'grib med pas kun gzhi'i rnam shes las grol/ ngar 'dzin med pas nyon mongs pa'i yid las grol/ gzung 'dzin med pas yid kyi rnam shes las grol/ skye 'gag med pas sgo lnga'i rnam shes las grol
6a6(rnying rgyud): log pa'o// gsang ba'i bdag po stong par rigs mthun las log ste/ rang bzhin dag pas nam mkha' kha dog dang bcas pa/ dbyibs dang brag rdul dang bcas pa 'di ma yin no// kye sems dpa' chen po// rigs mi mthun pa las kyang phog ste/ rig pa dang rigs mi mthun pas
6a7(rnying rgyud): bem po min/ stong pa dang ni rigs mi mthun pas/ phyi nang gnyis kyi 'byung ba bzhi las bung cing bskyed pa'i dngos po med do// rigs kyi bu don chen po des na/ gnyis ka pas kyang ldog pa shes par bya'o// gnyis ka ma yin pa'i dngos por 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o// zhes gsungs so// spos
6b1(rnying rgyud): thal don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ gzhi'i bye brag bshud pa'i le'u ste lnga pa la// // de nas yang mtshan pa dpe'i dgongs pa la bzhugs s+ho// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / de bzhin mkhyen dpegasung du gsal// zhes lus so// @
6b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' sug pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig/ ngas gzhi dang gzhi sdang chen po dpe dang brngas bshad par bya'o// mig yo brgya mchod gting lta bu'o// stong pa khyab pa dang yangs pa nam mkha' lta bu'o// drim med pa man+t+ra nes lta bu'o// dag rjegs pa la ma
6b3(rnying rgyud): pame long gi gzugs brnyan lte bu'o// sna chags su sdang yang dri mas ma gos pa pad+ma lta bu'o// 'gyur ba med pa glang po'am rdo rje lta bu'o// thams cad 'byung bas sa gzhi lta bu'o// dngos su mi snang la byin rlabs las 'byung ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o// rang gir bogs pa la mi
6b4(rnying rgyud): sa mau na// rgyu dpa dzi na// pa brgyu / ma / mdun pa sdus nga sgyu gas rgyu ste / rdzus bye sa sarnam pa ma / @
6b5(rnying rgyud): la chos smras khyab pa ni 'o ma dang mar bzhin no// chos nyid kyi snying po rig par gnas pa na nam mkha' dang nyaM ba bzhin no// chos nyid mi rtog pa la chos spu'i rtsal gcod pa ni spa gri'i lhag pa dang so bzhin no// ma 'dres pa la rdzogs pa ni zla 'og gi gur khyi ma dang gzugs brtan bzhin no//
6b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs snang la gnyis su med pa ni shing gi grib ma bzhin no// gzhi las rtsal 'du 'phron rgya mtsho la chu bran 'dra ba bzhin no// gzhil sgra gsum rdzogs pa ni/ nyi ma'i snying po la 'od mong pa 'gags pa bzhin no// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyi dang ni rma bya'i sgong 'am nyi ma 'amanam mkha
6b7(rnying rgyud): sprin dang cher bzhin no// yang na man shel bzhin no// 'khor 'das gnyis sngon yon du shar yang ngo ba gcig pa ni gzung bzhin no// gnas lugs dang snang tshul ni mar me dang me long bzhin no// rig pa dang ye shes kyi dpe ni gser dang ser po bzhin no// sku gsum ngo po rang nyid yin
7a1(rnying rgyud): gas la ma nan/ / ga pa na ma bya ba da jug
7a2(rnying rgyud): 'ad dang la yod kyang spyang par mkhan pa cad kyi nang bu la zhu'o// gzhi sdang chen pa'i dpal lazhes cing // dpe 'don dgres 'khyo mas/ dpe me sa bzhin rnaMs 'drag rnams kyis lags par dag ya/ 'bong ga babs gsum na kyi kyig sngab la/ gang ltu ba la
7a3(rnying rgyud): / bar ngas/ dpe pagacig ni kun tu thug par bya'o// spos thal don gas la chen po'i na las/ gzhi mtshan pa' ba'istan pa'i langs ga pa// danas ma ma ldan 'a rdzag do nags pa pa'i 'dzim pa sems par zhugs // nganas pa
7a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kyai bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / de yi brjod tshig ngos bzung gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// yang ston pas gsungs pa/ ngas bstan chud lung thams cad nas/ gzhi yi tshig tshogs mang gis kyang // mdor bsdus ngas pashad khyod kyis nyon/
7a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad bying bar gyur pas na/ de bo nyid kyi smrab// de snang yin pas na ny-id kyi snang ba'o// de yang ragadang mtshan pos shag pas snang brtson pa'i// 'khang 'das kyi na tang ma ma grol ba rgyang kyi 'o// yon t+yan dus gyis 'bras du rtsa spa gas pangs
7a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i med rgyal btags pas rgyas kyi su'o// ma rig pa dang bem pa las log ste/ yang dag pa'i shes pa'i sa gnas pa ni rig pa la// chu rkyen las 'das pas rang byung ba// zla dbyung ba min te/ yenas gnas pa'i dag pa'i bdag nyid du rnying pas na ye shes so// rang snang las
7a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan slar med cing ba mi 'gyur bas na/ snang ba dang sgra chen po gsal ba'i thig le nyag gcigag/ de'i gong na gzhan med pas zin mer// debs snga ba gzhan med pas sngon byung ngo // thams cad de las shar cing snang bas kun byed do// 'khor 'das thams cad de las sdang ba
7b1(rnying rgyud): / gas pa sa gas byas la// bab ma ngas pa na smras 'ang ma zug/ lags thams ta snang pa dang / dag 'dra sa thas tu nga / sna ba kyang bdagasal ba thal tha masug sa na gas langs gsas pa das san na
7b2(rnying rgyud): dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje 'chang ngo // sku lnga ngo bo nyid dang drug/ ye shes lnga mi gnas pa'i ye shes dang drug/ yul lnga bdag tu med pa'i klong dang drug/ rigs lnga a'i rigs dang drug/ 'od lnga rang bzhin gyi 'od dang drug/ 'byung ba lnga rang blang gi 'byung ba dang drag/ yul lnga dbyangs kyi
7b3(rnying rgyud): yul dang drug/ nyon mongs pa lnga khor khro ba dang drug/ 'gro ba rigs drug rnams don gnyis su med par bzhugs shing gyis yon tan du mi 'gag pas drug pa rdo rje 'chang ngo // gzugs cu'i sangs rgyas grangs las 'das pas/ thams cad de'i don rtogs pa las shar cad byung bas na/ sangs
7b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga sa na
7b5(rnying rgyud): med pas thams cad gnyis med chen por ro gcig pas kun tu bzang po'o// chos nyid gsal ba'i rang gdangs la// ye shes dag pa'i zer mdangs shar// 'gag med 'od kyi gzhal yas khang // snying po sku lnga nang na gsal bas na/ gzhon na'i sku'o// bgres pa mi mnga'
7b6(rnying rgyud): bas gzhon pa'o// rig pa dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pas// thebs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes dang / shes rab 'gyur ba med pas ye shes so// chos nyid kyi grong du rig pa grub cing rig pa'i klong du ye shes kyi rang gdangs lnga grub ste/ 'od kyi sbubs na spu lnga grub pas/
7b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin spun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas so// ngo bo nyid kyi sku dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngang nas/ rang bzhin 'od kyi bum pa lngags la ste/ thugs rje'i snying po sku lnga phyag rgya ma mas pa'i tshul du gnas pas na ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum mo// zhes rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par zung zhig/
8a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan thams cad tha snyad yin la/ yang dag pa'i don de ltar gsal bas na/ dang po'i gnas lugs so// rang byung gi ye shes yin pas na/ dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ sangs rgyas thog mtha' med pa'o// gzigs snang las 'das pa'i gsal ba mi
8a2(rnying rgyud): 'gag pas ye shes kyi mig go// gnyis su snang bas rtag chad dang yod med che chung mtho dman dang / yang sa dog gzung 'dzin dgag bsgrub dang / dag dang ma dag phyi na nga yang dog dang / blang dor yin min gnyis kyi chos/ de bzhin du gnyis snang med pas gnyis med do// mi mthun pa'i
8a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba med pas gcig go// sgrib pa med pas zang thal lo// 'khor 'das thams cad de las 'byung zhing thug pas na rtsa ba'o// brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab kyang / don yang dag pa de las mi 'da' bas na brjod pa zhes bya'o// ma bcos par dang gis gnas pas gshis so// thams cad de
8a4(rnying rgyud): las byung bas rgyu'o// gzhi chen po de las thams cad bskyed cing 'brel pas sa bon no// ka dag pa'i ye shes yin te/ dri ma mi gnas pas rnam par dag pa'o// 'khor 'das thams cad de las 'byung bas na rin po che'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs su snang zhing shar yang
8a5(rnying rgyud): ngo bo mi rtog pas 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab po// rang ga ngo bo rig pa dngos med ye shes med gzang thal du gnas la/ de rdos pa can gyi chos min pas/ yon tan gyi sgo yangs pa ni chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ ngo bo rgya ma chad pa'o// kye rdo rje 'dzin pangs bstan rgyud lung du/ tshig de rnams
8a6(rnying rgyud): gang byung yang / gzhi mtshon pa'i tshig tu shes par gyis shig/ ngo bo nyid kyi sgra zhes pa nas rgya ma chad do// zhes pa yan chad du bstan pa'i tshig 'di rnams ngas 'dir bstan cing bshad pa bzhin du/ rgyud lung thams cad du shes par gyis shig/ gzhan yang 'bod skad thabs gsum dang sbyar la/
8a7(rnying rgyud): gzhi mtshon pa'i tshig tu 'gro ba la 'byung ba na de dang mthun par 'brum nan no// zhes gsungs nas/ chos nyid mtshon pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang bdag snang ba chen po zer na/ snang ba ni yul 'gag pa med par gyis shi // chen po rdo snang ba de ma byas pa dang / de'i gong na gzhan med pa dang /
8b1(rnying rgyud): sku gagazhanadus 'dags par gas pa byung// sang ban ga'anams sa btung ba' byas / smra brnam pa dug pasas/ sngang ba nga ma med pa shes pa kyag// tsha byed can su 'byu ba dad // byas durnamams spa ga/
8b2(rnying rgyud): zi na yangs pa chen po cha shas dang bral ba'o// stong pa 'gyur ba med par shes pa bya'o// yul zer na bzhugs pa'i gnas dang de'i snang ba la shes pa b+ha'o// stong pa zer na mtshan ma las 'das te dngos po med pa'o// yangs pa zer na gang la yang dag pa mi mngang ste/ de nyid kyi khyad par
8b3(rnying rgyud): dang de las snang bdum mi 'gag par 'char ba'i rten du shes par bya'o// dbyings rnam par dag pa ni/ sgyogs ma'i 'byung ba ma grub pas pa rdul med cing ye shes kyi gdangs na zang nus pa la byA'o// pad+ma bdags pa zer na/ dri ma med pa'i sdang ba la gnod pa mi skyes ste/ rang
8b4(rnying rgyud): gas pa 'dzin med du shes par bya'o// spros bral gyi dbyings zer na 'thung ba bzhi'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'gyur med kyi klong zer na chos nyid la kha gting med pa'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ gzhi dngos po'i gnas lugs dang
8b5(rnying rgyud): snang tshul mtshon pa'i tshig ngos bzung ba'i le'u steg zha pa'o// / gsang ba'i bdag pos yang byas pa// kye kye rdo rje 'chang chen po// gzhi nyid rgyas par bshad pa de lags na/ gzhi nyid bsdus nas bshad pa dang / de don ngos bzung bstan pa dang / de la 'khrul
8b6(rnying rgyud): rtog 'char lugs dang // yang la ji ltar grol lugs dang / grol nas thi ma dus bshad par zhu// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal ba// dang po gzhi yi bsdus don ni// gzhi nyid ma bcos ma bslad pa// rig pags pabs nam mkha' lta bur
8b7(rnying rgyud): med// dngos por mgrub bim po med// rig pa gsal stong gnyis med par thal yin// rig pa rlung bzhin 'phye zhing skyid par nus// rtag chad la sogs mtha' brgyad dag dang bral/ rtogs dang ma rtogs nan ma phyed/ rig dang ma rig yengs dang ma yengs dang / yin min gang
9a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ gi 'dzin pa ma zhugs te// gang gi ming dang brda' du btags pa med// shes rig tsam du yang kyang der ma nas// thams cad ldan gyis phub kyang 'thung ma nus// gzhom po dngad byung stong gas pa dag tungs pa la// nges pa'i nges pa ga
9a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis maphye// tshul ne mnges gang 'khrungs pa med// dper na rdong bu rin chen yon tan ldan grub ste// bsod nams che chung gnyis kyi rkyen gyis ni// dgos pa bzang snang ngan snang nges pa med// de lta bu yi gni de ni// tha ma 'ang tu dad / 'i shes pa la// po'i 'thod ces
9a3(rnying rgyud): pa rang yis bstan// de ltar gzhi nyid nges par shes gyur na// wa sgom spyod 'bras nges pa dus gcig 'chang// kun la spel ba'i snod mi ldan// theg pa gzhan du de ltar bsten pa med// gzhi yi ngo bo ma bcos ma bslad cing // so ma rang byung dngos po'i gnas lugs las//
9a4(rnying rgyud): rtsal mi 'gags dang po gzhi ru 'char// dang po gzhi las rtsal de g.yo tsam 'gyur// g.yo mi g.yo las yid tsam ga yos// de las shes brtsel 'gyus pa// rang gzugs 'od tu snang ba mthong // tshe rabs yang chad mar chad byung // yang chad rang snang 'dzin med kyis/
9a5(rnying rgyud): 'chang chen yar la grol// mar chad 'dzin pa brtas pa yis// 'gro rdza gsams can mngal dakhrul// 'khrul ba rtog pa'i bye brag rnams// rgyas par 'og nas gsal ngar bstan// sdang ba dang snang 'dzin med ma zhes pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa ru khyad// de la
9a6(rnying rgyud): brtags pas kun brtags ma rig yin// de ltar rgyu gnyis rkyen ni bzhi ru zung // phyi nang sdod bcung drug tu ni// ye shes dang ni sems can gnyis su chags// chos kyi dbyings la ye shes lnga las ni// ma rig ye shes dug mar 'khrul// chos kyi sku yi rtsal las yongs su de
9a7(rnying rgyud): las lus su 'khrul// de gnyis tshogs pa'i rtsal las ni// sprul sku de las ngag tu 'khrul// myi 'i chos dbyings ma shes pas// 'gro ba rigs drug snang bar shar// de ltar 'khrul pas khams gsum sems can la// wa gsum ye shes rnam lnga ldan gyis grub/
9b1(rnying rgyud): bgachags spangs na skra gsum gnas pa la// bla ma'i gdams dag rkyen gyis rtogs par bya// rtogs bgoms nas dag pa'i sdang ba 'char// zag bcas sus dang bral na rin can skabs 'char te// langs su'i 'gro na byas nas chos spar gsal// de las su gsum ldan kyang
9b2(rnying rgyud): 'grung // nus par 'og nas 'byung bas shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyung las/ gzhi bsdus te bstan pa dang ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // shel gyi za ma tog gis mthub par g.yu'i maN+Dal las mtshad tan gyi gangs
9b3(rnying rgyud): gyi ru byung ba ste/ gzhi'i man ngag rgya tshogs lnga shar ba'i man dag/ a rked te kan ba.u pra pa n+da pra ka laSh+mat+ko ya har/ de'i tshe rten po rdo rje 'chang chen po// ye shes gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa shags so// yang de'i tshogasang ba'i budag gos zhus pa// go
9b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs gzhi sdang chen po de// glo bar ma yin ye shes de// da lA ma 'ongs rjes 'jug la// ye shes don rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pa ye shes gsal ba'i dgongs pa las bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi gus // ngas ye shes kyi don
9b5(rnying rgyud): mdor bsdus la bstan no// ye shes kyi ngo bo dang / ye shes kyi nges tshig dang / dbye ba rnam grangs dang bcas pa dang / mtshon dpe dang sbyar la bshad de/ ye shes kyi ngo bo ni gsal la mi rtog pa'o// de yang rang bzhin rnam par dag pa gzhi gnas kyi ye shes dngos med zang thal lo//
9b6(rnying rgyud): sku dang sbyar na chos smra'o// rig pa dang sbyar na ngo bo'o// rigs kyi bu 'dug tshul 'od dru gnas pas/ spu dang sbyar na gzugs kyi sku'o// ye shes dang sbyar na mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga'o// snang tshul phyin med par snang bas sprid med du gsal ba'i ye shes so// de yang rang bzhin
9b7(rnying rgyud): rnam par dgangs ge pa'i mtha'a'as 'das/ 'dug tshum me du 'dus cha pa'i mtha mas gyi/ tshul nang maungangs gang man po mtha' dam par dag na le zhes kyir zer// des tshig ni senas yin pa 'dzin ma no ba shes pas me shes so// dbya
10a1(rnying rgyud): rnamam sa da sa ga pa sa ma dru dzin pa dalusal mang mas rdza dunan nas/ smras na du gams das
10a2(rnying rgyud): pas me 'ong ye shes ma// stong pa de nyid rig pa yin pa ga pa de nyid stong pa yin te/ stong rig dbyer mi byed ngas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mi// stong ba dang ga pa gnyis su med pa so sor mkhyen pas sos rtogs pa'i ye zhesaso// dag par pos med kyil shes
10a3(rnying rgyud): yin pas yon tan gyi sgo yangasu pa ste/ rgyal phyogs med du gang la'ang mthogs par 'byung bas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// de ltar tshig tshogs de nas btags kyang / ngan phyogs cang bcas pa 'i snang bas mi gnas pa'i ye shes so// rje ti rigs shes pa ni/
10a4(rnying rgyud): rang rig pas rig pa'i ye shes so// de la byed pa po med pas rang byung gi ye shes so// de'i don las mi 'da' bas na/ 'da' gzugs kyi ye shes so// dpe bstan na gaji gnas kyi ye shes kyi dpeni/ thams cad 'byung bsas gzhi rin po che lta bu'o// zos kyi dbyings kyi pha
10a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rnam mkha' lta zla'o// me mong ye shes kyi dpe blang ngas pa'am ma lo ga yang dag pa lta bu'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni dus gsumamanyamang nyid kyi rdo wA Ta ro// paN+DIsasu med pa'i ye zhes bye po no/ gser nga se po lta bung // masang rtog pa'i
10a6(rnying rgyud): dade ni/ g+hu mdzo gzang glang nang ba lta bu'o// byA bgrub pa'i ye shes kyi dpon// rlung dang nyi ma bzhin no// mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi dpon rgya tha bzhin no// rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbe ni man shel dang 'od bzhin no// rang byung ye shes kyi dpon rdo rje lta bu'o// 'da' gzugs
10a7(rnying rgyud): kyi ye shes kya pani/ mang bang bgang jims pa gnas pa'i phrag sa mol mi pas klags mi 'tshol bzhin no// zhes gsungams// spos pa 'don gsal kyi chung rgyan po las/ ye shes po su zung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgupa'o// / de rjes la ston pas bkas /
10b1(rnying rgyud): na su// ma / gnan da / na dun du na bya/
10b2(rnying rgyud): yi/ mdzes yongs par rjon/ mtha rtags pade mi shes rin/ gangal thogs pa med par rjod pa/ bya thab pa'i legs pan// mthung da bral bar brjod pa// me gnas pa yi legs pan// reg pa 'o gas pa nga ba dang / rang gags su brjod pa
10b3(rnying rgyud): bramam des byin polan/ 'ju med pal sum byas// ngo rjog 'dud// dbyung ba zhe zin ba shang / 'ad med pa dang dang midrid padanga'i dradra nga ni 'dang 'dradang supa rnams pa dang/ shes sasadasas// rjes thapa dodags pa da
10b4(rnying rgyud): shes mtshon pa'o chog bstan pa'i 'ang+ge skye 'dru pa'o// nyi ma 'i sbyi po'i 'od ze m-i dag pa'i man pa// dz+nyAn ShAn+d+ha/ kA la thas nyid/ bcom ldan 'das thugs la kyi gongs pa la thugasaso// ya gas pa bdag pas dgongs phyim nas dus
10b5(rnying rgyud): maldan cig nga nga / med pa la na rdzangs gsu gsum/ zhes thusas// gyon papa 'a ngas 'i/ rig pa sa mi la // stong pa'i gas dbyer byed/ dang shes rdzogs bad pa ni/ ye nas shi shAm/
10b6(rnying rgyud): byas sa pa gdas 'a// ma pa sa dzu dusmrapa// rang sa she gad sa// 'dagu myed panas da gsapa/ ma nyid bugs ga n-i// kyang na ba nas // sa pa sa // das
10b7(rnying rgyud): ma ngags pa// bu bra mi shis nga gdas ni// rdzogs ma d+monas snga 'gas pa// des slong drugang // la zhes nga dun gyis bya// togasangs gyu pa pa zhes bya/ gas nga bachu gta jugs// dper nam lo dag la// gang cu rgyar
11a1(rnying rgyud): / kyis snang mad kyang // ldang ba sa nas gas med// gas med pa sa bang// de zhin dag pa chos sbal// man tan ma 'gags rna chags gang// gang kyang // gcig par gas pa// gcig pa gnas pa du ma med// dus dang gardas rlabs
11a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad du// dngos med dgra pa chen por gnas// sgrib med gsal bzang thal gnas// gzugs sgra gnyis kyi snang ba yang // rang la mi snang rnam par dag/ ces gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi khyud chen po las/ rig pa'i rtsal 'byung ba dang / rgyal rnam par dgapa
11a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i lernga ste cu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ des mtshon tshig rnams gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngas bstan rgyud lung thams cad du// rtsal zhes byung na 'di skad bshad// rig pa'i rtsal ni ye
11a4(rnying rgyud): gis wa// de yi \u0f7fla na 'od zer rje// 'od lnga rtsal ni 'byung ba lnga// nam mkha'i rtsal ni sprin dang du rling gis gong byed/ rlung gi rtsal 'u ngag/ dang bskyod pa'o// chu las thA sma dang dran cing spyad pa'o// sa las gzugs dang sdad rten byud pa'o// me las tshe ba dang khrig pa smin pa'o//
11a5(rnying rgyud): 'od dkar po las sha dang rus pa/ 'od ser po las mkhris pa dang chu sar/ 'od mang po las khrag dang dron/ 'od ljang gulas dbugs/ 'od mning galas was kyi skabs 'byed pa'o// 'byung ba lnga'i rtsa la ni sa song shad// phyi nang gnyis su bstan pa yin/
11a6(rnying rgyud): thig le phyi nang rtsal zhes bya// de ltar snang nus stongs su bshad/ de ltar 'byung bas rang byung ngo // gzhan las ma byung rang las rang byung bas// yon tan 'byung bas dang byung yin// de ltar shang bas rang shar yin// yon tan zhes bya pa bya// thams cad 'byung dang kun
11a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung dang // mang po dgas pa 'gyung brnams// rig pa gang bas rang nir yin// u lA rang snang yul lngar skar // de bzhin sems dpa' sems par sdug// de bzhinadathugs rje'i mdzad spyod snang // de mtshungs snang ba sna tshogs snang // sgyum sa bur gsungs pa
11b1(rnying rgyud): dang // snang la rang bzhin med pa dang // gsal la rtog pa med pa'o// zhes drung na/ rtsal la rang bzhin med par bshad/ thams cad rang snang rang shar yin// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ rig pa'i rtsal 'byung ba dang /
11b2(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa'i tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// ston pa thugs rje che mnga' ba// rtsal gyi ngo bo ji ltar lags// de'i nges tshig dbye ji ltar lags// de la mtshon dpe ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so//
11b3(rnying rgyud): pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo na ma 'gags pa'o// phral gyi nges tshig na/ 'byung ba'i stobs dang ldan pas na rtsal lo// dbye ba ni rig pa 'khor 'das gnyis su snang ba'o// dper na nyi ma gcig du mar snang ba'am/ nyi ma la 'od dang 'od zer mi 'gag pa'am/ 'aco drug ga
11b4(rnying rgyud): gzur ram glog 'gyus pa lta bu'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ rgyal bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / gser gyi sor gdub lag yu'i wa bcug pa'i mnangag/ rdo atra An kA la a haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad
11b5(rnying rgyud): sa nyid kyi rgyan ma 'gags par rol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// yang de'i tshe/ gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye ston pa kun bzang rdo rje 'chang // sna tshogs rtsal du snang ba de// rgyan dang rol pa ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rgyan
11b6(rnying rgyud): ro bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba mthun pa'i sgo nas bstan// rol pa la yang de bzhin bstan// ngo bo dbye ba'i sgo nas bstan// nges tshig mdzes pas rgyan zhes bya// dbyen/ chos nyid kyan ni sku gsum yin// chos sgra'i rgyan ni sgra gnyis yin// mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes lnga/
11b7(rnying rgyud): nyis ka'i rgyan du de bzhin brjod// mtshon dpe gser la g.yus sbas 'dra// nges tshig don gyi dbye ba ni// chos nyid dgal chos spus brgyan pa ni// stong la phyang chad gsal bas mdzes// chos kyi sku la ye shes brgyan// yon tan 'gag pa med par mdzes// ye shes gsal la thugs
12a1(rnying rgyud): dam brtan// 'amadug pa ma 'dun pasams// dacir mngasabs nanasas// nganam la ba 'dan bstan pa// ma 'gags gnyis mang Sh+Ta shA// ral byung na napa stan// napa dang btags nan// rang btan nga/
12a2(rnying rgyud): rang las grol// nges tshig gtan tshigs bcas pa yin// dbyen rnam pa gnyis yin te// dag pa chos nyid rol pa dang // 'khor ba rang rgyud rol pa'o// dag pa chos nyid rol pa ni// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid dang // ma g.yos pa yi ngang nyid las// rang bzhin 'gas
12a3(rnying rgyud): pa med par shar// bag dang bral ba'i nam mkha' la// 'byung ba bzhi yi gdangs shar bzhin// snang la rang bzhin med par shes// ma 'gags dang gdangs chen por gsal// 'khor ba rang rgyud rol pa ni// phyi nang snod bcud bsdus pa'i chos// gzugs su snang ba
12a4(rnying rgyud): sku yin te// chu zla lta bur gzung du med// sgra skad thams cad gsung yin te// brag cha bzhin du rang bzhin med// dran dang rtog pa thugs yin te// rtsa la ri mo bris pa bzhin// 'dzin pa rang rgyud yod ma yin// de ltar gzugs snang thams cad sku yi rol pa yin/ sgra skad
12a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad gsung gi rol pa yin// blan rtog thams cad thugs kyi rol pa yin// de ltar ma shes mtshan ma rang rgyud 'dzin// de ni 'khor ba'i rol pa yin// gang zhig rnal 'byor rtogs ldan la// rgyan dang rol pa sna tshogs kun// sgyu ma'i dpe bzhin snang yang rang bzhin
12a6(rnying rgyud): med// chos nyid chos spu mi snang rang bzhin yod// yod pas med par rtogs pas mtshan mthil gyis gnon// med pas yod par rtogs pas rig pa rang sa zin// de yi ched du rgyan tig bkod pa bzhi ldan mdzes// kyai kye gsang ba'i bdag po rgyan dang rol pa gang byung yang / ngas don gsal
12a7(rnying rgyud): 'dir spras pa bzhin du shes par gyis/ zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ rgyan dang rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / des mtshon tshig rnams gsung du
12b1(rnying rgyud): sa su sa su na na du na nan/ mam na /
12b2(rnying rgyud): dzum ni khyim ma thal lags bcan pa da// yogs 'ongs par rdzogs thag pa dang // rigs dpa'i gang bye ya ga// lags dag la thags sa brtson pa bshang // nga dang pa ca nga dang // yi da
12b3(rnying rgyud): smra byas / rnams na / nga/ sa sa/
12b4(rnying rgyud): pangs/ na dang tshig do bcwa nas pastan pa ma sgri tsa / de nas pa gas yang bdag pa ma rnamapa/ dam tshan rnam ng+ge snang lags/ thabs pam 'as pas gsung dug la/ sa rnam sa/ ga byab /
12b5(rnying rgyud): na du 'i gangs du hU~M/ ca nga pag rdzug bdun rte// na kya nga rgya pa na/ ci sbyi bdag na dang // sun ga rdzum da byas/ la gas bcan padag
12b6(rnying rgyud): nga bye byung // nang kyis sa na kyir wAng ba / na pa da gyu // mags da sa gags rnam brgyan pa ga/ mchi thaM zhi bdag// bla ma snang pa gapags gas pang /
12b7(rnying rgyud): gags ma cir yang byung // dems pa rnams pang ying smras pa min// zhes gsungs so// smos thal dregs pa kyi rgyud rkyen pa las/ can dang la pa mtshon pa 'a ba bstan pa'i mang skye bcudrug pa'o// / phral 'angs brtson pa bdegs la kyi grang kyir brangan
13a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ rgyal po nor bu 'od ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs pas// ngong la nor bu rin po che'i zam tog chen po gcig rin pa che phra mo mang pos bkang nas yod pal khong phyi rol du zhabs 'chag cing yul gzigs su byon pa las/ rgan mo ling tog can bya ba dang 'phrad nas/ rgan mas
13a2(rnying rgyud): sla'o 'brid/ rkun mo mi lngas par du za ma tog bkrus/ sme sha can gyi grong khyer drug tu mun pa'i mi drug la btsongs/ mun pa'i mi drug gis nor bu la mchod pa dang bkur sti chag/ nor bu la yang dgos 'dod ma byung / khong yang yid cung the tsom dzes so// phyis rgyal po la ldam po gcig byung /
13a3(rnying rgyud): rgan mos sla'o la brid/ rkun ma mi lngas brkus/ sge sha can gyi grong khyer drug tu mun pa'i mi drug la btsongs so byas pas/ rgyal po thugs nur te/ rgan mo bsad/ grong khyer drug bcoms/ mun pa'i mi drug la chab bsal/ rkun mo lnga bran du bkol/ nor bu rin po che dang phrad nas yul
13a4(rnying rgyud): bzung ba'i man ngag/ badz+ra a haM rat+na/ dz+nyAn pany+tsa pra par a haM b+hU ti/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das snang ba rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // gong gsungs rtsal dang rol pa de// ma rtog
13a5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin 'khrul par snang // 'khor ba ring rgyud rol bar byung // de yi 'khrul lugs gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs par nyon cig/ gzhi 'gyur ba med par ye nas sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po yin
13a6(rnying rgyud): pas/ sngar yang 'khrul ma myong / da lta yang ma 'khrul/ gyis kyang 'khrul mi srid do// dper na nyi ma'i snying po de la/ mun pa'i gzhi med pa lta bu 'am/ man shel la rkyen dang gang 'phrad de la snang yang / dag pa'i stobs kyis snang mod kyi// kho la 'byar dang gos pa med// de bzhin du
13a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs su ltung ba med pa'i shes rab ni// mgon po gzhi nas rdzogs sangs rgyas// bag chags 'khrul pa ka nas dag/ ma 'khrul pa yi sangs rgyas la// 'khrul pa'i tha snyad ga la yod// 'on kyang de ltar ma rtogs te// nyi ma gcig pas med bzhin du// yul khams re na nyi ma re//
13b1(rnying rgyud): ma blang ba'i skabs kyis spang ba ltar// rang dag gcig las mad bzhin du// gang la sa gnyis 'dum ra// sman dag gzung dbyar med kyang // sman dang dag tu snang bzhin// gnyis ma dag ni snang can pan// gnyis ma dang las mag pas kyang // man tan rtangs byas lnga yang // du mar snang ba 'o
13b2(rnying rgyud): yon tan la// 'khrul par 'gyur bas yon tan gyon du 'char// gong ltar rtogs pas skyon nyid yon tan grol// 'on kyang 'khrul lugs rgyas par ngas bstan gyis// 'khrul pa'i gzhi dang rgyu dang dus// 'khrul pa'i rkyen dang 'khrul pa dngos// 'bring po rnams la ras
13b3(rnying rgyud): bstan nyon// dang po 'khrul pa'i gzhi bstan pa// de la yang ni rnam pa gsum// chos nyid yul gyi 'khrul gzhi dang // rig pa sems kyi 'khrul gzhi dang // 'od lnga lus kyi 'khrul gzhi bstan// dang po chos nyid ris med stong // bar du ye shes rnam par shar// tha mar 'dzin
13b4(rnying rgyud): rtog bag chags brtas// de la snying po med bzhin snang // des ni yul gyi 'khrul gzhi bstan// da ni sems kyi 'khrul gzhi bshad// dang po rig pa 'gag med 'grus// bar du gdangs la 'dzin pa skyes// tha mar sems kyi yid 'grus pa// de las sems rtog du ma shar//
13b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyi 'khrul gzhi der bstan to// 'dis ni lus kyi 'khrul gzhi bstan// dang po rig pa klong nas shar// bar du chos nyid klong du shar// tha ma de la bag chags pas// gzugs kyi phung po rdos bcas snang // lus kyi 'khrul gzhi des bstan to// kye kye gsang bdag nges par rung //
13b6(rnying rgyud): gzhi gsum 'brad pa ngas bshad kyi// chos nyid yul gyi 'khrul gzhi 'thad// ci phyir rig med de la bem por snang // rig pa sems kyi 'khrul gzhir 'thad// ci phyir rig tsam phyogs mthun phyir// 'od lnga lus kyi 'khrul gzhing 'thad// kha dog dbyibs su phyogs mthun phyir// phrad
13b7(rnying rgyud): / rags pa'i khyad par las// gzhi dang dngos kyi khyad par bstan// des mtshon chog rnamasangs pa shang byon// 'khrul pa zhes su bshad pa dang // rig pa zhes su brjod pa dang // za tha nas su brjod pa dang // bskal pa dang po brjod pa dang // thog ma nas su brjod pa dang // 'das

14a2(rnying rgyud): xxx

14a4(rnying rgyud): xxx

14a6(rnying rgyud): xxx
14a7(rnying rgyud): xxx
14b1(rnying rgyud): ma ga cas kyag/ bdun btags pamam shangang / yung tag pa tha gas sa byas te/ yang ca susagyi rdul ba// dpan ma tha ma dang 'drag/ tham sa pas/ ma ga ba pang dag pa da mamaldan/ 'a ba dang/ zla bar dman du na
14b2(rnying rgyud): du nus byed dam thar phun pa'i me la dbang snang ba'am/ snang ba ma dag pa las thag pa pa phrul du spang ba sa nu'o// de ni yang dag par mang bzhin du nga / snang bzhin du byung ba'o// rigs kyi dad ba bzhin du/ ma rig pa sa su myed la nyams su med par// pa
14b3(rnying rgyud): kye them rdzogs pas shes rab kyi tshul ma rdzogs te/ shes rab kyi tshul ma rdzogs pas mdzong po'i yA li ye shrIs kyi rang gdangs lnga pa shes pa'i dran pa ma sad do// de yang ma g.yos pa'i rang kun tu bzang po las/ rang gi dang bzhin ye shes kyi 'byung ba yul ma 'gags par dA rab la/
14b4(rnying rgyud): mamyong ba de las yid 'grogs te/ rang snang chen por rtogs pa'i mtha' mchod do// rigs kyi bu ma rig pa'i gtan tshigs so// ma rig pa dang / ma shes pa dang / gti mug dang / ma rtogs pa dang / mgoms pa dang / don ma mthong bas 'khrul pa dang / phyin ci log pa la sogs
14b5(rnying rgyud): pablang yang ma rig pa gnyis su bshad/ chos gsungs so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po 'khrul pa'i dus ni rang gi lus las shar ste 'dzin pa rtse ba'i dus so// zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gsal gyi zud chen po las/ 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang dus bstan pa'i le 'u ste bco ban
14b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pas zhus pa/ kyai rtse bcom ldan rdo rje 'tshang / gakhrul bu'i rkyen rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi zungs bye shad khyod kyis yid lardung / rdza nang hU~M lis rkyen du bstan// bdag po'i
14b7(rnying rgyud): migs pa'i rkyen// mtshungs pa'i rkyen dang de bzhi'o// rgyu dang rgyu yi rkyen bshad pa'o// rgyu ni rig pa 'gag pa med/ gyen ni chos nyid stong pa yin/ rig pa chos sgra'i mtshan nyid ni/ rig stong dbyer med shes rab thogs pa med/ mthing ga dkar sir dmar dang lha
15a1(rnying rgyud): / g.yas/ sras mtshan/ dang dzin cing du ba/ gnas pas// chas nyid dag pa byu thu dang / lags 'byung ldan namam gtung ma rna ma cugatsun la/ dalas dgazhan bya da gzugs brtan nan// rang sa bya
15a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin tog pa ga can chung// de yi skad cig cims// dmigs pa'i rnam pa sa la du yang // rkyen du 'dzin pa'i ton kyi zung // dpa myigs pa'i can rnaMs badzad// de rnams mdza sangs 'bram chen rdzas// de la mtshungs pa'i rkyen nas 'arjod// dngas ga rgya /
15a3(rnying rgyud): skyes pa yin// de lta ba kyi brnal papas// snod kyi 'jig na migs sa pan pa// nasu pas thA bad rgyun rjod pa 'i sa// chog tu 'i thang brag// u ng+ge dgas pa ni// dri ni sa shes 'jus nas kyis// 'thung ba sa mi bdag nyid can// srid pa ma
15a4(rnying rgyud): dag ste// shid bu shing rigs de las skyes// tshigs snang gnyis kyi bdag nyid can// de ni lus kyi rten yin no// zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu dang mtshan pa'i tshig bstan pa/ deng pog rnam chen god de byung // sangs rgyas sems can 'ag nas 'byung // de gnyis par /
15a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal 'thob// bir kyi bskal bar bshad pa yin// rang gis la gnas pas na// mi babyed pa rjes laH// de ma yin pa dir 'dzin gyis// 'od sde 'grob cing rig pa stongs// mi bskyod rdo rje yin pa bshad// 'grom nus pas 'dra ba yin// dathogs pa pa mi 'gog pa//
15a6(rnying rgyud): dngos sugs lam nus pa yin// migs pa gas pa pa'i bdag nyid can/ gzhi las lags shing sems can sangs rgyas dngos ma yin/ ba na m+bu ga badzin no// myu gu 'byung zhes de la \u0f7f// de bzhin ngas bstan rgya lung dri// gang byung de bzhin shes par gyis// zhes ga
15b1(rnying rgyud): rdzu pa ma sa / mas ma sa sa sa mtha la gas can chu tu /
15b2(rnying rgyud): sa sbyi sa/ sa so// mas ma/ ma ma / rna 'a 'din/
15b3(rnying rgyud): dus kyi sbyong bso dpa 'azung bags cings mtshan// rnal gyi bying bab 'jigs sems bye// ga pa ba da banang thabs/ mam zang mig nyi min// 'i pos nga yin// gsheng can de rjes kya 'a //
15b4(rnying rgyud): ngags ngas// phung po khams dang bye mdzad thug// shid du gdu las rab tu grags// ngalas mang la'am sgras babyung// mi mdud 'jig rten ma par chags// nyon mang sa rags shing 'bas thang na// mthung mamanar myed gnas pa cug/ rjes gsungs so//
15b5(rnying rgyud): thabang dgas pakyi rtse bangs/ na bcad kyi 'phrul brjin pa'i ma du ga sung 'o// / nas pang gsus pa// cong rje 'an chad kun ga/ ba'imadzad kyang thas da // bsgrul pa tham 'i tshig brjod pa// tshogs brgyad ldan pa'i sems can rin/
15b6(rnying rgyud): byed shAHsa pa'i rtogs kya sams pa shad/ mang gi 'dus pas rung po yin// 'dus pa'i phyi nang bzhin no// khams ni mtshan ma chos nyid can// mtshan na brjid nyid bye mched yin// sa su dag gi sgrogs la zhing // rang dang gral yang ba byed
15b7(rnying rgyud): nga na// pa'i du na 'i / cu sa/ sa// de'i phyi na gyu na// 'dugs thal /
16a1(rnying rgyud): / 'du byed sems lagam par byeng // yid la byed pa dmigs pa s+dza// rig pa dag gis gang gcod par// rnam shes rnam par rig pa'o// thams cad kun las byed phyir dang // rgya can las byung 'dra byud yin// rlan las skyes pas klo zlar yin// rdzogs
16a2(rnying rgyud): par smin pas rdzus skyes yin// mngal skyes rim par smin pa'o// sgong las skyes bgyur te sprin// dmyal ba gdung ba'i lam pa yin// yi dwags 'gog pa'i lam pa yin// byol song mun pa'i lam pa yin// mI yi lam ni 'dom pa yin// lha yi lam ni g.yeng ba'o// gnas
16a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir dang bgrod phyir lam// rkyen dang rten pa mi 'bral ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// dmyal ba'i gnas na bzod dang ldan// yi dwags gnas na yid dang ldan// thol song gnas na myos pa dang // mi yi gnas na 'dod dang ldan// g+ha min gnas na cod dang ldan/
16a4(rnying rgyud): yi gnas na dga' ldan no// rten pa'i don phyir gnas su bstan/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi rgyu ni nyon mongs pa ste/ de yang rang rang sgra la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / don gyi bye brag so sor phye na/ las rgyu 'bras dang / de kho na nyid kyi don ma shes pas ma rig pa'o// 'dod
16a5(rnying rgyud): chag ni zhen pa'o// rgyal ni khang+ga pa bo// khong khro ba ni man sa phra pa'o// zhe sdang ni 'jug pa'o// phrag dog ni mi bzod pa'o// de dag ni chu drug go// de las ngo bo drug dang / 'bras bu drug smin pa'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag po// de dag ni/ 'gro ba dug la da ltar gnas pa'i chos te/ chu dang /
16a6(rnying rgyud): byung yang bskal pa za ma'i chos su 'dir bshad pa ltar shes par gyis shig/ ces gsungs so// spos thal don gas pa chen po'i chud pas/ 'byung ba lnga mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ 'khor brgyan dang /
16a7(rnying rgyud): ril par shar pa 'don de ltar lags na/ de ltar 'byung ba'i 'byung ba lnga bshad du gsol/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bongs tshig dang // dbyi ba dpe dang bcas pa rnams// ngas bshad khyod kyis yid la zung // ngo bo debye ba'i sgo nas bstan//
16b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba dngas ma lnga dang snyigs ma lnga// dngas ma lnga ming po ni// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes ste// snyigs ma sa mang po ni// sarba ma rlung nam mkha' lnga// 'byung ba lnga yongs tshig bstan pa ni// rig pa'i rtsal du 'char ba dang // rtsa la las 'khor 'das snang ba /
16b2(rnying rgyud): dbyen mu bzhir shes par bya// dngas ma sdigs ma rnam pa gnyis// tshe re la'ang de bzhin te// rigs kyis khyod legs par zung zhig/ 'byung ba'i dngas me 'od lnga'o// snyigs mas chu mi byung ngo // dngas pa'i snyigs ma sha dang rus la sogs// snyigs mdi dngas ma
16b3(rnying rgyud): tshon rnam pa lnga// dpe ni nyi ma'i 'od zer dang // man shel dag la 'od snang bzhin// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ 'byung ba lnga mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i mo 'u sto ter gnyis pa'o// // yang gsang ba'i bdag po sa zhus pa/
16b4(rnying rgyud): kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // snyig ma ba sa b+h+ya A thA// dngas mra pA las ji ltar shar// dngas ma 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// chos nyid don la sbyar na ji ltar sbyar// snyikA ma dngas mar grol na ji ltar grol// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal
16b5(rnying rgyud): pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ si yi mtshan nyid srob yin// chu yi mtshan nyid gsher ba yin// me yi mtshan nyid tsha ba yin// rlung gi mtshan nyid yang zhing g.yo// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yang shing go 'byed pa'o// rang rang las kyang de bzhin dbye/ dngas ma'i sa las 'o
16b6(rnying rgyud): zer dkar po byung // pas snyigs mas dusnang // de bzhin dngas ma'i 'byung ba las// 'od zer rnam pa bzhi ru zung // de la sdigs me bzhi ru snang // dngas ma'i stegs ma'i mtshan nyid ni// srab med par brtan pa dang // gsher ba med par sdud pa dang // g.yo ba med pa
16b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // tsha ba med par bsreg pa'o// khyab pa med pa'i gdangs can yin// chos nyid chos spu 'gyur ba med// dbyer med sra ba med par brtan pa nges// chos nyid chos sku gnyis med de// dag bzang bral dri ma med// thams cad de yi ngang du 'dus// gsher
17a1(rnying rgyud): @pa med par sdud pa'i chu// chos nyid chos skra dbyer mdang // gangab med par thogs pa med// g.yob med par bskyed pa'i rlung // masang gnas sa phyin pa'o// chos nyid chos sku gnyis med pas// ye shes chen pa rang gi gdangs pa 'azhugs/
17a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan du snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa mi meng 'bris// tsha ba med par bsreg pa med// gzhan snang med par rang gsal ba// khyad par ye shes gdangs dang bcas// nam mkha' khyab pa med pas gdangs can yin// snyigs ma'i dbyung lnga 'od lnga'i nang du grol// 'od lnga dngas
17a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i go ru brim// de bzhin rtags kyang rim par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang / shar lugs drim lugs don dang sbyar nas bshad pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas gsang
17a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'byung ba lnga la gnas pa la// bskal pa zhes su grags pa ste// de yi don bshad gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/ kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ bskal pa'i ngo bo bstan pa ni/
17a5(rnying rgyud): dang pa ye shes yul shar ba// shar bya sher byed ltar snang bas// dang po'i dus su chos nying bskal// ngar du 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis// ye shes snang ba nang du nub// snod kyi 'jig rten bskal zhes bshad// mtha' ma gzung 'dzin gnyis su bskul// sangs rgyas sems can da
17a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin bskal// nges tshig gtan tshigs bcas pa yin// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin no// yun du gnas pas bskal pa'i sgra// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsil mi rgyud chen po las/ bskul pa gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// // nam mkha'i
17a7(rnying rgyud): mthong nas snang gsal ci sbron mi shar bas/ mtshan mo sun pasel ba'i man ngag/ a badz+ra he ma rat+na kA ya oM dz+nyA na ka la bag bku la ya san dza hU~M rnams rag tu ta du ya I/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po// thugs rje 'byung ba sku gsam gyi dgongs pa la snyoms
17b1(rnying rgyud): par zhugs so// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ gya kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / 'khor ba'i rol par shar ba da ltar na// de yi 'dul byed gnyen po rgya// dag pa chos sku chen po las// sku gnyis ral ba ji ltar shar// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/
17b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i sku gnyis snang ba yang // nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid la// man shel lta bu'i rig pa gsal// nyi zer lta bu'i thugs rje byung // nad pa lta bu'i rigs drug la// mun pa lta bu'i gti mug pas// dug gsum nad rnams sel bar byed// ces gsungs so//
17b3(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje 'od dpag med// chos sku gzhi snang chen po la// 'bras bu longs su ji ltar rdzogs// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// thugs rje sku gnyis snang ba yang // gdul bya rnams la shar bar zad// rang
17b4(rnying rgyud): las shes rab skur snang bar// mtshan mar bcas pa'i sku mi snang // ye shes rang rig chen po la// mtshan ma gzhan snang rnam tog med// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye ston pa thugs rje che mnga' bas// shes rab sku lnga gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas
17b5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rig pa gcig gi ngo bo las// thams cad 'char zhing snang ba'i phyir// kun snang chen po zhes kyang byi// rang rig yon tan ma 'gags pas// rang byung chen po zhes su bshad// thugs rje'i stobs dang ldan pas 'od dpag med// shes rab thogs pa med
17b6(rnying rgyud): pas don yod grub// de nyid 'gyur ba med pas mi bstod pa// stong pa rig pa gnyis med ye shes thogs pa med// shes rab sku lnga 'ongango bo yin// dbye ba yon tan sgo nas dbye// nges tshig shes rab la de ltar mkhyen pa ma 'gags pas shes rab kyi sku'o// yang na rang la
17b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab ma 'gags la/ gdul bya la skur snang ba'i phyir na yang de skad ces btags so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ rang la sgra mi snang ba'i gtan tshigs ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po legs par zung zhig/ rang gi rireg pa dngos
18a1(rnying rgyud): mang ya dag zang tham can pa yan/ dad na byas par ga/ na // gzhan ma pas dug // gzugs rnam canam med pas ga pa nga mazang mon/ naganyapa gnas sags ldan mang bad 'asang ngan na ga rnam
18a2(rnying rgyud): pas chen par bshad/ ces gsangs so// zlos tha ba de na gas pachen pa'i rgyud las/ chos skangs rdugs gzugs su gnyis dbyung bang bstan pa dang / chos nyid pa rig pa dang snang las zla gnyis med par bstan pa'i lan hU~M rdza pa // da nam pa
18a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye rtse bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul na zhes ni gang la bgyi// spu ru snang cu la ji ltar snang // zhes nus pas/ ston pas gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po lags par zung zhig/ rnam dag stug rdzo bkod pa yi// chos nyid chos sgrar dbyer mang
18a4(rnying rgyud): klong // ye shes rang gdangs bum pa lnga// ma 'gags pa yi myu gu snang // chos nyid dag pa'i snang cha lnga// mthing ga dkar mer dmar dang ldang // ma 'dres gsal ba'i ye shes rdzogs// de lnga'i nang nas sgra lnga grub// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gnas te// dbus ni
18a5(rnying rgyud): kun sdang ye shes la// bzhi po rnam sdang kun tu zhal// mi bskyed ri ni 'byung chen po dang // 'od dpag med dang don grub chen por snang // drug mtshan rang gi thugs pa gnas// kha dog lnga yi bdag nyid 'dzin// gdan gsum dang la yongs su rdzogs// gdul bya rigs pa
18a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas te// dag gtsang gsal ba'i me long la// byad kyi rnam pa shar ba ltar// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gis ni// chos nyid dag pa'i snang ba la// mi bskyod rdo rje rin chen 'byung ldan dang // ldang ba mtha' yas don grub shar// gdan gsum dang la lhun gyis rdzogs//
18a7(rnying rgyud): rang rang phyag mtshan thugs la gab// dbyer med rdo rje skyil lung bzhugs// ye shes lnga yi sbubs na gsal// rang rangs sor chos nyid chen po las// lnga thos so'i sbubs na gnas// rare la yang bzhi bzhis bskor// ye shes lnga rdzogs rtsal gyi mtshan nyid 'dzin/
18b1(rnying rgyud): sa pam sunam dam sa na// sa nas nas sa// spyan shu sa su sas+ho// / sa sa// smra na// zung byed//
18b2(rnying rgyud): so// spos thal don gsapa chen po'i chud las/ shes rab kyis gdul byal su phyagargyar gas la lugs dang gdul bya'i skur rdzogs shing mtshon pa'i shar ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ sa kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po
18b3(rnying rgyud): gnas dang gdan rnams gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ gnas med gnas chen chos nyid rnam dag na// ma bris dkyil 'khor 'gags med 'od du gsal// yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ bzhugs gnas chen po dar bshad do//
18b4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs gdan gyi khyad par gyis// rtags dang khyad par chos kyi gdan// rtags pa rnam pa lngar bshad de// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags// rtsal gsum rdzogs pa med chen gdan// sku gsam chos nyid dang na gnas// mi 'gyur glang chen gdan du bting sa// dngos
18b5(rnying rgyud): med brda' yin chos nyid dang la bzhugs// sku gnyis chos nyid spyod pa'i rtags// 'gyod pa'i shugs 'chang rta mchog gdon// mtshon pa'i brdad byed thugs rje'i drags kyis bskyod// thugs rjes 'gro la mdzes pa'i don byed pas// mdzes pa ma bya'i gad na mchog bting //
18b6(rnying rgyud): des mtshon dpe yis mthun par snang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis phrin las thogs med mdzad// de yi rtags su mkha' lding thogs med gdan// de dang ma yin chos mthun mtshon pa'i dpe// dngos su thugs rje rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan// thabs ma 'gags pa'i ye shes dang shes
18b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid las// gnyis med su dang ye shes gsal// de rtags nyi zla rnam gnyis gdan// brjod mtshon sgra ste stong pa'i ye shes dngos// ran rig khong nas ye shar dri mas slob med/ des mtshon pad+ma'i gdan te dngos med don la sbyor// zhes gsungs so// blos
19a1(rnying rgyud): na ma dan gsul sab+ha man pa pas/ bzugs gnas da nga ga na bstan pa'i gsun na bdun pa// da nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pas rnas pa/ sa bsam ldan pa 'chang // gangan kyang ba sa rgyag dang // dang
19a2(rnying rgyud): dpe rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rnga ba tshas nyid 'gyur med yin// bkrus pa de las med mod kyi// dbye ba'i sgo nas mtshon nas kyang // rtags kyi gdun la rnam pa lnga// khyad par gdan la rnam pa gnyis// chos nyid
19a3(rnying rgyud): gdan la'ang dngang mtshungs// rang rang don sde ro las myod// nges tshig de la bzhugs kyi gdan zhes bya// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// rtags dang khyad par chos dang gsum// de las kyi bas gong ma bzhin// dpe ni rgyal blon gang na la bzhugs pa bzhin// zhes
19a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ gdan gyi don bshad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ g+he kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdan la rdzogs pa'i gtso bo las// 'khor gyi snang ba
19a5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar shar// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// rjes 'jug 'khor la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod las// sa snying byams pa g.yas dang g.yon// thugs rje thabs kyi sgra ru shar//
19a6(rnying rgyud): ma tshan mangs zas sman dag las// lA s+ya puT g.yas dang g.yon// thabs dang thabs kyi cha 'dzin las// shes rab zhes rab cha 'dzin pas// re ral 'ad gnyis gzhis snang // tshemabu'i dkyilang khor gcig nang gsal// de bzhin den chen 'azung ldan las//
19a7(rnying rgyud): kun zang nam mkha'i sbyi po gnyis// g.yas dang g.yon du rkang cing gas pa// mA ma kI lam g.yas gapa nad// sA d+hu ba gnyis sngags pa// tshem bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po gcig/ bcom ldan sdang ba mtha' yas las// spyan ras gzigs dang 'angam papa
19b1(rnying rgyud): gas// ma gagasagasas dang ga nanags pa// sum canan pa 'ang sangs// ma na can// gsasadag pad pa 'ad gnas la na nga ma mdam du can brgyamatan dra ma nga 'a rangs// kand ma 'ang /
19b2(rnying rgyud): grayas dang g.yon rnam par gsal// yum chen dam tshig spong mangs// dz+ra hU~M gartag las dang g.yon// tsam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po gcig/ yab rnams kun tu bzang po la// tham rnams kun tu bzang mong // de yos kun zang ra ba samags pa// de rnams kyi
19b3(rnying rgyud): ci log bzhi ye// mtha' gnyis pas ni rab 'das shing // rtag cang mthang bzhin mi par dag/ brjod pas skob yab sum brgyad// yon tan rgya la rdzogs pa 'gags bzhi bcu gnyin// mtshan dadu dab pyad ma lus rdzogs// thugs rje'i mdzar stong can dang rol par
19b4(rnying rgyud): shar// nam rtog mi mang 'a cir yangs mer mkhyen// ye zhes lus ma chos kyi sman pang 'bas// ma ni par rdzogs pa'ims cas me rnams cad mtshan// ma gags dang byung yon su gsung ni 'akur nad log drug/ thugs rje sprus su bya ba ga rim 'gags// zhes
19b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs sa// spros thal dan gsam gyi drung chen pa las/ sangs su rje ma bstan pa'i mabu sten dpung na// da rnaMs yang ston pas gsungs / de yi mthon pa'i chog rnams pashad kyis legs par zung zhig/ rnyed dang lung du ngas ba shad pa'i/
19b6(rnying rgyud): zhes su 'byung na de skad bshad// dkyil 'khor nas su 'byung ba dang // gtso 'khor zhes su 'byung ba dang // lnga ldan rdzogs ldan zhes su 'byung ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa dang // rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas zhes pa dang // sems dpa' mams ma zhes pa dang //
19b7(rnying rgyud): sal rang snang zhes pa dang // mtshan rdzogs rdorje 'chang gis zhes pa rnams// tshig rnaM mang yang mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// sbrel mtshan pas rababartan pas// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang zhes so// 'bod skad dathabs gsumangon gyis log sdebs la// 'ongs rgyu
20a1(rnying rgyud): / snang bang bzhin pa shang// ces gsungs sa// sras thal dan gas pa 'i chung can das/ longs su mtshan du 'chag banan pang ma thags ma tha rda// de nas yang gas dbang bdag ngas zhus pa/ legs pa sna byadang// sa
20a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// longs spyod rdzogs sa su yi rgyal// bzhi brgya rtsa gnyis 'od gsal ba'i// khyi yi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// rang rang don la ji ltar ltar// zhes gus so// rton pas bka' stsal pa// spyi mi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i
20a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga// byas pa med par rang byung bas// longs spyod chen po 'od kyi sku// grub tshul mtshon tshul bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// mtshan ci rnam grangs gtso bor bsdus// rnam snang la sogs rigs lnga'i sgra// maM phreng nang gi
20a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan bzhin// snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sku// thun mo ta mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku// s+pha re la yang yongs rdzogs pa'o// thun mod kyi yi mtshon dang bstan// longs spyod rdzogs pa sgra yi rgyal// sku yi rngams dang gzi brjid kyis// sbas sku'i mtshan ma zil gyis
20a5(rnying rgyud): gnon// che ba'i yon tan mdor bsdus yin// bzhi btu rtsa gnyis 'od gsal ba// rang rang lha yi don bshad na// sku gcig sde lngar gsal ba rnam par snang mdzad yin// de la 'gyur ba med pa mi bskyod pa// yon tan stsogs med 'ju gis rin meni 'byung ldan yin// dri
20a6(rnying rgyud): mas mgos thugs rje'i rtsal snang ni// 'od dpag med de pad+ma'i sku// gang la thogs med padag gzhan don 'grub pas// phrin las mthar phyin don yod grub pa'i sku// yon tan chen po kun tu rgyas pa dang // shes rang rnam gnyis kun baspyod yongs spyod pas// thugs
20a7(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// spu lnga ye shes lnga ldan mi 'gyur mi byed pas// thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje rtsa lpags pa// ngo bo mi gur rang bzhin mi 'gag par// drub rje yon tan thams cad 'byung bas na// thugs kyi rang bzhin nor bu rin chen gsal// rang
20b1(rnying rgyud): dri med rnam dag pas// thugs kyi rang bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad gnas// thugs kyi dgongs pa mtha' bzhi las 'das shing // tshad med ye shes phrin las rnam pa bzhis// 'gro don ma lus rdzogs mdzad pas// thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje rgya tham gsal// sum ni ye shes snang ba
20b2(rnying rgyud): ste// su mdog phyag mtshan yab dang mthun// gnyis med ye shes 'od du gsal// ma bcos rang bzhin yongs la khyab pa'i dbyings// yum gyur kun tu bzang mo'i don// rang bzhin mi 'gyur ngo bo 'gag pa med// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan gyi don la sbyar// yon tan
20b3(rnying rgyud): mdor bsdus rang bzhin mnyam par sbyar// yum gyur mA ma kI yi don la sbyar// yon tan smin byed rang bzhin kun thobs// 'od kyi mdangs dang ldan pas dri mas mgos so sor sbyor// yum gyi rang bzhin gos dkar mo dang sbyar// rang bzhin skye ba med cing mi ldog gnas su sgrol//
20b4(rnying rgyud): mi 'da' 'gyur med dang la gnas pas na// dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bgyi'i don la sbyor// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang / rigs lnga yum lngar sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i
20b5(rnying rgyud): bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / 'khor rnams don la ji ltar sbyar// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 'khor gyi rnam grangs mang mod kyang // yab kyi cha 'dzin yab la sbyor// yum gyi cha 'dzin yum la sbyor// yab yum
20b6(rnying rgyud): gad yang gong du sbyar ba bzhin// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / 'khor rnams don du sbyar ba gsung par zhu/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ mi bskyod chen po'i zhal gzigs pas// me long ye shes don rig pa//
20b7(rnying rgyud): sa yi snying po don gyi mtshan// gsal ba'i rten gyur ma gyes byams pa'i don// gzigs pa'i rnam pa ma 'gags pas// de gnyis dus mtshungs lnga s+ya puSh+pe'i mtshan// rin 'byung chen po'i zhal gzigs pas// mnyam nyid ye shes rig pa kun tu bzang // gsal ba'i rten
21a1(rnying rgyud): !/ gyur ma rdzas nam mkha' dun// don ma rmugs pa mA pa ma 'don// 'ad pag mad kyi na la gzigs pas// sa sar kun rtogs lags don dag pa// kun dasagazugs kyi na dang byung// gsal ba'i rten gyur ma thos 'jam dbul na
21a2(rnying rgyud): skyes pa'i yum gyur gI tI ma// ye shes don rnams ma sor bstan// ji ltar bskyed du mer me gsal// don grub chen po'i zhal mthong ba// gya grub ye shes lngar glu rigs pas// phyag na rdo rje'i don gyi mtshan// skye ba'i rten gyur ma skyes sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i don// @
21a3(rnying rgyud): bya skyed byed dus nges nI tI gan+d+he ma// brjod pa mang yang mdor bsdus pa'o// gnyis med dbyings dang me shes kun bzang yab sam ngon// mtha' bzhi las grol bdud ba zhi dang gis bcom// byin ci log las grol ba'i slob pa ni// ye shes tshad med bzhi yis don mdzad sgom
21a4(rnying rgyud): bani// skyem nga ba nyid kyi sbyang drug/ ma ngagags thub brjig gdon gyur// zhes gsungs so// sa thal don gas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ longs su pa khar gyi nu ba la stong ba bstan pa'i man sa sa gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pas
21a5(rnying rgyud): zhus pa/ kyai gre bcom san rdo rje'i rgyang / langs su shang lugs de kar ni// sprul ba m+bu yaM zhing khams 'dir// smin pa rtson sngags ji ltar lags// sprul pa'i surnams de ltar shung// zhes byas so// tsobo rdo rje 'dzin pa ston cig/ chos sgra'i ngad gyur longs su ba'i
21a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis// de yi gsung las rol pa'i sbrul sku rnams// gdul ba drug las sor 'tshams par bshad pado// zhes gsungs so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ snron brtson gzhid ltar na// sku yi 'khrungs rten gang zhig gis// rtogs pa'i shes rab ji ltar skyeste// zhes
21a7(rnying rgyud): zhus su// ston pas bka' stsal ba/ phading ma lam brten par// thung ba ma tog 'dzin pa ltar// su dum wa ra'i me tog la// rig pa'i ye shes las zhugs bdus nas kyis// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ ngas len mthong ba'i lus
21b1(rnying rgyud): smras/ // na s+ho// nga du nan/ sa ga
21b2(rnying rgyud): mi chos su dag pa las// thams cad margyan pa mam shas shang // mangs sum pa pyid lhan rdzogs pas// rnam pa thams cad mgrin par shad // nga dang sprul ba'i sku yin pas// rdos rnams dang blang chen gang// nga yi ga di la dbang bzhidogs// rnga bachen po 'di
21b3(rnying rgyud): bcas// de'i tshe dang dbang dang gis thob// thugs rje'i sgo snga ma 'gags pas// gdul bya'i zhing dag thugs rjes zin// yid kyi rnam shes rang byung bas// shes rab 'byung ba'i gzhi ma 'gags// suM yi rnam shes sprul pa'i wa// tshig rnams dang rang don pa sbyor//
21b4(rnying rgyud): nes gsungs so// smos thal don gsal gyi rlung chen po las/ sprul pa'i sgra'i ltur 'jig rten du byang tshul bstan pa'i leT b+h+yo so gsum pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ gya rtsi ston pa rdo rje 'chang // sku gsum gyi don bshad gsung du gsol/
21b5(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ chos spu nang ba ni phyogs spyang med pa'i shes rab dang gnyis su med pa no// mongs su ring po ni/ mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes gsal ba la mi rtog pa'o// sprul pa'i sku bo ngo bo ni/ thugs rje ma 'gags pa'o// chos chu'i ngas
21b6(rnying rgyud): cig ni khyab pa dang ni na pa'o// longs su'i dis tshig ni/ zhing dag pa dang 'khor smin pa dang mangs smad pa'o// sbrul sgra'i ngas tshig nim 'gags pa'i thugs rje sna tshogs par sprul pa'i phyir sgral smra'o// yun rnying ba'i phyir srung sla'o// mthun par snang ba'i phyir sbal smra'o// mangs
21b7(rnying rgyud): par snang ba'i phyir na sprul sku'o// chos sul dbyen gsum ste/ rig pa ngos bcung zal zhing me 'gyur bas/ chos sku'i chos smra'o// rig pa shes rab kyis sbrul mthun pa ma 'gegs pa ma chosi spu'i longs smra'o// gdul gyil snang pa'i spu lnga ni/ chos spu'i spu'i spu'o// rigs
22a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ kyi ba de la ning po rang bzhin thugs rjegs ma zhes kyang rgyu'o// gzhil gnas pa'i sku gsum zhes ca 'o// 'bras bu gzhi la grub pa zhes snang bya'o// gru gsum nga log chen po zhes kyang bya'o// 'bras bu'i ngang la gnas pa nas kyang bya'o// longs sul
22a2(rnying rgyud): chos su chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// longs spu'i longs sgyu rigs bzhi'o// longs spu'i sbrul su ni sems dpa' dang sems ma'o// de rnams la mtshan gyi bye brag ni/ 'bras bu mngon du gsal ba zhes bya'o// lu gsum rnam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o// longs
22a3(rnying rgyud): / sku'i gru gsum mo// sbrul lu'i sku gsum ni/ rigs bzhi chos kyi sku'o// sems dpa' sems ma longs su'o// thugs rje'i 'od zer sprul pa'i sku'o// kye sems dpa' chen po de la ni thugs rje 'byung ba'i sku gsum zhes kyang bya'o// sku gsum mtha' la bstsal ba zhes kyang bya/ de rnams
22a4(rnying rgyud): / rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs la gnas shing / ston pa'i don mdzad pas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sku gsum zhes bya'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag po nges par zung zhig/ nga rdo rje sems dpa' ni sbrul sku'i chos sku'o// nga yi dbu yi thor tshugs dang / mdzod spu'i bu ka dang / shangs kyi sgom la sogs pa
22a5(rnying rgyud): rnams nas sku 'jam dpal dri med snying po la sogs pa rnams ni srul sku'i longs sku'o// bub pa drug dga' rab rdo rje la sogs pa rnams ni sbrul sku'i sbrul sku'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyad las/ sku gsum bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi
22a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // de mtshon tshig rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po// ngas bstan rgyad lung thams cad du/ ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba rnam
22a7(rnying rgyud): grangs gang byung yang // ngas bstan gong bzhin shes par gyis shig/ yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ rnam grangs don rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nim byas pa/ ma bcos pa/ ma bslad pa/ mi 'gyur ba rang bzhin rnam par
22b1(rnying rgyud): / dag pa/ 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes chen po// nam mkha'i lta bu'i chos nyid/ stong ba rdo na'i chos can/ rig pa dngos med ye dgazung thal chen po'o// rang bzhin ni gzhi gnas kyi ye shes chen po la/ mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye zhes lnga/ ma 'gags pa rang po nang na 'od gsal
22b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje ni snying po sku lnga/ phyag rgya mi 'gag par gsal ba'o// rigs kyi phu ngo bo chos kyi sku/ rang bzhin longs su/ thugs rje sprul sku ste/ thams cad kyi gzhi ma 'gags par gnas pas gzhi gnas kyi sku gsum mo// rgya dgang chos kyi skul/ 'bras bu dag
22b3(rnying rgyud): / nyid gzugs su gnyis nang gsal du gnas pa ni/ yon tan du grub pa ste/ gzhi la grub pa'i sku gsum zhes bya'o// sku gsum nga log zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan nyid sde gsum las rnga log ste/ 'dus byas kyi chos ka nas dag pas rang kyang gi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'o// sngags
22b4(rnying rgyud): palas nga log ste/ rigs lnga gdul bya la snang bas phul pa ste/ longs sprul sprul sbyang log go// rdzogs pa chen po la sogs pa gyi thun mong las log ste/ bdag gis ma bsgom mi bsgom bdag nyid chen po'i dgongs pa dang mi 'bral bar gnas so// 'dug tshul log ste//
22b5(rnying rgyud): sgragazugs su gnyis kyi bdag med bsam 'das kyi sku yin pas/ chos spang log go// longs su sbrul srung nga log ceng / sbrul sku longs srung nga log pas na rnga log go// rigs kyi bu des na longs su man chad nas ltos pa'i brjod tshig go// de la byed pa med par rang bzhin
22b6(rnying rgyud): gyis de ltar gnas pas na chen po'o// sku gnyis rang gi gzhi'i ngang la gnas shing 'bras bu'i dang la gnas pas na/ don 'gyur ba med par gnas so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po rnam sdang la longs sgra'i chos skur bzhag pa ni/ rnam snang la rigs bzhi 'byung zhing rnam
22b7(rnying rgyud): snang gi yon tan gyis khyab pa ste/ regra bzhi'i gzhi'am shes byar gyur pa'o// rigs bzhi yang yang rnam snang gis thugs rnam par dag pa la longs spyod mar 'khor du smin pas sems dpa' dang sems ma la thugs rje spyod pa'o// des na rigs bzhi longs su'o// de las thugs
23a1(rnying rgyud): sa ngas sams sa ma na dasag sa zug sumatho dag ga ma tu gang tha sa pa mas pa pa sa
23a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras pa mngon par gas la pa'i dus shes par bya'o// chags sam khyen pas ya chos bla gas pa zhing / sman gyi bral bas pa gra gas te/ ba na mtshag gas la bas na/ rnam par bzhag par/ rgyas kyi ldan kyis nag sa mad ba ga cig la rna
23a3(rnying rgyud): ba sa la gtag ga pang 'dzubs/ 'dam tha ba thag na ga da/ na kyi panas rgyam ngabs/ thag du pa'i rtags pa ni/ thags na ba thugs pa sa nam gyu / sa
23a4(rnying rgyud): da ngos mdzad pas sprul pa'i sgraH/ 'thob 'dul ba'i drugs ma tho// na 'gags pa sngal ba'i sgra ste/ rtsal la ma thugs rje nga ba 'o// des chos thugs pa dang / l+r-ing sa zhes pa dang / thugs rjegs pa dang / sprul pa'i rtsazhes pa dang / mgon po zhes pa dang /
23a5(rnying rgyud): dpal zhes pa dang / skyabs zhes pa dang / gon pazhes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi smon ma zhes pa 'dod bsdus nas bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs ma// spos thal ngan gsal gyi chung chen pa las/ sngags ma mtshan pa'i tshig dang sgra'i rnam sangs bstan pa'i mdzu ste sul
23a6(rnying rgyud): 'o// / nas gas pa bdag dus gas pa/ thugs sa yinas N+Das ng+ge// sangs mang// sa pa nga gsung sas// zhes thas pas ston pas bka' stsal ba/ sangs sbyin kya dzam ma med pa'i ma sa so/
23a7(rnying rgyud): tshis nonon mongs pa'i dri ma dag cing / mkhyen pa'i ye shes byas pas na'o// dbyen gnyis nyig zhi ldan pa pa dang / rtogs pa mngon kyang zhes kyi'o// del nig shi gzhi di'i mtshan dang ldan pas na/ sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// chos sulas yongs su bached cing / dro
23b1(rnying rgyud): skyel sru rganapas/ lung thag thab 'azung ba tha na kun pa / rtags pa'i shes nyis mag dgas pa 'du na/ nga / sa dus pa ma nga/ ngas
23b2(rnying rgyud): sa pa bdag gi dpa s+ho// lung bye du byed ci 'char bus na thag pa rdeg na kyi dpal la// 'gro ba'i mdag pa'i mun bsel ba'i ston man// nga gas seMso// spos bu don gapa pa che ma rgyang pas/ sangs ces kyi tsho ga dang / mtshan
23b3(rnying rgyud): mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u stes drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos smras pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdorje 'chang // chos su'i bdud 'a'orjes ji ltar lags// longs su bdud 'joms rba skar lags// sprul pa'i 'dud 'joms ni ltar lags/
23b4(rnying rgyud): zhes sbas so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ chos su 'gag pa med pas 'chi bdag gi/ bdung ba tsam/ mtshan ma med pas phung po'i bdud bu com/ de gnyis su med pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang lha'i bu'i bdud bcom/ ngani ngang gis bcom pa yin/ srog ma swa
23b5(rnying rgyud): lngas 'ji bdag gi bdud bcom/ ye shes skams phung po'i bdud bcom/ sems dog med kyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang lha'i bu'i bdud bcom/ chos su don ldan rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom/ rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa'i bu'i don ldan rtogs pas nyon mangs
23b6(rnying rgyud): bdud dang zhwa'i bu'i bdud pa de bzhin bcom/ longs su'i don ldan rtogs pas byung ba'i bdud kyang bcom/ zhes gsungs so// yang gas pa'i bdug pos bris pa/ chos su'i ldan lugs ji ltar lags// 'ongs bu'i ldan lugs rje ltar lag pa// grul bu'i
23b7(rnying rgyud): gas ga gis// zhes zums// gan pas sa pa/ sa tha ra tu ga mangs pas// mags dang drug ldan// 'angs chum can dang byang tsun// dag po mi gas sa/ mang pa zhes pa ma ldan/
24a1(rnying rgyud): na// / smrasas smra smra sa sa/ ga rdzu / na
24a2(rnying rgyud): su sa
24a3(rnying rgyud): / smra
24a4(rnying rgyud): sa
24a5(rnying rgyud): ga sa sa pa sa ma /
24a6(rnying rgyud): rnas pa// sngagasum thogs rjem 'gags pas// na mngang rgyu la ra lags// sbyin pas bka' la pa/ rigs pa dang ma thos pa 'i brgyad ldan pa'i changang smras so// de nas ba cad kyi bar du shes ra zla thog shing la shes snang khring baban ngas/
24a7(rnying rgyud): pas bdag 'tshal te/ dgongs bzhid lag thal la// de nas pa bcang kyibar yul 'i ming dubyu sa ma du te/ sa sa dang pa kho rnams kyi bsngal gyi gdung ba bsal te/ rin pa pa 'di srung 'atsunan gzung brgyas nas 'thar sa
24b1(rnying rgyud): bdang te/ thugs ngas gzhan brnal pa zur/ ma pa 'dan sa dgongs nas drag pa tha mang rnams bshad do// nganas yang na 'bar ba'i rtso ma lasangs rgyas kyi bden pa nges par mthang nas/ snang bskong ba'i chos rnams pashad do// nganas ba skong su ma la/ rlung da pa
24b2(rnying rgyud): gsang barmad du byung ba rnams thugs las bkrol/ mgur gyi bum pa la 'dril/ ljags kyi brgyal bskyon/ yon tan rnam pa lnga'i rnam par shes pas pa krams/ rig pa'i kha thug gzung dbyangs yan lag drug tu dang ldan pa gcig tu bshad de/ 'khor gyi tho gro tsham dang gas pa
