24b3(rnying rgyud): bcad do// lo nyi shurtsa bzhin mya ngan las 'da' bar zhal tshams rnam pa gsum bshad do// rjes 'jug gi don du spos bral don gsal dang gcig/ gcig shes klan grol dang gnyis/ rin chen kun 'dus deng gsum bshad do// nga'i rjes su ni 'jug yang dang phrang po'i skam
24b4(rnying rgyud): b.re ba rnams kyi da du bzhig pa'o// da skyegasum ci gdung rnyed de bzhan du bzhag nas/ nga yongasas mya ngan pas 'das so// zhes pa 'ongs pa'i don dude skad smos shig/ ces gsungs so// sgras bral den gsul ldan pa'i byud sa la tha da me gas pasan pa'i ma
24b5(rnying rgyud): brdung ba'o// / sa yang so rapas mchon pa pasas sa mi thab pa'i dgangs pal bzugs so// don ci la dgas pa'i bdag thos rnas pa/ skye gre btsam ldan thabs ba // ldem tha 'a ni la dgongs pa yi// thed brgyad don rnams gsung drug po'o// zhes bus so// rjen
24b6(rnying rgyud): ba rgya mchod rten pang rim dgra pa'i steng nas ston pa gsu'i bya 'azlag smang lan bzhin 'don pa'i man dag/ swA hAs rba yAn sras rangs ya/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ seshegasang pa'i bdag po legs par thang zhig/ nga dang nga'i sprul ba yas/ thun mong rje dang blang par gyi
24b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gdul bu rnam pa gnyis la/ sde ma dgangs sra bstan pa'o// ldem pa'i skab di ltar te// nyan thos ring rgyal sems dpa' dang // the rog sde gsum bskyed rdzogs gnyis// bden pa grogs re nas bzung nas// gza' gtad bcas pa'i ska ba brgyad// blo yul
25a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi mur 'dzin pas// rang rig ye shes la ma zlos// de bas phyin ci log pa yin// don las nyams dang gol ba'i phyir// zhe 'dod blo yi lta ba yin// kye gsang ba'i bdag po zhe 'dod chas pa'i lta ba brgyad/ gang zag bdag med
25a2(rnying rgyud): gas kyang chos sde bdag ma spangs// chos kyi bdag ni gzung 'dzin gnyis su snang // 'dzin pa'i rgyan rtog skad cig 'gags// rtag chang gnyis las 'das par blta// dbe na du bo gang+gA bzhin// gzung bu kun rdzob rnam par bsal// don dmadul thanangs su 'dod// dab /
25a3(rnying rgyud): g.yag dz+rad seng bzhen// mdo sde bye brag gnyis su 'dod// nyan thos ni 'dod yin pasan// gnyis med pade chen don dang 'gal// gang zag bdag med gang mthun des rtogs la// chos kyi khams la phyogs gcig bdag med lte// de gnyis mtshan mang nges 'dzin pa// rang rgyal zhe 'don
25a4(rnying rgyud): lta ba yis// gnyis med pade chen don las nyams// bdag gnyis bral bar blta zhing bden gnyis tshul du 'dod// don dam sems su blta ba dang // kun rdobaskung pa mi 'debs pa// dper na rje lam sdig rgya bzhin// byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba yin// gnyis med ye shes don
25a5(rnying rgyud): la// me tog skye 'gagu med pa'i ngang las ma ga yos kyang // sems dpa' rnam gnyis rje dang bran dub sta// bi hwA'i rta ba ni 'dod dang bcas pas// kun bzang ba chen don dang 'gal// me rtog rang las ma g.yos skye 'gag bral bzhin du// sems dpa' rnam gnyis sun dang grogs por/
25a6(rnying rgyud): blta// u ba yo ga'i 'dod pa yis// dbyer med ye shes pade chen don las 'gul// maskyes 'gag pa med rnying mi rtog g.yo ba med bzhin du// khams dang lce mched lha dang lha mor blta// mahA zhe 'dod mtshan mang 'dzin// spos bral bde ba chen po'i don las grol// mya
25a7(rnying rgyud): g.yas mi rtog skye 'gag med bzhin du// dbyings dang ye shes sgra dang lha mar 'dzin// e dzung de 'dod lta ba yin// ngas ze ma papa pa// rabag // slo bral dan gas la chen pa'i byung lam/ theg pa brgyad kyi grub mtha' bstan par 'argyas
25b1(rnying rgyud): dbu ba'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ gyakye ston po rdo rje 'chang // theg pa brgyad du de ltar gsungs pa de// dgongs pa nyams su ji ltar len// zhes byas so// ston pas bka' stsal ba/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par rung dag
25b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs gtad bcas pa'i bsgoms pa brgyad// rtsol ba'i blo yis yul bzang nas// nyan thos theg pas 'di ltar bsgom// rang lus ngos bcas phung po la// mi gtsang rdzas su 'du shes bskyed// rnam par sngo dang bram pa dang // dral pa byugs par bsgom pa ste// gzugs zhe pa
25b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' las brtog/ zhig nas yan lag cuganyis ldan// tshigs drag yul dang rtog pa spang // rang rgyal 'dod pa 'di gar bsgom// dang po ma rig lngas gas nas// mtha' man shing zag par brdzo// rang gi dpal bar sems gtadang// kaung sna dkang po the por nam// de sems zin
25b4(rnying rgyud): ban pa dang // de las brjid nang keng du khad+ha// de nas ma par 'gag par bsgom// thang sems 'ad pa 'di ltang bsgom// de yang rno la 'ad pa yis// sems tsam sems ni dang nga gsal ba sgom// dbum bakhyen par byer bye rnam ma la rji kyil snang bsgom/ kr-i shA'i 'dod pa
25b5(rnying rgyud): ga nom/ stong pa'i natshogs spong ngas// dgasugs sa phrag rdza ldan pa bsgog// so ga na di ltang bskol// byang rngub rnams so song sa// pram hAH bdud thug rngub dang ldan par byo'o pa// ma mo bathong pa'i// ti na 'o myong nas/
25b6(rnying rgyud): khor 'byams bsgom par byed// phyag ba'i ldan pa slob pa'i bajug/ yaT ga na 'dod bsgos pa'i// sgo myo 'arjod bsngon song nas// thung po ste ma zug rngu pani// dbang na du las su bur dang // dzu bac+doMs por nang bton pa pazhin// ga ngag pa'i gas par brkos// bas
26a1(rnying rgyud): rang don la bsgom dus su// spyod pa'i bye brag ji ltar spyad// ces zhus sa// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po legs par zung zhig/ theg brgyad rang gi spyod pa bstan// sdug bsngal rtsol bsrub bcas par spyod// spyod pa blang dor med
26a2(rnying rgyud): par ma rtogs pas// thun mong ma yin blang dong spyod// nyan thos spyod pa'i khyad par ni// ma byin len dang metshangs spyod// srog gcod rnam par spang pa ste// lus kyi spyod pa rnam par dag/ ngag gi smod pa dag pa ni// rdzun dang ngag 'khrul rga ma dang // zheg cad tshig rnams med par spod//
26a3(rnying rgyud): yid kyi spyod pa dag pa ni// banapa sems gnod sems log lta bral ba yin// dge bcu rnams ni rang ga don du stod// rang rgyal ba yi spyod pa ni// rdzu 'phrul ma ma byung 'ga' yis// 'gro don shas tsam stod par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni// tshad med
26a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang bkru ba bzhi// gno gzhan gyi don du spyod// kri ya pa yi spyod pa ni// phyi nang rdzas gsum dag par spyod// yo ga dag gi spyod pa ni// phrin las rnam pa bzhi dag dang // khon nyid bzhi stod par byed// ma hA yo ga'i spyod pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis sgo nas// 'gro don mtha'
26a5(rnying rgyud): du phyin par sbed// a nu yo ga'i spyod pa'i gnas skabs ni// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis su// dbyings dang ye shes rnam pa gnyis// gnyis ma da gcig la yongs su spyod// ces gaspangs so// spros bral dzin gsam+b+ha gyi rgyad chen po las/ thug pa brgyad kyi sdod pa
26a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gcag pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ ston pa thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ de yi 'jug sgo bsung mtshams dang // grub pa'i thabs rnams ji ltar lags// so so'i 'bras bu ci ltar smin// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka'
26a7(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ zhugs nas de yi don spyod pas// so so'i 'dug sgo spyod par bkru// zha ba'i don las me 'da' bas// so so'i dam tshig lta bar bsdu// so so'i lta ba goms pas bsgrub pa'i mchog/ de la de nyid der bsdus pa'o//
26b1(rnying rgyud): rna / sgrub na d+hA na pa nas thu na// na dag ba na// pa na// su zla du/ dgas smras ra/ ba na pa /
26b2(rnying rgyud): byas rnam ga nyis ga// de nu na/ khyung sems dag zha zla nga // ma pa spa pa sa// ma na nas parji pa spongs nas// sa 'du la gnas pa 'ad/ la'i nas kya //
26b3(rnying rgyud): dgus tshad pas// gas gsu ma rmugs myo bar 'dod// rdorje 'dzin pa'i sartson nan// lcog dag gi 'bras tshun/ 9sgom stod pa'i byin rlapas kyis// skyem du bdun mdang rdzogs te// TIgasum nga bzhin smin kyis thab// mA hA yo ga'i bras drin// skal la mi sa
26b4(rnying rgyud): mngon gyur nas// phyag rgya chen por mngon rdzogs pas// bcug cig kun tu 'od kyis la mngon par 'grub/ a nu dag gi 'bras bu yang // ska ba dag gi dgos pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sanon nas/ mchags pad+ma can gyis la gnas/ zhes gsungs so// spos
26b5(rnying rgyud): bra' de na gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ theg bi sa sa'i 'bras bu dang / 'dug tho bsud mtshams smra ba thabs pasum / sgom spyod pa'i bsgruthabs bstan pa se rje ste zheganyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsung ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ saM kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // theg bdud
26b6(rnying rgyud): sgor spyang ba dang // 'dus bu mthar gyid de ltar na// mate 'don pa 'jug pa yi// mang rla ba gas// 'thob sa rnas ma mas cad phyi// sngagadus la zhes rnam pa la// nga ba nga chas yod pa la// gang cag la su dkrugs pa rnams// kun gyis ma dag sa stes
26b7(rnying rgyud): 'tha~M // hU~M yi yul nyid chos nyid la// gzhan gyis sgrib pa med pa ste// mthong ba med pa sang lags// rdordzi chang gis bshad dru gsol// de skad ces ni zhus pa las// rdorje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cigags de bdag chub kri// skugasum
27a1(rnying rgyud): @shes lnga yod na// ngo bo gcig la mtshon tshul lce// dedon gcig tu dril ba ni// rang chag chos kyi sku ru 'dus// rang rig rtogs par bya ba'i thabs// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // brgyad khrab ni stong chos bshad kyang // car gyis
27a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i gdams ngag med// de phyir lam du zhugs tshad kyis// rang gi rig pa chos kyi sku// rang la rang chas yod gyur kyang // rtogs par gyur pa ma yin no// rang rig chos skur ma rtogs pas// phyi yi 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// chos kyi dbyings nyid yin gyur kyang // 'byung ba
27a3(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga dang gar bzung // de phyir chos nyid rtogs par dka'// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen po// gang zag phyi ma'i don ched du// da lta nyid du rtogs pa yi// cad gyis bstan pa'i gdams ngag ni// thugs rjes
27a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la gsung du gsol// de skad ces ni zhus pa yis// rdo rje 'chang gis yang gsungs pa// tha mal dang chud shes pa ni// cad kyis brtan pas rtogs pa'i chos// gang zag phyi ma'i don ched du// bstan kyang snor ni shin tu dka'// dper na u dum war bzhin// brgya
27a5(rnying rgyud): stong khri las rere zheg/ 'ga' tsam zung tsam 'byung srid na// de yi don du nga yis bstan// de skad ston pas gsungs pa dang // gsar pa'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// smyon pa rdo rje 'chang chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa dang // sems can kun gyi gnas lugs
27a6(rnying rgyud): don// car gyis bstan pas rtogs pa'i chos// sal gyis bstan pas go ba'i don// 'di don ston pa'i slob dpon de// car phog man ngag mkhas pa dang // slob ma'i snod rtogs mkhas pa dang // snod ldan thugs rjes 'don pa dang // blta bsgo mngon la gnas pa dang // spyod
27a7(rnying rgyud): pa rkyen gyis mi tshugs pa// de lta bu yi slob dpon de// gzhan gyi skyon snang mchis gyur kyang // lus ngag yid gsum dang pa yis// yang dag skye med don chen lha// yang ni ston pas gsungs pa ni// yang dag skye med bstan pa'i snod// dad brtson brtul zhugs shes rab che//
27b1(rnying rgyud): gdang ba mas gus brnags pa che// la d+har chos dang slob dpon dang // 'di nyid ngon pa mos brtse// ser sna'i mdung grol langs spyod 'bral// longs spyod medan dang lus 'ayul// mnangang tub 'dan d+ha dang // dang byung ba la sogs te// srog la ba kyang tong mam na// yang ga kyang ma byas/
27b2(rnying rgyud): bstan// de sang ston pasas sungs pa dang // gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// slob dpon man dag ldan pa des// slob mgong bzhin sdod ldan la// car gyis bstan pa'i man ngag 'dis// lngabargya'i ngas la nye ba'i tshe// thos pa b+ha ru tshe tshad thung // dgod pa bsnyen dang chos nya
27b3(rnying rgyud): ste ru shad pa'i man ngag 'das// shes rab can dang thos pa can// ji srid cha yis rtogs srid kyang // rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba med// thos rgyang shes rab chung pa yis// rtogs pa'i don dang mi ldan pas// thos pa rje rgyang med pa dang // shes rab che chung mang byangs/
27b4(rnying rgyud): gi mtshan nyid ma nor bar// bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs pa'i don// rdo rje 'chang gis gsung du gsol// e ma zugs rje'i bdag po lags// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gsad pa'i bdag po nyon// brgyad ze bzhi stong chos bstan
27b5(rnying rgyud): kyang // gang zag blo dang sbyar ba las// nges don car gyis bstan pa med// brgyad khri bzhi stong theg dgur 'dus// theg pa rim dgu gsum du 'dus// mtshan nyid sde gsum chu yi chos// gsung gi sprul pa shU ka thub kyis// gtan la phab cing bstan pa'o// phyi chud
27b6(rnying rgyud): sde gsum 'bras bu'i chos// sku yi sprul pa rnam snang gis// gtan la phab nas bstan pa yin// bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis nang pa'i chos// thugs kyi sprul pa gsang bdag gis// gtan la phab nas bstan pa'o// theg pa rgyad rdzogs chen ming mthob// de phyir gnas
27b7(rnying rgyud): gas matogs phyid// sdug phreng thugs gsum 'dus pa yi// sbrul spa dga' nga yis// rdzogs pa chen po'i chos rnams bshad// den na rdzogs can mang thob ste// dal bshad thabs rnam bzhi// bskyed pas snang ba'i spros pa tshod// lung byung
28a1(rnying rgyud): ma thong sregasas// sems thal lags pa galas bshad// thab pa thas gsong bsdud pa lan// ba sgrubs pas sems gnas ste// de las don pa thos gcod pas// srung bdag tu bdun pa yin// nga ga gag man dag/
28a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa dag la spros gcod pas// cang ba'i man ngag dag tu bstan// de yis 'khrul pa rtsad gcod mkhas// gzhan pa ltos nas zab 'gyur te// car gyis bstan pa'i man ngag med// de phyir don gyi ngom 'phrod// ngo ma 'grod pas nang don yin// yang dag don gyi
28a3(rnying rgyud): bo ni// tshig don gnyis su 'brel ba yis// cang kyis bstan pas yo bas rtogs// sal gyis bstan pas rgyal gyis rtogs// chog don bstan pas dngang shes// de la bu ye man dag la// brten na po grod gcig gis tshag/ dben stod rnam pa bdun// spos bral
28a4(rnying rgyud): don gsal gyi rgyad chen po las/ a ta'i don ro smod pa zhus len dang bcas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// // a d+harma kA ya/ mun pa'i skrag rum chen po ru/ nyi ma shar pas mun pa'i smag gtan nas sangs par byed pa'i man ngag ces bya ba 'di/ ngo spong
28a5(rnying rgyud): bdun gyis gtan la phab dgos so// zhes gsungs so// sa kye rdo rje 'chang chen po// ngo spyod rnam pa bdun po yi// dang po 'gyur ba dngas snyigs ni// phye la rang ngo sprad pa de// phye rabs don dus sung du gsol// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gis bkang
28a6(rnying rgyud): la pa// 'byung ba dngas tig dbye ba yi// rdo sprod bstan pa 'di lta ste// dang po shan dgye skyon bsal dang // bar du sti dang bye brag ngo yis bzung // tha ma spu dang dbyings su la bzlab// dang po shan dgye skyon bsal ba// khyi yi yul dang nang gi shes rig gnyis//
28a7(rnying rgyud): phyi yi yul ni 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// nang gi shes rig rnam pa bstan pa ni// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad yin// phyi yi 'byung ba rnam lnga bstan pa ni// chos kyi dbyings nyid ma shes gol ba ste// gar byung gnas dang gar 'gro ba// de don gong 'og rnams su shes
28b1(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'khrul nas rags pa'i 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// phra ba ye shes 'od ky-i kha dog la// chos nyid stong pa'i ngang du shar ba ste// rtogs pa'i don ldan rnams pa chos nyid yin// matogs pa la 'khrul sdang yul d+ha shar// chos nyid do yis bzung na 'dag //
28b2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid stong ba nyid dang rjes nyid na 'gasus pa// cang nyi gnyis su med dang rtso nyid dri ma med// thogs pa med pa dang ni 'a bya dang // phral sri ngas padrang shug/ chos ca // tshas nyid dal mtha ba stod pade// tshang zhi dang ngadakrugs ma gas /
28b3(rnying rgyud): 'gags pa ru 'char ba de nyid du// chos nyid dag paganyis snang med pa yin// kyai dang nang gnyis zhes su bstan pa yin// chos nyid don pa spros pa med par dgu pa 'o// chos nyid ngo bos khyababs na// chos nyid rdzogs pa med par bshadang // chos nyid bye zag shan
28b4(rnying rgyud): ngos brdung bstan pa na// chos nyid gyon gyi mtha' bas pa 'dis hU~M// nam tag dag pas drim dgas pa ste// 'byung ba rnam pa lnga du btas pa yin// dbus byeng po mchog ba dang // rdo blanas bran shing bran yan chang na// 'byung bas ya dang por brtas pangs pa sa
28b5(rnying rgyud): mam b+ha glang chen po man chad nas// rgyun tsam gshed tsam chu yi thigs pa yan chad ni// rnam rtog rngu dru brtas pas rags pa yin// bskal ba'i ma chen 'bar ba man zad nas// gtsub shing me rtag phra mo yan chad pa// rngam d+ho/ me dra brtas pas rags pa yin//
28b6(rnying rgyud): bram rdung marna nas bzung ste// seng bu phra mo yan chang chub rnams// rnam rtog chung du brtas pas rags pa yid// 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi yis ni// chos nyid stong bsgos bral dal bsgribs// 'byung ba za ba'o dramasel// ngan rtsal don chos nyid dang du 'char bayin// 'od dang
28b7(rnying rgyud): gdang sa dang ye shes cal la bsgribs// dri ma zab bral gyi rags bste// yul ni dngos po mtshan mtshan// b+ha tshogs dge bsdad pas yul kyang das // kye tshogs dgas pas dul gyi sa pa sa// dbang pa na ldang la mchen mang skyes pa par gas// dbang pornam
29a1(rnying rgyud): khyong bas dgas// de yis gang la sgrub tur na// dbang bzlas bye bar bzlas pa las// 'byad pa mang ba'i zhes nga ba slabs// dzam rdzogs padag zhugams yang na mang ga mdun pag dung
29a2(rnying rgyud): blo lnga ste 'gag bcas pa des// skye 'gag/ med pa'i ye shes bsgribs// zab yid gnyis dag tu bstan pa des// yul gyis pra snyed ngos po la mi spong // smre grags phra ste dze gzugs ma spyad// grangs kyis rba ste dbang pa na lnga bal du med// yid
29a3(rnying rgyud): shes gzung 'dzin te// nyon mongs yid ni drang 'dzin yin// sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pas yul la spyad pa ni// de yi rjes su rtog pas shes pa yid la zhal pa// de ltar shes pa de ni yid kyi rnam shes yin// de yis gzung 'dzin nyon mongs can gyi yid// de ltar tshogs
29a4(rnying rgyud): bdun sa bon te// bsags pa de la kun gzhi zhes bya'o// yid gnyis dag gis rang rig spos bral de la bsgribs// yid kyi rnam shes gzung 'dzin bcas pa des// 'dzin pa med pa'i rang gsal dag la bsgribs// nyon mongs can gyi yid ni ngar 'dzin bcas pa des//
29a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa med pa'i rig pa de la bsgribs// tshogs bdun gzhi 'am rtsab byed pa'i phyir// myong ba don makun kazhi zhes su bshad// rnam shes tshogs bdun de dag gis// dge baspyad na gzhi la dge ba 'phel zhing sdig pa 'grib// sdig pasrung na sdig pa 'phe zhing ge ba 'ag/
29a6(rnying rgyud): lung du bstan na ltar du bstan pa rnam 'phel te// ma bstan spod nam bstan 'phel bar 'gyur// mdor na sbyor ba don gyi kun gzhi de// tshogs bdun spyod pas las rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// tshogs bdun ma spyad las rnams 'grob// tshogs bdun gzhi rtsa sred pa yi//
29a7(rnying rgyud): kun gzho da dag gis ni gangal bslab 'gyur na// rig pa' mtshan nyid lnga ldan de la bsgribs// spya ma dzes bzung rig pa'i mtshon zhing bye zag ni// phrug sum gan bya skyon gyi mtha' bas la dang // spyi dang bye brag gnyis sungs bzung ba'o// chos spa ngos bzung ba
29b1(rnying rgyud): shanang bya ba dang// phrin ma tham pasal ba dang // 'thung ba'i rnam thar gsugs mthal ba// sa na da gugs la mal shing byal la ba ga sa 'azhes pag / dag pasapas s+ho tha gsags mang thul ba la/ rang gsul 'dzin pa thar brlung ga sa
29b2(rnying rgyud): brgya dang gadzin/ chos nyid dung ga pa // ye shes dbyings lus shar pams// mtha' dmas rnam par me rgya nga // 'argal du 'byung ba ga thar yinate// yun la brdas chen po men// chos sum tshan bye bdun lda N+Da/ dbya 'byung brjod pa da //
29b3(rnying rgyud): tan 'byung zhing dri ma med// thogs pa med dang mtshan ma yi// chos dang bral bus stong ba'o// rang blang chos skya rten gyis mi shigs 'gyur ba med// skra dang ye shes mi 'gag pas// yon tan 'gag pa med pa'o// nga ba sman med ngapa dzi rna ma med pa'o// rtsal
29b4(rnying rgyud): / 'grug pas phyogs gcig tu chad med// mtshan ma'i chos can ma yin pas ni stong // hung gyis bstan namatshan nyid bzhi// rig pa kyis sma rnam pa gnyis// ji thog cig pang bstan pa yin// de yi mtshan nyid 'di bzhi yin// rang sa kyis spro'i bstong // den chos nyid/
29b5(rnying rgyud): stong pa'o// ngo bo stong pa de nyid ga stsal// rang gsalnga dag tu gnas pa yin// gsal ba'i rtsal ni gnyis su 'byung// 'bru ba chung dang snang brjod// 'gruba'i dbang gis nyams su myong bu 'argyar// ye shes lnga shA rtsal du 'od 'a shar// de dag skrag sra ma rdzogs par rtog
29b6(rnying rgyud): pa ste// chos spru gsal la mi rtog pa'o// de nyid cang kyis nga spang ba// dpe rtson gnyis su shes bya ste// dpe ni mun pa'i sprin ma yis// ron chen stor ba rnyed pa 'dra// skyon gyi mtha' gsal shan+da dbye ba// yid pa'i mtha' dang dag mtha' yis// chos
29b7(rnying rgyud): spong ba smros bral ba skabs// med mtha' dang ni chad mtha' yis// 'dzin pa med pa'i rang gsal bslabs// der 'dzin shes pa phreng des// chos sgra gang po smos bral bslabs// phra ba'i shin du sra ba yis// nam mkha' spong pa 'di las ni// dri med rna mangs
30a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas sa sul brlabs// ngam tha gas rnams byas// sa myongs la bslabs // rgyas migs pas spyan ma gag/ rgyun nyis nas rnam ga dugs gyu// rnam sbyin sas skrag sa do sa
30a2(rnying rgyud): rlo
30a3(rnying rgyud): / sa sa gapa / la / 'du
30a4(rnying rgyud): sa nag sa sapas su ma na
30a5(rnying rgyud): zhes smra rnas/ pa dang / ma na pa/ ngan pa migs ma ldan grubab ste/ la thabs gyu 'o// gas y-i gdangs na pas// dus pa'i mtsha da pa
30a6(rnying rgyud): gi legs pa 'ad/ gangs sa bang ba gas byung / 'ang sa tha pa ma chen pa'i spang gas/ yin ta thab rnam pas/ mtha' gas tha pa yin/ ma
30b1(rnying rgyud): mtshan gdan the la sogs pa// snang yang yang dag don du grub pa med// chos su'i yon tan tsam du snang ba yin// rtsal dang mdangs su ma 'gags cha tsam shar ba yin// mkhyen pa'i shes rab tsam las gsal ba yin// longs su'i skyon gyi mtha' bsal ba// dram
30b2(rnying rgyud): rags pa'i phung po rnam pa lngas// longs sgra rigs lnga dag la bsgribs pa yin// dril bas longs surnam sbeng de la bsgribs// phrabs rigs lnga grol bsgom pa dag gis mang // longs sgyu rigs lnga chos spu'i rtsal can de la bsgribs// dngos su zhan pa phra mod// longs su slob
30b3(rnying rgyud): byed phra mo yin// yongs su mthong du mi ster sgrib byed dri ma'o// longs sgra dang ni sgrib byed phye la shan 'byed do// bar du spyi dang bye brag ngos bzung ba// spyi ni gong du smos pa bzhin// longs spu'i bye brag ngo yis bzung ba ni// chos su gsal stong de nyid la// gsam cha rdung 'gyus
30b4(rnying rgyud): dus su 'od byung ba// de nyid longs su kho na yin pa'o// mdor na gsal stong gnyis med chos kyi sgra// lun grub chos kyi sku zhes de la bya// ma rtogs dus na ngo bo nyid kyi sku// rtogs pa'i dus na chos su kho na'o// chos sku'i rtsal mdangs 'char nas longs pu stsal sku'o//
30b5(rnying rgyud): sru ngo 'grong dus na longs su srul sku gnyis ka 'grod/ bye brag ngos 'dzin longs su ngo spod khon no// gru gsum la zlo gong 'og gzhan na gsal/ srul swa shan dbye skyon gyi mtha' bsal dang / ba ra du sri dang rang gi mtshan nyid ngos bzung dang / mtha' ma su gsum dag tu la brtsa ba'o//
30b6(rnying rgyud): dang po shan dgye ston gyi mtha' bsal ba// chos spa rang rig gsal stong la// 'od gdangs lhun grub shar ba longs sku ste// de gnyis rtsal shar gdul bya'i rol ni// 'od dang rig pa'i rtsal gyis sbyar snang ba// 'gro ba drug la mthun snang 'char ba de// thung drug la sogs srul
30b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i skur snang ngo // sleb byed gzugs kyi phung po rags pas bsgribs// mdor na rig pa gsal stong de la ni// 'od dang drung ma byung ba'i cha nas ni// chos su'i ngo bo zhes ni de la bya// 'grus te 'od byeng spu dang thugs tshogs pa// de ltar rdzogs pa'i cha nas longs su'o//
31a1(rnying rgyud): dang thugs pas byung ba'i rnganas sbal smra'o// chos srung 'phrod dus na lpag sa mang 'thod pa'o// cu'i phyir zhen sgra gsum sman thub byed// thugs ma martags mas ngag yang gsum ste// rtogs pa'i dus na mugasum dus gcig 'char// rdzas/
31a2(rnying rgyud): kyai lha la gsum gdus gcig rdzogs// ci yi myir na lhun gyis thub pa'i phyed// gyon bas la ngos bzung la ba zla rnams// rang rang skabs nas rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ chos kyi dbying sa dang meg pa chos kyi sbal
31a3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa sku gsum rdo sprod pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ lce sde bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / ye shes lnga yi ngo sprod gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum don las ma g.yos kyang /
31a4(rnying rgyud): mtshon tshul ye shes lngarang snang bas// ye shes lnga ya spong bsad// shan du bye skyon gyi mtha' bas pa dang // rang dang sgra yi mtshan nyid dngos bzung ba// tha ma ye shes ldarnams la bzla'o// dang po shan dgye skyon gyi mtha' bsal ba// rig pa'i ba spyong par 'dug pas na// stong pa/
31a5(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi ye shes yin// rig pa stong pa de nyid ma 'gags gsal ba yis// me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// rig pa stor gsal gnyis su med par mnyam pa yis// gnyis med mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// rig pa de yi ngo bo la// stong pa'i phyogs nas bltas na stong
31a6(rnying rgyud): par gsal// gsal ba'i phyogs nas bltas na gsal bar 'dug/ gnyis med phyogs nas bltas na gnyis med de// de ltar so sor ma 'gags cha nas ni// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so// don de rtogs pa'i rtsal gyis ni// bya ba thams cad thogs pa med par 'grub//
31a7(rnying rgyud): byab grub pa'i ye shes so// de lngar ma rtog drug lngar shad// gyon gyi mtha' bas la 'di lta ste// ye shes lngal sgrib byed de// rags pa nyon mongs dug lngas bsgribs// phra ba 'dzin byed tha mos bsgribs// shin du phrab ngom shes pas bsgribs// grib pa'i phyir na dri ma'o//
31b1(rnying rgyud): shan dbye ba ni 'di gas// ye shes lnga dang dug par dbya// skyon gyi mtha' ni drug lnga gsal// ngos bzung sme rba shes par bya// rang gi mchod nyi dngos bzung ba// pha grang ye shes dang sdang nga// rang zung ya shes can pa zhes pa ste// drag wa mngan snang ba na// bzlas pa
31b2(rnying rgyud): shes pa zhes pa ste// ma bcos gzug ma gnas pa'i don// don rang byung ye shes te// yon tan ye shes lnga ru 'char// la thAH/ sgrom spyod pa po// ye shes lnga po dag dang // sku gsumangon la dbye ba med// chos nyid gong mamig bsal dang // gnyisas med pa
31b3(rnying rgyud): cha les ni// chos kyi sku ye ba yin// su gnyis rtsal mi 'gag pa ste// so sor ma 'gags chanas 'od 'byung ba// longs su'i ngo bo de nyid yin// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzan pa// sbrul sbya bya thub ye shes yin// su gsum ye shes lnga po de// chos su'i rang
31b4(rnying rgyud): la lhun gyis srab// ces gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi chud chen po las/ ye shes rnam pa lnga rdo sprod pa'i phe'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ bya bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // tshogs brgyad gtan la phab steng sbed pa/
31b5(rnying rgyud): bas don du gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs brgyad gtan la phab ste ngo ldad 'di ltar shes par gyis/ tshogs brgyad grangs ni 'di lta ste/ sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa
31b6(rnying rgyud): na gyi yid dang/ sna tshogs gsog pa'i kun gzhi dang brgyad yin te/ de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos yin no// da'akhor bar 'gro ba ni/ gzhi don gyi kun ga zhong ma shes pas/ reg pa'i rtsal gyis yul la 'jug pa yin te/ de'i phyir tshogs brgyad 'char ba yin te/ de
31b7(rnying rgyud): sgo lnga rig patsal ma 'gags pa rten med de rten dbang po dang bcas pas meg ge yul du gzugs mthong / gzugs sdug me sdug la chags sdang phye/ de bzhin du rna ba'i yul du sgra dang / sna'i yul du dri dang / lce'i yul du ro dang / lus kyi yul du reg bya la sogs spyad nas/
32a1(rnying rgyud): ng+ya / smya // hA// sa nga sa rnam mas nga du
32a2(rnying rgyud): byas palta bu'o// des bag chags su song ste/ dwe gsog pa'i gzhi marjod / dza s+ye/ sna tshogs gsog pa'i kun gzhi'o// rig pa 'gro ba'i rtsal dmu gis 'grub yin te/ de la yang ces n+yaH// med de nyid las byed pa'i chanas tshogs bcud du thugs pas pa nga
32a3(rnying rgyud): gsal mi 'gag par des yul la sbed pas 'phyir b.las so lnga/ maud ngos go lngas spa ba'i nyon mongs sagrangs su padz+rang ste/ ldan du bltas pa'i rgyanas nyon mongs pa'i med de/ mngo na yid lagyur ltas nas sra myo pa'i mangs rnam// nang du sa
32a4(rnying rgyud): nas bzung bas nyon mongs pa'i yid do// bsags pa'i gzhi'i chanas 'phyogs gsogasangs bran ga zhi'o// rigapas phyir bcad pa ning du skyel ba'i tshanas med do// martogs pa'i dbang gis de ltar byung / gzhi dzad ngas pa sa lugs gang du spem pa tegasu na ye shes/
32a5(rnying rgyud): lngang 'dzid te/ thams cadam khyen pa 'byung ba yin/ rtogs pa'i ngas ni slo bas tugs pa 'atsir \u0f7f/ na srid kyi gdams ngag par phyog rdzabastan na gang gcig gis zhes pa yinaH/ gzhi rnabs kyi dngabyung gi me gas nga jig tha bstanan/ cho gdas
32a6(rnying rgyud): 'brel yin te/ dza 'grod pa ning bang cwochul medad// rdzogs pa med pa gros shing ma/ mtshan nyid lnga dang ldanaH/ rngan snang b.rang bzhin gas la ba/ mtshan da gnyis su ma dpa/ thugs rje 'gag pa med pa/ yon tanam btsal zad kyis grub bya/
32a7(rnying rgyud): dal migs / nasapas pa pa dang me // mas gnagasal ma gas na pa das pa na sa / sems ca kyi tha rnam pa sal sa byud/ sa ngan ce nga
32b1(rnying rgyud): grol/ sangs rgyas pa'i dus thams cad mkhyen par 'byung ste snang bam// gsal brag ga thog tur gas las// gsal ba rtsal rdung gis 'grus na/ yul ba spyod bzhin dum ldan pa togs pa thal lo// gsal ba dang snang pa la nas gnyis sum dado// gsal nga
32b2(rnying rgyud): rtsa las gdangs 'od lnga byung / gnyis med de las rgyal srin las rdzogs pa med pa byung ste/ des gdul bya'i don thams cad ldan gyis grub pa'o// 'od nam lnga 'char bas snang ba lhun gyis grub pa'o// de ltar rtogs pas ngo 'phrod pa yin no// la bzlang ni lta ba'i skabs
32b3(rnying rgyud): bshad do// gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar shes par gyis shig/ ces gsungs so// spos bral do na gsal gyi gud chen po las/ rdzogs brgyad gtan la bab nas rdo sprad pa'i le'u ste'i drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos byas pa/ kye sde bcom
32b4(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang / tshogs brgyad phye steng sprad de ltar na// thog mtha' ba cad deng spyad pa// rdo rje 'chang gis gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor brgya nas ba bdas munas rtsad bcad pas// snying po gzhi la thug gis rngug
32b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid do yis cor bzung bas// rdo sprod ces su bstan pa yin// gzhi nyid rtogs pa lta ba'i mchog/ 'badas gyen la bdas pa ni// 'khor ba rangs ldog pa ste// 'khor ba 'di dag ci las byung // 'khor ba rkyen dang rgyu las byung // 'khor ba'i rkyen ga
32b6(rnying rgyud): bdas pas ni// de ma thag pa'i skad cig 'phel// de yang dmigs pa'i rkyen las phyung // dmigs pa yul la dmigs pa yin// yul dmigs bdag po'i rkyen las byung // bdag po yid kyi 'dzin bcas yin// bdag po rgya yi rkyen las byung // rlung gis yid 'gyus
32b7(rnying rgyud): kA yi rkyen// 'khor ba'i rgyu gnyis 'di lta ste// ma rig rnam pa gnyis yin te// kun btags ma reg 'od lnga brtag pas btas// lhan gyis gsal cha 'od lngar snang ba la// rang snang yin par ngom shes pa'o// de dag 'grubs yid bzhi paskyed// g.yo dang 'a
33a1(rnying rgyud): @/ dang tshor ba dang // gcod pa yi ni yid bzhi ni// ma rig rgyu rkyen de las byung // spyod pa 'od las yul du skrod// tshor ba 'od kyi snang ba tshor// 'gru ba rlung gis rig rtsal 'gyus// g.yo ba gzhi ni rlung gis g.yos// rlung ni rang gi rig pa'i rtsal// rlung
33a2(rnying rgyud): gi mtshan nyid 'gyu ba ste// rig pa'i rtsa la ni 'gyu ba'i rlung // rlung las 'byung lnga lhun gyis grub// rlung de sdud pas chu yin no// rlung du smin pas me yin no// rlung du brtas pas sa yin no// re re dag la rdzogs pa'o// rig pa ye shes lnga ldan de'i// rtsal ni gdangs lnga 'od lnga
33a3(rnying rgyud): shwar// de dag phyi yi yul du brtags// gzhi nyid rgyas par bshad pa ste// rgyud kyis ston nas gsal bar bshad// nges bzung 'dri ru bstan pa ste// rdo smod cad kyis bstan pa ste// yid dang tu chen rtsa ba ni// 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhir gyur pa// de yi ngos 'dzin//
33a4(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar yin// had nges le sol ba// de nyid las ni 'khor 'das thams cad 'byung // gzhi yi rang rtsal gnyis yin te// rlung dang 'od gdangs gnyis su byung // gzhi ni g.yo 'gul med pa la// rtsal ni ma 'gags rlung g.yos pas// g.yo ba yis ni 'grub byung // 'akrus pas 'od kyi
33a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba tshod// 'od de rang snang ma shes pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig byung // rang snang ma shes yul du bcad// gcod pa'i yid ces de la bya// 'di la brtags pas kun brtags ma rig byung // rtsal ni yid du 'gyus pa des// rgyu yang byas te rkyen yang byas// rgya yi
33a6(rnying rgyud): rkyen zhes de la bya// 'gye ba'i yid ni rlung can des// 'khor ba bskyed nas 'khor ba'i bdag po byed// mya ngan 'das na de yi bdag po byed// gang bskyed bdag po de yis byed// de yis rkyen byas bdag po'i rkyen// 'gyu ba 'od la dmigs pa'i rkyen//
33a7(rnying rgyud): de la 'khrul pas brtags byas nas// skad cig de ma thag pa'i rkyen// de ltar 'khor ba bskyed pas te// gong du shin tu gsal bar bshad// gzhi nyid ngos 'dzin 'phrad pa'o// gzhi las gsal ba'i chos sgra yis// spangs nas mya ngan 'das lugs ni//
33b1(rnying rgyud): grag sa pastan dang nan // nas gsung na// ma tha dgas ban pa byu las/ 'a' rnanas pa ba sa nas nga ma na ba kyi dun // / sa nga dus su 'a ga// sa sa /
33b2(rnying rgyud): ya lda ga// tham sna na ces gsung ga stsam/ dag ces ya / na zhes pa la ba/ cigags pa'i bdag pa'i rgyu// ma shes lta ba// gang gig gan zhu // gas thangs papas kyi
33b3(rnying rgyud): skyes pa pa'i 'dus pa'o// rngas gas ma dag kyi shes pa dang // dum malog pa'i shes pa na// dus gas ma shes pa smos bzung // 'das pa rnas gcod shes pa dang // ma'ongs rjen pas shes bdang // sa pa ya~M// oM m+b+ha yul la sho pa'i
33b4(rnying rgyud): grong shes / sa gas man / pa gas sa/ 'dun pa'i/ rje'i chu pa dus gas bsngags ga// dgasus
33b5(rnying rgyud): su sa ra / nga smras pa 'iste// mang sa na dus gsum dag/ mardzas ma snyam ba pa// nga byu ba nas gnas byaste/ nyi ga pas phyinas sbyin// phyugags byung po// ting nga ma les pa'i ban// de las gyu
33b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes te// rgyu rkyen ming bas rang byung ngo // nyid shes pas ye shes len// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ dus gsum rtse nas rdo smin pa'i mdza na brgyad pa r+sa// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pas
33b7(rnying rgyud): zhus pa/ rtse sa'i com ldan rdo 'chang // dus gisum rlud da lags na// de spyod rnam pazhigasung rdugs la// zhes nus pas/ ston pa rdo rje 'chang gis bkal rnam pa/ rdo rje dzin pa rjes tha ga/ ga rgyad kyim tsha nyid ni// mi ming dag la rab brtan nas/
34a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ da ltar gtan pa 'bebs pa ltar// sgra gsum 'du 'bral med pa'angan// ya nas rang la spun thub pas// brda' yas gtan la dbab par bya// kye gsang ba'i bdag ga byang nyan cig/ bstod bzhi ru shes par bya// cang byar yul
34a2(rnying rgyud): nges pas so// bzhi po gang yin de ltar yin// sku wa rin po che'i sbubs dang gcig/ longs su lnga ldan de dang gnyis// sbal bu'i bar do dang gsum// sku gsum 'du 'bral med par rdzogs ldan no// de bzhi mthun ngas pas the tshom dang bral ba'o//
34a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can// do spyod bya ba'i shes pa ma 'gags pa'o// rigs kyi ngu khyod legs par nyon// grangs ldan gtan tshigs bstan pa'o// bla mas gdams ngag sgrogs pa'i tshe// go rim gnyis su bstan pa ni// gzhi nyid lhun grub dag gi gor ma dang /
34a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa mngon gyur dag gi go rim mo// kye gsang ba'i bdag po legs par nyon cig/ de la gzhi nyid rdzun grub ni// dang po chos sku'i rdo sprod dang // de nas longs su'i ngo sprod dang / de nas sprul sla'i nga sprod bstan pa dang / de nas sku gsum 'du 'phral med pa'o//
34a5(rnying rgyud): spad pa'i thabs la gnyis yin te/ brda dang ngag tu bstan pa'o// mtshon pa'i brdal rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje sems dpa'i me long bsten pa dang // 'dra 'bag dag la brten pa dang // 'od khyim dag la brten pa dang // nyi ma dag la brten pa'o// brjod pa'i sgra la rnam bzhi
34a6(rnying rgyud): dang po chos su mtshon pa'i tshe// kye snod ldan slob mang la nyon// thugs kyi me long man shel 'di// chos sku dngos ni ma yin te// 'di nyid ci 'drar shes par bya// man shel phyi nang med pa ltar// rang gi rig pa chos su yang // phyi nang med par shes par bya//
34a7(rnying rgyud): shel mdun rgyab med pa ltar// chos spu yang ni mdun rgyab med// man shel zang thal gsal ba bzhin// chos spu dri med dag pa zang thal yin// 'don nang med nang na rkyen med 'od lpags la ba ltar/ chos sru zang thal nang na ni/ srugasum nang gsal du'i
34b1(rnying rgyud): gas pa ste/ smyung pa la shas snang ba can du rgas par gyis/ dpa' na'i nang nas 'ad sa byu ru 'char ba ltar// mas kyi sku las gzugs sku gnyis/ gdul bya gnyis la snang bag// rigs kyi blang ga zung nyon dang / longs su ngas la gradams paH/ rang dag
34b2(rnying rgyud): ngos la bstan pa'i tshe/ me long dag cing gsil ba ltar/ chos nyid dag cing gsal ba'o// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan snang la rang bzhin med pa ltar/ chos nyid klong na su lnga snang la rang bzhin med par gsal bar gnas/ kye rigs kyi bu dag tshur nyon dang / spa
34b3(rnying rgyud): su brda' dang ngag tu sbyar dus su// ngag gi me long dag cing gsal ba ltar// chu yi sgron ma dag gi dbyings// me long ngos la sme ljagasal ba ltar// rtags kyi ye shes sbrul sku 'od du gsal// sku gsum 'du 'bral med par brda dang ngag myong bas/ gre ma gsang
34b4(rnying rgyud): bdag nges zung zhig/ nyi ma'i snying po 'od zer bcas pa bzhin// chos kyi sul thugs rje gzugs sgyur ngab rgyan// nyi ma 'od zer nyid dang mi 'bral ltar// sugasum yinas 'du 'bral med par gnas// kye gseng bdag nges par byung zhig/ rtogs pa mngon snang go
34b5(rnying rgyud): bar de man chad brtsib ste// sprul pa sgra yi ngo sprod ni// chos nyid bar rdo'i rdo sprod yin// longs spyod rdzogs su'i ngo spod ni// lnga ldan dag gi rdo sprad yin// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa ni// rdzogs ldan dag gi ngo skad yin// chos sku dag gi ngo slad ni// rjog
34b6(rnying rgyud): ldan chen ze 'ang sprod yin// gdams ngag ga dang mthun pa la// dang ba par da'ang sbed bya// de rtogs sgra rusnang bas na// de nas lnga ldan klad bya// de nas mngon shes la sogs pa'o// ze ba yongs su rdzogs pas na// rdzogs ldan sprod bya ba yin// thugs
34b7(rnying rgyud): na myang na 'das// debs rdzogs rten chen po yin// ji slong gdams ngag gsal bar bstan// des nig shes pada' bzhipa// tegs na byang chub sams yin to// ji snad bzhi las 'gyur med bston// don ni skyegasum 'du 'drang med// bden don rnas par /
35a1(rnying rgyud): yan// spad pa bral ba'i gang stan pas// dashid rnam pa bcudrugs// dulang gdas pa rnam pa 'o// sngun bu dres pa'i gdams papan// dgang rtogs pas zang par 'gyur// na mnasal gdang mang
35a2(rnying rgyud): drad / gling thob par 'gyur/ da nga nga bsus pa de la mtshan nyid kyis bgad na// jig le nyugag cig 'ad kyis// rgyas skye rang gas la ngan rtogs shing // ri can thabs kyi dgongs pa// / ma thulo ga'i snyed kyis// yigs na dang
35a3(rnying rgyud): / rtongs pa cad sa// rdul ldang ga dang rtogs shig// chom kyang ba 'dugangs pa kyang// amra pa na med kyis// sngags ma 'du 'bral med pa gan da rtogs dang // rdzogs ldan dgongs parjod pa 'iH// nga rgod ma
35a4(rnying rgyud): byamanam sa// sprul ba'i ma pa ga ngadzini// zhes ni 'drin par ngasang // ma 'grub mni dzags pas/ mthong ni'i tshul la zhes pa'i dran pasad// dran pa bzhi pa 'dzinanal// men 'ang sangs kyis shi// zhib mya na myang den/
35a5(rnying rgyud): sa bye'o// gas rnasasangs sa pas// rnam padun rig sangs rgyas mang/ dazungs ni sa dgongs pa yin// de nams mi ldanang ma spang ba'i rgyan// don 'tshang can bdag gis shad// ces gsungasas// sa 'a donags pa pa da
35a6(rnying rgyud): / ldan hU~M gas nga dang gas na na gas
35a7(rnying rgyud): sa ma/ byi gatha nga 'du/ du su rdzos/ dpa pa du chus
35b1(rnying rgyud): gang// sa na pa// sus na nga/ da dang/ /
35b2(rnying rgyud): dang // sa sa // na// ga sa
35b3(rnying rgyud): na la dag pa la// rang chu pa grub pa med// gsal ba'i rtsal niganyis sa 'gyur/ rig pa'i gsalan sgos ngan// gzugs thugs na // rig pa 'a // mad+ha shal rnam par dag 'dra/ nyid k+Sha
35b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bste// man she lan ma par dag pa 'dra// gsal stong gnyis sa med pal// gzugs dra gnyis srang ba ba // she la gas la mdo// 'das mi 'gag 'cha bal// dag gas pa stong gnyis su med pa la// rga snga ma 'gag
35b5(rnying rgyud): ban/ cang ngam// rig pa makyis kyi sa// mad kyi chenas longs su'o// lnga gsal bar nas rnatshog / tshul ba 'byung bya// mings bla 'dabab can/ sbyin po gam gar bal// ma t+pa la bsan
35b6(rnying rgyud): da ma// da nga na ma zar/ di 'dus pa// sakAl/ // sangs klud ma/ pagang / bdag
35b7(rnying rgyud): pa// mig brjeg la ni brgyab rgya// mig bsgri'i namamakha'asbyong bar blta// bris su gang yan 'dag sa// dbang po mig gis mngan sum dra// sdang ba rang bzhin medapa 'byung // dang dini yangs spyi'i rnam pa yang // chos sngags pa snying gnyis
36a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ gas sus nakun du sa sa / na
36a2(rnying rgyud): sbas// de dag phyogs ri'i cha bzung ba// rigs pa sems dpa'i tshogs su byung // de dag snang la rang bzhin med// gsal la rtog pa med pa ste// dper na bar snang 'ja' dang 'dra// sra ni 'od kyi su yin te// thugs ni skyed la stong chos su de// gnyis med rto
36a3(rnying rgyud): bral chen po yin// sgra dang thugs gnyis 'dus pa las// rtsal ni mi 'gag bdag nyid kyi// gdul bya gang dang mos phyogs su// gang la gang 'dod 'byung ba de// sprul ba'i sku yi gnas lugs yin// dpe ni sgyu ma mkhan po yos// rdzas dang kyi rten 'grol
36a4(rnying rgyud): kyis// ltas mo'i mi yi mig snga ru// gang 'dod gzugs pa yod pa 'dra// de bzhin dpe ni su ma yi// gzugs brtan sna tshogs sdang ba 'dra// chos sgra'i rtsal ma 'gags pa yis// gzugs su gnyis su snang ba'o// rig pa'i cha nas chos kyi sku// de gsal ga
36a5(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// chos kyi sgra las gzugs su gnyis// rtsal lam shugs las byung ba'o// de'i phyir chos sku sprod pas// gzugs sku gnyis po shugs la 'phrod// gong bzhin chos sku'i gnas lugs de// ye nas bdag gi rang bzhin yin// de dag rang la ros
36a6(rnying rgyud): bar ste// ngo bo rang gis mamang dzin// dzad ga dmas car bzung nas// dam la shes pa 'di nyid pa// thab tar thal langs sa// dbang ba med kyad dag/ dedag gnas / nyid kyi kranas bya// ldan pang sangs sa zhes / nyid
36b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa mang dgyur na// rgya ltar dbye ba'i lta ba ste// rnga nyad rtogs pa'i gnas yin// na ga ye shes ma shar bas// stong ba btang rnams canas ni// myal nyon mongs ni btsam// de la zhig nas zhes su bstan pa yin// gang gagan tad ngas brdu ga/
36b2(rnying rgyud): gsal cha brtan pa ste/ lhag mthong rig pa chos sku yin// gsal cha gong 'og kun tu ni// shin tu zhib par bstan pa ste// stong pa'i cha dang gsal ba'i cha// gsal ba rang gsal dag dang ni// 'grus pas sgo lnga yul lags la// rjes su mi 'dzin rtog pa ya
36b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs rtsal 'od gdangs dag tu 'char// rang gi snang bar shar ba ste// de la mi 'dzin mi rtog pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa yin// de ltar chos su gsal stod la// snga gsum ye shes lnga rdzogs pa// lta ba'i dam pa kho na'o// gsal rtso kar ya
36b4(rnying rgyud): mi 'gag pa// mi 'dzin mo rtog mi 'brang ba// lta ba'i dam pa kho na'o// gsal ba'i rtsal dang me ldan na// zhe gnas brtan po zhi la las// gsal rtsal dag gis ngogs dpung ste// 'og nas gong du 'phar bar 'gyur// tog pagasal dang brtan pa yis
36b5(rnying rgyud): ngas sgrib pa cha yis 'bral// don la ched du spang du med// bogs dang 'phang ba dag kyang med// rtog pa gsal dang gdengs ldan pas// nyon mongs cha yis 'gags pa la// lam gyi ming du btags pa tsam// ye nas gnas pas gzhi ru bstan// 'khor
36b6(rnying rgyud): 'das 'byung phyir gzhi ru bstan// de dag rang ngo ston pa la// ji spod zhes su ston pa yin// de don rtogs pa lta ba yin// byud la gsal bsgom par ston// chun du 'khyer ba spyod pa'o// mngon gyur 'bras bu'i gzhi mar rig/ dag pa chen po'i mthar thug pa'o//
36b7(rnying rgyud): lta ba mdor bsdus bstan pa ni// mtha' rnams kun dang ma spangs bral// mtha' bral chen por gyur pas na// phyogs su ltung ba gang yang med// ma brtsal ldan gyis grub pas na// rtsal rnams gang yang mi 'gag 'char// thams cad mkhyen pa de las rgyud/
37a1(rnying rgyud): @/ bkas pa snang ldan pa'o// rig pa chos sbyang ba sbra pas// gzugs sku gnyis po grags las 'char// gzugs su gnyis pa jo smad pas// sragasum ldan gas srab bas na// phyi sa chos dadrangs bstanas na//
37a2(rnying rgyud): par 'od gdangs shar ba'o// spang ba rang snang mi 'dzin pas// chos dbyings ngo ni 'phrad pa'o// ma rtogs 'khrul bar rags par brtas// de la rtogs ldan gang zag gis// rang snang 'dzin med chags pa med// gang zag rtogs ldan chos dbyings yin//
37a3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ gyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi ngo sprod bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// / rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ rdo sprod bdun gyis ngo spad pas// rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par 'gyur// zhes
37a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// kye kye rdo rje 'chang chen po// ngo sprod rnams kyi ngo bo des tshig dbye ba dang / brjod pa'i tshig rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig/ ngo bo ni rang sems rang gi ngo bo'o// nges tshig ni rang ngo dang
37a5(rnying rgyud): la bstan ste spad pas 'phrod pa'o// dbye ba ni bdun du bstan pa ste// gong du gsal zhing rgyas par bstan pa'o// brjod pa'i tshig ni ngo sprod ces kyang bya/ ngo bo mthong ba zhes kyang bya/ rang ngo shes pa zhes kyang bya/ gzhi'i don shes pa zhes kyang bya/ rig pa chos sur
37a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa zhes kyang bya/ don ma nor bar mthong ba zhes kyang bya/ rang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i gdams ngag ces kyang bya'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ ngo sprod mjug pasdu ba'i man ngag gi le'u steng gcig pa'o//
37a7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / ngo sdod gtan la dbab pa yis// bstan pa'i don 'di ji ltar lags// phyi rabs don du gsung du gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ a kA ya tri dz+nyAn pa \u0f7f/ nyi ma'i ste
37b1(rnying rgyud): po la 'od zer gsal bas/ mun pa gtan mi gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// bltar med lta ba'i don bstan pa// a ti'i lta ba gza' gtad bral// dngos med ye shes zang thal bas// rang rig ye shes ldan gyis grang // de las ma gtogs gzhan
37b2(rnying rgyud): med pas// so so rang rig ye shes la// cir snang ye shes chen po'i gdangs// ye nyid bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // de bas gzhi snang rdzogs sangs kyis// sangs rgyas yul med gzung 'dzin rnam par dag/ rang rig ye shes rang gi gdangs la bzhugs// bzung bzhi
37b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// chos nyid don gyi nam mkhas ye nas khyab// chos nyid don gyi nam mkha' la// rang rig ye shes nyi ma shar// phyogs ris med pa kun tu bzang // yid kyi rnam rtog ci 'bru yang // ma 'gags rang bzhin med pa'i don// bltas shi
37b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bas mthong rnyed la// phyi nang gnyis ka phye nyid nang // zab pa'i cha shas togs yul bral// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// byis pa'i skye bo rnams la snang mod kyi// lta ba rang rig ye shes dngos med zang thal ba// dngos po mtshan ma'i sgrib pa ye nas rnam par
37b5(rnying rgyud): drag/ kun bzang zhal ni phyogs bcu kun tugasal// yum gyi b+hag pade klong gcig tu 'khyil// de bas khams gsum ma lus spos bral chen por gcig/ lta ba rnam dag rang rig ye shes la// sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med// sems can med pas
37b6(rnying rgyud): khams dang 'byung ba med// man shel sgra ltar rang gi rgyud dag pas// dri med zang thal dag pa chos kyi sgra// sa chu me drung nam mkhar snang ba yang // matogs blol tshad mar spang mod kyi// sdang la rang bzhin med de ye shes gdangs su gsal// dper na mkha' la 'ang tshon
37b7(rnying rgyud): gsal ba yang // mkha' las logs na med kyang logs par ldang // mkha' yi dang du gnas shing mkha' dang mi phyed ltar// chos nyid chos su dbyer med don gyi nam mkha' la// ring shar rang sbrang rang gsal ye shes gdangs// logs ltar snang zhing 'gags pa
38a1(rnying rgyud): ma gsapa// gas na // / sas s+ho// bdu gas g+sa// smad da / du na rnal tu
38a2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ bgrod par 'dod na ye shes mtha' la ring // ma bsags bzhin du tshogs gnyis ye nas rdzogs// ma srungs bzhin du sgrib gnyis ye nas byang // ma byang ma skyes 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la// bkod pa lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom mi dgos// dkyil 'a
38a3(rnying rgyud): gnyer rta lugs kyis// khro ba dag chen po'i skur bskyed nas// su gsung thugs kyi bzlas pa dang // chu yi rgyan ltar bzlas na yang // rang rig ye shes chub kyis phyogs// ye nas byas zin gdod bcol ba med// ched du byar med ched du dgag tu med// mar me'i snying po
38a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi 'od la gnas pa ltar// rang rig ye shes rang gi gdangs la gnas// 'das dang ma gyon da lha'i sangs rgyas dang // gnyis med do gcig chu la chu bzhag bzhin// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ blta ba spri ru bstan pa'i le'u ste
38a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // de ltar lta ba bstan pa de// phyi ltar dbye bar 'dug pa na// rang gi mtshan nyid lta bde// ma nor nges par bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka'
38a6(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ phyi rabs dad ldan don cid du// rang gi mtshan nyid lta ba ni// ma nor nges par ngas bshad nyon// sbrang ba chos dbyings chos nyid dang // rang byung rang reg chos kyi sku// sbal gyis rtogs pa'i lta yin// de nyid car gyis ngos bzung na// tha mal shes pa 'di nyid
38a7(rnying rgyud): la// had des le so leb// thig gis lesang ngeb// de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid yin// rig pa chos su bzhi ldan yin// rang gi ngo bo ma grub pas// chos nyid stong pa'i cha yin no// ngo bo mi rtog pa zhes bya// stong pa de nyid dngags la yin// rig rangags la
38b1(rnying rgyud): ste// gsal ba'i dus na dngas po med// dngas mdan nyid gsal bar shar// gsal snang gnyis su med pa'o// gsal ba la ni rnam pa gnyis// ye shes lnga rum 'gags te// de la gdangs lnga 'ad wa shang // na nyid ma tags dag lngar 'khrul// 'ad
38b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung lngar 'khrul// ye shes lnga po ma shes pas// 'gyu ba'i rlung ni dug lngar shar// de bzhin gcig la tshad lugs yin// de la lkugasu ma rdzogs lugs ni// rang byung gsal stong gnyis su med// de nyid mi 'dzin mi rtog pas// rtog med chos kyi sa yin ste/
38b3(rnying rgyud): chos su de las gdangs byung bas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin no// de gnyis rtsal ni ma 'gags pas// thugs rje sprul pa'i sku zhes bya// rang byung rig pa'i rtsal zhes pas// sku gsum yongs su de ltar rdzogs// lte ba rang byung dag pa la// ye shes lnga yi rdzogs
38b4(rnying rgyud): lugs ni// rig pa 'ong bo mgrub pas// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdzogs// de nyid ma 'gags gsal bas na// me long lta bu'i ye shes rdzogs// de nyid gnyis med mnyam pas na// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdzogs// ma 'gags so sor gsal bas na// so
38b5(rnying rgyud): sor rtogs pa'i ye shes rdzogs// rtsal ni sgo lngar bcas pa yis// thams cad grub par gyur pas na// byang grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas// rang byung ye shes zhes bya'o// rang rig gcig gi yon tan yin// rang gi reg pa chos srul//
38b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub// gang la thogs med zang thal yin// man shel dag pa'i dpe bzhin du// gsal dngas rtog med zang thal lo// dper na mar me gsal ba bzhin// rang gsal dag gi ngo bor yod// snang ba chos 'byings lta ba ni// mtshan
38b7(rnying rgyud): mar ma grub stong pa la// rig pa dag gi rtsal shar bas// gdangs dang 'od kyi rnam pa byung // rang snang dag tu shar bas na// rig pa rang sar grol ba dang // sdang ba rang sar dag pa'o// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// nyi ma gsal zhing 'phyo ba bzhin// yul nyid stong
39a1(rnying rgyud): / pa'i chos nyid na// rang deg ces spags pa snang 'phyo// gang bgatogs ldan lam lugs kyis// 'bral snang 'dil de bzhin gyur// thams cad nga nyi rtogs pas krol// rang sa bzhag pas sbyangs zin// zhes gsungs sa// gos nang
39a2(rnying rgyud): don gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ lta ba rang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o// // kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// ma 'ongs skal ldan don phyir du// lta ba rang gi mtshan nyid de ltar na// rgyas par bshad 'ji ltar lags// de skad ces ni zhus pa yis//
39a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don ched du// lta ba rgyas pa dang yis bshad// lta ba'i rgyu kye nang po dang // nges tshig rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang // dbye bsdu dgos ched gol sa dang // skyon dag lhan gyis grub lugs dang // gtan tshogs mtshon pa'i dpe
39a4(rnying rgyud): dang ni// togs chad ma rtogs skyon bstan dang // gzhan sel rang ngo bzung ba dang // la bzla spros bral chen po'o// lta ba'i rgyu ni rang byung chen po yin// ci'i phyir dang myang chen po yin zhe na// rang rig chos sku rang la gnas pa de// sangs rgyas thugs rje dag las ma byung dang //
39a5(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams kyi las kyis ma bskyed dang // nang gi ma rig 'khrul pas ma bskyed dang // phyi yi 'byung ba lnga las mgub dang // gang zag lam pa'i blo yis ma bcos dang // sla dang gcan tshigs dag gis gtan la ma phab dang // sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin rlabs dag
39a6(rnying rgyud): yas ma byang dang // rgya yis ma bskyed rkyen gyis 'jig mi 'gyur// ma bcos ma bslad so ma rang byung chen po yin// de phyir rgyu med rgyu de chu yi mchog/ rkyen ni bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag ste// ci phyir man ngag bla ma yin zhe na// bla ma dam pas gdams ngag bstan//
39a7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// rang byung gsal stong gnyis med don rtogs so// de phyid rkyen ni bla ma dam pa'i gar mas ngag yin// ngo bo rang rig gsal stong gnyis med yin// de don rtogs pa lta ba'i ngo bo yin// lta ba'i res tshig rang rig ye shes yin// gzhan la rag mi dgos
39b1(rnying rgyud): pas rang shes bya/ kham bdag las gangs sa pa// dus na ma thar ma byung lags bya// na nyid don dang gra dgas pa san// ltabang rang bzhin gas la dang sa chen pa yan// rang ga gsal bas das la 'ad bar shar// ra narang byung dgas na /
39b2(rnying rgyud): gsal rtsal 'od gdangs shar ba'o// deyi gong na gzhan med chen po yin// lta ba'i mtshan nyid ye shes lnga ldan yin// rang byang rig pa chos su de la ni// ngo bo ma grub stong nyid ye shes yin// ma 'gags gsal bas me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// de nyid gnyis
39b3(rnying rgyud): med par mnyam pa yis// gnyis med mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin// de rnams ma 'gags so sor gsal ba yis// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de lta bu yi ye shes de rtsal gyis// gsal ba ma 'gags gang yang grub pas na// bya ba grub pa'i ye
39b4(rnying rgyud): shes zhes su bstan// de la sa gsal rtsal 'od lnga shar bas na// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga zhes bya// lta ba'i dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bstan// rang gi rig pa chos skur bstan pa dang // bar gyi rig rtsal ma 'gags bstan pa dang // phyi yi snang ba chos dbyings bstan
39b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// nang gi reg pa rtogs na chos kyi sku// rtsa la ni gzugs sku gnyis su ldang ba'o// chos skra rtsen ye shes lnga ru bstan// de yi rtsa la ni kha dog 'od lngar shar// nang gi 'gru ba sgo lngar bcas pa yin// phyi yi yul la spyod kyang rang snga grol// 'dzin rtog med
39b6(rnying rgyud): pas 'gyub zang rdal yin// phyi yi rang byung rig pa gsal gyur na// phyi yi yul ni chos dbyings stod pa la// 'od la shar bas 'byung ba lnga ru brtas// bar gyi gdangs ni rang rang lus su grub// ma rig las byung nyon mongs dug lnga ni// rang rig dang gsal
39b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med do shes na// rang chas shar bas rang snang dag tu bstan// 'dzin pa 'grus kyang gar 'grus rang sar grol// gyi yi snang ba yul la ma zhen cing // nang gi rang byung rig pa gsal gyur na// rang rig chos kyi sku zhes de la bya// stong gsal mi rtog bde
40a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ ldan pas// kun gyi don shes rjes su 'dzin pa med// rig cas kyi sgra zhes de la bya// lta ba'i bsas don bstan pa 'di ltar yin// rig pa dang mthu star ba rtsa// da nyid gsal bar 'dug pas kyang gas la can pa yin/
40a2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba mi 'gag rtsal du bstan pa ni/ 'gyu ba rjes med thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// gsal cha gzugs mi 'gag pas 'od lnga'i gdangs// yul la 'dzin pa ma zhugs chos kyi dbyings// stod cha gsal cha snad cha 'grus rtsa bzhi// 'dzin med don gyi zin pas
40a3(rnying rgyud): lta ba yin// lta ba'i dgos ched bstan pa na// lta ba mig dang 'dra ste thams cad gsal// lha med kyad dag sangs rgyas thob mi srid// lha med ma rig mun pa sangs mi srid// lha med bsgom pa byas kyang don mi 'gyur// lha med spyod pa byas kyang spyod
40a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu med// lha med 'khor ba'i gnas nas thar mi srid// lha med lhag bsngal dag las grol mi srid// lha med bde ba chen po zong mi srid// de phyir lta ba dgos ched shin tu che// lta ba'i go la ma bcad par bstan pa ni// rang zung yin pas rgya rkyen gol sa
40a5(rnying rgyud): chod// stong par 'dug pas dngos po'i go las chod// gsal bar 'dug pas stong pa'i go las chod// rig pa zang thal shar bas gzhi gnas go la sa chod// gsal ba 'od du 'chang bas reg pa spyod pa'i go las chod// ma bcos ma bslad gnas pas bskyed de mgo la
40a6(rnying rgyud): sa chod// 'du 'bral myed par gsal bas bsgom pa'i grol sa chod// rang nyid yin pas gas nul re ba'i go las chod// phyogs med 'chang bas phyogs mtshams go las chod// kun gyi rtse ba yin pas theg pa'i go la sa chod// bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs pas zos pas mgro las
40a7(rnying rgyud): chod// ring ngo rang gis shes pas gzhan du gol mi srid/ sngon nam dag par brtanas ni/ go las chod pas skyon rnams rnam par dag/ rtag mtha' dag la chan mtha' dag/ yod mtha' dkang med mtha' dang // sdang mtha' dag la stod mtha' dag // gcig
40b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' dag laja ma dag/ mtha' rnams thams cad dag pa na// lta ba rnam dag chen pa yan// chen po zhes nas phyir bya// rnamadag don la spun grub pas// dag pa chen pa zhes bya'o// lta ba ldan grub bstan pa ni// sgron rnams dag das yon tan
40b2(rnying rgyud): kyis grub// de yang sku gsum ye shes rnam pa lnga// lhan gyis grub pas thams cad rdzogs pa yin// blta ba lhun grub chen po yin// dper na bsam 'phel nor bu la// dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba 'dra// skyon rnams dag pas chad du spangs pa ma
40b3(rnying rgyud): yin te// rang gi ngo bo rtogs pas skyon rnam dag/ dper na nyi ma shar bas mun pa mi gnas bzhin// yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub pa ni// bsrubs pas grub pa ma yin te// rang ngo rtogs pas thams cad mkhyen par 'char// dper na rin chen rnyed pas dgos
40b4(rnying rgyud): na sa lan
40b5(rnying rgyud): chen po 'dra// thams cad 'byung bas sa gzhi chen po 'dra// nyon mongs sdig sgrib bsreg pas me dang 'dra// mi gtsang ldan ljin 'khru bas rgyu dang 'dra// gang la thogs pa med pas rlung dang 'dra// ngo bo ma grub par snang stong pa 'dra// gsal la mi 'gag nyi ma'i zer dang
40b6(rnying rgyud): 'dra// gsal la mi rtog me long man shel rkyen 'phrad 'dra// bde la mi rtog byang chub sems dpa' 'dra// gang gi skyon gyis ma gos me tog pad+ma 'dra// phyir mi ldog pas sems can du ga zos tshe dang 'dra// rgyun mi 'chad pas chu bo'i gzhung dang 'dra// ngo bo gcig/
40b7(rnying rgyud): la rang rtsal mi 'gags pa// rgya mtsho chen po dag las rlabs 'char 'dra// 'od gdangs lhan grub man shel rkyen 'phrad 'dra// nyon mongs rang grol sbrul gyi mdud pa 'dra// tog pa rang ngo rang gis shes pa ni// rgyal bu dmangs nas rgyal sar bton pa 'dra// dus gsum
41a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur brgyad pas rten canags dang dra// nang dugs pangs pasan mang ma 'dra// gcigags kyil sa rna ma bas na// da dgas sul ra gdang / rnam pad nga mtshan pa// ga sa
41a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig rtogs pas ma rig sel ba ni// sron me bteg pas mun pa sel ba 'dra// phar la 'joms shing rtsor la mi tshugs pas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje pha lam 'dra// ngo bo 'dus ma byas pas nam mkha' 'dra// rang rig don rtogs nyon mongs dag pa ni//
41a3(rnying rgyud): ma shar bas thams cad gsal ba 'dra// ma bsgom gas la rtsal byad dang me long 'dra// ma bcos ma bslad dang reg gnyug ma 'dra// mtshon dpe sum chu tham pas lta ba'i don gyi phyogs mtshon// lnga bablo dang 'thas pa'i yul las 'das pas na// 'di yin
41a4(rnying rgyud): dag kho na zhes su bstan pa shin tu dka'// don gyi zur tsam phyogs tsam mtshon pa yin// gtan tshigs mang bar bstan kyang gsum yin te// lung gis gtan la phab pa'i gtan tshigs dang // man ngag dag gi gtan tshigs bstan pa dang // de gnyis 'joms pa'i rjes su
41a5(rnying rgyud): rigs pa'i gtan tshogs so// lung gi gtan tshigs rdo rje 'chang gi bka'// man ngag gtan tshigs bka' lung bcud kyi don// rig pa'i gtan tshigs rang reg mngon sum don// lung dang man ngag gnyis kyis ngo sprad pa'o// lha don rang rig mngon sum rtogs pa'i tshe/
41a6(rnying rgyud): ro sprod shes pas rang ngo zhes pa ste// nyams su myong bas rang las 'byung ba'i don// nyon mongs dug lnga la sogs dang grol du// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ma zhen dang // nyams togs thams cad rang las 'thung ba dang // dus gsum dag tu 'gyur ba med pa yis// bar
41a7(rnying rgyud): du gcod pa'i bdud kyis tshwag mi 'gyur// nang gi rig pa chos kyi sU ru togs// gsal stong gnyis med spos dang bral ba'i gdengs// bar gyi rtsal ni 'gyu ba 'ang mar dgrol// rig bzang thal ci spyod ye shes so// phyi yi ldang ba 'di sdug rang sa dkrol// ma bcos stong nyid
41b1(rnying rgyud): ca rnas gapa// dag pa bstan pas rgyan rnams thams cad thal// de ltar shes na lta btogs par byed// ltab martags pa skyon brtan pa// dpar na byam 'ar la ma 'anga' bu 'dra// byam nyal nus su'angs 'ang ga' ltar// yang dang rtanas
41b2(rnying rgyud): lam zhugs pas// gnas skabs tsam las mthar thug 'bras bu med// da phyir lta ba ma rtogs sangs mi rgyu// lta ba'i ngos 'dzin do sprod skabs na gsal// ngo yis zin na 'phral du rtogs pa 'char// ci phyir zhen char pog bstan pa yin// de phyi ngos 'dzin
41b3(rnying rgyud): shin tu gces// lta ba'i dogra bcad shin tu gces// mi mthun pa yi rkyen las bzlog par 'gyur// de yang rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa ste// me mthun phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog/ mi mthun phyogs las bzlog par bstan pa ni// rig pa yin pas
41b4(rnying rgyud): bem po dag las bzlog/ mgrin pa'i phyogs las ldog par bstan pa ni// nang gi rnam shes tshogs brgyad ldog pa'o// shes rig tsam du mthun snad gyur na yang // 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yod med khyad par che// de yang sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa ni// yul de snang bas
41b5(rnying rgyud): shes pa skye bar 'gyur// yul mi snang na shes pa skye mi 'gyur// de yang yul la 'dzin pa bcas nas skye// de phyir sgo lnga'i rtogs pa rang kha ma// rtog pa gsal na sgo lnga'i 'dzin pa 'gags// yid kyi rnam shes mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// phyi ru yul lnga stod pa'i bdag po byed//
41b6(rnying rgyud): nang du de las bzung ba'i nyon mongs yid// gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis kyi bdag po yin// de phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams// dang gi rig pa dag gi rtsal yin te// 'dzin med gsal ba'i rig pa de nyid ni// rig pa 'grus kyang 'dzin pa'i rjes med de// phyi ru yul la sprad kyang
41b7(rnying rgyud): ma bzung na// lta bzang thal yin te yid las ldog/ nyon mongs yid kyi mtshan nyid ni// yul gyi rtog pa dpyad pa de dag ni// yid la bzung ba'i cha nas nyon mongs yid// 'dzin med rig pa gsal ba lta ba yin// don la rig pa'i rtsa la ni ma 'gags pas// ma
42a1(rnying rgyud): shes yul la gzung bas rtog pa'i tshogs su shar// shes nas yul la 'dzin pa med pa ni// ye shes zang thal bsdu ba'i mthar thug yin// spor ba don gyi kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// tshogs bdun rtog pa'i gzhi la bya// cha
42a2(rnying rgyud): bdun dag la rtog pa mi gsog na// sbyor ba don gyi kun gzhi de las bzlog/ mthun phyogs tshogs brgyad dag las de ltar bzlog/ nang rig pa'i tshogs brgyad dag las bzlog pa yin// gyi yi chos dbyings dag las bzlog pa yin// 'byung ba lnga ni rags pa rdos pa can//
42a3(rnying rgyud): lta ba chos kyi dbyings ni stong pa la// 'od gsal dag ni trang rgya snang ba 'char// de phyir chos su chos dbyings shar tsam na// 'khrul pa'i snang ba las ni bzlog pa yin// lta ba'i la cwo spos dang bral ba yin// ci phyir spos dang bral zhe na// spros pa'i mtha' ni mthar
42a4(rnying rgyud): skye// de dang thal na snyos thal lo// mtha' rung 'bor ba'i mtha'i yin na// 'khor ba'i mtha' yang phyi nang gnyis yin te// kye yi 'brung langs pa'i mtha'// 'thung ba lda ni 'das byas te// 'dus ma bus shing 'dzin pa med pas mtha' pas grol/ nang
42a5(rnying rgyud): mongs dug lnga 'dzin pa'i mtha'// 'dzin pa'i phyogs sum lhung mtha' dang thal// gyi nang sdod bcud mtha' las de ltar grol// gsal la 'dzin pa med pas chad pa'i mtha' las grol// mi rtog stong pas rtag pa'i mtha' las grol// phyogs cha gang yang med pas rus
42a6(rnying rgyud): dgu'i mtha' las grol// phyi nang ldod bcud kun gyi mtha' las grol// sku gsum ye shes lnga ru 'dzin med pas// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' las grol// phyogs ris gang yang med pas mtha' rnams kun dang bral// 'dzin pa gang yang med pas phyogs su lhung ba med// /
42a7(rnying rgyud): blo yi yul las 'das pas brjod pa'i tshig dang bral// dogs pa med cing re gnas med pas sangs rgyas da lte nyid// ro dogs kun dang bral bas 'bras bud lta nyid// de ltar shes shing rtogs pa'i gang zag de// 'khor ba'i gnas su 'dug kyang 'bras bu sku gsum rdzogs//
42b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes zhwa yis don lang 'gyur ba med// rang byung rig pa'i don de mngon du shar// yang bag tsha med pas khrung chen nam mkhar rdzid pa 'dra// zhes gsungs pa// smyos bral dron gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ sta ba nus par bshad pa'i le'u rti bzhi pa'o//
42b2(rnying rgyud): rtse bcom ldan rdo rjel cheng// snang rgyas par bstan pa de la ga sun// ljongs yang bag rjod rje nga// sgrub rang ga mtshan nyid de drag pa// gnad kyi ma nang na mi 'phrul dgag// gcig sugagacig gis gzung ba ba sung drug pa la// nyes thus
42b3(rnying rgyud): de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// dang rig chos su gtan la dbab pa ni// rang rig yon tan brjod kyis mi langs kyang // yon tan bcu ldan rang rig chos kyi sku// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed rang byung cha// dngos po mtshan mar ma grub stong pa'i cha// rang rig rang gsal
42b4(rnying rgyud): sa na su na gas nasu na
42b5(rnying rgyud): skyon rnams ma spangs drag pas rnam dag cha// yul rkyen rang sar grol bas 'dzin med cha// g+ha rkyen gnyis kyis ma bskyed dang byung ni// bde gshegs thugs rje dag las ma byung rang byung dang // sems can rnams kyi las kyis ma bskyed dang // phyi mi ma byung ba lnga yis ma
42b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang // nang gis rnam rtog dag las ma byang dang // gang zag lam pa'i blo yis ma bcos pa'o// de phyid rang byung rgya rkyen med pa'o// dngos po mtshan mar mgu ba stong pa ni// glo bur ma yin gdod ma nas kyi stong pa dang // gsal ba'i ngo bo ma grub stong pa dang // blo
42b7(rnying rgyud): yis ma bcos ma bslad pa yi stong pa dang // rdzas dang mtshan mar ma grub stong pa dang // nyon mongs bag chags ma thub stong pa'o// de phyir chos nyid stong pa nyid ces bya// rig pa nang gsal ngo bo bstan pa ni// gzhan la rag ma las par gsal ba dang // glo bur ma
43a1(rnying rgyud): / yin gdod ma nas kyi gsal ba dang // gsal tsam nyid namang po mthu bgasal ba dang // gsal ba'i dral na pa de'i na gsal ba dang // yon tan lhan gyis thub pas gsal ba'o// de phyir rang rig rang gsal dag yin no// sgo lngang rab rtsal phyogs pa/
43a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// mig gi yul du gzugs rnams snang ba dang // na ba'i yul du sman mas zag pa dang // sna yi yul du dri rnams sdom pa dang // rtse yi yul du ngo rnams tho ba dang // lus kyi yul du reg bya tshor ba'o// sgo lnga de rnams rig pa dgra la tshad// sgo lnga'i rjes 'dug
43a3(rnying rgyud): 'phya bzang thal yin// myig la brten nas gzugs kyi rnam par spyod// rna ba la brten sgra yi rnam par spyod// sA la brten nas dri yi rnam par spyod// lce la brten nas ro yi rnam par stod// lus la brten nas reg bya'i rnam par spyod// spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang na 'khrul pa yin//
43a4(rnying rgyud): yul lam spyad rang sar grol bas zang thal yin// rig rdul 'od du shar bas gzugs rtsal yin// stong nyid ye shes rtsal ni mthing gar gar// me long ye shes rtsal ni dkar por shar// mnyam nyid ye shes rtsal ni ser por shar// sor rtog ye shes rtsal ni dmar por
43a5(rnying rgyud): shar// bya sub ye shes rtsal ni ljang gur shar// rtsal gnyis rang sar mi 'dod// rtog pa// rang sdang rang sar grol brtogs pa'i tshad// gsal stong gnyis med don la thig car ni// tha dad gnyis su mgub gnyis med dang // gsal stong gnyis su ma grub gnyis med
43a6(rnying rgyud): dang // gdod nas 'bral ma myong ba'i gnyis med dang // rang kyang chu rkyen med pa'i gnyis med dang // bzang ngan med pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // gnyis med steng du 'dzin med lta ba'i mchog/ yon tan ma btsal ldan gyis grub pa'i lhun grub ni// rtsol ba
43a7(rnying rgyud): gang gis ma btsal lhun grub dang // yon tan lhun gyis grub pas lhun grub dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan tshad pas lhan grub dang // glo bur ma yin gdod nas rdzogs pas lhun grub po// de phyir ma bsgrub lhun grub chen po yin// skyon rnams la spangs dag pa'i rnam dag ni//
43b1(rnying rgyud): rang go dgas pas srad lan// nam to/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par dag/ dngos po rtag mtha' thams cad rnam par dag/ med latha 'dan cang mtha' rnam par dag/ rlung di thag pa'i bkrin rnam par du// mngag ga mugasan rnam pa dag/ sra bya
43b2(rnying rgyud): rangs grol ba'i mtshan nyid de// don rtogs spyang rkyen dngas 'grol ba ste// dge pachos snga pa'i byor rtogs pas// yul gyen de shang 'dzin pa med par grol// mig gi yul du gzugs gar 'dzin med pol// dpa'i yul thas byung 'dzin me dkrol/
43b3(rnying rgyud): yul duji ltad 'dzin med bral// lce yi yul du ri myong 'dzin med sgrol// lus kyi yul du rig tshor 'dzin med thol// don rtsal dang shang rig pazang bra la yin// rang rig chos kyi sgra yodon rtogs na// snang ba dang snang 'dzin pa rang grol lo// de phyir rang ljang dang gar zhes
43b4(rnying rgyud): bshad// de ltar yon tan bcwa ldan de// gcig srog gcig gis bzung bas mthar me ltung // la blo spos pa'i mtha' rnams kun dang bral// de phyir rang rig blo yi yul las 'das// btags tshad ming yin pas mchod blo// snang tshad yul yi bas tshad 'dzag
43b5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rtog pa thams cad 'jig pas na// ma byang ma skyes rang byang chen po'i wa// ma bcos ma bsrad ma bsgrubs ma zhen pa// me rtog mi 'dzin mi zhen mi ltos so// rig pa'i gnas lugs de ltar gnas pa'o// rku bar shang rig pa'i don rtogs pas// ska
43b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid stong pa'i dang las rig tsa la 'od war shar// matog pa las 'byung ba lnga ru brtas// rang gi rtsal snang thung dor mtha' dang bral// rang sdang rang grol zhen pa kun dang bral// dang rig na rtogs 'gru ba rang grol na// sgo lnga'i yul lnga dag gis gnod ma nus/
43b7(rnying rgyud): rang byung migs skab 'dun nogs na// sa bsrad ma thung ma byas ma btsal ba// me 'bral ma tog ltos minan no// ji gtsigs pa ni rten ldan lags // blos na mdon gsus kyi chud chen po las/ lag cig srog gcig gis brgya nas paldan
44a1(rnying rgyud): 'i 'argya ste khya/ rna rgyabacom ldan dab da ba'ibrog brta des gsan/ skababasam ba pagasal// gzug tu she/ b+hAs// derje 'chang gas paka'asngal pa
44a2(rnying rgyud): sgro ma spyod pa dril ba na/ rang gi rig pa chos kyi sku spros pa dang bral ba yin te/ de la dbye na gsum/ nang rig pa chos kyi sku dang / phyi snang ba chos kyi dbyings dang / bar du rig pa'i rtsal mi 'gags pa dang gsum mo// nang rig pa chos kyi sku ni rig pa gsal stong gnyis
44a3(rnying rgyud): su med pa yin te/ de yang rang gi rig pa ma bcos paras le ba de nyid co 'ango bor yang mgrub pa de chos nyid kyi stong ma yin no// mgrub pa de ka rang rig pas le 'dug pas rang rig gi gsal cha'o// stong pa dang gsal ba thA dad du mgyur pas gsol stong gnyis su med pa'o//
44a4(rnying rgyud): / den mying na gnyis med kyi bden zhes bya'o// gnyis med la d+hA ma 'gags par 'bya bas/ bral gyi 'gro cha zhes bya'o// 'bru cha med na zheg nas lced po zhes bya ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'chang mi sring ngo // rig pa'i rtsal 'grus pa de sgo lal brten nas/ yul gar/
44a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs su shar ba ni 'od ba dog lnga dun ba'o// bar gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa ni rig pa gsal stong gnyis su med pa de gsal ba'i cha'o// de ni phye'i yul la 'gru ba de yin te/ de yang 'gru ba gsalam mi 'gag pa la 'dzin pa med de 'dzin pa'i shes parang byung pa dgrol ba'o//
44a6(rnying rgyud): de yang 'gyu ba rang grol du song ba ste// bar gyi rtsal mi 'gag pa de ye shes zang thal zhes bya'o// rig pa chos kyi skugs pa stong gnyis su med par spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba de lta bu gcig rang byung du drang gsal tsam na/ phyi'i yul mi 'gag rig pa 'gru bsgo
44b1(rnying rgyud): la brten nas 'gyu yang 'dzin pa dngas grol ba'i yul de gsal rung migs padz+rag/ snang dung stong dung yul chos kyi dpyid yin par la bcad do// de ltar rtogs pa de lta ba yin te/ de nyid rgyud lags la bde bsgom pa'o// de khon 'gro nyal 'dug sdod mi 'thal bar ma yengs pa yongs
44b2(rnying rgyud): nas nam tog byung yang rang sar grol ba ni stod pa'o// rtogs pa'i don dang mi 'bral ba 'bras bu'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bral do na gsal gyi rgyud chen po las/ lci sgom spyod pa gcig tu dril nas bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / kye kye bcom ldan
44b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang / gang zag spros pa bcad pa'i phyir/ rang byung rig pa phyogs de nas// yon tan bye brag brjod pa dang // spros pa'i mtha' rnams bcad pa'i phyir// rgyas bsdus spos dang bye brag mang bstan kyang // rang byung rig pa'i ngo bo de// don gyi la zlo ca ltar zla// de
44b4(rnying rgyud): skad ces ni zhus pa yis// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal ba// rang rig chos sra'i ba'i// sta ba mnor dam pa yin// dpe dang gtan tshig rba sbrang dang // dza skad lta bsam spyod 'bras dang // 'bral dang rtogs dang goms pa rnams// rmo man lam gyi mkhye
44b5(rnying rgyud): sa// don la ma grub btags pa tsam// ngo bo rig pa chos su'am// rang byung ye shes bya ba de// rang rig chos sku'i ngo bo las// 'khor ba med cing myang 'das med// gzhi med lam med 'bras bu med// theg pa med cing gang zag med// chos dang chos min
44b6(rnying rgyud): gang yang med// 'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu med// rgyu ni ma rig gnyis bstan dang // rkyen gzhi la sogs gang yang med// 'bras bu 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog med// dug lnga la sogs nyon mongs med// rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems
44b7(rnying rgyud): can med// phyi yi 'byung ba lnga yang med// sa med chu med me chung med// nam mkha' dag kyang btags pa tsam// de ltar snod bcu gang yang med// 'khor ba 'khrul pas btags pa tsam// 'khor ba med cing myang 'das med// rtogs pas sangs rgyas btags pa
45a1(rnying rgyud): las// dbus ngab rgyas sul// yangs med ces mang gu pa ra med// bcom ma num ba mang/ bya shing chub sod sams dpa'athod// dbadun med da gnags pa meng // dang co bas bu dang me / su bya
45a2(rnying rgyud): ba da@ stan par byed// des gsung ya mig // ma thapa'i sa / bas pa ma/ mabyas banags cang ming // bas
45a3(rnying rgyud): bzhom thong dang ma ny-ing mdu// dang sngal 'gro man ma/ maud du me shA gang ba // ce ma pa // dga'adu dag 'gan da sa ma dang // pa marjeg pa ma dang / sum mam rdzums/
45a4(rnying rgyud): dag sa/ smrang sa sasu sa / sa / me pang+gA 'i / med pa gnas myong ba bsgra ma pa/ yang na
45a5(rnying rgyud): pagan dang zal// phral la N+Dal 'ams smos pa n+de// phyogs sa bzang ris mtha'i zhes s+ho// phral 'jos zhin ci chags pa med// m-i tha' mi tshogs sa ma sbyang bas// khros pa'i mtha' rnams ca bral// tho 'das ljid kyis la las 'das// sras
45a6(rnying rgyud): blas shing dag gis klas pa dang // b+h+yo yis bsams shing yid kyis man las 'das// rang rig chos su bya ba pang // btags patsam las don la 'di 'dra med// gsum gre nas snga sogs kyang // mtshon pa ma du bstan pa yin// byang chub bsgrub bya ba sgrub tu
45a7(rnying rgyud): med// de dag rang she ba ste// dag chos su tsam du btags// gab grod bzhin yi// gang can la rdzas kyis// brjod medapas mamed mtha jal de// yaMnas gnas pa'i chanasanan// de mdogs las 'phral babyung // de rnags
45b1(rnying rgyud): rtson dpa mad yim// de ltar gzhimathong rtsu ba yin// mthong nags pabs bams pa las/ nyid dus gsum nun byed pa// spyod patsam du ga gas pa pan// mngon pa 'bas zhes sa stan// lta ba las byeng dun ngas pa dang /
45b2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa gsum// kyai yi yul gyen 'thang ba'o// / don la grub pa med pas na// rang snang dang gro la dngas med yin// yul gyis don la gnongs nus// gdang sa chen pa rjong pa'i don// zhes gsangs so// thos bral dron gsal ba da bye pa las/
45b3(rnying rgyud): lta ba la bzla ba'i le'u steng bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye sde bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // bskom du yod med ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa lelags par gyu zhig/ ngas
45b4(rnying rgyud): bstan bde chen gnyis med la// bsgom du yod dang med pa yi// tha snyad thams cad rnam par dag/ shes rab stobs chen rang rig don rtogs pas// gnyis med bde che na dang du 'du bral med// ma btsal bzhag pas dang las ma g.yos kyang // rgyun chad med pa chu bo gang+gA
45b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin// dbang po yang rab don du de bstan to// rten gyi gang zag shes rab 'bring rnams la// mi bsgom bsgom par bstan pa yin// rnal 'byor shes rab N+Dal chungs// ma bsgoms sangs mi bya bar bstan// kye gsang bdag nges par zung zhe// padra 'ad rje/
45b6(rnying rgyud): na gnas kyang skyon gyis mgos d+har// phyi nang 'khrul par shAr kyang ni// rang rig ye nas gos pa med// me 'khrul pa yi sangs rgyas yin// rigs kyi bu gzhi dag pa chos kyi sru pa// 'bras bu dag pa gzugs kyi sra gnyis kyis btsun nas// don lu gsum 'ang
45b7(rnying rgyud): la med pa ni// bum pa'i nang gi mar me ltar// ye shes nang nags la ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzugs kyi phung po rgya snod kyi 'jig rten/ gzhal yas khang 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na/ sku gsum gyi rang gdangs 'gag pa med pa'i yegs kyi gzhal
46a1(rnying rgyud): su ma na gyu// na/ smra pa smra smra / chu
46a2(rnying rgyud): 'thor te/ daltar gnas pa nas 'phrul ba'i badz+dza'o// rigs kyi tha ma jal ba'i bad+ha la/ me byas pa'i chos nyid bstan pa 'i/ thugs kyi mi long yi te/ dper na na bcas kyi phung po 'di rgyas pa'i mi yo ga seg rdul pababs pa/ zag pa med pa ma shes
46a3(rnying rgyud): 'ag pa ma pa gsal ba/ sman ga sa la / '-i mi gas gas pa la shug/ thams rgyud 'thung ba gan shegs pa 'dzi/ mAgu pa'i gas kyi sa sta pa/ ldang sa mthal las kyi thugs kyi spyo sa/ ra thang dang shar ba
46a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa nas
46a5(rnying rgyud): rang krung gi yi shes chen pa yin pas/ dus gsum du 'gyur mamyod ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i skabazod na pa chen pal// de ni 'khrul pa loganas ye shes kyi de khon nyid kyi tig rten pa la// des ni rtags kyi sto nas mi 'gyur ba'i gzer ba bya ba'o// srung gi tig rkyen pas ngon
46a6(rnying rgyud): la lhor // bdag nyid chen pa da t+taka la gan bcas pa'o// de 'dzi gas nas pa mang ma dang yin no// de yang rang chas gnasu pas 'dra 'bral med// pra la dang rdul chen/ ba skyom bya dang seM mgyid/ dadzin pa dang mtshan ma da migs su
46a7(rnying rgyud): med/ dper na gar sbyin la spang ma'i 'dab ma chag pa lta bu'o// chos nyid kyi don thamal gyis mi rtogs pas/ so so'i kyo ba thamal gyis migo te/ go d+har togs dgos pas/ yangs su med de skyon can no// nges par rtogs can/ yengs pa med dems
46b1(rnying rgyud): nano// yongs su me dang de/ 'dug kyang chos nyid rang sdang gdang las ma g.yos pa tsam du 'dug la/ 'gro yang ye shes kyi rang gdungs la/ rang ba'i nam 'gag bcom du 'phos/ mar me'amanyiHrang rtswang dang chas nas 'thab bzhinano// nyal yang ngapa sam
46b2(rnying rgyud): g.yos pa'i grong rig pa zang thal gyi ngang nas rtsal gzhi la 'dus te/ rang bzhin gzhi la thim mo// mtshan ma rang sar grol nas don la stor ba chen por 'gyur ro// langs kyang dang ma g.yos pa las langs/ rig pa rang shar te rang bzhin ma 'gags par gsal lo//
46b3(rnying rgyud): kye ma rigs kyi bu legs par yid la zung zhig/ skrod lam bzhi ci spyad kyang / rang gi gdangs las mi 'da' zhing / chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos pa/ dper na b+ha yis gang 'phur kyang / mkha' las 'dang ba med/ nya yis gang 'byos kyang na las mi 'dang ba dang /
46b4(rnying rgyud): yis gang byin yangs las pa 'da' ba bzhin/ rna'i byo rtogs ldan dang las galas pa med/ rigs gi thu bsgos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa mas pa// rdom da po gsan med de/ rang sa kyi sh+tsa madz+ra// chung sathangs ca na nga ga
46b5(rnying rgyud): ste/ rig pa chos su stong pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang / de nyid dbyed med pa dang / de ltar shes pa'i zhes rab mi 'gag pa dang / de la thogs pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid myur shar ro// de wa ye shes lnga gar ro// ye shes lnga 'od du gyur ro// 'od rigs la
46b6(rnying rgyud): shair // rigs lnga sI lngang shar ro// su lnga yum lnga mi 'gags so// yab sum la sems dpa' dang sems ma mi 'gags so// sems ma rnams las yul du sha ba ro// sems dpa' rnams las dbang po dang rnam shes su shar ro// des na rig pa rang sha
46b7(rnying rgyud): gyi dgongs pas snang ba la rgyas gdab ste/ m+ba \u0f7fda rang snang gi ye shes las gzhan sdang gi rtog pa med do// 'gags pa'i dus su mtshan ma rang grol gyi dgongs brtsal gzhi la 'dus te/ yul lnga sgo lnga'i ngang du grol/ sgo lnga sems dpa' sems ma'i nga du grol/ sems
47a1(rnying rgyud): / dbang sems ma rnyogs sprul ga sum me dang durgal/ de yang ye shes lnga krol/ ya gas la yang dag bya'am da 'a / mtshan nyid 'jig pa 'dzin med dang gsal dumalan/ dbang gan mam pa
47a2(rnying rgyud): laT/ ye shes dbyangs su thim pa'o// de lta krol nas dang las ma g.yos pa ni/ shes bya bum par chud pa ste/ chos nyid chos sru dbyer med zang thal gyi bum pa na/ rang rig pa'i ye shes mar me rnyeng gi sam po skyed pa lta gsal ra/
47a3(rnying rgyud): man ngag/ gti mug gnyid la sogs pa shes rab kyi don de kho na nyid la 'byor pa'o// thams cad byung yang rang las byung / stang yang rang las snang / gsal yang rang gas gsal/ ngag cing grol yang dang shi du grol bas nA/ ye shes yang dag che
