47a4(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi snang ba dang snang las gzhan sdang med pa'o// smin dang khri drungs par yang nam mkha' nus byung / sngar yang nam mkha'i drung li snang / gnas kying nam mkha'i dang la gnas/ dag kyang nam mkha'i rang dru dag/ grol yang nam lakha'i dngang grol bstana'o// zhes gsu
47a5(rnying rgyud): so// spos bral de ni gsal chen po'i chung las/ bsgom du yod med blo dang sbyar bar bstan pa ste/ sgo 'bring la tshun gyi ting nge 'dzidagatan tshigrwa dang gicas pa bstan pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus bya/ kle kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // dri sum du yod la bsha
47a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ sgo zhan rnams la bsgom pa bstan// bsgom du med par ma shes na// mchi ba yid la byed pa dang // bu rtsol bral ba mi rtogs te// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin don migs la// bsgom du yod par ma shes na/
47a7(rnying rgyud): skye bo rnams dang khyad par med// tha mal rang rgyu dgol bar 'gro// mi bsgom bsgom pa'i don shes pas// sangs rgyas nyag gcig don du 'du 'bral med// bsgom pa mi bsgom don shes pas// dmigs gtad blo yi mtha' las bzlog/ gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas//
47b1(rnying rgyud): du san shAs// da du / sa pa bye byed// sa phyag sa ma bcan pa yin// rnas pa gsas stsas// gsang / ga midags
47b2(rnying rgyud): btang la sdong pa yin// nang naH yi rlung ma bsnams// ring byung dbyings kyi thig le las// dang por lus kyi srid pa chags// de lus las ma nga rtsa gnyis shar// mya gnyis 'dus nus tsa mdud lte bar gyur// de las rtse zan rnams kyi
47b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed// de nas snying la sogs pa'i nang khrol rgyas// de las dbugs yang dri las nam rtog shar// de la rtsa ba rab tu gus pa mig yin pas// ci snang dang srang yin gyi rnam rtag ma byed cer skos// gas mi bsku bas de nas rig paN+Dal ma 'gyur// rtsal dang
47b4(rnying rgyud): 'grogs rlung dang ser bu bzhin// ma bsdus rang sar zhog cig 'phro mi nus// de bas rlung ces de la spyan mi blta// rlung yod rtogs pa'i shes rab yongs su rgyas// thabs kyi sa zin pas mi tog drangs gnas// skabs su ha dang phaT ces rlung ro 'bung// gsang bar bslab pa'i
47b5(rnying rgyud): thabs gsum ste// rgyal po gdan la bzhag pa dang // rnon po btsun du bzung ba dang // da mangs rnams cha ma la shugs kyis phebs so// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ rgyal po ni dang rig dag pa chos kyi skya'o// gden ni rang bzhin dag pa nam mkha'i yul du snang ba
47b6(rnying rgyud): 'di'o// don ni dbyings kyi TIg le yul sdang ba 'di'o// de nyid kyi don bdag dang bral ba ni// dbyings rnam par dag pa rig pa'i ye shes bzhugs pa'i gdan te/ dra lta byang chub sems kyi sgron ma/ chu'i rang bzhin dag cing gsal ba la sbyar ro// de yang 'dug tshul gyis
47b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dang / snang tshul gyis 'byams pa ste/ dper na bya khrag nas ri brag gi nang na gnas bcas nas/ stod sa tshang sgor sdod pa bzhin/ dpe de bzhin du rig pa'i ye shes tsit+ta rin po chen bzhugs pa ste/ rang gi dri bo rtags la mngon par gsal lo// gdan la
48a1(rnying rgyud): bgrags du mags kyi byung na don dunag zhas long / zla la gas gsal banang rnas ma// de bas na dazangs rnam par dag pa ldan na d+ha rgan ma g+sa nang du rgya gang bzhin du gnas kyi snang ba gan sa// gdan/
48a2(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs pa ye shes kyi snang ba ni/ ye shes chen po'i thig le ma 'gags par radags pa po// ye shes snying po rig par gnas shing / rag pa la ye shes gsal bas/ lhun gyis grub pa'i thig le mtshan ma dang / rnam tog bcom pa'o// de ltar gyi gyur
48a3(rnying rgyud): gnas shing / rang snang las gzhan sdang med do// de ni ldan gyis grub pa'i thig le ste/ don snang ba gsum stor du bstan na/ mdzang bya rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' ni// nam mkha' dag pa de rang gdang sa yin// de la ngo gro dag pa dang // mthong byed rtse yi sngon ma ni//
48a4(rnying rgyud): nying dag pa'i ye gdanges so// rig pa yul la shar ba'i sdang ba ni// ye shes dgu pa'i zer gdangs so// kyem nam mapa' dag ka'i rang gdangs ni// mtshan mo nam mkha' lta bu'o// chos nyid dag pa'i ye gdangs ni// nam langs pa'i nam mnga' lte bu'o//
48a5(rnying rgyud): shes chen po'i zer gdangs ni// nam mkha' la ni nyi ma shing blta bu'o// rgyal po gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ spos thal gyis dbyings 'gyur med kyi ngang du rig pa ye nas dag pa ste/ de las ma g.yos par bzhag go// 'chi ba dag bdud kyi sgo nas ye shes kyi rgyang chu ba'i
48a6(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas pas/ de gsum gtun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa la thug pa med de/ mtshan mang mi gnas pas/ spyan nam mkha'i dkyil du bzlas te/ rtse'u dgi sgobasdams so// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas sems can bya bar naganas
48a7(rnying rgyud): pas/ spyan par sdang du bsti'o// mgrin pa cung ba gtus te/ dpung pa'i khar yog ma bzhag go// cagasam chung gi largya srang bcad pa'o// lha dang mi bsam gtan dang / sems 'dzin ni mtshanam shas chengs gong ma gnyis pobs dka' ste/ lhanas la blta'o//
48b1(rnying rgyud): don mthon cung zad ba cag ste/ oMg mabyung ba dga'abadang bya'o// de ni rtsal po gang nal bzhugs shing ga dan thog tu btang ba 'thabs so// deste dag brtsal po dang 'du gyu rangs badzin pa'o/ ldan po ni sems te/ rig pa'i la na gtu shong bas/ ga
48b2(rnying rgyud): su mi chu rtog med du gsul te/ dper na blon po btson du zin pas gros blo dang bya ba byed mkhan med pa lta bu'o// lus dang ma bral bar dbugs yod de/ rig pa la rta yod pas blon po lta bu'o// btson du zin pa 'dra ste/ rtog pa'i rlung yod la rgya mi nus so// sgo lnga 'a'adas dang
48b3(rnying rgyud): 'dra bas las myed pa yin no// dus deng gsal la rtog pa med do// de ni 'brangs cham pa la 'bebs pa lta bu'o// kye rigs kyi bu bslab par bya ba ni// dang dngas rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po'o// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' dang // chos nyid dag pa'i nam mkha'
48b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis// rnam rtog bral ba'i rig pa gsum// dbyer med stong zhing mi rtog pas// ma bcos pa yi rang zhes bya// rang rig ye shes gsal ba dang // 'byung bzhig dngas su shar ba gnyis// rang bzhin ma dgags ye shes gdangs// gsal bar sdang la rang bzhin
48b5(rnying rgyud): nga // stong pa med na rang bzhin yod// dbyer med bdag nyid chen po'i don// mdor na rang rig ye shes yin// lo gra pa'i tshad ni/ shes pa rkyen gyi dbang du mi 'gro zhing / rnam rtog chun bcad mtshan ma zil gyis gnon pa'o// drod rtags mi 'dod bzhin du 'byung //
48b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus byas zhing lam chen por ldog// lung ston rim par 'byung ba yin// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro las// dngos dang 'byung ba'i sba la brten// de yis nges par rgyud la skye'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bra'i don gsal chen po'i chud lam/ bsgom du
48b7(rnying rgyud): par bstan pa'i dgongs pa dang / bsgom thabs rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o// / kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // bsgom du yod med sa mtshams yang // blo dang sbyor ba de lags na// rang gi mtshan nyid bsgom pa de// mnor legs pa dang lhan
49a1(rnying rgyud): gsal// zhes zhus pas/ napas pa'aphrul pa/ rlungags rdzun bzhus pa// da gangs panas / ma du na gsudang// gangs sadz+ra k+Sha stsa// dad kyang dugs shA
49a2(rnying rgyud): pa rang gi mtshan nyid yin// rig pa chos slar rtogs gyur na// sku gsum mun gyis grub pa yin// ye shes lnga yang lhan gyis grub// rang rig zos srud de las ni// rnam tog yul gyi rkyen gyur nas// 'khrul pa'i rtog pa byang gyur na// spyod la la gdams pa
49a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du khyer// ye nas gnas pa'i chan srogazhi// de nyid rtogs pa lta ba'o// de gsal bsgom pa tsam du btags// rgyan tu byed bstod pa'o// mngon gyur 'bras zung bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// spros thal dron gsal chen po'i rgyud las/
49a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa rang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// // kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // bsgom yod bsgom med bstan pa dang // bsgom pa ring gi mtshan nyid bsgom// rgyas par bshad pa de lags na// theg pa brgyad kyi gol sa dang
49a5(rnying rgyud): spyi yi go las bskrun pa rnams// rdo rje 'chang gis gsung du gsol// de skad ces ni gus pa las// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// de ma dgu bsgom pa'i gol sa dang / gong 'og skabs nas gsal bar bshad// spyi yi gol sna 'di ltar bshad//
49a6(rnying rgyud): gnas stong pa grolas m+b+ha/ lcag mthong gas la ba ga lasaH// de nyid snre l-i gA 'i sA gnyid// galas bcwa gnyis dbatu bshad// / rgyags kyi sa // zhe gnas rka pa dgro las ni// nam ga gnas smin pas na'o// @/
49a7(rnying rgyud): sgoms ltang po 'golas ni// rtsol ba med deng gnas pa'o// stong pa chad po 'galas ni// bem ga gang yang mi 'dod pa'o// martog 'thom pa'i galas ni// drin me dgas la cha 'gags pa'o// 'dzin med nyed pa'i golas ni// bral gyi rnam pa
49b1(rnying rgyud): spar yang // gang yang gtan la ma phegs pas// rang ngom shes 'dzin pa med// 'dzin pa med kyang gsal cha med// de phyi dgolas rabastan pa'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag nyon cig/ gsal ba phyag mthong ko pas ni// kun brtags lha gams dang /
49b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'od kyi golas dang // rdza chung bde ba'i gol sa dang // gzung 'dzin yul gyi gol sa dang // 'khor ba sdug bsngal go las rnams// gsal ba dag las go la sa'o// ched du byas pa'i golas ni// mchong yid la byed pa'o// mo bsgoms 'khrul pa'i ko
49b3(rnying rgyud): sa ni// skye bo rang khar 'dzin pa ste// 'khrul pa phyi ru shor ba yin// lta ba rtogs don gsal gyur na// se la sgrib sdug bsngal 'byung mi srid// ces gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i klud las/ bsgom pa'i go las bstan pa'i le'u ste re gcig
49b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // kye kye rdo rje 'chang chen po// bsgom pa rang gi mtshan nyid ni// mnor bstan pa de lags na// de ltar ma shes bsgom pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba ste// de nyid mi gol gdams dag ma nor gsung du gsol// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal
49b5(rnying rgyud): pa// nyon cig gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang // rang gi rig pa chos sku de la ni// chu rkyen ma bskyed rang byung yin pas na// glo bur byas bsam dag gi go las chod// rang gi ngo bo stong par 'dug pas na// dngos po rtag pa la sogs gol sa chod// de nyid ngo bo gsal ba yin pas
49b6(rnying rgyud): na// chad pa stong pa rnams kyi gol sa chod// gsal stor gnyis med gcig pa'i bdag nyid pas// ting 'dzin nam gsum rig pa'i golas chod// yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub pas na// 'bras bu gzhan nas re ba'i go las chod// thugs rje 'gag pa med
49b7(rnying rgyud): par 'byung bas na// 'gro ba'i don med thugs rje rgyun chad go las chod// gsal ba'i rtsal gnyis mi 'gag pas// zhi gnas btang snyoms mi rtog gol sa chod// chos sku dang gnas bsgom mi dgos pa yis// lha sgom kun brtags bsgom pa'i go las chod//
50a1(rnying rgyud): chos sum rnam ga du sags pa// mthun 'du na man sa // dag pa gangags gtag pag/ gangag sasas da na ga las kyad da par ngas yangs/ 'du tan ras dang
50a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gol sachod// legs sa chen po chu wAn du gnasapasan// sems 'dzi thun pa sgos rtsol ba'i grol sa chod// grol gnyis sems srab thus napa dam pas// dang bcos spang 'dang par ma kyigs thod// dgA'i bkang
50a3(rnying rgyud): 'ja bldan pa tho pa gapa mtshad/ kyi la dag 'dzin ma tha papas// 'dzid pani 'dod can gyigapas tshad// da mi btsun song bdang ma mengs byab 'ang ni ba/ mang la bed pa 'ag rjod// ma
50a4(rnying rgyud): las// smon lam 'dus byas dag la re ba'i golas tshad// da lta nyid du 'bras bu mngon du gyur pas na// sa pha ma rim gyis bgrod pa'i gol sachod// lci yi golas bco brgyad yin// theg pa'i rim pa'o go las rnams// rang gi mtshan nyid mthong na gol mi sring
50a5(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// sgros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa'o// las bzang pa'i 'a ste gnyis pa pa/ gsang pa'i bdag pas yang zhus pa// kye bcom lda rdo rje 'chang // myod pa'i bye brag gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas
50a6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des drang zhig/ thang dor med pa'i spyod pa ni// spyad na med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ chos nyid don gyi spyod pa ni// mtshan ma med pas nam mkha' bzhin// chos can mtshan mar mi blta bar// rnal 'byor bag med shes rab kyis// dngos
50a7(rnying rgyud): med rnamamatha' bzhin spyad// rang ga shes nga na// dpo sa can mo pang bzh-in// legs rang bzhin ma gags pas// rang gang dang ldang chags sdang thal bar spong // lha 'dzin gyi spyod pa na// krung chen mang brjong ba bzhin// byang btsun
50b1(rnying rgyud): tho rdzogs par spyad// dgongs pa dan mi spyod pa no// dab na chu 'ogatu bzhin// kun byi 'byor rgyan par spyod// 'bras budo tu spyod pa ni// nem 'od zer bcas pa pazhin// grags sa 'du 'thal mdu ga // dgas pa sa sa
50b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab chen po ma dzad pa ltang// rnal 'tshor yid kyi spyod pa yin// rna'i 'byor dag ga spyod pa ni// dper na phrag rgya sde sgrogs ltar// sgra rnams zhen pa med par gyung// lus dag yid gsum stod pa ni// 'jig rten 'phor 'a sa cos 'dig// dpe
50b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan bzhin// snang bzhin chags med par spyad// dran pa med pa'i spyod pa ni// rnal 'byor tshul 'chos me bu bur// glang chen smyon pa bzhin du spyad// bung ba me tog 'jib pa bzhin// gcig tu zhen med nal 'byor gang bdar spyong // thugs rje che
50b4(rnying rgyud): po'i spyod pa ni// dper na nyi ma'i snying po bzhin// lus ngag yid kyis 'gro don rdzogs par spyad// thugs rje gdung ba'i spyod pa ni// bu gcig pa yi ma bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis 'grod na spyad// gnyis du/ med pa'i spyod pa ni// ched du mi dgag ched du
50b5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa med// ched du mi 'ang ched du mi spang ngo // ma bcas dang la rang bzhin 'gags med sbyang// ces gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa bslus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste re gsum pa na// gsang ba'i bdag pos lang
50b6(rnying rgyud): zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // skye ma spyod pa de ltar na// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pagang // rdo rje 'chang gis gsung du gsal// zhes gus so// rdo rje 'chang shes bka' stsal ba// sgra yi spyod pa gong bzhin te// gang zag nyams su len pa la// rang
50b7(rnying rgyud): gi mtshan nyid spyod pa ni// dbang po yang rab gyur pa la// lha ba rtag gis rtogs pa yi// de yi dang las me 'bral bas// rtswa sgom spyad pa dus gcig rdzogs// 'bras bu gzhan nas mi 'tshol bas// dus de nyid du cig cang rdzogs// 'bring dang rnga ma'i/
51a1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa ni// dus bzhi dag gi spyod pa dang // dus gsum gcig pa'i skrod pa'o// dus bzhi dgag smod pa ni// nyal khar rtsal lcu gzhi la bsdu// dbang po rnam ldag zhi yi rtsal// gzhi la gsal cha ma 'gags pas/
51a2(rnying rgyud): dbang po la brten gyi yul spyod// gzung 'dzin gnyis sdang dug lnga bskyed// de dag gnyid du 'gro ba ru// gsal cha gzhi yi steng du 'dus// tha mal gti mug gnyid du 'gro// gang zag rtogs dang ldan pa la// rmi lam med par song gyur nas// shes byatham
51a3(rnying rgyud): par chud pa yin// ma bsgoms rmi lam 'byung gyur yang // med pa'i bar du bu ma 'jug go// rmi lam dgu dang sad dus su// rig pa rang gsal gdams ngag tu// rmi lam dran rtog byung ba 'am// sad pa'i dran rtog byung ba na// don dran 'dzin pa rang grol bas//
51a4(rnying rgyud): snang ba dang sdang dang sar dag/ 'dzin pa grol bas snang ba dag/ goms pa brtas na rmi lam chad// 'dzin pa grol ba'i spyod pa ni// mar me bzhin du rang gsal lo// langs dus yul lnga rgyas btab ste// mig yul gzugs la rna kul sla// sna yul dri
51a5(rnying rgyud): la lce yul ro// lus yul reg bya la sogs pa// yul ni rnam pa lnga yang snang // rang snang zhes su bstan pa yin// bskyod par byed pas 'gyu ba rlung gi rtsal// yul dang sdang ba gzugs tsam yin// rang sdang yul la 'dzin zhen med gyur na// phyi yi yul la
51a6(rnying rgyud): rgyu yis thebs pa yin// snang ba rgyu yis btab ces bya// rtog pa skyes nas don dran pas// 'dzin med skye bas 'dzin pa grol// grol 'dzin yul la rtog mi 'jug/ nyams blangs goms ni rtog pa yi la// dus bzhir 'gyu ba med par ni// rang rig
51a7(rnying rgyud): chos sku dang gsal te// dper na nyi ma'i snying po de// gsal dang mi gsal 'grogs nas yod// rig pa chos su de bzhin pas// dus bzhi 'gyur med gded kyis bzung // zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa rang gi
51b1(rnying rgyud): 'tshan nyid dus bzhi mnyam sgror gyi ma na dag bstan pa'i le'u stir bag zung// / de nas yang gas pa'i bdagu pos zhus pa/ ca mang// dus pacu'i srid par gyur na// ngasagatu masmod pa 'i ltar lags// zhem sa// 'a
51b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsa yo // gang bag rjong ldan don tshangad du// dus gsam spod pa 'di ltar skad/ rang rib chos spa ngas gsum du// nyi migs pa dang mi 'thal bzhin// rang / gas la dang me bral te// mashes pa bas dag gis// sa chag
51b3(rnying rgyud): byasags la sgrib 'byung // de mong dus gsum spyod pagaces// rang gi dang gsal mnyam gzhag dus// de las yongs pa rjes tho d+has// dug wA langs pa rnam ti d+hes// degasum rdzos smra 'i 'bral ba// srod po la rnaM panA par ba dang // mnyam ga
51b4(rnying rgyud): chos su gsal ba la// de las yengs pa byung dus su// yul ni gang byung rtsal snang de// 'dzin byed rtog pa rang grol bas// rang rig chos sgra dang dran pas// ngar 'dzin pa la rtog pa stong // de phyir snang ba rang snang la// 'dzin byed rtog pa rang sang gro la// rags
51b5(rnying rgyud): padrug lnga skyes pa'i tshe// zhe sdang dgrar sdang rang snang la// 'dzin byed dgrar snang dang grol yin// rang rig chos sku'i don tog pas// 'dzini rtog phra rigs rang ser grol// dug lnga gzhan la'ang de bzhin sbyor// rang rig chos su'i rtsal las kyang // zhi yang chos
51b6(rnying rgyud): sru'i dang du zhi// dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// sprin dang du ba khu rlangs 'gyung // byang yang nam mkha'i ngang las byung // zhi yang nam mkha'i ngang du zhi// rang byung rang snang rang bzhin nam mkha'i dong // gyi yi yul nyid snang ba la// nang gi rig pa rtsal
51b7(rnying rgyud): shar ba// 'dzin pa dag gis bzung gyur na// rnam par rtog pa zang thal yin// 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyi las// yul la 'gru ba'i shes pa ma bgags te// 'dzin byed rtog pa rang grol ba// ye shes zang thal rtog pa'i las// rang gi shes pas spyad kyang
52a1(rnying rgyud): ni// rlung spang dang sa pa 'angan pa med// yul sems namanyam 'phrang srur na// 'jan pa zol bangs mnyam dag/ srud bas mnyan dag pa bya// / zhus gsangang sa// dgas la can pa dngas
52a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam spyod kyi stod pa'i le'u b+he re lnga pa'o// // gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // lta sgom spyod pa'i gdong med par// bdud kyi spyod yul ji ltar 'byung // de yid rjog thabs stang lags//
52a3(rnying rgyud): yang// rdo rje zang gis bka' sdeb pa// !sgom snang pa'i gdeng dang ldan gyur na// 'dud kyi spyod skyel mi tha te/ da gdeng dang mthunan// bdud kyi snod du la cwob rgyang byung // bgo pa dang ga dang me na// gzung pa na byas
52a4(rnying rgyud): 'jar// 'acom pa gdang med gol gyung bas// byang dang rgod pa'i bdud ga nyis byeng // spyod pa gdang mi gol gyung bas// spyod pa dgal bdud bdun gyur// sgom spyod pa'i gdong med pas// nyams kyi bdud ni ban 'gyur te// de ltar don dang
52a5(rnying rgyud): pas// bdud kyi spyod yul 'byung bar 'gyur// rang byung ye shes rang la yod gyur kyang // rgyal bu dmangs su 'khyams pa bzhin// rang po rang gis ma shes pas// gdams ngag med de rtogs pa ma shar bas// lta ba gdengs su ma gyur pa// drug lnga
52a6(rnying rgyud): yul sdang shang ba'i tshe// de la 'dzin pa gas pa dadug par 'gyur// sgo lnga dag la brten nas 'jug/ zhe sdang gzung yul dgrar snang // 'don pa yid kyi rnam rtog ni// mig gi yul du gzugs snang bar// zhe sdang bar ni skye 'gyur ro// rna bar rtsig rnab
52a7(rnying rgyud): byung ba dang // yid 'dzin na sdang thug gas bskyed// rang spang 'dzin ma dam bdan bdud// rang gar 'thung na 'dre kyilas// khamasags par khrod ba'i gnas su dbyams// de bzhin na namangs gzhan la yang // gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis log rjon//
52b1(rnying rgyud): 'dud las brnag kyang rton mongs grol ba// dag ting rig pa'i cal snang ba// dngag ra ba sto gas pa yang // sa sa pa dang byab pas// nadung lon pa sa grob// da dan tan mangs gang pa pa/ nga dang bdag sa yu sa sa kya
52b2(rnying rgyud): gcel sha rang ngas grol// yul nyid gyur la mngon shAran// de le shes pa par 'jug pas// rang snang 'dzin med rangs dkrol// yul sems dus mnyam thar gyur na// rang gsal yu lags le 'dzin ma dgro// chos spa rang bas la
52b3(rnying rgyud): zas gsum 'gyur ba med pa'o// rnam tog 'bru ba / bur yin// yul la 'dzin pa gnyis ka ni// 'khrul rtsal yin pas rko bur yin// de ltar shes pas sgra bdud chom// bdu tshom sangs rgyas pargya nyid// lta ba gdong dang ldan byang na// sgom spong nyam
52b4(rnying rgyud): kyi bdud kyang chom// sgom pa'i bdud ni gnyis yin te// bying dang rgod pa rnam gnyis so// byang rgod bdud ni gang byung yang // gyi god dang sar rang grol lo// ji ltar byeng rgod byang gyur kyang // chos su 'gyur mo gdeng gis bzung // spyod pa man ngag de bzhin
52b5(rnying rgyud): no// rang byung dang snang rang gsal te// rang rig 'gyur med rtsal snang ste// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin gsal zhing 'bral ba med// rnam par rtog pa glo bur tsam// de ltar rtogs pa'i gang zag gis// bying rgod bdud las grol bar 'gyur// spyod pa'i don las gol bur
52b6(rnying rgyud): byas// sdod pa'i bdud ni bdun du byang// 'du 'dzi longs spyod ga yeng ba'i bdud// shes bya yon tan g.yeng ba'i bdud// longs spyod bdud la rnam pa gnyis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'grub tu ba dang // mi 'dod dgra ltar dgag pa'o// shes bya
52b7(rnying rgyud): yon tan la yang gnyis su bstan// 'grub tu re dang ma 'grub dogs pa'o// gang la spyod pa gang la skye gyur yang // 'grub pa med de bdud du 'gyur// phyi ru tshul 'chos bdud dang ni// nang na nyon mongs rang gis spyod bdud drug/ bye brag yin te de las
53a1(rnying rgyud): / dam nubs ma mkhyag// gang la tshad du 'dzin par// bdud rnams kunas lha yin te// ched 'dun mdan bdud pa 'byung // rtsod pa'i bdud bdun gang la yang // rang las gyu zhing rang las sdang // de dag rang sar skul ba yis//
53a2(rnying rgyud): gong gi lha sgom spod skabs bzhin// gong gi gdeng bcas dus bzhin du// lta ba rang byung rang snang gdeng ldan pas// spyod pa'i bdud kyis mi tshug te// mdor na bdud rnams gang thung yang // rang byung rang snang rangasar grol// de ltar rtogs na 'dud
53a3(rnying rgyud): dang bral// nyams kyi 'dud bzhi bstan pa ni// lus ngag yid las byung ba dang // byin gyi rlob pa lung ston 'gyur// dang po lus kyi bdud bstan pa// de bzhin gang yang yid la ying// mchod martags su 'byung ba ni// de la yang dag 'dzin pa yin// de
53a4(rnying rgyud): ngag dang yid la yang // mtshan rtags dam par blta ba ni// de nyid ngag dang yid kyi bdud// lus la bdeb pa sogs 'byung // ngag la de thob chos skal sogs 'byung // sems la mngon shes la sogs 'gyung// ci byin rlabs lung bstan 'gyur//
53a5(rnying rgyud): dam par dgongs spyod du// bzung na nyams kyi bdud du 'gyur// de dag bdud las 'grol ba ni// de bzhin lta sbom spyod pa la// gding gis zin pa ji bzhin du// nyams bdun pa ni sog 'dos dzin na// nyams pa den par 'dzin par/ rang steng da po
53a6(rnying rgyud): dag tu 'gyur// ched 'dzin rang srar grol gyur pas// nyams kyi rim pa ci byang yang // de ltar / sgom spyod pa'i rtags// rang byung ye shes rang chas las// mtshan rtags ched du mi bsgrub ste// shugs las 'byung ba mi dgas so// dbang na rin chen dag
53a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod 'dra// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gas la chen po'i rgyud las/ 'du gyi spyod yul bci rtsod bdun pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// bcom ldan rdo ching // bdud kyi spyod yul grol gyur nas// rje tsomagags rnams sel gyur/
53b1(rnying rgyud): nyams kyings pa ji ltar 'char// dadza 'chang gis gsung du gsal// da skad ces ni zhus pa las// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyan cig gas dpa' bdag pa khyod// gang zag tsam/ skom dang // stod pa dag pa gnang pa la// @
53b2(rnying rgyud): ba ni// dbang po rab 'bring rnga gsum las// rab ni rtogs pas grol ba ste// bdud dang the tshom glegs rnams ser // sgom spyod gnyis la sbyar mi dgos// rtogs grol sangs rgyas da nyid// nyams kyi rim par rtse dra med// yus dang mthal cang
53b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa sangs rgyas thugs ltar gnas// rang rig chos srugs la stong 'gro// thig le nyag gcig spos dang bral// ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa la// rtsal mi 'gag ste sgo lngar shar// de phyir rtsol ni zad thal 'dzin pa med// srugs ma 'gyur ba me pang gnas/
53b4(rnying rgyud): zag 'breng dang tha ma pa// bdud dang rje tsa mgagasu 'thung srid// de la gol sa gong ltar chod// las tsho dang sa ta mas rtogs dbyung // bdud med nyams ni myang du bya// drod dang rtags dang nyam sa dang gsum// drod na rang lagasal ba med// rtags ni ga
53b5(rnying rgyud): gsusu bar 'gyur// gnyis gsan nas rdzogs// dedag mas kya man// zlas ga med pa byung nga// 'a sa rnams dang brdzun pa/ nga gams btan kyang phyin par// dang sa su da dag pa dang // dag can pa ga ma
53b6(rnying rgyud): dang po g.yo ba'i nyams bstan pa// ngo spyod gdams ngag zhungs su// rang ngo 'phrod pas rtog pa ga yos// rtogs pa rtag/ gis skye bar 'gyur// lus kyang bde ba de la 'byung // ngag kyang 'khrul gtam shas chung ngo // de nas thob pa'i rtags brdzun pa// lteng
53b7(rnying rgyud): deng du gyur pa de// thob pa'i nyams ni yin par bstan// 'phyir lta ba gdeng zin thob// lta ba gdeng gis zin pa ni// rang rig chos sgra rtogs pa ste// rang pung ye shes yin pa'i phyir/ dus gsum 'gyur ba med par no// 'gyes pa dang sar grol bas na//
54a1(rnying rgyud): sa zang thal don// 'grub 'igan da pal// 'don mad 'dzin pa 'bras songs panan// dgazung 'phrul ba ga ta marnams gan// gos pa'o rnam sun du rgyad// na ga na mthal ba//
54a2(rnying rgyud): rgyan tul ma khyer bas// goms pa'i nyams su bstan pa yin// skrod pa'i mdud gces paste// dus bzhi mdus gas mgong ltar ro// de dag shin tug rdzas thur na// yangs dang ma yengs med pa yin// mnyam bzhag rjes po gnyis dang rgal/ @
54a3(rnying rgyud): dang ma yengs gnyis ka med// rang rig chos lha ring bo lnga// sgagasu ma ye shes ldan grub ste// rang yin dus gsum 'phrul ba med// 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'brang gyur yang // 'dzin pa'i blo dang bral bas na// yul rkyen rgyang rangs dgrol// rag
54a4(rnying rgyud): pa de ltar shar ba'i tshe// lus sems 'khrul pa'i dbang mi 'gyur// rig pa mngon shas phra mo 'byung // ngag kyang bden pa thob par 'gyur// lus lan tshe sdug sbrul bral// dgra bgegs phyi nang srin 'bru rnams// de la gnod pas dz+rag me 'gyur//
54a5(rnying rgyud): ngag gis ma bslabs chos rnams smra// mkha' 'gro ba de gshegs lung ston 'gyur// dgra bgegs gnyis la bden pa 'dug/ goms pa brtan pa de nyams yin no// goms pa'i gzhug la brtan pa 'byung // goms pa shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba'o// /
54a6(rnying rgyud): de la dag pa'i snang ba shar// gyi yi bral sdang 'di dag ldog/ dag pa'i sdang ba 'od snang 'char// lus dag pa ni 'od kyi lus// rig pa chos su 'gyur mi srid// rnam par rtog pa rtsad nas tshod// bdag tu 'dzin pa gzhi nas sgrol// mngon par shes pa
54a7(rnying rgyud): 'char// tha ma la lus dang bral bus su// nad gcod lce shi'i sdug bsngal med// lus dang bral nas rin chen sbubs// longs su'i snang ba 'char bar 'gyur// de dag gong 'og gzhan na gsal// mthar rtsen nyams ni longs spu'i dus// yon tan brjod
54b1(rnying rgyud): sa me langs so// bde ba dus gsum zad mi srid// nyams lnga lam ldar spyad pa ni// chags lam sbyor lam dus na g.yo nyams 'byung // mthong ba'i lam la thob pa'o// bsgom pa'i lam dang goms nyams gcig/ brtan dang mthar phyin nyams gnyis kya
54b2(rnying rgyud): me slob lam dang dbogacig/ nyams dang lam du sbyor ba'o// rtogs pa rnon gyi rab la// rang rig chos spu'i gyu ba med// de la rtags mtshan blo snang yin// 'bring dang tha ma'i blo dag la// rnam rtog dag gis pa / pagasal na
54b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'gags// de la nyams kyi snang ba 'byung // zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ nyams bstan pa'i le'u ste de bdun pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// dang po gzhi
54b4(rnying rgyud): sa na // de sa pa ga
54b5(rnying rgyud): zug par la// gegs bdun dag gis sel 'gyur te/ gzhi yi gegs dang 'khrul pa'i gegs// lta skom skyo nga nyams kyi gegs// 'bras bu'i glegs dang bdun gyis bstan// kye kye rdo rje 'chang chen po// glegs bdun byas par gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i
54b6(rnying rgyud): don gsan bka' stsal ba// dang po gzhi yi gegs bstan pa// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// dngos po'i don gyi gnas lugs de// kwa dag yin nam lhan grub yin// sangs rgyas yin nam sems can yin// sangs rgyas yin na 'khrul mi srid// ji srid
54b7(rnying rgyud): sems can yin gyur na// nges pa yin nam ma nges yin// ji srid nges pa yin gyur na// spos bcas yin nam spos med yin// mtha' can yin nam mtha' bral yin// gzhi yi ngo bo spyan grub der// 'khor 'das thams cad ldan gyis grub// ngo bo nges pa chen po
55a1(rnying rgyud): la// marnamangs dgas byung // macan su la gang thon namathod// gnas na ma/ gal pa'i gzhas na 'di ltar bas// ngal ma don 'thul byal klu 'dags pa ga/ 'ag na /
55a2(rnying rgyud): dag// de mis 'khrul ba'i tha ma mchod// lta ba'i gags ni gtas lan// ldan pas na// sbyin gyis gos pa med bur mye dgas stong pa// rngamani tshogs 'dzin med // ga ma thang du'i rnarnabs
55a3(rnying rgyud): skyon kyis 'jigs dngas// pa bam mas myong // ga gzod pa'i skabs na gus pa/ nam pa gags gangs lan// ba rnam du yo dog mar mang dngas cas 'tham // bya
55a4(rnying rgyud): rang gnas pa'i// snyi dang shes tsaman// rang gis rang nyid gsal ba las// khas 'asu ni nor du med// dbang po byur la dran pa tsam// gas lan dran pa stor// ma brnams kun du 'bral mthong // bzhom dang me na
55a5(rnying rgyud): rnamame las cho// nyid pa'i gags byas gangs ma// khyad pas grol pam ma skyed pal// mi sbed tha mipa'i su ma 'dug/ srang cing mang dag tu 'gyur// rig pa dang yang gtas// thol mi 'ag bya // ga sa
55a6(rnying rgyud): las// zed du spya pa su spyong rgyu med// dubasgos dang bral ba la// lon pa shA rtog / yang phral la bden napa 'ang/ shad rang grol spyo pa ste// su rkyen tshogs shi gyu kyang // ni med pa ser grol ba 'is me du
55a7(rnying rgyud): tsam// spyod med do dang ma 'bral tsam// ma 'gags zhen med spyod pa'i mchog// skyed pa'i thatsam the chod// nyams kyi gags ni gang selan// rang byung ces su 'gyur med ni// nyams myong mthar pas 'daga' te// shig gang zag mgoms pas// 'a
55b1(rnying rgyud): byags na 'dabus pal// tsas spugs la zhing rtag par ban/ de'i rnamam cing tha sangs 'char// tam ma med 'dzin 'ad du med// sbyin na/ ma gas 'apa'ang// nyams nam rnams rjod// 'bras bu gag zhig sa lan// 'das du /
55b2(rnying rgyud): chos klu de// gdod nas yod na btsal ma dgos/ glo bur 'dus byas 'jig par 'gyur// gdod nas rang byung rjes spa de// rang ro ma shes rtog pas pa sgrib// de nyid ngo shes rtogs niman// dang po rang kyad rang ngo 'thod// rtogs pa krol das 'dzin
55b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rtsal bu dmangs 'khyams rgyal sar ba ton// rangs zin pa de bzhin no// 'bras bu'i je tshom de yis rjod// rang byung rig pa chos smra de// gang gi bor ma grub pas// mtshan ma 'dus byas the tsho mchod// gsal la me 'gag 'tshor pa yis// stong pa ni
55b4(rnying rgyud): gnas the tshomachod// rtsal ni 'od du spang ba yis// rig pa rkyang ba'i the tshomachod// gsal ba sna tshogs 'char ba yis// me tog ltengs po'i rnga tshe mchod// gang la 'dzin pa med gyur pas// mtshor yid la byed pa bral// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen
55b5(rnying rgyud): po'i klung las// the tshom dang gegs bsal ba'i le'u ste de bgyud pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag zos zhus pa// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'azung // de yi 'bras bu de ltar lags// zhes nus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'don pa legs rba
55b6(rnying rgyud): zhig/ 'bras bu skya ba mngon gyur te// de yi gnas lugs bstan pa ni// chos ted phyi nang med par gsal// rigang sbyi nang med par byab// gnyis med chos sna ji'i lus// rangangs la 'dzin med dang druganas// de las mkhyen pa ma 'phags pas// rang rig le shes
55b7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra// yul gyi rang bzhin ye shes spun gyi bum pa lnga// sdang la dngos med nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// de yi dang na sprul pa'i sku lpags la// gsal pa me rtog bum pa'i mar me bzhin// sku gsum nang gsal 'du 'bral med par gnas//
56a1(rnying rgyud): dgas na // smra da / / nga su sa
56a2(rnying rgyud): brtan padzin// spang la dang byed na mad pas mkhan ma rgyun shug// snasnang nga bzhi me dang / spong ba'i sa 'das// pa'i rnapas kyi'i ba gis kyang / donapa kyi nga dag pa'ang bzhin// zhesagasangs //
56a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thud las/ 'bras pa de ltar 'byung ba bstan pa'i po 'i snyi dbu pa'o// de nas yang gas pa'i bradag pas zhus pa/ pa ba sa da de/ datso ba dang rnams gsung dunapor// zhes byas s+ho// ston pas ba/ 'dul ba/
56a4(rnying rgyud): legs zung zhig/ zag pa'i ra bo shes rab snyed rje yin// de gnyis me chung theg pa rje lung snang // theg pa'i des chog 'dogs dang bstod pa yin// dbyed meng yang bstani gnyis las med// sa rkyen lam byer mtshan nyid thog pa dang // 'bras rgyal khyer gas
56a5(rnying rgyud): ljags theg pa gnyis// Tha'apa wa gzings mtshan nyid byeg pa da pe// bam pas gshegs lpags byeg pa'i dge// zhes gsungs so// sa pal do gas pa dzan po'i rgyud las/ zag pa'i don pa shad bsdus tebristan pa'i lce'u sa bdun chub
56a6(rnying rgyud): nas mya gas ba'i bdag pos thos pa/ thu seM so ldan de 'jung// bag pas sa bgro pa dang // slong pa bras kyi do gis mi // de 'i na ga // dbye ba mthun dpag snying dugs so// zhes bris sa// stornams paka' yul pa/
56a7(rnying rgyud): ba ring tho so so'i dbye ba las zhes par bya'o// nges pa'i don lta ba dang reg yo shes bya ba ni/ rdzogs sbyang med pa shes rab// ngesatshig ni yang dag pa'i shes bya grungan pa'i mthar gyur pas ni lta ba'o// dbyen gnyis so// yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag
56b1(rnying rgyud): ma pa dang pa// yang du da dus gyu na / ga/ pa sa na pa dang ngag dang/
56b2(rnying rgyud): / dgas ga/ pa
56b3(rnying rgyud): da// shes panapa pa dang // sa' pa sa 'di// ga kyi / sa/ mang
56b4(rnying rgyud): bya// s+ya sems dpa' chen po// gsang 'dzin gnyis su dod pa tun rjes lta bar bshad/ 'don pa spyod pas gzung nga za ni'i na rang ces ba ba shang / sebs dang thams carnam par smra pa dang / don ma dang can rdzob tu ldan/ byang chub sems dpa'
56b5(rnying rgyud): bshing / de na mthams cad mthun pa la/ rags gsum 'ad pa la dr-i lta khor ba da/ gnyis 'dod 'i brgyad/ sems byab bya bdun 'a'ad pa'i tshig ldanan/ kyir me pa'i snyibang ba shing / bzla ba rgya ba ces sa bcwa pa
56b6(rnying rgyud): log ba lta bar bshang // ma kya rdzogs pa'i cha gatshogs dang // dbyis da la gang mig tu ni// madri mags byab na/ rtsa la das pa'i tshigacigs dang/ rang byung logs kyi rnams dang / ngas rgyam la sogs// 'a
57a1(rnying rgyud): can ltabar bsha/ tsam pa dang smras dun paran// 'dug/ na 'dradang / 'don pa shadang tu na da// ngan sa ya da
57a2(rnying rgyud): kyi kye bcom cu ngorje 'jung / dgongs pa bsgom pa na ma bye ba/ ni ya na bshad ga sung thugasopa// zhes byas so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ ba rdzog byed dang // mthun dpa 'dzid pa tsha
57a3(rnying rgyud): yin// bsgom pa'i nges tshig rnam pa bzhi// don la dmigs pas bsgom pa yin// ma yengs pas na bsgom pa yin// mi 'bral bas na bsgom pa yin// goms shing 'dres dang mi 'gro ba'o// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su bstan// mtshan bcas ma
57a4(rnying rgyud): yin no// mtshan med la'ang gnyis yin te// rtsol bral chen po'i bsgom thabs dang // rtsol mthal ba'i bsgom pa'o// mtshan bcas la a de bzhin no// mdor na bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis te// bsgom pa mtshon pa'i dpe bzhi ste// mar bu sdong du gnas pa dang /
57a5(rnying rgyud): chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa dang // nor bu chu dngas lta bu dang // bum pa'i mar me lta bu'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag po nges par zung zhig/ dgongs pa zhes pa ga byung yang // bsgom pa bsam gtan ting 'don dang // ma yengs ma 'phros 'du 'bra ba med// gnas dung goms
57a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dris pa dang // de rnams gar byung 'bod skad sdebs la bshad// ces gsungs so// sgros bral don gsal chen po'i mud las/ bsgom pa'i don bshad pa mtshon pa'i tshi ga dang bcas pa'i le'u ste/ don gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus
57a7(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // bsgom med don bshad gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// phag no rdo rjes nges zung zhig/ bsgom med ngo bo des tshig dang // dbye ba mthun dpe brjod tshig bshad// jo bo dang rig rgyan chad med pa yin/
57b1(rnying rgyud): drang du byang nga' phyir natha mam nga ma dpa mchag/ ba gnasas na nga ga ma gos pag/ 'asum mdang byu ma byug s+ho// mtshan ba das nas du slod pa // mnan mdapa tha ma mad pan// ma 'ang ram ngag to// bsho
57b2(rnying rgyud): dang / rtogs pas bsgom du med pa'o// ma bsgoms sun chad med pa'i dpe// chu bo lta bar bsten pa yin// ma bsgoms don dang mi 'bral bas// tshur smin sbeng pa'i 'deb ma bzhin// ma ba sgomyos tang gis gas ba'i// shes ga ma
57b3(rnying rgyud): pas// das gtung byung mas cad nas// bzom modags pa gnams dang // gnas ma dgos pa'i tshig rnams da // bzlang su pa'i dri rnams dang / 'du bram bdapa' tsheg rnams dang / ngadadang pa dang ba med ra nyid ci do//
57b4(rnying rgyud): du ma pa dang / tsho rnams pa 'das pa // lamal brjong ngam byed / gas pa ma da ka sangs kyis dang / zunga'igs pa ba ga/ phrin pa nimi song chus byedang// yodas kyi ma dang / byigs bya tshul ma
57b5(rnying rgyud): mngo ni pa'isacas pa dang / bsgom dmang pa cigasums cad ni 'dus ngas spangs 'ongs sa tu rang ma shes pa tsas na ga nga ma// sa thamadunapas pan bye chud 'as/ bsgom me don dpa ston
57b6(rnying rgyud): 'bye pa na pa'i bu myed ga mam/ ga pa'i ba sam rnam rnaMsam sa/ da pa don da / sa pa
57b7(rnying rgyud): nga dag/ spyod pa ngas cig dang / dam pa nga ba da cig dang / bsu chu don pashang du/ skye 'ang pon khyod ya gas pa dadu sa phyir na// byed pa rtson na du mi mang dran par ga kyi ma mthod pa ma
58a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ na rnam pa gnyis yin te/ glang dor yod ces spyod pa dang // blang dor med ces spyod pa'o// dpe ni sna tshogs sgyu ma'i gar mkhan lta bu dang // gang ltar yang ba don la sbyor shes pa'i dab/ bcu ba mkhas pa'i skyes bu lag gi 'du byed ma'ang lta ro// cha gas la
58a2(rnying rgyud): gso/ sa ca / spyo na da // smye nga/ padang/ pa / bdun pa shin
58a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa na
58a4(rnying rgyud): des tshig dang // dbye ba mthun dpe brjod tshig rnams// bsdus pa nga yis nges par bshad// 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni/ so so'i lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nges tshig ni/ grol smin rdzogs mthar phyin phyir mi ldog pa'o// dbye na zag bcas zag pa med pa'o// ri ma bzhin
58a5(rnying rgyud): gcig char rdzogs pa'i dpe// shing tog lo tog smin pa 'am// u dum wa ra'i 'bras bu bzhin/ kye gsang bdag nges par zung zhig/ ngas bstan chud lung thams cad du// so so'i 'bras bu gang byung yang // 'dir bstan bzhin du shes par bya// 'bras bu mtshon pa'i tshig tshogs ni/
58a6(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin pa dang rdzogs pa dang // smin pa dang ni grub pa dang // grol dang phyir mi ldog la sogs// dang po dgra bcom zhes pa nas// tha ma rangs zin pa dag/ ngas bstan bzhin du shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i don bshad pa'i le'u steng
58a7(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// // kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'ching // lha sgom spyod pa yongs rdzogs pa'o// theg pa dgra yi ming gi nges tshig gsung drugasol// zhes thung so// smyon pas bka' stsal pa/ so so'i sa tshig ni// ngas brtan khyod kyis yid lazung // ston pas gsungs pa'i don tshig
58b1(rnying rgyud): dang 'dungs na yang dang mas nas// dang gams sacas// dran pa gsungs gsus pa// dadonagazhan zug bye pa// nyanathos ma ga son pa// don pabaka sasu na/ sa nga sas pa
58b2(rnying rgyud): len// ya shA jug pa dang // la ma'i tshigs nangs// 'i phyig yi// rdzabadugardzu pa da/ ma
58b3(rnying rgyud): ub la yi mi ge des tshig yin// rdzogs pazhi sa sa rgyam dan byernal bal// shi su ga gle gsu ma sbyo phre sa nan do byed// yoga'i mang gi sa tshig sbyin// ting 'don nam gsum thangs dang shes radag slong ston pas/ na sod
58b4(rnying rgyud): sa ma sa yang na
58b5(rnying rgyud): sa
58b6(rnying rgyud): nas sa
58b7(rnying rgyud): sa thub par gas// dgu mchos sa pa 'du/ gangs rdzun pa phun nga rdzos 'a gyu gas na pa'i 'bar / dge
59a1(rnying rgyud): @#// 'phrul yam thung 'ga' yas// dan mang dgas tsam pas stod pa 'phags// dag pa'i bshes gtan mi masten par// goms pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub pas sgrub pa 'phags// tsabs rgya lta bu'i 'bras bu khyad par 'phags// rang rgyal dag
59a2(rnying rgyud): byang sems 'phags pa yang // bdag med rnam gnyis rtogs pas dalta ba 'phags// tshad med bsdu ba rnam bzhis don mdzod spyod pa 'phags// pha rol gyi na bcu bslab pas slab pa'i phags// kun tu 'od kyis non 'bras bu 'phags// byang sems dag las kyi ya 'pha
59a3(rnying rgyud): pa ste// don dam skye ba med par rab rtogs te// kun rdzob bdag dang ye shes lha// rje 'bangs la bur blta bas lta ba 'phags// dag pa nas gsum spyod pas spyod pa 'phags// goms dang bsgyur dang byin rlabs sgo nas bsgrub pas sgrub pa 'phags// rigs gsum 'brus
59a4(rnying rgyud): / da sa sa nga /
59a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu khyad par 'phags// u pa ya las yog 'phags pa yang // kun rdob lta dang grogs por blta bas lta ba 'phags// srin las na pa bzhi spyod pas spyod pa 'phags// phyag rgya rnam bzhi pasgrub pas sgrub pa 'phags// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nyid dus grub pas 'a#
59a6(rnying rgyud): 'jag/ yog dag las ma hA bzhis 'phags te// rang lag rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba sgrubs lbub 'phags// khyo grol gnyis kyis 'gro don mdzade pas spyod pa'i phags// thabs dang shes rab ni nyis kyi sgo rnas 'grub pas sgrub pa 'phags/
59a7(rnying rgyud): 'bras su 'phags// mtha dag las a nub zhes 'phags te// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med rtogs pas lta ba 'phags// dbyings kyi longs spyod ye shes dag las spyod pa dang // ye shes longs spyod dbyings la spyod pas spyod pa 'phags// phung po lnga
59b1(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga yab yum 'grub nas sgrub pa 'chags// mchags pa d+ma can gyis thob 'bras bu 'phags// ar+tha dag las a ti bzhis 'phags te// sdang srid thams can chos bu'i sangs rgyas bltabs lha'i 'phags// chas kyu'i byin thabs so nas 'grod na mdzad pas
59b2(rnying rgyud): 'phags/ bya rgol med par bslab pas sbub sa phags// bcu gsum 'khor mo chags rgyan pan chad nas// nyaM shu rtsa gcig man mangs non 'bras bu rigs// ste rigs kyi bu/ nges bstan da lung thams cung ngu// 'phags pa dpags chan ar+tha dang // gong 'og sha
59b3(rnying rgyud): gangabyung ba// 'dir bshad pa na zhes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// spros tha la don gas la zin pa'i skud las/ theg pa rgya sde 'phags grags bzlas nas 'dun pa'i btsu don bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag rung pa/
59b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rung nga // 'a rags pa'i don pa shang gsung du gsol// rjes zhus so// smyon pas bka'athul pa/ dras bshad spyod kyis legs par byung // 'angags pa'i rab ni phyog dang // dbying zhes kyang rags pa'i dang // rnam pa pa'i lu 'dus la pa med// nga
59b5(rnying rgyud): pa dag gi phri'i// byed par don chen mchog gyur pa'o// 'phags pa dag gi sa myog ni// mi gnas ring por gang gyur byed// desachog gtan tshigs 'jus pa yin// dbye ba rnam pag nyis yin to// gnas sapaste 'drar pas 'a rigs pa dang // bcung med mamed thu padags
59b6(rnying rgyud): // ri la'ang nga ni bzhi na// gtsun d+ha ba dang bras bu'o// dpe ni mchod rten gyi 'phang bzhin// ba ti mu 'dres yongs su rdzogs// gnyis med cos su byer ming shes rab pa// nga ya na rje sbrang mthong man mi gnas kyang // blo dang byer nas drang ba'i tha
59b7(rnying rgyud): 'ad// des gsu ma/ thos pa 'din gas mchen po byung las/ 'phags pa don bzhan 'a'i hriM t+ta don babyed par// / de nas yang shes dpa'i bdag pos byas pa// kyi rtse bcom ldan rdo rje 'tshang // blos zal 'phags che rtse/
60a1(rnying rgyud): gas nas// sa mas// noms pa sa na na du// nga dus masas du na 'ag / mag
60a2(rnying rgyud): mchogs padam pangs// ma'i ba sangs kyi 'dang/ gang// mi byengasas min+da na mang// bag ti ca pa sa rdzogs pa/ da
60a3(rnying rgyud): // de sa kyim dpas pa dang // dri me dang brdzu pa phyags pa dang // bam yangs sa byas pas rnyi pa dang men// zhes ga sungs so// yang gam ba'i 'dag pas byas/
60a4(rnying rgyud): / 'amangs/ mas ga la bya// bdag mid du / dang gas sa su ni // sa la nog sbyid na ma // yon pa // lag na
60a5(rnying rgyud): / na pas thugs bye dad/
60a6(rnying rgyud): sa'agyu
60a7(rnying rgyud): dunamang du
60b1(rnying rgyud): pa/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas cheng ba de ltar lags// zhes zhus sa// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sbrul sgra 'adz+ra gyur 'byung ba ma// rang lus gyur ba 'ams zhi pas// las lam mangs zangs kyis kau// gzung 'a namaganas rnam par dag/ rab da sa
60b2(rnying rgyud): chas pas che// phung po lnga rnams snang ba yang // rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi wa// swa tra na chen 'od du'i bar// ma bco pa dang la ye nas ldan gyis thub// ye shes rang sngang yin pas che// nam shes brgyad dubarta dza pa yang // sems da
60b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// gzhan ma yin par rang snang yin pas rtse// rname par shes pa'i yul bcu kyang // rang la spyad pa'i sems ma brjod// ma bathal reng la ldan gyis grub// ye shes rang snang yin pas bdag nyid che// rang las dra'i zh-i
60b4(rnying rgyud): deng bral// yul med dang ldeng chen pa la// bgrod du ma pas sun ngas te// rang cham yin pas btsal du med// ma bcal yun gyis sub pasam// dad pa rdzas thubabs na// pang bas chos 'dra ba 'das pa // ra sogs pa dang // 'a med pa
60b5(rnying rgyud): // mi 'gyur ba sa kyang med ma pas / spyod ming lam la dmigs su med pas ze// chos rnam sna thams cad bdag nyid du// 'og la dag gis shes pa med// des na ba dang nyid men pa bshad// ces gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag pas rang thus pa/ de dam
60b6(rnying rgyud): bdi ldan lags// zhes zung // na pas bka' dul pa/ deste gtan pa bebs pa de// mtshon pa'i bang ba'i phrin la su lags pa da'adug// lugasu pa'i 'brab mi du 'dod // ngas dgasas pa phyogs snga bugs pa pas ga
60b7(rnying rgyud): byasa'ar 'al / gam ngas/ sa pa nga ba 'phags ca gsu sa ba la ba sa / sa gsu // sa byas pa
61a1(rnying rgyud): bas ni che ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rad rig 'gyur med chos sbrul// ngos gzung med pas bsam las 'das// bsgom du med pas khyad par 'phags// chos su dngos med zar ba pa /
61a2(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i yul med pas// gnyis su med par khyad par 'phags// rig pa dngos med zhi ba las// smos pa'i dngos med mtshan ma med// rang gdangs chen po 'phags te che// rang rig chos sku gnyis med chen po la// mtshan du med pas 'phags te
61a3(rnying rgyud): chos sku rang byud ye shes la// chu rkyen med pas 'dus byas med// 'gyur ba med pas 'phags te che// rang rig dri ma lnga dang bral bas thams cad ye sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gsal chen po'i slad las/ theg pa brgyad las chu ba lngas 'phags pa
61a4(rnying rgyud): ste don dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // theg pari ma dgu'i bye brag rnams// gdul ba'i yul dang sbyar nas gsungs// de yi gol sri'ang ltar lags// zhes lus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs pa dazung
61a5(rnying rgyud): zhog/ theg pa dgu yi grol sgrib rnams// dbyen bsam gyis mi khyab ste// bstan sum cu rtsa drug yod// lha sgom spyod pa 'bras bu bzhi// mtshan nyid sde gsum sgrib pa mang // sum cu rtsa drug rtsa gnyis dang // rtsa brgyad gsum la rim pa yod// go la sa bcu gnyis brkyad
61a6(rnying rgyud): dang bzhi gnas so// gyi ba sdigs ma gol sgrib mnyam// sgrib pa bcu gnyis mun pas tshad// lcang sa go las bcu gnyis yod// nud pa je gnyis gol sa mang // so gnyis rtsa bcad rim par yod// sgrib pa bcu dang drug tu gnas// rdzogs chen thig le nyag gcig la/
61a7(rnying rgyud): gol dang mgo la gnyis su med// go las rang bzhin rnam par dag/ kun bral nyag gcig sbyir ma spangs// a ti'i lha sgom spyod pa dang // 'bras bu ye nas gnyis med pas// gnyis su snang ba'i gol sgrib med// rta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu bzhi// ye nas rang byung
61b1(rnying rgyud): shes gsal// chu rkyen 'dus pa'i gol srib med// rdzogs chen lta ba sgom pa dang // spyod pa 'bras bu lhan grub pas// sgom lbubartsol bsrub drog rtsol ba yi// go las sgrib pa rnam par dag// nga yi gong na gzhan med pas// sgrib med gsal pa ya shes yin// ga ba#
61b2(rnying rgyud): 'og ma dang ba yang // da mi thugs rnga'i mdzad sdod med// 'byed med shes rab dang la gnas// ngang las ma 'dres rdzogs pa'i ye shes pas// ltung ba'i go las rnam par dag/ 'byed pa med pa'i shes rabar nga gsal la// go pas grib pa gnyis su dbyer med gsal// zhes
61b3(rnying rgyud): / sa pa lado na gas maldan pa'i rgyud la mi/ gopa skyed byug pa brgyad la yod pang bsnyen pa dang / yat+ye go la ba med pa dang stan pa de la ste bsrung bu phye// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos dus pa/ sa kyi com dza rje 'a'adu// dzin pa du sa
61b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes lus pas/ skyon pas bka' skal pa/ rdo rje 'don pa legs par byung shig/ ngo bongs pog dbye ba dang // mtshan dpo tshig dang bcas nas bstan// go ra sli'i po ma rig pa// go' rjes chog stan 'di// gong ma'i na ma mthong bas sgrib pa yin// gong mas 'og ma
61b5(rnying rgyud): bya yin// de phyir gol grib ming gi nges tshig yin// gol sleb dbyen rnam grangs te// bdun rnam pa bzhi yin no// lte sgom spyod pa 'byas phu zhe// ro la'adagol sgrib gnyis// khol sle bar gyon pa'i dpe ma // byang dro don gnyer rtso du cim// lhor byin byang gi don mi 'gra //
61b6(rnying rgyud): don 'did 'og ma ju// khyog mas gong pa'i don mi ga // gsungs so// rigs kyi sa dus bstad rnyed lung bams da du// nor zhes bye ni skang ba shang // ma shes mya rtogs byung na skad ba shang // go sos sgrib byung nu ltar 'arjod// gal m+b+hi med pa ba gtan na
61b7(rnying rgyud): bshad// gzhan yang 'bod gang gag khrig sal// da gsal dang 'di dun pa rje du mye / kyis gsungs so// sgros tha mngon gas mtshan pa'i rgyud las/ goms bkod pa dang mtshan tshig bsdus pa brdzun pa / slong ma
62a1(rnying rgyud): @#// gyi sgo g+hu nas// gsal shing sgron mes rgyal blon dmangs dang gsum gyis nor 'byin cing mun pa sel ba'i man ngag/ tan+t+ra a nu u pa arta ka las twa trA~M/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla na med pa mtshon pa'i dgongs pa la bzhugs so// de nas yang
62a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan don gsal mkhyen// theg pa spyi yi mtshan nyid dang // rang gi don rnams de ltar na// rang don ma lus kun bshad pa'i// rgyud lung man ngag ji ltar bshad// rgyud kyi ldang tshad ji ltar lags// de yi nang nas gsungs pa
62a3(rnying rgyud): sbyang pa med pa'i sa rnams dang // bgrod du med pa'i lam rnams dang // spyad mi dgos pa'i pha rol phyin pa rnams// sgra mthun don dpag ji ltar lags// sbubs zhes spros pa ji ltar lags// snang ba zhes pa'i lter lags// cha lus rnam bzhi ji ltar lag+ha/ sam
62a4(rnying rgyud): dad ye shes ji ltar lags// bar do zhes ni ci la bgyi// grol dang ma grol ji ltar lags// sun zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// lus sems bral zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// lnga ldan rdog ldan ji ltar lags// bugla rje'i bye brag ji ltar lags// mya ngan 'da' lugs ji ltar la
62a5(rnying rgyud): phas rgo la rtsod pa ci ltar bzlog/ sna tshogs 'bru rnams ji ltar gzhom// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen po'i chud las/ zhu tshig nges pa'i sdom dang bcas pa'i le'u ste kye gnyis pa'o// // de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhing
62a6(rnying rgyud): chung ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam lngas bshad// de la dbye ba rnam gsum ste// chos su phun sum tshogs pa dang // longs gru phun sum tshogs pa dang // A la swa phun sum tshogs pa'o// chos sku'i phun sum tshogs pa lnga// ston pa 'gyur med chos kyi su// bstan pa mi nub rtul mtshan ni// gas
62a7(rnying rgyud): ba rig pa'i rlung chen lnga// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyid las mi gzhan pa// rigs lnga bde gshegs 'od du 'bar ba lnga// bzhugs gnas skye med chos kyi dbyings// dus ni 'dal dus mabyon sngon rol nas// rtog med sbyin pas byin gyi rlabs kyis bshad// nyid las mi gzhan
62b1(rnying rgyud): lnga rang rang gis// rgyad chen byin gyi rlabs kyis go// de nas yang ston pas yongs su'i phun sum tshogs pa lnga gsungs so// ston pa rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa lnga// bstan pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen lnga// 'dus pa'i 'khor ni sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs// bzhugs pa'i gnas
62b2(rnying rgyud): ni ye shes gzhal med 'od kyi klong // dus ni de rnams rig pa yul du shar ba'i tshe// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas mi 'chad par// sku yi cha bAd sgo nas ston// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzod kyis// rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas 'dus pa la// sku yi rgyud chen rang gi ngo bos bshad// bcom
62b3(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje mi bskyod pas// rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor rnams la/ thugs kyi rgyud chen rang gi ngo bos bshad// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan gyis// rin chen rigs kyi sem dpa' sems ma la// yon tan chud chen rang gi ngo bos bshad// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas kyis// badz+ra'i rigs kyi
62b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems ma la// gsung gi chud chen rang gi ngo bos bshad// bcom ldan don yod grub pa yis// las kyi rigs kyi 'khor rnams la// phrin las rgyud chen rang gi ngo bos bshad// thugs kyi dgongs pa ye shes rnam ldan gsal// bshad pa ma yin mnyan pa med// gtso ba'i zhal
62b5(rnying rgyud): gzigs thugs kyi dgongs la gsal// rang gi ngo bos bshad ces pa// ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pas bshad// ston pas sru la spu'i phun sum tshogs pa lnga gsungs pa// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen ngas// bstan pa'i snying po gsang ba'i chung chen lnga// de sogs phyi nang gsang bas bsdus pa
62b6(rnying rgyud): rnams// thugs kyi stong du shes rang chen pos bkrol// mgun gyi bum par ye shes rlung gis dri le// zhal gyi ljags la ma 'dres gas la bar bsam// tshems kyi bar nas cho ga don so sor bshad// yan lag drug cu sdeb sbyor legs par bshad// khyung chen lding thabs don gyi spyi
62b7(rnying rgyud): khog phub// stag mo'i mchod ltadra dkyus kyis chen bcad // rus sbal 'gros kyis tshig gi 'bru rnams bcom// seng ge'i gdangs skad lta bus theg brgyad zil gyis mnan// glag mo gzan 'dul lha lus man ngag 'dril// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs sangs rgyas rabs bdun la/ lha gnas
63a1(rnying rgyud): / gsum du bdud mang char can ba// badra brtags pa'i gnas mchog rnam gsum ma// zhes gsangs sa// zlos pa la do dgas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa lnga mal 'as grags ma pa'o// pha nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/
63a2(rnying rgyud): lda rdo rje 'chang // phrangs sa tshogs pa'i don bshad dang // de yi dgos pa gsung du gsol// skyes zhus pas/ snyan pas bka' stsal pa/ sa kyabacom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lags par zung zhig/ phran sum tshogs pa'i ngo bo dang / phran sa mtshogs pa'i nges tshig dbye ba dang / gu sumatshogs
63a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpe rnams panyan/ dang po bo bstan pa ni// rgya ning po tshogs pa yin// dgos pa chu chen tshogs par spod// ci phyir phun sum tshogs zer na// kun nas dgos btsang bas phun sum tshogs/ nges tshig gtan tshigs bcas pa yin// dbyi bgong du bstan pa bzhin// dper rgyal
63a4(rnying rgyud): ljonang sangs dang gsum// gang la gang tshogs bka' ba gros 'byung // des mtshon tshogs gcig dper bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// yang gsang pa'i bdang / pos zhus pa// phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa// klas pa'idagos pa ji ltar phags// ma bsten phyug du ji ltar dgur// 3
63a5(rnying rgyud): lus so// ston pas bka' zhal pa/ ston pa phun sum tshogs pa smos pa'i dgasang ni// gang zag rig bcos ma yin par// sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa yid byas te// maM bsla bden pa'i gtan tshigs ngag tu 'gyur// bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa smos pa'i dgas pa ni// bang
63a6(rnying rgyud): cel ma yin nga na dang ldan par yid kyang chos// 'dus pa'i kho tshogs smos pa'i dgos pa ni/ kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i// nges par ston pas gsungs par snying byung ces// gnas kyi kyi khrag gsungs pa dgas pa ni// gzhan du bstan pa'i snying ba ma gsungs pa/
63a7(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i gnas der gsungs par yid kyang ches// dus kyi phun sum tshogs pa smos pa'i dgos pani// gnas skabs lnga rtsom bskal bar// dus tshod mtshungs shing zin pas yid kyang chas// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gas pa chen po'i lung las/ yun sum chogs
63b1(rnying rgyud): 'don bshang dgas pad ngas pathamangasatha 'a dza da// nas pa gas yang bdag pas ngas pa/ spya sa ung da dang// rnams dung bag nga / la gas/ nas byas pa/ san bas gdang //
63b2(rnying rgyud): mngon pa'i dpa bshad// rnyeng byang ba bstan pa ni// rje gi rlung bar byo nga// nga rtsen dkya bang / ngan nyung kyang ba ni// 'di ga la gras ca po phyin// jig gzhung kying ba na// babathun ma sags pa // thog pa ga tshogs sa
63b3(rnying rgyud): kyi ramatshig rnam pa lnga// 'brel dang mtshang med padang / yongs su rdzogs dang thugs pa dang // phun sra tshogs pa'i phyir chung ngo // dbye bci ga nga don byung gnyis// gong ba sang bzhin du shes par bya// 'bre ba dpo ni ba pa dang // dgas patshang ba n-i
63b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin// yongs su rdzogs pa sngan shing brdan// dkrugs pas thags kyi sun badzi rnon/ ngas bstan chud rnams de ltar bshad// ces gsungs so// spos bral de nags tshar pa'i dud las/ chud kyi don pa dang brtan pa'i seng sa bu sa pa // de nas yang gas ba bang sa
63b5(rnying rgyud): pas nus pa/ sa bcom mun rdorje 'chang // gang bshang drung kyi sdang chad bshad drugs pa// des rdzas sa// ston pas bka stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa lags par zang jig/ byang kyi ldeng tshad rnam pa badz+ra// dbang dang nga mchog gnyis sa dang // de chirnams
63b6(rnying rgyud): ba ces bsas kyi shesas pad/ sa dang cig tu pa nga/ bskyed pa bsgrub pa byas pa s+ho// med pa// dbang ma gas d+hA/ gnalangags rngu bsta dang / yebs papas lags
63b7(rnying rgyud): dang // dbang ga dngas pa bstan pa'o// dang sa gzil rdzogs cul na// btog 'gyur med chos sal// mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam sngags la// rang las pig na spang bani// rin chen 'ad 'bar pa gsal ba // nyid las mi gzhan dbang gi chu bo ga//
64a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ ma bsrur gzhi pa ye nas rdzogs// su lha'i thugs rje ma 'gags par// khrag 'thung he ru wAr rtsa khas// thugs rje rang khyung dbang gi chu ba bzhi// ma btsal gzhi la ye nas rdzogs// de nyid ye shes lus can rang sdang la/ de nyid dang la gnas shing dang du grol// 3
64a2(rnying rgyud): shes chen po'i dbang gi chu bo bzhi// ma btsal ma bskur gzhi la ye nas rdzogs// des mtshon gsung gi ngo bo ni// rin po che yi yi ge lnga// ma btsal gzhi la ye gnas pas// dpa' bo 'gu lnga dbang gi chu bo bzhi// ma btsal ma bskur gzhi la ye nas rdzogs// de lta bas na
64a3(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i ye shes gzhan la rag mi lus shing rgya rkyen gyi dbang du 'gro mi srid pa'o// rigs kyi bu rim pas babs lcags bshad pa ni/ shes rab kyi sra bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa kun sdang gi ye shes lnga/ dbang ba ni rdzogs su gnas pa ste/ mkhyen pa'i stobs mi 'gags pas/ gzhi
64a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i chos skya la/ shes rab 'gags pa med pa'i dbang thob pa'o// shes rab 'gags pa med pa'i sra bzhi las/ gdul bya la snang ba'i sku bzhi ga ba'i tshe/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i thub zhi // da la gzigs pas thugs mkhyen te/ shes rab rig pa'i sku lnga la/
64a5(rnying rgyud): / rang dbang yas babs su thob pa'o// de bzhin du rigs bzhi las/ sems dpa' sems ma rang dbang yas babs su thob pa'o// ba sprul pa'i skur shar te/ thugs kyi grong nas rang chas su gnas pas/ ngas mthong zhing gsal te/ de'i tshe ngas rtogs pa'i ye shes rang dbang skad
64a6(rnying rgyud): cig ma la thob bo// de bzhin du khams gsum pa thams cad rang la dbang bzhi rdzogs su gnas pas/ rim pas rig pa tsal gyi dbang 'thob par 'gyur bar ngas lung bstan to// zhes gsungs so// rtse rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig dbang gi dngos gzhi ni bsrung thabs gnyis te/
64a7(rnying rgyud): khyad par gyi dbang rdzas bzhi shes rab la brten nas/ gzhi rdzogs rig pa rtsal dbang du bskur pa dang / chun mong gi dbang rdzas bzhi la brten nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi gdams ngag dang sbrel te/ bskur zhing thob par byed pa'o// khyad par gyi dbang rdzas bzhi shes rab la brten nas gzhi rdzogs
64b1(rnying rgyud): chen po dag parbal dbang du bskur ba dang / brgyad 'dzin bum pa'i dbang wa snang ting du bsur ta/ mkha' blod rnam par dag pa'i dngan/ legs kyi sun ma 'gags pa/ 'od kyi bum pa lngang gas la te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bzugs pa'i rten du gyur pas na/ bum bu nas byaH/ dza nga?
64b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings stong pa nyid du bstan pa las/ don stong pa nyid du rig ste/ dngos pa'i mtha' las log go// rgyal po dang rtags phyag tu'i dbang bskur ni/ bum pa wa'i klong na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ba dugs lugs pa shang de/ shes rab bye ba dgacid rmi shes lnga rags pa zhing / thugs rje bdag/
64b3(rnying rgyud): nyid phyag rgya la gsal bas/ sdong bcud dngos po dang mtshan mar snang ba thams cang phyag rgyam bskyed pa'o bzhan gshegs pa lnga dang / lug tugasal ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa la yin par rig ste/ dngos po dang mtshan ma
64b4(rnying rgyud): malus par spa dang yi shes su dag pa ste/ mtshan mthil gyis gnan te// zhal srid rin pa che sna bdun gyi dbang ni/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun te/ dper na rgyal po la N+Dal srid norabardzun yod pa 'dra bar/ rang ga ngo ba gang la yang mi gnas shing / yon ta rtsir yang snang bas/
64b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur rigs sa// rang rig pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa thams cadang thung ba'i gzhim dgags pas/ yon tan 'khor 'das su 'thung zhing nyon mong ba mi mad bas/ zung khyim kyi ro du byin pa dang ldan te btsun
64b6(rnying rgyud): mol/ khur rigs so// rig pa chos sprul 'thun pa'i rna ma dang / rig pasu wang ldang yang don gnyis su med pas/ yul gyi mtshan mdang gis bcom ste/ nyon mongs pazad pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pas/ dmag pon 'a blar rigs so// rang rig pa'i ye shes
64b7(rnying rgyud): 'i mi ma ba sa sa pa ma gas/ brag ba bang mi bya ba can dus dang phra zungs su ga sa kyi mi sas lags sa pasas sa
65a1(rnying rgyud): thang gsas/ da pa gas du nan pang ma kyad pa ma// la gsas/
65a2(rnying rgyud): 'gags pas dang / stobs ma 'gags pas dang / thams cad dror sngon du gyur pas yo shes kyi yon tan te/ de bzhin du gzhad pa'i yon tan dang / yo shes ldan te/ blon po lta bur rigs so// de ltar chog dbang bskur bas rtog pargyad la skyes grub pa'i maH
65a3(rnying rgyud): sgo ma 'gags pas yon tan skyon dang bral ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa'i spros pa tshad de/ smos pa gcod pa'i chos bzhis/ rgyud kyi snying po gsum gyi lta ba la zlos pas/ don gyi dgongs pa bzhi la gnas pas ni/ don brgyad rdzas su bstan pa'i thun mong gi rdzas la rag ma lus te/ thugs
65a4(rnying rgyud): / rjes sems can la 'od 'pho ba'o// rigs kyi bu des ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs shing / rtsal ma 'gags par rdzogs pas/ dbang po shes bzhi rdzogs su thob pa'o// kye rdo rje 'don pa/ thung mong gi rdzas la brten nas dbang bskur ba 'a pas tshig dbang ngan pa che
65a5(rnying rgyud): phyir dbang rdzas la brten te bskur/ nang du bag chags lus la bskur/ sku gsum bzhi rdzogs su ngo bstan no// rigs kyi bu dbang ni ye shes kyi thug dang // rgyal rtags phyag rgya dang / rig pa rtsal gyi dbang gsum ste/ phyir rdzas kyi bum pa lnga la brten nas dbang bskur/
65a6(rnying rgyud): nang du longs su rang la grub lugs dang lnga ldan gyi dgongs pa rdzogs par bshad do// phyir phyag mtshan dug la brten te dbang bsur/ nang du tshogs drug sul ba shar lugs dang / rdzogs ldan gyi skabs su sbal bu byor lugs su bshad do// phyir dbang rdzas bzhi la brten
65a7(rnying rgyud): la dbang bkur/ nang du chis bu'i gnas lugs dang / rin ba che'i sbubs bshad de// rin batshang gdams ngag dang 'brel bar bshad do// de'i rim pa ni ngas bsten pa'i ye shes bla ma du shes par bya'o// zhes gsungs sa// slong bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ rgyud
65b1(rnying rgyud): kyai ljang rtsad sdom dang / dbang bsdus nas bstan pa'i lakhra ste sa drug pa / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos lus pa/ kye kyi bcom ldan nan 'chang // dbang gdan pa gang gsung drugs la// zhes byasaso// ston pas bkang rgyal ba/ mayin pa 'bas
65b2(rnying rgyud): par byung cig/ dbang gi ba ngas chog dang // dbu ba mthun pa'i das bzhad pa// dbang gad ba nga blang gi ye shes gnanang ba du ma gyur pa'o// dbang gi jis thog ni/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la mang 'amang dacing dbang bskur bas do// dartson tu ma rang thad par dang
65b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// ngapa ni rgyal po la glang po ches dbang bskur bas rgyal por rang dbang thob ste/ rgyu las zin pa lta bu'o// zhes gsangs so// sgros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ dbang gdan bshad pa gsal bar bstan pa'i le lce bdun pa// nga rdas yang gagang
65b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye bya bcom ldan rngon 'chang // dam tshig gsang ba bshang du gsol// zhes khrums// ston pas bkang phral pa/ rigs kyi phungs par zung zhig/ dam tshig dbang las skye bas na// ma bskur ba yi dbang chen la// bsung du med pa'i dmatshogs ni/ ma/
65b5(rnying rgyud): nyams le bsnangs gdang dang ldan// nga yi dam tshig gsang ba ni// rang rig ya shes chen po la// bsrung ba sung byed gnyis pad pas// nyams dang ma nyams gnyis su med// theg brgyad bcos ma'i dam chog grang ste// me bsnang bsan med ces bya// 'og ma'i dam tshig las rgal
65b6(rnying rgyud): zhing // rang gi sgo gsum yang bas na// phul pa zhes su btags pa yin// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig la// 'da' mi srid pa'i bsrung zabs ni// rang rig ye shes gcig pu las// gcig pu zhes su btags pa yin// rang rig ye shes gcig pu la// bya btsal med par ye
65b7(rnying rgyud): bsrungs pas// lhun grub ces su btags pa yin// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i chud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang /
66a1(rnying rgyud): @/ ngamatsho bdun pa shad de ltar lags// zhum nus sa// ston pas bkang stsal pa// dza rje 'dzin pa legs par rung zhig/ dam tha gang bangs tshig dang // dazab mthun pa dang ba rba bstan// dngu rang bshad pa ni// rang ma zad pa bar/
66a2(rnying rgyud): @bltab rang rig ye shes yin// bsung po don bye des tshig yin// 'ad du med pa'i dam tshig yin// ma nir nges pa'i dmachog yin// de las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te// bsrung mtsham bcas pa'i dam chog dang // bsung mdzams med pa'i ram tshi
66a3(rnying rgyud): gong dang dog tu shes par bya// dam tshig don la mi 'da' ba// thams cad nam mkha'i dang las mi 'da' ltar// rang rig ye shes don las 'da' ba med// 'da' mi srid pa'i dam tshig yin// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen nga'i rlud las/ ngam tshig gido nang na
66a4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gya dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // dkyil 'khor phrin las de ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ dang po dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// ngo bo dpa ni
66a5(rnying rgyud): des tshig dang // dbye ba mthun pa'i dpe ru bshad// dbye na rnam pa gsum du bshad// mtshon pa brda' yi dkyil 'khor dang // dam tshig tid 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// ngo bo rnam pa gsum yin te// mtshon pa bdang yi dkyil 'khor ngo po 'i//
66a6(rnying rgyud): bris dang 'bur du ba to dang yin// dam chog ting 'dzin dang ni// gang bsgos yid la gsal ba yin// rang bzhin sun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// su gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// rig pa dkyil la ye shes 'khor// mos spu'i ngong nges cheg yin// gzu bo dkyi/ la sems
66a7(rnying rgyud): dpa' lab yum 'khor// longs su ring po ngas tshig yin// kun ga di dkyil la tshogs brgyad 'khor// sbrul lba'i nga dnges tshig len// dpon nyi rtag sa skar sharang bzhin// brjod lpags mang yang bsdus pa yin// zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gas la chan nga'i jug pas/ dpa
66b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu bcuba'o// / de nas yang ston pas bkang stsal pa// rngon 'dzin pa legs par rung zhig/ ma bras ma bsrud ma bsgoms par// rang bzhin gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bu bral 'das pa than las byas// thog ma med par don mngon
66b2(rnying rgyud): de// sra gsum rgya' ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ston pas su gsumangon mdzad dade// lu yi 'od dang gsung gi 'od zer las// ston pas sngags ma rtsal du grub// byin rlabs dang gi tshig gyur gyis// phrin las 'gro don thogs pad mdzad// zas pa med par spyan gyis grub// ces gsungs
66b3(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// phrin las don bshad gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ phrin las kyi ngo bo bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin/ phrin las kyi nges tshig ni// rang bzhin bya rtsol las 'das pas// so so'i
66b4(rnying rgyud): don mdzad zin las yin// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te// rtsol ba yod dang med pa'o// rtsol bral phrin las rnam pa bzhi// chos sku dngos med spos dang bral// rtogs pas spros pa thams cad ni// zhi ba'i phrin las zhes su bya// yon tan nor bu bzhin du dbyung // rgyas pa'i
66b5(rnying rgyud): las zhes su bya// tham cad 'byung yang de las 'thung // thams cad gnas gang de la gnas// thams cad thim yang de la thim// thams cad la yang dbang bskung bas// dbang gi phrin las zhes su bya// reg pa dngos med rdos pa'i chos med pas// gyog mad gang la dang thogs
66b6(rnying rgyud): pa med par 'dzad// jug rjo stobs kyis sgra zhing bskus pas na// drug por med pas shes su gsungs pa yin// bcol med pa shi pa'i 'od cir gyis// khabs gsum mtshan mo thun pa sel bltar// thogs pa med pa'i thug pa rje chen po mas// bcol med pa'i phrin las
66b7(rnying rgyud): chen pa yin// zhes gsungs sa// gros thal dani gas la tshan po bachud las/ phrin las kyi rang bzhin sa medanga'i don dran pa'i le 'brog gcig pa'o// / de nas gsang pa'i bdag pos nus pa/ rje bcom ldand tu rang // mtshang ba'i rdul 'gror
67a1(rnying rgyud): / ltar lags// des nus so// ston pas bka' phul pa/ rdo rje 'don pa legs par drang zhig/ chos ting dag par bathang du/ rang sha ye shes ma 'gags shAr// ya shes dbyings la shar ba pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med 'gyur//
67a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes gnyis med mchod pa yin// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi sar// yab yum bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'phros// ye shes lnga yi dad la rol// ma 'gags gnyis med mchod pa yin// srul sku'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga// mchod rdzas gzugs bla dri ri reg/ sems dpa'i khye'u chu
67a3(rnying rgyud): lngas blangs nas// ring byed dang du/ nyis med thim// rgya mtsho chu yi 'tho 'du bzhin// mchod pa rkun mi chad pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rnal dbyor gsungs pa// lugasum 'du 'bral med pa ni// don la mos byed rnal 'byor yin// rnal rjor chen po bsgom pas
67a4(rnying rgyud): 'das par rtogs// rtogs pa'i don la bya col mi mnga' bar// rang gdangs chen po'i dang la gnas pa yin// nal byor dab chen bcom 'das pa yin// dedo na rang pa gnas pa ni// rdul 'byor bla na med pa yin// rnal 'byor dag gi ngo bo yang // gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa yin// rnal 'byor dag
67a5(rnying rgyud): gi nges tshig kyang // blo dngos gnyis med 'byor ba dang // gru gsum gnyis med 'byor pas 'byod zhes bya// dgye ba rnam pa gnyis min te/ ming dang don dung yis bshad// don gyi rnal 'byor gong bstan bzhin// zhes gsungs so// spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ mchod pa dang
67a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bstan pa'i lung skye go gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gas dpa'i bdag pos zhus pa/ sngags dang stag rgya ji ltar lags/ zhes nus so// smyon pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par drang zhig/ dang po sngags rje don pa shang pa// mchog tugyu
67a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags don no// thongs tsheg daze ba bstan// dbye rnam pa gsum yin dete// gsang sngags ri gasngags gces grags gsum// gsang sngags dag ging dpon// shes rab snying de gnyis su bstan// deg sngags ngan gang 'di// shes rab ni po mes yin// ga
67b1(rnying rgyud): sngags dag gi dpo ni// shes rang dang ni ting 'dzin yin// sngags gsum dag slong mchog ni// shes spobs phyir na des brjod pa'o// sngags gsum dag gi phrin las ni// gzhi gnas bag chags sel ba dang // ma rig pog lha sel ba dang // 'bras zung ba gacha
67b2(rnying rgyud): byed pa yin// rjes gsangs so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// phyag rgya chen po po ni// 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin// phyag rgya chen po'i ngas tshig ni// mi 'da' bas na phyagaHyin// dbyib kyi dang bsrum pa yin// rgya kya ni yod//
67b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi bstan pa// chos nyid mthal chos kya // phyag rngu med po yin par bshad// rang rig ye shes dbyings las shar ta dbyings nyid rig pa dang ldan pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis du med pa ni// da mtshi rtseg tu yin par bshang // rang 'a ye shems 'phags pa/
67b4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba chos kyi phyag tu yin// thugs de'i mu gnyis mi 'gags pas// rtog med thugs rje'i don 'dzin pa// las kyi rtseg car ngas bstan pa'o// phyag rgya'i dponi nam mkha' dang // tshul pos phyag rgyas btang pa pa// de las 'da' bar mi nus bzhin// gsang sngags ma yin
67b5(rnying rgyud): shes rab ma 'gags pa'o// phyag rgya ma yin thugs rje ma 'ag gra 'o// zhes gsungs so// smos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste go gsum pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// bsnyen pa bslab pa ji ltar
67b6(rnying rgyud): lags// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ lta ba rang rig ye shes de// do spyod bzhi yis gtan pa 'bebs// rang rig mtshan nyid nyams su myong // de ni bsnyen pa'i don du bstan// lam la gnas pa nye bsnyen yin// lam grol gyur pa bslab
67b7(rnying rgyud): pa yin// lam ci 'bras bu mthar phyin pas// bsrub pa chen por gyur pa'o// gsang sngags mi bzung don la bzhag/ phyag rgya mi bsgom ma bskyed lhun gyis rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsapa chen po'i rgyud las// bsnyen bsab rnams sa
68a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ga'ags bzlabs/ nga nas yangags pa'i bdas thos tham pa/ sa su // gaganas ngardzus 'angs rnams/ bgang pa bsarnamasags gas pa// 'am du
68a2(rnying rgyud): skyon pas bka' stsal pa// rdorje 'don pa lags par rung zhig/ srang rnams che bangs bshad // sngon po dgal nas gsungs pa pas// gzhan gyi lung lam brtan par// lung gis med ches pa'i na ba dang / smon pa'i rdzags rnam par dag pa la/ dang po dus par rjen
68a3(rnying rgyud): mod/ tha ma me dgyur bas/ 'gyur med nam mkha'i lung gis che ba dang / nyes pazad pas dun gyi tshig sba bar mi byed pas rkun med pa le nal nas gsungs pa'i bden pa'o// ston pa mkhas pa'i bdag nyid las// tshig dang jug kyis don thabs legs// de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' /
68a4(rnying rgyud): yid ces lang gis mama'o// dus 'khor kun las 'phags gyur ba'i// dga' rab rdo rje'i din chad du// smyon pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa la// lung mnor par bris pa ni/ rin chen gser gyi rmugs bsal// bdur ya ni ldan ma pas// rang nan dag ru legs bris pas// tshig gi
68a5(rnying rgyud): ga cad mthugs sa// das ni la na da// bskyed rdzogs brnam pagasas// 'am la med pa'i dgongs rnyan// la ma tag byas pa gyur// da mi dang sa sa ni// gas 'jugs pa dadang khyen gyu / ma 'grul bas// bas
68a6(rnying rgyud): sdigs na tho ga dus pas// rnga dag yid rnas chu'ang// nas gsungs sa/ sa thas danags pa rten pa'i lha las/ 'an tsa brdzabaskyed pa'i 'a na slab // nas yang gsang sri bdag pas rngas pa/ bcom pa
68a7(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing ga don pa shang gdung du gsol// zhes dras so// na pas bkad stsal pa/ rngon 'dan palegs par ru zhig 'ag rang sa tshig dang // dedatha bdun ma dpa rnams bshad// rigs kyi bu lung na pa ni/ dbung sgonas bstan par tham/ don gyi lung ga yon
68b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur sems kyi lung zhes bya ste/ rig pa nyid do// tshig gi lung ging ba na// skyon pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa las// ma bstan ma gris mabyas par tshig go// tshig gi lung la gnyis te/ stan khung las bcud pa dang / mngon du gyur ba'o// de la gnyis de/ dzang do
68b2(rnying rgyud): gi nges tshig ni/ tshig gi don mtshon pas lung zhes bya/ yid ches par bya ba'i phyir lung zhes bya/ zin pas wang zhes bya/ bde blag tu rtogs par thabs lung / bcer bdebs kyang lung / kun dang 'brel du 'drab pas kyang lung ngo // da ni N+Dal pos bka' stsal ba lu bya/ snod sud
68b3(rnying rgyud): pa lta bu dang / sdong lung med bkyer mi bde ba las/ lung can bkyeng bde ba lta bu dang / 'dams kyi phur pa lta bu'o// zhes gsungs so// smos bral don gsapa chen po'i rgyud las/ lung gi don bshad bstan pa'i le'u skye go drug pa'o// / de nas yang mas
68b4(rnying rgyud): pos zhus pa/ kyai kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / man ngag bshad lugs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston byas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ man ngag don gyi bshad lugs ni// spyi don rnam pa lnga yis bshad// lo nus dan dang rtsa ba'i don
68b5(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'o// tshig gi don du bshad pa dang // yo ga'i don du bshad pa dang // dgos ched kyi don du bshad pa'o// lo rgyas kyi don la gsum ste/ gang zag dag gis 'phral la byas pa ma yin par// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa brgyad pas bshad/ @
68b6(rnying rgyud): zhal nas gsungs pa yid ches 'gyur// nges pa don gyi 'khor yin pas// rig 'dzin brda yi bcud pas bshad// ldem po'i don la dgongs pa ma yin par// nges pa'i don du gsungs pas yid ches 'gyur// de bzhin bshad pa'i dus su gang zag rna bar brgyad na
68b7(rnying rgyud): bshad/ bachud pa 'brel ma chad pas nges par yid ches 'gyur/ rtsa ba'i don du bshad pa ni// rang rig ye shes chen por bshad// tshig gi don du bshad pa ni// byin rlabs ngo bo ngas tshig bsdeb pa ste// su gsum rgyal ba'i bshad lugs yin// mtshon byed
69a1(rnying rgyud): tshig gis ngas pa 'don bshad pas// gang nga bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya// mag 'don du bshad pa ni// theg pa'i la shan kyal bshad// da yang don gas la 'dir bstan bzhin// dgas chad dan du bag pa na// 'khrul mags ma/
69a2(rnying rgyud): parabang bying rim pas grol// rin chen skabs pa thabs 'jigs par bstan// zhes gsangs so// spos thal da na gas ladzin pa'i chud las/ yan ga danas chad rdzas bshad pa'i le'u srog bdun pa // / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pa sdums pa/
69a3(rnying rgyud): skye bcom ldan na 'chang / sanA gargyamags sa mdod kyi nga ltar lags/ zhes ngas pas ston pas bka' sam pa// d+ha 'dzin pa legs par byung nag/ srung gi sa dang thubs dang gas kyi mdzad// mad ga pa kyig skyes gnas ljags nga/ de 'dzin
69a4(rnying rgyud): chog gi man dag dang // tshig dang don spor man dag gsum// bsdus pa'i man ngag tshig gsum pa// lu gsung thugs kyi mdzod nas zung // snying po gsum du shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ mnang gdon gyi ngo bo dang // ming gi nges tshig bstan pa
69a5(rnying rgyud): dang // de yi kye brag ji lta dpe dang bcas la bstan// de yid sdeb bstan pa ni// cho ga dang don du shes par bya// don gyi man ngag dzan ni// bong nas ga bskas da yin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// gsal bar zhal du brjod pa'o// tshig gi mardu ga ba ni/
69a6(rnying rgyud): zhal nus gsungs pa'i tshigadon kun// mnor ston dang khrigs brdebs nas// bde gartogs kyi dkar chag mnan// tshigadon gsal bar byed pa yin// ji ba dbye pa de bstan no// de yi rjes tshig bstan pa ni// cho ga chung don ma'i mnangag go// des den gang ma dag/
69a7(rnying rgyud): gang yin pa// brjod bral gsang byer man ngag go// nges tshig gtan tshigs bcas pa yis// ma yis gdams pa bul smras pa bzhin// skyer na rgyud lung man ngag gsum// rje blon 'bangs dang 'dra bar bshad// ces gsungs so// spros bral do nags
69b1(rnying rgyud): nan pa'i rnad las/ man ga ga na pa gdabang mdumams na pa danam yang gas pa bdag sangs pa/ mdug gas pa ma dang / tsan pag ga gas pa rna rgya
69b2(rnying rgyud): drig// man ga rdzogs pa chen pa la// sa la slar du ma pa yin// lam la bgrod du med pa yin// pha rol sbyin ba cu lud du med// 'on nang theg pa snyi dang skyo bstan pas// du du med pa'i sa'i sna dang // ba 'od snang pa'i ma la dang // srid da ma dbang ba
69b3(rnying rgyud): gyen baspyad// ces gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ sbrang du med pa'i sa rim gsung du gsol/ zhem zhus so// rdzogs chen chos nyid sa gcig pa// yon tan togs tshul brdo lnga 'gyis// hud lung lI li lo gdon kun bkrol nas// rnga skad rnam par
69b4(rnying rgyud): 'dir bden pa mthong / de la rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes bya// mnang gdon gyis wa~M yi the hom bsapa// rang gi rgyud la nges pa'i shes pa sres// dri ma med pa'is rba btags pa yin// gsum pa 'od byed pa ni sems nyid ye shes su dbang du 'dus te/ de nyid rtsa ladu shes pas do
69b5(rnying rgyud): brjod rag ma lus// bzhi pa 'od 'grod don kun tu sgrogs// lnga pa dug lnga drug gsum nang du dag/ drug pasrubs gsum skabs kyi lugs ma gsal// bdun pa thags brgyad don las rab tu 'phags// brgyad pa rang gi don las ma g.yos mkhyen// dgu pa yon tan rang la
69b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par mkhyen// bcub chos rnams gang pa'ang thogs med mkhyer// bag chags srubs su rtogs pa skye thugs yin// rtogs ldan 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'gags pa ci// chos nyid spyod du ye shes 'od dugasal// bsu ngogs gcig la gnas pa kun tu'od kyis// dend rang /
69b7(rnying rgyud): yin pas mthun pa khong nas shar// shes rab skyes pa'i stobs kyis sra gsal ba// chom bu lnga chos kyi kun drug shar// gsal la mi gnas pad ma can gyis// gsu rig ngo bo dang bung yig drug/ ljags las 'od 'phros sprul pa'i slar gyur pas// bcugasum

70b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bas// bgrod med lam gcig rtogs pa'i thabs// sgra mthun don 'phags lam lnga bshad// gla mar bsnyen bkur yongs rdzogs nas// dam pa'i drung na gnas pa na// tshogs kyi lam zhes de la bya// bla mas ngan pa'i don bshad de// gdams dang gnyis kyi don la gyod/
70b5(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i la mdung yis bshad// ngo spong rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas// tshe 'dir nges pa'i bden pa mthong // mthong ba'i lam dung yis bshang // bsgom du med pa'i bsgom pa dang // bsgom du yod pa'i med pa gnyis// 'du 'bral med par gnas pa'i// bsgom pa'i lam dung pi sa

71b2(rnying rgyud): dang par ba bdang ga/ shang ba sa 'dzi na pa bdag / dang 'i don pa shes pa yin// ngasag ga ta rgyags pangs pa sa// gnas pa 'jogs la ci// dkyi ma gnyin su 'dres/ rgyal sa gyi pa nga//
71b3(rnying rgyud): la ma zhugs pas// 'dod pa'i yul du phyin pa 'am// gru la brten nas mtsho las thar// lces bu'i mtheb mos mda' ba khyod bzhin// mthar byin grub pa'i sa la gnas// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i chud las/ 'bras bu la du srin pa'i dor bshang ba
