71b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos nus pa// kyi thabacom ldan rjo 'chang // rla pas gsungs pa'i thud lung las// skapes kyis gsungs pa'i ltar lags// rjes nus sa// ston pas bka' stsal ba/ ngon 'dzin pa legs par bung zhis
71b5(rnying rgyud): grubs kyi po des tshig dang // dbye ba mthun pa'i dpe yis bshad// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// rin chen sbubs dang 'od kyi srubs// bag chags srubs dang gsum yin no// dang po mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ni// nam dag zang thal me tog 'gyud pa med// 'gag med kun gsal
71b6(rnying rgyud): shes gru// phyogs gcig mtshan na man sel bzhin// zhib tu gang bsta dru ga na snang bzhin// rin chen srabs zhes chos su yin// bar pa'i mtshan nyid brten pa ni// 'gag med ye shes 'od kyi phra// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// chomabu'i dkyil 'khor chen po lnga/ gas
71b7(rnying rgyud): 'tsho gyu drugag badzi 'bab// 'dakyisapas sangs sugan// thas mtshan ta bstan pa ni// bad chag rnam pan 'a rdzogs pa// lung ba khams tu da kya/ khyo sa sa mas dpa sa // ngag cadas grangs su mas bsam
72a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ dal srub sa gsum ban// gang bstan sug sum yin par bshad// srubs zhes bya ba'i gtan tshogs ni// zhugs pa / tha ba na// dus zhes bya ba 'a du chog te// sas 'angs chog bstan pa ldan// yan ta kun 'thung ngan can sub
72a2(rnying rgyud): snang sa rang bzhin med pa 'od 'i srungs// mu zla me yong gzugs brtan dang // 'ang 'tshon la pa'i dpe yis bstan// rnam rtog mthab nas pag chags su 'ang // zhing gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po chud las/ sbubs bstan pa'i phre 'a brgya dang pa
72a3(rnying rgyud): nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rton pas gsungs pa'i rgyud lung du// sdang ba'i thag gsungs pa rnams// de la don bshung gsung du gsol// zhes byas so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ sdang ba'i
72a4(rnying rgyud): cho ga dang // dbye ba so so'i dpe ru bstan// dang po dbye ba rgyas bsus gnyis// rgyas pa la yang rnam pa bzhi// 'gro dugazhen pa'i snang ba dug/ u 'bras sgo yi snang ba bcu// rtogs ldan don gyi snang ba gcig/ dbyer med kun tu bzang po'i snang ba bzhi// bsdus pa'i snang ba rnam pa gsum/
72a5(rnying rgyud): sa dag 'khrul pa'i snang ba dang // dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ldang ba dang // yang dag pa ye shes kyi snang ba'o// dang po lhung brgyas bshad pa// 'gro drug nin pa'i snang ba rung // shes bya'i dkyi sa 'khor mi 'gags pas// snang ba'i dngos po 'di nyid la// daskal bas tshe grang gnyis su mthong //
72a6(rnying rgyud): yadwags gsums snang ba gsum// byi nang spyi mthan snang ba // gyi yis zas la rnag khrag dang // gos la tshur ma lta bu'o// gcig la zas sna su mas bsrung // gzigs srung med thos bdug/ de bzhin yi dwags gsum du snang // tol song gnyis la sdang ba gnyis// byang
72a7(rnying rgyud): naganas pas lu pa ste// kha thor gnas pa khyen thu 3// mi la mthun snga pa pa nyid de// rang yul mi sa mchis sogs// lha ma yin lan rtson sdang // skal ri tham pa'i Ang / dz+ha ljang zhen pa'i bag chags men// zang smos spang ba bkri// mu skabs tag
72b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i snang ba yang // rtag pa'i dngos las gzhan mi snang // mu stegs chad pa'i sbyang ba yang // 'di yong khyi ma med pa ste// snang 'di glo bur byung ba dang // zhag pas 'byung lnga'i dang dun// chad par snang las gzhan mi snang // nyan thos g.yag rde rde'u ming dang // gong cha shas me
72b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mos kyi bdag tu 'dzin// rang rgyal gong mthun phyogs gcig stong // phung po khams la phyogs gcig bdag med pa// mdo sde don dam stong pa nyid// kun rdzob lha ma tsam du snar // gsang sngags kyi nang gnyis ka yang // don dam mdo sde mthun pa la// kun rdzob sngangs
72b3(rnying rgyud): gri yas rigs gsum rje khos mthong // u pas lha dang dpon g.yog mthong // yogs spyan dang grogs por mthong // maM hA sa phung po lhar snang mthong // a nus dkyi nges dang ye shes mthong // kun gyisanA 'bras mi spangs shing // dngos po mi bden sgrol snang // rgya 'bras blo yi snang ba yi
72b4(rnying rgyud): rtogs ldan don gyi snang ba ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i snang ba yin// thams cad chos sku'i ngo bor mthong // kun tu bzang po'i snang ba yin// gong ma dang mtshungs gnyis med snang // thog ma'i gzhi snang 'dug tshul yin// bsdus pa'i ldang ba rnam pa gsum// ma dag 'khus
72b5(rnying rgyud): snang gong bstan rigs zug yin// dag pa 'jig rten pa'i snang ba bcu ni byang chub sems// yang dag ye shes snang ba bzhi po gong dang mtshungs// snang ba'i dbye ba rgyas bsdus bstan pa'o// snang ba'i ngo bo bstan pa ni// dbye ba gong nas shes par gyis// 'og tu zur tsam brjod mi lang
72b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag nges pa'i ngo bo ni// chos nyid gdangs dang sbyang ba dag gi des tshig ni// 'gag med yul du mthong bas snang bar btags// dpe ni dbye ba'i khog tu bstan// 'di ru nges pa'i dpe bstan pa// nyi ma dag las zer snang dang // mar me la sogs snang 'od bzhin// sdang zhing rang gi
72b7(rnying rgyud): gdangs la zhugs// de bzhin ye shes chen po las// ye shes rang gdangs zang thal snang // ye shes rang gi gdangs la zhugs// chos nyid dag pa'i dpe bstan pa// me long la sogs bzhin snang bzhin// gong du bshad pas 'dir ma brjod// bsdus pas gnas pa'i
73a1(rnying rgyud): / yul ma yin// zhes gsungs sa// sa thal don gas la chen par byed las/ snang ba don pa sdus gsalnga bar bstan pa ma skyeb ma dang drug pa // nas yang gas pa bdag pas zhus pa/ ma bam lda dang 'cha
73a2(rnying rgyud): ldang ba de la gnas pa yi// 'char lugs bzhi po ji ltar lags// zhes byas so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs par zung zhig/ dang po thugs rdo rtsal gyi 'char lugs ni// rig pa mtshan nyid lngar snang bas// rang byung ye shes 'od dugs pa// de las
73a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rtog 'grus pas// 'od de lus kyi rten du gyur// thugs rje rtsal gyi 'char lugs la// de ning 'khrul pa'i sems can la'o// thugs rje srul sna'i 'char lugs ni// longs klu yab yu mazhal bar nas// yi ge drug pa 'od du 'gro ba'o// srid pa gzhi yi 'dzin lugs ni/
73a4(rnying rgyud): dang po bag chags lus 'di la// brtags nas srid pa gzung ba'o// de nas lus byings bskyed pa'o// mig gnyis dag nas rgyu gnyis shar// de las kyi yi ma dud par gyur// de las lus bapyid \u0f7fyis yan lag rgyas// de yi nang du rbo// dang // spro ba la sogs ca krol rnams/
73a5(rnying rgyud): snying so sor rdzogs par 'gyur// srung byed lus kyi chags lugs yin// lus byings bskyed rdzogs g.yo bar byed// rdang gi bcud kyi chags lugs ni// ma bu'i lte ba gnyis 'brel te// lte bas nang nas bskyed par byed// de yis stobs dang gzi madrangs 'phel// zhes ga
73a6(rnying rgyud): so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ chags lugs bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rkang lung kun nas gsungs pa yi// bar do rnam bzhi gsung du gsol// zhes
73a7(rnying rgyud): zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs par nyon cig/ bar do rnam pa bzhi po ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i bar ro dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do dang // chos nyid 'od gsal gyi bar de dang // srid pa'i bar do dang rnam pa bzhi'o// de la rang bzhin par de ni// da lta'i dgul hA
73b1(rnying rgyud): nyid yin// ting nge 'dzin gyi ba 'do ni// las su ma rungs bsgom dus yin// chos nyid par de nas bya ba// 'khrul snang 'gags nas zhag lnga'i bar// rang ga ye shas 'ad du shar// 'od la gnas pa par do yin// sred pa' bar dgas bya ba// chas nyid 'dagasal spang ba yang / rtags/
73b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i shes rab ma skyes pas// snga nas ye shes bag la zha// sngar gyi bag chags snang ba shar// dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan// srid pa'i sha gzugs sngon du shar// rang dang rigs mthun lha mig mthong // lus dang 'dugs tshol bar byed//
73b3(rnying rgyud): dbye bar bcas pa'o// nges pa'i don la mi gnas pas// rang sa mazin par de yin// nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhes bya'o// dper na 'jig rten don gnyer ba// 'gros ma byin zhugs bzhin// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar dol// chud lung kun gyi log dngol te// rdo spod bdun gyis gtan la pas/
73b4(rnying rgyud): ga sa pas pan rjod pag// ting badzin pa gas pa par bya// chos nyid pa dal shesangs bzu 'o// gab tu mgyur bas// srid las kyi bramathu 'o// zhes gsungs so// zlos la dodags badzin po'i rgyud las// bar dpa bdun pa'i yi brgya #
73b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // chos nyid bar dor grol ba'i thabs// sems dang ye shes de ltar dbye// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nges par zung zhing // sems dang ye shes rnam pa gnyis// gcig
73b6(rnying rgyud): min tha dad ma yin te// dbye ba rab tu dka' ba'i chos// sems nyid ye shes rtsal yin te// sems kyi gzhi ma ye shes yin// de la sems dang ye shes gnyis// gcig pa dang ni tha dad pas// grol dang mgrol zhes bya'o// sems dang ye shes dbye ba ni// ngo bo skanas dbye ba dang /
73b7(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi sgonas dbye ba dang // lam gyi sgo nas dbye ba dang // 'byung ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang // skyon yon so so'i sgo nas dbye ba'o// de la ye shes ngo bo ni// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa chos kyi sku// 'dug tshul 'od du 'dug pas gzugs kyi sku// snang tshul gyi nang med pas
74a1(rnying rgyud): #/ ye shes zang thal yin// srAg sum dbyer med dngos po'i sgrib las 'das// zhib tu gong bshad 'dir ni ma badza // sems kyang ba brtan pa ni// sbubs dang brnyas pa' gzang 'angan yan// sems dang ye shas gnas bstan pa/
74a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po'i bzhugs gnas yin// rnam dag dbyings kyi thig le yin// de ltar rin chen sbubs na bzhugs// 'dug tshul gnas dang snang tshul rnams// gong dang 'og tu shes par bya// sems ni rlung can grong na bzhugs// lam yang rnam pa gnyis su bstan// rin
74a3(rnying rgyud): chen rgya mtshor 'brel ba yin// dkar 'ja mkhog pa stong pa'i rtsa// thig le khrag gis ma gang bar// ye shes chen po kun tu rgyu// de ni ye shes lam du bshad// mgrin pa sems kyi lam du bshad// de ni dbugs chu'i bad+ma srang yin// sgo ni rnam pa gnyis su bshad// ye shes
74a4(rnying rgyud): sgo dang sems kyi sgo// ye shes sgo ni gnyis yin te// khyab pa mi snang sgo dang lkog gyur sgo// rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin// gsal ba'i bdag nyid zang thal bas// mngon gyur sgo de spyan du bstan// sems sgo 'dod pa'i sgo gsum yin// dbugs rgyu mi gyu'i rnam shes da
74a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes yon tan kun snang rdzogs// sems kyi skyon ni 'khor ba'i chos// de dang de las byung ba'i rtse// kye ma rigs kyi bu legs par nyon cig/ don de zab mo'i brdar bstan na/ ljon ri rab kyi rtse mo rgya mtsho'i nyi mnyan na/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu 'od ldan bya ba bzhugs skad/ kho lho nas
74a6(rnying rgyud): yas mar gzigs pas/ rnam dag pad ma'i tshal bya ba na rin po che'i khang pa nyi zlas brgyan pa bye ba 'dug pa mthong / der khong yar byon te bzhugs pa'i pho zang byas skad do// gong ma la mchod khang byas te bzhugs skad/ de nas mar gzigs pas rlung can gyi gror na/ blon po kun byed bya ba
74a7(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa mthong ngo // der byon nas blon por bskos so// rgyal blon 'khrugs par gyur smad do// de nas blon pos bskyod pa shugs kyi rta la zhon nas/ kun tun+da'i srang du phyin te/ 'thab rtsod kyi sgogasum du byon te/ rin po che rnam pa wa btsal nas/ rgyal po la dbya ngal
74b1(rnying rgyud): bas// rgyal po mnyes pa dang tshims par ma gyur te/ dmangs dang blon po yi mug ga chad nas/ rgyal blo na 'thab pas/ rgyal pos blon po la chab bsal/ 'bangs cham la phabs nas/ rgyal blon bral bas mchod pa rgyun chad de/ rgyal po pho brang du bskyod de/ 'thab
74b2(rnying rgyud): zla med pas shin tu so bsod do skad/ dz+nyA na tsit+ta pra be sha ya sa du a hA k+ta la/ zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ sems dang ye shes dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gisang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// b+h+yo kye bcom
74b3(rnying rgyud): ched// gangag grangs ni rnams gas pa y-is// dgra pa'i slang ba ltar gags// ye shes snang chang// rang ga shes pa na// dan kyigs pa skye byung // ya byu la lugs ltar lags// zhes /
74b4(rnying rgyud): pas bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag nges pa'i don 'di zung // 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'di// dang po dang las shar ba'i phyir// mtha' ma rang gi ngang du grol// gang bstan rang shar rang grol bzhin// snang ba sems kyi dbang du 'dus// gzung bar bya ba'i yul dang bral// sems
74b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs ye shes dbang 'dus pas// 'dzin par byed pa'i sems dang bral// gzung dzin bral ba'i rig pa la// yo gas rang dngas 'dagasal ba// mkha' la'ang 'tshon gsal bltar// chos nyid grong na ma shes gas la// mtha dbus ma dar kum khyab// de tshogs pa de pa 'dra
74b6(rnying rgyud): dngas ma'i 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// chos nyid ngo bo nyid la shwar// de la snang ba'i 'byung ba lnga// rang rang dang dru dag cing thim// 'byung ba'i skabs su bstan pa yin// dang pos la sa thim pas// lus ste shes pa 'jib pa yin// de nas chu la chu thim pas// lus po kha sna skam pa yin//
74b7(rnying rgyud): de nas rlung 'i rlung brim pas// lus dang shes pa lnga zhing byings// ngo tshom la mtham pas// lus ni drod dang bral ba yin// rnam zhes nam mkha' dang dubrim// rdor bab sdug rnam rtog thal// khyab pa med pa'i gdangs laganas// chos ted rang gi ba la?// bag le lngas bdag/
75a1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsa/ nyid can// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' dang // gnyis min gcig sri don gyis gnas// tsi yi gyi na logs na myed// bag dang ma thal kha dog dbyibs// de la de snang dayang bal// daphyir de 'di skad cas brjod pa'o// ye shes gzhil 'phros pa'i rtags/
75a2(rnying rgyud): rerab rtse nas nyi ma nub// rlung bzhi rim pas zhi gyur nas// las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i bdag/ 'chi bdag bdud kyi grong khyer nas// bdud kyi so ba mig gcig po// dus la bab dang ma bab blta// mang yang rtags kun bsdus pa yin// zhes gsungs so// spos bral do na gas la chen
75a3(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyud las/ gri las spyi'i mtshan nyid bsdams pa dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // gang zag lus sems 'bral mi 'bral// rtags kyi bye bras ji ltar 'byung // de skad byas
75a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lan gsungs pa// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag po khyod// gang zag lus sems 'bral mi 'bral// rtags kyi bye brag ngas bstan nyon// 'chi ltas bcu gsum dag tu bstan// gangs kyi rlangs pa yal ma yal// nyi ma'i ngos la rlangs pa yal ma yal// rlangs pa yal na lus sems
75a5(rnying rgyud): 'bral bar 'gyur// gzhung rtsa nyams te rlangs pa med pa yin// gsal ba shel gyi me long gi// gdangs de nub pam ma nub pa sta// me long btsir bas bltas pa der// mdangs shor gzhi 'dus 'chi ba'i rtags// dpag bsam 'dab ma chag ga ma mchagang lta// skra dang ba sku log na lo 'dab
75a6(rnying rgyud): bskams// rtsa bran nang du 'khums pas 'che ba'i rtags// mkha' 'gro'i sgra sgrogs chag gam ma chag brtag/ rna ba gnyis btsir bas ni mngon pa ste// skra chag gzhi la rtsal 'dus 'chi ba'o// gnams ri 'brel zag chad dam ma chad brtag/ lag ngar meg sngar phyar bas brtag/ chad na
75a7(rnying rgyud): a to li ka nya nas te'i tshe// thabs dang shes rab 'bral la ma mthal ni// sna bug gnyis kyi dbugs la blta ba ste// dbugs la ring thung byung nas 'gags 'chi// rta mchog khang bzang gti bab ma ma gtib brtag/ sA brag zhom na khang bzang gti bste 'che// don snying po rtsa nyams
75b1(rnying rgyud): pas // u kyi mams mam dunams// ma sa thags pag sam // khaganams sa ngas pasan// ga pang ga su ba la bgapa// gyus/ du da ma
75b2(rnying rgyud): labs// mchod mtshangasan dbyas pasam bsum migs// ba\u0f88\u0f90 nas bdud dag la sa ma langs// ma sa nga bajon// seM pas byed ma byed pa// byed ma pa 'jangs pa sa// gnag pa rdzog pa du 'amam
75b3(rnying rgyud): grib par snang gzugs la blta// gzugs med snang ba log pas 'chi// dus kyi chu gang ma la na nyal mnyal// praN+Da' khyams po meng na 'chi// de ltar 'chi ltas byung na ni// tshe yi 'du byed byer bar 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen pa'i rgyud pas/ 'chal
75b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // gang zag rtogs shing goms ldan la// bar de'i snang ba ji ltar 'char// de nyid zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa// sme dang bye grag zhis
75b5(rnying rgyud): su bstan// bye brag dbang po rab 'bring gi/ gor ma bzhi du 'char bar 'gyur// rtogs ldan gyi ru 'di ltar 'byung // lus sems bral te su gsum 'chang dus su// 'khor ba'i bu bo ba zhelas brgal// lce nas na 'chi bzhi yin no// srid pa'i lamargyan lnga las brgal// nyon mongs/
75b6(rnying rgyud): chags sang rnams lnga'o// sems kyi rten phur phyung bste// be ma rig bral ba'i dus yin no// mya ngan thang chen dag las banal// 'jig rten 'di yi sdug bsngal lo// lhan cig skyes pa 'a grogs dang bral// lhan gyis ma rig sangs pa yin// rtag pa'i yul dang thab
75b7(rnying rgyud): bar gyur// 'jig rten snang ba 'di nyid 'gags// yun ring 'grogs pa'i grogs dang bral// 'jig rten 'di yi sems yin no// 'gyur ldog can gyi blo dang bral// gzung 'dzin rtog pa sna tshogs so// rtag tu na pa'i nad dang thal// de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal lo// dus kyi dmar
76a1(rnying rgyud): u rgyud pa yin// da ni gangs mab zung smras// ngas ma'i dang snang shur ba'adus// ga pa dang dgasags pag// 'ad pa'i shes pa med pasan// skang rgyan gyis pasru ma tshugs// rang sna ga sangs sa das/
76a2(rnying rgyud): shes zang thal yin// 'og 'gyu'i srog gcod dang ma sangs// rig pa rangs zin pa yin// rig pa ma dang 'phred de ldog mi srid// sdang ba rang lda shing d+ha snang ba la// rig pa 'dzin med 'khrul mi srid// sku gsum sman gyis thub pa la// 'bras bu gzhan nas mi 'tshol tshul drung bral/
76a3(rnying rgyud): longs skur byon nas gzhan don mtha' ru 'byung // gzhan don rdzogs nas chos sku nyid du thim// de nyid dus na gzhan don gzugs sku man chad nas// 'jig rten dag dang theg pa'i mtha' rnams bral// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las// bar de'i 'bras bu
76a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u sde brkya dang bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kyai kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // spyi yi bye brag de ltar na// rab 'bring tha ma'i grol lugs rnams// ma nor rim pas gsung du gsol// zhes gus so// ston pas bka' stsal
76a5(rnying rgyud): pa// dbang po yang ra'agyur pa la// ye nas zang thal chen po pas// bar do med cing skad cig mar// de lta nyid du gnas pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// chos nyid dag pa'i ngo bor gnas// de la rig pa zang thal shar// shar ba ma yin gnas pa yin//
76a6(rnying rgyud): dper na nam mkha' zang thal la// khang khyim byas pas nam mkha' gud du bcad// khang pa'i nang gi nam mkha' dang // rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' gnyis// sgo'am mthong na sgrib med pas// nam mkha' gnyis po sgrib med gsal// bag chags sbubs kyi rig pa dang // mkha'
76a7(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa'i reg pa gnyis// ye shes sgo yis mtshams sbyar nas// bag chags lus kyis ma bsgribs par// gnyis med zang thal chen po gnas// rtogs pa'i don chen de ltar ni// seng ge'i mchongs pas sa chong ltar// ye shes zang thal chen po yis// bar ngo skye 'gag
76b1(rnying rgyud): mi gnas par// ran can skabs kyi nang du gcad// dbas la grol chen por gnas// dal dz+has grang ba ma byar// ji ltar don brjod mi shes pas// dbang po dman pa'i gang zag la// grol lugs rjes gdab bya du med// byas kyang nges pa mi 'ad pas// lta ba gcag gas
76b2(rnying rgyud): par bshad// de nas de nyid 'phrad par 'gyur// 'bring la rab 'bring tha ma gsum// 'bring gi rab dang 'bring gi 'bring // 'bring gi tha ma rnam pa gsum// 'bring gi rab kyi grol lugs ni// skad cig gsum la grol bar 'gyur// dang po snang ba tshur la 'jug/
76b3(rnying rgyud): rnam shes dag la'o// nang gi 'byung ba 'od la 'dra// rnam shes lnga po de ltar 'dug/ rtsal snang gzhi la 'dus pa ni// tshon gyi bu gu bsdog pa bzhin// de tshe rlung bzhi rim zhi nas// stong rje med pa'i las kyi rlung // so pa rtse nas ldang bar 'gyur// ri tshe gnas
76b4(rnying rgyud): lam du 'dug/ lam nas sgo nu myur du 'dug/ sgo yi snang ba chos nyid klong du 'char// thugs rje rgyan gyi thag pazang thal la// zhon nas ye shes rang gi gdangs la 'dug/ de yi skad cig dang po la'o// de'i tshe skur snang shes rab kye// bzhi pacwa rtsa gnyis mngon gas pa
76b5(rnying rgyud): me long nang gi gzugs brtan bzhini// ye shes lnga ldan dgongs pa yin// gong du zhib par brjod pa'i phyir// 'di du brjod par mi bya'o// de las mngon shes chos spyan shAr// sku gsum rnam par bzhag pa ste// yi ge drug po da zer 'gro// sprul pa'i lur 'gyur don
76b6(rnying rgyud): rnams byed// de ma rdzogs ldan dgong sna pa rdzogs// de yi skad cig gnyis pa la'o// de nas mya ngan 'das gyur te// blo dang 'khor ba'i chos can las// 'dus te mi gnas dang du thim// ye shes spyan gcig 'gyur med gsal// rdzogs ldan chen po'i de gnyis pa rdzogs
76b7(rnying rgyud): dri'i gang bsam pa'o// 'bring gi bring gi grol tshum ni// rang ba kyin 'khrul ba dag/ gnyis par rang shi ngas yo dgas pa// gsum pa la ga kyi ga sa// bzhi pa rang spang shes ba bri// mau ga ba nings rtsos ste// ban ba rtsa gnyis
77a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ mngon sangs rgyas// 'bring gi 'bring gis lnga ldan dgongs pa rdzogs// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ nam mkha'i mthong nas nyi shar ltar// rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes shar// 'asogs yig rnam drug 'gro// da na sbrul grub rgya yin te//
77a2(rnying rgyud): las dag gang zag rnam pa gnyis// 'du 'phro byed pa'i bar du 'gro// dkar dmar rnam gnyis lus kyi chu// yi ge drug pa'i byang chub sems// lus kyi rgyu las sems shar bas// dkar dmar klod tu gnas pa ni// gnas la gnas gab lus dang sems kyi tshul// de nas lus
77a3(rnying rgyud): kyi skul pas 'gro don mdzad// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// rang rig ye shes ye gnas pa// snying po 'gyur med 'gag pa med// de don nges pa kun la sgrogs// thugs kyi snying po 'gro la 'char// ston pa'i dgongs pa longs 'gyur bas// yid 'dres bcud la
77a4(rnying rgyud): bcu dgab 'gyur// de yis nges par grol bar 'gyur// 'bring gis rdzogs ldan dgongs pa rdzogs// de nas skad cig drug pa la// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs 'da' ste// ye shes rlung gi stobs rnams kyis// dang po chos skur gzugs sgra bskyed// / tha ma gtso
77a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor rim pas thi ma gyur te// ye shes rlung gis chos nyid dang la spyod// de tshe 'byung ba'i mtshan ma rang sar thim// sbrul sgra'i 'byung lnga 'od lnga'i nang du thim// de yang ye shes 'byung ba'i ngo bor grol// dang po ma las shar bas pa yi dang du zhi// dang po shar yang dbyings kyi ngang nas
77a6(rnying rgyud): shar// bar du gnas kyang chos nyid dang du gnas// tha ma thim yang chos nyid dang du thim// spyan gsum rnam dag 'gyur med gcig tu gsal// chos nyid dang na rig pa'i ye shes gsal// phyir mi gsal la ye shes nang du gsal// bum pa'i nang du mar me gsal ba bzhin//
77a7(rnying rgyud): de tshe 'gyur med sku gsum rangs zin// 'bring gis rdzogs ldan chen po'i dgongs pa rdzogs// 'bring gi tha ma'i grol lugs ni// phyi yi 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// phyi yi snang byed sgron ma la tshur shar te// gzung ba'i yul dang bral ba'o// sgo lnga gsal ba'i sgron ma ni// ye shes
77b1(rnying rgyud): dang du 'dus pas na dgazul/ nang ga 'byung ba rnam pa la/ rag dang blanam la shes d+ha la stsung sbrul 'dus/ don na lag la 'dus par bstan pa// mthags napa ba byung kyang yangs sa 'ad pa mang pa'i shes bsrung gag
77b2(rnying rgyud): bgacags kyi thabs rang sangs te// skad cig mi dang po la gnas so// de'i dus na 'byung ba'i zlas pas/ hwags ngem par 'byung ngo // snying rje med pa las kyi rnang sa sogs pabardung lpaganas par byed pa na 'degs par byed pa'i drung rjegs pa la gan te/ yang
77b3(rnying rgyud): / de rje bas sras myongag ste/ nanas dang jugs pa byung // dang ga dang byed ngo byed pa'i drung sas la skyesapa pa rdzu ti/ dang kyi byed kyin / sa kyi sa bshAb dang sa ngas byed // shen dang ba rji ros da ma// sras
77b4(rnying rgyud): bkrag 'o// ngani na dang 'thogs pa'i drung ste/ zhibs mdangs nyams pa'o// medang dus mnyam pa'i drung po ba na gnas te/ der bas 'dra ba dang sras bying sa drangs par byed do// zhi bas drod 'drang bas zas mi'ang / dan ma dang 'thogs pa'asla // dngas gas nga
77b5(rnying rgyud): sa ba ba na lasangs nas med pang/ shegs pa papa la ba kyang / nga/ da nga mithogs pas zus/ nga bas pa ngas padang / sa pa dang
77b6(rnying rgyud): rlung la bang babrog tu na gnas te/ srog 'dzin pa'i drung yin pas/ nga srad gnas kyi par du lus sems mi 'thal ba'o// de ni rnam par shes pa dang thogs pa'i du ste/ deng spyad pas sgyid nas pas cang dang / kyi srad 'a ba dang babyed de/ rtags kyigs so da /
77b7(rnying rgyud): rkyem ga brel bar phyin pas/ 'ad du la 'thung sa bar 'ang mthag pabani nga/ rig pa'i ye shes gnasas/ de'i sring nga sumachos nyid rnags te/ yegs ngas yin te/ brgyang bad drug rgya byengs pas sbres te/ sngags rgya
78a1(rnying rgyud): @/ zhon nas rang gi gdangs pa 'dug go// bags kyi gdangs la zhag lngar gnas te/ shar ba cig car shar ba'o// yang ye shes kyi sbyang ba nam mkha' la ja' shwar ba ltar snang ba'o// de la rtogs pa'i shes rab pa pas b+ha ste/ zhag 'o
78a2(rnying rgyud): mthing ga gsal bas/ rig pa ngos bzung dang bral bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rang snang rang shar rang gdangs rang gsal du shes pas/ shes bya la gcod byed med do// zhag gnyis pa la chos dbyings ye shes gsal ba'i steng dadu me long ye shes shang ngo //
78a3(rnying rgyud): yul du snang ba'i tshe/ de nyid rig pa 'gag pa med pa'i me long ye shes su dag chod do// zhag gsum pa la 'od zer ser po yul du snang ba'i tshe/ de nyid rig stong dbyer med rang snang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gdangs su gsal lo// zhag bzhi pa la 'od dmar po yul du sA
78a4(rnying rgyud): nyid shes pa'i shes rab ma 'gags pa'i rang sdang so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi gdangs su gsal lo// zhag lnga pa la 'od ljang gu yul du snang ba'i tshe/ de nyid bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi gdangs su gsal lo// skye ba rim pas skye bas zhan sngal ye das kyi snang po gas
78a5(rnying rgyud): lo// chod pa thang kar chod pas/ snang ba re re la rtogs pa'i shes rab re re skye ste/ sems med pa'i shes pa skyes kyang gcod byed med do// zhag lnga la lus mtha' rdzogs pas shes rab mtha' rdzogs te/ skad cig ma la chos nyid 'ongagasal gyi dkyil 'khor na/ tshom ba lngang
78a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya mi 'gags par gsal lo// des tha ma'i wa ldan gyi dgongs pa rdzogs so// sku de rnams la mngon par shes pa dug 'char te/ spyan gsum pas chos kyi spyan no// de ci ltar 'char na/ ldan gyi mngon par shes pas/ yang gzigs su med pa chos sku rin po che'i lcags
78a7(rnying rgyud): mar gzigs/ thad ka nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma 'gags par 'od du gsal lo// mar yul pa sku'i zhing khams bag chags sbubs na ji ltar gnas pa thams cad gzigs so// skan gyi mngon par shes pa ni/ yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
78b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad gas rdzom gas pa gcig pa ra/ 'ad pa rmang bslangs pa yang gsan/ thu kar ba nam bu lags lal// mang sprul pa'i bu'i zhing lams na/ nga ga smra babams ca gas nan// byags rgyam ngan pa dgas pas/ yang ces tha na
78b2(rnying rgyud): srubs nas 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab 'dzin pa med pa'i rang gsal/ gzhan snang gi rnam rtog med par bzhugs par mkhyen no// thad kar rang gi dgongs pa ma 'gags par gsal lo// mar sems can gyi rnam rtog mngon du mkhyen no// gnas kyi mngon par shes pa nA~M/
78b3(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi zhing khams dang / chos kyi dbyings dang 'od kyi snang ba dang // 'byung ba bzhil brtan pa bca' lugs bzhin gyi rigs drug gi gnas gzhan ma 'gags par gsal lo// las kyi mngon par shes pa ni/ ston rang gis ji ltar smad pa dang / da lta 'phro ba gcan
78b4(rnying rgyud): pa mkhyen no// thugs rje byin rlabs kyi mngon par shes pa ni/ mthun pa'i sems can rnams la snang bas/ rigs drug mthun pas mthun par snang bas 'dul ba gzigs te/ sprul pa'i sku drog shar lugs mkhyen no// rigs kyi phye de la chos kyi spyan zhes ni'i phyir gdags shan
78b5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i skus 'khor ba'i chos dang / chos su rin po che mya ngan las 'das pa chos gnyis/ rnam rtog me mnga' bar gsal bas chos kyi spyan ni// donas rnam par mkhyen pa ni sgrogs su gyur pa ma khyen pa'o// stan ni gsal ma mi rtog pa ste/ gzugs brtan la sogs pa ba
78b6(rnying rgyud): nau// de tshe dang byung gi yi ge drug 'chung ba yang / ba dang / a dang / ha dang / shA dang / sa dang / ma dang drag ste/ rigs kyi bu yig rjen dri na ni chos su pa don man du bzhugs so// dbying sa dang rig pa dang / ye shes dang / shes rab dang / mi 'gyur ba dang /
78b7(rnying rgyud): pa nyid dang / dbye ru med par gnas pa'o// bag chags lus can sul sprul/ lus kyi gnas drug la gnas te/ gsung 'gag pa med par don la sbyar ba'o// longs sku'i ljags las 'gro ba ni/ thugs rje 'byung ba'i gzhi ma 'gags pa/ yi ge drug po las rin po
79a1(rnying rgyud): / sa sa bsgril ba'am/ skal ma' tshan spyad nga rmi lam bzhin 'thos pas/ las dgra pa sgral pa gyi'i spyan nus 'du// sems can las kyi gru ba mang la nas 'phrag zar// dad man pa gsang gnas nang/ 'ong 'bang ba dab rta ma
79a2(rnying rgyud): ste// bde chen yongs la khyab pa'i thig le la/ snod dang brgyad gi tshul dug pa/ de sprul pa'i sgrar gyur nas sems can gyi don byed pa'o// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed par// rtog med du 'thung ba kun gyi donam spangs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma ltas ma
79a3(rnying rgyud): te/ de nyid spun pa rgyun mi chad pas/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba'o// phyogs gcig tu ma nges te/ gdul ba gang na gnas pa'i don mdzad pas na/ phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyung pa'o// mthun pas mthun pa 'dul bar gzigs pas na/ ji bzhin 'gro
79a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i don byed pa'o// dngos su thub pa drug gis 'gro ba dag gi don byed pa'o// thugs rje'i lcags kyus zhing dag pa de yang dag pa sa la 'dzin pa'o// rdzogs ldan gyi dgongs pa'o// de nas bdag nyid chos slar grol bas ni/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen pos 'byed pa med pa'i
79a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' klong du khod snyoms so// de bas tha mas rdzogs ldan chen po'o// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ ma togs pa la bar don sems dngos su med par sems phyis 'char ba'i dpe ji lta bu lags
79a6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i skus don byas nas rang grol ba'i dpe ji lta bu/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ zhing khams gcig pa la snying po tha dad pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ rig pa gcig la nal so sor rdzogs pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ rangs na grol zhing rangs nas dbyer mi phyed pa'i dpe ji lta
79a7(rnying rgyud): bu lags/ mu bzhi'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ ye shes rang la gnas pa'i dpe'i lta bu lags/ rtog pa med par bsgom pas mi grol ba'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ rin po che'i sbubs na dgongs pa gsal la gzhan gyis mi gzigs pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ dang po rin po che'i sbubs las
79b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ phyis mi 'khrul pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ dpe'i ngo bo gang lags/ nges tshig gang lags/ dbye ba ji ltar lags/ dgos ched ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nges par byang zhig/ mngon par rtog
79b2(rnying rgyud): par sangs rgyas pa'i dpeni/ nam langs pas ni k+Shar med par gsal ba lta bu dang rgya mtsho la gza' skar shar ba lta bu dang chu zla lta bu'o// bar dol sems dang po med par phyis 'char ba'i dpe ni/ sa bon ste'u la myu gu sngon po meng par phyis 'byung ba lta bu'o// pra sa sgra'i
79b3(rnying rgyud): don byas nas rang grol ba ni/ chu zan rgya mtshor 'du ba lta bu'am nyi ma nug par zer 'du ba bzhin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dpen 'anga' tshon nam mkhar bim pa lta bu'o// zhing khams gcig la rigs tha dad pa'i dpa ni/ mar me mang du btang ba'i 'od mi byed par ting po sa song
79b4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba lta bu'o// rig pa gcig la rtsal so sor rdzogs pa'i dpe ni/ sa bon gcig la slor bu so sor gyes nas de la snying po so sor byung nas/ 'bras bu mang po rdzogs pa bzhin no// rangs nas rang grol nas dbyer med du gnas pa'i dpe ni nam mkha' kung du bcad pa btang ba
79b5(rnying rgyud): lta bu'o// mu bzhi'i dpe ni gcig dang tha dad las grol ba gser dang gser gyi ser po lta bu'o// ma grol ba smrig s+phu chu b+hu lta bu'o// grol ba'i mgrol ba khams dang bum pa lta bu'o// ma grol ba'i grol ba nyi ma dang 'od lta bu'o// ye shes rang la gnas pa'i rtags kyi dben
79b6(rnying rgyud): tshang 'thung bas ra ro ba lta bu'o// rtog pa med pa'i bsgom pas mi grol dpe ni/ ro mo 'am lder so lta bu'o// rin po che'i skabs nas dgongs pa gsal ba gzhan gyis mi mthong ba'i dpe ni/ gnas khang langs par mtshan mo mgron po snga'i tshogs nas nyal ba lta bu'o//
79b7(rnying rgyud): dang po rin po che'i sbubs nas 'khrul pa'i dpe ni/ byis pas me long du shar ba'i byad ngom shes par gzhan du mthong ba lta bu'o// phyis mi 'khrul pa'i dpe ni/ byis pas rang gi na rdzogs nas rang byed la rang gi ngo shes pa lta bu 'am/ lo thog nas su smin nas nang par ldang par
80a1(rnying rgyud): sa / ga du na zhugs / narnyan / sa napa 'a dpa
80a2(rnying rgyud): bamatshon pa'i dpe dang / gnyis med mnan pa pa'o// dgos ni don rtags pa'o// zhes gsangasas// sgras zla sa dron gas rdzun pa'i rgya dmas/ dbang po skang rabal grol da ma par bstan pa dang / 'bring la dang 'bre gas ma myed byu ba dang / man
80a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ldan zad kar dngos babyung ba dang / mngon shes drug thugs rje'i 'byung lug dang bcas pa dang / rdzogs ldan chen po sa sor bye ste bstan pa'i le'u sti brgya dang bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang //
80a4(rnying rgyud): dI ma na pa gi dge srung dugasol// zhes byas pa// don pas dag 'phrul ba/ gsang ba'i bdag pa nges par rkyenag/ seMs ring bangs chog da// dbya med dang mnyan pe bstan// 'khor ba'i tshesi la mi gnas par// mya ngan 'das pa'i don la gnas// rgal
80a5(rnying rgyud): spyi yi de bor bshud// rang rang so ma'i 'a bor te// lus las grol ba'i ngobo ni// rang gdangs chen po gsal ba yin// yul las grol ba'i ngo bo ni// rig pa dngos med rin chen srubs// sems las grol bzhing bo ni// rtog med dri dag rang gsal yin//
80a6(rnying rgyud): spel bkres pa'i ngos tshig ni// rtsol ba'i chos las rab 'das shing // 'khrul pa gsum gyis ma bcings pas// nges tshig gtan tshigs bcas pa yin// dbye ba ngo bo'i skabs sra bgad// dpo na sbrul la mdud por dang // rnga ma dag go mdud pa bzhin// thugs
80a7(rnying rgyud): dbangs rtso ni// dab mi 'gags gzugs gtas// tsa bye zugs gas kya// ma 'dags gnod pasang pa zhugs// dbyed na po chung gnyis// rtag sang tig bcwa so// 'ad par byed pa zugs pa pazhin// tshul ba kya pa'i bu zhinan/
80b1(rnying rgyud): ma rig sel bas nyi zla bzhin// sdug bsngal nang sal sman dang sman pa bzhin// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ grol ba dang thugs rje'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bcwa bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos
80b2(rnying rgyud): zhus pa/ kye sde bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // bag chags skabs na gnas pa'i dpe ji ltar lags/ sbubs 'pho ba'i dpe ji ltar lags/ 'dir rtogs pas par dor shes pa skye baji ltar lags/ bag chags skyabs bor ba'i tshe ye shes dang mi 'bral ba'i dpe ji ltar lags/ 'khrul
80b3(rnying rgyud): paldog pa'i dpe ji ltar lags/ rtogs pa can 'tsha khar nad dang rkyen gyis dgrags kyang / shes pa phyis mi 'khrul pa'i dpe ji ltar lags/ chos skya lus las ma byung bar ye shes sngon du 'char po'i dpe ji ltar lags/ skad cig ma'o chos su gsum du bsdu
80b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa gang lags/ skad cig ma la grol ba'i dpe gang lags// ye shes kyi gdangs la shes pa myur du 'dug pa'i dpe ji ltar lags/ chos nyid las ye shes kyi snang ba 'char ba'i dpe ji ltar lags/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dpe ji lta bu lags/ zhe
80b5(rnying rgyud): zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu nges par zung zhig/ bag chags srubs na gnas pa ni// seng phug dang kur phug lta bu'o// skabs 'pho ba'i dab bye phrug sgong nas 'gyung ba dang / sbrul skags pa dang bral ba bzhin no// 'di rtogs pas bar ngo chod
80b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ sngar 'dris pa'i mi phyis ngo shes pa lta bu'o// skyabs 'pho / bar ye shes dang mi 'bral bar 'a grogs pa ni/ tshang bang nas me sgron gyir bton pas tshang bang mun par gyur te/ mi'i lag pa sgron me dang ma bral bas 'gro sar gyin pa lta bu'o// 'khrul pa ldog pa'i dpe
80b7(rnying rgyud): gnying sa pa skye bya'o// rtogs pa can 'chi ba na dang rkyen gyis dbugs kyang mi brjed pa'i gzungs tho te/ snang gi yu su d+hu r+b+hu d+hA ba'i dben/ rgun la jo btub nas 'khrugs nas mi gsal kyang chu dngas pa'i 'grol gsal ba / d+ha // chos spu lus las mabyung bar la
81a1(rnying rgyud): / shas son ral du 'char ba 'dang na/ nyi ma shar kyi la kan 'dag kyang 'dan pa la 'char ba lta bu'o// skad cig ma tshos su gsuman/ 'dzin par byed pa'i grags kyu'i 'odabras ma bzung ba gzang bar 'gyur ba dang / grad par byeng pa dang
81a2(rnying rgyud): kyi ngo bo ye shes shar ba'i ngang du thim pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs rgyan gyi ma dang gsum mo// skad cig ma gcig la grol ba'i dpe ni/ seng ge mchongs pa lta bu dang / bum pa chag pas mar me gsal ba lta bu dang / skar mda' nam mkha' la rgyug pa lta bya'o// ma zhes
81a3(rnying rgyud): la shes pa myur du 'jug pa ni gser gyi thur ma lta bu'o// chos nyid la ye shes kyi snang ba 'char ba'i dpe ni/ nam mkha' la 'ja' shar pa lta bu'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i dpe ni thog dang dpag chen gyi mda' bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// skos bral don gsapa chen po'i chud las/ da
81a4(rnying rgyud): spyir dril nas ni bshad dang bcas pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kyai kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// mya ngan 'dang lugs ji ltar legs// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas mya ngaca da
81a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul// Ter tsamagong dungs bsan yang // khyod kyis nges par ma shes na// byas pa rangs bshad legs par byung / shes rab mkha' la 'degs pa yi// ma bskyod shugs ni bskyod par byed// 'byung ba mal zhab ste// mtshan ma rang sa snol bar byed// ye gas
81a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings su thim pa yis// rtsal rtog pa zhi la thim par ston// shes rab mkha' la thim pa yis// sku gsum ye nas nang gsal ston// rig pa rangs zin pa yis// dgongs pa bgyur ba med par nyon// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/
81a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rang byung tshig lnga'i dgongs pa de ltar na// so so mtshan nyid rnam grangs dang // de bo dang ngan ba grol lugs rnams// de ltar gnas dang ngos 'dug la// thabs la mkhas pas gsung du gsol// zhes du so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ la
81b1(rnying rgyud): ngas byung zhig/ shes ba mkha' la 'dags pa la// mtshan nyid rnam grangs rnam pa bzhi// stobs ldan ma dang thazla ba chang ma// 'degs byeng ma dang brtanam pa'i// skabs marnams ni 'char ba dang // gnyis su me par sbyor bar byed// grags rgya ma nang kyang /
81b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rtsal du ni// spu dang ye shes 'char ba yang // rtsol ba med pa'i nga gis shar// tha ma 'khor rnams gtso po lnga la 'dus// gtso bo lnga yang rin chen srungs su gshegs// gtso dang bcas te bskyod pa ma yin yang // dang ngam shugs kyis grol ba'i myang na shugs 'chang
81b3(rnying rgyud): ma'o// de'i dus na chos sgo rin po che lta bu la rdos pa can po chos med de/ chos nyid nam mkha'ag/ pad+mang // chos su nam mkha' ste zla gnyis// gnyis su med par zang bral ba// ma byid srung dag nas pas 'degs byed ma/ btsas dus na ye shes rlung gis mig yo bas da /
81b4(rnying rgyud): de rnams rlung gi mtshan nyid gcig la gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'byung ba ma la zha ba'i mtshan nyid la lnga ste/ 'khrul pa'i 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// ye shes wa li gdangs la 'dus/ ye shes lnga'i 'od ga dngas kyang / rang byang 'byung brdza dadus/ de'i tshe na rlung gi rgya gram bkod legs/
81b5(rnying rgyud): te gdan du bting ba'o// de yang rlung ni mabyung ba'o// dus der rlung g.yo byed med par gnas pas kyang rgya tha ma lta bu'o// de ni g.yo byed med par bskyod pa lta bu'o// tshwa shel gyi 'khor lo brtsegs legs te/ 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab klong gcig du dril te/ gshar ba med pa'i chu'o//
81b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dbyings bsngags legs so// de yang dbyings rnam par dag pa'i dngan/ rig pa gsal stong daster med do// de'i ngang nas ye shes kyi spyan ma 'gags par shar ba 'od kyi bum pa la gnas la/ de'i snying po rigs lnga'i sku gsal lam 'dres
81b7(rnying rgyud): par gnas so// ngas na bzugs legs sa// rigs kyi sre nga gas pa 'dzin pa med pa'o// da'angs sus pa dang bcas pa'is/ srab med pa'i nga du grol te/ don gyung ba med pa'o// nga yang rang gi ba 'gyur ba med pa'i dngan/ gang ma bzhin ma 'dres par
82a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa mchod rten lha gung // de la bzang ngan dang che chung dang yangs dog med par gnas pas kun tu khod snyoms pa'o// 'dug tshul sku dang ye shes la/ snang tshul sku dang ye shes lngar shar bas/ rtags tshul bas
82a2(rnying rgyud): med chen por rtogs te/ dbye ba med pa'i tshul shes pa'o// rigs kyi bu dus de tsha ba dang bcas pa'i me tsha ba med pa'i ngang du grol te/ rang rig pa'i ye shes las gzhan snang gi rtog pa med pa'o// dri ma med pa'i rig pa la su dang ye shes su gnas kyang / de na gnyis su med par gsal
82a3(rnying rgyud): te/ sa bon 'bras bur sprin la 'bras bu 'gyur ba med par gnas pa ni/ me tog pad ma 'dra bar 'od 'bar te/ ma spen pa smin par byas so// rig pa'i ye shes 'byung ba las 'das pa'i rang ga dang / 'od las 'das pa'i ye shes yid las 'da' pa'i shes rab dus thams cad du sgra 'gags dang nub
82a4(rnying rgyud): pa med par gnas pa ni/ nam mkha' khab pa med pa'i gdangs can de/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo lta bu'o// de ltar 'byung ba lnga po mthog nas shar bas/ mthog tu grol te/ mi gnas pas 'byung ba ma la zha'o// de yang dang po dbyings dang rig pa dbyer med kyi ngang la shar ba sa
82a5(rnying rgyud): zam yang de'i dang du dag cing thim pas ye shes dbyings su thim pa'i mar dag/ ye shes dbyings su thim pas so sor rtog pa'i shes rab las 'das shing / gzig snang g.yul la mi gnas pas ye shes rtse gcig par gsal ba ste/ ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pa'o//
82a6(rnying rgyud): de'i tshe shes rab kyi spyan dang chos kyi spyan las grol ba'o// g+sa kyi bu ye shes kyi dbyings su thim kyang / stong pa phyang chad du mgyur te/ dbyings kyi thig le gsher ba med pa'i chus/ ning med pa'i nang du 'dus te/ sku dang ye shes nang gsal du gnas pas/ shes rab mkha' la 'khyil pa'o//
82a7(rnying rgyud): de yang rgyas par bstan na mtshan nyid bzhi ste/ sku dang ye shes dbyings su zim kyang // rig pa dang gsal dbyings na mi gnas pas/ thim pa la ma tshugs pa'o// ma chug kyang sems nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ rang rig pa'i ye shes las gzhan sdang rtog pa mi mnga' bas/
82b1(rnying rgyud): mgasas// mam ma sa / 'gas pa du / sas// rnas nas// dadags pa sa rlos/ rnas par slobapas ma
82b2(rnying rgyud): nam mkhar dbyar ma dang // de bzhin da pag chags skyabs kyis brgyad kyang / ngan la shes zang rdul na/ bdag sa na ma bsgribs par zang thal ste// de bus na yin pa la bdag med pal// de'i dang la dus gsas kyis das nas bdugs kyad/ 'arjid pa gang ga
82b3(rnying rgyud): dang gas pa rtag pa mang par bzugs so// dag pa'i yon ta dang bgrang nas shang ba/ tha mar mi 'gags pa dang gi slong nag nas / yum gyi bum pa la shes rgyas lngas sar gnas te/ rang snang las gzhan yang ba byung / dzin sas ma dris pa pa'i 'thud pa
82b4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs sa// drus deng rig pa rang sa zinata// gnyis ming cas snga ma ldang bas/ stong panyid du ga du'i thun ba// gnyis su med pa tsas sgra'i dang na rig pa la shes kyi sun dgags pa med pa gas pa pas/ 'ongs stong blang sa gatha med pa nga ga
82b5(rnying rgyud): ga/ shes ma sa sa mi sa ba dpa rnams chog ma sma myu ra ga pa sa sa sa
82b6(rnying rgyud): nga byedang // lung shes dag nas segs shes pa kyi kun nagacig dang // sras gnyis las 'das te/ rig parjed pa nang ca bla ma dang ma ta/ gang gnas par// nas ga ngasas// zhes pa nags pa can pa nad pas/ ma
82b7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa nga gangs pa dang / ngamatshan pa'i tshig spang dran bshad pa'i laste brgya dang bas bang ngo // / de nas yang gas pa'i bdag pas zhus pa/ kye rtse bcom lda rnamatha' las 'das// mya ngan 'das pa'i don pa gdang ltar lags// nes byas so//
83a1(rnying rgyud): / ston pas bka' thal pa/ rigs mi blangs par ma ga/ bzangs ga bab dang // mtshan nyid dathab ba nims bshad// mdun das pa'i ston// ma gnas lags na cag/ ram gzug pa la rangs su / mnag dang /
83a2(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i phyir na'o// dbye ba ni zag bcas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / zag pa mang pa'o// mtshan nyid ni mtha' rnam pa bzhi las 'das pa'o// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i don bshang bstan pa'i
83a3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste brgya dang bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsung ba'i bdag pas zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / tog med gsal ba spyan gyi don rnams gsung du gsol// zhes nus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rlung lang kun gyi nang na sran zhes brjod pa
83a4(rnying rgyud): ni/ ngas bstan 'di ltar shes par bya'o// ngo bo dbye ba bcas pa ni/ ye shes kyi spyan byed pa med pa ni rtsa gcig tu gsal ba dang / chos kyi stan rtog pa med par rnam par mkhyen cing gsal ba dang / shes rab kyi spyan rnam par dpyod cing donam sor gsal ba dang / lha'i
83a5(rnying rgyud): spyan rnam par dag pa bag chags zad pa la snang ba dang / sha'i spyan rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba la gsal ba dang / chu bur gyi mig bag chags kyi lus can rnams la thun mong du sdang zhing gsal ba'o// des tshig ni na mthong zhing ma 'gatha par gas la bas no'o// mtshan nyid kyi ni sleb pa dngapal
83a6(rnying rgyud): ba/ dab tu nang nga nga // des gsus sa// skyes tha 'dogs chen pang rgyad las/ sun ci dan bstun pa'i le'u skye bacha dang bca brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos ngas pa/ rtse rtse bcom ldan rnam pa ma bya// byud lung man ngag las byung ngo //
83a7(rnying rgyud): mu bzhi'i don yang bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa logs par zung zhig/ mu bzhi'i ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba mthun pa'i dpe rnams te// dpe ni gong ltar shes par bya// ngo bo dbye ba bcas pa ni// mu bzhi rnam pa gnyis
83b1(rnying rgyud): yin te// dus dang grol ba la sogs pa// dang po rus kyi srung can// lus kyi mtha' rdzogs pa'i dus dang / shas ba rjiH la rdzogs pa'i dus dang / las kyi mthara' zad pa snam pa'i la shas mthA rdzogs pa'i dus dang / yang dag par ngogs pa'i sangs rtas pa
83b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i rtsa la zad pa'i dus so// grol ba'i mu bzhi ni/ gcig pa dang tha dad pa las grol ba'i thig le dang rang byung gi ye shes so// rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir na rang byung ye shes nyid thig le yin la/ thig le nyid kyang rang byung gi ye shes su gsal bas/ gcig dang tha dad
83b3(rnying rgyud): dra brjod pa las 'das pa'o// gcig pa dang thadad pa las grol ba ni/ chos sgra dang nam mkha'o// rigs kyi 'i phyir na/ de gnyis zad pa'i phyir te/ rang bzhin dag pa'i rnam mamang ste/ mdog dang byibs kyi bdag nyid dang / 'byung ba'i rang sachen dag byung / bgadang ma/
83b4(rnying rgyud): bral te ngo bo rig med stong pa yin pa'i phyir ro// chos spu thig le chen po ni/ stong par mthun kyang de rnams las ldog ste/ don des gcig pa dang tha dad pa las grol ba'o// grol ba'i mgrel ba ni sems dang ye shes te// grol ba ni gzhi gcig pa'o// sems rtog bcas phra gsal
83b5(rnying rgyud): la/ ye shes rtog me du bzhugs pas/ don ngas rgyal gling ba nas ma grol ba'o// mgrol baji bral ba ni thig le dang yul te/ thig le'i rig pa 'gags pa med pa dang / yul med stong par gnas pas mthol ba'o// bol ba ni chos thams cad tha dad pa lta rnam
83b6(rnying rgyud): yin pas/ stong pa dbyer med du gnas pas/ so sor brjod pa las 'das pa'i gsal bzang thal lo// don des ma grol ba'i grol ba'o// zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gsal chen po'i chud las/ mu bzhi'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dang bcu dag pa'o//
83b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye su bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // sma yi don bshang gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// ngas bshad rgyud lung thams cad du// sgra rnams ji ltar snang mod kyi// mr-i yi dbyings dang srub byed
84a1(rnying rgyud): dang // gzhan sa la ngan sa s+ho/ rnam pa sharla ba sa sta/ sku byeng pan 'du ba'o// de gnyis su kyi 'byung gnas pam// da yang ngang 'byung nan/ das sa song ba sa na dang/ da
84a2(rnying rgyud): bsas so// de gnyis kyi bar du le shes mi 'gag par ngabyung bas na'o// dalas zhes ba skyegs na 'byu // de gnyis gakyi po med pa dang / dena'i ldang ba'i sra kyis thugs par 'byung bas nga// da sa kyi lam kyi 'di ni ga
84a3(rnying rgyud): / bsran pa 'o// de gnyis rgya mchad pas gra'o// de gnyis su med pa la thams cad 'bar bas chon// de gnyis can gyi 'byung gnas yin pas rgyal// derti gnyis su med pa rnams su mya bas nAro// dam 'gags par pa
84a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang 'bral meng pas na // ma rig pa yin pa sun ta'o// gzhiganas mtha tha pas na hA// de gnyis su med par byung na shes byam bcom / ma shes su 'byung bas nate'o// martogs pa sems su spa bas na'o//
84a5(rnying rgyud): kyi sku yirnams pa'o// thabs 'gag pa med pas pa'o// tsal srang snang bas pa'o// de gnyis kyi brags rje sra bzh-i las grub pa ya'o// thugs rje dang mi 'bral bas // de gnyis las thams cad 'gro zhing 'dus pas la lo// de ga
84a6(rnying rgyud): lha snang bas ci lkog dang / log pa'o// bas nang dpas ni sba yi dbyings so// de gnyis sgrub par byed pa ni/ ag tid ces yig thams ca dag par 'brub pa'o// las thams cad zhus pa dang shAl bang bslab poso gnyis 'brel bar gyur pas @
84a7(rnying rgyud): med par bsgrub pa'o// ha dang 'brel pas na chen po ste/ ma byas pa spang bar byed po// ye shes rang brtsegs 'byung bas thag pa / lce 'gag med par bsgrub pa'o// ha dang nabs kyus kyang yig dang bar 'brel bas blang ba ste du dpa'o// dza da'i san pa'i byed can
84b1(rnying rgyud): pa ra ta sa ra dang bcas pa ni spros par byed pa'i grub pa'o// sa dang ta ni de la phan pa'i rkyen can no// za log thams cad thun mong ma yin pa'i bsgrub pa'o// rang ngo thams cad ni dbyings bsgrub pa'o// de bzhin du'adang a las shar ba thams cad don phyogs de dang ldan pas/
84b2(rnying rgyud): a'i don phyogs de bsgrub pa'o// de ni sgra'i rtsub byed du bzhag pa'o// de rnams kyi 'a dang a'i ming mthun pa'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs sel cing / sgo so so'i mi mthun phyogs sel bas gzhan sel lo// de rnams kyi 'phrul lugs kyis dang rang gi don sgrub pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba dang /
84b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i yon tan bsrub pas don thogs su 'gyur bas na/ skra phan pa'i rkyen can no// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ sku'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye
84b4(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo 'chang // tud lung man dag gang gsungs pa// tsheg tshogs thams cad de ltar ba shad lags na// 'bru rnams de ltar gzhom pa gsung du gsol// stan pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ rgyad lung man ga gdon thams cang gong ltu
84b5(rnying rgyud): la/ gnas skabs thams cad 'bod skad kyis bsdebs la// gong du bshad pa 'bru mnan no// rigs kyi bu le'u zhes pa ni/ so so'i sa mtshams dang chos gzhan ma 'dres te/ gang mtshon pa'i don gtso bor bshad pa'o// skabs shes pa thams cad le'u'i don dang don 'byu
84b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi ma 'gags par shes pa la bya'o// spros bral thams cad ni mi 'gyur ma 'gags par shes par bya'o// snang ba thams cad yul lo// yul thams cad bzhugs pa dang snang bar shes par bya'o// rig pa chos su dang don mkhyen pa dang bem po las log pa dang ma rig pa
84b7(rnying rgyud): las log pa'o// ma rig pa thams cad don ma shes pa'o// yon tan thams cad mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gzhi ldan pa dang ma 'gags par bshad do// skyon thams cad mtha' dang gzung 'dzin dang / ma rig pa dang log lha dang / don so so dang mi mthun pa dang / spang byar
85a1(rnying rgyud): @/ bshad do// grub mtha' thams cad palta ba dang 'bras bur bshad do// 'bras bu thams cad don mthar phyin pa'o// don ni thadad do// dgongs pa thams cad dang dngas rang bzhin bdag nyid chen por bshad do// dang ni ma bcos pa dang mi g.yo ba dang / mi 'da' ba dang mi gnas
85a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / mi 'gyur bar bshad do// rang dang ni ma 'gags pa dang / mi mthun pa dang so so'i chos nyid du bshad do// bdag nyid chen po ni thams cad rig pa dbyer med par bshad do// rang bzhin ni gzhan la rag ma lus pa'o// 'grub thams cad ni rtsal lo// skabs med pa'i 'grub
85a3(rnying rgyud): da kyi rtsal lo// sbubs can rtogs bcas so// de ltar de bzhin de 'dra zhes pa ni gar blang yang tshig snga phyi'i dpe dang sbyar ro/ de ni zhes pa thams cad ni snga ma 'og tu rgyas su bstan pa'o// de ni zhes pa ni snga ma bshad nas/ de dang de las bzlog pa gcig ston pa'o// 'di ni zhes pa
85a4(rnying rgyud): ni thams cad don logs su bkar ba'o// can thams cad yon tan du snang ba dang sbyar ba'o// dpal dang sdug pa dang mangs pa ni mthu stobs dang byin rlabs so// 'di yang zhes pa thams cad don dbus mgor 'og du bstan pa'o// ci phyir gang gis phyir na de phyir ni//
85a5(rnying rgyud): gnyen tshigs su bstan pa'o// rnams dang ma lus pa dang thams cad dang kun dang de dag ni/ tshig gi don lhag ma ma lus par ston pa'i tshig go// byang zhes pa rig pa chub pa ye shes so// byung ba chos su chub pa longs sku/ sems dpa' srul sku'o// gzhi dang rtsal du yang bshad
85a6(rnying rgyud): do// chos nyid mi 'gyur ba dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang dbyings su bshad/ shes rab ces pa ni phyogs lhung med pa dang / so sor dpyod pa dang ma 'gags par bshad/ sgron ma ni gsal byed do// mun pa mi rig pa'o// shar ba yul la shar ba dang / rtog pa dang rtsal
85a7(rnying rgyud): te/ don thadakar gyur ro// rang thung ni 'dus ma byas pa dang rgyal la// gnas srabs shas pa gces so// 'di snang la rang bzhin med pa dang / gsal lam bsgribs pa'o// mtshan byag zhir bshad do// mtshan byed thabs su bshad/ mi gnas pas ni mtha' thal bar bshad do//
85b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa ni phyogs thams cad nas dag par// mtshan ma'i chos las grol ba'o// bdag med pa na bdag gnyis dang pal ba sems pas grol ba'o// wAn ces tud dang chos su dang / ya shas ta skabs dang spar zhes par// rtsa ba dang dang 'khor 'ad //
85b2(rnying rgyud): yul da rnam par bshad/ yadang spyod ni mnan par snang ba'o// rdzogs pa ni dregs malus par// chen pa ni mabyas pa dang / gong na med pado// ye shes nyi ni nga ba shes pa'o// deshing ni dang / shes pas la ba'o// pa rang 'a dam ba
85b3(rnying rgyud): dang las dang sha zar ba shad nga// 'greb rdo dag pas mkha' la 'grob dang // thugs rje dang pas dang shugs kyis 'gro ro// 'bar ba nes 'phags par gsal ba'o// mdzod ni bajugs gnas su rang // sgron 'byung zhing 'dug pa'o// ni chang ni thal ba
85b4(rnying rgyud): dmachog ni dbyer mi phyed pa'o// dpal ni bdag gzhan gnyis kyi'o// thugs rje ni thun mang dang byin thabs las byung ba'o// skyes bu ni ngon mchog tu bud pas 'gro ba'i khal gyi ni du bsgyur ba'o// ma ni ste pa'i gzhi'i byung ba'i gnas so// me ni shes rab kyi ba
85b5(rnying rgyud): // thabs nadon bslab pa ca ro// yan lagazhi gang yin pa las 'gro ba'i chos can nu// med pa'i 'gyur ba'i ngan gyin med par// gaming na mi kar pa'o// gzhung na gdun dang ma 'dres pa'i lcags so// lag ma ngam pa //
85b6(rnying rgyud): nigatsang pa dang nga bang // mid pa nis dgas pa dang med pa las yod par snang rnas par // 'chang ba ni du 'thal mad ngo // dz+nyA na ni sang rtsag mas 'dra bgyur du// byung na chags nas zlos pa ma so// mang de tshan pa'i to// ga
85b7(rnying rgyud): ri nga ba/ chos ni bcan mtha gas/ ga chags gzung 'angan chos las 'das pade sangs rgyas so// gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i rig pa 'thung ba la 'das pa'i gdangs ni/ rig par nga snang dadags pa zang thal/ sprul pa 'das pa'i lags chos sa brgya
86a1(rnying rgyud): par shar ba/ tshig las 'das pa'i rang snang / brjod bral gzhan snang med pa'o// lam ni gnas pa dang 'dug pa'o// sems can ni ma shes pa'i rtog bcas so// 'khor ba ni gcig tu mi gnas par 'khrul pa'o// sems ni dran pa nges
86a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bskyod pa ni gshegs pa'o// bskyod du med pa ni mi bzod pa'o// sdug bsngal las grol ba'i bde ba chen po yin pas byang chub pa'o// shes pa ni mkhas pas de don la ma rmongs pa'o// gnas pa ni rtsol bas ma song bar phyin pa'o// gu ni sgrol ba ste
86a3(rnying rgyud): thabs so// ting nge 'dzin ni gsal ba ste rtse gcig pa'o// rab ni 'gran zla med de chen por gyur pa'o// mchog ni ngo mchor ba ste 'phags pa'o// phul du phyin pa ni khyad par 'phags pa'o// bla na med pa ni de'i gong dang logs na med pa ste/ dbang byed pa med pa'o// rdo rje
86a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ni spyod pa nyid/ dran pa nges pa ni mtshan ma sna tshogs pa'o// zab pa ni gtid ring zhing dpag par dka' ba'o// gting dpag dka' ba ni phra bas na'o// chos ni mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang / rnam par dgar ba dang gzhan la brten pa dang / kun 'byung bas na'o// byang chub
86a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ni/ bdag gzhan la sems dpa' dang sa non pa'o// phung po gsum ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sems can no// byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yang sangs rgyas dang snang ba mi mthun la/ mar sems can dang mi mthun te/ gnyis
86a6(rnying rgyud): ka ma yin pa'o// de yis phung po gsum du bzhags pa'o// bag chags ni gzhi gnas dang 'phral 'byung ngo // dag lugs ni rang dengs su 'gro ba dang / phra ga'i gdams pa la rag lus pa'o// dpe gangs la khab babs pa dang / mtshol dar chags pa dang / ras
86a7(rnying rgyud): la dri mas gos pa bzhin no// gzhi gnas kyi dbye ba ni chu dang 'o ma lta bu'o// 'phral dpung gi dpe chu dang zla ba'o// sel ba'i dpe ni ral gri lta bu dang lcags kyu/ bu'o// gsang ba ni gab pa'o// sangs rgyas ni mthar phyin pa'o// ma rig pa ni 'khrul pa'o//
86b1(rnying rgyud): pas na byung // mdzes pas na lha mo'o// byams pas na mgon no// mdzad pa tshogs pas na phrin las so// bdag po ni dbang man pa'o// yon tan ma 'gags pa'o// dri ma med pa dang / ma 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mthun pa 'dzugs sa// sna chags
86b2(rnying rgyud): ston pas gsung ngo // gzi brjid ldan pas na sla'o// / thabs dang shes rab 'dzin pas na yab sam mo// byang chub chen po dang ldan zhing bskyed pas sras so// de lta rangs bstan pa'i drung lung thams cad du shes par gyis shing // ngas bstan pa don rnams patsud par
86b3(rnying rgyud): gyur na gang rtsod pa dang / je b+h+yon dmangs gsum par de bdag la/ 'dri lugs dang dam bcang ma nor bar byas la/ srub byed kyis gang yin pa bsrub cing / gzhan sal gyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad spangs la/ phan pa'i rkyen gyis bsnyungs ba tab ste/ don ma
86b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dbyings la bsgral po// log lta can gyi sgrub byed la/ gyon gyis sgrub byed mi mthun pa'i phyogs btang ngo // khong gis gzhan sel ni/ mi mthun pa'i skab rtse dngabatang ngo // pha na ba'i rkyen la gnod pa'i dgal rkyen btang ngo // rang rig pa'i ye shes dgag slab dang bral ba
86b5(rnying rgyud): ni/ dbyas sa rtsub pa sa san 'du / na cig gas pa das pa du smras / da pa'i phyin papa tu dngas papa na// ni skang la sags pag nga dang / thags dam /
86b6(rnying rgyud): bshad pa bzhin don gyi gnang dri ba dang lan gdab par bya'o// mthun na sgrub byed kyi dbyings la s+phar/ mi mthun na gzhan sel gyis brgal lo// don nges par byed pa dang / the tshom dang thal bar byed pa dang / shes bya gtan la 'bebs pas na gtan tshigs zhes bya ste/ de dang rngams
86b7(rnying rgyud): mthun par bshad do// des yid gnyis za ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ 'bru 'thor bsdud pa dang / the tshom dang bral bar byed pa dang / skyon gyi mtha' bsal ba'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gcig pa'o//
87a1(rnying rgyud): / danas yang ston pas nang tsa maldan 'das su bstan pa'i 'adz+ra 'a shAsangasas// gsang ba'i bdag pa dang 'dzin pa kon cig// don gyi man dgartsa pa cang byug ga/ de ny-id gros tha lda na gas la bstan par/ na gang slo ba/
87a2(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di/ gsang ba dag zla ba'i 'khor dang dga' rab sdud pa'i 'khor// gzhan yang 'dir mos 'dir 'dus tshogs pa'i 'khor// nga yi spos thal don gsal skad chen 'dis// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bcad kyis ston pas na// rtsa ba car pogasud chen zhes su rung /
87a3(rnying rgyud): gcig shas kun dutshul ba sanipas na// yang ga rgyamig zan pa drang dubyung // ngan bu nyi dang mnyan rtse gas// sangs rgyas mnyam spor chen pa'i nad zung // mazla zlas dang thal bar gan pas na// sa bya lado nags la cu che shems byaste/ dang
87a4(rnying rgyud): dza rang ya rdo spod ston pas na// gsang ba'i ngo sprod chen po'i chung ngu zung // gnas lpags de ltar yin pa rdzogs par ston pas na// rdzogs chen nang nas yongs rdzogs rkun pa'i rgyung du zung // lha bsgom dri med dag pa chen po ston pas na// dri med ka dag chen pa'i chung ngu za //
87a5(rnying rgyud): pas me da gtustsa ces dubya bar napasas dzin da nadun pa sa nga/ 'a byung bshes pa la 'am na pasum/ sashes dri ga cin rgyud drudang / na gdun pagrangangs su garnamasas pab sa
87a6(rnying rgyud): na pa'i byan pa nga cang// 'phe pa dad nas stsags pas na// da sub nga tu can par cang // 'askal bams cad ca sasargyaman// dasngam ba nga rjo d+hi thub nga/ 'a ba mthos thal byas/
87a7(rnying rgyud): bsu ma thabar rjo / do mongs gang da ti sa nan pa na// // 'a su jamam pa nas// ba mad mas rdzo// da can rgyag meng sdugs nas sto pasan/
87b1(rnying rgyud): mapa nga mam sa// ma ma ga tha da / ma da// pa sa na sa su sa/ ma su sas//
87b2(rnying rgyud): len par// spros tha 'a do dgas pa da sangs sung za // don pad na ga pa rtogs par byar// dngos med da com sra ma rtogs par// slong gcang ma mthang la dzin // dadags pa 'ang mi ngas sa ngas pan// na ga pa
87b3(rnying rgyud): sa te dang // banas lugs snang thugs rnam gnyis matogs pas// gnyis kyi mamadul bden par ma 'don te// snang ba 'dabaso na gas panges kyi sa/ na gnyis byed pang 'a gis nyid// grags ma 'dra ba la myed pa sogs pas
87b4(rnying rgyud): bdags pasno rdzogs rnamasanyis bde pa ma na pa// blo blangs 'a bas rnags pa dresas thangs// 'on kyang yinas spyan rdugs dag kyi thos pa la dag la zhes paratshig dang pode'i bral ma dan // ngan
87b5(rnying rgyud): gsal nyams sa langs// don kyang mi shas donags pa chud la 'char// zhes gsungasas// de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag po lasags te 'dus pa'i rdzogs rnams kyis thal mon nang bstan ma nga byas nas// tsas bcom na rdo rje latshang // bdag ca
87b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// sras zal danags la chud pa rkad pas// ma rig kun pa rgyad 'dis bsal// 'khor bzung nas rgyung 'dis bcad// nyon mongs g.yul las rnyed 'dis 'azlog/ rba bo bzhi las d+hur 'dis 'asgral// nga nam dang nas cung 'das
87b7(rnying rgyud): sngags// bas chags ldan ljin cu de 'dis bas la// 'khrul ba thams cad cung 'dis bzad// rang ngo rang la chud 'dis slad// gcig zhes kun las chud 'dis grol// gnas lugs don cher rlung 'dis ni// lig lta tshar can nang 'dis bcang // thag das na/
88a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ shan dzang rgyang 'dis kye// 'byung ba dngas snyigs chung 'dis bya// rten mongs dug lnga cung 'dis bsal// lam la col mang chud 'dis byas// rang byung ye shes chung 'dis shar// 'khor ba dngas snyigs chud 'dis rtse// log pa'i
88a2(rnying rgyud): lam zhugs rgyud 'dis bzlog/ chos 'da'i rtsa ba rgyad 'dis bcad// man ngag rlung sgrog chen po rgyud 'dis khrol// sku gsum yongs rdzogs chud 'dis thob// ye shes rnam lnga rgyud 'dis shar// ma mthong yul chen chud 'dis mthong // ma mjal zhal chen rgyad 'dres
88a3(rnying rgyud): mjal// ma thos gtam chen chud 'dis thos// 'byung ba ma la rgyud 'dis zhwa// grol zhing thim pa rgyud 'dis byas// 'khor ba'i la las rgyud 'dis bzlas// rtsol med 'bras bu chud 'dis thob// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// dgos 'dod de zhong nor bu
88a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen lta bu khyod la bstod// ma rig mun pa sel mdzad nyi ma lta bu khyod la bstod// 'khor ba'i bag chags bsreg mdzad me dpung lta bu khyod la bstad// nyon mongs dri ma 'khrud mdzod chu bo lta bu khyod la bstod// rang gsal don nyid gsal mdzad me long lta bu khyod la bskyod//
88a5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag don chen ston mdzad man shel lta bu khyod la bstod// skyon gyis mgos ston mdzad pad ma lta bu khyod la bstod// tshegs rung don chen ston mdzad man ngag lta bu khyod la bstod// 'khor ba'i g.yul ngo bzlog mdzad dpang bo lta bu khyod la bstod// 'khor ba'i gcod
88a6(rnying rgyud): rnying 'don mdzad sman pa lta bu khyod la bstod// 'gro drug bde bar sgrol mdzad thugs rje'i bdag po khyod la bstod// ces gsang ba'i bdag pos bstod do// spos bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud las// chud kyi mtshan yongs su bstan pa dang / bstod pa phul
88a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa// nga yi blas bral do dgasal chud chen 'di// bstan pas shes shing bklags pas go ba ste// da lta rang ngo rang gis shes te dus gsum 'gyur ba med// rig
88b1(rnying rgyud): parbasA s+phar nas shing ldang brgyas kyi dbyings sushes// gtas mang ngan chen dud lags lab phyis// rkyong ba'i ga sbyin nang pas coM bya ga sang sa srung mi srid// dgas 'do rab bsrung pa na pa ngas nas // nAd nga hrung drung man nang
88b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'dis/ snod ngan nga mchog med pa rnams pa dor sridang// slob dpon gsang nas rang che 'byin pa rnams la shor srid do// rang gis nor ma shor bar gdams ngag 'dod pa rnams la shor srid // 'phur bu rang 'dod can gyi mo le sher sri // kha gshegs
88b3(rnying rgyud): s+pha rban ni skyi la shing yid do// thog pa rnon po che li mI la shar srid do// mthar thug la zla chos la mos pa mi zed dang // rdo rje slob dpon gtan par mi sems dang // lus kyi sgo nas dam rdzog mi bsrung bar// bku sti mtho zhabs tog mi byed dang // dbu ga
88b4(rnying rgyud): nas dam tshig mi bsrung bar// snyan par mi spra slob dpon ming nas 'bod// yid kyi sgo nas dam tshig mi bsrang bar// mos gus chung zhing gdang ba'i sems dang tha ma// ji srid de 'anga'i gang zag thung gyur na// khong du srul zhugs steng la ma 'bar zhing // shel
88b5(rnying rgyud): gis gtub mgo la thog 'bebs kyang // dam med stong ngan rnams la gong srid do// gnas pa'i lus srog 'bral ba'i nA zur yang // dam med rdo dang na rnams la shor sring ngo // rjes skyong srung mad ma can rgya mtsho dang // oM sh-i rje ga thar pa gzigams/
88b6(rnying rgyud): / 'jig rte di sa marbang rang mang mi bde sa chags dang // dam chag thams pas rtse mdzer yul bar bya// gzhar gyirnam sbyin padag shegs grags pas dkyings// dmachog tams ngas sangs rgyas bkas mi tshubs// rabs dam chag gtan ga steng bas lha byar
88b7(rnying rgyud): bgrang / lus dag yang gsum de mtshig ldan pa yis// hud 'dir gis steng bas lhag par rmongs// rjod ldan ga' tsham zung tsam gtogs par// snod med rnams la nor bzod dopa// dam med rnams la shor ba rjong dka/ dad med rnams la gor ba
89a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ gsas / nga sa ma da smra/
89a2(rnying rgyud): rgya gsum pa'o// / mad+ha/ sangasacas mnyam byung nganags pa can po'i nang mazad pam bral ba 'di yangs so dogs so// thab/ gta ya shes ba par mig tu chen po 'di
89a3(rnying rgyud): mkhor dga' rang rnas bsdus nas tshig dang la su sa sa nas sa chu 'jam dpal ba nas gtan la bshang/ ngas thar skyes dgal bshang / ngas a can tha ma dmapa bshad // ga bang mang byung gnasangs// kyi kyigams pa// sman
89a4(rnying rgyud): gsum skyes bu'i dan cha dang // chos rnams kun gyi mchen mo// kun bskyed rang gzung tshugs shing rigs// sras thal ni gas la rgud chen sbas// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam skor don// thos pas ma bsgom la mo ltos shing // bstan pas rtogs
89a5(rnying rgyud): shing dran pas gas // 'thad pa sna ba mazung pas sol// 'thas pa la zab pa cas// yid bzhin na rgyal yin// zhags pazlang ya gtu gsong pa nga 'di ba// mtshangs la ba zang chul tsho // 'argal thod nyams pan
89a6(rnying rgyud): snying dang man namig zas yon// bdag kyang thas chung ma yin na/ ngang 'chang dang mthun pa sa smrab// dekying thugs cigs ga 'di// gnas pa'i bar dag te gtsigs na// las 'bro drud pa med ngas byung/ tsho par ri
89a7(rnying rgyud): la bdag/ gsang dmadal bsrung ngas thar to// sa bang pazlam thong ngas dogo 'tshal/ bram 'khrum phrag 'dor bad// gsum la dpagatad thun la min/ ngas labab na 'gro na meng // nyan drung du thob la sra la dzin grongs// chung mchog rnan
89b1(rnying rgyud): bu dgas nas// rgyung 'dugan lags ma dums// gcab kyang gtar bdun par// rnam sa thags kar sbya banak+ta/ skrag ga pa pa 'byin par zhar// gtsug na yang gta nga smras so// sgrab cal lang thar bar 'byung // gcig
89b2(rnying rgyud): riri'i phug// gre'u 'i lo la 'byin par 'gyur// de yang 'dir ni ma gu tshang // yang gter rlung gsum bu yi tshul// ci'i phyir ma yi bcud bsdus pa'o// don gsal rgyang mchog ma yi tshul// ci 'dod bun bskyed ring gzhung thogs// de ltar zab kyi thugs gter yang /
89b3(rnying rgyud): yang gter thams su 'di ma bstan// da lta sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// 'dis sngon phyir na chud sor bzhang // 'grel pa'i mun pas g.yogs ta re// TI ka'i skar mos badz+ra ma ta re// lung drangs lho tshal bsus te // de phyir bka' rgyud rang sor zhog/ dron
89b4(rnying rgyud): 'grol dka' na bla ma bsten// tshogs brgya rtsa dang maN+Dal dbul// zhib tu dpe blta na la dbyang / bltas pas grol ba kho na'o// shes rab blo ldan snying rje can dang 'thad par shog/ ci'i phyir gsang sngags ngo bo shes rab yin// wI/ u ts+yai/ chu n+ya r+ya/ e ma
89b5(rnying rgyud): bdag 'das shin chos dbang la// dus gsum sangs rgyas bka' babs te// gang po'i chud mchog 'di 'dra ba dag/ chen ngo mtshar dan song// sbrul srams kyid 'a zhugs// gtsu 'i sdang nga na dang seng gis// glo bag la tha~Mng gon paT// sum bu mo la zhes
89b6(rnying rgyud): chos bris// de las byung ba'i dge ba zhis// kun gyis chud 'di rtogs grol shog// rgyag swA dang / sad+d+ha ba d+ha sa ga la tar+tha/ bod skad du/ chud thams cad kyi kyi rgyal nam mkha' 'bar ba'i chud/ ming med mtha' bral dngos med zang ka la phyag 'tshal
89b7(rnying rgyud): 'di sa kyi yang mthos pasam pa dang migs pa'i thal pas 'das pa'i dus mtha' med pa san gnas tsarnal mam 'ab ban/ kyim pa cing med pa rnam pa 'gas// bsan pa'i rgyal pa gtang ma mangs parjod/
90a1(rnying rgyud): / dam parang byung ngang dang sa snang tshang grol la bshad// dus kyi rgyal pa zag mtha' mad ba dus// rdza pa sa gsang bdag na zanaH// danas mar gyi rgyal pa dang byung ngang dang sa zlas// ngan pa'i rnal ma meng me kunam pa la// bras ju
90a2(rnying rgyud): thal sgrar gus pas 'di skad zhus// phun sum chags pa'i don ni de ltar na// sems kyi rang bzhin ji ltar gnas// sems kyi nga de ltar gas pa// sems kyi thugs je ji ltar 'char// sems la yon tan de ltar mnga'// sems kyi srin las ji ltar mdzad// ma
90a3(rnying rgyud): 'di yi nas yod dam med// sems ni sangs rgyas yin nam men// yin na sems can ji ltar 'khrul// sems la ye nas dngos po yod dam mang // sems pa khrul ba yo dang ba med// sems can kun gyi sems 'di mnyam lags sam// sems lan ti
90a4(rnying rgyud): mug yong ngam med// sems la dug lnga drug gsum yod dam med// sems la dbyibs dang kha dag yod dam med// sems 'di rtogs pas sangs nus sam// sems nyid rtogs pas sangs rgya'am// sems dang rig pa yid dang gsum la khya par yo
90a5(rnying rgyud): med// dbyings dang skye med ye shes gsum la khyad par yod du ma med// sku lnga ye shes lnga dang nyon mongs lnga la khyad par yod dam med// snying po stong pa rig pa gsum du chos rnams ji ltar grol// grol bar byed pa'i gdams ngag gang ltar bshad// sems kyi snang
90a6(rnying rgyud): tshul sna tshogs pa// mdo don gcig tu ji ltar bsdu// sems kyi zag ni gang du bcad// sems kyi la ni gang dang gang du bzang / sems nyid lugs su ji ltar bsgral// stsol bar phyed pa'i gdams pa gang // sems kyi dpe ni gang du bstan// dpe yi thog tu phebs tshe thabs
90a7(rnying rgyud): mi phebs// mi phebs dpe bstan dgos pa med// sangs rgyas sems can gzhi gcig gam// gcig na gnyis su 'ang ba ci// mi gcig 'khor 'das 'bral mad dam// ma rig ye shes ngo bo gcig mi gcig/ mi gcig 'brel po med lags sam// 'khor 'das
90b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi skyes mdo gang tsam lags// klos btags chos rnams yod dam mad// byar med blo 'das gang la zar// thA 'das zhes paTag gis btags ma btags// btags na zlos btags ngas dang khung bar cang yod dam// ma btags zar nags btags gang nas
90b2(rnying rgyud): thung // snang btags chos rnams gang du bsgra// chos med sgra nad mtha' rnga gang du bskul// dngas pa chos rnams la bkra de ltar lags// zhes du tshig ni bcus gnyis pa bdag cag 'das pa'i dakhor rnams pa shin tu nab par gsung dugs pa// zhes lda srapa ma// dam lakha
90b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ lteng ga'i phran su ma rdzogs pa dang / 'khor gyis gleng ska ba zlas pa'i le'u ste dang pa'i// / de nas rang byung dang dngas kyis// sen pa'i rgyal ba med med kun grol la// sems kyi rang bzhin de ltar gnas// sa klas pa dang / ston pasang khor lda dang phrul
90b4(rnying rgyud): pa// sems kyi rang bzhin bstan tu ma mchis te// 'khrur ba rtog pas pa pa'i phyir// mun thong gsar sram lwa bur bshad// 'kho rnams ma yang gus pas ston// sems kyi rang bzhin gnas lpags brtan pa ni// rang bzhin stong pa lhan grub yin// rang brjin du rten med
90b5(rnying rgyud): yin// rang bzhin 'apa 'gyur mang pa yin// rang bzhin ci yang med pa yin// rang bzhin dngas po med pa yin// sems pad pa med zla ma dang yang med// sems spyi rang badzin gnas lugs ni// steng gas la dngos ma 'a dag rdo byibs dang thul// skye ma dka /
90b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs med ma mtha' yas// dngos meng zad ka gtad med gting mtha' yas// thig la chen po med med po 'das te// ming med mtha' rta mtshigs kun gyi gzhi// rnam pa kun ldan gang dra'ang grub pa med// des na ldan 'don rma me spyod yul grol// zhas
90b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// nam mkha'a' bar ba'i rgyud las/ sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u te gnyis pa'o// de nas rang byung rang thal kyis/ meng med ston pa kun bral la// sems myong bar lta rigs la/
91a1(rnying rgyud): / zhes byas pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bku stsal pa// sems kyang bags la par bstan pa ni// sems kyang brog dag dgas la yin// sams byung bags pa dag yan// sams sbyor ba gting gas pa yin// sangs
91a2(rnying rgyud): kyi ngo bo khong nas gsal// sems kyi ngo bo mkha' gsal yin// sems kyi ngo bo 'od du gsal// sems kyi ngo bo rtsal du gsal// sems kyi ngo bo zer du gsal// sems kyi ngo bo rol par gsal// sems kyi ngo bo spang bar gsal// sems kyi
91a3(rnying rgyud): po dbang po lnga ru gsal// sems kyi ngo bo don snying lnga rugs la// sems kyi ngo bo yan lag lnga ru gsal// sems kyi ngo bo gzugs lha yul lngar gsal// sems kyi ngo bo rnam shes tshogs brgyad gsal// sems kyi ngo bo dbang po lnga dang yid lngar gsal//
91a4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi ngo bo yul krol rig/ sems de gsal dag klong du dag/ ces gsungs so// nam mkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sems kyi ngo bo gsal ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rang byung dang dngas kyis// ming med kun grol ston pa la/
91a5(rnying rgyud): sems la yon tan ji ltar mda'// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems kyi yon tan bsten pa ni// yid bzhin nor las dgos 'dod 'byung ba bzhin// sems la yon tan 'thung lugs bsam mi khyab// yon tan rnam gradas
91a6(rnying rgyud): bshad pas mi langs te// re zhig bsdus te yon tan 'di ltar bshad// ma rig ye shes gsal bar byed pa'i yon tan mnga'// dus gsum sra gsum bsgyur ba'i yon tan mda'// dug lnga ye shes bsgyur ba'i yon tan yod// sems can sangs rgyas bsgyur/
91a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i yon tan mnga'// 'khor ba myang 'das bsgyur ba'i yon tan mnga'// rigs drug g.yangs gcod pa'i yon tan mnga'// khams gsum zhing khams bskur ba'i yon tan mnga'// nyon mongs phyags mas 'debs pa'i yon tan mnga'// rnam rtog chos skur
91b1(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ba'i man tan nangag// spang ba rang sar gul bar yan tan mnga'// dag pa dang rnag byed pa yan tanam / sems cad ming mang rtags pa'i man tan ma dang // ji da ma las maldan par yon nam ngag/ ngaltab bzhin mnyan pa san nas dang // dang /
91b2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad mthun pa'i yon tan medang // mchog mthen pa yi yon tan mnga'// maspangs gnas su dag pa'i yon tan mda'/ ma bsrubs yongs su grub pa'i yan tan mnga'// 'khor ba'i 'das nas 'dzin pa'i yon tan mdang // bu bzhin bcu la
91b3(rnying rgyud): snyoms pa'i yon tan mnga'// snying rje kun la sman mdzad yon tan mnga'// sdug bsngal bde bar shes pa'i yon tan mda'// nam mkha' bzhin du kun la yongs su khyab pa'i yon tan mnga'// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas par// shes pa sems kyi yon
91b4(rnying rgyud): tan yin// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sems kyi yon tan bstan pa'i ledu sde bzhi pa'o// // de nas rang byung ngas kyis// ming med kun rol ston pa la// sems kyi srin las ji ltar mdzad// ces nus pas/
91b5(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal ba// sems kyi phrin las mdzad lpags bsam me khyab// ra zhig sbyin las mdzad lpags bstan pa n+ti// pa rig mun bsrel ba'i phrin las byed// gti mug bag chags spel ba'i yin las byed// sgrib g.yogs man pa 'joms
91b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i glen pas byud// drug lnga nga sa krol ba'i rjen las mdang // sems can sangs rgyas bskur bu'i phrin las mdang// 'khrul gzi rtsad nas gcod pa'i phrin las mdzad// 'khral snang dang sa 'grol ba'i man lasu mdzad// snang ba'i dngos gan grol bar zin
91b7(rnying rgyud): las mdzad// 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dren pa'i phrin las mdzad// sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa'i phrin las mdzad// thams cad sangs rgyas yin shes srin las chen po mdzad// zhe kyis dbang drag lta bu 'di yin no// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' 'bar
92a1(rnying rgyud): / ba'i gyad las/ sems kyi phrin las bstan pa'i les te lnga pa la// de nas rang byung dang dngas kyis// ming med thun po la ston pa la// sems 'di pe nas yod da med// rjes zhus pas/ snyan pas
92a2(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// sems 'di ye nas med mod kyang // ma rig 'gru ba'i rlung 'dis 'khor 'das gnyis// dper na nam mkha'i sprin dang me long g.ya'// gzhi la med kyang shugs las byung // zhes so// de nas 'khod kyis yang zhus pas// sems de le nas yod
92a3(rnying rgyud): martag par thal// ye nas med na chad par thal// rtag chad mtha' 'di gang gis sel// zhes ston pa la lus pa dang / ston pa pa 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems nyid du zhi la gzugs su grub pa med// de yis rtag pa'i mtha' sel lo// rtsal lam
92a4(rnying rgyud): rol pa sna tshogs shar// 'od gsal yan lag dang snang bas// de yis chad pa'i mtha' sel lo// sems nyid gzhi la rtsal thim pas// rtag chad gnyis med mtha' sel lo// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' 'bang ba'i nad las// sems yod med ga ce
92a5(rnying rgyud): med du bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rang byu dang dngas kyis// mid med ston pa phun grol lnga// sems 'di ye nas sangs rgyas yin+dan ma min// yin na sems 'di ye nas ji ltar 'ja la// mi na 'khor bste tshad 'gyur//
92a6(rnying rgyud): zhus pas// ston pas 'khor la dka' stsal pa// sems 'di ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar 'jams// ma rig dbang gis 'khor bar snang // 'khong ba lte ba chad pa ma yin te// 'khor brgyad tshod mya ma dang // zhe
92a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// nim mkha' dbang ba'i rgyud las// sems lenas sangs rgyas yin kyang drug lnga ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba ri le ru ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rang byung dang sa kyis// ming med ston pa phun grol la// ye rnams
92b1(rnying rgyud): yin na sems can ji ltang la dral// sangs rgyas dbu' mthug pa med// sems desangs rgyas min na sangs rgyas gang nas 'tshal// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khong la bka' stsal pa// sems datogs pa mngon du thar pa'i sang rgya
92b2(rnying rgyud): nas ldan thub sangs rgyas yin// gzhi rang bzhin snyan gyis grub pa la// rtsal dang rig pa zer 'bul bas// drag lnga nyon mongs ma rig dbang gis sems can 'khrul// sus kyang ma lanar dngom shes nyes// sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi 'tshal te// sems
92b3(rnying rgyud): nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas yin// 'khor bar ngo shes mya ngan 'das// sems nyid do shes 'khrul du med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud las// sems de ye nas sangs rgyas yin kyang ma rtogs pas gzhi ldan dam pa bsum
92b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rang byung dang dngas kyis// ming med kun grol ston pa la// sems la ye nas dngos po yod dam med// dngos po yod na sems de rtag par thal// dngos po med na chad par lud// de nyid ngas ni lta lags/
92b5(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis nga la dris pa ni// gzhi la 'dri 'am rtsal la 'dre// chos nyid gzhi la 'dri ba ni// sems kyi gzhi la dngos po med// sems kyi gzhi la gzugs su med// sems kyi gzhi la kha dog med//
92b6(rnying rgyud): sems de cang med dngos med tha snyad med// ces gsungs so// rtsal la dri'o zer ba na/ mtshan nyid ma 'gags sna tshogs 'char ba'i phyir// snang srid dngos po'i chos rnams gzhi'i rtsal du shar// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud las// sems
92b7(rnying rgyud): kyi gzhi la dngos po med pa la/ rtsal la dngos po yod par bstan pa'i le'u ste dgra pa'o// / de nas rang byung dang dngas kyis// ming med ston pa kun thom la// sems pa 'khrul pa yod dam med// 'khrul yod sems nga skyon du 'gyur//
93a1(rnying rgyud): bdag pa dab bzhin no// sems la 'khrul pa myed pa la// sems can thams cad dbral bar dgas// deganyis bzang dang ltar bas pa// zhes rten pa la zhus pas/ ston pas 'a la bka' gyur ba// sems dan
93a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul ba med// rtsal la 'khrul sdang ltar sdud kyang // sems kyi gzhi la gos pa med// dper naman shel dag pa'i nang // dkar dmar ldan drug bzang ngan gang snang yang // shel gyi gzhi la gang yi dbub pa med// sman drug snang 'grib pa med// sngan
93a3(rnying rgyud): mi bsrubal da mi srang// shel ga nang du gnyis ka dag/ de bzhin sems kyi gzhe la yang // 'khrul snang cing yang skad mod kyang // bzang po mi bslab ngan ma snang // sems nyid ka dag nga dung ngul ba dag/ 'jal phreng dang pozhin med de sems srid //
93a4(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// nam mkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud las// 'khrul pa gzhi la med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rang byung ring dngas kyis// ming med ston pa kun zil la// sems can kun gyi sems 'di mnyam lags
