115b4(rnying rgyud): nan nas ma shes ldan pa 'dul// snying po'i mthi gas me dgas dag 'di// dzangs dang ngam mang gnyis ga gnyis mying phyin// reg pa ma la ra gyur// bran man med na gyizhig 'thob// rjod ming dang la gag pa gang du med
115b5(rnying rgyud): dang ma nga gini mthong dam // chu'abras tsho sa bam ma zhim skye rnams/ blanan dag ba pa rgya phyir ma na// dod thod pa 'thas pa'i 'a/ dbe par sadag sa byang ngas pa'o// yi gdu mi byed
115b6(rnying rgyud): nga shig/ dbyang na gyi meng rjes gang byung na// rkye nang 'phral phyim rkyen cig gis rjo// dpas mapa thun thapa brtsiga' ma 'dis// mtshad da mthang byangs rtsam la ma// ni yin pa med pa ga nga byung // ma hU~M
115b7(rnying rgyud): srung mingangasal// smon gying byu byen ma mad// mi bdag tar bang byung ba bas med// cang yang mamathang khyab la// rgya' gyi yan lag smra ba'i rim pa rnams// rang nga bamar smrang yang cag pa med// gcis pa mams pa mi ma sa
116a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' 'ang// dbyabs dang 'dag gang yang ba thab pas// 'da'adum rgyan ma pa nga chubasams// srasang ga ma gas mtshal na la dang dkyang // 'khrul rtogs pas dang phyimi gnyis mang thong // mi'agyur ma mags
116a2(rnying rgyud): mtshon bra la dang la bsgoms// 'gro 'ang yangs med bsgom bya sgo mazed med// gzhan med rang sa snying po'i gling bsgom mchog/ gzhan nas thob med rang gnas 'bras bu'i rgyal// rgya dang rkyen meng chos su mkha' mnyam mchog/ rang bzhin kun bya
116a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid thams cad mkhyen// chos sku'i ngo bo 'di zhes bstan du med// thob zla 'thob byed ming med mya mtha' stongs// 'khrul zhen grol tshe bdag gzhan yod ma yin// log pa'i rgyud las grol bas bde chen don// snying po 'khrul pa'i rkyen
116a4(rnying rgyud): gyis rtogs par dka'// ldog thabs gnad kyis gang phyes thad kar gsal// snying po ma yi rtsa ba mtshon du med// 'khrul snang rang drangs mabungango spong mchog/ 'khor 'das chos rnams gang yang mthong med la// 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa
116a5(rnying rgyud): cir yang sdang // snang ba grol bar shes pas bag chags stongs// mnyam rjes gnyis med mtha' stongs snying po rtogs// gnyis bsdus mtshan ma'i ming med mu mtha' stongs// zhes gsungs so// rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i chung
116a6(rnying rgyud): las// chos thams cad yang ti ra la bzla ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas rang gsal rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa blo 'das gsang bdag la zhus pa// chos rnams thams cad snang grol kun brlag par// rtog pa'i
116a7(rnying rgyud): don la dbye bas la ming med kyang // cir sdang ma spangs rdzogs phyir bar dgang // zhes zhus pas// blo 'das ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bang med cing snang snang tshul bas ma 'das pas// bar ngo'i mtshan nyid bsan gyis bzung bar gyis
116b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gnas lugs thog ma'i bar do ru// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis kyi 'byung gzhi btsal// rang bzhin dang ni rlung gi bar do ru// rlung dang 'gru ba gnyis kyi gyes gzhi btsal// rtsal zer shes pa phra mo skyes pa la// rag pa skye ba'i gzhi ma
116b2(rnying rgyud): btsal bar bya// yan lag snang tshul rig pa'i bar do ru// yang mar 'char sgo 'khrul sgo'i gzhi ma btsal// snang ba rnam pa gsum gyi bar do ru// ston pa sku gsum 'byung pa'i gzhi ma btsal// kha dog rnam pa lnga yi bar do ru// gzugs brnyan
116b3(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi gzhi ma btsal bar bya// 'od lnga gzugs lngar 'char ba'i bar dro ru// rigs drug 'khrul pa'i gzhi ma btsal bar bya// thos dang bsam pa shes rab par do ru// mar gyi sems can 'khrul tshul rtsad nas bcad// da lta shes pa snga phyi'i bar
116b4(rnying rgyud): do ru// 'khrul pa bzlog thabs rnam gsum nyams su blangs// skye dang shi ba srid pa'i par do ru// snying po mtha' thol klong du gnas par gyis// zhes gsungs so// rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bar do'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
116b5(rnying rgyud): de nas rang gsal sems dpa' rdo rje des// blo 'das don gyi ston pa la zhus pa// yang ti la shan rin chen ldan ma 'dir// phyi rabs gtad pa'i snod kyi khyad par gang // zhes zhus pas/ gsang bdag ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
116b6(rnying rgyud): dgos 'dod kun 'byung nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gsal ba'i go 'byed thams cad yongs rdzogs pas// theg pa la blo shan 'byed yang te 'di// lha mi'i 'jig rten gnas su drang ba'i tshe// rin chen lta bur sdod ldan gcig la gtong/
116b7(rnying rgyud): ma mkha' lte bur klong yangs gcig la gtod// nyi zla lta bur blogs la gcig la gtod// ma 'ongs bstan pa'i sngon mthed par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// lta ba la shan chen po'i rin po che'i sngon ma rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i
117a1(rnying rgyud): lanas brgya brdzogasas// 6blda pa grub ma ma hA/ sa rdzun pa pa 'byung gnas dang / bang naldan pan ba gas dus pa 'don myu ts+tsha// gang
117a2(rnying rgyud): sras rgya// / kun bzang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mis// thig le zhag gcig sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rtsa chung thig le'i rgyud bshad pa// blo thog ma lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// smyon pa thig le nyag gcig lu// 'khor ni rang byung chen
117a3(rnying rgyud): la// dus gsum dbye ba med pa'i dus// bstan pa gnyis snad med par bshad// ces gsungs so// rtswa chung thig le'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / kye gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rtse rlung theg
117a4(rnying rgyud): le gzhi la gnas// ngo bo tha dad rang bzhin gcig/ thugs rje'i rol pa rang shar ro// shar tshul snang tshul gnyis su snang // de ni gzhi yi rang rtsal las// 'gag pa med pa'i rang byung shar// shar ba yin pas nges pa med// tsa
117a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rtsa rlung thig le'i rgyud las/ skyeng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpa' khod nyon cig/ rang shar rjen po'i rtsa rlung ni// gyi dra shar ba'i rtsa lnga dang // nang du shar ba'i rtsa lnga dang // gsang bar shar ba'i rtsa lnga
117a6(rnying rgyud): dang // yang gsang yang ti'i rtsa lnga dang // de kho na nyid gsang pa chen po'i rtsa lnga'o// de las kyi r+ya shar ba'i rtsa lnga ni// dbyings kyi thig ye lnga yin te// thig le lnga ni stong gsal du// snang gsal chen po'i rgyas gdab po// rig gsal ngang du
117a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrad pas// big la lnga yang gcig tu 'dril// 'byung ba lnga ni rig stang gsal// 'byung ba ldan sprad de// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // mkha' khyab dngas pa'i nga tsun// chags drug rol pa mjo sprasmad pas// 'dang yan lnga dang chags sdang lnga// rang /
117b1(rnying rgyud): la / na / rna dus du / ma//
117b2(rnying rgyud): bya'i lnga ste// gsal byeng shes rab rgyas bdab pas// nang gi rtsa lngagacig tu 'akyi'o// shes rab chen po gcig tugs la// lce des lnga po dbyings su thol// dbyings lnga rig pa'i grong dkrol// dang gro pa rang sha nas pas// de na
117b3(rnying rgyud): grol rnam layin// zhus gsungasas/ rlung theg pa las seM gam pa'i hrI ba ni pa don sem smra khyo nag/ gas ba shA sh+tha / la// dge rnam pa /
117b4(rnying rgyud): par shes pas/ ma bslab ny-i pa nga shi // de lta oMmahA bye pa s+ho// da le g+sa tshal ba ste/ ts+tsha ba chung pa'i grol su na/ ga rkyen la// rnam pa chen po 'o// sbyong
117b5(rnying rgyud): lhag pa la// 'bras bu yul sbeng med pa yin// ye shes ladzin pa'o// bdud med pa dang rgal yin// zhes gsungs so// ma cung drug di na las/ gsang bar dgrol gyi / rdo rjesasas dpang
117b6(rnying rgyud): / dadi khon nyi ge wAn/ gnyis spyang mad pa'i thas rapal// thogs pa med pa'i zhes bgyis// 'gas pa mad pa rig pa la// ring dag lags dang thal du// lhungs kyis shes pa ni ba yin// nas gsungs so//
117b7(rnying rgyud): 'i rlung las/ yang gas tshul gyi ladus drug pa / rnasams dpa'i tshod nan cig/ rgyal par rgyal 'asam ma rgyag/ brdzun rnam pa nyis su 'dus/ chos rnams can na kya dzin// yang
118a1(rnying rgyud): / mi gnyims/ 'di ni yang dgadon na/ gasngagasangs sakun na pa dang bsngagasungs bya'o// ma shesas mdu nadrung // kun na yang ba thugs kyi bdu sams dad dra/
118a2(rnying rgyud): gi thigs pa// dga' ra ba rdo rje'i srog gi 'khor lo/ srog gi chan pa/ srog gi bcud chen po/ thugs kyi reg chod/ rig pa srog gi 'khor lo zhes gsungs so// rtsi rlung gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / 'jam dpal 'das pa'i rgyu las
118a3(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa rdzogs so// / sangs rgyas thig le nyag gcig la// chos su brdal khyab la rtogs par bya ba dang btsal ba'i chos med de/ gang zag blo'i ngos nas gnyis su yod par rdzogs dgos pa las/ rtsa rlung thig le'i ga mas
118a4(rnying rgyud): pa bshad par bya/ de nas gdams pa ni/ rtsa dang rlung dang thig le'i gnad gsum rang grol du shes dgos te// zhig le chen po'i rtsa 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus so// de la thig le gyi ltar bshad pa/ phyi 'byung ba lnga ni ngo bo
118a5(rnying rgyud): gsal te rang gsal du gan pa rang byung ye shes so// de ni phyi yi thig le'o// nang gi thig le ni/ ngo bo rig pa'i ye shes rang shar ngo shes pa'o// gsang ba'i thig le ni/ bsgoms pas ma rnyed/ ma bsgoms pas ma stor/ ye shes rang las
118a6(rnying rgyud): ma gtogs pa med de/ phyi gsal ba 'byung ba lnga ni rang snang chen po'o// nang rig pa'i ye shes kyi mdangs te/ me long dang byad lta bu'o// gnyis su med pa'i thig le chos su brdal khyab chen po dang / ye shes brdal khyab gnyis su med pa'o//
118a7(rnying rgyud): thig le gsang ba gsum po 'di rtogs shig/ rtogs pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa khong du chud pa zhes bya'o// rlung la yang phyi nang gsang ba gsum ste/ thog ma'i gnas nas rig pa bskyod pa gzhi la gnas so// phye yi rlung ni gling bzhi
118b1(rnying rgyud): 'degs pa dang / rang thung du bsgred pa'i rlungadang // nang gi rlung ni 'gro dang skang 'don pa dang bskyod pang // gsang ba'i drung ni 'asgrub dang snyam zed dang thugs 'byung ba'o// rlung gsum da 'ang ma shas kyi drung rtogs na srugasum tha ba/
118b2(rnying rgyud): rtsal yang lce nang gsang gsum ste// gyi yi rtsa ni chos nyid rang byung gi rtsa ste/ 'od lngaste stong pa rang snang du shes pa'o// nang gIH ni rnam rtog rang rig pa'i ye shes rang shar bste/ rig pa'i ye shes so// gsang ba'i rtsa ni dbugs dang 'gyub
118b3(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dbyer med pa'i chos sku zang thal lo// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le gtan la phab pa/ sku gsum lkog bzhengs kyi dgongs pa/ bstan ma thag tu lta skyom la rag ma lus pa las sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa skad cig ma la thob pa/
118b4(rnying rgyud): zag bcas phung po'i nang du/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang mngal ba/ lam ma basmod par rang sar slebs pa/ sku gsum gyi dgongs pa dus gcig la thob pa/ 'khor ba'i mngal kha dus gcig la rgyas theb pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag/ mdzod
118b5(rnying rgyud): kyi gdams pa/ rtsa rlung gi thig le gtan la phab pa/ rtswa rlung gi rtsa ba rdzogs so// / dpal kun bzang sku la phyag 'tshal nas// rdzogs chen bsgom pa'i rgyud zhus pa/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa'
118b6(rnying rgyud): che/ chos nyid lhun grub pho brang du// rig pa 'gag med 'khor rnams la// sangs rgyas sems can dbyer med 'dus// rang shar chen po'i bstan pa la// bsgom pa srog gi spu gri'i rgyud// zhal nas rang byung chen por 'thon// bsgom
118b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i srog la rnam bzhi ste// sems phyogs yongs grags bsgom pa'i srog/ rdzogs pa chen po bsgom pa'i srog/ a ti chen po bsgom pa'i srog/ yang ti 'bru gcig bsgom pa'i srog/ ces gsungs so// sems phyogs yongs
119a1(rnying rgyud): bags 'amam ni// bsgom ma dang dom ma gnyinas 'dang // yang bar 'ang rnag pa gyuman/ med par 'du bcad pa'o nam/ mtha gnas sags nag cang // ga kyi ma
119a2(rnying rgyud): bsten// rdzogs pa chen po bsgom pa na// thams cad rang la rdzogs par 'dod// bsgom gyi skyon la bsgom med skyon// gnyis su med par 'dug pa ni// de la ye shes ma shar bas// sau so rje po'i khru ru gol// a ti chen po'i
119a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa ni// rig pa rang snang rang gsal la// snang ba rang snang gnyis su med// de yi don la gang rtog pa// ma hA a nA sems rtsal du// 'gro ba yin par bshad pa'o// yang ti nag po'i bsgom pa ni// shan dbye la bzlar 'dod pa
119a4(rnying rgyud): ste// shin tu 'di rnams sbyar bar bya// rig pa gsal ba'i nyams kyi pha rgyad du// bde ba'i nyams ni ma rgyud du// stong pa'i nyams ni dbu ma ru// 'od gsal nyams kyi longs sku ru// gol ba yin phyir yang te bstan// da ni la
119a5(rnying rgyud): bzla bstan pa ni// yul dang yul can du mi bsgom// bsgom pa phar la mi bsgom rang shar shes// bde ba mi bde yid bder shes// rig pa'i sgra la gyi nang med// mkha' khyab yul la snang ba med// ye shes lus la phyi nang med//
119a6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i sgra la sku gsum med// phyi ru snang ba longs sgrar bsgom// nang nas shar ba sbal skur bsgom// thig le nyag gcig chos sku la// chos sgra'i bsgom pa rdzogs pa'o// phyi ru bsgrim pas longs srur go la// nang du bsgom
119a7(rnying rgyud): pas sprul sprer gol// gnyis med bsgom pas dbu mer gol// chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang // dang po theg le'i ngang las byung // bar du thig le'i ngang la gnas// tha mar thig le'i ngang du rdzogs// bsgoms nyams
119b1(rnying rgyud): ji skad byung ba yang // dang po bka' mi srad las byung // nga ni nyams la mi sten te// yang ti nag po'i bsgom pa'o// bsgom sa srog gi sa 'i'o// srog gi 'khar po'i chung rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das dpa' dran du bzang po
119b2(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// sngon pa kun tu bzang po yis// thugs kyi skal pa chen po la// dus gsum khyad par med pa'i phyir// nyid las me gzhan 'khor rnams
119b3(rnying rgyud): // rdzogs pa chen po'i bstan pa shar// zhes gsungs so// lbab la thal chen po'i chung nyid kyi zhal res byin brlabs su/ rang bzhin dag pa rnams la babs// chos su tig le nyag gcig la// 'khrul pa med pas sa
119b4(rnying rgyud): med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// blo dang dngos po gnyis su med// chos can chos nyid gnyis su med// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis su med // dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// rnam rtog ye shes gnyis su med//
119b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// lam gyis bcos su ga la yod// ye nas grol ba'i chos skul// lha sgom spyod pa 'ching ba'i rgyu// ye grol chen po phyogs med la// phyogs su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i lam// lha sgo
119b6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa nor ba'i lam// 'bras bu thob 'dod ltos pa'i chos// ye grol chen por shar ba la// rtsol bsgrub byed pa 'khrul pa'i la ma// thams cad rang ljang chen po la// bsgom du med par bsgom pa ni// de ni nam
119b7(rnying rgyud): mkhar lhags pa 'dra// ye nas chos slar gcig pa la// bar dor chos nyid kyi 'dod pa// da ni lam gyi g.yos yin// thams cad ye nas spyan grub la// bar dor 'bras bu 'dod pa ni// rdo ni sa la go las yin// rig pa rang thung /
120a1(rnying rgyud): shes la// rgan po mthar rdzogs pasgom pa dang // rgang mo mdzub tshugs bsgom pa dang // gzhon pa bde ba bsgom pa na// nyams myong ral phyogs ltos med// nyams myong rkyen gyis bskur ba'i phyir// ye shes skyes
120a2(rnying rgyud): pa rkyen khar thal// phyogs la ltos nas rten 'cha' bas// de ni nyams kyong go las yin// rdzogs chen yang te nag po las// phyogs 'dzin mi srang mi 'gogs la// ched du gang phyung po bslab pas// des na spros pa'i chos med
120a3(rnying rgyud): de// rnam ming ni ldan grab yin// de yi mtshan ni rdzogs chen yin// gsang mtshan yang nye 'brug cig len// yang gsang skabal bral rtse chud/ kun tu bzang po'i sgrog gi su waM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi reg tson/ ro mangs pa par
120a4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi srog gi legs pa/ brgyad pa gsum pa/ lte ba la bal gyi rgyud rdzogs so// / zag la nyag gcig sbrul phrag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// chos nyid dbardal ba'i pho brang du// 'khor gyi rdo rje sems
120a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' la// rig pa phyi nang med pa'i dus// thabs dang shes rab bstan pa shar// zhes gsungs so// thig le'i ngang dang byin rlabs las// spyod pa gtan la phab pa yis// thabs dang shes rab chung chen 'di// byin gyi rlabs kyis shar ba'o//
120a6(rnying rgyud): smod pa'i don nyid rnam gsum te// sems las byas pa spyod pa dang // chos lus byas pa'i stong pa dang // yang ti nag paji srid pa // sems kyi grod pa nasngags sate// pangos 'dral ba mngon pa gsum// de yang sems kyi ra
120a7(rnying rgyud): pa yin// ma hA a ru sems phyogs gsum// de yang sems kyi spyod pa gsum// chos kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis// lta ba skam pa spyad pa yang // de yang chos kyi spyod pa yin// zos dang bas ma dang bsgom pa yang // de yang chos rtsa
120b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa yin// zhes gsungs so// yang ti nag po'i spyod pa ni// shes rab chen por 'dod pa ste// snang ba mi 'gegs thug grang khyer// 'ad gsal 'khor lo rgyas 'debs spyod// 'don pa rig pa dang grol bas// yid kyi 'dzin
120b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyas 'debs spyod// yul dang yul can gnyis med pas// dbyer med chos su'i rgyas 'debs spyod// de ni yang ti phyir spyad do// yang ti nang spong bstan pa ni// rang lus 'byung ba'i yid phung la// dbyer med chos sgra'i rgyas 'desas
120b3(rnying rgyud): spo/ 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor ba yis// chos sku shes rab dang du 'char// gzung 'don rig pa'i slad du dag/ de ni nang gi spyon pa'o// yang ti gsang spyod bstan pa ni// rig pa bkag pas me legs te// rang shen dgag bsrub med
120b4(rnying rgyud): par byeng // rig pa gcer bur spur gyis phyungs// sdang ba bsgom pa spun por shod// mig le'i ngang du lhangs kyis zhog/ 'od gsal chen por lhangs kyis gyungs// de la spyad pa'i yul med pa// ye bzhengs chen po zhes kyang bya// gzhi bzhas
120b5(rnying rgyud): chen po zhes kyang bya// ye grol chen po zhes kyang bya// yang nyi nag po zhes kyang bya// gser gyi 'bru gcig zhes kyang bya// thig le'i ngang du shar ba yi// thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud// srog gi glegs pa/ bdud rtse'i byam pa/ sngang byed spa gri'i rgyung
120b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// / bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// 'khor gyi rdo rje sems dpa' la// phyi nang med pa'i chos dbyings su// 'bras bu thob pa med pa'i dus/ thams cad ye grol bstan pa la// yang ti nag po 'bru gcig shar//
120b7(rnying rgyud): gre rlabs kyis byung ba yi// 'bras bu ye grol chen po 'argyud las// ngang la shugs kyis shar ba'o// 'bras bu la yang rnam bzhi ste// phye yi 'bras bu bstan pa dang // nang gi 'bras bu bstan pa dang // gsang ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa'o// rtse yi nga
121a1(rnying rgyud): bu bstan pa ni// gyi yi 'byung balnga po ye shes lnga// nang gi 'bras bu bstan pa ni// rtags kyi ye shes tshon gang la// yang gsang 'bras bu gnyis yinan// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rnga dang // rig pa'i ye shes kun la/
121a2(rnying rgyud): re re la yang bzhi bzhis bskor// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dbus gnas te// thams cad ye shes chen por shar// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las// thams cad 'byung yang dang byung la// thams cad 'gags kyang rang 'gags la// thams cad grol yang
121a3(rnying rgyud): rang grol las// 'bras bu thob pa'i sa med de// dper na rgya mtsho'i nya mo bzhin// gar byin rgya mtsho'i nang du gnas// lhun gyis grub pas thob pa med// pad ma nor bu rin po che// thams cad gcig las rang byung bas// de ni lhan grub chos sku'o// dbang
121a4(rnying rgyud): po rab kyi chos yin te// 'bring dang tha ma 'khyams par mchi'o// rdzogs chen gnad du ma phebs par// chos spyod gang dgar btang ba ni// de ni rdzogs chen rgyun chad yin// rdzogs chen rtag cing ma chad par// dge sdig 'tshal bar spyod pa ni// de ni rdzogs chen drang
121a5(rnying rgyud): thad yin// rdzogs chen rgyud la ma thebs par// thos bsam bsgom sgrub mi byed pa// de ni rdzogs chen rgyal pa yin// ye shes gnad du mi 'dzin par// sems 'dzin phra mo brtsam pa ni// de ni sgron ma'i yid smon yin// sems 'dzin
121a6(rnying rgyud): gcig la yang 'cha' ba// de ni long ba'i lam sna yin// gdams ngag phyogs re ma rdzogs par// rgan mo mdzub tshugs bsgom pa ni// dam par zhen pa'i bsgom pa yin// zhe 'dod gcig la rten 'cha' bas// rgang po mkhar thogs bsgom pa ni//
121a7(rnying rgyud): ni long ba'i lam rgyas yin// bde ba'i nyams myong la brten nas// gzhon pa bde ba bsgom pa ni// de ni gzhon pa'i rmi lam yin// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang po srog gi thigs pa/ 'bras bu ye grol chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so//
121b1(rnying rgyud): bam ldan gan bzang po ste// ldan gru bsgral phrag 'acal nas// zag la mthong brdal rgyud gsungs pa// skyon pa kun na bzang po yis// gnas ni b+hag la myul la thabaH// 'khor na nga byung ye shes la// dus ni thams cad dang byung dus/
121b2(rnying rgyud): bstan ni gnyis med thig le'o// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor gyi rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// thig le mthong ba rdo la rig pa'i 'khor lo bskor// phur bu chen po thob la sgrol// sring gsum dbang du bsdus ma sbyor skor gyis/
121b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa/ rig pa 'gags pa med pa la// shes rab 'gags pa med pa yis// snang sri dpung thob mog gi ca brgyad// thugs kyi gcod bu gro tshe// 'dzin med zhags pa tshod la thong // zhes gsungs so// yang bka'
121b4(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ thig le mthong nas brdol ba ni// tsit+ta'i nang du rab brtags pas// rig pa stong par gsal ba ni// de ni thig le sde brdol yin// nyams myong 'dres pa'i bde gsal ni// de ni thig le nang brdo lnga yin// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa/ thig
121b5(rnying rgyud): le mthong nas ma brdol na// rig pa'i gnang du brdeg par bya// tshogs drug rol pa tang sangs la// rig pa'i bde ba dang shar ltos// 'di ni thig le nang brdol yin// dkar po'i dus su rab tu sbyar// khong nas yid kyi 'dra ba la// 'grubs 'gyu ba'i dus tshong du//
121b6(rnying rgyud): bdegs la nyid du lhang nge blta// de ni thig le nang brdol yin// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed par// rang bzhin nyid du shes pa gsal// de ni phyi brdol nang brdol yin// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa/ rig
121b7(rnying rgyud): dkyi ngos bzung dang // bde srong nyid du nur gyis dbyung // bde ba ting la lha stangs bya// 'od gsal nyid du stongs kyis 'byung // zhes gsungs so// thig le mthong brdol gyi rgyud/ rig pa drung 'byin gyi brda'/ srog gi chan pa/ yang di nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so//
122a1(rnying rgyud): @rgya gar skad du/ tan+ta gra rA dza sAd+haHt+ta praSh+TA n+da la A ka shrA bat+ta bi shud+d+ha sa mudrA bar+t+ta pra ka Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rtse rgyal te zla 'od 'bar mkha' klung rnam dag rgya margya klong gsal gyi rgyud \u0f7fsa phya ba/ sngon thog ma'i sangs rgya bya ma
122a2(rnying rgyud): ka dag la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis ci yang ma thos pa gang du yang mtshon brjod las 'das pa'i dus med pa de/ bkol med gnas su ka dag ston pa des// 'od gsal 'khor la skye med bstan pa bshad// dus ni dus gsum gcig mi med pa'i dus
122a3(rnying rgyud): snyad pa bro ni gas la dag rin po che'o// de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// phun sum tshogs pa'i don ni de ltar na// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs ji ltar gnas// 'od gsal rtsal gyi yan lag ji ltar shang// snying po slong du rtse gas
122a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar grol// de gnyis dbyed med gdams ngag ji ltar lags// thod rgal theg pa ji lta bshad// 'i snying po sI ti n+do ga la// thub mchi ma smos btags yod dam med// gyis gdab blo bral bstan pa la// byab tsal blo mas mi tshal lam// la sgab 'das pa
122a5(rnying rgyud): la// lha sgom spyod 'bram dgos me dgos// theg dgu spang ngas ji ltar bgyi// dkyil 'khor dbang dang dngos grub la// re 'dra ba ma yid mardzogs// tshogs dang gtor ma ma btang ba // tshogs bsags smon lam ji ltar rdzogs// ti pA'i snying po/
122a6(rnying rgyud): sgrib 'khrul pa yod dam med// ma rig ye shes yod dam med// 'char sgo 'khrul pa kyil zer// rtogs dang ma rtogs yod dam med// sangs rgyas sems can ci la zer// dge sdig las 'phro yod dam med// mtho ris ngan song tsal zer// rdzogs chen sti ti yog
122a7(rnying rgyud): yis// ma bsrubs 'bras bu ji ltar thob// zhus chog nyi shu rtsa gcig de// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ shin tu zab par gsung du gsal// zhes zhus so// rgya ci che rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong nam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud las/ phun sum gas
122b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang zhus ci gnyi shu rtsa gcig gi glang blang bstan par ma'u stod pa'o// / de nas gas la dag rin rten gyis// s+ya ma da ga dag ston pa la// dngos po gshes kyi gnas lpags ji ltar gnas// zhus pas/ ston pa'i rgyal ba skam dag dag gas// 'khor gyi dang /
122b2(rnying rgyud): pags li dag rin chen la// rdzogs chen rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pas nyon// don dam mtshon dang brjod las 'das mod kyang // rtsal gyi rig pa blo dang sbyar nas bstan// dper na mun nag rdzas stong la// lag nom btsam pas rnyed par dag
122b3(rnying rgyud): snang gsapa smod me la brten nas// btsal bas rnyed par ba tshom med// de bzhin ma ga sun nug gi rgyas nyid na du sbyor ba/ skad rdzog gis rnyed par dag // mnor tha mang zhal dran gyis// den rjen pa rda yis rnyed par 'brar // mal la ho mtshar che ba'i bka'// dngos po gagis kyig na
122b4(rnying rgyud): khrig gi// gtis gA rjes shAr le nas gnas// zhesang sangs snang yigs gnas// 'dod chags smras par smris gnas// dgral sngags sa dpyong med min// thag dag na ma pa de ba'i bya// sdug bsngal la spangs sgra la krol// dgagasum ma spangs sngags
122b5(rnying rgyud): / ga ngas meg na tha gling gas rje pa da pa nga/ ga drim da me pa pe pa ma mamangasas na par thong/ thang pa pa kyig/ seM nga ba zhing 'ams sbyin pa byes// srog bsngal ma spangs 'dis
122b6(rnying rgyud): na pa dbyung // b+hanangs spangs phral bam pa/ rgya ma thal// bab masna sa dag ga thu med pa bral// gang nam srung sa dbyibs pa med pa gra// dngas pag shes kyi gnas cigang te// lenas na par gnas// ngas gangal bar ma gsu
122b7(rnying rgyud): // gdag chen pa yi sa gnas// blamung rje ba gzigs sagasu ma// gte seM na par men pa gang// gnyis ban ga par mags sa so// rgyun med pa men pa gnas// mtha' ba dpang mi gsung mas// gtanangs cas babyud med pa gnas/
123a1(rnying rgyud): #/ pas dgrub par ma gsungs so// dngos med chen por ye nas grol// zang thal can por yenas grol// spyi thung thod rgal chen por gnas// nas gsungs sa// rkad kyi rgya rgyal nya spa da 'a bar mkhang klong nam dag tha spang gas
123a2(rnying rgyud): kyi g+had las/ dngom pog shes kyi gnas sngags bstan pa'i 'a sa gnyis pa'o// de nas gsal dag rten chen gyis// kye me ke ga napa la// dadags pa rgyal gyi yan lag de ltar shang // nus pas/ na
123a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos po gshes kyi rtsal zer gnyis med kyang // 'khor gyi rtog pa bsal phyir shar tshul bshad// mkha' klong rnam dag gnas lugs klong dkyil nas// ma 'gags 'od gsal rtsal rnams shar// gzha
123a4(rnying rgyud): rlung nga yi rtsal du shar// 'od gsal nga yi rol pa'i rtsal// shes rig ma 'gags rol pa'i rtsal// ngo bo rang bzhin nga yi rtsal// dus gsum yid 'khor nga yi rtsal// ma rig ye shes yan lag rtsal// 'char sgo 'khrul sgo nga yi
123a5(rnying rgyud): rtsal// kun gzhi rig yi dang yi rtsal// 'khrul lugs rnam gsum nga yi rtsal// 'khrul sprin phung ljang yi rtsal// btang bzung zhen pang y-i rtsal// phyi nang snod bcu dang yi rtsal// yul sems gnyis kang yi 'phral// dgag
123a6(rnying rgyud): bslab gnyis 'dzin rol pa'i rtsa la// spang len dbye bas la yan lag rtsal// bzung ngan rtsis gdab yan lag rtsal// 'khor ba kyang 'das yan lag rtsal// bde dang sdug par yi rtsal// dgraganyen phyogs ri sa nga yi rtsal// phyogs mtshams
123a7(rnying rgyud): kha dog yan lagazul// kun btags rim dgra yan lagaN+Dal// 'gro ba rigs drug yi rol par shar// rtag chad rnam gnyis ral bar shad// grub mtha' rnam gnyis rol pa'i rtsal// grub mtha' ma rim pa'i rgyal//
123b1(rnying rgyud): 'dad pa ca la yan lag ma// 'gras cang rig padang yan lagacal// rtags cad ma lus ral par kyal// 'chad chad brjod cang byams ca dang martsal du gang // zhes gsungs sa// bya ma nyag 'da'ab ma nga dpad
123b2(rnying rgyud): nga gsal gyi rjed pas/ 'odagasal rgyal dang yan lag bstan pa ga ste gsum par// / de nasags pa dag shin chen gyi// me ka gaston pa 'o// snru 'dugs la /
123b3(rnying rgyud): na pas la po bka' sa pa// mkhad thong rnam dag chos dbyings snying por// dang ngo sa myer ba stong du thim// khor rje snying can kyang du grol// sa ngags pa 'od 'bar ste
123b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ngo bo snying po'i slong dupo la// ma rig ye shes snying po'i grong du tshul// 'cher gro 'bul sgo snying po'i stong du grol// gti mug ma spangs mi gnas slong dgu pa// ma rig ma spangs me gnas slong du gros// zhib gsogs ma spangs mi gan
123b5(rnying rgyud): grodag pa spyang po mi gnas stong dag pa// snang phrad gra brdung rnyeng pa nga krol// 'ar dang phreng 'das 'ang spyod pa pa// ba dang sdug pasam kying ba gang du thos// babang nga na spang min snang nga // dbyapa la
123b6(rnying rgyud): dgag tan rdzogs des phyi ba nga du bas// ga ga zang 'drin snang ba / gros// dgan mad meng ba'i nga bral// drin med pasam dzad snying pa'i slong dugapa// dgang phum ba grol// rnam rtogapa gzugs
123b7(rnying rgyud): bran btags rim dgu ba'i slong du grol// grub mtha' lte skom thams cad snying zab klong dgrol// mtshon zad btags zede dang po'i gling du krol// byab rgyam rtsol bsgrub ma byas par// rang bzhin shugs kyis de grol// klong nas rgyal zer slong ngagrol/
124a1(rnying rgyud): / rkang las kun thung gang ba byu // mad las ga chags med par thal// thas thung yang dag byung cha dgral// thal byung ngartagasang bar grul// gzugs sasang cang ba dgagags blasas// sraskad thams cadag gus ngags du
124a2(rnying rgyud): grol// dran rtog thams cad sangs rgyas thugs su grol// khams gsum sems can lus dag yid gsum de// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra gsung thugs su grol// snang srid 'jig rten 'khor 'das thams cad kun// sangs rgyas zheng khams 'od gsal chen por
124a3(rnying rgyud): grol// zhe 'dod rtsol sgrub byas nas grol ba ma yin te// thog ma nyid nas ma spangs mi gnas grol// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong grol// blos btags chos sde brgyad khri bzhi stong grol// dper na sbal gyi mdud pa bzhin// 'ching mkhan grol mkhan med par grol// de bzhin
124a4(rnying rgyud): rtag chad chos rnams ma lus kun// ma bcings ma grol snying pa'i klong du grol// dper na rnga ma'i mdud pa bzhen// mtshan ma sna tshogs rang grong nyid// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud las/ snying po'i klong du 'ong
124a5(rnying rgyud): gsal grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// snying po'i yan lag gnyis med ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// chos nyid mkha' klong snying po
124a6(rnying rgyud): klong dkyil du// 'od gsal rtsal zer yan lag ma lus thim// snying po rtsal zer gnyis med thog mar ye sangs rgyas// grwa btsal rtsol bas ma bslabs par// mkha' la 'ja' chen thim pa 'dra// nam mkhar cho 'phrul thim pa dang // 'o mchu dang 'dres pa dbyer mi phyed// de
124a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gzhi rlung gnyis su 'dres pa dbyer mi phyed// rlung lnga 'byung lnga gnyis med dbyer me phyed// 'od lnga zer lnga gnyis med dbyer mi byed// shes pa snang tshul 'gyu med dbyer mi phyed// rang bzhin ba thugs rje dbyer mi phyed// dus gsum srugs ma gnyis med dbyer mi phyed// mid//

125a1(rnying rgyud): / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag stan pa la// blo 'das thag pa ji ltar bshad// zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// blo 'das rang la brjod med kyang // 'khar gyi rtog pa bas la phyar bshad// yang taN
125a2(rnying rgyud): zla'i snying po theg pa'i spyi phud 'di// theg pa'i gong brgal rdzogs chen gnya' gcog yin// nyi zla'i snying po theg dgu thod zhal 'di// 'di go kun go'i chos su bshad// 'di rtogs kun rtogs chos su bshad// 'di shes kun shes chos su bshad// 'digs
125a3(rnying rgyud): kun gsal chos su bshad// 'di bcangs kun yod chos su bshad// 'dir zhugs kun gyi sgor zhugs yin// 'di bris chos kun bris par bshad// ci'i phyir zhe na chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud sde yin// theg pa kun gyi spyi phrad rtse rgyal yin// brgyang bri bzhi
125a4(rnying rgyud): gsal bar ston pa'i nyi zla yin// theg pa kun gyi gter mdzod lde mig yin// btags chag kun gyi zhing sa yin// thams cad bskyed pa'i yab yum mkha' spyod b+hag yin// kun gyi sa bon gzhim rtsa ba yin// kun gyi rtsa ba gcig rtogs pas// kun la dbang bskur thob pa yin//
125a5(rnying rgyud): te 'di yis chos rnams gtan la phebs pa'i phyir// bstan pa'i yang snying 'di thos pas// 'di thos gang zhig thos pa'i mchog/ dper na mchog rabartse nas ri bran thams cad gsal// 'byung chen nam mkhar 'byung ba thams cad gsal// gnams gnyis su skye
125a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro thams cad gsal// za 'og snam bur dang sna sna tshogs gsal// bsam 'phel nor bur rin chen sna tshogasags pa// dkyil 'khor chen po sa tshon rnam ljags la// phye yi rgya mtshor chu bran sna tshogs gsal// de bzhin chos kun rtsa rgyud nyi zla'i snying por gnas// sems
125a7(rnying rgyud): ses btags kyi rnams ril ba rags pa// ma hong la~M bkang can 'di lta ba// gzhan nas mi 'byung sa pa la// rang blang ngam tshad khrid par can// dragagasu ma sbags ma yin par bshad// drug pra sde pra man par bshad// ma rig 'dags pa chen por bshad// gti mug gdas/
125b1(rnying rgyud): chen par bshad// nam rtag zam nyid can por bshad// mtshan ma chas rnams gzugs par bshad// zlabacal mad par chos su bshad// rtsol slab mad pa chom su bshad// gang dang mdapa'i chosas bshad// ! s+thAm smad 'bras mdapa chos su bshad// dang ma thab la pa/
125b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i chos su bshad// sgra dang ye shes dang la tshang pa'i chos su bshad// bro zad grub mtha' stongs pa'i chos su bgad// mtshon brjod dmigs las 'das pa'i chos su bshad// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong nam ngag tum ma blang gsapa gyi byad las/
125b3(rnying rgyud): blo 'das bshad thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pago// de nas gsal dag rkyen chen gyis// kye me ga dag ston pa la// nyi zla'i snying po yang te yog la// khrab mtha'i smos btags yod dam med// ces zhus pas/ ston pas 'khong la bkar stsas pa//
125b4(rnying rgyud): zlas btags gro la phul// krol yul langs pa med// blo bral ma zad sangs mis// dephyir pa tinyi ga snang ba'i rtog pa'i// theg pa dang / mtshom mi dgas// 'on kyang yang tam rtogs gang bag la// theg pa dag la lta sgom bstan// mu stegs nyan nam dang bul dang //
125b5(rnying rgyud): ma dbu ma byung sems dang / khre ma log sub la/ mA hA y-i mus ti / de yi thab mtha' blos btags ni// rang dang dkas nagasal gyir // rlob btags pa snyed 'dir ma bstan// nyi ng+ga'i snang brtags pa la// de rnams po yin dgos pa med// dzin kyang bakhrul rdzongs mi shes nas
125b6(rnying rgyud): zhig chog gi smon mes don gyi dper mtshon pa// dngos po'i chos can gcig la ni// mu stegs tag lta bas ni shes shing rig pa ngo bor btags// de yang rdzas su grub par 'dod// rtag 'dod la dog dbyibs kyi tshad// rang rang lus dang sbyar nas ni// snying dkyil nyung 'bus na tsam sa// ba
125b7(rnying rgyud): dgang cang rnam pa 'dzil// des gsu mas// mu rtags pa'i smra // med thas pa med pa da// legs la pacwa kyang bzhin// dgag med// ces gsu sa// nadapa ngas kyas ga na// chos ca gang drang gcig pa // nyan thas tha gas ma
126a1(rnying rgyud): tha pa da/ bla zag pa 'byur ba ba dang bcas par dang // de'ang gdungasas kyi la thub// yul na sa brda lang dang / zhes gsudum sa// rangs tu 'dod don// nga' sul rnam pa dang // dam shams ma
126a2(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// sems tsam pa'i 'dod pa ni// rnam pade dan ma ldan rnam gnyis te// sems tsam nam bden lta ba de// dgar dam sna tshogs sems kyi snang bar 'dod// 'jig rten lams ni sems tsam mo// zhes gas saso// mtshananam na /
126a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa med par// rang rig rgyan gyi rtag par 'dod// sngam sngams su byas nas// phyi ma gyi ma 'bras bur 'dod// de yang gzung las kyang // shes pa bder te rnam pardzun// mi rnams pa ni gyur po snang // 'jig rten pa la sems tsam mo// sem ni yang dag dngos ma yin//
126a4(rnying rgyud): pan // nam gsum mo// dbam pa pa sems ma dud pa'adang pa dang / rnam pa dud pa kyang// de yang mab da pa dag// me 'ad dang sa byan ma/ mag par bya // thab gyi ma pa medags bden chub// ce
126a5(rnying rgyud): lam lta bu la sogs pa// s+thA ma'i dpe brgyad bzhin 'o// rnal byor spyod pa'i lta ba ni// yul te rnam pa gang zad yang // rtogs car bshigs pas gcig mgrub// gcig mgrub pa'i gtan tshogs kyis// mtha' ba'i thal mo snang par gnas// stong pa btso cud spros par mtha' brgyad 'ad
126a6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// da kyi rgyam ti zla 'dang bar mkhang kyang rnam dag rgyamatsho sbyong gsal kyi spyad pas/ mtshan nyid zhe gsum gyi grub mthang bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// kye med ka dag ston pa la// kyai kyang ste gsum zag pa'i
126a7(rnying rgyud): ltar lags// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kri yA pa yi lta ba ni// yul gyi rnam pa snang ba ni// rigs gsum lha yi sku ru 'dod// mtho dman 'jam rtsub rigs gsum mgon// u pa ya yi theg pa ni// bri yar spyod la yo gang blta// gnyis ka'i rgyud las gzhung

127a4(rnying rgyud): da// ny-id la gang gis daphags nan// snang ba'i rnam pa ga la yang // ming 'dags med par theg sa sno la laH// dag dang mdag med pa nga / zug chen da ma// 'ams gas pa sngag pa sngal med par 'dakas zung bul// sangs rnas sems ca
127a5(rnying rgyud): 'grojug gnas med par// tham btags ming ngadags ma pa thal// rdzas zad pa stor natsha pa bsam las 'das par grog// sa can tham bral sa// rang ma nga med med pa gra y-i// zhes gsungasas// rgyud kyis rgyal tiH da' ba mkha' thang
127a6(rnying rgyud): rnam dag nA ma nakyang gsal kyi rgyud las/ ga na pa yang te bstan pa'i pe'u skye brgyab // de nas gas pa ga na rten gyis// bye da kadag sbyin pa la// rlung dam b+ha thal bstan pa la/ byab kyil rdzas mi 'tshal lam// zhes
127a7(rnying rgyud): tham/ smon pas 'khar la bka'asal pa// yang tu 'i byung po la// thab tsal rtsal slab me dgos te// ma bcos dang sang grothabs sa bya// sa rnams thas cang smras pa nam// pram ga yi gas ma pa pa med// ud pa dam pa cing spyad kyang / na
127b1(rnying rgyud): dan pa chags padapa ma/ bdas ba sa sa'am// stabargyal bas su bdus // brnams pasam tha gam pa mad// bzlum pa d+hal bas bslab yang// rungasasma bu spyod pa mad// da la bas ba ba ma// brlabs bcub ba slab mad// yang /
127b2(rnying rgyud): rtsol bas bslab tu med// phrin las tshol bas bslab tu med// dam chog rtsol bas bsrung du med// sa la ma tshol pas bgrod du med// cir snang cing srid lta ba la// lha dang mi lta rtsol sgrub med// rig za dang bras tshad grol ba sa// bran de bcad pas banom du byed// ga sha sa
127b3(rnying rgyud): smod pa las// rtsol bas ched du smad du med// kadag 'od gsal dam tshig las// ched du bsrung zhing bsdam du med// sbyang bgrod ye med grol ba las// sa lam stangs shing bgrod du med// 'bras bu yi slong mtha' stongs pas// yid smon dog brtsol 'amed//
127b4(rnying rgyud): 'i snying po la// zhe 'dod bu rtsol ma byed de// byar med lhag par bzhag pas chog/ ma bcos rnal ma rang sang zhog/ ched dri rtsol bsrub gang yang med// 'gro yin gro yin rang sa gropa// sdod kyin sdod kyin rangs dgrol// nyal gyin nyal gyin rang sang grol// tha yin
127b5(rnying rgyud): yin dngas dgrol// su gagen sdug gin rang sar grol// srid byin skyid kyin rangs 'grol// gang na gnas kyang ma chags rang sar grol// ci la spyod kyang mazhen rang sar grol// ji skad smras kyang grag stong grol// ci chos gang yang mnyan grol// gang la reg kyang ma
127b6(rnying rgyud): btang ma bzung grol// sde ljags la ba'i shes pa la// yid ldum bslabs zang bal grol// yid rig brgyus kyang ma bzung grol// skye med 'gag med sna tshogs kyang // sna tshogs spyi med klong du grol// dngos med dngos po ji snyed kyang // ngang dngas dngos med grong du gro
127b7(rnying rgyud): cang med cing snang de kar grol// stong pa'i klong nas kun 'byung stong pa dang du grol// rtsal zer rig sems 'od gsal chen por grol// 'gru ba dran pa glo dang rtog pa yang // ngang dngas rang sangs snying po'i slong du grol// dros btags chos rnams thams cad kyang // ched du dgag/
128a1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub rtsol bsam spangs par// ka dag dngos med skye med byar med blo bas 'das// gnas lugs snying po cheg chod pa// chos nyid yang dag nges pa mnor pa// tshig rtso chos lnga ldan grubazang nal yenas grol// ye dag mags pa ye grub la gnas
128a2(rnying rgyud): yang ti nyi zla'i snying po la// de gdod bya btsal rtsol srub ga la yod// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse tshul nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgyam gyi klong gas pa gyi rgyud las/ spyi 'das yang nye bya ba tshal blo zos mi dgos par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa/
128a3(rnying rgyud): de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// rtsol ba slub 'das pa'i theg pa la// lha sgom spyod 'bras dgos mi dgos// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yang ti rtsol rdzab 'das pa las// lha sgom stod 'bras blo li yul//
128a4(rnying rgyud): blo yi yul las nges pa med// blo yul ma zad sangs rgyas chos mi zad// des na yang ti nyi zla'i snying po la// zhe 'dod lta bde sems dang bral// dmigs pa sgom pa'i sems dang bral// bya rtsol spyod pa'i sems dang bral// de dogs 'bras bu'i sems dang bral//
128a5(rnying rgyud): thag le mthong brtol sems dang bral// zhe 'dod gzang gtad lta ba med// ka dag 'od gsal bsgom pa la// dmigs gtad yid gzung bsgom pa med// dngos med byar med rnalam la// bya bcol med pas spyod pa med// gsang ba'i yang snying blo das la// gzhan
128a6(rnying rgyud): nas rnyed pa'i sangs rgyas med// ye nas sku gsum ldan grub la// ro dogs 'bras bu yongs kyis med// ming med phyogs bral rtogs pas lta ba med// kadag skye med rtogs pas sgom pa med// dngos med rnal ma rtogs pas bsam du med// som lhag pa bag yang
128a7(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas spyod pa med// ye nas rang 'khrungs rtogs pas 'bras bu med// rtag zad po las grol bas lta sgom med// blo zad nyon mongs ye brlag yid sngon sangs rgyas med// yang ti yog rtogs pas na// rig med sems med chos rnams med// ces gsungs so//

129a1(rnying rgyud): / la// rabang byab 'am man mchags// zhes nus pa dang / dpas pa ga stsag// tu namabyung ba'o// 'dug pa byas 'bang ba dang sa tha' du sa byung rgyabasams kyad dul ga sa// ga ma
129a2(rnying rgyud): srir mi re// mkha' klong rnam dag chos dbyings dkyil 'khor na// rang byung snying po'i lha tshogs ngang gis gsal// da gdod mi bskyed ye nas rdzogs pa'i lha// spyan 'dren mchod bstod mi byed ye nas rang la rdzogs// dngos grub gzhan nas mi re rang gi sems la du// dkyi
129a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan nas mi bre sems la rdzogs// sa tshon dkyil 'khor 'dus byas yin// 'dus byas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig/ de phyir rang byung sems kyi dkyil 'khar ni// rang bzhin po thugs rde gsum// thog ma dang po'i dkyil 'khor yin// 'dod chags de snga
129a4(rnying rgyud): gsum// bde gshegs gsum gyi dkyil 'khor yin// sems can lus ngag yid gsum kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// snang srid snod bcud 'jig rten rnams// ma bras 'od gsal dkyil 'khor yin// skye 'gro snang srid sems can rnams// ma skyes yongs
129a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs lha tshogs yin// snang bsgra yi dkyil 'khor yin// sgra grag gsung gi dkyil 'khor yin// dran tog thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// stong gsum 'jig rten ma lus kun// ye gdod ma nyid nas ka dag yin// rang byang 'od gsal chen pod// gsal dag / sgrib med dkyil 'khor yan
129a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor de ltar rdzogs pas bskyed mi dgos// snying po ches dbyings dkyil 'khor la// rang thA ste med gtso po brdzags// ro dgas la shar phyogs dkyil khong la// gdag slob med kyi tshogs gnas// lho phyogs rang bzhin dkyil 'khor pa// rang byung sangs rgyas lha yang bzhugs//
129a7(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs rnam rtog nub pa'i nub phyogs na// dang gsal khye zung ye nas ma bskyed bzhugs// spos brtags brgyad khrim rje stong byung ba'i byang phyogs na// blos brtags mtshan ma grol ba'i lha yang bzugs// mab byed yongs su rdzogs par bzhugs// rigs lnga cha mthun khyad pa nga phags/

129b2(rnying rgyud): xxx

129b7(rnying rgyud): xxx
130a1(rnying rgyud): gsal kye rgyud las/ yang te gnas lugs kyi dkyil 'khar bstan pa'i le'u ste brda bzhi pa sa// de nas gsal dag dan chen gyis// skye mad ka dag ston pa la// dkyil 'khar chan pa da ltar na// dbang bskur thun
130a2(rnying rgyud): brlab 'tshal mi 'tshal// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs chen yang ti rtogs pa la// byin brlab dbang bskur mi dgos te// rang sems gdod dag skye med nam mkha' la// thig le mthong brtol ka dag nyi zla shar// ma rig las dang nyon
130a3(rnying rgyud): mongs ye nas brlag/ de dag 'od gsal chen po'i dbang rdzogs so// snying po 'dus ma byas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rig gsal dang dngas khye'u chung la// thig le khong gsal bcud bsdus dbang bskur bas// rang grol zang thal dbang thob bo// mkha' klong
130a4(rnying rgyud): rnam dag chos dbyings dkyil 'khor du// sems rig dang dang sa khye'u chung la// thol byang ngang dngas dbang bsrung bas// rang byung dang dang sa dbang thob po// rin chen gsal dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du// rig pa dang dngas kun byed khye'u chung la// byar med rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i
130a5(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bas// bro zad chos med gtid rdzogs mtha' yas dbang thob bo// dbang bskur dbang bskur byar med de// rang sems ka dag dang la rdzogs pa la// rdzas dang bum pa'i rten med kyang // byar med blo 'das dbang bskur pas// rtsol bral ming med dbang thob bo//
130a6(rnying rgyud): dbang ni rang sems skye ba med// bskur ba ka dag chen por bskur// thob ni 'pho 'gyur med par thob// dbang ni dang dang sags la dag ste// gsung ni dngos med rnam mar bsrur// thob ni zang thal dang byung tog/ dbang ni stong pa kun tu 'byung // bskur ni 'dzin pa rang
130a7(rnying rgyud): dag bskur// thob ni namadag ye shes thob// gzhan gyis bsrung ba'i mkhan po med// rang gi sems la ye nas rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal te blo 'od 'bar mkha' slong rnam dag rgya mchi klong gsal gyi rgyud las// rdzogs chen yang ti rtogs pa la dbang dang
130b1(rnying rgyud): byin gzhananas mdags par bstanapa 'du sa byas/ dan sa sus padag da rnams// rtswam gdag tan pa// chogs dang gtu ma pata ba // gas pasags ldan pa dang dzugs// nas us
130b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rdzogs chen yang ti yog la// tshogs dang gtor ma mi dgos te// tshogs gsog gtor ma dgos na yang ti min// ci phyir rtsol sgrub yid smon yin// yid smon chos kyis sangs me rgya// de bas yang ti yog la// tshogs dang gcor
130b3(rnying rgyud): yinas rdzogs// me nas dang pa ga gas// tshogs ni sdang srid 'khor 'das te// hral tri gang gnyen par tshul// dkyipa ni rang thang sde ma dang skyes// rdzogs ni dugs dag gsamaste// phra ni snyam sngags ma thal// dkris pa'on dbang kyis
130b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs ni mtshon ma'i rnam rtog ste// phul na rdzis gdab med par phul// dgyes ni chos dbyings klong chen dgyes// gtor rje khros btags chos rnams gtor// ma ni chos nyid rnal ma yin// gtor ba grub mtha'i sgom gtor// mni lta sprod bslab pa med// tshogs
130b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis ma bsags yin sa rdzogs// sleb gnyis ma spangs ye nas dag/ tshogs dang gtor ma ma btang bar// ka dag snying po'i klung du sbyar// tshogs gsog byas pas deng kyi sgrib// sngon lam zhes pa'i rang bzhin kyang // 'dir btab gyi mar mar ro// ston la mag
130b6(rnying rgyud): yin yid sngon te// tron la ma zhus pa'i 'chog yin// smon pa'i sangs rgyas dang la rnyed// de nyid thar lam 'gro ba'i lam// des na smon lam zhes su bshad// ka dag skye med klong gyur pas// sngon lam ma btab menas rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// byu rgyal
130b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar mkha' rjod nam dag tum gyi klong gsal gyi hud las/ yang tenye na'i snying pral rdzogs gtod smon lam me dgas par bstan pa'i labri gle ba thugasa'o// / de nas gas pa dag na rje gyis// skye med ka dgason pa la// yang ta zla'i snying po la// gabacwom
131a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa yod dam med// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ yang ti nyi zla'i snying po rtogs pa na// gol sgrib 'khrul pa gang yang med// ye nas thog ma'i don rtogs gol du med// skye med ka dag rtogs pas sgrib pa
131a2(rnying rgyud): med// byad med thong das rtogs pas 'khrul du med// ye shes spyi lpags rtogs pas theg par gol sgrib med// yang te yig rtogs pas na// gol skye ba tis stong lnga bcu yang // chog gi gong thog thog pas gcig tu tshod// gos rdzi bzod pas 'dul
131a3(rnying rgyud): gang yang med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rje rgyal te zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud las/ yang tata zla'i snying po rtogs pa la gol sgrib 'khrul pa med par bstan pa'i le'u steb tu bdun pa'o// / de nas gsal dag
131a4(rnying rgyud): chen gyis// ste med gdug ston pa la// ma ga yo shes yod dam med// 'cher sgo 'khrul sgo ci 'a bar// zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal ba// yang ta nyana'i snying po la// ma reg ye shes gang yang med// dper na te zla'i snying po la// mun pa
131a5(rnying rgyud): pad ma gsungs so// de bzhin ka dag stong pa mi// 'od gsal de la ma rig med// bag chags sleb medag rdul sgo med// ye dag rang gsapa ye shes la// snying po klong du gyur pas 'char sgo med// thig le mthong ba rtol gsal med la// mngag yod par ma mthong ngo //
131a6(rnying rgyud): rig ye shes rnam gnyis kyang // rnam rtog blo la gnyis snang te// yang ti'i don rtogs gnyis gamed// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// ma rtogs rtogs pas lam du gcig/ 'char sgo 'khrul sgro gang yang med// thig po spyi rtol rtogs pas na// 'char sgo med la dakhrul
131a7(rnying rgyud): med// dper na mtshan mo'i mun nag la// sU rla gsal ba'i nyi shar ngas// mun pa ma spangs 'od du gsal// 'od dang mun pa nam mkhar gcig/ de bzhin ma rig sgrib g.yogs la// thig legs la dag nyi shar bas// ma reg ma spangs ka dag chen po dgas pa
131b1(rnying rgyud): bag chags sleb gamags 'dags la can par gsal// gti mug chas su rang bzhin gcig/ d+hu rkyen 'ab 'gyur mad pa 'dan rtags nas// snang ba yang dag man rangs pa' lam// skye med ka dag gyur mang zla 'das yin// dngas mad thang thal mang ma da rtags pas/
131b2(rnying rgyud): 'char sgo khrul sgo gnyis ka med// de phyir thog mar ye sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud las/ yang ti nyi zla'i snying po rtogs pas ma rig ye shes 'char sgo 'khrul sgo med par bstan
131b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// rtogs dang martogs yod dam med// sangs rgyas sems can ci la zer// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yang
131b4(rnying rgyud): pa// gas dang togs baspya sa/ da rnamam zag/ sa dngas rtags gsayin gas mdun sa // gdag sa bral rtags pa la// ma da kyis ga/ pa pa med kyi
131b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs med kyis ma shes shig/ shes yul med kyis ma shes shig/ shes rgyu med kyis ma shes shig/ shes mkhan med kyis ma shes shig/ gang gis gang rtogs ci zhig rtogs// rtogs na sems de ji ltar 'jug/ shes na gang shes cis ci shos// shes pa'i/
131b6(rnying rgyud): d+hin zhig 'dug/ stan pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// thams cad rtags pa'i rtags rgyu med// cang me nga dang sa chen pa yin// tha snyad tsam ste mtshan tu med// rtag pa pan dang sa mad grol// shes med pa ni shes shes rgya'i dngas bgrol// bye ma dka dag das
131b7(rnying rgyud): po'i blo las 'das// tshig gis shes rtogs gang yang yod ma yin// kun shes kun rtogs gang yang ma btags bzhag/ rten med ka dag 'od gsal blo 'das so// zhes gsungs so// rang grol rang gsal gleng gyur pas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ka med//
132a1(rnying rgyud): stong pa kun 'byung stong par sangs// rang byung rang grol rang sangs rgyas// gti mug mun pa ka dag rgyas// sangs rgyas gzhan na med kyis ma re zhig/ ye yin klong gyur ro shes pas// sems can 'khor ba med kyis ma dogs shig/ gnyis
132a2(rnying rgyud): med gnyis su dbyer med pas// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med gnyis ka med// ces gsungs so// glang kyi rjegal ten 'ad 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag nu ma klong gsal ci chung bas/ rtogs matogs sangs rgyas sems bdag ni la byed med pa
132a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// dge sdig las 'phro yod dam med// mtho ris dran song ci la zer// zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rdzogs chen yang ti yo ga la// dge
132a4(rnying rgyud): ba mi bsgrub sdig mi 'gegs// rang sar grol zhing skye med rtogs// dge ba ched du mi byed mtho ris skye ru med// sdig pa ched du mi byed ngan song kye ru med// dge sdig gnyis po ched du ma byas pas// mtho ris ngan song de dogs g.yang sa med// las 'phro mi len 'di ka lta bur
132a5(rnying rgyud): stsol// ci ste las kyi dbang gyur na// rang byung ye shes ga la yod// mtho ris ngan song bla dwags yin// yang dag don la mtho ris ngan song med// skye med ka dag rtogs pa la// ngan song ltung ba'i rgyu yang med// thig le khor gsal don rtogs pas// mtho ris ngan song
132a6(rnying rgyud): rgyu yang med// ye yin rang sar grol gyur pas// las 'phro mi len mu mtha' bas// ka deg ming med don rtogs pas// mtho ris ngan song skye ltung med// dge sdig las 'phro'i khar mi 'od// rgyu rkyen chos la blo mi gtod// dge sdig gnyis la rten mi 'cha'// chu
132a7(rnying rgyud): 'bras gnyis la rag ma lus// bya rtsol zhe 'dod de dogs med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od nga'abar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud las/ yang ti nyi zla'i snying po la dge sdig mtho ris ngan song med par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
132b1(rnying rgyud): de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// sangs rgyas bya ba yod dam med// dmyal ba bya ba ci la zer// zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal ba// thig le mthong brtol don rtogs pas// sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas rnying yang
132b2(rnying rgyud): med// rnyed par 'dod pas bskal pa brgyad mi rnyed// sangs rgyas gang yan bla dwags yin// b+hU dgas chog la sangs rgyas min// sangs rgyas gang yin zhe 'dod yin// zhe 'dod sangs rgyas dgos pa med// sangs rgyas yod 'dod yid smon yin// yid smon
132b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dgos pa med// sangs rgyas med pas sangs la rgyas rgyu med// 'dod pas mi myong ngo dogs yin// sangs rgyas med kyis ma re cig/ dmyal ba med kyis ma dogs shig/ re dogs gnyis med mtha' chod cig/ ye shes gting rdzogs mthong brtol//
132b4(rnying rgyud): pas// dmyal bar lce ba'i rgyu med do// dmyal ba'i gnas med ka dag klong // dngos la dmyal ba'i rgyu med pas// dmyal ba me lce'i phreng ba yang // byang chub sems kyi zhing khams yin// 'dod chags sprul pa'i sku ru rdzogs// lha ru skye ba'i g.yangs bcas/
132b5(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang longs spyod rdzogs skur rdzogs// dmyal bar skye ba'i g.yang sa bcad// gti mug chos sku chen por rdzogs// byol song skye ba'i g.yangs bcad// nga rgyal po nyid kyi sgra// lU min skye ba'i g.yangs bcad// phrag dog don dam bde ba'i bla//
132b6(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i g.yangs bcad// ser sna dbyer mengs ru rdzogs// yi dwags skye ba'i g.yang sa bcad// kwa dag ming med blo 'das rtogs// dmyal ba la sogs 'gro drug med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgya la nyi zla 'od 'bang mkha' glong rnam dag
132b7(rnying rgyud): che slong gsal gyi rgyud las/ yang ti nyi zla'i snying po rtogs pa las nges rgyas dmyal ba med par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig // / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// b+he med ka dag ston pa la// rdzogs chen yang ti yo g.yas// ma bsgrubs
133a1(rnying rgyud): / 'bras bu ji ltar thob// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal ba// nyan 'aglang po yang tol// 'bras bun pa dang yong gnyis med kyang // rtsol bas 'bras bu mi krung // dri zhig 'khor bzod pa zud byung
133a2(rnying rgyud): bshad// ro dogs 'bras bu ngas ma bshad// yid sngon 'bras bungs ma bshad// zhe 'dod 'a bras grangs su bshad// bya btsal 'byas bungs ma bu shang // tshogs bsags 'bras bungs ma bshad// gzhan nas 'bras bu ba ras ma bshad // gzhanan
133a3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu thob pa ngas ma bshad// sngon thog pa nas rang pa rang chas ldan// gnyis med khrong du ka dag dang krol la// dzaM ka le spyi brtol gsang ba'i yang steng bskrun// stong gas 'jo dang bar grong dkyil d+ha// theg po yang gsang bcud bsdus pas//
133a4(rnying rgyud): le kho rags la 'bras bu'o// chos nyid gsang ba'i pho phreng du// ye shes gting rdzogs ka dag pas// gting mtha' yas pa'i 'bras bu'o// mkha' grong rnam dag dkyis dpyod du// rtse med ka da 'das ngas// sa mthang yas pa 'bras bur// byab
133a5(rnying rgyud): rtsal bas mas pa thas pas// yod med da bribs pa med pa ste// me skyed chen po nga lo// kang kyi medad po med// thar med dbras bablongs dngas// byang tsal ni 'dod pa rlabs pas// gas spyo phru gyi rnye po par snang ridi// rang byung mang grol
133a6(rnying rgyud): rang sangs nyid du grol// bde gshegs gsang ba'i snying po'i bcud 'di rtogs// re dogs blo yis ma bsrungs pas// ye med gtid med yod chu ci yang med// thig le khor gsal ye shes zang bral lo// stong pa'i klor nas kun 'byung bas// ngang dngas rang sangs rang
133a7(rnying rgyud): grol lo// bya btsal rtsol bas ma bsgrubs par// 'ad ka rang du grol ba thob// bslabs nas gzhan nas thob pa'i 'bras du min// ro zhig 'bras bu'i ming btags gong ltar ro// zhes gsungs so// bud kyi tho byab nyin 'od 'bar me khang klong rnam dag rgyamatsho klong gas pa
133b1(rnying rgyud): sa cud las/ yang ta nya togs pas ma bslabs 'bras bu nab par bstan pa'i phe'u sde nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsal dgra na chen gyis// smye med ka dag ston pa la// nAd su mtshan bshad nga ltar bshad// ces zhus pas/ ston pas 'khong
133b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// chud gsum rje rgyal nyi zla'i chung du 'dus// rgyud rnams kun gyi rtse mo byung rgyal bas// rgyud sde kun gyi spyi phud rtse rgyal yin// de phyir chud kyi rtse rgyal rgyad// nyi zla 'od 'bar rgyud chen dang // mkha' klong rnam dag chung chen dang // rgya mtsho klong gsal
133b3(rnying rgyud): tud chen dang // de gsum rgyud kyi rtse rgyal spyi phud yin// de nas 'khor gyis zhus pa la// nyi zla 'od 'bar rgyud kyis don ni gang zhig bstan// mkha' klong rnam dag rgyud kyis don ni gang zhig bstan// rgya mtsho klong gsal rgyud kyis don ni gang zhig bstan// zhes zhus
133b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyi zla 'od 'bar rgyud kyis ni// nyams gsal ba'i go yang 'byed// snang gsal go babyed 'od gsal chud// snying po ka dag ston pa ste// ye shes gsal dag mtshon pa'i rgyud// 'od chen rab tu 'bar bas ni// gti
133b5(rnying rgyud): mug ma rig mun pa sel// bag chags sgrib g.yogs ka dag rgyud// mun pa'i smag rum sangs te rang sar grol// gsal ba'i go 'byed nyi ma'i rgyud// tsan+da zla ba'i rgyud kyis ni// mtha' yi mun sel 'od 'bar chud// ma rig mun pa sel ba yin// ma rig ka dag ye shes
133b6(rnying rgyud): gsal// rmongs pa'i mun pa sel ba'i skad// zla ba'i 'od 'bang ma dag gti mugasangs// nyi ma'i 'ad 'bar snang gsal ye shes rgyas// dpyir ti dra 'od 'bar gyud // zla ba'i 'od 'bar thabs kyi ldad// nyi ba'i dod 'bar shes rab rgyud// dpyir thabs dang zhes rab
133b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med chung // mkha' klang rnam dag rgyud kyis na// mkha' ni rig pa'i 'odags la mkha'// klong ni snying po chas nyid klong // rnam dag 'khrul pa rnam par dag/ de phyir mkha' klod rnam dag rgyud// mkhar niHla zer 'od gsalal// klong ni rnying po ka dag zong // nam
134a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa sa rnams dgags// / ga san su byas/ da
134a2(rnying rgyud): / dang da 'angs pa //
134a3(rnying rgyud): su
134a4(rnying rgyud): nam yo las 'as// gas gdasags mas na da
134a5(rnying rgyud): gsal rgyud// mun gtad med rten med bstan// mchos ni dmigs med g.yo med bstan// stor ni bar med snyos bral bstan// gas labs mi dag slob med dun// des na tu mtsho klung gsal chud// rgya mchog med ka dag lta ba ba// slong gis gapa mang rnal
134a6(rnying rgyud): sgom pa bstan// gsal gyis lkug pa bag yangs so bde ba// byar med spos bral spyod pa bstan// kyad kyi thog ma gar mna' dra// ye shes rgyun du gnas pa'i phyir// snying po tshun chad med pa'i rgyud// sngon rdzogasus nas thams// med can du gnas pa'i
134a7(rnying rgyud): skye med ka dag snying po'i rgyud// gzhi drung ngus nas da lta'i bar// 'od gsal rgyun du gnas pa yis// snang gas pa 'od ba gsal dag chung // ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi ce rgyal nyi ng+ge da'angang mkha' slong rnam da spangs gyud pas/
134b1(rnying rgyud): dbye mtshan bshad bstan pa'i ladra sa nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin can byas// sre me dag dag ston pa la// rgyud 'di bstan pa'i skal ldan ji lta bu// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'dzod la bka' srung ba// dper na
134b2(rnying rgyud): ma yang // rin chen gser zor grags pa las// sdod ngan phal du bzhos gyur na// bcud kyang 'bo la snod kyang cha// de bzhin nyi zla yang ti yang // snod ldan 'ga' la bstan pa las// snod med dag la bstan gyur na// chos kyang shor la rang yang bajug
134b3(rnying rgyud): des na snod kyi khang nga ngag rjes// rgyud 'di bstan pa'i skal ldan ni// smas pa mi 'gyur ri rab lta bu'i sgo// snying rje phan sems che zhing dkon mchog mchod// bla ma gtsug khur gdapas dag snying la 'chang // dam tshig gzhung nga srung rnam smin las la 'dom/
134b4(rnying rgyud): gdung drung // tshe dga' sdig spyod chags sems can// g.yo sgra lel mi 'jobs kyis bkra// log sa byed cing sgo srang 'debs// slob dpon gas de nas rang che 'byin// ga yo dang rlabs kyis man dag 'bring// lag tu thob nas zong du 'tshong // de lta
134b5(rnying rgyud): ngan la// yul mkhar snor kyang mi sbyin no// de lta bu la byin khyer na// gnyi brjo ga yang la ldang ba bzhin// gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nye bla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho gling gsal gyi chung las/ chu dag dang
134b6(rnying rgyud): rjid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i le'u gnyer bzhi pa'o// ut+pal bsten pa 'byung ba'i dus ji tsam na lags/ zhus pas/ nga yi yang snying ni zla 'di/ spu dang gsung gi bstan pa drug// gsang sngags thugs kyi bstan pa dang // lnga brgya dus kyi rnam la// dus par
135a1(rnying rgyud): gra sa kyad/ d+ha la khams dang // mngag dang/ ngasu sa das pa da dru gang // ma na ma/
135a2(rnying rgyud): tshang nyams myong sa ma na// sdod pa pang tshol phreng srin mo ces dgengs// man ngag slong bskang rje brdzun gyis dgyed// rdem tir ches nor 'dod cing sreng yar rung \u0f7f// ri khrod brims pa'i rnam 'byor byed// rbal lpagag gas
135a3(rnying rgyud): par byed pan cing bsri dang gadra// de ltar byas papa stong na bang mang // mirung drug pa'i thung ba dra// bdag gi gi nyid kyi mad du// rgya bas da/ 'gros 'dru ba de theg
135a4(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i khrims me nug// btsun mas dang sridus mi thab// btsun pas mda'i rtseg byed pa'i dus// btsun nas b+ha pa / bye mo so/ nga dang du ga/ lan gcig da// bra yi dus gcig maH// zhes gsung so// da
135a5(rnying rgyud): dag mamam kyang gas da can/ rdzogs pa cad pa yang te/ a na kri ba d+ha dang / brdzabs pa dpa la brtsegs kyi 'gyu rgya gta / brtags pa trag zag dang du sa/ rang yang ga dang b+ham
135a6(rnying rgyud): nyon/ gter na/ gas kyi/ gdaH/ ma/ gsadang / za // rtag sa dang / nAtas d+ha / sasapa/ dan da rjesems dpang mig ba tu ba dbang mi tshig rgyal bar rgyad byas tha ba
135a7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpa na pa pa chags pal// 'di dbang ga ga thong ma du gcan/ dpa gshegs pams cad ga pa gan cid me dun / rdzanas thams pa ngas pa ga gas nga /
135b1(rnying rgyud): sems sams dun ta/ dkya da ngas na/ byags bcas na nas rgyal ba dus// bka' banas thugs rdza dang bsgrub// rdo rnasams dpa nga ma nga// 'ang ga rten dang khams dang ga na// nyes byas rnam ldan thams padag datan pa yod tudangan/
135b2(rnying rgyud): ces bsgo'o// rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje 'dzin// nyid dang sprul pas 'di skad gsungs// dus la bab bam de bzhin bgyi// nyes byas rnam smin sprad pa ni// ngan song na rag gnas nas drangs// de nas ston pa kun bzang dang // ku ni rig rnam par snang mdzad nams// mi ga yo mnya
135b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang la bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams de bzhin no// de nas ston pa rdo rje sems// gnas kyi dang po 'og min du// lag na rdo rje rgyal sras 'khor// 'khor ba thugs rjes bzung ba'i dus// 'khor ba dong skrag 'gyod tshangs gsungs// chud mchog rdo rje brgya pa dang /
135b4(rnying rgyud): gas sa// ma sa su dag/ / rim pa bzhid du byed // dang dang sa // gag sa / 'do
135b5(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sprul pa lag na rdo rje yis// 'jig rten rgyal ba rab 'byams dang // rgyal sras sprul
135b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig rtsa ba nyams pa yi// slob mas slob dpon nyes byas de// 'dul dang 'dren pa'i dus bab ba ma// 'gro 'du ga thugs rjes gzigs lags na// nyes sngon sngon byung d+he yi chu// zhes mkhyen bzhin du spras pa dang // kun bzang rdo rje rnam
135b7(rnying rgyud): snang gis// sprul pa gnyis la bka' stsal pa// rgyal sras 'khor 'dus sngon zung ni// 'jig rten mi mjed zhing khams 'dir// bram ze dung gi phreng ba can// rgyal ba rnams la bsnyen bkur ba'i// rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can
136a1(rnying rgyud): / gcig/ bas mtha' drang khrod gnas na bkud// mkhas pa kun gyis dger kyang // yul khams myong ba'i rgyal khyong bus// bskyabs grangs rig pa rdzogs byas pas// chal ba'i gangan bram ze gnas// rgyal bu phrag dog sems dang nas// /
136a2(rnying rgyud): bram ze sgrub pa la// mkha' 'gro tshogs kyis brda' bstan pa// rna'i 'byor gser sdod drag g.yos pa// drug can snod la 'bros par 'os// nyes smin sras sems 'phrul bar nges// zhes pa'i dam tshig pa dang gtong zlas// dang dbyed ba ni dados pa bzungapa/
136a3(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyal bus bram ze bos// myos chang blung nas rngan byas pa// dbang po'i dngas ma mig la yang // lcags kyi zur ma phra mos gtsag/ tshig sgo gsal byed sde yang ni// lugs kyus drangs te spu gris bcad// lus ni dras sbal khrag gis brags// tsag
136a4(rnying rgyud): zang mo byas// lus pa rje ga nyi ba byas// dang pa'i mi pa ci kyis pa// rag tshong bzhi byeg/ de da na byes bdag tan/ brji pa ngas padas// reg seng du nga yang med// tho
136a5(rnying rgyud): bral// 'gul ba'i stobs med bud med brdzis// rus sbal khrag byugs chu bur dang // rgong pa la sogs nad rnams byung // dran pa dang yang rab rib 'dug/ rtabs te bram zer bsam pa la// 'di ltar bdag la 'di byung ba// snga ma'i las kyi rnam smin nam// 'on te
136a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi phrag dog gam// mnyam par bzhag ste bltas pa las// rang gi rgyal bus rngan byas mthong // de nas bram zes dmod pa por// kye ma kye hud rgyal bu khyod// lo dang zla bar bslab sbyangs nas// reg pa'i gnas la mkhas byas pa'i// lan du 'di
136a7(rnying rgyud): 'dra ma ngan byed pa// khyod ka skye ba gcig 'dir yang // tshe thung nad kyis lus gzir la// sems can phul po gcig tu skyes// dmus 'or+ya lpags pa mdze lkog dang // shaM bkra ba la rdzag chu bur dang // rkang lag zhar khums dbul po dang // lus la sha za'i tshang 'char
136b1(rnying rgyud): doka/ tshe 'phos nas kyang na rag gnas// khwa 'khor sdug bsngal thar med shog/ de las thar nas pre ta ka/ tir+ya ka yi kha 'khor shog/ dus dang tshe rabs thams cad du// 'phags pa'i zhal ni mi mthong zhing // byang chub mA ku sngo bskam sho ga/ ces dmod pa por
136b2(rnying rgyud): sa byas dam nyams rgyal po de// de nas tshe ni mur du yang // lus la nad sna mang pos 'phos// rang gi nyes pas rnam sbyin dang // bram ze'i dmod pa smon lam gyis// sems can lus sral gcer bur skyes// lus la nad sna sna tshogs byung // sha rba stong gis tshang
136b3(rnying rgyud): yang bcas// byang chub myu gu sngo bskams nas// na ngag gnas na sdug bsngal spyod// tsha grang brdung btsog gsheg gtubs las// de bzhin pre ta ti d+ya 'khor// rnam smin sdug bsngal de spyod pas// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// thugs rje chen po de las
136b4(rnying rgyud): sa// zhes gsungs no// de rnamams dpal log ban pa bang ma ga rgyam bu'i skad pas/ gabyung gi/ rkyen gtam chud la gces pa'o// den pa de rnasems dpa' dang // pablan rda d+ha sa rtsenagyis// skad tshig
136b5(rnying rgyud): gcig pa yis// rgyal ba'i tshogs la 'di skad brjod// de ltar 'dul ba'i dus yin na// thabs mchog gang gis drang bar bya// slar gsol ba de bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa las/ kun bzang rdo rje rnam snang gis// sprul pa nyid la bka' stsal pa//
136b6(rnying rgyud): legs so sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// mkhyen par gyur kyang zhus pa legs// rig pa 'dzin pa rigs kyi bu// gsang sngags dam tshig nyams pa la// na gdong nas sdug pa yi// 'gyod tshangs bshags pa'i rgyal po sgrogs// chos nyid don gyi sgron ma theg
136b7(rnying rgyud): lus ngag yid kyis brtson 'grus phyung // sku gsung thugs kyi tshangs pa thob// ngan song dong skrag sku gsum mthong // phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur gyis// chud drug gnas nas nges par drongs// ye shes lnga ldan chos klu thob// yul med ming gi blo 'dogs
137a1(rnying rgyud): / chad// gsang sngags pa mad rda rdal// thabs mchog ldan med pa bzhugs// nyan rdzas dang sbrul sa thas na// dper na nyan thos 'dul khrims ni// rdzags sa ma btang ba 'dra// chag par gyur nags thabs med// gsang
137a2(rnying rgyud): theg pa 'di// rin chen gser 'dra rgya mchog bzang // gser dngul snod 'dra zhoms yang bcos// sngon ma bzhin du legs par sos// de bzhin gsang sngags dam tshig gi// nyams chag byang yang gso thabs yod// sbyang thabs yangs so thabs
137a3(rnying rgyud): go mang // rnal 'byor spyi khrus ngan song dong sdug brjod// dbang mchog rgyud drug ste sgo chod// yul med sgro 'dogs gnyis med chod// ces lung bstan no// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ nyams pags thabs lung bstan pa
137a4(rnying rgyud): ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sangs rgyas sbeng la 'di skad gsol// kye kye rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// gsang sngags bla med rdo rje la// dam tshig bsdus rgyas ji ltar lags// bslang sdom 'a
137a5(rnying rgyud): pa ji ltar bskang // zhes mkhyen bzhin du zhus so// rgyal ba 'dus pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// gsang sngags 'bras bu'i theg pa la// dam tshig rtsa ba rnam pa gsum// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum mo// yan lag dam chag te
137a6(rnying rgyud): mi spang lnga dang blang ba lnga// shes par bya ba lnga dang ni// spyad bya lnga dang bsgrub bya lnga// gzhan yang nying lag pas ma las 'das// 'bum sde la sogs dam tshig kyang // rtsa ba yan lag shes par bya// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi sgor zhugs pas// dam tshig na
137a7(rnying rgyud): dag bsrung bar bya// slob dpon pi dam slob ma mched// legs par bsrung dang bsrung du med// yan lag nye shu rtsa lnga yang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum du 'dus// lus ngag yid gsum bag yod bya// chag nyams thams cad gsum las byung // su gsung du
137b1(rnying rgyud): kyis lus ngag yang // byin brgyab bshags srung snang bslab dang // rang gakhrang rdo rjegs nyid de// yid kyi gnas chag nyams byung // thugs kyi stabs bshags par bya// lta ba mag pa nyams pa // yin pa 'dab rnam // yid
137b2(rnying rgyud): thabs chen po yin// lus kyi sgo nas chag nyams na// phyag rgya su yi bsgoms pas bshags// phyogs su 'dzin pa nyams pa che// yangs pa med pa sgom pa'i mchog/ de ni lus kyi bshags thabs yin// ngag gi sgo nas chag nyams ma
137b3(rnying rgyud): sngags dang 'don brjod spyod pas bshags// tshul 'chos spang blang nyams pa che// yin min med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ mdzad spod dag gi bshags thabs yin// de ltar ngam tshig gsum bshags na// nyi TaH lnga ma grubs byas te// yan la
137b4(rnying rgyud): tshig bshags su med// ci ste bsrung bya lung byed med// skye med dam tshig shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig mtshon pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang lag na rdo rjes sra
137b5(rnying rgyud): de'i gam du gyon nas mnar med nyam thag de la 'di skad ces bsgrags so// na ra ka b+ha ta tsak+Sha pra be sha ya a zhes bsgrags pas/ de nas las ngan sems can des// sngon gyi las ngan dran gyur te// sdug bsngal gnod nas 'gyod pa skyes// rdo rje gnyis la'o slad na/
137b6(rnying rgyud): kyi ma kye hung kyi hud nongs// 'gro mgon thugs rjes bdag skyobs shig/ thabs mchog rgyal po bsgag tu gsol// slad nas me 'chab mi bgyid do// zhes lde sngags phyung ba las/ de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpas sems can las ngan de'i rna lam du 'gyo
137b7(rnying rgyud): tshangs kyi rgyal pon ngag dong sdug 'di bka' stsal ba/ nyon cig las ngan sems can khyod// 'gyod sems phyung la yid gtod ceg/ ngag sgogs la brjod brkyang phyag 'tshal// zhes gsungs nas 'di brjod do// dus gsum 'jig rten rab 'byams kyi// rgyal ba

138a2(rnying rgyud): rnam ma gas pa// thabs dang gas ba tshog ma brnas pa// gas ba ba gagags lalo// ma tha pa gzhanas du// rje gu ma' ba rnam kya bzung da // dgas mam par rnams rgya tsham pa/

138a4(rnying rgyud): lha'i tshogs la phrag 'tshal lo// me tog bdug pa mar madri chub kyis// rgyal ba rgya mtshornams la mtshang 'bral ma// mdzad pa'i lha ma rnams la phyag 'tshal la// drug thal thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa// mad med bzhi ldan ma pa di thub par srung //

138a7(rnying rgyud): zheg sus pas phyag btsal na// nyams chag kun kyang byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las// zhi ba'i le'u stelnga pa'o// / yang dka' stsal pa/ brtson 'grus lungs nig sas nga nasams can khyod/
138b1(rnying rgyud): 'di nams dbang du gsal la phyag/ chag gsul lus gus mas pas 'amapa// byang chu can pa bya 'khang na// zhab rgyas tad nga bas ma ga las kyang // tha mas mtha bya thabs ma ga rdza dral// 'bar 'thab 'a chags rtag pa la la// rtarang / blangs tu
138b2(rnying rgyud): rgal po mchog/ sangs rgyas spyi dpal khro ba'i rje// tshe mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig te ra 'das pa'i dus na mngon 'byung ba// gdug pa 'dul phyir rus las mi mdang pa'i// dpal chen he rug la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings ting
138b3(rnying rgyud): sa// dpal 'bang rngam pa'i cha lugs can// sgom gnam zhal ma la phyag 'tshal lo// khyi ma dbang phyag rgya la 'khyil mdzad cing // mkha' 'gro mi bzang 'byung ba'i sprin 'gram// gdug pa 'dul mdza kho mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa ma
138b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor na// ye shes sku mchog 'jigs byed rgyan gyis bzhugs// khro mo chen mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur bskur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul pa mo// phra med chen mo brgyad la phyag
138b5(rnying rgyud): / rjeg dang ba nyimatshogs ma ba rtse// shang b+h+yo nang byangan 'o gagrub par bye // byang tham ba'i lag 'tshal la// dpal gyi 'khor chags pa yang ste// mkha' la shugs rgya ma tshogs dbang phyag ma// rdal 'byong ti shub cang bdun /

139a2(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sul phyag 'tshal lo// cing yang sprul pa'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i phul phyag 'tshal lo// mngon par byang chub sku la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mchog 'jam dpal dmar nag yul phyag 'tshal lo// ston

139a4(rnying rgyud): brnyes pa// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin dbyings nas grub pa mo// dbyings phyag lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// chu 'bras byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste// mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// ga Na ba ta'i sprul pa ste// ging
139a5(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo dpal mo'i sprul ba ste// ging mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten khams la mnga' mdzad ma// 'jigs byed dpal 'bar ral pa can// 'dod pa'i ro la chags pa mo// ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// legs nyes ltar 'dzin

139a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / bka' stsal pa/ gang gis sgyu 'phrul khro bo ye// dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal na// nyams chag kun kyang byang 'gyur te// mtshams med lnga yi sdig kyang byang // na dag gnas kyang dang lkugs te// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// daska
139b1(rnying rgyud): a bklags pa dang // dmyal ba'i gnas kyisams can// dran pa slang na rnyed par gyur// phrag bsngal skabs nazhi ba las// dza rje sems dpas 'di skad gsungs// zhang khams rgyal ba rgyam cha dgangs// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bya// mtshams ca nyis bya
139b2(rnying rgyud): rnam smin byang // gsang sngags dam tshig so ru chud// mi dge phal pa smos ci dgos// ga zhig nad kyis nyen gyur kyang // sdug bsngal de las nges par grol// 'go ba'i nad rims byung ba'i tshe// bdag nyid yi dam gsal ba yis// snying po 'di 'arjod des mi tshugs// gang
139b3(rnying rgyud): zhig ngan sngags mtshon brdeg kyang // snying po 'di brjod rang la ldog/ don gnyer lam 'gro 'di brjod na// 'jigs pa'i dgra las nges par grol// gdon 'jigs bgegs kyis 'tshe ba'i phyir// rig pa 'di brjod gdon de 'jil// sems can gang zhig pu 'dod kyang // rig pa
139b4(rnying rgyud): 'di las rabs de zin// nyon mongs dbul zhing phongs pas kyang // snying po 'di brjod rin chen rnyed// gang zhig 'khor sdud 'di brjod na// srid pa gsum yang 'khor du 'dra// phrin las rnam bzhi nges par 'grub// nyams sgrib thams cad 'dag byed pa'i// yi ge brgyas bdag
139b5(rnying rgyud): gis brjod// chag nyams thams cad 'di yis bskangs// zhes smras te/ ngan song dang nas spags pa 'di brjod do// oM A hU~M swA hA/ oM badz+ra sa twa sa ma pa/ mA nApA la ya/ badz+ra satwa/ tA na pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i d+ha mi b+ha ba/ sra ta t+ya ma b+ha ba/ a nu rak+ta me b+ha ba/ su
139b6(rnying rgyud): b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tset+ta shre yaHku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga bA naM/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA maM yul+ya bar+d+ha b+ha pa/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa a/ 'di ni dus la bab pa'i tshe// gsum mam bdun nam bcu bzhi 'am// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad/
139b7(rnying rgyud): bsgom gsal bas brjod byas na// chag nyams thams cad bskang par byed// ngan song gsum las thar bar 'gyur// yi pa dag tu 'di badzad na// dul gsum rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// zhes gsungs pas/ las ngan sems can dmyal bab rnams kyis// mgon po sems dpa'
140a1(rnying rgyud): al la \u0f7f/ zhes snyams// da nas dus gsum gyis sa rgyas rnams kyis/ rdo rjesems dpa' ma/ thugs kyi yang sring ba dag da/ shin na lags sa// bshags pa rgya rnam thagasas zags sa// ga
140a2(rnying rgyud): dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ yang snying gsang sngags bshags pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// las ngan sems can de la ni// sngags kyi snod du rung bya'i phyir// dang po sems bskyed dang byas nas// bum pa'i lha yi dbang
140a3(rnying rgyud): dang // na ra ka gnas nis drang ba yi// gsang ba sngags kyi dbang bskur ro// bum ma rdzas dang ldan thogs nas// las ngan de ye gtsug tu bzhag/ rig pa'i tshigs bcad 'di brjod do// hU~M kun bzang yab yum bum pa na// rgyal bzhi/ khro'i lha tshogs bzhugs// sems
140a4(rnying rgyud): / can khyod la dbang bskur bas// na ra ka stag bsngal bral bar shog/ du da ha da ha sarba nar ka ga te he huM hUM phaTaHhUM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi k+She pa
140a5(rnying rgyud): yadz+dza/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaM ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra mA me mrany+tsa/ badz+rI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya/ badz+ra satwa a/ dz+r-IM badz+ra oM b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M zhes dbang bskur bas/ dus der na ra ka gi gnas de sprugs par 'gyur ro// dbang mchog
140a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i rgyud las/ na ra ka dong skyugs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas sems can las ngan de// yi dwags gnas su yang skyes te// phyi nang gnyis ka'i sdug bsngal myong // rnam smin yi dwags chen por gnas// de nas lag na rdo rje yis// yi dwags de yi
