145a7(rnying rgyud): dbul pa'i dang sang dzang // dbul pa'i rdzun 'thal pas shes// hUM l-i chos dang kri le btapa// de ma pa bul pa ya dpa med// dbazhin du la bas su sernams// yad das pa slal bde nas sul// sbal pa yin pas med pa meng// de'i ni bral pa pa san
145b1(rnying rgyud): kyang // sprul pa nyid dang kwa la mnyam// dbyer 'khrul bzer bas chog/ de bzhin gzugs brtan rjen 'dra// klong nga 'dug kyang zla ba med// de bzhan dngas por snang ba 'di// klong de 'dug ste snang ba med// yod na snang ba mthun nas rtsa// sdang ba gcag la mthun nga med
145b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan nyid dang kri le mnyam// de bzhin sgra brnyan lta bu ste// yod nas ma btags med nas btags// yod na ming btags gcig par rigs// gcig la ming btags don mthun med// sgra brnyan nyid dang khre le mnyam// des na brag cha nyid dang khyad par
145b3(rnying rgyud): med// yod pas me sngar med pas ldang // dper na dri za grong khyer 'dra// klong de 'dug pa'i dus na med// snang ba rang gis med pa yin// med na sems kyi cho 'phrul ltos// sgyu ma'i chos nyid mthong na lta ba yin// mthong med mthor na yin pa med// lta ba yin
145b4(rnying rgyud): ba med pa yin// ces gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ sgyu ma'i chos bdun gyi snang ba med par thag bcad pas bltab rtogs pa'i le'u ste bcu dgupa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'khor 'dras nyon// mthong dam mthong ngam
145b5(rnying rgyud): mthong bar ltos// ma mthong ba na ci zhig bsgom// dper na dmus long 'ga' dag gis// glang chen rtsal ldan laganoms nas// lnga dang mjug ma rkang lag rgyab// dang po gang reg bsgom pa 'dra// de bas mkhas pas legs par ltos// rmi'am ltos shig mthong ba
145b6(rnying rgyud): na// rme lam bsgom pas bsgom pa yin// rmi lam shes nas rmil ma bsgom// l+h+wam mthong nas sgyu ma bsgom// sgyu ma'i gzugs dang l+h+wa ma'i sgra// ska ma'i dri dang su ma'i'o// sgyu ma'i reg dang l+h+wa ma'i chos// l+h+wam legs par mthong bar// lham 'dres pa bsgom pa
145b7(rnying rgyud): yin// goms par gyis shig sbru ma las// sgyu mar spyod shes lha ma yin// khyu ma 'bras med 'bras bu yin// de bzhin melam sreg turnams// de ltar mkhas pas legs par ltos// mthong med mthong nab ltar yin// de dag goms na bsgom pa'o// gnyis med//
146a1(rnying rgyud): @/ spyod pas spyod pa yin// 'du 'bral med na 'bras bu'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas rig 'dzin rgyal po dag mthong des// sangs rgyang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // mgon pa rdo rje 'don pa la// 'dzum pa'i mdangs gyung gus brtananapa/
146a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshogs la 'di skad gsol// drug gi dkyil 'khor gnyis 'dus ltar// bdag 'dam ri gadregs pa yis// yang dag nyid la log bltas nas// za ba'i mchog nyams pa sogs// mi 'chab mi sbed mthol lo bshags// sran chad bsdam mo dpa
146a3(rnying rgyud): gong sa pa// sras dag me gsum cos gyu/ yangs ga nyams rna sa// da tshang sa gas pa ra// sa dag sa ga mangs nas bsgrubs// byed napas sags pa so gyu // 'dran pa
146a4(rnying rgyud): brgyartsa brgyad du bshags par bya// smre 'gyod mthol lo gdung ba'i chog/ brkyang phyag gus byas chog gis bshags// sems bskyed las brtson 'gro ba 'don// sran las bkra shes dge ba bshags// thams cad yul med ming bral mthong // rtogs pa mnyam nyid
146a5(rnying rgyud): bshags// e ma bdag gi phung po'i khams dang skye marjed rnams// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar gyur te// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod par bzhes// bsu rdul phran re res kyang // 'gro ba'i don rnams byed par shog/ ces phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pa phul lo// dam
146a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i rgyud las/ sbrum bshugs mchod ston lam gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag gis/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal mgon lag// rgyud chen 'di yi dpe mtshan ci// gang gi dus su dar bar bgyi// gas gus pas/
146a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpas bka' sbal pa// nyon cig lagan na rjesags// nga mes rgyad ce rgyal po'ang// dper na sems mun pa 'dra // mur zung sngong po'i rgyud zung // dpe nan dang sngar sti'o// sran mchog num po'i myad da nga byeng // dper na ci shing me nya pa// brgal ba'i
146b1(rnying rgyud): tu // dang b.rigs sa'i rtags labs// gus pa rigs pargyang gad nga// da gas sa jas nas// mags cu par jug 'arjod dpa/ mags pang bya byung // thams cag mams cad das blang bas// bzhags ca
146b2(rnying rgyud): chud du rung // 'gro drug gnas nas 'dis drangs pas// 'khor bdod sbags rgyud du zung // thams cad sgyu mar la zlos pos// sgyum mnyam nyid rgyud du zung // snang srid lha dang dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bsgrub bskyed rdzogs dmachog sngags// phyag rgya dbang
146b3(rnying rgyud): rgyud lung dang // 'khor 'das thams cad bltas pas mthong // lta ba dbang mchog rgyud du zung // mthong nas bsgom du med pas na// sgom pa dbang mchog rgyud du zung // spyod nas slad du med spyod pas// spyod pa rgyal po'i rgyud du drang // mthong bas dpung 'dras se
146b4(rnying rgyud): bas// 'bras bu dbang mchog rgyud du zung // nyams sgrib thams cad 'dis 'dag pas// dam tshig khrus lung rgyud du zung // 'khor tshogs 'dus pa khyed rnams kyis// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud 'di ni// dus ngan tha ma dus dag tu// sngags pas dam tshig me bkrung
146b5(rnying rgyud): pas// las kyi 'bras bu ngan song 'khor// zang zing nor gyis mig bred nas// na rag gnas su 'khor byed nas// de dus yis rgyud 'di 'byung // dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// dbul dang nad dang 'jigs pa med// thar pa'i lam skas byed par nges// dper
146b6(rnying rgyud): na mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// mun pa'i smag la gsal ba'i rkyen// nyi zla lta bu rtog byed nges// dper na me dang shing lta bu// shing nyid mau yi grogs su nges// kye ho na ma mkha'i mthong na 'byung ba gnas// sa chu me rlung gang yang sdang // thams cad nam mkha'i dang du thim/
146b7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur to// rig 'dzin rgyal po dge mthong la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang ngo // sprul pa rnams ni mngon par bsdus te/ rdo rje'i sbal skul gtad do// yi ge brgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i chud ces bya ba leng

147a5(rnying rgyud): dang // de nas skyon pa kun pa'ang dang // kun rig rnam par snang mdzad sogs// mi gsos nye ma po dang la bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i gang khams de bzhin no// de nas sto pa rdorje soms// gnas kyi dang po 'og min du// lag na rdo rnga d+ha lasras 'khor

147b2(rnying rgyud): gzigs pa dang // nyes skyon sngon gyid ci yi rgyu// ces pa mkhyen bzhin spras pa dang // kun bzang rdo rje rnam snang gis// skul pa nyid la bka' stsal pa// rgyal sras 'khor 'dus sngon byud ni// 'jig rten zhing khams mi mdzedang der// bram ze dung gi phreng ba can// rkyal
147b3(rnying rgyud): pa rnams la bsnyen bkur bas// rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rig can gcig/ bas mtha'i dur khrod gnas na bsgrub// mkhas pa kun gyi seng ger gyur// de lta bu yi slob dpon la// yul khams skyong ba'i rgyal po'i dus// blo sbyong rig pa
147b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs byas nas// rgal po'i gong na bram ze gnas// rgyal bu phrag dog ngan sems skyes// bla mi bram ze sgrub pa la// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis brda' brtan pa// rnal 'byor gser snod ngan dug g.yo// dug can snod la bros par 'os// ma bros nyes skyon las sim
147b5(rnying rgyud): 'bral// ces pa dam tshig brda' bstan yang // rnal 'byor pas ni bsam gtan mdzad// de nas rgyal bus bram ze bos// myos chad bud nas rngan byas pa// dbang po'i dngas ma gsal byed mig/ lcags kyi thar ma phra mos gtsags/ tshig sgo gsal byed smra ba'i
147b6(rnying rgyud): sngags kyus drangs te spu gris bcad// lus la dus spel khrag gis glags// mi gtsang dam pa'i bud med kyis// lus la brdzi bcag mo nye bar byas// rkang pa'i sbrid pa mtshon gyis bcad// lag pa'i sran tshe de bzhin bregs// de ltar rngan byas bzhag pa na//

151a1(rnying rgyud): gas pag nas gang rnas// bang sa da nas 'phyag ma// mdagasam mams dgarten yang byams // pa dang nga byu ba nga / gyu/ dran ma rlabs sathas na na
151a2(rnying rgyud): gnon tho bo brgyang la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab sems ma yul kyi gzhal yas 'dir// rang byung ye shes thugs las swa sbal ba// zil gnom drom brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i las nyon dug cing khab la// thabs ldan 'bral gyi phyag mtshan pa chags

151a6(rnying rgyud): sal bskyed rdzogs sbyor// ye shes khro mo bcul phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i pho nya mche ga shog sprul pa'i tshogs// ci bgyi'i bka' nyan yang sbal las byed pa// 'jig rten la lo bsgyur ba'i pho nya mchog/ za byed pha bcu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// drag po'i las mdzad lnga
151a7(rnying rgyud): men mgo brtan can// mi bzad rngam pa za byed mgyogs ma 'tshogs// thugs kyi sprul bas phyag tu sna tshogs ston// gsod byed pa btsud tshigs la phyag 'tshal lo// ting nge ma thal las byed du 'phrul can// thogs med kun tu chu ba'i lo gar bstan// sgo bzhi re las
151b1(rnying rgyud): bzad rnams pa phyag 'tshal la// dbang mchog rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las phung ba'i le'u ste bcub la// de nas yang cig thabs sgo bka' skal pa// chos dbyings yum gyi dang las sgra sprul pa// pha ral gyen drug ye shes drug ga dang // thugs rjes sems can ma
151b2(rnying rgyud): lus don la dgongs// dbyings kyi yum dug tshags la phyag 'tshal lo// dgongs spyod rgya mtsho dpag gis mi longs kyang // thugs rjes sems can ma lus don la dgongs// snying rje'i dbang gis ji ltar 'dul mdzad ma// rje mo bcu bzhi'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro
151b3(rnying rgyud): don phyir sna tshogs sgrar ston cing // zhing chen gsar rnying tshogs la longs spyod pas// gnod byed bgegs kyi tshogs dpung 'joms mdzad ma// srid pa ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// mi srin la sogs dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// kun kyang dus las mi 'da' dam tshig
151b4(rnying rgyud): can// gdug pa thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad ma// dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// sku mdog phyag mtshan gcig tu ma nges te// phrin las rnam bzhis bka' yi bstan pa bsrung // bka'
151b5(rnying rgyud): nyan las byed tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal ba'i rgyang las/ ma mo'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang cig thabs sgro bka' stsal pa// gang la gang 'dul de la der bstan nas// so so'i sgrub mchog
151b6(rnying rgyud): yi dam rtags 'chang ba// sgrub pa'i rig 'dzin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ldan grub byug rgya rnam smin tshel dbang // so so'i rigs su rig 'dzin phyag rgya brnyes// rigs kyi rig 'dzin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig 'dzinas la gnyis med ldan gyis grub// rdo rje
151b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid// rdo rje chos mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i gtso// rdo rje slob dpon rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las rig 'dzin rnams kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang cig spangs thabs bka'
152a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ stsal pa// dmigs med thabs kyis sna tshogs sgra gzugs ston/ sku mdog phyag mtshan cir yang sprul zhing bsgyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i las mdzad pa// 'jig rten bstan srung rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i ba
152a2(rnying rgyud): pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes nas// legs nyes lhangs 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod cing // bka' bzhin rjes su bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzad pa// dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten las las grub pa'i dregs pa can// las kyis dbang gis dregs
152a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i stobs brnyes shing // dam tshig dbang gis bka' yi bstan pa bsrung // sngags bdag dam can tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyad pas bstan srung gI le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang cig spangs
152a4(rnying rgyud): thabs bka' stsal pa// las ngan sems can nyes byas khyod// las ngag yid gsum gus pas brtson 'grus phyung // dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dbang du gsol la mthol// dmigs med chos kyi sul phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skal phyag 'tshal
152a5(rnying rgyud): lo// cir yang stsal pa'i sul phyag 'tshal lo// ji 'gyur rdo rje'i sul phyag 'tshal lo// mngon par byang chub skul phrag 'tshal lo// thugs rjes ni ma de lha la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mchog dbar nag dang ma dpa' phrul phyag 'tshal lo// rkyen meng ma chog
152a6(rnying rgyud): gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag don ldan khrag mthung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyes pa'i nad sel bdud rtsi spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// phrin las drag po phur pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// sa dang lam/
152a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rig 'dzin tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa pung mdzod dmatshan tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bgegs sgrol mdzod sngags pa dag tshogs la phyag 'tsha po// zhes gsungs so// rdorje sems dpa' lage brgya pa dbang mchog rgyang pong rgyad pas/ nongs pa
152b1(rnying rgyud): dbang gsol phyag ma na gyi skabs pas/ dkyil 'khor bsdus pa 'i dus brngu bzhi pa/ nga sems dpas bka' phral pa// gang gis rgyal ba na dzul// dkyil 'khod la phyag 'tshal na// nyams cag /
152b2(rnying rgyud): yi sdig kyang 'byang // nar ka gnas kyang dod sngags te// rig 'dzin rtsal ba'i zhing du grags// de skad ces pa bsgrags pa dang // dmyang ba'i gnas kyi sems can rnams// dran pa sbyar na rnyed par gyur// sdug bsngal skabs deng ba sa// rdo rje sems dang
152b3(rnying rgyud): slad gsungs// zhing khams chal brgya mtsho dgongs// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad // thugs kyi yang snang bdag gis brjod// kun nas byin gyis brda par mdzod// g+ha sa ston pasang sa rgyas rnams// dus pasu phul ba'i ldang zhing dang/
152b4(rnying rgyud): med nyes byas rnam sten byang // gsang sngags dmachog so chud// mi dge rnams la spos ci dgos// gang zhig nad kyis nyen gyur kyang // sdug bsngal de las nges par krol// 'go ba'i nad dmas byung ba'i tshe// bdag nyid le dam gsal ba yis// snying po'ang brjod
152b5(rnying rgyud): mi rmugs// gang zhag na sngags mtshon brdeg kyang // snying po 'di brjod rang la bzlog/ don gnyer las 'gro 'di brjod na// 'jigs pa'i dgra las nges par grol// gdon 'jigs bgegs kyis 'tsho ba'i tshe// rig pa 'di brjod gdon ni 'jil// sems can gang
152b6(rnying rgyud): zhig bu 'dod kyang // rig pa 'di bzlas rapas des zin// nyon mongs dbul zhing phongs pas kyang // snying po 'di brjod ngan chen rnyed// gang zhig 'khor bsku 'di parjod na// srid pa gsum yang 'khor du 'du// phrin las rnam bzhi nges par 'grub// nyam sgrib thams
152b7(rnying rgyud): cad dag byed pa'i// yi ge brgya bdag gis brjong // nyams chag thams cad 'di yis rmongs// zhes spras te namang do nas spags pa 'di gsungs sa// ma~M A dz+dza swAH/ oM badz+ras tras ma ya/ mahA pA la ya/ badz+ras d+ha tro no sa tiSh+Tha/ dz+ra d+ham b+ha wa/
153a1(rnying rgyud): me thA tha/ ar+thar// ma b+ha wa/ su po min za/ sarbas d+hi m+be za yaH/ sarba karma su tsam/ tsaH the yaM kurbar+tha/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+hag ldanas rbata thAg ta 'adz+ram me TaH/ badz+ran wamardzas ma pa ba tra ma/ 'di na dus pa babang 'tsha// gsung
153a2(rnying rgyud): mam bdun nam brda bzhi'am// nyi huH gcig brgyartsa brgyad// lha bsgom gsal bas brjod byas na// nyams zag thams cad slong bar byed// ngan song gsum las thar bar 'gyur// yid me dag tu 'de brjod na// dus gsum rgal ba'i sras su 'gyur//
153a3(rnying rgyud): de nas las ngan sems can dmyal ba ba rnams kyis// mgon po sems can la dgongs pa a la la ho// zhes smras so// de nas dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la gsungs pa/ thugs kyi yang snying brjod pa lags so// zhes tshad du brjod de
153a4(rnying rgyud): gnang ba byin no// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyad las/ yang snying gsang sngags bshad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas badz+ra pA Ni les// las ngan sems can de la ni// sngags kyi snod du drang ba'i phyir// dang po'i sems bskyed dang byas nas// bya
153a5(rnying rgyud): pa lha yi dbang bskur dang / na rag gnas nas drangs pa yi// gsang ba'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ro// bum pa rdzas dang ldan thogs nas// las ngan de yi gtsug tu bzhag/ rig pa'i tshigs bcad 'di brjod do// g+hu kun bzang yab yum tham pa na// rgyal bzhi khrong lha
153a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs bzhugs// sems can khyod la dbang bslar rabs// narag sdug bsngal bral bar shog/ du da had has rban rag ga ta he tun rje phaT/ hUM badz+ra sarba sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tIH/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha wa/ su to h+ya ma b+ha wa/ a nu ra k+to me b+ha wa/ su
153a7(rnying rgyud): po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sarba sa~Md+him+me pra yadz+dza/ sarba karma pu tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ d+ha ga ldan/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ma me muH/ pad+mo b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya badz+ra satwa a/ hU~M badz+ra ma b+hi Sha \u0f7f oM/ zhes dbang bskur bas/ dus der na rag gi gnas dong sdug
153b1(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ na nga ga dong sdug pa'i le'u ste bcudrug pa'o// / de nas sems can las ngan de// yi dwags gnas su yang skyes te// byinang gnyis ka'i sdug bsngal kyang // rnam smin yi dwags chen por gnas// de nas pa
153b2(rnying rgyud): nade rje yes// yi dwags de yi rtsa dbyon nas// las ngan de la 'di skad bsngags/ pre ta ka tsaSh+Ta pra be sha ya a// de skad napar bsgrags pa yis// sngon gyi las ngan yongs su dran// kyem gyi hud mgon po yis// thugs rjes zung la bdag skyobs shig/ bdag
153b3(rnying rgyud): sgrol la bde la 'khod// mgon pos myur du bdag spobs shig/ ces pa gsol ba btab pa dang // de nas badz+ra pA Ni yis// rin chen sbom bu lag thogs nas// las ngan de yi gtsug tu bzhag/ rig pa'i tshigs bcad 'di brjod do// A/ rin chen som gyi bus
153b4(rnying rgyud): pa na// rgyal bzhi khro'i lha tshegs bzhugs// sems can khyod la dbang bskur bas// pre ta'i sdug bsngal bral bar shog/ pre pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba pre ta ka ga te he huM hU~M phaT/ AHyadra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ pad+ma satwa twe no pa teSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me g+ha wa/ su te Sh+yo ma
153b5(rnying rgyud): b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo ma g+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre ye ku ru hUM/ AM oM a a hUM ha ho/ b+ha ka wAn sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma mA me muny+tsa/ pad+ma b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya/ pad+ma satwa aHpadz+ra a b+hi ShiSh+Tha a/ zhes dbang bskur bas/
153b6(rnying rgyud): dus der yi dwags rig gsum la// rgya ba gnas pa rnam par sbyin// phyi nang gnyis ka'i sgrib pa can// yaM dwags gnas ngan de las thar// mthong log sdug bsngal las grol lo// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ pre ta ka dong stug gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
153b7(rnying rgyud): nas las ngan sems can de// byol so gnas su yang skyes so// byol song rigs bzhi yod pa las// gor mdze yi 'bu ru skyes// sngon gyi las ngan bag chags kyis// de yi rnam par smin pa byung // rigs bzhi'i byol song dpag tu med// bsdus pas su ma
154a1(rnying rgyud): 'bum nyi khri yod// shin tu bsdus pas rigs bzhi yin// de dag kun ta skyes pa la// de nas lag na rdo rje yis// sems can de yi gam du byon// las ngan de la 'di skad bsgrags/ tir+ya ka dza b+ha pra be sha ya AH/ de skad sems can des thos pas//
154a2(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi las ngan dedran nas// kyem gyi phung ba dag 'dri sogs// las kyi rnam smin dang la smin// mgon po'i thugs rjes bdag sgrol cig/ zhes gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas badz+ra pA Ni yis// las ngan sems can byol song la// shes rab sa stil gathogs
154a3(rnying rgyud): nas// las ngan de yi gtsug tu bzhag/ rig pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod do// oM shes rab rig pa'i bu ste 'di// dus gsum sangs rgya ga ni khro'i gsung // sems can khyod la dbang bskur bas// tIr+ya'i sdug bsngal bral bar shog/ sum tha ma zas rba ti d+ya ga ga
154a4(rnying rgyud): tehe tuM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM bud+d+ha satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la pa/ bud+d+ha satwa twe ne pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha wa/ su to h+ya ma~M b+ha wa/ a nur d+ho ma b+ha wa/ su ba~M d+hi She d+ha wa/ sarba sa~Md+d+hik+She pra yadz+dza/ sarba karma su tsa me tsi ta~M shre yaM ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha rA ma~M ru
154a5(rnying rgyud): / pud+d+ha b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya/ bud+d+ha satwa a/ oM a b+hi Shi ny+tsa a/ zhes dbang bskur ba dang / yang de'i dus su bol sor glen lkugs dang / bsad bcad dang / nying sha nying gis za ba las zad te/ 'khor dang byol song khri sum stong bde ba rnyed do// las ngan gyi sems can de yang
154a6(rnying rgyud): rang zhig ste/ byol song gi mun pa las thar ro// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ tid+ya ka dang grol ngan song dod sbugs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas lasas na sems can des// lha min gnas su skyes te yang // 'gro la gnod sems ma
154a7(rnying rgyud): ngas 'khrug/ 'thab rtsod las la dga' zhing nad rims gtong // mi dge'i las byed dge la bar chod gtong // sgra gcan nag por bya bar skyes// lha la khong khros 'khrug par byed// dpung gi stobs kyis thams cad bred par byed// lha yul dmag 'dren bsam gtan
154b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs// de nas lag na rdorje yang // sems can de la gnas su byon// las ngan pa 'di skad bsgrags// deb a su tsa tra pra be shAl ma// skragacan nag pos dathos pas// sngon gyi las ngan de dran// mgon po nyid la dod ma zhing // gdung ba'i ste sngags 'di skad smras//
154b2(rnying rgyud): e ma bdag 'dra'i sems can zhig/ sngon gyi las ngan dag las byung // kye ma kyi had mgon po yis// bdag lus ngan pa bskal du gsol// sngar byas 'gyed de mthol bshags bsdam// thugs rjes zung la dbang bskur sbyongs// slad nas byang chub mchog thob mdzod// ces gsol
154b3(rnying rgyud): byu / na la / / sh+tha gsu / ga thod // ma dug sa
154b4(rnying rgyud): zhe khro rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag mtshan 'dis// sems can khyod la dbang bskur bsgral// ustar yi sdug bsngal bral bar shog/ tres rba duHkhas rba karma pra pe shab+h+yAM phaT/ ha ka rmas tra sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya~M/ karmas twa twe no pa teH/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha wa/ su te Sh+yo ma N+Dam/
154b5(rnying rgyud): a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su poSh+yo me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa ma/ karma shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ karba mA me muSh+Ta/ karma b+ha wa/ ma hA sa ma ya/ karma satwa a/ hA a b+hi ShiSh+ya aHzhes dbang bskung bas lha ma yin
154b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan rnams kyang byams pa'i sems skyes te/ snying rje tshad med pa la gnas so// 'thab rtsod thams cad dus der rang zhi'o// sgra gcan nag po de badz+ra pA Nis bsgral lo// lha ma yin gzhan rnams kyang dge ba'i sems la gnas te/ skye ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa sha stag
154b7(rnying rgyud): tu gyur te// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ skra gcan nag po bskal ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas sder gyi sems can des// lha mi gnas su skye ba blangs// lha gnas rnam pa gsum las ni// 'dod khams sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// dge
155a1(rnying rgyud): @ba'i ngang tshul bya bar skyes// lha mo bdun dang lhan cig 'grogs// 'dod yon chags pa can de la// badz+ra pA Nis 'di skad bsgrags// de wA tsakya pra be sha ya aH/ dge ba'i ngang tshul de thos nas// sngon gyi las ngan skye ba dran/
155a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi rgyan bkrol thogs nas ni// 'gro mgon nyid la ro dma' zheng // kye ma kyi hud thugs rje che// bdag 'dra rmongs pa 'du 'dzi can// dam tshig rtsa ba nyams pa'i skyon// ngan song mtho ris gnas na 'khod// mi 'chab mtho la bshags me tog bzhes// dbang
155a3(rnying rgyud): bskur lha yi gnas nas drongs// zhes gsol rang gi rgyan phul lo// de nas lag na rdo rje yis// nga rgyal phrag dog 'joms byed pa'i// pi war lag tu thogs nas ni// dge ba'i ngang la dbang bskur nas// rig pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod do// swA/ longs spyod bdud kyi
155a4(rnying rgyud): g.yengs 'joms pa'i// pi wang snyan pa'i don byed 'dis// de ba khyod la dbang bskur bas// skye ba gcig gis las rdzogs shog/ a sarba ta thA ga ta bi d+hAm+ba bar+tha ts+tshi nI ts+tshiHhUM phaT/ swa rat+na satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ rat+na sarba twe no pa ti rdza/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha wa/
155a5(rnying rgyud): @su te Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nurak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yadz+dza/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsiD+hi shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na mA maM muny+dza/ rat+na b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya/ ra trA sarba a/ sA rat+na e d+hi/ aHzhes dbang bsrung bas/
155a6(rnying rgyud): lha gzhan rnams kyang dge ba la brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur te/ skye ba gcig pa sha stag du byung bar gyur to// dge ba'i ngang tshul lha yi 'pho ltung las dus der grol bar gyur to// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ lha yi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas las ngan sems
155a7(rnying rgyud): can de// gling mchog dzam gling mi ru skyes// skye ba gcig pa'i byang chub sems// rig 'dzin gsar spyod rnal 'byor de// sngar byas las kun dran pa can// rig pa'i blo can sngon sbyangs stobs// 'gyod sems drag pos dkar thu bstod// 'phags pa 'am mnyes par byed//
155b1(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag rgyag zung rjes kyang // ngan mo myong ba'i spyad dbang sgyur// bum pa thabs shes gsang chagags// dbang mchog pasrub pa del 'gyur// 'gro ba'i byasgo bcad pa'i phyir// rang tung stong ba'i sngags brjod pa/ sbo bo na sutshal tshad tanan zla / de nas dam
155b2(rnying rgyud): cho nyams pa gso ba'i phyir// bshags pa'i rgyal po rgyam brjod// yid ma lha nags la byas la// 'phro 'dus 'gyod skyongs tsher bcad bya// rgyal bzhi khrod bang gsol la// phyag 'tshal mos gus bshags pa bya// gsang sngags 'bru ba rgya'i bshag
155b3(rnying rgyud): brjod/ tshwa dz+ra badz+ra sadrA sa ma ya/ ma dra pA la ya/ badz+ras d+d+hi pa tit+ta/ br-i d+hi ma la/ dug kyim d+ha wa/ a ru maHmra/ sun pa/ sarba sa d+him+me pra baH/ sarbakam pa tsam tre la ku braM/ ha ha ha ho/ thAg rdzaH/ sa
155b4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra mA me muH/ bar+d+ha b+ha rba ma hA sa ma pa/ badz+ra sarba a/ hUMng dz+wa ad+hi Shi ny+tsa oMH/ au b+hi Shi wAH/ sA b+hA ma m+b+hi Shi h+yasaH/ A tA ad+hi b+h+ya \u0f7f/ hA karma ak+Sh+mI I aH/ zhes phyag mtshan du/ rin po che'i bar bu dang / gseg shang dang / dzo dang / 'khor po dang
155b5(rnying rgyud): rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / rgya gram dang / dril bu la sogs pas dbang bskur te/ bden pa'i chog bcad 'di yang brjod// rdzirin chen par bu'i bum pa na// rgyal bzhi khro'i na tshogs bzhugs// rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas// lha dbang lum pa thob par shog
155b6(rnying rgyud): giseg shar drang srong sgra sgrogs 'di// thugs rtags zhi gro'i lha yi brda'// rigs kyi bral dang rang srung ngo // a bad+hU tI'i dbang rdzob shong// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// padz+ra rgya gri mthugs kyi rtags// rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas// 'khor pa lnga la dbang rdzogs sh+log/ ces sngag
155b7(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin tshigs bcad kyis// rig 'dzin da la dbang bskung bas// lha dbang lus kyis thob par gyur// rang lus rgyal ba'i sngar rdzogs kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i don ma rtogs// rtog bcas lha yi dbang zhes bya// zhes gsungs so// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las
156a1(rnying rgyud): cu dang/ da / ga dus sa/ gang nga srung gsas sus/ dus dun/
156a2(rnying rgyud): chog gi dbang bskur med par bstan// thabs kyi dbang bskur baspyad pa ni// gyi nang sdod brgyad thams cad gyi// sdang ba yod med brda' du bstan// gcig pas sna tshogs bcur byas pas// snang ba yod med bstan pa yin// sku tshogs bslang ba meng gis mtshon//
156a3(rnying rgyud): gleng bzhid dkyil 'khor dang // bram pa su dang rdo rje dang // 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // gya gra maral gri me gsum dang // phrar bu ma 'u dang gzhu dang ni// me long dkrigs dal bdag tu// tha mas ming btags de la ni// slob ma'i shes rab ltang min// dpe'i ngo nang shes na shes
156a4(rnying rgyud): rab yin// gsang ba'i dbang bskur bstan pa ni// rang la rang gsal bstan pa yin// rang po shes na gsang dbang thob// gcig pa shes na thams cad de// mnam pa nyid ni mtshar che// yod na yod par yenas mnyam// med na med par ye nas mnyam// bdenan bden par
156a5(rnying rgyud): yenas mnyam// rnganan ldan par yinas mnyam// stong na stong par le nas mnyam// dngos na dngos por ye nas mnyam// mnyam pa sted du shes pa ni// gsang ba'i dbang bskrang thob pa yin// tshig gi dbang bsrung rang med bstan// nga bdag 'dug na rnams kyang 'khor//
156a6(rnying rgyud): dpung sbed ro dang bral ba ni// chog gcig tshig med dbang gi mchog/ nga med bdag med sdang ba med// ces gsungs so// rig 'dzin dge mthong dang / 'khor 'dus pa mang po dang / theg pa brgyang po las dang po pa rnams brtul te/ sa pa 'brel bar gyur to// la
156a7(rnying rgyud): du zhing smre sngags 'dom la la ne skrag cing spangs par gyur nas skur pa 'debs/ la la ni mos pa log ste ba nam thobasgra/ la la ni yi chad de byas pa ladon med pa kyes kyi nyud/ gsang bdag rdo rje ma gsung zhig/ ces phreng ngo / yid ma rang ba rnams ni mu stegs pa bden no//
156b1(rnying rgyud): zhes rang rang sla'o// de nas lag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la yid ches par bya ba'i phyir/ bos shing bsdus te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa rnams the tshom bcad par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal dang spyod kyis phongs shig/ chos kyi sku dang mjal te 'ong ngo // zhes gsungs
156b2(rnying rgyud): te/ 'khor rnams slar 'dus te rdo rje sems dpa'i drung du bskor ba dang / phyag dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de 'khod do// dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i chos nyid la yid ma ches pa'i leT ste nye gnyis pa'o// / de nas badz+ra pA Ni yis/
156b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ gsang sngags gsang ba mnyam mi mnyam// de bdag rang sdang yod dam med// chos can dngos gcig bden nam rdzun// bag chags re dogs 'bral mi 'bral// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'
156b4(rnying rgyud): bka' lnga pa// stobs rgya de rje 'khor 'das nyom// chos nyid ces su'i dgongs tshad ni// mnyas pa nyid du mkhyen pa yin// mnyam pa nyi de la gnyis 'di// dbe na nas nang be gcig/ rgya la ka bzum pa dang // dper na dang lta 'de// snying gis rin
156b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi sa yin// mtshon pas yin nam las kyis yin// 'dus pas yin nam 'bral bas yin// mdog gis yin nam dbyibs kyis yin// bsam pas yin nam gang gis yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'khor tshogs kun// ming gis rdo rje yin pas na// ming gis gang grags rdo rje
156b6(rnying rgyud): 'am// gzugs kyis rdo rje yin pas na// gzugs su gang snang rdo rje 'am// 'dus pas rdo rje yin pa na// sa rdo bo ba rdo rje 'am/ bral bas rdo rje yin pas na// 'dus byas thams cad rdo rje'am// mtshon pas rdo rje yin pas na// dpe bkod thams cad rdo rje 'am// las kyis rdo rje yid
156b7(rnying rgyud): pas na// sems can thams cad rdo rje'am// mdog gis rdo rje yin pas na// dkar dmar thams cad rdo rje'am// dbyibs kyis rdo rje yin pas na// zlum pa la sogs rdo rje'am// bsam pas rdo rje yin pas na// yid smon thams cad rdo rje'am// de ltar rgya yis yin pa med// rdo rje bya bgang

157b2(rnying rgyud): ngas narjes kyi dngos po med// sems kyis byed rtags la stong dang // 'gya dran 'don chags gang gis byed// lus sems dngos po 'di zhes pa// rdo rje sems dpa' ngas ma rnyed// mtshon pa tsam dung zhes bya// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// kun tu bzang pos da /
157b3(rnying rgyud): rdo sems dpas mchen du med// snang ba med dum snang ba gang// snang ba yul gcig sul bden// yul du bden mun gzeg la ltos// dper na khrung bculta bur// 'gro drug su stegs drug chad dang // rib dbu mthong snang thadad pas// ring du ba dag gcig cang deng // dbang nga/

158a1(rnying rgyud): / bcas rgyag la mthong kI 'i Ta na pa zhub / des 'ang bAg la thum na gang 'don pa 'a'aphos/ smye na ba rtog yang // sgyum ts+tsha 'ahral bzhin// zlum 'das pagang gas byed// rgyam pa /
158a2(rnying rgyud): ci yis byed// dper na gyes suganyid log na// rmil mya dag rdeg tsho bral ni// dngos por snang ba'i bzhin ni// nyen par dag chags mtshon pa la// de la dngas pa yid dam med// dper na mdang gis hril ma ma// skyes bu mtshan thog mang po mas// bdag gsod
158a3(rnying rgyud): 'thub mkho na ri la dang // bred spangs ngal chang shi med zos// sad par gyur na de cir snang // de bzhin snang ba'i dngos po 'di// ri rab gleng bzhi 'byung ba kun// dgrag nyen chags sdang sdug bsngal kun// skye ma rmi la mji bzhin no// yod nas mi snang med nas snang //

158b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rdzog tu snang ba// ba na med pa denas snang // da sa po'i chugang de dzin no// ga tu da 'i man pa// ces te da med pa'i phyir// de bzhin mapa spyod cig yor kyang // yod nas myi snang med nas sbyang // sgrab byung 'jug pa
158b4(rnying rgyud): kun// yod nas mi snang med snang gyur// kun rdo bye dngos dang gi'i mnyam// dngos po 'khrug pa bden pa zed// de bzhin dul pa'i sprul ba yang // yod nas mi sprul med nas sprul// sprul ba yin pas yod pa med// de bzhin 'khrul pa re las rnams kyang //

158b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i man med// spang ba dgas pa pan// 'den pa bu zhes/ gyi gyi nyid yin pa tsha san 'ang/ ba'i du ma du rjo// nam gsu mas// dab ma las/
159a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ snang ba med par zag bzang pa'i lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'khor 'dus nyon// mthong ngam mthong na mthong bas ltos// mthong ba med na ci zhig bsgom// dper na rgyas

159a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa 'dra// de bas mkhas pas legs par ltos// rmi lam smos zhig mthong ban// rmil ma shes nas rmi lam bsgom// me la mgoms pa bsgom pa yin// sgra ma mdzod na sgyum bsgom// sgyu ma'i gzug dang 'i sgra// rgya ma'odro dang sgyu ma ro// lha ma'i reg dang
159a4(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i chos// sgyu ma legs par mthong ba na// sgyu ma 'dris pa bsgom pa yin// bsgom par gyis shig sgyu ma las// sgyu mar spyod shes sgyu ma yin// sgyum 'bras med 'bras bu yin// de bzhin rmi lam smig tu rnams// de ltar mkhas pas legs par ltos// mthong
159a5(rnying rgyud): ngam mthong na lta ba yin// de dag goms na sgom pa'o// gnyis med spyad na spyod pa yin// 'du 'bral med pa 'bras bu'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas rig 'dzin dge mthong des// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // mgon po rdo rje 'dzin pa la// 'dzum pa'i

162a3(rnying rgyud): can de bzhin no// sgo phyogs 'jom grar mi rigs la// 'gro dang ldang ba'i dring 'di yin// sring ba'i 'don pa mngal zhi tshogs nas na// rigs dang na chod na gzhon med// dbu la mongs rin kyang mchog tu 'gyur// sprang pos rgyal po'i phreng zin dngadra// thams

162b1(rnying rgyud): do gas na ldog padur ba dag ga la ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang lag nong rjes gsol ba/ skye kye ston ba rje chang // gsung bags pa'i nang po las// gsang sags sa cig rten lon gapa mtshan bzangs pa shAn pa rdzangs tra// dang/
162b2(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badz+ra pA Ni sogs// gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgor 'jug na// sbrul ni lhag dong zhugs pa 'dra// gsang sngags gsang ba'i don ston la// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu ga ces dang yid 'thad dbul//
162b3(rnying rgyud): / sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung // lus mig srog ltar bkur bar bya// rgyud lung khor khrol slob dpon la// dam tshig lus la tshad btsugs bkur// dbang bskur srog gi slob dpon la// dam tshig dpral gyi mag ltar bsrung // man ngag blta bsko ma slob dpon la//
162b4(rnying rgyud): dmachogasregs ltung bsrung ba yin// yid ma lha dang mA~M 'bral basbyin// ldam rdo 'a phrag dag ngan sems dang // bskrun stong la dbyu dribya// sku yang mtshag bsrung skyom ra// thugs dang thama'i gsang mi bcag/ chos la mi bcoms pa mi gzhag/ rdun
162b5(rnying rgyud): sogs ngag gi skyon rnams spang // gsung gi dam tshig bsrung sdom yin// gsang ba'i man ngag spel mi bya// dam tshig gnod sems sems la spring // gdams pa'i don las gzhan me brnab// thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung sdom yin// gzhan yang yan lag tse 'u
162b6(rnying rgyud): lnga// shes par bya dang bsgrub par bya// thob par bya dang dang de blang // mi spang dam tshig bsrung ba yin// yan lag stong dang rtswa brgyad kyang // de bzhin shugs las bsrung ba yin// lus ngag yid gsum sdom pa'i don// dam tshig yid bzhin rin po che// 'khor
162b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru// snying po goms 'dris rtogs pa ni// bsung sdom med dang phyal ba yin// yul med ming dang bral phyir ro// dam tshig mi ldan gang zag ni// gsang sngags bla med bslab pa'i phyir// bka' brgyad don la mkhas gyur kyang // be spel g.yang du
163a1(rnying rgyud): srung ba zhin// bdag gan sa rgya gnas// de nyi nas pa rda gnas// debapa dang rgyag rgyab badzin 'azungs// rba ba thom thegs pa sngags brel// rgyal pos rbag dog rnas pa ma// gra
163a2(rnying rgyud): skyon da gyur ba yin// de la mchog kyi thugs rjes gzigs// bka' bgro thugs rjes drang sa pa yang // don mchog dong sngags yig bcu payin// zhes gsungs so// rdo sems dpa' mig brgya 'i chung las dmatshig rdza pa 'al khyod ngom mtshad pa'i bye
163a3(rnying rgyud): denas pa ga zhin dam mi bteg pa lapa/ so slob sa s+ho// me gsu / dag rang brdzu tu// nganas gags blangs sa thas pas/ dag sor dad
163a4(rnying rgyud): lagags/ ma ba/ dpal bdang // dgatshe dang phrad pa dze// nang medad ga/ na sa hA
163a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang// da da phyugs pa// zag zlab// na pag / ra gnas 'dus ma // sa
163a6(rnying rgyud): gas byas lags gyes pa las/ pa'i bye po pa phra sa ta / mchog su kyil ba dag/ ga rten pa ma dri la dbang dag
163a7(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyid kyil 'ab dang // khyang la la rgyal 'thor // sru 'al ga // gsuM ga ce lnga// ban// 'a tu kyi pa / la gyu byung ga
163b1(rnying rgyud): / hA// nag // / 'bar nga pa du rdzo// gsas sa mas// bags pa 'o byag da // 'dud nas ma/
163b2(rnying rgyud): rjes me lta ba'i dong // gagasas bu ba rnas pa'o / ma sa nga ba byung ba tsho ba kyin 'ad sus rgya gru pa/ 'dag sa// sa gags tu nadu
163b3(rnying rgyud): 'an na// dan 'ji rdorje chung gyus// ts+tsha 'ardzu ba // de lta ga sa smra// kyi ba // zhab // zhes nas 'as/ pa
163b4(rnying rgyud): pa// nan cig badz+ran sogs// thugs mi ga ji sems dpa'al// gas kyi stong pa 'jug rgyagapas// dang byung myig 'jas pa / jirje rjenas dpa ste shes bklags// 'am tshogs khyed kyis legs par dang // ngas rnas pas/
163b5(rnying rgyud): mnu la pa/ badz+ras d+hatan pa nyiH/ rdo naman+taH/ sa ma thal/ an+ta k+to maHla/ suM po ma rnam/ sa ma d+hi ste pa ladz+dza/ sa ba ka ma m+b+ha sa/ zlag+h+rasar+b+ba dz+dzaH/ hAn to/ thAg+sa b+han/ s+yA d+ya ta thAg ta/ badz+ram mi rbaH/ pad+d+hob+h+ya
163b6(rnying rgyud): ma hA sum pa/ bad+masmra ma/ kun bzang yab yum rigs su dang // ug rjesems dpa' sems ma dang // sgob sgomathu badrug sogs// bzhi brgyam gnyis rdo dbyungs// khrag 'byung dang d+h+ra'aM// kau brgyad dang min brgyad// nom pa 'i di
163b7(rnying rgyud): dru sogs// klog ma brgyan rtes te// rdzab rgya margyad rdzo \u0f7f// rdo rigs kyi srubargyayi na// sku ma dag zugs nga gas na// sa pa'i sa kyis padang // dang ba rtson 'dreg se mas babyed la// khyod pa shi pa ni gzus
164a1(rnying rgyud): ma dang nags na / ma gsapa ca / ga sa sa/ nga nga rtag sa / na
164a2(rnying rgyud): ga/ 'grus dran yin chags par med pas// rtag chad mthang med pa byang dang // blta ba sgom dang chog mi shes pa// dpa' batshogs ba brgya ngogs yin// zhe gsungangs// brjo kyi bshags kyi chung pas da mim me dpang rig sa

164a4(rnying rgyud): sa ma

164a6(rnying rgyud): ba ma ga/ masas sa/

164b1(rnying rgyud): lus dag yid gsum brdud la ngo// srog dang snying po mang pa gtad// spang ba yod mda'akhrul ma 'khrul// dakhrul pa bden rngun dakhrul bas chod// mdzo dang rtag par mthul med// rtswal 'chos la mang stongs nad// ces gsu
164b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud las sku ltar bshags pa zhi pa re ledra ste bdun pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje 'khor bcas kun// rdo rje rigs kyi yon tan te// rin chen rdo rje rdo rje'i ma// lnga brgya sog gi snying po brgyas//
164b3(rnying rgyud): pas tshangs// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang // chos dang ye shes sems dang mthu// stan dang 'bru dang bu tsha dang // 'khor dang phyugs dang bsam pa kun// 'phel bar 'gyur te the tshom med// sbyor ba dngos gzhi rdzas gsum bya// thams dang sngon
164b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' gsum gyi don pa 'jug/ dngos gzhi chos 'khor spro bsu bya// mchod stangs dregs pa tshar bcad yin// rjes su la 'ang rtogs pa'i gdeng // dmigs pa med par blo 'dogs bcad// rin chen rin chen 'byung ldan ches// seng ge sa bsngags legs par
164b5(rnying rgyud): drung // swAd d+has d+ha sams/ mnu bral sa/ rerdzas tshun ta// mab+hAH/ thub/ yaR+tha ma ga d+ham/ sarbas sle ba yaH/ sarbA kAm sa tsas/ yi // ga pa/ sarba shAg te/ dbu me /
164b6(rnying rgyud): b+hab ma hA sa ma ye/ rat+na sa twa ma/ sA la pASh+Ti ku ru ga dgra/ saM praSh+Ti ku ramAd+ha/ ba don gyigadams thabs so// rin chen kun 'byung dang chen dbus// lte babru bzhir rigs bcu'i la// snga las 'od zer ser po 'byong // mchod sbyangs dregs pa cha re car ro//
164b7(rnying rgyud): saMd+hi bsdu ba'i ting 'dzin gsal// sA la bib+ha ba'i phreng bskor te// g.yas g.yon bskor bajo mo'i tshul// yon tan rigs brgya'i bshags pa yin// mnyam nyid ye shes dang thung ngog/ yul med med thal tshangs pa'i dbang // yul du bden rdzun gcig la ltos/
165a1(rnying rgyud): / gcig la mthung snang ba dad pas// gcig tu bden pa gcig kyang mod// mang du bden rtan gnagal rung // gcig la mang du bden pa med// de la mang dus la 'dran// bden mnyamathun mnyam mang med yan// srang mnyam dang
165a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam yul med yin// bshags pa'i don mchog tshang ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje brgya bshags las yon tan gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badz+ra pA Ni sogs// rdo rje rigs kyi gsung mchog ni//
165a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma snang mtha' yas// gsung mchog sAl sku gsung gi lha// lha brgya gsung gi yi ge brgya// 'dod chags ser sna'i bshags tshangs byed// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// 'byung ba dgra dgegs dbang du gyur// skong ba dngos gzhi rjes gsum las//
165a4(rnying rgyud): srog dang snying po la bzla'i tshad// sbyor ba'i don la rnam gnyis te// sems bskyed pa dang 'jug pa dang // dngos gzhi chos nyin bshad pa dang // spo bcu ting 'dzin gsal ba ste// oM las brgya ba'i phreng bskor te// g.yos g.yon mgal me gnyis bskor bzhin//
165a5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs dregs pa dbang du bsdu// rjes su shes par bya ba yin// srog snying yul med dmigs med do// snang ba mtha' yas mtha' yas ches// gsung mchog seng ge'i sgra bsgrags gsung // oM pad+ma satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ pad+ma satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/
165a6(rnying rgyud): dri na mab+ha ba/ sgra Sh+yo mthab/ a nu k+to ma thA bA/ su badz+ra ma dzA ba/ sarbas m+me pra sats+tsha/ sa rbakam su tsam// we saM \u0f89\u0fa4 dzaH/ hahahata/ b+ha gA wAH/ sab ta ShabyA ta/ padz+rar+sa masaH/ badz+ra b+ha be/ mad+has ma yaM/ pad+d+ha satwa ma/ oM la
165a7(rnying rgyud): ku rug dag/ hrIHba shaM ku ruswa ta?/ dbang ga don du gdags pa yin// pad+ma p+la gzi mgrin pa'i thor// snang mtha' dbus la dgas brgya rtsa// pha mo gnyis ni g.yas g.yon no// maHlas 'ad bar dmar pa 'bros// a las 'od 'phros dmar pog so// mdzod/
165b1(rnying rgyud): sbyangs dregs pa dbang du bsdus// dbang bsku'i ting 'dzin nga rgyal ldan// sa sa 'angan rtogs gcig tu gyur// 'di yi don rtogs gcig kyang med// shes pas rang byung yul med dang // so sor ma rig gcig pu dang // yul med mngangal ma shes nyid// gcig na na
165b2(rnying rgyud): kyirang bzhin yin// ma 'dris rgya mtsho 'gaza' skang 'angadra // zhes gsungs so// badz+ra brgya ba'i rgyud las gsung gi le'u ste dbu pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'dzer// rdo gam lus kyi su// don ro dpung pa drag po'i d+ha// mngon
165b3(rnying rgyud): bar byang chub bya ba krung // phrin las brgya pa ngan sngags brgya// khong khro phrag dog bshags tshangs byed// bdud dang bar gcod dgra dang bgegs// dge lnga bar gcod gang byed kun// bsad mnan bsreg dang bskrad dang bzlog/ drag po'i las rnams thams cad 'brub/
165b4(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes gsum ste// snying rjes bskal ba'i dmachog ni// spyod pa'i don la zin par bya// dargyal khro mchog sugasung thugs// seng ge'i yid la 'brug gi skad// khro bo'i lus pa mtshon cha'i bog/ dngos gzhid na la shes pa'i gdengs// spobasdus pang/
165b5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs dregs pa 'dul// ting 'dzin glog dang 'brug ltar sbyar// rjes su yul med mi bral lo// gor ma bzlog dang yig 'bru bzlog/ khog tu tshangs pa khog tu dkrugs// don yod grub pa don chen grub// las rnams seng ge'i sgra spogs zung // badz+ra satwa A/ ma hA
165b6(rnying rgyud): sa ma sa/ badz+ro d+ha ba/ badz+ra mA me dzaH/ sarba ta thAg ta/ b+ha ga bAn to/ hahahahaM/ m+mAH/ tsit+ta shAM yaM ku ru/ sar+b+ba kAn suHme/ sarbi m+be pra lats+tsha/ su bodz+dza me b+ha ba/ ana? k+to me b+hang/ suta d+ha mAd+hab/ d+h+r-i me d+hag+ha/ tron pa tiH/ badz+ra saH/ mnu nA/
165b7(rnying rgyud): la ya/ karmas t+yas ma ya/ hAka tras tras ma ya/ maM nu pA la ya/ badz+ras tra dran pa ti// dzin ma d+ha baM/ sung ma b+ha ba/ mnu b+h+yo mthA ba/ ma d+ha ba/ sarba ng+ge bram / sarbakam su tsi mi/ krot+t+ra bre li dzu dzAH/ he ha ta ho/ thag tan/ @
166a1(rnying rgyud): / 'dumam / masmras sal/ bangs ma/ btsun pa'i dus bya// mams sas/ sas sa sa sam ng+ya mams sna na mad tan rna na na
166a2(rnying rgyud): mahAs ma sa/ mnu pA pa yA/ sarba karba s+ya ts+ya me/ ro ba tiH/ badz+ra mA me mun+ta/ dr-i d+ha mA thA ba/ su to d+ha me zlab/ ar+tha k+tom b+ha ba tan/ ka myas dris sa pa/ sarba mre pra ya dzA/ badz+ra satwa sa/ !srab pa chen po rdzas pa steng zhes bya// srog sbyang
166a3(rnying rgyud): shan phyed nas las dmas zin zhes bya// yul gyi sgo 'dags tshod na las stor yin// glo phugs gting nas gro na las stor yin// bag chags gting zag chod na las sdong yin// rang dbar ring gis thob na las sbyor da// rang bzhin 'gyur med pa 'gags las rtogs
166a4(rnying rgyud): ltab krung mtha' sa lam dge sdig med// ces gsungs so// rdo rje brgya pa'i d+hang las phrin las drag po'i le'u steng du ba'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya yi sna// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs nyon// phrin las drag po 'di po mchod// ngan sngags brgya
166a5(rnying rgyud): dayis bstan// bsad mnan bsreg pa bzlog pa dang // byol sod dgrag dang las la sbyar// ngan sngags mtshon cha 'di ltar yin// mA ra ya/ mA ru ya rbad/ mA da ya~M/ mA ra yai staM b+ha ya nan/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya dz+wa pa ri/ mA ra ya yu tsa ta ya phaT phaT/ ya ma nA
166a6(rnying rgyud): gang rdzog zad/ ya ma hA ga r+b+he Shadzang / rnal ma gdong babrog dkrugs bzlog la/ sham thar sngags su gdegs pa yin// gsang gnas bu gsum rgya tham gnas // dngas 'a dang ljang me 'adz+ram// mtshad srung sa dregs pa bas ma ni ga/ rjes su wa dgas mtshad
166b1(rnying rgyud): dbul// steng gsum dag rten rab byams kyi// rgyal bdul snyed mnyam par mtshad// phrin las rigs brgya'i bshags pa yin// khong kha phrag dag la sogs te// dug rdza chags sdang byung 'dag ngas// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs mad 'ams/
166b2(rnying rgyud): lha gnas rnam gsum dong stag yin// thugs ltar bshags pas na ra ka gnas// tsha grang rdo rje dong skrag yin// gsung ltar bshags pas rgyu rnams smin// yi dwags rigs gsum dong spug yin// sku ltar bshags pas ma nges gnas// rkang rdzogs rnag khrag dong
166b3(rnying rgyud): sdug yin// yon tan ltar bshags gling bzhi'i mi// rigs bzhi mi yi dong sdug yin// bya ba'i las grub ye shes pas// gzhan med dang chas rang byung shes// byang med bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin// don grub mngon par byang chub sku// de dogs med dam las rnams
166b4(rnying rgyud): zin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje brgya pa'i rgyud las sngags bdag mchod gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// de dag zhi rgyas dbang drag las// zhi ba'i las rnams bsrub pa ni// nyams dga'as
166b5(rnying rgyud): dkar shar bltas par// dkar gsum 'bras bu dkar po'i shing // tsan dan me tog dkar po sogs// dung dang dngul gzhong sdod nang du// dkar gtor 'bras chan brgyan pa bsham// maN+Dal zlum po hom khung zlum// ra ba bzhi yi chos gcig brgyad// til dkar ka ra mar bsreg
166b6(rnying rgyud): na// thams cad zhi gyur dmyal bar 'gro re kan// shAn+tiM ku ru brgya sngags gsham// rigs brgya bzhi yis bstod byas mthar// lhag chad spangs pa'i brgya ba mchog/ rgyas pa'i las la 'jug pa na// gser dngul zangs lcags rin po che// 'bru sna gtsad ma sna
166b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang // bkra shes pa yi rdzas brgyad dam// shing ser me tog ser po dang // gser ram ser po sdod nang du// gtor ma thu bzhi rin po che// rin chen lnga ba dang chan dang sman// nyams dga' sa sar ltar bltas sar// maN+Dal gru bzhi gser mdog bya/
167a1(rnying rgyud): mas kyang khang pas dgas bla// bu dag pa 'angs du thogs byas// a dang pas 'thub na grangs thong // nga dag pas pa da babs// gag na ma chags dang // cadad
167a2(rnying rgyud): mtshal dang gur gum dang dmar ram// zangs mam dmar po'i snod nang du// dbang gi gtor ma brag ma bsham// sha chen khrag chen rab brgyan la// me tog dmang pos brgyan par bya// tshil chen thos la tsan dan grogs// yid 'ong brag ni dmar po ru// mnal blags dmang po la/

167a4(rnying rgyud): drag po'i las ni byed pa'i tshe// sha khrag rnam pa sna tshogs dang // dug spos sA sna tshogs bsod // phur pa la sogs mtshon kun bsog/ srin po khros 'dra drag po'i ri// drag por 'jug pa'i gnas mchog tu// lcags sa ma drag po'i snod nang du// sha wa ga dug gi ga
167a5(rnying rgyud): mapa sham// dug shing la sogs gdug pa'i shing // gra gul zhun mer ta la mang bsreg/ e 'draral gri rgya bram bsnams// nyams 'jigs khyad du kha bltas par// maN+Dal nag po grwa gsum bya// rdo rje bya gram bu gsum bu'i// hom khung bu gsum lta bar ro// dmigs
167a6(rnying rgyud): pag sngal bya yin bsrang// gang yin dmigs pa rje tshom med// drag po'i las de 'grub par 'gyur// lha dang lha min skye mi byed// thugs mchog thugs kyi bslab pa ni// sbyor ba dngos gzhi gzhung bsrung ste// sems dpa' rnam gsum gsal ba yis// lus dag yang
167a7(rnying rgyud): gsum dpa mi bya// 'bugs 'dred yengs med dal medang zlas// mchod ldan pas kya sa bya// rjes pa la bkra dgos tshang ngo // thugs skab phrin las ras bzhil// nag/ dong sdug gdon par bya// kun kya de bu rus pa med// bcwa sngags bcu bshags/
167b1(rnying rgyud): nga // zhes gsungasas// dang bcwa ba'i rlud pam thun las bzhi dgas pa don dang / thugs tu ba da tu bsla ba dang nga gi ba gang kun la gces par bstan ra ba 'a skye badru gnyis pas// de nas pa d+has zhus pa/ tsaton pa dang cang
167b2(rnying rgyud): thugs mchog yi ge brgya pa 'dis// mchod sbyin gtor ma btang ba dang // su gdung tsha tsha gdab pa dang // ro bsreg bdun tshigs byed pa yang // rmod pas ma 'tshal bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ yang bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// mchod kyi
167b3(rnying rgyud): las la 'jug 'dod na// don mchog yi ge brgya pa yis// gtor ma'i las than rdzogs pa la// sbyor ba dngos pa rdo rjes su bsdu// bang po sems bskyed rnam pa gnyis// ston pa dang ni 'jug pa'o// bdag dang sems can byang chub smon// 'a rol phyin drug 'jug par//
167b4(rnying rgyud): slo ba zhes pa tshig la sbyar// ting 'dzin nam gsum khog phub la// rgya mi maM ge hUM de las// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dbang bskyed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas dril// seng ge nyi zla brda' gdan// bcung
167b5(rnying rgyud): bsum sbrel krung gang gsal bskyed// nga ni dam chog sems dpa' ste// de yi thugs kar nyi zla pad// dkyil na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// gong mchi 'ang tshon gang bsgom// de ni ye shes sems dpa' la// de yi thugs kar nyi dra pad// gser gyi rdo rje rtse ldan// 'bre
167b6(rnying rgyud): stangs bram pa'i dkyil dzA tAM// de ri yig 'bru'i tshag yin// sgo srog gnyis kyi sgrung snabya// gzhi mi yig 'gyur med las// dang pok+ta mi spyo bskrun// snod dang bcud ces grags pa 'don// rgazhi zong d+halas po gcig 'phros// pad ma 'dab bcad rin chen sdod/
167b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' dang mnyam par nga migs pa'o// brlad na dpa' bo 'bru las bskyed// gag pa'i 'drani 'grib mngangs/ badz+ram tra ces pa sa// spyo brjid thams cing spang pa yin// skra dang brgyabs spel ba yin// ai dang nga rgyabs mos par gyur// hwas gas ba
168a1(rnying rgyud): mtshang sbyi byed// ma ma thab par byas sas// rlu dang brgyabs dbang dra 'azlas// dbang byad+mar rtson pa'i tung 'anganaH// da ltar srungs sla mas bshugs pa// maskon rnam su ma par sun drungs te// rdzangs smos padag pa
168a2(rnying rgyud): rje'achang ba 'di skad gshegs// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje'i chang la mchod pa 'bul// mya ngan mi 'da' 'gro don mdzod// gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor du gsol// phyi nang sgrib pa sbyang du gsol/
168a3(rnying rgyud): yid la snying po thob par smon// yang dag snying po'i don rtogs shog/ badz+ra sa ma ya zhes brjod// mgron bzhis nam mkha' khengs par bsam// de nas mchod sbyin bkye byas te// so sor thob par bya ba'i brgya pa la// ba lid aM daM khA he gdags// de nas dang don dbang du bya
168a4(rnying rgyud): nas tshig bcad bsngo ba ni// hU~M byin brlabs dmigs med gtor ma chen po 'di// sri zhu bram rgyal ba 'khor bcas dang // yon tan phyigyi nang chos skyong 'khor bcas dang // snying rje 'gro draganyon mongs sems can dang // lan chags bgegs rigs sngar chags thams cad la// 'di
168a5(rnying rgyud): pon mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bsngos pas// mchod mnyes thugs dam sgong gyur cig/ rkyen bzlog sdug bsngal byang nas su// lan chags phyi nang sgrib pa dag gyur cig/ kun gyis yang dag don rtogs shog/ ces dang de nas yang ni brgya pa gdon// lha brgya phyag
168a6(rnying rgyud): 'tshal bshags pa bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje brgya ba'i rgyud las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// mchod rten sku gdung gdab pa ni// sbyor ba'i don dang dngos gzhi 'don
168a7(rnying rgyud): / rdzas kyi las kyi don dang gsum// sgor ba smon 'dug sems bskyod de// tshad med pazhi ldan rnal 'byor bas// bskyed rdzogs sgra gdung gdapa par bya// 'jug palta ste sems bskyed do// dngos gzhi zhes pa las rim te// byed brlabs gang ba dang ting 'dzi // byi
168b1(rnying rgyud): brlabs las rim 'byung ba lnga// 'dug pa' phas rim bya ba yin// theg dang thar pa gdab pa yan// sa rko ba dang brdung ba dang // spos chus byug dang maN+Da gzhug/ 'ab 'di bya dang na bza' sngam// bye rlabs sngon 'gro' dam ni// rnal khyor pa las shes /
168b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i las rim gnyis su dbye// 'byung ba lnga dang 'jims dang // gang skad lam du 'dobs pa'o// 'byung ba lnga las nam mkha' dag la gdab pa ni// bdag nyid sems dpa'i skur gsal bas// brkos phod byin gyis brlabs byas la// gzhi yi yi ge nyid las smos// 8
168b3(rnying rgyud): rgyabargyab 'dzin byin gang ba// sku gsu thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dmigs// me rnga rung yang de bzhin gdape// 'jim pa dag la gdabang ni// 'bri 'bi dgos por nang brtag la// yig 'brub rgyas brjod sbyin du// d+harma lA ya a zhes gdab// badz+ras d+ha ldan bzhug
168b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchod rten la// lha brgya la sogs kyis bskor bar // bskor ba mchod pa byed par bsam// de yang 'di ltar shes par gyis// gdab pa la yang gnyis yin te// gson dang gshin du shes par bya// gson po la yang gnyis yin te/
168b5(rnying rgyud): rngub don dang rkyen bzlog gnyis// byang chub don ni gong ltar te// rkyen bzlog phrin las rnam bzhir gdab// dang po zhi bar gda' ba ste// zhi ba bud+d+ha rdo rjer dmigs// bgos phor d+hi gyes byin brlabs la// oM prad+d+ha satwa sa ma ya nas a zhes brgya pa'i sngags brjod la/
168b6(rnying rgyud): che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru gdab// mchod rten dkar po zlum po kyi// nang du zhi mdzod rdo rje dbyangs// 'od zer dkar pos gang dreg pa// zhi bar 'gyur te zhi bar byed// rgyas pa rin chen rdo rjer dmigs// brkos por hUM gyis gre bzhir brlabs// sA rat+na satwa zhes pa nas// as
168b7(rnying rgyud): pa rgyas pa nas// che ge mo bud+d+he ku ru gdag/ mchod rten gru bzhi ser po phye// nang du rdo rje chus mdzad dbyings// 'od zer ser pos kun la khyab// tshe dang bsod nams dpal rnams rgyas// dbang la pad+ma rdo rjer dmigs// brkos par blag ma byon brlabs la/
169a1(rnying rgyud): / A mjus rgyas ma yanas/ a zhes yi ge kye ba brjod// rdzab shang ga drubad// mchod rten dmar po zlagam bya// nang nga dbang bskur badrad dbyabs// dmang po ljabs kyur 'on zer gyis// dbang du bya ba gang yin pa// mas shing nga
169a2(rnying rgyud): cad dbang du sdud// drag po dag gi las bsrub na// karmardo rjer dmigs bsams la// brkos phor b+h+rU~M gyis e ru brlabs// hA karma sa tra zhes pa nas// a zhes brgya rdzogs par brjod// che ge mo mA ra ya phaT ga da // hom khung nag po grwa gsum gyi// nang du las
169a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad khro bo'i dbyings// 'od zer nag po me mtshon gyis// dmigs pa gang yin sgrol bar byed// thams cad sgrol te the tshom med// las ni gang bslab thams cad la// srog snying bris shing khor bar gzhug/ de ltar btab ste gang yang 'grub // ces gsungs so//
169a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje brgya pa'i rgyud las gson ltar gdab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'khor tshogs rdo rje khyod// tshe 'das don du gdab pa ni// thar lam mkhyen pa nga yis bstan// dras pa'i phye ma zhib par bsre// don mcho ga yi ge
169a5(rnying rgyud): pa la// a nr-i su tri pre du drug btags pa'i// ngan sor spyod pa'i snying po'am// yang na 'di btags gdab pa yin// da ha da ha sarba nad ga ka te he dun hUM phaT/ ma tha ma tha sarba tAr+ya ka te he dun hUM phaT/ pa tsa ba tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te he dun hUM phaT/ zhes pas/ tshe 'das ngan song gnas nas drad//

169a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs snying pos spyan gang na dpab// gshegs su gsol zhes spyan drangs la// sa mA dza zhes brjod pa pyodan// ting nge 'dzin gyis bstim par bya// 'khor ba ma spongs par du bzhugs// rnam dag sgra ma'i tshogs bshad brjod// a hi pre ho nas phyag btsal la//

180b4(rnying rgyud): gis// snang ba gtan tshigs ma gzhigs pa// 'khor 'das ma rig chos kyi sra// gzhi shes nang gi rig pa de// bsam pa'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir// rang byung yin la nges shes min// nam langs mun pa med pa'ang // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' tshon// ye shes
180b5(rnying rgyud): chos sku'i bar dri ni// rnal 'byor rig pa'i blo ldan pas// sems can rgya ba rgyan gcod pas// ye shes 'gag pa med par gsal// bsgom pa'i shes rab yin pa'i phyir// mnyam gzhag dang la yengs pa med// rjes thong ma yengs ting bzhin du// ye shes rang las chos dra/
180b6(rnying rgyud): btsal// de shes gdeng gis zin pa ni// nyi shar mun grib med pa 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po rnon// sems kyi snying po rig pa dang // sangs rgyas snying po ye shes dang // chos kyi snying po rdzogs chen dang // 'byung ba'i snying po nam mkha' dang // 'khor 'das
180b7(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid// de don rnam par dbye ba ni// kun bzang rgyud dungs bshad kyis// dad ldan bye ba togs par gyis// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don 'dus pa las snying po nges don 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sran rig son
181a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'ang // na la 'arnas pa// dab na smra 'das// na rgya kyis bsta byas nas// 'dag snar phyung // sasun bya ma dang nag // sems sbyang bcwa tshigs ngan// yul dang
181a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis ma sod spyang // de yang mkhrul ba'i semasas snad // dpying snang bangs med yin// shes klung dgaginang du ni// 'a dag snga phyogs ras 'i zhug pas// kha nag gatshogs ci yang snang // srung yang shUl la 'gyur ba med// de bzhin dbyung ba la/
181a3(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin rten sas sa drug 'byung // 'khrul pa'ang ma cir yang sdung // sdang yang ga zhil 'gyung brjo // de yang 'dus pa'i sa nyon// gse ts+tsha'i lagags pa sbyad byas nas// tshal bangs sbyin spyo zlas na// seM nga ngan pa'i das s+yA snang /
181a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin 'phrul pas brtags tsaman// yul kyang ma dag 'jig rten khams// de mthog g.yangs kyi rdo snang // gsuM sgra mchod rten byas tsaman// tshogs pasag rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir// gser kyang bzang po'i rdzas su mthong // ye shes can gying ging la/
181a5(rnying rgyud): yul kyang zhi khams rnam par dag/ rin chen gaskyer gying ga la// gsang sa rgyal bzang ngan med// de bzhin chos pa dzin la// s+yAng dang mi snang gzhil med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying nyon// sna tshogs da kyi chags rnams la// bachog sngam thams
181a6(rnying rgyud): tsamaH// snatshogs dang kyi mi da bral// b+ha 'og skam bya gcig pa ltang// chos srung ba ni sems yin cing // l+r-ing ldan rkyen gyis bsnyen tsa na// sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i sems nga bral// thig 'i rtagag cig chen pa 'dres// dbe na ldan rig gzhi gcis/
181a7(rnying rgyud): la// la la'i sman pal pa'i drug/ de bzhin ngos don chos 'di la// la la'i brang chub la la'i dmyal// ha la na ga 'i drug dag byed// thabs ma khas bza' legs sman gyi mchog/ de bzhin 'dod chags ni sdang yang // nyon mongs rangs mal
181b1(rnying rgyud): / de ni rang byung ye shes yin// spyan gyi rgyal po'i bcud len kyang // thabs la ma mkhas bza' nyes na// ha la nag po'i dug dang 'dra// rang la gnas pa'i chos nyid kyang // lung med 'khrul pa'i dbang song tshe// 'dod chags la sogs dug lnga yin/
181b2(rnying rgyud): dayang ngo na sems dpa' nyon// sa 'og gnas pa'i rin chen gser// ngom shes na rdo dang 'dra// de bzhin rang la yod pa'i don// rtogs pa med pa'i 'khrul rtog sems// ngo shes phrad na mi zad gter// dgos 'dod re bde las byung // res don chos
181b3(rnying rgyud): skye rtogs tsaman// byin rlabs nor bu'i tshul du 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i snying ba ton// mkha' la gza' skar shar ba dang // rba nang ngag gi gzugs brnyan ni// gcig pa ma yin mo sa min// de bzhin rig pa'i rgyal ba dang // rig pa'i rtsal du snang ba gnyis
181b4(rnying rgyud): sdig bcas ma da ngo bo gcig/ rdzogs pa chen po ngas don 'dus pa las dpe don 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyud pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// chu rkyen ma bskyed rang byung la// gsal 'grib med pa
181b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes yin// rtsol spab dag las ma byung bas// rang byung lam la rag ma lus// yul las mabyung ye gnas te// lung ldan rkyen gyis rtogs pas chog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yang dag chos su 'dus pa 'di// rang la yod kyis gzhan ma blta//
181b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid ngang las thugs ma bcos// lta ba'i don la brjed mangs// sgom pa'i dang 'dran lagasal// spyod pa'i chos la bcos ma bslad// dam tshig gzung ba 'tshur mkhyen// 'bras bu'i chos la rtags ma ring // da yang 'khor gyi spring ba nyon// 'gros med kyis
181b7(rnying rgyud): can 'dug/ ye nas yin gyis ga ma bcol// 'khor ba tshas 'angs ma 'dzin// snang ba'i yul lazhinam gyi// 'jig rten gtam 'grom no// namamakha' dag la bgos mthod// rgyal ba'i bka' la nad mabyud// mang pon dag la 'gas ma 'jug/
182a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa can pangasadon mas ca 'dasa' lag dan kyi bsrung bstan pa'i lo'u stedas pa la// nanas rang sems dpa' bos// 'das pa'i 'khar ba phan gdags kyang// kun rigs pa sus mal bab// yon nan pas 'duskad
182a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// mtshan nyid theg pa'i ltar 'khrul// phyi nang gsang sngags sgrib pa gang // thabs med yon tan ji ltar rdzogs// theg chen kun dang mi 'dra gang // rdzogs chen rang gzhung dbye ba dang // lam dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis// theg pa gzhan sun dri ltar
182a3(rnying rgyud): gdon// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// phung po lnga yis kun khyab ste// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ni// so so'i dbye ba ngas bshad kyis//
182a4(rnying rgyud): po spyi yi mtshan nyid kyis// phung po lnga ru 'dod pa'i gzhung // sems tsam theg chen pa na re// phung po lnga la ma gtogs pa'i// chos ni gzhan nas yod min phyir// phung po lnga ni yang dag yod// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgya yi phung po lnga rnams kyang //
182a5(rnying rgyud): lhar ni ma shes dad pa yis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi// lam la rim gyis bgrod byas nas// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis// sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis sbyang ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan na// rang gi don dam nges pa yin// 'bras bu thob pa'i dus
182a6(rnying rgyud): na ni// sku gsum ye shes bzhi 'dod// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po lnga ru 'dod pa de// yang dag don dam ma yin te// du mar snang yang rkyen gyis babyed// gnyen pos bcos shing bsgyur yod phyir// kun rdzob skya ma tsam yod par// yang dag
182a7(rnying rgyud): don du 'dod pa 'khrul// mi dang tho yor phag sbrul bzhin// 'khrul pa yin par the tshom med// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po lnga yi dbye ba dang // mtshan nyid so sor tha dad pa'i// sems tsam gzhung du zhi ba bstan gyis// nges don skabs spangs ma
182b1(rnying rgyud): bshad/ rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ sems tsam sun 'don pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun bzang ston pas bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags phye nang 'dod pa'i gzhung // zhang po khams
182b2(rnying rgyud): dang skye mched rnams// sangs rgyas yin par blos bsgyur nas// ye shes sems dpa' mchod la sogs// tshogs gnyis bsod nams bskyed nas ni// chos nyid sgrib pa bral dus na// 'bras bu 'byung bar nges pa ni// sku gsum ye shes lngar 'dod pas//
182b3(rnying rgyud): rang rig chos ska nges don bsgribs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa ni// phung po lnga sogs rtog tshogs kun// ma bskyed rdzogs par 'dod pa de// 'bras bu ye shes lnga dang ni// sku lha lhun grub 'dod pas bsgribs// yang dag 'dus
182b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying pa nyon// rang bzhin ldan grub sangs rgyas ni// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur cing // gnyen pos bcos shing bskyar du med// thabs ni gang la'ang mi brten phyir// rang byung kun tu bzang po bya// de yang 'khor gyi skying mo nyon// phung po rnam pa lnga las kyang /
182b5(rnying rgyud): lnga ye shes lnga ru 'dod// phung po gcig las med pa la// 'bras bu tha dad 'byung ba yis// gnas 'gyur du ni sangs rgyas nas// rig lnga'i yon tan rdzogs 'dod pas// shin tu mi 'thad 'gal ba'i phyir// ma rig rmongs pas rang la bsgribs// de don dgongs
182b6(rnying rgyud): shing bsgrib pa ni// kun gzhan du ni zhib bstan phyir// nges don skabs spangs ma bshad// da yang rdo rje sems dbang nyon// ming gi rnam grangs du bstan yang // don gyi ngo bo gcig tu 'dus// rtsal shugs tshul du gnyis su sdang // don la dgos med tshig dang bral// de kyi
182b7(rnying rgyud): byis pa'i sprin tshig 'dra// phung po khams dang skye mched can// sems su byas shing tshwa yis bcos// de phyir yang dag phung po min// don dam chis la spos ci dgos// de phyir ma rig rmongs pa kun// gnas 'gyur sangs rgyas 'dod pas phung // gtan du 'khyams pa
183a1(rnying rgyud): @ltang ring // rdzogs pa zan pa ngas don 'dus pa las/ gas sngags kyi nang gi 'dod gzungs na 'don pa bstan pa'i lezla sta bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun reg ston pas bka' stsal pa// mra spyugs
183a2(rnying rgyud): chad 'drar bskur btab kyang // des don snying po ma mthong phyir// gtan tshig sgo skur skyon bka' kyang // don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// theg pa 'og ma'i chos kun bzhin// shes rab thabs la brten dgos na// byas pa yin gyi
183a3(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs min// su dang ye shes 'brud me srid// de phyir thabs la rag lus med// rang byung snying ba zos spa ni// nyi ma dang ni 'od bzhin du// shes rab chos su gcig pu la// skra dang ye shes kun ka rdzogs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// des don bka'
183a4(rnying rgyud): yis drang don kun// sran bton sgo 'dogs chod pa yin// nges don bka' la sun 'don med// de phyir dang don bka' 'di gol// nges don yang ti'i gzhung gis ni// dngos su snang yang 'byung ba med// don dam rang bzhin ngo bar gnas// don du zab ma dmigs kyang //
183a5(rnying rgyud): rang byung yon tan grags la rdzogs// rtswa mra'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // rang byung spyan gyis thub pa yis// rang byung dang la shugs kyis 'byung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po dbye ba 'dus grags kyang // thun morang theg par sgo bsun d+hi // glan da'adi
183a6(rnying rgyud): mthun bstan pa yang // drang don yin phyir yang dag min// yang dag nges don yang ti ni// dper na shing thog smin pa la// 'bras bu shugs kyis 'byung ba ltar// chos su sgrib pa med pa la// sku gsum ye shes lnga rnams kyang // ma btsal rang bzhin ldan gyis rdzogs
183a7(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i sangs kyis don gyis tshang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes can// ma sras thogs pa med par brtsen// rdzogs pa chen pongs don 'dus pa las thabs la ma brten par yon tan thams cad rang la rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas/
183b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams ces// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// theg pa gzhan nang sgo bstan byer// phung bcu 'bras dan byas pa// phung po rnam pa lnga pad// yang dag don dang rjen btangs pa// rtag chad zal dang rang gnas// sran rag ston pas
183b2(rnying rgyud): dra gsol// de skad byas pa'i don gas na nas// 'das pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rnam shes phung po yang dag yod// phung po bzhin byin rlabs byung // tag chang bal ba'i rnam shes ni// kun gzhi rang gis bo yin// te ga zang ngo bor gnas pa ni
183b3(rnying rgyud): ldang po gzhan dang tsho gas bdun yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de yi 'bras bu spu lnga dang // ye shes lnga rnams yod tshang ni// 'dus mthus kyi nam mkha' bzhin// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par ni// chos spyi ye shes yang dag yang//
183b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes gzhan dag ni// byin gyis brlabs las 'byung ba ste// gza' skar rgya mtsho de bzhin du// rtsol du med par shugs las 'byung // chos sku me long lta bu ni// rtag chad gnyis dang bral bar gnas// ngo bo rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// de phyi dus gsum
183b5(rnying rgyud): dkyar med// su dang ye shes gzhan dag ni// tag chad gnyis kyi bor gnas// theg pa gzhan du zhi ba bstan gyis// nges don skabs spangs ma bshad// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ theg pa kyi dang rang gi 'gal bar bstan pa'i le'u skye bcwa
183b6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// yang ti rang gzhung bka' stsal pa// rang byung ye shes chos su la// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang // yang dag don du mi 'dod phyir// ye shes gzhan la spros ci dgos// da yang rnon sems
183b7(rnying rgyud): nyon// rang blang ye shes chen po ni// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur ba// me long lta bu'i ye zhes kyang // thog ma med kyang tha ma yod// de cing chen las byung ba yin/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i dus tsam na// kun gni rnam par shes pa la// gnyen pos 'gyed pa'i ga
184a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur gyi// ye shes bya ba'i ming yang med// nges don yang ti'i gzhung gis ni/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i dus na yang // rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi su// chos su zab pa ye gnas phyir// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob dus na// ye shes chos kyi sgra ni
184a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// de phyir don dmachos skal// mos ni gzhan na yod me srid// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'on khyod kyi 'dod pa ste// sems can las ni sangs rgyas pas// de nyid 'gyen pa ma yin nam// nges don 'gyur ba ma yin te// ma tog/ bag chags bcas pa
184a3(rnying rgyud): dang // rtogs pa bag chags bral ba'i phyir// khyad par tha dad snang gyur kyang // don la rgya 'bras rim gyis med// ngo bo gzhi yi chos sku dang // rtogs pa ye shes chos sgra gnyis// ngo bo'i gzhi la tha dad med// nyi ma rang gi ngo bo la// mun grib grang ba gang yang med//
184a4(rnying rgyud): glo zad ljin gyis pasgri bapa tsam na// nyi 'od med pa ma yin te// ngo ngo phel 'brib med pa lhur// rtogs martogs pa'i thad par las// sems can sangs kyis gcig pa'i phyir// gzhi langs gsum 'gyur med yin// da yang de rje sems dpa' thon// lung ldan bstan
184a5(rnying rgyud): pas thams cad mkhyen// de dus 'bras bu sangs kyis phyir// ngo bo dag la 'phel 'grib med// skye 'gag med par rgyun du gnas// sems can dus kyi chos spu las// de las 'phel ba dul tsam med// de phyir yang dag ngas bshad nyon// de yang 'dus
184a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po nyon// 'o na dus gsum mi 'gyur cing // thams cad chos skur 'dod pa de// lung rigs gnyis dang 'gal ba dang // sdud pa'i rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir// 'o na rtag dang khyad ci yod// de yang don dang mi 'gal te// thams cad chos skur 'dus
184a7(rnying rgyud): pa de// bsdus nas 'dus pa ma yin te// nyi 'od srurang ma mang rab bzhin// dus gcig rdzogs pa zos kyi sra// rang bzhin dang gis gnas pa bzhin// chu rkyen tshogs 'dus ma yin pas// wang dang rigs pa kyim dag la/ kha dog dbyibs su med pa la// rtag /
184b1(rnying rgyud): na nan du du na du
184b2(rnying rgyud): da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos nyid mchod sngags ba'i phyir// sgo lnga dag gi slod yul min// de rtsir chos su brjod las 'das// btags pa'i tha sta dgran dang bral// de phyir sems kyi yul las 'das// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes la// chog gi mtshon thams cad
184b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ yang ti rang don shan dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pa yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyan thos lam dang 'bras bu'i gzhung // tshe 'di'i snga ma yang snga la// dge sdig las ni gang byas
184b4(rnying rgyud): thob dus ni// gzhan don mthar phyin grub pa las// 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob par du// mtho ris 'bras buganas rten bcas// lha dang mi yi the ma skas la// rim par 'jogs nas sangs rgyas 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshod ni lang ti rdzogs men pa// rtogs pa
184b5(rnying rgyud): gcig pus chog zer na// rgyu rkyen mtshogs 'bras bu 'dod// stong pa nyid kyis mtha' ru lhung // lung rigs gnyis dang shin tu 'gal// de bas dge ba tshogs par spyad// 'bras bu lha dang mi yi ni// 'bras bu thob par bya ba la// rang sems rtogs pas mi chog ste// bsong
184b6(rnying rgyud): nams tshogs ni bsags nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i dbang brten te// ting 'dzin cigacig bsgom gyur na// 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa yi// ye shes thob par 'gyur ba la// khyod ni yang ti rdzogs chen pa// 'khor ba las ni thar gyur nas// mya ngan 'das pade mthang rab tu/
185a1(rnying rgyud): byas na 'bras sa 'a drag// dbas mas pang mdanga'// pa sa/ na da // la dzus da na bas pasasas so// / gags nas gargyas ra 'gyur/ ga nga rga/
185a2(rnying rgyud): cigacigs// ma yengs don la bsgom gyur na// bdag don chos su 'grub par 'gyur// da yang 'dras pa'i snying po ton// 'bras tha bdag dang gzhan don ces// phran sum tshogs pa thob pa ni// 'di las thabs chen nges pa'i las// chos ni gzhan na yad dazang // da dag kyi
185a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs bsags thabs// snying rje chen pos gzhi bzung nas// theg pa gzhan du zhib bstan phyir// des don skabs sungs ma bshad// da yang rngon sems dpa' nyon// gsang sngags kyi nang 'dod pa'i gzhung // lam dang 'bras bu'i khyad par ni// thabs dang shes rab zang 'brel
185a4(rnying rgyud): nas// bde ba'i yon tan rnyed par 'gyur// 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa yi// ye shes thob par bya ba la// thabs dang shes rab 'jom pa dgos// de phyir thabs ni gang zhe na// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// lha dang lha mor gnas 'gyur bar// rim gyis bskyed dam
185a5(rnying rgyud): ma bskyed rdzogs// cho ga gsum mam bdun gyis ni// bskyed cing bsgyur byas ye shes sems// spyan drangs pa ste ma dang mchod la sogs// gzhung dang ldan par byas gyur pas// mthar phyin 'bras bu thob dus na// gzugs spu rnam gnyis 'byung nas kyang // byang chub
185a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' man chad nas// sems can dmyal ba yan chad kyis// 'gro don mthar phyin grub pa la// stong nyid ting 'dzin bag chags spangs// chos sku thams cad mkhyen pa yi// ye shes bde ldan thob par 'gyur// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'di las lhag
185a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i des don chos// rdzogs chen yang ti khyed la med// de phyir thabs la brten nas ni// shes rab lta bas zag be cad de// 'bras bu nges par 'byung bar 'dod// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ sngags dang mtshan nyid kyi lam dang 'bras bu dbye ba'i le'u ste/
185b1(rnying rgyud): bya// / de nas 'das pa 'chogs rnams la// kun ga ston pas bka' phrul ba// phyag brgyad la ma thog pa na// khyed cag zung ma nam gapas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel dgas zer// 'khrul pa tas par zha ba lan// da yang /
185b2(rnying rgyud): tod// dper nam 'dod pa lag+sa// rngu bsrubs pas ni ma ming ta// rnabs kyi mi ni ma dngos pa sdu// non pa'i thams cis kyang byab 'dadong // dpe na nyima'i stor pol// sprin dgang dag gti ga / deb nang bskal bted dus
185b3(rnying rgyud): gang zag kun gyis rlong por bzung // de byer lam chi gegs su gsungs// dA yang dri rje sems dpa' nyon// dper na skyes bu mi rnams kyis// sngags med pa ye drag pos na// a thaka yi rkyen yin phyir// tshe zung gang cos gnyis ka 'dzi// nges pa'i wang do med
185b4(rnying rgyud): babs ni brgyang gnyis kus 'arnabs// krol bzlas pas bangs dgol// dkyi nga gcos pa ne// sems cigazi ni sa nan// thabs ga la 'ang na pa med// dpyid ma na tung bar rdzog// dayang 'dras par rnyeng bton// chen gadreg pa'i ga pa
185b5(rnying rgyud): ma dpos tu thonas// 'bras thams dazhen pas / ma thob ba da / sa kyi gtan pa gamu/ tugs sgom pa rgyal pa ra// mamatshom pa ldan sa da/ tshul sa yid padadran pa shu shA
185b6(rnying rgyud): sa// da yang 'dus pa'i snying zhon// sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro ba yi// nges pa'i lam ni gang yin hU~Mr// thog mar blta ba'i gdangs dang na// ting 'dzin gyud la mangs gcig bya// rang byung snying po'i dan/ gas phyir// brjod pa'i tha stan kun dang zar// thig pa
185b7(rnying rgyud): // shes dang sangs rgyas dus mnyam gyir// de las lhag pa'i chos gzhan med// da yang de sems dpa' nyon/ khyod ni theg pa 'og ma pa// bye ma las ni mar btsor bzhin// bes po 'byung ba rnam pazhi las// sangs cas 'dod pa'i snying dral bran//
186a1(rnying rgyud): par btu kyang 'thab paspyod// bar pa sams pan// thalta pa tho gyur pa da // sanas parjog ya thAs/ thung thug na// dgas ldan pas dag 'dang // bgan nga/ na
186a2(rnying rgyud): dmam par spangs pa bzhin// drin tsam kyis thos phyogs pa// ci byed nas brtsam ma dgos// de myi ma brjod pa mim// dpe den nor ba rin men bzhin/ rtogs pa cim sachog pa'i tshor// bdag gzhan ga ni skang kyis 'grub/ phyi dpa na yang na/
186a3(rnying rgyud): de yang ni sems dpa' na// khyeng pagacag pa 'ogs // dab na til 'i mar ma bang // mamatshar bar dramar mi byung // de bzhin dang bya yang ma kyang // ma dan pa du shes kyi med/ bkang pa 'jam ga bskyes byar// 'dres byas chos tho bas par
186a4(rnying rgyud): ngas cas 'byung med// da'adu 'angs pa snye nas/ dedag ste da las mang yang / rang ma ma pa shesan// nim la dzi mamed da ga // dag brjo na sa pas/ thug pa pa
186a5(rnying rgyud): skye badrug sa/ na numamam pa'i'iste/ 'drim pa 'ab ba nagangs rgya/ bde na nam them la sa// 'dadapa 'tshig gis 'din na nan// marin pa ni pa ci shi // thal sems panis gargyas ni gtug
186a6(rnying rgyud): nga bye da/ la du yod dpa / nis sa rgyas med par byung // kyims pasha ngan mo'o// des nam na pasan // 'dum pa'i la ba ma ba d+hAs d+ha// sems ca can lugs ma 'don// marig sa shes
186a7(rnying rgyud): su lu su su / sa / sa sa su
186b1(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pa dang bzhin// de la phral ma 'dzin pan// bgal nyal ba'i mnA thung // dpyi dang la nga gas bsgribs// lhan gas pa ma dab/ rtswas rgya gas dal tha// rgyud gadzang gyur ba na// nam thag tu 'angan pas brtags// dganam ma dang /
186b2(rnying rgyud): zhen 'dzin cing // de mthag pa'i rkyen zhes bya// rgyu dang de ma thag pa yi// rkyen gnyis brang du 'jom pa'i phyir// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig yin// da yang 'dras pa'i snying po nyon// des bskyed shes pa mngal du 'jug/ ngar 'dzin chags sdang phram ze// nang gi bzung
186b3(rnying rgyud): bkun tu brtas// de phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen zhes bya// khong nas byung nas phyi rol gyi// bag chags yul gyi sdang ba la// rang gi yid kyi ngan tog zhugs// yul la chos brgyad kun tu btags// nga bdag dan tog 'dzin bltas zhen// mngon rgya chags sdang 'tshar phyis
186b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa bdag po'i rkyen gnyis tshang // kun brtags ma rig pa zhes bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lhan cig kun btags gnyis 'jom pas// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yin// des bskyed tshogs brgyad kha tshang bas// 'khor bar 'khyams zhes de la gya//
186b5(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyan// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// rang sems rab rtogs pas byung // yang na dang byung kun cigazhi// shes nas lung ldan nges padzi don// zung du 'jom kyir ye shes yin// sman dang sman pa 'jom pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'ja
186b6(rnying rgyud): pa las/ ma rig pa dang ye shes dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas kun reg rgyal po yis// yul sems dbye ba bka' stsal pa// sna zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// 'khrul sems bag zugs btas pa'i phyir// snang bzhen pa sna tshogs pa//
186b7(rnying rgyud): bo yul du grub pa med// de phyir snang ba log 'khrul yin// da yang 'dres pa'i snying po nyon// rang gi sems ni 'khrul pa'i dpe// thag sbrul po yor mi bzhin du// med la yod 'dzin kun tu brtags// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi// 'khrul pa'i bag chags brtas pa
187a1(rnying rgyud): phyir// dngos su snang yang don du med// de yul 'di ni gtan med la// rmongs pa kun gyis dam par 'dzin// lag pa'i rjes su 'brang bas ltung // smre 'dra'i lung gis bslad pa yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang rig chos sgra ya
187a2(rnying rgyud): shes la// ma rig rgyan bzhis ma bskyed pas// kun gzhi med phyir sems kyang med// yul sems gnyis ka gzhi la med// de phyir sems min chos srul// rang rig ye shes blo ldan pas// snang ba med phyir 'dzin pa bral// gsal la 'dzin med mi g.yo ba// sangs
187a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs par bshad// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyen// rang snyems yul du 'dzin pa'i rgyu// 'khor ba'i sa bon ma rig pas// rgyu rkyen byas nas sdug bsngal 'byung // de phyir rang 'khrul rmongs pa'i sems// gzung 'dzin bying rgod zhen pa'i cha// yal la brten
187a4(rnying rgyud): nas chags sdang skye// 'khor ba'i rgyu ni chags sdang gnyis// gcig dang mi gcig rtsol ba'i bar// 'khor ba'i mtha' la zad pa med// de phyir rang rig don rtogs nas// sems med yul 'di ci la srid// de bas rang sems snying po 'di// sems kyi yul las 'das
187a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// gcig dang mi gcig brjod kyi bar// ma rig blo la yul sems yod// log lta can rnams dam par 'dzin// de phyir sgra dang mtshan ma'i chos/ sbrel 'dra'i lung gi blos btags nas// yul sems rtsol ba'i chos kun byung // ngas lung man ngag bstan pa yis// yang
187a6(rnying rgyud): dag nges pa'i sangs rgyas la// rang rig chos sku sems dang bral// de phyir yul med rig pa ga tso// nga'i lung go bas yul sems brlag/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de yang rtsa ba mdor bsdus na// nyi shar rngan zab med pa bzhin// rang byur chos sku'i don rtogs pas//
