211b3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phyir// dngos po yul gyi mtha' las 'das// skye med don ni de bzhin gshegs// rang gi ngo bo brjod du med// rgyu med phyir na skye ba med// rkyen med phyir na 'jigs pa med// de phyir sems dang bral ba'i thugs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon//
211b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin skye med spos dang bral// brjod du med par rang yid ches// rgya chen ma bskyed don gyi phyir// lhun gyis grub par thig chod do// rdzogs pa chen po des don 'dus pa las/ rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// /
211b5(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rol pa gang yang mi 'gag pas// skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung // de phyir rol pa 'gag med pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi che ba bshad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon//
211b6(rnying rgyud): nadang 'byung ba sna tshogs pa// snang stong dbyer med kun khyab mnga'// mtha' dbus med las thams cad 'byung // de phyir nam mkha' kun gyi gzhi// rtsi shing nags tshal thams cad bskyed// theg chen po la kun gnas pa// byang chub dper ni bstan pa'i phyir//
211b7(rnying rgyud): des ni rol pa 'gags pa med// thams cad sdud par byed pa'i phyir// gzhi gnas rnam dag zla chen pos// mi gtsang gol sgrib 'khrud pa'i dpe// de phyir rol pa 'gag pa med// gang yang chags pa'i rten med phyir// zhes bya thogs med ye shes rlung //
212a1(rnying rgyud): rig nam tog 'byor pa'i dag/ de phyi can bzung rol par bstan// thams cad ma lus kun pa sreg phyir// skrag mthong ye shes 'di 'bar mo// theng rgod mapar 'dzin 'joms pa'i dag// dper ral pa 'gags pazung //
212a2(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos spong ba nyid kyi rtsel// snang ba'i di ni chos kyi dbyings// de yang rang gsal chos nyid rtsal// 'byung ba ye shes lta ru dag/ daphyir 'gag/ med ril pa yin// du yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// theg pa
212a3(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad ni// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs// cir yang snang ba sprul pa'i sku// de phyir rol pa 'gag med yin// snang srid 'byung ba'i sgra skad kun/ khyab gsal rang bzhin go ba'i sgra// gsang sngags gsung gi 'khor
212a4(rnying rgyud): lor shur// de yang 'gag med rol pa yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// ring gis nges pa'i ye shes kyi// ngang pas choms byed rgyas kyi dri// lhag mthong tshor ba rang bying sgra// de yang chos nyid rol pa yin// chos su thig le nyag gcig la//
212a5(rnying rgyud): rtswa lA ni chos nyid nyams su myong // myong yang don du 'dzin pa med// de yang 'gag med rol pa yin// rang byang sangs rgyas ye shes de// bde mchog don la rig pa'i chos// de rtsal don la 'gyur ba med// de yang 'gag med rol pa yin//
212a6(rnying rgyud): de yi don la 'gyur ba med// 'gegs med nga yi rol pa yin// nges pa'i lung ldan gdams ngag gis// gi deng nyams che ba'i don nyid la// ye shes nga rgyal bdag nyid che// nges pa'i don dang 'bral mi phod// sdug bsngal gang yang med pa'i phyir//
212a7(rnying rgyud): bde chen rang bzhin snying rje chags// zhen pa gang yang med pa'i phyir// de yang 'gag med rol pa yin// gol dang ltung ba med pa'i phyir// chos nyid gzhan dang phrag dog med// de phyir rang byung chen por shar// de yang 'gag med rol pa yin//
212b1(rnying rgyud): nayang 'dus pa'i slong banyan// 'byung ba 'dang yon dug lnga yang // thams kya gags tsas rtswa gang// byadagag nga byung dgas pas// kun yang ba ba nga khyab s+ho// / dgas pa rgyan sa ngon 'dus pa dang/ rnam pa gas
212b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// mtshan nyid gnyis med gtan tshigs kyi// nges don rtsab chos srul// lung ldan gyen gyis yid ches bya// @
212b3(rnying rgyud): sems can ngo bo la// rang byung yin phyir gnyis su med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de nyid rtogs pas 'khor 'das dag/ de phyir mtshan nyid gnyis su med// phyi dang nang dang snod dang bcud// mtho ris ngan song dge dang sdig// dag dang sa das
212b4(rnying rgyud): gtsang rme dang // yin dang min dang blang dor dang // bya dang mi bya sgron yon sogs// tha snyad gnyis su gsungs pa kun// dper na ri bong de bzhin du// tshig tu yod la don la med// de phyir mtshan nyid gnyis med pa'i// gtan tshigs chen por bzhag pa
212b5(rnying rgyud): ra yang 'das pa'i snying po nyon// mtha' dang bral ba'i chos spa 'di// med pa ma yin dran dang tshod// chad pa ma yin rig ti gsal// rtag pa ma yin dngos po med// gnyis sum so zla bo med// gcig tu ma song kun la yod// da yang rdo rje sems dpa
212b6(rnying rgyud): nyon// chos can rang gi mtshan nyid ni// gdod nas gnyis su med pa yi// chos rnams rtsa ba gcig pa'idon// gtan tshigs dag nyis yid ches bya// gnyis med ces su btags pa ni// 'dres pa'i don gyis ma yin te// gang dang ma 'bres rang byung s+ya/
212b7(rnying rgyud): tshad dang gnyis med ma yin te// sangs rgyas snying po chos sgra yod// de phyir gzhi la 'khor 'das med// gnyis ka med phyir mthar ma reg/ rang byung chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po des don 'dus pa las// mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i gtan
213a1(rnying rgyud): / tshigs bstan pa'i le'u ster drug pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// ra ba du bgrol ba// gtan mags ngas par yid zas ngan// lus ngagatsal ba med pa'i phyir// rang byu
213a2(rnying rgyud): grol 'ching grol med// de phyir ngo bo nyid du gnas// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gzung 'dzin skyon gyis mgos pas// rnam rtog blo ni rang sar grol// de phyir nges don ye shes klong // rgyud dngadu rkyen las ma byung bas// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de nyid rtog
213a3(rnying rgyud): pas chos skur grol// yang dag sangs rgyas 'di las med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos nyid dus gsum mi 'gyur phyir// las kyi dbang du gzhi mi 'gyur// de phyir chos sgo rtogs pas grol// de las sogs pa gang yang med// nges pa'i lung
213a4(rnying rgyud): yid ches pa'i// nges pa'i gdeng rnyed rnal 'byor pas// mi yi lus ni 'di nyid las// sangs rgyas 'bras bu da lta tho ba// de phyir rang blo ngo bo nyid// dus 'dir rtsol bas btsal du med// 'dzin med gsal pas bsgom du med// de phyir yang dag dgongs
213a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdeng // de dang su ldan rnal 'byor mchog/ de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// byang chub sems ni rnam dag pas// de don rang byang don rtogs pas// sangs rgyas gzhan du bsgrub mi dgos// de phyir lung ldan gdams ngag gces// chos nyid dag tu blo
213a6(rnying rgyud): krol phyir// nyon mongs drug lnga rang sar grol// de la skyon gyis ma gos te// rang byung lus la ye shes zhugs// sems can rang blos 'dzin pa med// de phyir nyams pa rdul tsam med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'jig rten ma lus thams
213a7(rnying rgyud): cad kun// bsam gyis mi khyab tshig gyur kyang // nam mkha' tshig par mi 'gyur bzhin// nges don rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// lha srin mkha' 'gros dgrar langs kyang // gnod pas mi tshug ji bzhin byed// de phyir lung ldan shin tu gnyan/ rdzogs pa
213b1(rnying rgyud): chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ rang slong bo nyid du grol ba'i gtan tshigs bstan pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// / de nas kun rig smyon pa la// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don rjed du// rdorje sems dpas 'di skad gsol// nges don gdul bya ga
213b2(rnying rgyud): bu yi// sku gsum ston pa ji ltar 'byung // de 'khor las can gang la gsungs// 'gyur med rgyun gyi dpe don gang // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas ngo
213b3(rnying rgyud): sku gsum las// chos sgra rang byang rig pa de// dus gsum dag tu skye 'gag med// 'gro 'od med par le nas gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// des don chos sku'i mthun dpe ni// 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' che// dngos med kun khyab
213b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gcig/ mtha' dbus ris su dbye ru med// de don rang byung ngo bo de// tshig tu brjod med rang rig sgra// thugs la gsal phyir nges shes pas// de phyir kun bzang chos kyi sku// zhing khams chos nyid bde ba'i klong // rang bzhin 'og min byang chub
213b5(rnying rgyud): thugs// de las 'gyur ba rdul tsam med// dang byang rig pa rnam par dag/ snying po chos sku thugs sgo ni// chu 'bras gzhi la med pa'i don// chos nyid rtsol bral snying po yis// 'khor 'das ma rig lhun rdzogs chos// chos sku'i ston pa kun
213b6(rnying rgyud): bzang gis// dgongs pa'i nges don byin brlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i nyid las mi gzhan 'khor// dus gsum sangs rgyas nyid la bshad// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ chos sku'i gdul bya bstan pa'i le'u ste re bskyed pa'o// /
213b7(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// de yi gdul byings par 'byung // nidon legs par bshad kyis nyon// longs su 'byung ba'i mthun dpo'o// nam mkha
214a1(rnying rgyud): dngos med go dpal// gzha' tshon namatham 'dres gas pa// dan ma nyid nas dngas mang yin// de bzhin dang gang po yang// sbo ma chos da kyisngal// rags la sgyu mngon brgyan pa 'byung // dbying yongs su sangs
214a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas yin// kun gzhi chos sku'i gzhi cha la// snga phyi bag chags med par gsal// 'byung lnga'i rol pa sna tshogs kyang // zhen pa med phyir chos nyid dbyings// yang dge nges pa'i 'bras bu rnyed// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra'i sgo nas// ldem dgongs
214a3(rnying rgyud): gyi nang gsang ba'i don// sa bcu'i rig 'dzin sems dpa' la// gsang sngags rang gi ngo bos ston// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa lngas/ longs sku'i 'khor gyi gdul bya bstan pa'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la/
214a4(rnying rgyud): kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// sprul pa'i sgra yi sangs rgyas ni// ji ltar ston phyir sprul pa'i sgra// 'gro ba'i don phyir gdul bya la// ci rigs par ni don mdzad do// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gzhan don sbrul sku'i mthun dpe ni// nges med brag cha
214a5(rnying rgyud): khyad dang ni// seng ge chu zla gzugs brnyan dang // u dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra// srul sgra rang gi ngo bo ni// thub pa drug tu sku sprul te// mi yis shAkya thub par mthong // lha mi rnams kyi ston pa yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// zhing khams gsum
214a6(rnying rgyud): gyi gnas 'di yi// 'gro drug sems can las dag nas// tshogs gnyis bsag thabs la brten nas// sgrib sbyangs 'bras bu rim gyis 'byung // sbrul sku'i gsung gi sgo nas ni// gang la gang 'os drang don du// dge sdig rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi chos/
214a7(rnying rgyud): sdeb sbyor legs pa tshig tu spyod// rdzogs pa chen zengs don 'dus pa las/ sbrul sgra'i 'khor gyi gdul bya bstan pa'i me sku bdun cupa'o// / de nas 'das pa'i 'khor rnams pa// kun rig sbyin pas bka' sum pa// 'bras brangs pa mtha
214b1(rnying rgyud): drug nga// cha ba'i man tan ga tan bang// dAdan lags par ngas bsha // 'khar 'das gnyis kyi gan gyu ba// rang byung nga ba nyid stoH// dgas 'khor 'das thams dkyus// ga ni// po ma thu pa dzang// sma
214b2(rnying rgyud): don la med// dpyir rang byung na gyi gzhi// de la bskyed par num pa med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' zhon// dbe nagasang gcig pa la// dbyi ba sna dang gzugs ni thang dang // rgyas po dag ming radags// shA gyu
214b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin pakhor 'das sna tshogs la// thun po rnams kyis thaMd du bsgre // de la spyang skad rten pa byas// gzhi la ngo po gcig las med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dpe nar bu rin chen ster// rked pa yod la da// rang byung man gas pa la/
214b4(rnying rgyud): mra btsal yon tan thams cad 'byung // de pyi chos sgra nyid ky-i rtsal// rtogs pa'i byi rlabs ska gsum byung // chos sgra kun bzung nges don pa// rtogs pas phyogs phyir la sangs rgyas// nga yang 'dus pa'i skang banan// su mo sprul pa ljang mang
214b5(rnying rgyud): kyis// dag par spyod pa'i rnal 'byung ba// gyi rgyud rnamugasum chos bstan te// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i san btags// ba~M na me / bya mi gnyis ni// 'dzad pa'i yang tanarnam lnga yang // dus gcig nyams su myong ba yin// dang sa kun cin
214b6(rnying rgyud): mchog bzhin// sgra dang ye shes ma lus pa'i// ci ba'i yon tan 'byung 'dod pas// gzhan don smon lam mthar phyin pa// longs stod tshogs sgra'i 'gro ngo byed// da yang 'dres pa'i snying po nyid// thugs kyi sprul pabyung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa
214b7(rnying rgyud): / nga dang ldan pa'i ga 'dzim la// kyang srung gnyis kyings pa'i chos// gcig tu bslab gyur // rdorje ba chang gis la byug/ dayang 'dus pa nga tan// sra ma chog rgyal btsun na l+h+wa sa bad kyim satas// shing
215a1(rnying rgyud): / bsnyung sran gyi mchog/ gang la reg pas 'tshob ka// yang tig cig le nyag gcig la// nges pa'i lung ldan dan pasan na// lus ngagacol ba mi dgos phyir// bstan dang sangs rgyas ngas mnyam byung // dpyir ma
215a2(rnying rgyud): ngag shes pas chog/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gsung gi sbal pa bAg thub kyis// sems can skye bo las dgu la// sde snod rnam pa gsum gyi chos// bskal ba zangs med rnam gsum na// 'bras bub cwa gtsigs gnon 'dod/
215a3(rnying rgyud): yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na dpag bsam sdod shing pas// bsod nams che chung rim pa yis// 'bras bu sna tshogs rab 'bring 'byung // de phyir las dang sen las byung // de bzhin drang don chos rnams kun// gang rtag go yi rim pa la// ci ga
215a4(rnying rgyud): pa yi chos bstan pas// 'bras bu lha dang mi ru skye// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// drang don chos kyis sangs meH// i mra'i 'bras bu sbyin ma srid// ma rtogs chos kun ci snyed kyang // rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ro// rdzogs pa chen pa ngas don 'das pa
215a5(rnying rgyud): las/ rang rig 'bras bu mthar thug pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o// // de nas 'das pa'i 'khor rnams la// 'gyur med don gyi dpe don ni// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// chu bo chen po'i dpe bzhi yis// mi 'gyur don chen nges
215a6(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa// bshad kyis 'khor rnams legs par nyon// chu gzhan skye 'bri yod mod kyi// chu bo chen po gang gA la// dbyar skye dgun 'bri med par ni// rgyun mi chad par rtag pa bzhin// rang byung sme med rnal 'byor la// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// /
215a7(rnying rgyud): lta ba 'phel 'grib med par ni// ye shes chen po rgyun mi chad // da yang 'bras pa'i snying pa nyon// chu gzhan mtho ba yod mod kyang // rgya ba chen po pad+mal// gting la ring thung med 'bab cing // drag ril med pa snyoms pa bzhin// theg gzhan rdzos/
215b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzig yod par kyang // des na rgyas kyikyi 'dzin la// bran mtshams med par cun du gnas// de pyid 'byung 'drag med pa gsapa// da'ang 'dus pa'i stong brog// rtagags gyur la/ ma ma byung // rtson no na pa// zags sung da/
215b2(rnying rgyud): dal 'ab lding // drang por 'byung ba med pa bzhin// theg gzhan zung dor ched byed kyang // nges don ya tI rdzogs chen la// bzang ngan che chung med par mnyam// 'gyur med ga dod med par spyod// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// mu gzhan sman rdzogs
215b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // si ta na bachen po pa// drag med ldan gyis nang kun sa la// kun gzhan pa'i sman mchog bzhin// nges don rtogs pa'i 'bras bu na// gol sgri ba skad me nges pa'i chos// 'gro ba kun 'phen pa'i chos// khyim ma yin dus 'a byung // nga ya
215b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chu bo bzhi 'dus rgya mtsho ru// cha bran mang po kun 'dus phyir// rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig kyang // chos sgra thig le nyag gcig tu// ste sgom spyod pa 'bras bu 'dras// de phyi rang rig chos su nyid// de rtsal snang ba chos dbyings la//
215b5(rnying rgyud): gang ya ma lhags spyan gyis rbaH/ rdzogs pa rkyen byangs na ngas pa las/ 'gyur ba meng pa'i ban pa klu bstan pa'i me snod dganyis pam// de nas sem/ dpa' smos// 'dres pa'i 'khong la 'ing d+has su phyir/
215b6(rnying rgyud): sakyis ma 'dran dag sa den ga sa/ man tu songs na // gleng gsug da/ sa nas rlos sa// de pa
215b7(rnying rgyud): gas// den gas pa'i dag nan sa nga // 'tha ba bangs mi nas ma pa sa sam las par byas //
216a1(rnying rgyud): byin 'bras bur nges// bud meng ma par po sas zab// bden pa zhis su gan thothob// sarnams gnon par 'bras cin// klu co can po sdug pasngal thul// tshangs par spyod bdag blang chags// bde skyed 'ang
216a2(rnying rgyud): sul bu'i tshul// zab byas shing TAr tan// zag pa med cing 'khor bskongs// dA yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang ni rdzogs rten la sa na// 'gro na mi byed thabs dang bral// chos su martogs shes rab thal// lung lnga nges pa'i don ma thong/
216a3(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab bral ba'i phyir// nyan thos rang rgyal nyid du ltung // de phyir nges pa'i sangs rgyas min// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu yang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// 'gro ba'i don du dka' ljang /
216a4(rnying rgyud): sa kyis pha rol phyin pa bzlas// sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// da yang 'dus pa'i spyir po sbron// san 'od kyis lini// me lus med par longs su'i tshul// mtshan dang dpe byang thams rjed ldam// don dam rang bzhin meng pa'i
216a5(rnying rgyud): phyir// sangs rgyas che ba'i chos kun mkhyen// gdul byul khor gyis longs su mthong // da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyang // yang te rdzogs chen la ltos na// nges don snying po ma mthong phyir// gzhan ma rig
216a6(rnying rgyud): yod pas na// rtsol ba byas pas chos sru bsgribs// de phyir yang dag sangs rgyas min// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don 'dus pa las/ rgya mtshan nyid kyi sangs kyis bstan pa'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po gyis
216a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'bong la bkang stsal pa// gre ma lga dang / mo dang // po mo gnyis kyi tshul du gnas// mgrong lham je'i tshul du yod// thabs dang zhes dang bde ba yang // lha'i tshul dri bltas pas tshim// mi tshe bdun du bgrug pa'i mthus// drang khrong
216b1(rnying rgyud): ngag 'dzin sa rjong mo// skye ba med pa'ijorje 'dzin// rig pa gsum mgon po sangs rgyas pa// bram bu'i tshul dug cang spyod pas// dag pa'i sungs sus 'ba' zhig 'dod// da yang 'dras pa'i stong ponan// ku kyang longs tshogs pa
216b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs brgyan chu na lA bu rjes// 'gro don smon lam stobs kyis byed// de snyir dag pa'i sangs kyis 'dod// du yang rdo rje sems dpa' tor// yo ga rnal 'byor sems dpa' yis// 'bras bu phyas rgya bzhi bslabs te// 'brag ze sreg zong ra
216b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sar// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas 'dod// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thabs dang shes rab bde spyod ni// lha dang lha mo kun kyang ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i cha byad can// sems dpa' sems ma mang pos na// 'dzig bral med la ye
216b4(rnying rgyud): shes lha// chags pa'i tshul gyis bteg pa'i tshul// lag bcangs 'khyud pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba chos kyi dbyings su smin// gsang sngags thabs chen 'bras bu'i mchog/ sangs rgyas san 'da' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med pa
216b5(rnying rgyud): skye shi bral// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i// sangs rgyas bde skyid kun ldan phyir// gzhal yas dkyil 'khor zhing khams rnams// bsam pi tsum gyis rang bzhin 'byung // dper na 'phrul dga'i longs spyod 'dra// nga yang 'das pa'i sku
216b6(rnying rgyud): na// de dag kri yog sangs rgyas kyang // yang ti rdzogs chen la ltos na// rtsed mo 'dra stel ta slob// yang dag des don ma shes pas// ro ngogs yod spyir lhan grub mid// rdzogs pa chen po de sangon 'dus pa las/ gsang sngags kyi chung
216b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor chen po'i sangs rgyas ni// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa'i bya
217a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus rang 'jigs// dayang rdo rje sems dpa' bon// de bsgrub sangs rgyas skye ba 'das// rdorje 'chang ba san // thabs pa shes rab ba skad ga// dga' 'dus po mo'i dpe bzhin du/
217a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrig pa'i sbyor bas thabs kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zhi khro'i lha tshogs rgyan dang bcas// 'dod chags 'khrig pa'i tshul du gnas// bde skyid sangs rgyas ngo bo la// ye nas /
217a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid// grangs kyis mi langs pho mo kun// 'gro doni ma lus dus gcig byed// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// chos rnams rnam rtog dbyer med pas// nam mkha' steng 'byung sna tshogs bzhin// skye shi med pa smos ci dgos// dus
217a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung bas khyad par 'phags// de phyir thabs la brten pa'i mes// 'bras bu byang chub chung mi 'dza'// thabs kyi rlung na dam pa'i mchog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyen// rjes surnal 'byor sangs rgyas ni// ma bskyed rdzogs pa
217a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes klong // lha yi dkyil 'khor rang byung ste// kun bzang rol pa thabs kyi yab// kun tu bzang mo shes rab yum// bde chen gnyis med rig pa'i rtsal// 'ja' tshon ris 'dra dngos med gas la// thugs ni rig pa'i ye shes can//
217a6(rnying rgyud): phyi nang rtsal du gang yang shar// nam mkha'i dkyil du nyi zeran tshul// rang la rdzogs pas bskyed mi dgos// btsal du med pas sde shi med// 'du 'bral med pa'i sangs rgyas la// kun tu bzang po'i sa zhes gdags// da yang rdo rje sems
217a7(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyon// de dag chung lung sangs rgyas kyang // yang ti rdzogs chen la ltos na// rang byung nges don ma shes pas// ched du byed pa'i rtsol bas bsgribs// re dogs phra mo yod pa'i phyir// nges lung ma shes snang bar 'chol// gzugs can sangs
217b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'dod pa byed// chos su mangs cam ngon pa bsgribs// thogs pa 'i myongs don 'das pa las bag / grang sa sbyangs rgyas pastan pa'i ba mad smras par/ denas 'das pa sa/
217b2(rnying rgyud): bas bka' stsal pa// thig le nyag gcig mngon phyung nas// lung bstan nges pa'i don phyir du// rnam smin lus dang bral ma thag/ thog mtha' med pa'i sangs rgyas che// skad cig gcig la ma rig sangs// lus med rig pa'i ye shes kyang //
217b3(rnying rgyud): / rang byang zhugs la s+ye shrI med// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ldan// nam mtha' nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ye shes lus can sangs kyis la// sems can med phyir don me dgos// rang byung rig pa'i chos sna
217b4(rnying rgyud): rang lnga yod pa ngo shes phyir// ched du rtsol bas bsgrub mi dgos// rang byang rig pa'i chos srul// dus gsum 'khrugs kyang 'pho 'gyur med// stong gsum zhig kyang nyams mi srid// rang byed chos smra ba mig can// de yi gzugs brtan
217b5(rnying rgyud): sgra gnyis// ma btsal 'byung ba chos kun ston// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rgyud lung nyan thos yan chad na// 'bras bu gzugs sgra 'byung mi srid// yid smon gyis ni sangs rgyas kyang // nges don yang tig sangs rgyas min// dus dang rnam
217b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyang // 'dus ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas ni// dngas med rang byung rig pa'i sku// de don chos sku shes pa la// drang ba'i don dug zugs su 'byung // thabs la mi brten yon tan rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/
217b7(rnying rgyud): yang dag par nges don sangs rgya bar bstan pa'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags phyir// kun rig ston pa chos rjel// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// rig
218a1(rnying rgyud): / tshen sems dpa'angs dang // snang rgyas rnags pa bcud du gsul// l+h+wa smral pa 'do medadu// 'don rtags pa bshang du gsopa// ma hA smo mas da dang//
218a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs shig/ dad tan rnal 'byung ngan ched de// mkha' 'gro'i dz+hags pa 'dir smos shrIg// de srang zhus pa'i don gis na nas// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal lo// da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor bzhis ni// sti bas rnapa 'gyur drin mi dang /
218a3(rnying rgyud): rang sems chos sku'i don rtogs pas// rang rang thugs la mnga' ba yis// tshig tu mchen pa 'dir smros shig/ de skad gsungs pa'i don gonas// kun rig smyon pa'i spyan snga ru// 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i tshul gyis ni// rang dang rtogs pa 'dza
218a4(rnying rgyud): phyir// nyid las mi gzhan phyogs bcu nas// rdo rje gsad pa'i rin chen snying // dri med grags pa las rab krub// zhi ba pa de dang nyi ma'i 'od// nam mkha'i snying po 'bum gzigs rnams// go ri la bzhin du rtogs brjod phyir// nges pa'i dgongs
218a5(rnying rgyud): don 'dir gsungs pa// rang sems dngos po med pa la// rig pa stong pa'i dang la gnas// de phyir rang byung chos kyi sku// de la skyon gyis gos pa med// da ni dgongs don 'dir gsungs pa// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes la// dngos po mtshan ma
218a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phyir// gang la 'du shes med 'jug pa// rtog med gsal ba sgom pa'i mchog/ yang ni dgongs don 'dir gsungs pa// dus gsum ste 'gag med pa'i phyir// rang rig chos sku ye shes gsal// sde phyed lnga med par gnas/
218a7(rnying rgyud): de las mi 'da' chos nyid la// de don mi rtog dgongs pa'i mchog/ yang ni dgongs don 'dir gsungs pa// sangs rgyas thugs ni chos kyi sku// phung po med phyir rgud pa med// skye shi med pa rang byang sku// de nyid rtogs pa blta ba la//
218b1(rnying rgyud): de do yengs med bsgom par cog/ yang ni dag ngas don 'dir gsungs pa// nga bol nas sangs rgyas byer// 'khor 'das med par rnam par dag/ snro ni med pa'i rig pa 'di// dus gsum so 'gyur du ngas pa yin// yang ni dag
218b2(rnying rgyud): don 'dir gsungs pa// rgya rkyen ma skyes 'bras bu la// lung las ma byung ye shes shar// sems las ma byung chos sgra rtogs// de dang mi 'bral dgongs pa'i mchog/ yang ni dgong mdon 'dir gsungs pa// chos nyid dang las dngos po med/
218b3(rnying rgyud): phyir mtshan ma rang sar grol// de phyir thig le nyag gcig la// yengs med 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid// yang ni dgongs don 'dir gsungs pa// sems kyi yul 'das byang chub zugs// rang la bltas pas ye shes mthong // de don dngos med du
218b4(rnying rgyud): chub sku// de las ma yengs nges don mchog/ yang ni dgongs don 'dir gsungs pa// dngos por ma mthong chos skur mthong // bsgom dang mi bsgom tha skad bral// gang la'ang mi gnas rig par shar// de don sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin//
218b5(rnying rgyud): yang ni dgongs don 'dir gsungs pa// nges pa'i rang rig ye shes la// gang yang mi bsam dran med de// yid ches gdeng dang ldan pa mchog/ de la 'gyur med chos kyi sku// rdzogs pa chen po des nyon 'dus pa pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
218b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o// // de nas kun bzang spyan sngar ni// rig 'dzin rtogs pa brjod pa'i phyir// blo gros gtso dang rnam dag snying // dam pa'i yon tan 'od rlabs can// shes rab tha ma rgyal mtshan 'dzin//
218b7(rnying rgyud): rnam par grol ba ting 'dzin dbang // chos dbang dang ni bsod nams brtsegs// bdud 'joms dang ni seng ge'i sgra// rin chen mthong dang brtse ba can// dbang phyug gtso dang yid dge dang // mthong dga' bden mos gsung brtsegs rnams//
219a1(rnying rgyud): bsod pa khyer/ nges pa'i sri nga bya brjod pa s+ho// ma bya'i brtsam so/ masas rnyed pa ga pasarjod / do dadang byung nga ma la/ sa ma da/ zhi smra nga byu pa/ nyin ma sarnams
219a2(rnying rgyud): spangs na rtsol ba'i so la sgri ba yin// spang blang med pa'i don rtogs na// ngos don dgongs pa de las med// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// gsal la ma yengs chos kyi sku// ma bsgoms 'phrul med ting nge 'dzin// dmigs sa med pas rnam
219a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'dra// 'du 'bral med pas rgyun du gnas// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// sems la gnyen po med pas na// bsam pa'i yul las 'das pas na// gzhan nas ma 'ongs rgyun mi chad// de nyid rang rig chos ltung rtogs// yang
219a4(rnying rgyud): gdeng nyams 'di gsungs pa// rang byed rig pa dang shar phyir// ma rig mun pa rtsad nas gcod// de la gnyen pos bcos su med// gdod nas rang byung sangs rgyas zhugs// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// chos nyid yi nas ma bcos pa'i// de
219a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// skye med rang gsal chos nyid la// rgyun du 'bral med byang chub klong // yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// rang byung dag pas pad+ma 'dra// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa// de phyir chos nyid dang la ni// 'bral med byang chub sems su
219a6(rnying rgyud): gsal// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// zab mo'i meng ni cing btags kyang // dpes kyang mtshon med brjod las 'das// dmigs pa'o yul bral chos kyi sku// de las mi 'gyur nyams kyi mchog/ yang ni gdeng nyams 'di dag spangs pa// 8
219a7(rnying rgyud): byung chos su mtha' dbus med// de las ma yengs rtsol bzla ba 'das// mtshan du med pas rkyen mi tshug/ de phyir dus gsum 'phral ba med// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs na// snying po chos su'i rig 'dzin de// lhun gyis grub phyir ye shes gleng //
219b1(rnying rgyud): dang la 'khor ba med// de phyir sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// yang ni ga deng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// 'byung ba ni zhig pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// chos nyid snying po rig pa ni// ye shes rang gsal 'gyur ba med// de phyir bsgom med byang chub bya// yang dag
219b2(rnying rgyud): nyams 'dir gsungs pa// mtshan ma'i yul med byang chub lam// de las ma btsal rang bzhag na// yang dag don gyi dgongs pa ste// de nyid mi 'bral bsgom pa'i mchog/ yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// mngon sum mi gnas chos su
219b3(rnying rgyud): tha dad bral bas ye shes klong // de las mchod pa'i med ma rnyed// de las ma g.yos bsgom pa yin// yang ni ga ded nyams 'dir gsungs pa// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// bsgom pas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// ma bsgoms pas kyang stong bral med/
219b4(rnying rgyud): de phyir chos nyid 'bral ba med// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// rang byung chos nyid nam mkha' 'dra// de bzhin ting 'dzin spros med gsal// de la gnyen pos bcos su med// de phyir 'bral med dgongs pa yin// yang ni gde nyams 'di dag
219b5(rnying rgyud): pa// yul gyi mtshan ma sna tshogs pa// de tsam nyid nas rang bzhin shes// de phyir sems rtogs chos skur gsal// de la skyon du rdul tsam med// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// ma btsal ba yi chos nyid las// rtog dbyed med pa bskom
219b6(rnying rgyud): pa ste// nyams ni shes rig gsal ba la// de las ma yengs bsgom pa yin// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsugs pa// gang yang ma spangs skyon ma gos// 'gro 'od med par rgyun du gnas// phyir rgod rkyen gyi dbang mi 'gro// de las sgrib med
219b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gsungs pa// ma bcol rang las rnyed pa'i phyir// lhag mthong dran pa blta ba'i gzungs// de phyir mi 'bral bsgom pa'i gdeng // yi nas yod pas stor bral med// yang ni gdeng nyams 'dir gtu
220a1(rnying rgyud): pa// bskom med dmigs dang bral ba'i phyir// sdug tu bsgyur mo ste/ par des// gsung med rig pa'i dgongs pa yin// ye shes zags la 'gyur bu myod// gzhan yang shu 'dzin pams pa'i chags// dasam
220a2(rnying rgyud): kyis mi khyab grangs las 'das// rang rang gdeng rnams 'dir gsungs pa// de don nges pachos sbyar gzhig/ rdzogs pa chen pongs don 'dus pa las/ rig 'dzin sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste don brkyang pa'o// rkyenas
220a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal sras skal pa'i tshogs// tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po bzhi// thags bzang ris dang ga ba bzang // mkha' lding rgyal po rta mgo can// zur phud lnga pa nor srungs dang // mgrin bcu dang ni klu rgyal rnams// rang rang rtogs pa brjod pa'i phyir// nges don
220a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa 'dir gsungs pa// rtsol bsgrub bral ba byang chub zhugs// ri dogs med pas gol sa med// de don ma thal chos nyid la// rgyun du 'bral med yin sa yod// yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// snang ba chos dbyings rtog med las//
220a5(rnying rgyud): skar bral ba chos kyi dbyings// de nyid dus mnyam rang gsal ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs par go// yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// golas med pa'i lta ba la// bying rgod bral ba'i bsgom pa rags la// phrag dog med pa'i spyod pa de// de nyid
220a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes chos nyid klong // yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// nor bu chu dngas dpe bzhin du// dran pa tsam gyis ma rig sangs// bcol du med pas ye shes rgyas// de dus nyid na gzugs sku 'byung // yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// des don
220a7(rnying rgyud): lung la yid ches pas// the tshom med las rang byung gsal// rig pa mi 'gag bde chen klong // de las mi 'gyur dgongs par shes// yang ni togs don 'dir gsungs pa// yul gyi mtshan ma cir snang yang // yid kyis dgag sgrub med par ni/
220b1(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings grang sngar rog nas// tha du 'i// na med do// yang tog don 'dre gangangs pa// lu pa yang ces dgongs pa meng // zabs rgya ma dgongs pags pa// dado rtogs snyoms 'bras thal// sadus su
220b2(rnying rgyud): bya// yang ni rtog sa don 'dir gsungs pa// tshe mas tu mdu brnyas pas// sa byin pa'i rtog pa la// ma ye sa rgyas nyed rangags la pa// de las bsgom pa rdub tsam med// yang rtog don 'di gsungs pa// drang byung bye na pa
220b3(rnying rgyud): de la rtag tu yid brtas na// bag chags sgrib pa zhugs la dag/ ye shes chog chen sangs rgyas yin// yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// dus dang rnam pa thams cad nga // chos su'i don dang mi 'di 'gyur// yang dag ting 'i gag mo cha
220b4(rnying rgyud): de phyir nges shes 'gyur ba med// yang ni rtogs don 'di ga tu ngas pa// 'khor bas ma bskang deng 'dzer la// ma bsgoms chos nyidang lha'i thugs// pad+mo ma dang mi bsgom ci phyir 'jug/ mthu ma rjes med par rgyan tu gnas// yang ni rtogs don 'di
220b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// rang sems ma bcom dang lugs la// me chos rang bzhag bsgom pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i nyams myong gas la// de don dang sems rtags pa yin// yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// dadongon chos nyid 'gyur med la//
220b6(rnying rgyud): brtags pa thams cad med// gang yang ma spangs rang byung ba// de la bsgom du rdul tsam med // ga suM pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las/ rgyal sa sprul ba'i 'khor gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste don dkru pa'o// / drang nan 'khor la
220b7(rnying rgyud): dra// mkha' 'gro sde lnga 'khor dang bcas// rang ri rdzogs pa brjod pa'i phyir// nges pa 'don du gsungs pa// gnyi mug mun pa 'thibs pa la/ thogs tha 'chod pas marigs ngas// yul 'dis bshigs chos kyi dbyings// de rnyed nga
221a1(rnying rgyud): @sems rtogs pa yin// yang ni rdzogs dang 'di gsungs pa// zhe sdang 'dog yul la ng+tha/ rgya lo grolas gcad nasaH// zhesadang sro 'argyal ba'i thags// de dus spya na rdzas kyi // yang 'dags
221a2(rnying rgyud): pa// rtogs don bde ba'i ye shes shang // rgyal pong bo nyid kyi sra// de don mi 'bral chos srung gser// de la skyon gyis gnong mi tshug/ yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// po mo 'dod chags kyi// de nga // gol myed po shes ldan mi 'char/
221a3(rnying rgyud): snga phyir ma song zhen med phyir// bde chen longs spyod chen por bshad// yang ni rtogs don 'dir gsungs pa// lha dman chos la phrag dog kyang // gol ba yin phyir nyes med dge// de phyir byang chub bde ba'i thor// de la snron gyi gros mi smod//
221a4(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sangs rgyas rig 'dzin spyan snga ru// 'jig rten mkha' 'gros 'di skad gsol// dam bcas don las bdang / mi 'da'// bka' bzhin bgyi ba'i don ched du// nges don 'dus pa'i don chen 'di// mi nub pa
221a5(rnying rgyud): bdag gis bsrungs// 'di la 'gal byed sdig can kun// myung du bskal la zhal du rjud// de yang ston pa'i 'khor kun nyon// bdag cag yid kyis dam bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sdig can bsad kyang grol bar nges// /
221a6(rnying rgyud): rnam smin srog la longs spyod kyis// sangs rgyas rig 'dzin rnams kyis kyang // rang sems chos skur byin gyis rlobs// de skad brjod pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig ston pas 'khor rnams la// rtsa ba nges pa'i don 'di gsungs// legs so//
221a7(rnying rgyud): ljin 'a khor rnams non// shes rab blo yi khyad par las// tshig tu mtshon pa sna tshogs kyang // don la dbyer med nga ba gcig/ de skyi 'khong rnams chos srud rtogs// sangs rgyas 'bras bu de nyid yin// rdzogs pa chen po des don 'dus pa las//
221b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'a togs pa brjod pa'i le'u ske brgyang cu ba'o// de nas 'das pa'i la ba rnams la// kun gzhon 'chos yis/ sru ba'i snying po 'don gtang ba// chos kyi rgyal po kun rdzogs 'di// la ldan 'dus pa rnang
221b2(rnying rgyud): yid la brlag cing bcang bar gyis// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nga yis bstan pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i chos// rig 'dzin rnams kyi thugs la spros// chos skyong rnams kyis gter ltar srungs// de don man gi nges don 'a
221b3(rnying rgyud): log sred zhen chags ma nges la// nam yang bstan par ma byed cig/ nyan thos la sogs lta dman pa// bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur la// mi theg khal chen bkral ba bzhin// don mgo bas ngan song lhung // da yang 'dres pa'i 'kho na
221b4(rnying rgyud): de bas rang sems sngon spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor dang ldan 'khor rnams la// 'chi ka'i snying po don mtshon nas// nges don rgyud 'di rtogs par gyis// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yang gsang nges don khyad par can// 'bras bu nges pa'i gdams
221b5(rnying rgyud): 'di// bla mar mi gros ngams can// tshul 'chos byed cing slob dpon sdod// nom phongs gzhog slong khagasags can// g.yo sku'i thabs kyis chos 'dod la// rgyud kyi snying po'i lta ba ni// nam yang bstan par ma gsungs so// ded 'dod rang
221b6(rnying rgyud): bzod dris don chos// gal te snying po'i don bstan na// 'phags pa rnams kyang dgrar ldang na// mkha' 'gro ma can spros ci dgos// rang gi srog bcad mnar med lhung // nga yang 'dul pa'i snying po nyon// nges don 'dus pa'i rgyud chen 'di//
221b7(rnying rgyud): shi ba'i 'od bzhin du// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus dag tu// kun bzang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// rnal 'byor skal ldan rnams la 'gyur // de tshe ris don 'bras bu 'di// gu lang gi ser bzhin mi nub tsam// snod ldan 'ga' la bstan pa las// snang dgu
222a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi thod snyagasas// banas byes pa'i don la no// dayang 'das pa'i spang ba/ shAgang panags ga nasas ces// las kyangs ga gas pa gru cang / smra gas ma/ nga /
222a2(rnying rgyud): da snying po 'di// lung ldan rnams la gas par gyis// de rtogs 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung // 'gro ba'i mgon pos/ de spyad gsungs// de yang rdo rje sems dpa non// gsang ba'i man gtud rtse di// banag cig dus cing nga/
222a3(rnying rgyud): snad ldan kun la chos 'di 'thung // de co theg dman sgro sgrar 'debs// rang gis rang bskus 'khor bar lultung // 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlabs// bsod nams mi bad gter dang ldan// kye ma'i 'bras bdung /
222a4(rnying rgyud): 'di'i'i byeng // kun tu bzang pos de srid bzhed// rdzogs pa chen po ma don 'das pa la sa/ gyung bskrad cing bzung bar bstan pa'i le'u ni brgyad rgyartsa gcig pa'o// // rdzogs brten pa ngas den 'das pa pa khrims cad kyi snying po na po ni rnam par
222a5(rnying rgyud): gong ba zhes bya rdzogs sa// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba ma la me tha dang / bo da nI mi n+na baM mAHr+tha dran pa mo rjes kyis bsgyur cing zhus ni gtan sal ba pa'o// / rgya gar ska dang/ ma hAs d+he rdzas swAr sgra la myod de n+tus/ bdag du/ rdzogs pa chen po
222a6(rnying rgyud): bacha khor bca gcod kyi rgyad cis zab/ bcom ldan 'das dpa lar byung / ba nyid ye shes kyi sgra dang ldad pa la thug 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa'i dus gcig sa bcom ldan 'das 'og pid mig nas ni sra byang chub tu sbyi /
222a7(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs nas// ye shes 'khor po'i dgongs pa las// g.yas pa med par snyoms par zhugs// de'i tshe ngas gsum sangs rgyas dang // rdorje 'chang gi rig 'dzin dang // dpal chen dzan 'thang ma mo'i chags//
222b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang lha mi la sogs pa// ngang ba'i dad pas 'das pa rnams// rang sems gdong nas dag pa'i phyir// dang ba'i yid kyis yengs med par// thabs cig rim par 'khod gyur to// de nas thugs kyis gzigs pa'i don// rdo rje sems dang pa
222b2(rnying rgyud): d+he// 'khor rnams la ni brtser dgongs nas// ting nge 'dzin gyis don gsol ba// 'jig rten mgron po rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes thags rje chen po yis// chos nyid gnas lugs ji lta ba// mnor ma brjos snying po'i thugs// 'khrul ba
222b3(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i thabs// dus 'dir bdag la dang shad du gsol// rang byung ngo bo nyid sku ste// don lhan chos rjes bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas chos nyid ji lta ba// 'khor 'das ma rig snying po'i don// yang mes ra yis don bshad du// rgyud yang sems
222b4(rnying rgyud): cing ldangs// garnams mi sde brgyal zhir 'jug// lha min 'jig non sbyin pa'i tshogs// blo slong 'dagyes pa'i gang thag nams// gtan du dkyil bachen por byed// deng tshel bdag da dang // 'jigs pa sde rdzogs kyi nga //
222b5(rnying rgyud): la po spong du 'gas// rig 'dzin rnams kyis spong bar 'gyur// de ltar bka' stsa la khron go nas// sems kyi gdung ba'i yus paton to// 'gal sems rdul tsam med pa ni// dad pas byang chub don la mos// nges tshig bstan par yid bsdus so//
222b6(rnying rgyud): tshong bo nyid sku des// ye shes 'khor lo'i dgongs pa las// thugs rjes mngon par gzigs nas kyang // kun bzang chos su rtogs 'dod de// don du bsdus pa bka' stsos pa// legs so dad pa'i 'khor rnams nyo na// don rnams gsal bar
222b7(rnying rgyud): sa bshad kyiso// legs par nyon la yid kyis zung // 'khor 'das tshig tu brjod dka' ba// chos spyan ma mkha' lta bu de// kun laganas kyang rtogs par dka'// mngon sum du yang mi gnas phyire// srid gsum sems can thams cad ni/
223a1(rnying rgyud): bkreng dang don gyis 'dul ba las// nges pa'i don gyis 'dul ba min// nges pa'i don gyis 'dul ba ni// u du ma wa ru'i me tog bzhin// brgyal mA las ni des ga' zhig/ 'byung srid kun dang thun mong min
223a2(rnying rgyud): de khyer snod ldan 'phrang gyur na// ma mtshon go dang ma dpyang rtogs// don ldan dag tu rig pa'i blos// ma bsgoms bstan pasangs par rdzog/ de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la// dad pa gyong la med pa dang // meched la sring
223a3(rnying rgyud): gdang ba dang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'i phyir// byang chub srog dang bsngo ba la// don 'di khyod la bshad kyis ston// de dang mi ldan 'di bstan ni// phyi ma'i dus kyi snod med rnams// gnam lcags sa la bying ba bzhin// mkha' 'gro na
223a4(rnying rgyud): kyis srog bcad nas// thar med ngamyale ba'i gnas su ltung // rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi gleng gizhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / sems dpa' chen po khyed nyon cig/ nga yi chos nyid gnas lugs ni
223a5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum med pa'i gong rol du// 'khor 'das gnyis ka gdod nas med// nga nyid de tshe gdod nas gnas// bstan pa med pa'i ston pa'i thugs// da rang nyid las ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas sems can ming yang med// 'byung ba lnga dang srid pa'ang med//
223a6(rnying rgyud): mi sred phung po gang las skyed// bag chags ma bgos smos ci dgos// don rtogs sangs rgyas mang pa'i phyir// de bstan rtogs pa shar ba med// de tid 'khor 'di ska la bskrad// gzugs med sems kyi snying po la// sgo lde med phyir yul yang med// bza
223a7(rnying rgyud): ngan nam tog gtid nas med// nga nyid gcig pu sngon du byung // rang gsangang nyid kun gyi mes// rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nga yi mtshan nyid mthun dpeni// dngos po med pas nam mkha' 'dre// mi 'gyur srabs rdo rje 'dra//
223b1(rnying rgyud): skye ba med pas a dang 'dra// don la yin gyi dpe mi bstan// de phyi snying po'i thig le 'di// chos nyid med pa'i ston rol du// stong pa nyid las sA phyir// nga la stong pa/ ltar ma te bsna// gdags pa med pa'i sngon rol du// ming dang tshig pas
223b2(rnying rgyud): ro snga phyir// yod cing rtag/ par sgro mi gdags// ra ni dbyar med snying po la// skye shi med par yid ches pas// 'khor 'das ma reg nga snga phyir// reg gnyis log phyir gdod nas dag/ skyon gyis ma gos chos kyi skye// kun bzang glo bar 'angs
223b3(rnying rgyud): rab tu che mchog ye shes sku// don gyi sangs rgyas rtogs pa'i phyir// mi skye mi 'gag nam mkha' 'dra// nga martogs pa'i sangs rgyas med// de phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// sangs rgyas kun gyi bla mang // de ma 'khrul pa'i sems can med//
223b4(rnying rgyud): sems can pha ma nga nyid yin// nga las 'khrul ba'i rkyen gyis su// sangs rgyas sems can nga las byung // kyi yi 'byung ba nga yi rtsal// nam mkha' stong pa nga yi dpe// li nang mtshan ma nga 'khrul rtags// 'khor 'das
223b5(rnying rgyud): rtsa bang nyid yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// nga la bshad cing mtshon mi mkhyen// mdzad pa'i chos nyid smos ci dgos// bskal bar 'byams kyang skye ba med// shi med nor mchog kun gyi gzhi// rang byung snying po kun la khyab// don la
223b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba rdul tsam med// gdod nas 'gyur med byang chub la// ji skad brjod kyang mthun pa med// de phyir blo yi spyod yul min// mdzad spyod 'byung ba 'khor ba'i chos// de la dam par gang 'dzin pa// nam mkha' dag la 'dzin pa 'dra// sangs rgyas
223b7(rnying rgyud): rnams ni spyod mi mdzad// mgyur ma skyes pa nyid yin// rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor brtsad gcod kyi rgyud las/ don chos nyid kyi gnas lugs bslad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / da yang sems dpa' chen po nyon// nga las 'khrul pa
224a1(rnying rgyud): byung ba ni// thog ma'i dus kyi mtha' drug gnyis// spyan gzhi ma rig mun ga seb na// gcig la snang ba gnyis su 'byung // yar mar 'khrul 'khor 'khor ba'i chos// thag sbrul bro yor je bzhin du// ma rig pa las
224a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa brgyad// dmus long lta bur rang bsgrubs pas// mi shes log pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams// de bas sems dpa' chen po nyon// 'og ma'i lung ldan rkyen phrad nas// blos 'jal lta ba rnam pa bzhi// yo ga man chad nga yi gtan//
224a3(rnying rgyud): je snyed mdzad kyi dang mi rnyed// mtshan ma rags shing nga mi rtog// rgyud lung rnal 'byor chen po las// nga tshol ba 'khrul nga mi rnyed// nga ma rnyed pas sdang ba zhe na// 'gro don theg pa rnam pa brgyad// gzhi nyid mu shes 'khrul pa'i phyir// brkyad gnyis
224a4(rnying rgyud): mi sgrol shin te 'ching// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'khor ba'i rgyu ni rtog pa yin// gzung 'dzin zhen pa mtshan mar snang // bag chags brtas phyir kun gzhi yin// ye shes mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// mi rtog gzhi gnas nyid brdal ba// 'bras
224a5(rnying rgyud): bu zung 'brel ldan grub pa// gnyis ka'i rgyur gyur gzhi nyid ni// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de nyid ma rtogs dman rnams kyis// sdang ba de nyid gzhir 'dod pas// smig rgya chur mthong 'thungs 'dod bzhin// 'khor 'das glo bur rkyen yin phyir// ngo bo
224a6(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs chos sku yin// rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor brtsad gcod kyi rgyud las/ de las 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / kye sems dpa' rdo rje nyon cig/ ma rig 'khrul pa ldog 'dod rnams// 'khor 'dras gnyis
224a7(rnying rgyud): kyi ma rig 'dod// rang sems snying po rtogs pa'i thabs// lus srog mi lha dad pa yis// skrag cing yang med sems kyis// the tshom yid gnyis med par ni// 'khor 'das rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid// dpa' brtul chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis// phyir mi
224b1(rnying rgyud): rdzog ci med ches pas// yangs par mi 'byung rgyun mi 'chad// sems nyid ma rtogs don mi btsal// drug lnga mi srung chos nyid du// de shes mi bsgom dgos pa med// da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi sgo sla /
224b2(rnying rgyud): mgos ngo bo nyid kyi sku// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi yin phyir// kyu yi ye shes de la b+ha// rtogs pa'i rkyen gyis chos kyi sgra// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu yin phyir// ma rtogs sems can thams cad kyang // bla mA'i rkyen gyis ye shes 'byung // @
224b3(rnying rgyud): 'das lam gyi 'bad rtsol gyis// bla med byang chub gegs yin phyir// bsgom rtsol med pa'i ye shes 'di// lam gyi mchog ni dam par gsungs// de nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// theg brgyad srang len zil gyis gnon// sems rtogs
224b4(rnying rgyud): snying po de nyid nas// stobs rnams me btsal yon tan rdzogs// de lha'i ye shes 'bras bu ni// phyi ma ma yin dus 'di cu// dbul pos rin chen rnyed pa bzhin// btsal med rig pa mngon sangs rgyas// du yang rdo rje sems dpa' byon// rang byung ye shes
224b5(rnying rgyud): chen po la// yin med dbye ngas patud kyis// yid kyis nyen pa'igs pa dkyang // ye zhes chen por byung // sems can rdul ma ma byeng // mdzag phre na ye zhes meng // mimam pan ma ne long ba'ang // r+ya byung med pa'i ye zhes de/
224b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ye shes lnga 'dod pa// rkyen gyis 'gyur phyir ye shes min// rdo la gser du 'dzin pa ltar// ye shes rang byung ma yin te// yi na gnyis kun gzhi glo bur skyed // gzhi 'khrul phyir na gnyis med min// ri bong rwa yi kha dog 'dra// rang byung ye shes len
224b7(rnying rgyud): pas na// shes rab lhag mthong bar byung ba// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung de// lung ldan byin gyis rtogs pa'i phyir// rang byung ye shes 'jom pa ni// mar gyi yang kun lta bur gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor bca gtsacad kyi rgyud las/ don
225a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa ma/ dang da pa / pa smra 'gasas/ na nga da sa// 'a
225a2(rnying rgyud): gdams dgam bslad byung / khyod kyi mang du pyod de lag// don dang mthun par mdzad gsong // do na gapa sbyin pas dkar stsal pa// gzhi ti gyigs nga b+hu // don gyi snyi ba mi bzung kyi// dmag ni tho ma zer mnad // gsuMm thong ba ni
225a3(rnying rgyud): chos srugs// gcig las thad dngos zin pas// dri ma'i phreng dang 'char ngos bzhin// dgagi ba sgrub po byeng chos kyi dacings// rdo kyai nga sems snying po di// rdzogs pas sangs rgyasu la ma du de// rang sems bsgom pa ldanapa lam// rdu ma
225a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i lam yin no// dper na byung chen mkha' la lding // rgya klung srin mthar la meng // bar snang khams dran pam dra bde// dmigs pa'i mi phyogs yid kyi ts+tshin// lta ba rtogs pa'i lam yin pas// de bzhin ye nas rnal 'byir chags//
225a5(rnying rgyud): ma bsgoms ye shes de lha nyid// rtogs phyir rang sems bsrom du med// de las mi 'da' ldan gyis grub// de kyid ma bcas lta ba yin// dmigs med sems kyi ye shes gsA la// btang bzhag med pa'i lta ba la// golas rngub tsam medapa
225a6(rnying rgyud): phyed// bsgom med ye shes chen po 'byung // da yang rdo rje sems dpanga' nyon// sgo srur gathod pa'i mun dag bstan// drang sems chos srung du skad nas// lus bcos kun gzhig nyi cha la// sde dang bral ye shis gsal// rgyang dngas rtog med
225a7(rnying rgyud): dpe bzhin du// chos su khamig rnab can// 'byung 'dug med phyir bsgom mi dges// stong nyid cig tshad dus mnyam bur// dran rig rgyu ba 'i byung yang // gzhil med byer ma bsgoms kyang // sems can dus na chos kyi sku// rmi 'dogs ma
225b1(rnying rgyud): tshod lus bsgoms pa// dper na bum nang nam mkha' bzhin// tshe gcig bsgoms kyang ye shes med// rnal 'byor ma bsgoms rtogs par gyis// du yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' nyon// yul gyi rkyen gyis rtog gyur tshe// rgya yings
225b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi don gsal ba// ye shes ma bsgoms bral ba min// ba mo la ni nyi shar bzhin// yul nyid sems su mi bsgom pas// dran rig chos nyid byang chub sems// de nyid spyad pa'i yul las 'das// de nyid don las nyams pa med// rang sems byed//
225b3(rnying rgyud): rgod du ma gnas tshe// nang gi dus bzhi don dran pas// tshogs drug 'gags kyang chos skur gsal// bum pa'i nang gi mar me 'dra// 'jigs pa brgal 'dod mi bzhin du// nyams med rig pa'i don 'di las// nad gcod sdug bsngal ci byung yang //
225b4(rnying rgyud): man ngag dran pa gces par gsung // sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ka'i gong // gsang ba'i dus gcig nyid du shes// gol sa rdul tsam mi 'byung bas// de tshe chos sku zang ka ma// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin na// de phyir skye ba'i rgyu med
225b5(rnying rgyud): pas// tha ma 'chi zhing 'pho ba med// de ltar rig pa rdzun mi 'chad// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gdams ngag mngon du bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
225b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de yang nyon// nga yi rtogs pa la bzlan// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang / spang du med de byang chub lam// 'dod yon lnga ni longs spyod rgyan// lus la pho mo yod pa'i phyir// chags pa spyod tshe don gyis zin// gsal jes
225b7(rnying rgyud): chos su'i snying po nyid// de tshe bde ba longs spyod rgyan// gzhi pa 'ching grol med pa'i phyir// dkar po'i chos dang sdig la sogs// gnyis ka'i 'bras bu mi 'byung bas// sems nyid ye nas rtogs pa yin// de phyir dge sdig byed mkhan med//
226a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka skyes bu'i log rtogs tsam// don la spyod spangs gnyis ka med// de phyir zhe sdang yul mi dmigs// 'jig rten tshor ba bsal ba ni// gti mug rmongs par ngas bshad pas// rtogs nas mi 'byed dang
226a2(rnying rgyud): 'di// ci smad blta bar rab shes pas// 'dod yon lnga la ci spyod kyang // bcing bar mi 'gyur grol bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' da nyon cig/ chos 'di zos pas 'dzin rtog nub// chung 'di go bas rtog pa'i// 'khor 'das 'phru
226a3(rnying rgyud): rnab par dag/ spang sdang zhen pa rdul tsam med// rtag chad gnyis po rdul du brlag/ 'khor 'das bzang ngan sbyin ltar dengos// zhen pa'i chos rnams gting nas med// sangs rgyas sems can gcig ta byas// mtho ngas ngan song can du
226a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba chos nyid dang du brlag/ nyes pa dag pas sgrib pa med// gnyis su med pas shes rab gsal// gzhi ni mi 'gyur gser bzhin du// ye shes mi 'gyur brtan pa che// de ltar rtogs pas ye shes nyid// 'bras bu gzhan das bce 'am
226a5(rnying rgyud): gdong nas byung ba'i jo bo nyid// 'bras bu sul mi ltos pa// lus dang bral ba kun bzang thugs// gzhi gnas brag chags mi gos pas// rnam lA mi g.yo ye shes sla// rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor bskrad nas gcod pa'i rgyu da las/ rang byung
226a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po la bzla ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / sems dpa' rdo rje nyon cig/ nga yi mdzad spyod chen po ni// stong gsum 'jig rten thams cad ni// nga yi bzhugs gnas gzigs mo'i sa// gzugs nyid ska la sgrar snang
226a7(rnying rgyud): gsung // dran tog thams cad nga yi zhugs// snang sred kun gyis ngam mthong // mtha' yas ming du btags pa rnams// nga yi rol pa las gzhan med// nga yi snang ba sna tshogs pa// don la med phyir gzhig mi dgos// spros kyang nga la bzlas
226b1(rnying rgyud): kyang nga // nga ye skra gsang thugs lnga ni// 'khor ba gdod nas med pa ste// du yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// khe nas gnas pa'i gzhi nyid ni// chos kyi sku yi thugs su bstan// de nyid rtags pa'i ye shes de// chos kyi sku lo longs spang
226b2(rnying rgyud): thugs// dran rtog don du shes pa de// chos kyi sku yi sprul pa'i thugs// de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes te// don ldan gzugs kyi phung po 'di// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku// dbang po ma 'gags gsal ba de// long so sor rdzogs pa'i
226b3(rnying rgyud): ljongs spyod smra// bskul bskyod pan lag gang yin no// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sprul pa'i sgra// don ldan tshig tu brnyed pa de// sprul pa'i sbrul chos srang gi srung // dngos med tshig tu gsal ba de// sprul pa'i muM yi longs spyo gsung /
226b4(rnying rgyud): tshigal ba nas de dag pang // sprul pa sgra la thugs yin gyi// thugs kyi thigs te thugs parig/ mas stes pa ma// gis gags gas ltam// de yang seM pa dbang chenapa to// / ngol mu gsung rdugs nyid las/
226b5(rnying rgyud): gang yang med de ye nas gong // de yi mdzad spyod ci skad pa// rnam smin lus dang ma bral kyang // pad+ma dang ni 'dam bzhin du// nyes pa kun gyis gos pa med// phyi ma'i mdzad sbed chen po yang // rang sems rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor par//
226b6(rnying rgyud): 'di ma yin phyi ma yi// bar dor mngon sangs che ba nyid// mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs med pa'i phyir// kun tu bzang po gud na med// thugs ni chos sgra nyid kyi thugs// sgra ni ye shes chen po'i sku// ye shes lus can thams cad mkhyen// sangs
226b7(rnying rgyud): sa kun dang mnyam las lhag/ de phyir gsang sngags 'bras bu che// tshe gcig 'bras bu nges par 'byung // de bas rang sems ye shes sku// de yi yon tan brjod mi langs// de nyid ston pa'i ye shes kyis// gzugs med rig pa ye shes
227a1(rnying rgyud): sangs cas rgyal brgyas pa sra// yon tan thams cad mu ba tsa lardzogs// gdul du mangs gzugs rnams 'byung // daco sems narnams cad/ yad bzhin dbang po dag nga thad don// dazung bdag pa
227a2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la// lus dang bral bas sgrib mi gos// sprin dang / bla rnangs 'byung me srid// de ba'i ni rang sems sdong po la// sems can don phyir ci spyad kyang // sgrib pa gnyis kyis mi gos pas// chos su dag la nyams pa med// rtses gsu
227a3(rnying rgyud): de nas dus gsums ngas rgyas dang // rigs gsum 'dus pa'i rgyal sras 'khor// dang ldan la sogs dkyil 'khor gyis// rang sems lhag mthong mngon gyur nas// dga' ba'i sems kyi li rang ste// rang rang sems la gsal ba'i don// ga
227a4(rnying rgyud): pa brjod pa'i don mthun nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis tshig 'di gsol// 'bras bu sangs rgyas da lta myangs// rang sems ma dang thug gis sprad// de phyir da lta kun bzang nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' dge bache// 'dren mdad khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//
227a5(rnying rgyud): de skad gsol ba'i tshig go nas// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsungs pa// sangs rgyas thugs kyis byin brlabs pa'i// dgongs pa ma lus bcud 'dus pa'i// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi don// gdams ngag tshad med nyid khu 'di// dad //
227a6(rnying rgyud): na 'khor la ngas bshad kyis// don 'di rgyud la shin tu spros// yang dag nyid du sems kyis dpyad// thig le nyag gcig mngon phyung ba// chos kyi gtor gyi 'byung gnas 'di// snod ldan rnal 'byor don gyi mchog/ de yang dad nyan 'khor rnams
227a7(rnying rgyud): // gas byor bas 'byung / den 'di na cing bshad dug+sa/ dris garnam sangs rgyas dbang drus kyi/ ma bgrornams la chos srungs // gang la du sri bzhin par da// thal ba pan ni pa thams par rtag/ pan
227b1(rnying rgyud): ngag gsang chud 'dra gron ma// las can slob ma dang ldan la// gzhan la mi ster mna' bor te// man ngag snying po tshang bar bstan// tshogs kyi mchod pa ci nus bya// de ltar ma byas par chod 'ong // zhes gsungs so// mu dgatad pa dang mdzad stong sa
227b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba rtsad gcod rdzogs so// / ma gar skad du/ ma hA swan+d+hi saM sAr mU la sto dAn d+ham k+Sha la a r+thaHrkA bid+yA tar+tha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa tsun po kho na
227b3(rnying rgyud): chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rang byung ngo bo nyid ye shes kyi sku dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad gsungs pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pas/
227b4(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga la ni sku gsung thugs gzigs nas/ ye shes 'khor lo'i dgongs pa las g.yos pa med par snyoms par gnas so// de tshe dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje 'chang gi rig 'dzin dang // phyi nang dam btags chos skyong dang // gzhan yang
227b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa// dbang med dad pas 'dus pa rnams// rang sems rtogs par 'dod pa'i phyir// dad pa'i yid kyis sems dmade nas// thabs gcig rim par 'khod 'gyur te// de nas thugs kyis gzigs pa'i don// rdo rje sems dpas don pa
227b6(rnying rgyud): bskal don gsol btab brtser dgongs nas// ting nge 'dzin gyis gsol btab pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes thugs rje chen po yis// zhi gnas la ni 'bral med don// chos nyid gnas lugs ji lta ba// 'khrul/
227b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i blo yis rtogs pa'i thabs// nges don chos sku dang rgyas pa// dus 'dir bdag la bshad du gsol// rab byung ba nyid spyades// don gsan chos rjes bkang stsal pa// sangs rgyas dgongs pa ji lta ba// 'khor 'das marig snying po'i don/
228a1(rnying rgyud): du / sa / na tu rgyu du su // rlog yu ga // sa/ nas du su na tu ga /
228a2(rnying rgyud): 'chal ba'i sngon bzhi la// mgo ba yi rtog gsum gyis// lhagadeng nyams pa'i smon bdun 'byung // de tshe snod ldan kha cig las// rgyud lungasangs rgyas sgeg cing sngangs// nyan thos mdo sde brgyal zhing 'bog/ lha dang lha min srin
228a3(rnying rgyud): srar 'dogs pa'i gang zag rnams// rtag tu dpral ba chen por ltung // 'di la tshe yi bar chad dang // 'jigs pa sna tshogs kun kyang 'ong // mgo lngas tshal pa bdun du 'gas// rig 'dzin rnams kyis spang bar 'gyur// de phyir snod ldan shin tu dkon/
228a4(rnying rgyud): srid bka' stsal don gonas// sems kyi gdung ba'i lus bton te// 'gal sems rdul tsam med par ni// dad pas byang chub den la mos// nges shing dad pas yid bsdus so// de zo ngo bo nyid sgra des// ye shes 'khor lo'i dgongs pa las//
228a5(rnying rgyud): skal ldan rtogs pas chog pa pa// bye breg spyod pas bshad dru gsol// don gsan 'khor la bka' srub pa// ma rtogs da pos ci sgre bkyang // rang sems chu rgod stong khams ldan// mngal kyis sgrib g.yogs khang srong bsrung //
228b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs bsgoms pas mi grol 'ching // da yang 'dus pa'i snying pa nyan// yang drag don gyi nges don 'di// 'khor 'das tshig tu brjod dka' ba// chos spyan ma mkha' 'drung // kun la khyab kyang rtogs par dka'// srang ma
228b2(rnying rgyud): wA ra'i me tog bzhin// brtsal ma 'ga' la ris 'ga' tsam// dbyung srid kun mi thun mong min// de phyir snod ldan phrad gyur nus// bla ma dze'i slob dpon la// nyan bshad bsgrub pa dbang nos nas// mching la srid spang ba
228b3(rnying rgyud): cing // rdzol bas ma bsgom par 'dod pa'i phyir// byang chub sgrog dang bsngob la// des den ma nor gdams dag 'di// ma mtshan gi dang ma dbyung rtogs// don ldan man ga rig pa'i thos// bstan te go pas nges par chag// de khyer lung bstan pa'i
228b4(rnying rgyud): dayang rdzong sems dpa' don// lanaci gdu kyi dengs ngan// rdzogs rten depadon pa nying gi// dang dran rnams ni di 'a 'dug/ dardzogs chen bstan pa byung // de mde mdon chad pa'i// gdaman pa pa snga 'byung / zhes banopo
228b5(rnying rgyud): shA // nga rtsom mdapang chud dus na// bang gshegs ma kha' 'gror byin gyis brlams// gnod papa mi tshugs bsod napa su byeb// datsong rtsegs pa sogs mas// pa rang bdamachags rtsod 'gyur bas// dbum shes shing rab da nas//
228b6(rnying rgyud): ning 'jig par 'gyur// deg du dus kyu dze// gal te tshogs pa chos pa/ dran// nyams dang drug la zhe pornarnams// yod med pa sher la bshags su gzug/ nyams su'i na par dam brkya'ang// gdams dgra yeng snang tshang bar bstan// de/ yin pa
228b7(rnying rgyud): 'di bstan na// gnam lpags sal bying ba bzhin// mkha' 'gros srog bcad nges par lhung // de phyir ma btags chos me bshad// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brgyad nas gcod pa chos rgya skyes med pa rig pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u phyeng ba kaM/
229a1(rnying rgyud): da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyen// du pe gsung gi 'od zer gyis// marig sems kyi man sel ba// sgron me'i snang ba nyi bzhin shar// yul dang ma bral chos kyi sra// des don ma nor gdams ngag dug
229a2(rnying rgyud): lung ldan ston pa ngas bshad nyon// chos nyid gnas lugs ngo bo la// rang byung yin phyir thog mtha' med// 'khor 'das gnyis la thog mtha' yod// dus gcig chod par ta la bzhin// 'khrul dang rtog pa yod pa'i phyir// mu ni dang chags
229a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig nam lang+ga 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor ba'i rgyu ni rnam gnyis te// gzung 'dzin zhen rtog gzhi ru snang // ras dkar la ni sU mA zhen 'dra// bag chags brtas phyir kun gzhi yin// ye shes mya ngan 'dam pa'i
229a4(rnying rgyud): // ltu ljin rkyen gyigadams dgo gas// shes rab rtag mthod las byung ba// rlog rjes kyi su zhes bya// daya rdo rje sems dpe'i nyon// gnyis ga 'i hU~M dzi ni// rang thung ngab nyid kyi sa// ye shes tshul sogs pa la// me gnas sa
229a5(rnying rgyud): shes don rtogs pas// 'ching grol dge sdig gnyis kyi chos// gzhi la gnyis ka gdod nas med// de phyir thig le nyag gcig go// rnal 'byor gdeng du de 'chang na// de la bsgom bsgrub ma byas kyang // gcig las shes pa kun shes pas// 'bras
229a6(rnying rgyud): bu sangs rgyas spos ci dgos// de las gzhan pa'i don med phyir// ldan gyis rdzogs pa'i chos sbrul// skye shi'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas// gzhi las mi 'gyur gser bzhin no// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad rnam gcod pa/ chos sku rtse med reg pa'i rgyud las/
229a7(rnying rgyud): gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes te ched du brjod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas kun rig nyal po la// 'khor gyi snying pos 'di skad gsol// rang skyer don gyi gnas lugs kyis// dpe dang dod kyi khyad par dang // yid ces mi 'gyur gnas/
229b1(rnying rgyud): lpags gang // / mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad nus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// dpe don khyad par bka' stsal pA/ shu dz+ra.A ga pa bu sems kyis kun// dbyung ba lnga la dzud/
229b2(rnying rgyud): med// de phyir 'byung lnga byang chub sems// phyogs 'ga' 'dra ba dab ru bstan// rgya mtsho'i dkyil nas me 'bar ba// gcig gis gcig la gnod mi rus// de bzhin ma rig ye shes kyi// thog mtha' rtsab mchod na// mung 'das po
229b3(rnying rgyud): na mi 'byung phyir// 'khor ba zil gyis ci la non// dper na khyung chen rin chen gyis// mtsho nyid bdud rtsir gyur pa ltar// sangs rgyas pas kyang sems can gnyen// sems can dus na ma rtogs na// dug lnga rang krol ci la 'ong /
229b4(rnying rgyud): nyam bzhig pas kyang rjes thob gtso// rjes thob lta bar ma shes na// thun mtshams bsgom pas sangs mi rgya// lung la brten nas rtogs pa yis// dus bzhi'i gdams dag ma shes na// ye shes 'brel med ci la 'char// de phyir
229b5(rnying rgyud): lung ldan gdams ngag gis// bar do lnga yi don rtogs pas// sangs rgyas rgyal po ye shes sku// 'di don rtogs pas 'dzin rtog nub// lung don rtogs pas rtog pa bros// 'khor 'das 'byung ba rnam dag bcom// spang sdud gnyis po tsho
229b6(rnying rgyud): bzung // rtag chad zhen pa rdul du brdeg/ mtho ris ngan srong rdzun du song // chags sbeng skyes shing ting 'dzin gsal// g.yeng ba chen bde chen rgyas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// shes rab lta ba 'di med ni// 'gro don sa
229b7(rnying rgyud): ci spyad kyang // byas pa don med bdud kyi las// tshogs su mi 'gyur tshe chad gnas// de phyir rtogs pa shin tu gces// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa// chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ dpe don khyad pa
230a1(rnying rgyud): / loT ste gsum dag// dpang rje sems dpa ton// 'grodrug sems can thams cad la// rang byung ba nas stong pan// togs dang togs med pa gnas// drang dubyu mdzin pa'i dang
230a2(rnying rgyud): bar snang khyad phrug khru byug dang // seng phrug pad+ma dngul rdo bzhin// ngos gzung med la gyen mi tshug/ mngal na chos sku ye shes gnas// ngos zin lha dman zil gyis gnon// bstan ma thag tu ye shes sku// nyon mongs nad nas dbyung gsal//
230a3(rnying rgyud): rtsol med dang chas ye nas gnas// de phyir gzhi ni 'gyur ba med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa'i nyon// sangs rgyas dgongs pa brtag dka' yang // sems can b+h+yo yis don rtogs thabs// dgos dor gzhi yi man ngag gis// ci stong
230a4(rnying rgyud): byAng ye shes shar// thog ma ma yin tham med// de lta'i zhes pa 'di nyid las// bzang por song bu gang yang med// yid ces chos su kha mig can// de phyir 'khor 'das ma bral phyir// rkye nang stod brgya dkun gyi grong // sangs rgyas sems/
230a5(rnying rgyud): chen gnyis pas sna// bltar med de krAn gyi ga ni// rnam mkha' nyi marin po che// sa gzhi na mtsho'i ri ba bzhin// mtha' dra bus mi dpyid rang gi sems// gsal la mA bsgribs rlos k+Shi \u0f88\u0f90// yon tenang byung ba sprin gyis grub// 'khor ngadam
230a6(rnying rgyud): bsnyed gyi kun gyi gzhi// g.yos pa med pas bsam mi khyab// 'gyur ba med phyir 'du 'bral med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rnal 'byor dam pa'i las can gyis// yid kyis ngo shes don rdzogs pas// kun bzang chos su da lta dang //
230a7(rnying rgyud): dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor bcad nas gcod pa/ chos sku sgo med rig pa'i rgyud las/ don chos nyid kyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// chos nyi
230b1(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs las// tshogs btud 'khor ba gang nas byung // mu stegs phyi rol yang dag dang // gsang sngags gsang chen ji ltar 'khrul// gren bsgom spyod pa'i nyes pa gang // lus sgrib 'khor ba gdan gnas// kun rigarnas pa
230b2(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// nga las 'khrul ba byung ba ni// thog ma'i dus kyi mtha' drug gnyis// kun gzhi'i rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyang // rang sems yin te chos skra min// yang ldan mang 'khrul 'khor dang
230b3(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdangs bzhin du// dang po shis bzhin lung ma bstan// chos nyid bdag gi rtsal yin kyang // lung ma bstan phyir rkyen dbang gyur// 'khor 'dras 'byung ba'i drang por ni// 'khrul pa'i gzhi la
230b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa yis// ma rig las 'khrul rnam pa brgyad// rkyen bzhis gzung 'dzin thos btags pas// rgyu rkyen zung du 'dzam pa yis// rang byung rig pa'i bo ngas// dmus long lta bur rang bsgrib pas// mi shes 'khrul pas 'kho rabang
230b5(rnying rgyud): 'khyams// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sgo lnga la sogs tshogs brgyad kyis// rtog pas bye brag 'dzin skyong bzhin// 'khor ba'i bag chags brtas par byed// de phyir rnam shes tshogs brgyad dag/ yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i chos/
230b6(rnying rgyud): gnas 'gyur chos su bstan pa yang // bkri dang ldem dgongs bstan par zad// de phyir kun gzhis 'dus byas te// gnyen po gzhi yis 'jig pa dang // bag chags chags pa'i rten byed pas// yang dag ma yin 'khor bA byung // rdzogs pa
230b7(rnying rgyud): chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa/ chos kyu skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor ba dang po gang nas byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon/ lha log mu stegs rnam gnyis dang // phyi rol yang dag gsang
231a1(rnying rgyud): sngags dang // gsung can lajal pas pa s+ho// // / dam padagan // stsu nas kyang 'dod 'jug// ngan ladug gyu sa// 'dug ga na la//
231a2(rnying rgyud): nyon// 'og ma'i lung na chen zang nas// blos 'tshal ba lta ba rnam pa bzhis// nyan thos dang rgyal yin padanas// lcog sun du rlung yi gtam// mtshan pa 'dul me nga ma rtogs// su dprang dz+wal chen po las// sol bapa' yo nga
231a3(rnying rgyud): / ngamarnyed pas snang ba 'ong la// grol 'dod theg pa rnam pa brgyas// snang ba'i nga bzhin shes pa las// rang sems don gyi snying po la// gzhi ni ma nas 'khrul pa'i byed// ma rtogs ma grol zhin tu 'ching // rdzogs chen pong khong brtad nas gcod pa/
231a4(rnying rgyud): byeb med pa rig pa'i rgyu de las zag pa 'ogam pa'i 'khru la tshul bshad pa'i len sa drug pa'o// de yang rdo rje sems dpatshanan// U na// me rtogs ci da drug sde bsgom// thun ga nga ljon shing badzin// spangs par
231a5(rnying rgyud): rkyo/ pA rnam gsum gyis// rang sems snying po ma rtogs par// gresgom du 'dod pa snying ngo // rgyal ma sgreng bang mtshor 'jug zung // da yang 'dus pa ska sbyin// dmas ling rdung ma mangs ma bzhin// ngabacos su ma rtogs pade// 'khor 'das
231a6(rnying rgyud): chos la ci byasams kyang // bsgoms pas sgrol bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir me rtogs kyi ba sgoms kyang // snang ba nyid nyi dganir 'dod pas// sdig tu chung rje thong ldang 'dod bzhin/ 'khor 'das kyi bur rkyen yid kying// ngo bo gnas lugs chos sgra min// rdzogs /
231a7(rnying rgyud): chen po 'khor bcad nas gcon pa chos sku skye med reg pa'i rgyud las/ ma rtogs par bsgoms na gol bar bsnyen pa 'i le rje ste bdun mi rma// de yad rdo rje sems dpa' ton// chos rnams can gyi rtsa ba mo// bla me dag la mi brten par// gseng sngags zang po /
231b1(rnying rgyud): blo drugs nas// nyan pa gang ba\u0f88\u0f90 ba dbang med pa yis// rang dbang med par gzhan bang bsgyur// nang bsngar ma gdol pa bzhin// rbang bka'/ thung rnams par byed// bar rjod gnod pa khyeng mod srung // dayang 'dus pa'i slong btan// dug dang gtan gang dang /
231b2(rnying rgyud): bzhing // spa gsu shugs kyid mnyams na// 'brus bu skyo bogs spyugs pa dang // phyi ma rdon dmyal bar lung // nang ma dbang rdung ma rgyas bzhin// rgan ma bye dngas rgyud kyi stsol// gdams ngag ga deng med se mas rtogs// nyams ma dra ba
231b3(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// yul ngan mun sros lo nyes bzhin// zhi gnas lhag mthong ma 'brel na// nges 'jog 'bras bu gsum mi 'byung // de phyir 'brel med rnal 'byor min// 'brel dang brnangs pa 'pho ba bzhin// lus ngag yid sa snod steng pas/
231b4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal sgo skur gzung 'dzin 'gyur// phyi ma las ngan du drar lung // rgyus med long bkru med bzhin// phyag rgya sngags dang ting 'dzin nyams// nyes sgron gsum byung don med pa khyams// de phyir gas sngags spyad par dka'// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas
231b5(rnying rgyud): gtsang pa chos smre med rig pa'i rgyud las/ lha spyod nyams pa'i nyes pa bsnyen pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpa' yang nyon cig/ 'khor 'das dag gi sa mtshams ni// rgyud lung skye 'dra'i slob dpon sems// drang don grub pa thob 'dod nas//
231b6(rnying rgyud): mi sbyor ba la sogs kyis// bu ni mad yon tan lha ldan yang // rnam smin lus dang ma bral bar// sangs rgyas yon tan rdzogs 'dod pa// shin du gti mug spad pa'i gnas// bcom ldan 'das kying rna mchog tu// rang lus bor nas sangs rjesana?// rnam smin lus da /
231b7(rnying rgyud): pas ni// 'bras bum rlo ba smras ci dgas// jo gse chen po 'khor ba byed nasagacid pa chos spyi bye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ rnam sbyin gyi lus dang mthal ba sangs mi bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gru pa'o// / da yang 'dus pa'i nyan// debye yo pa mtshan da ni/
232a1(rnying rgyud): #gzhi gnas bag chags rnam pa bzhi// ltung rkyen 'phral 'byung bag chag sA lngas// rang dbang med par mngal du 'jug/ de rgyu nyon mongs rnam gsum gyis// kun gzhi rnam gsum sdug bsngal 'byung // thar lam mi thob kye zhing 'chi// dpang 'dus pa'i snying po
232a2(rnying rgyud): nyin// sems can kun la gnas pa yi// kun gzhi khor ba ga ni yin yang // chos kyi sku yi nyid yin// de phyir kunag ni 'dus byas pa// byin kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ste// chu ba bzhi pa mthe' la chud// ma bsgral bar du thar mi srid// rdzogs pachen po la nga rgyad dan su gcod pa/
232a3(rnying rgyud): sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud lus 'khor ba da lta ga dan gnas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// 'khrul pa ldog pa'i zabs chen ni// dad pa brtson 'grus dam tshig dang // rang byung ye shes dbye ba yi pa// tha ma 'khor ba gang du 'gro// kun ri/
232a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// ma rig 'khrul pa ldog 'dod rnams// 'khor 'das gnyis kyis mi reg don// rang sems snying po rtogs pa'i thabs// lus srog ni bltad dpa yis// skrag cing yang med sems kyis// the tshom yid gnyis
232a5(rnying rgyud): med par ni// 'khor 'das rtsa ba ngo bor zhus// dpa' brtul chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis// phyir mi ldog par yid ches nas// yengs pa mi 'byung rgyun mi chad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// sems las ma rtogs don mi btsal// dug lnga ma spangs chos nyid shes// de
232a6(rnying rgyud): shes mi bsgom golas med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang byung ye shes yin min gyis// dbyed rnam pa bzhi pi don// lung ldan bla ma'i gdams ngag gis// rang sems snying po chos sgra ni// bstan na de ma thag tu shes// ma bstan par du shes mi srid// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon//
232a7(rnying rgyud): rang rig ye shes 'od po che// 'gro 'ong med par 'khor ba brlag/ ma rig log pas ye shes skye// 'khor ba ru bzlog mya ngan 'das// de shes ma bsgoms lhun gyis grub// don dang mthun pa'i nyams myong gis// bsgoms kyang de nyid nges shes skye// de phyir rtogs pa rab tu gces// rdzogs pa
232b1(rnying rgyud): chen po 'khor ba tud nas gcod pa chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa ldog pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // 'khor gyi snying pos yang gsol pa// nges pa'i don dang mthun pa yi// phyi nang dus mnyam pa ba grang // chos prA nyams su blang thab pa dang //
232b2(rnying rgyud): rigs gsang mthun 'jug la bzla ba'i// nges don spyad pa ji ltar spyad// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bstan du gsol// de skad nus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la dka' stsal pa// nga yi chos nyid gnas lugs ni// don gyi snying por dbyung la// ngaganags
232b3(rnying rgyud): med kyir// 'khor 'das 'byung ba gdod nas med// kye rkyen ma bskyed la sogs pa'i// rang gi ngo bo bzhi ldan pa// snying po nyid bslab mthar phyin// skye 'chi med pa rang byung sla// de phyir 'khor 'das lhung dogs med// rang gsal ngo'i kun gyi gzhi// rang sems rdzing po
232b4(rnying rgyud): nam ma kha'i rdo rje yid pe// sgri ba med phyir a dang 'dra// don ma yin phyir dper ni bstun// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ngo bo nyid kyis chos sprul// yod dang med pa'i rigs gnyis yod// tshogs brgyad yul las ldog pa'i phyir// yaM shes ba nga byung su// chos nyid dag pa
232b5(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// phyiru 'dra min la sogs pa'i// rang gi mtshan nyid lnga 'dra'i phyir// sngon gyis mgos chos kyi sra// gang yang rung bci la yang // sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa// yang dag don du mi bya'i phyir// dgag bsru ba med par btung sgoms pa dag/ de yang 'dus pa'i ljo/
232b6(rnying rgyud): rol yul gyi rang bzhin ni// rnam bzhi gyi la bar snang nang // gsum bral snang ba chos dbyings la// gcig pa tha dad ngos zin pas// nyi mther dang 'char ros zin// dgag bsgrub med phyir chos kyi dbyings// dred mo gdos zag chod pa bzhin// 'brel pa yod med rnam pa bzhis//
232b7(rnying rgyud): log rtogs zhen pa lnga log nas// nyam nga med pa'i brtul shugs 'byung // dper na khyung chen mkha' ldings pa'i// 'phur rlabs 'og tu kun chud ltar// phyi rol yul gyi rnam pa ni// sna tshogs mdun du bzhag pa bzhin// snang tsam nyid nas spang sdud med// zhen med
233a1(rnying rgyud): / rnal 'byor chos dbyings la// 'khrul pa'i tog pas gzhi mi 'gyur// rtsol ba'i sems las dbyings mi bskyod// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brgyad nus gcod pa chos su su med drug pa'i rgyud las/ nges pa don gyi lA ba bstan pa'i 'dra ste bdu gnyis kyi'o/
233a2(rnying rgyud): da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang sems chos sku de sprad na// lus can kun gzho gzhi cha la// snga phyi ma bral ye shes gsal// chu dngas rnyog med ji bzhin no// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag zang mo chos sgra ni// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/
233a3(rnying rgyud): rtog mtshan ma gzhi nas dag/ nyon mongs dang 'dzin rnams dang bral// 'phel 'grib skyon rnams ngang gis med// de yi dang la gnas thabs ni// tha ma 'bring gi rnal 'byor pas// stong pa gsal ba ma yengs bsgoms// gal te phyid rgod skyon byung na// gdams dag bcos pa'i
233a4(rnying rgyud): thabs gnyis kyis// dgaka bsrub med pa'i rang bzhin la// gzengs bstod dbang po yin du gzug/ me la zhing bsnan rin chen gter// rnam thog ye shes srul mur shes// de tsam nyid nas chos nyid gsal// dbang por ba kyi lha sgom la// bcos dang mi bcos med pa'i
233a5(rnying rgyud): phyir// sprin med nam mkha' ji ni nan du// rtogs pa'i gdeng dang 'bral ba med// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// nyi zla gzas zin mnyam pa bzhin// dbying sa dang chos sru dus mnyam cir// snod lam rnam pa bzhi ldan pas// 'bral med ye shes rdzogs pa yin// rdzogs pa
233a6(rnying rgyud): chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa chos su sgo med rig pa'i rgyud las/ ma bsgom mang bra' med mngon du bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yul gyi rkyen byas rtogs byung tshe// las dang dus bzhi don gsal ba// ye shes ma bsgoms 'bral ba med//
233a7(rnying rgyud): ba mo la ni nyi shar 'dra// yul nyid sems su me bsgom pas// dran rig chos nyid byang chub sems// dgag bsgrub med pa'i rang bzhin las// de nyid spyad pa'i yul las 'das// de phyir de na las nyams pa med// rang sems dbyings 'gags dum gnas tshe// rkyen byung dus bzhir don du/
233b1(rnying rgyud): ba/ ga phrag 'gags pang chos spangags la// tha na ci'i drag zhags dadra// 'jigs pa 'gal 'dod pa pa da// nyams med dag pa dan 'das// nad gcod sdug bsngab ci byung phyung // gdams gdung pags pa gasrungs// nga rgyas sa
233b2(rnying rgyud): gang // rtogs dang 'khrul pa'i bye brag gis// mu bzhi ya kyad gcig tu shes// gol ba rdul tsam mi 'byung bgro// de ma chos sgra zad kA ma// mi 'gyur brten pas gseng bzhin no// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' ton// 'jig rten dman pa'i spyod pa ni// srog rjod pa da pa dang /
233b3(rnying rgyud): me gtsang sprod dang rngan du sba// re de la ni gnyis gnyis dang // gnad dang dkag pa yod pa'i phyir// blang dor skyon gyis mgos te// gzhi la 'ching grol med pa'i phyir// dkar po'i chos dang sdig la sogs// gnyis ka'i 'bras bu mi 'byin na// dug lnga ye shes shar ba yin/
233b4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po 'khor brtsed nas gcod pa cos su skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ rig pa'i spyod pa gsang bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ched du bsgom du med pa'i dpe// nam mkha' bsgom du 'dzin pa 'dra// de bzhin yod med yul las
233b5(rnying rgyud): 'das// de phyir gzhi shes bsgom mi dgos// 'gro dron 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyi// rnal 'byor spyod lam thams cad du// nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor de// don la mi 'da' dam tshig srung // rang rig ma yengs dam tshig mchog/ da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// snying
233b6(rnying rgyud): bzlas su dang gas pa den// ma bsgoms 'phral med pa zhes rmod// rang sems shes pa snyi tshogs pas// gang yang ye shes las gzhan med// bla mi la rang sems chos nyid ni// de yang mi 'gyur nga seMn// ngag dang mdagag ni la med// dus dang snod rim nyid du 'ang // gri ba rnaH/
233b7(rnying rgyud): / rtogs pa'i ga nga mi 'bra na// matog pangs sa/ na 'tho kyad dag 'ang cho mi ga pa spyad pas/ brtso du med par la 'tha ba'i 'du bye ci rdza // da yang 'dras pa byo tan// gas can nyi gyu
234a1(rnying rgyud): // bla med go 'ayang mchog brnyes pa'i// bla ma dus gsumasangs rgyas dpal// dkyil 'khor sgo thugs 'bral med lha// man ngag rgyud don rang rig sa// chol med rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ba// lus dag yid kyis phyag 'tshal te// dgongs bdon gyis brlangs pa'i phyir// 6
234a2(rnying rgyud): du rtsol ba mi dgos te// phyi yi mchod ga tor gtong ba'i tshe// byin brlab drug dang smon lam btab// nyan bshad la ton la sogs rnams// dkar po'i chos spyod gang byed kyang // blta ba dran pas tshogs su 'gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nang gi mdzad spyod tshogs chen ni// yid 'a
234a3(rnying rgyud): pa yi gnas dag tu// dam tshig sel med tshogs 'khod de// sngon 'gro bas drug rdzogs byas nas// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang spyan drangs te// byin gyis brlabs la tshogs drangs nas// mchod pa rnam gsum rdzogs par 'bul// lha gshegs lhag ma ngol pa dang // sku gi dus
234a4(rnying rgyud): smon lam yang // lta ba'i dang du rdzogs par bya// de phyir tshogs gnyis dus gcig rdzogs// de yi yon tan brjod mi lang // rtogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// /
234a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// the tshom gegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// gdams ngag don rnams dbye ba dang // 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i rtags gnyis gang // thIgA le la shan gegs bsal ba'i// yon tan don la ji ltar rdzogs// kun dgA rgyal pos bshad du gsol// wasa?
