234a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i de nags na bka' stsal pa// lha sgom spyod pa 'bras bu yi// gdams ngag dbye nyi shu bzhi// ngo bo la sogs drug drug tu// dbye ba gcag tu rtogs pa'i tshe// mi yi lus la sangs rgyas thugs// de yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po 'khrul pa'i gzhi/
234a7(rnying rgyud): shes kyi// mari ga nga 'dzin khrul nga ste// ma spangs rangs grol ba'i phyir// 'khru ldog rtags brgyad ldan pa pa// de'i pa'i sangs rgyas rtsol med 'grub// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phyi rol yang dag rnam pa bani// gsang sngags gsang chen gyi nang lngas// yud nyid sems su 'dzin pa de//
234b1(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing na rkyen gyi gdams dag gis// 'byung ba ni'i lus dang brang med nas// 'khrul ba 'og pa'i tagla bca dganyis// de ldan rdal 'byor gang yang drang // sangs smras sras la rgyal ba'i thugs// rigu 'dzi ga dung 'tshor kAl pa'i sku// yon tan nam ma lang mtha' dang mnyam// rdzogs pa zad po da /
234b2(rnying rgyud): na gcid ducos su bye med rig pa'i byed pas/ man ngag gi dbye ba'i sonas 'jul pa rlog pa'i yon ten brtan pa'i ledra ste chu bdun 'o// kun zang nga yi byi brlabs kyis// tshig tu ma bkod thugs las brdud// don gyigati byin bstan pa'i phyir// tshig nyung don du rdzogs pa ris// cig de
234b3(rnying rgyud): lazhan dbya ba ni// mdzod nyid bdags pa'i thog dang // bsang sngags gagi'i thig mi drung // rdzos su sbyin bu mi thig le dang // yang ti'i brib 'i nyig gcig pa// rdo ni bzhi bzhing// ngas ba dadag tan tshig kyi me// 'gros la kun byeb yang // rgyang kyi blo nas gsuMs bstan pa// snang
234b4(rnying rgyud): chos dbyi dag / gsogs te// dbye 'i donas pani du snang // da yang bdus pa'i steng ba nyin// rlung gi rig po cos sprul// sgra sathun dang da ngagras gtun rdzogs kyis// thams cad sdig pa yin med kyang // gang ni bani mi mtshan nyid pa// dba' sogs pazhes nog// rten bstan
234b5(rnying rgyud): partse// don ming poganyis su 'dras// lab zlag cig gi nga du rdzogs// dra yang 'dras pa'i steng po tan// kyi nang yul la so sa rnams kyi// tsom gegasu rnams bsal ba'i phyir// thung lnga la bcu bdun kyis ni// mi 'phrul shes pa'i rnab 'brang des// nges pa'i gad ngab ldan ston pa
234b6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rdzogs pa rde po 'kho na nas gcid pa rjes sgra skye mi dge pa'i klud las/ tshom gyi gags pasam pa dngos bstan pa'i le'u ste co brgyad pa'o// / du yang rdo rje sems dang rton/ nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan ni// sems bskye ga pa ga rnam pa dang // de gnas
234b7(rnying rgyud): khrag mthong rdzogs pa yis// 'angs byin bcu pang la sogs// sngags kyi dza spyod rnams cad rdzogs// nga yang 'dug pa'i 'khod rnams ston// rang sems rtogs pa'i ye shes la// tho'i sgrib med par bstan pa yang // bcwa ga nyis gsum dang bdun pasnyen //
235a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ rtogs pa gsum du 'dus// gang yang yid la ma byas na// gol med chos spu thugs la gnas// nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag don gyi nyi khru'i don// ye nas chos sgra dpral med don// nyams kyi rim pa lnga ldan pas// rtags chen gsum nyi
235a2(rnying rgyud): shugs las 'byung // de tshe bdud kyi spyod yul ni// bzhi gsum drug 'byung zil gnon na// nges padon gyi rtags yin pas// de phyir bar dor sangs kyis 'grub// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa chos su skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ glegs sel ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i
235a3(rnying rgyud): ste bcu dgra pa'o// // sems dpa' chen pos yang gsol pa// 'bras bu yon tan gdul bya ni// ltad ma nyams bskong thabs dang // rtsa ba gcig pa'i bden rtogs na// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod ji ltar spyad// kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas//
235a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams la ni bka' stsal pa// lta spyod la sogs nyams bskad pa// nyes 'gyod yid la byas nas su// bla ma mkhas pa'i don ldan nas// dbang rnams rim par mnos nas ni// dang sems dbang btsug don zhus nas// rgyun du mi gtong gus pas mchod// de la rtag tu gnas par
235a5(rnying rgyud): bya// de bskang gdeng chen bdun ldan pas// da lta nyid du sangs rgyas thugs// gser skal mig gis 'dod yon lnga// dus gcig nyams su myong ba bzhin// ci spyod sangs rgyas ye shes thugs// sems can 'gro don btsal mi dgos// mi lus ldan pa de nyid la// lha mis
235a6(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal mchod par 'gyur// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa chos sku skyo med rig pa'i rgyud las/ lha spyod nyams pa bskang ba'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste ti shu pa'o// // da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ni// pha ma
235a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i bu bzhi yin// de yang gdod nas gcig las gnyis// gsum las 'brel yod gcig la med// rtsa ba bzhi yi don shes pas// skal ldan rnams kyis rang rig pa// bden mthong snang med rtogs dus 'dir// tshig tu brjod par mi nus
235b1(rnying rgyud): kyang // sems la gsal por yod pa'i phyir// reg pa'i ye shes mos nyid mthong // dus gsum dag tu sgra 'gags med// mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang myed// rin rjen 'dul khung stor gyur kyang // de yi yon tan mkha' la 'byung /
235b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rang sems ngo bo nyid// mngal du rang sems bying gyur kyang // rang byung gdod nas rad gsal phyir// ye shes chen po rgyun mi chad// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lus kyi nang na mos skya gsal// nad sgo lha yi 'od shar bas//
235b3(rnying rgyud): grogs su 'ong ba rnams// de tshe yul dang 'brel pa med// cung shes reg 'jam nam mkha' lding // ma mtsho gser dang mchog rab bzhin// sems kyis gar phyin chos sgrar gsal// yul gyi gzung 'dzin sngon mi gos// reg pa zo thub bzhi zon
235b4(rnying rgyud): ldan// 'khor bar gnas kyang go lus med// de phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur brtan// de ltar don lnga ye gnas phyir// 'bras bu rig pa de lta nyid// de nyid ma brjed kun gsalan// mi gnas mya ngan 'das zhes bya// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor bcad
235b5(rnying rgyud): nas gcod pa/ chos sgyu ste med rig pa'i rgyud las/ snad med sems kyi rig pa rtogs dus bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nga yi mdzad spyod chen po ni// sgra med gzugs skur 'byung ba ni// thams
235b6(rnying rgyud): cad zil gyis gnon par byed// tshig med rig pa'i gsung gis ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyas par byed// rnam par rtog med ye shes thugs// cir yangs lce thams cad mkhyen// stong gsum 'jig rten gsum po yang // ra yi bzugs
235b7(rnying rgyud): gnas gzigs mor ngos// smug kyang thugs kyi rol pa ste// re re la ni gsumags ma dang // dbye ba rnam pa dgra yis ni// da lha chos sgra la mig can// lus dang bral ba'i skad cig la// sangs rgyas rgyal po ye shes sku// gzugs snga rnam gnyis shugs la 'cha
236a1(rnying rgyud): sems can bsam pa'i khyad par las// yid bzhin dbang po gang 'thad ston// rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa chos snga skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ yon tan ci gdul bya bstan pa'i 'du ste ter gnyis pa'o// // de nas kun
236a2(rnying rgyud): po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor ni rnam pani la// nges pa'i dgos ched bka' stsal ba// rang ring rtogs pa 'dir spros shig/ de skad gsungs pa'i don gsan nas// rnam par gzigs la sogs pa yi// snro byungs rgyas rnam bdun gyis// rang rang ga
236a3(rnying rgyud): brjod pa// rig pa 'gag med chos kyi sku// rtogs pa brjod med rang yid ches// ma btsal rang sar 'gyur ba med// ngan pa skyon de ya ngang du bzhag/ snang med rang sems chos skur gsal// rang lus da lta nyams pa med// dngos med rig pa stong par gsal// log pa dad se
236a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i// da lta'i sangs rgyas rnam bdun gyis// rang dang rtogs pa yang gsungs pa// rang byung kun khyab ye shes gsal// sa la lo mi rtog da lta nyid// nad gsil yul la ma yengs pa// dngos med gsal ba bsgom mi dgos// dad lus rang sems chos nyid don// ngo bo 'gyur med la bcos pa
236a5(rnying rgyud): tha mal snying po rtogs pa'i sku// byams pa la ni sogs pa yi// mgron sangs rgyas rnam pa bdun// rang dang rtogs pa yang gsungs pa// shes pa 'di na med ye shes grub// cir smang dgag bskyab med par zad// swA phyi yengs med ye shes rgyun// rnal du rig pa 'gyur ba med// ske med rtag
236a6(rnying rgyud): pa byang chu'i sgra// brjod med ting 'dzin 'byung 'drug med// rang sems ma bcos don la thog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gi// dgongs pa gcig phyir ye shes thugs// rdo rje yengs med la sogs pa// rig 'dzin sems dpa' yang yum bcu// rang rang rtogs pa'i don brjodapa
236a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'dzin med rig pa stong // rtog/ pa'i dran pa 'gyur ba med// spros bral lta ba yengs pa med// ye shes 'chi med zhe sdang bral// nga sems ci spyod snying po'i don// ma skyes nga rgyal ngo bo nyid// dngos med ye shes zhel yod// 'dod chags gol med ye shes rgyun// lta ba rtsol ba med pa'i klong // gsal bzhin med
236b1(rnying rgyud): kyichag/ da yang lus pa sa rjod/ mas sbru na TI/ rangs kya ju na byags pa/ da gra med par dbum rtogs/ ma ni mo pa dang/ thubra la dgo nas pakung bum // zhes pa tho'i thad par ba/ ga tum na sas// don pa byung da / sas cas sa
236b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa chos sku gyi med rig pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// // de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // de tshe 'dus pa rnam bzhi yang // rang sems rtogs pa mngon gyur nas// dga' ba'i sems kyis yi rang nas// rdo rje sems dpa
236b3(rnying rgyud): gsol ba// rtogs pa brjod pa'i don mthun pa// 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas da lta myong // rang sems ma dang thug gis phrad// de phyir da lta kun bzang nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// 'dren mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad gsol ba'i don go nas// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsungs pa//
236b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs kyi byin rlabs las// dgongs pa ma lus bcud bsdus pa// dus gsu mgul pa'i thugs kyi don// gdams dag tshad med nyid khu ni// dad ldan byed la ngas bshad pas// don 'di chud la shin tu spros// yang dag nyid du sems kyi bzung // jig rtag gcig mngon snang ba//
236b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi gtur gyi 'byung gnas dade// snod ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis kyang // gal te sbyor bas don ston na// sangang kyis chos stong dbang tsugs// gzhan pa mi smye mna'abor nas// snod ldanaman dag par bi bstun// tshogs kyi mchod pa dus bya// de ltung mthas tsas bstanan// slobang
236b6(rnying rgyud): bar chad 'ong // bka' chu bra ma smod pa la// mi tshe 'di nyid da lta'i dus// nad dang pa yog sna tshogs 'ong // de phyir man dag yang snying 'di// 'jig rten grags pa nor 'dod phyir// nams kyang ma rmil sems la tshong // rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs// rdzogs sa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa
236b7(rnying rgyud): chos du sgo med reg pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs pa'i mdzod spro dang byung gtad pa rnaMl rje ste nye thu bzhi pa'o// / rin po ci te kyai 'byung ga das zhes bya rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan posim pa mi tra dang / A r+ya dran pa ye shes kyis bsgyur ci zus te gtan la phab pa'o//
237a1(rnying rgyud): / kya ga ska dang / maN+Das sh+tha tagaH/ sa pra sh+'u ya/ gzhan ba phrul tananam/ bad// dang / dgas can pa rga ba'i yang snang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ rnam par slong 'das kyi byud ces thab/ bcom ldan 'dus ra
237a2(rnying rgyud): nga bo nyid kyi tha/ dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska gsungs pa'i bus gcig na// bcom ldan pa ni rig rgyal po de// 'og min chos dbyings po thang dra// snying po kyang chub zla bzhugs pas// rigs lnga'i 'khor la thugs gzigs te// ye shes khor po'i
237a3(rnying rgyud): pa las// g.yos pa med par lhun gyis grub// de tshe 'dus pa rnam bzhi yang // rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob// 'khor 'jig bsod srubs rin chen mang // mar me log par dad sel dang // 'od srungs rin chen snying po dang // dbang po zhe dang pa ba rtsegs//
237a4(rnying rgyud): srub dang ni shA ma thub// me dri ma bu chen thob dang ni// spyan nas gzigs dang 'dam pa'i dpal// dri med phyag na dga' ba'i dbang // dus gsum spangs rgyas rnams kyang bzugs// sems dbang rdo rje snang ba dang // ye shes dpal dang yon tan snying // skyon med grags pa lung brtsal/
237a5(rnying rgyud): shes spyan mardo rje dbyings// dpal 'bar ma dang dpal ldan bde// las kyi sems ma chen mo rnams// rang rang gcol 'khyud nas 'khod// gzhan yang chos sung skal pa'i tshogs// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro pho mo dang // dregs can dam btags zhal 'ches pa// rang dbang med
237a6(rnying rgyud): dad 'dus rnams// rang sems rtogs par 'dod pa'i phyir// lus ngag sems kyis zol med par// thabs cig rim par 'khod gyur te// de tshe rdo rje sems dpa' yis// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa yi// thams cad sku gsung thugs dang ni// rdo rje las byung
237a7(rnying rgyud): sum tshogs// kun rig rgyal po'i dgongs pa des// mngon par gzigs pa'i don go nas// rdo rje'i yid kyi don bskul ba// 'khor 'das ma rig rnal 'byor thugs// nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas// ye shes rnam par grol ba'i thugs// ngo bo nyid kyi srub spyod nas/
237b1(rnying rgyud): rdzags dam dbang gis bzhengs su gsol// dgad bskul ba mthun gyur nas// nga banyid las gzugs sbar bzhengs// bzugs sba ral ba'i mngad bud kyis// 'od zer zlos pas nam mkha' khyab// thams cad kun tu snang mang dpas// 'khor rnam sar mtshar byang dang
237b2(rnying rgyud): gcig lus dge yid kyis kyang // rnal babyor tshogs kyis phyag 'tshal nas// bden pa'i yid kyis yang bskul pa// 'khor 'das rtsa bzugs kyi dbyings// shes rab chen por mnga' ba rnyes pas// sprul pa grangs med 'byung ba'i gnas// chos du bdebs 'gro don gyis/
237b3(rnying rgyud): bskul bzugs chud nas// 'khor 'das ma degadon chen la// 'bral med dgongs par snyoms zhugs te// cad mi gsung bar ldan gyis bzhugs// de nas blo gros dam pa de// cang mi gsung bar ngo mtshar te// dpa' bo mgon por yang zhus pa// e mnam mkha' lta bu/
237b4(rnying rgyud): chog pa pa nas // nas mi rnam sa// 'du nas rje / bzhin ga ma ma ldaldan gyis// dgrag tsug pas thams A/ ga 'i gtsa pa'i gang// ga sumasadas
237b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes snying po rdo rje'i thugs// nyi zla lta bur rang gsal ba// 'khor 'das spros bral thig le'i thags// ye shes rig par byin gyis brlabs// thugs rje kun gyi bdag po khrod// sangs kyis rnams kyi yang mes po// rnal 'byor kun gyi dam pa'i lam// bdud rnams kun gri bdud
237b6(rnying rgyud): 'o// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// byang chub sems kyi mdzod chen po// ma rig mun pa bsal du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i don go nas// bcom ldan bo nyid spu des// 'khor rnams la ni thugs gzigs nas// phyogs bcur zhal ni 'dzum mdzad de// dper na
237b7(rnying rgyud): mar snying po las// 'od zer kun tu bkye ba ltar// khyab par mdzad cing bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das med pa'i gong rol du// ngartogs kun tu bzang po byung // gzhan pa'i zhe gnas blos bsgom pas// sangs rgyas kyi dkyang gded med gol// phra mo'i rnal 'byor blos ci dgos// de skar
238a1(rnying rgyud): / bka dul gsungs mthag/ 'khor rnams mdag nga rdzogs te// don la thathom pas // ma na yi gyis sbyin d+hAm sa// 'do nagan dag par chagasas// rgyam mom rin pasogs// kun bya blan cing yang na gyur// nanas dngas sa
238a2(rnying rgyud): // thugs kyis gzigs nas don rig pa// 'khor rnams zhe gnas pas pa gtan la// zhen pa gas la bar yid gzigs nas// ting nge 'dzin gyis don gsol pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes thugs rje chen po yis// chos nyid gnas lpags ji sta ba// ma
238a3(rnying rgyud): nor ma bcos snying po'i thugs// 'bul ba'i blo yis rtogs pa'i thabs// 'khor 'das ma rig lhag mthong don// dus 'dir bdag la bshad du gsol// rang byung ngo bo nyid su des// don rigazugs kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas chos nyid ji lta ba// 'khor 'das ma
238a4(rnying rgyud): rig snying po'i don// yang mes nga yis don bshad du// rdzogs chen skye med don zab kyang // ma rtog pa la sdig mor che// nor bu rin chen rnyed dka' bzhin// phyi ma'i dus kyi mi ngan rnams// dar drag dang thuzung tshor skyen la// bka' yi don la yid mi ches// gzhung mang sprin tshig rtog
238a5(rnying rgyud): pa za// byang chub pas ni khe grags bsgrub// le lo che bas grub rtags rings// 'dug la brtson nas 'dor ba skyen// des pa'i don lag la chen 'jug/ bden pa'i tshig la sgo sur 'debs// tshig tu zhib la don tu cing // thos bsam pas ni ngom par rings// shes nas mi bslab lal
238a6(rnying rgyud): bar 'dor// gong 'og gzung ni bsres te bskrad// bka' min mi chos don du byed// man dag zab mo thor du 'tshong // tshig nyung zab mo gting phyin la// shazung mi phyed khrom zhes smra// gdams ngag zlos chud mi gson par// don nyid rtogs par byed pa la// yid mi ches pa'i rigs pa la
238a7(rnying rgyud): mang por bshad kyang don med la// mekhas pa yin zhes yon tan brjod// bla ma sprod pa'i gang zag la// kho bden zer zheng rjes su 'jug/ gsang ba'i man ngag mgo bar// sngo bus mabyas slob dpon 'khangs// blangs nas brgyud pa'i man ngag la// ma nor yin par mi
238b1(rnying rgyud): bar// rang ba zo 'a chabs 'bras pa la// yid ches byed cing dam par 'don// lta dman rnams kyi do sung byed// da lta bu la dus byung ba// don bstan srung cig nyid la// rgyud lungs das rgyas smag cang dngangs// nyan thos mdo rje bsngal cing 'bog/ zhwa dang la/ med du /
238b2(rnying rgyud): blo slar 'dogs pa'i gang zag rnams// gtan du dmyal ba chen por byung // 'di'i tshe yi bar chad dang // 'dogs pa sna tshogs de la 'od // mgo lus tshal pa stong du 'gas// rig 'din rnam gyis spongs par 'gyur// de rgyar shin tu gsang ba'i don// snod ldan spong
238b3(rnying rgyud): rnyed dkon// de skad bka' stsal don go nas// 'khor rnams mgrin gcig thal sbyar nas// yid kyis gdung ba'i don gsol pa// 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung ba la// thugs rje chen pos mi 'dzin nam// ri dwags 'dzin pa'i rgyar blud na// rnam tog zab ma gcod dam/
238b4(rnying rgyud): can las la rdug tshad kyang // 'gro don snying rje mi mdzad dam// ma rig mun pa'i smug dum ru// dmus long bzhin du rang sems 'thibs// ye shes nyi ma mi 'char ram// zhe sdang me chen 'bar ba ni// las kyi rlung dmar chen pos bus// chos nyid rlan gyis mi 'jil
238b5(rnying rgyud): lam// 'dod chags chu ltar thub pa yis// bse rtse bzhin du zhen pa la// ye shes me yis mi bsreg gam// don stor lus kyi nang du sbyor// lam stor bdag las mkhan mdzod// dus 'dir 'dus pa rnams kyis kyang // 'gal sems rdul tsam med par ni// dad pas byang chub
238b6(rnying rgyud): don la mos// nges shing dad pas yid bsdus so// de nas ngo bo nyid su des// ye shes 'khor lo'i dgongs pa las// thugs ni mngon par bzhengs nas kyang // kun bzang chos sru'i rtogs don de// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal ba// legs so dang ldan 'khor rnams
238b7(rnying rgyud): lhag mthong gsal bar ngas bshad kyi// legs par nyon la yid kyis zung // go las chod pa'i lta ba yis// gdeng du go 'gyur rnal 'byor pas// ched du mi bsgom dang yan te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis// dbang po rang yan btang las byung // ma bsgoms ye shes
239a1(rnying rgyud): shun du nan / rgyu / sa nas // sa na na natu nan na su sa du /
239a2(rnying rgyud): mas// dag pa ba'i 'ang gis da ston pa// 'ab pa pa // brnyed nal sa cog// gas par rted par yigs ma'am/ na me byums pa'i 'a // 'dzin ma rjod thag kyi la da// ded ngan
239a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa / na/ ma
239a4(rnying rgyud): gted bani gams pa snyed// rgyu mag tsam 'o// sa mya dang rnams 'am ma da/ pa rjin de / na la mardzogs mad pa// sa la can shal so/ kyi shings sa maH// dpang bam pa 'das la dag
239a5(rnying rgyud): bka' las mi 'das med kyis ban// lta ba'i yang zhing ba shad du gsol// de gang gsol ba'i donags na nas// bcom ldan ra ba rjid ched da ma// gad nas 'bral med ti dzin la// bde par rdzogs nas bka' stsal pa// yang snying ga ba'i chung chen 'di// yid kyis pazhan
239a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'idon// ngas shes legs dam par gyis// bdud dang byang gi tsud gnas cad kya nyid ngol pa las gagani med// dmags par ci nga // \u0f7fsa rba glag tu tshog par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sgra gas dbyugs// khre 'gag med pa ma/

239b1(rnying rgyud): drugs lnga// bran / rgyal pos bka' sbal pa/ khyod kyi zhes bya ngas bshad nyan// nga yi ye shes ldan thab la// ba zhag mos pa drang ba'i ci// hUM lamatshan nyid rtogs pa'o thabs// bana' tsam kyan nas nan thol ba'i// na
239b2(rnying rgyud): kyi mos pa yis// theg pa kun la thos bsam gnas// dben pa'i dgon par gang bsgom pa// rang sems dmu rgod stong khams yan// mngal gyis sgrib g.yogs khang stong bsrung // bcos ma'i spyod pa sras bsgom pa// 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob 'dod pa// zhe 'dod yod phyir 'khor
239b3(rnying rgyud): hUM// snang ba sems su byas pa'i phyir// 'bras su ye shes 'byung mi srid// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das tshig tu badzod dka' ba// chos sku nam mkha' lta bu de// kun la gnas kyang rtogs par dka'// u du ma wa ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na yang de 'ga'
239b4(rnying rgyud): ga/ 'byung srid kun gyi thun mong min// don 'di kun la bshad kyis nyon// bla mardo rje slob dpon las// nyan bshad sgrub pa'i dbang mnos nas// mched la sring ltar gdung byed cing // thos bsam bsgom par 'dod pa'i phyir// byang chub srog dang bsgo ba yi// snod ldan ma nor phrad
239b5(rnying rgyud): gur na// 'tsho ba rang gi sbyar la yang // lta ba'i dgongs don 'di bstan te// ma mtshon go dang ma dpyad rtogs// don ldan man ngag rig pa'i blos// ma bsgoms rtogs pas nges par chog/ de yi 'bras bud lta nyid// sangs kyis rgyal po ye shes sgra// thams cad mkhye
239b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes te// 'bras bu kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'adra yang nyon// ngo bo nyid kyi tshos spu la// 'das dang ma 'das mi mda' yang // nga nyid dngos su mi bzhugs tshe// 'dzam gling dbus kyi shar phyogs su// skal ldan rigs kyi sbal pa gcig pha
239b7(rnying rgyud): med bram ze rigs skyes nas// nga yi des don ltab 'di// gdams ngag me bachad ston pa 'byung // phyis kyi rnal 'byor 'jug 'dod pas// nga yi spyad 'di rtogs par gyis// 'di shes bla ma dam par bzung // de bzang yon tan brjod mi langs// nges don 'di la gang mos
240a1(rnying rgyud): @#// rnams// bka' dang mthun par don gyinas// dul tsam du yang ma bsgoms cad // sangs kyis sa la spos ci dgos// da tsha nga ldan 'di la 'jug/ 'khor 'das ma chog chos su'adzin// las can kun gyi rtags dran gyis// man na
240a2(rnying rgyud): chen bstan pa 'byung // de tshong yi 'khor rnams kyis// nges don lta ba 'chad pa la// lha dman tshul 'chos sde pa ni// sngags pa de las 'che'i chu stegs dang // drang don theg pa la zhen rnams// zheng byed pa'i dus gyur ro// kha zer 'phyar la gtong ba dang // dug nga
240a3(rnying rgyud): mtshon sogs kyis// de la gsod par sems 'gyur zhing // sa phyogs mnga' ris 'gegs pa'i mo// kun bzang lta ba nges don 'dri// ngo bsrung tshul 'chos ma yin par// zhum med dam chos 'di 'chad pa// chomatshom med pa dpa' bo'i mchog/ 'jigs med ma nor ston pa'i/
240a4(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs rnams kyi byin gyis rlobs// mkha' 'gro chos skyong khros ci dgos// gnod pas mi tshugs bsod nams 'phel// de tshe mu stegs nyan thos sogs// rang rang brkam chags rtsod 'gyur nas// g.yul 'gyed byed cing ru tra 'dra// rims nad sna tshogs bkra mi shis
240a5(rnying rgyud): yon bdag rnams ni dad pa rdzog/ 'og ma'i bstan pa 'jig pa'i rtags// phyi ma ngan song smos ci dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de lta bu yi dus byung tshe// gal te tshogs la chos 'chad na// nyams dang lpags pa na 'khon rnams// yod med gsher la bshags su bzhugs
240a6(rnying rgyud): dpe nus par chos mi 'chad// dper ni lha ma rang dug skyes na// bdag pos dug tu shes mthag/ rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed// de bzhin dam nyams mi mthong na// gang yin tshegs las bkar la btang // lta bshags ched du yid la bya// de ltar ma yin rtsal bzhag na// rkyen med ma
240a7(rnying rgyud): thug srog gcod bzhin// nyams thib gyon gyis na tshe 'byung // mkha' 'gros chad pa rims kyis gcod// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gal te da dpas gdung sems kyis// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon 'gyod nas// bskang bshags g.yo sgyu mi byed pa// gser dngul chag bcos rtsir
240b1(rnying rgyud): nga// dun pa stan na sas/ das ldanag/ ban ga sa shAgs pa san// do ga pal du gyud// la dus pag+sag+sas // sha'adang man zang gang cad// ma gas nga
240b2(rnying rgyud): pa chen po lta thams cad kyi yang snying / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi bsten pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// zhal gyis bzhes te bka' stsal ba//
240b3(rnying rgyud): lung man ngag yul la blta// de phyir mnor chos spu min// sems yin zer zhing snang bar 'chel// sems dang 'bral med brjod byas kyang // glang po phag dang 'dra ba bzhin// 'brel med don ni rtogs bya'i phyir// de phyir yul 'di sems 'dra yang // snang ba chos slar 'bral med pas
240b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid rang sems rtogs par bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' thon// yul gyi snang ba 'di nyid la// mtha' yas ming du btags pa yin// yod mthong snang grags chos rnams kun// bla dgas tsam du btags par zad/ de la dngos gzhig la yod// med pa nyid na yod rtog pa// 'khrul pa rnams
240b5(rnying rgyud): kyi shes pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi mkhyen phyir// phyi rol yul la don mi bzhag/ de kying 'khor 'das 'byur ba kun// glo bur yin phyir gnas lcags min// de phyir 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nga yi gsung gi 'od zer gyis// ma rig sems kyi mud khrang du// sgron ma'i snang ba nyi bzhin 'char//
240b6(rnying rgyud): yul dang ma 'brel chos kyi sku// rang la dang thapa ye gnas pas// lung ldan rkyen gyis rtogs pa 'thung // klu 'bras rkyen rnams ngas bshad nyon// ngo bo gnas lugs chos su dang // de las 'khrul pas 'khor bar 'artsams// ldog thabs sdod brgyad ldan pa yis// nges pa'i don mthun
240b7(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag gis// the tsho mgegs chen bsal ba dang // 'bras bu lhun rdzogs gdul bya byung // de sa gsungs pa'i don thos te// 'khor rnams dga' zhing yi 'angs ste// gus pa'i sems kyis chos nyan to// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yad snying // nam mkha'i spong langs kyi rgyud las/ gsung
241a1(rnying rgyud): bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// dad ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sems kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir// med du 'arjod pa'i don gsungs pa// 'khor
241a2(rnying rgyud): 'das gnyis kyi gzhir gyur pa// ngo bo nyid kyi skra mchog ni// rang byung yin gyi thog mtha' med// 'dus mthus kyi nam mkha' 'dra// de yang 'dus pa 'i snying po nyon// ma mtshon go dang sa dpyad par// de nyid rtogasu pa'i srin tha la// byar na zlog mtha' dzas bci
241a3(rnying rgyud): rab ta la 'i nyi shar 'dra// lub ldan rkyen gyi gdams ngag gis// thog ma'i gzhi shes rnal 'byor bas// 'khor bya'i mtha' me shugs la rkyod// mun pa rnam langs d+hi shar 'dra// sems can rang sems 'phrul ba'i phyir// mtshon dpyang rtog/ phung khor ba gyis// bablang pa
241a4(rnying rgyud): jo thar dzad// phyi nang spa nga thogs 'dag dang // de' da'i sems dpa rtson// 'khor ba'i gzhon zhe rtog yin// gzung dron nan pas 'khor bar ra// ngas dag nga ni rna mazhen 'dra// bag chags pas phyir dran ga khri yin// da yang 'dral pa ting ba
241a5(rnying rgyud): ye zhes bya ma pa'i rgya// shes rabalhag mdzang las byung g+sa/ lung ldan rten gyis rtogs pa'o// rdzog po pos brgya// gzhi ka'i rgya tu na// rung banyid pa // seMrnams kun ci gzhi na byed// nas rgya zhes de'ang/ gas mgyogs pa
241a6(rnying rgyud): cang // phung ldan chen tu mishes de// thabs cad mkhyen pa'i rgya sbyin byer// pe'i gis de la bya// rjid lam gyi 'dod rtsol gyis// btsur byung chu shegs yin pas// shrI la rtsol med pa ges 'di// 'amadzal shes dam nga ba sungs// rtogs pa'i dadangs ca
241a7(rnying rgyud): da // gas de gra kyi nga da dang// nga ma da rnaMs su gyub/ yon nyi kyis rnamam mings byung/ mi shes 'bras kyinyid skyes pas// dmya po'i na can rgyun pa babyed// rtsoms len ma da kyil 'drig pa mngang sang //
241b1(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying bzhin// mi gnas chos kA don// klu pa// 'chang grol dag rjeg gnyis kyi chos// gu zhol gnyis ka gdod nas med// depyid byeg le thug gzog go// de yang 'dus par byung ba ston// nye pa dkyil na san med ltar// dang da
241b2(rnying rgyud): ma bsgoms kyang // skye med byang chub chos spu'i spyong// go la shrI bdag la la ming // dper na seng ge'i rdza grags pas// ri dwags phra mo 'phyir ba bzhin// don 'di rnal 'byor ga yod pa// lha dman spo srur zil gyis gzhon// dper na pad ma 'dal gnas kyang // dri mas mi
241b3(rnying rgyud): shin tugs la// de bzhin rnal 'byor lus yod kyang // sgrib pas mi gos ye shes gsal// dper na 'khor pos sbyar kyal nyid// gling bzhi sring phran dbang du bsdus// de bzhin den 'di rtogs pa yis// pha rol phyin bcu'i dbang rnams kyang // rang bzhin ma btsal lhun du ba rdzogs//
241b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gdengs su de 'chang na// de la bsgrub pa ma byas kyang // gcig shes pas ni kun shes pas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas smos ci dgos// de las gzhan pa'i don med phyir// ldan gyis rdzogs pa'i chos stsal// skye shi'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas// gzhi las mi 'gyur gamed bzhin no
241b5(rnying rgyud): de skad gsungs pa'i don go nas// rang sems rtogs par tha ba'i phyir// rtse gcig dad pas gus gyur nas// la bzla la don gyis mos// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang d+hid// nam mkha' slong yangs kyi rgyud las// rtsed du brjod pas gong rang ston pa'i 'dra ste gsum po'o// / de nas su
241b6(rnying rgyud): rgyalabo la// dadus pa'i 'khor gyis don rdzas pa// chos nyid dang byung gnas sngags kyi// dpe don khyad par gang gis dbye// yid ches pa yi ga tan tshigs gang // kun pazang thugs ni ji ltar rtogs// zhus pa'i don gis na 'aka' stsal pa// dpedon ldad pa dngas bshad kyis// nam mkhas
241b7(rnying rgyud): gang tu sems can gyis// nam mkha' dag la rig pa med// sems nyid ma bsgri bla rig par gsal// de phyir nam mkha' byang chub dpe// 'degs byed rlung gi 'byung ba la// ye shes rlung gis theng rngub khyab// radi rig dngos med byang chub dang// chos nyid klong du mngon sangs rgyas// spyad pa'i
242a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal sa a b+hag/ rmany-id byung chub da ma // / dbas sa oM// byang na ba snang na mngan sangs rgyas// mapyod 'a dam par shod pa// rangs mas snang pa dang sa mad kya// thams cad mab ga/
242a2(rnying rgyud): mngon sangs rgyas// drod snyoms tsha ba me 'di la// rang sems me yi ga zhi med kyang // nyon mongs sreg phyed dpe bstan pa// byang chub med ni mngon sangs rgyas// 'byung ba lnga po 'di nyid kyang // don gyi sangs rgyas ma yin kyang // btags pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// 'di la
242a3(rnying rgyud): dgag srub ci yang med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma dros mchod kyil me 'bar ba// mthong nas gsal ba chu yis ni// bskal par de la gnod mi nus// de bzhin ma rig ye shes kyis// thog mtha' rtsa ba mchod na// myang 'das yon tan mi 'byung phyir// 'khor ba zil gyis
242a4(rnying rgyud): ci la na na// bya khyung rgyal po rlabs chen gyis// rin chen nam mkhar thon pa'i tshe// kye mtsho nyid kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur// de bzhin bla ma'i gdams ngag gis// rang byung snying po rtogs tsam gyis// sdug bsngal nyid kyang bde chen 'chang// tshig dang yi ges mtshon pa rnams// ming du btags
242a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos kun nor// 'khrul rkyen dpe yis bstan pa'i phyir// dpe don dbye ba shin tu gces// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ mtshon pa'i dpe don ma yin par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la
242a6(rnying rgyud): kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// don gyi dbyeb bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas pas kyang sems can gnyan// sems can dus nas martogs na// drag lnga rang grol ci la 'od// mnyam bzhag pas kyang rjes thob ga ces// rjes thob lta bar ma shes na// thun mtshams bsgom pas
242a7(rnying rgyud): sangs mi rtse// lus la brten nas rtogs pa yi// dus bzhi'i gdams ngag ma shes na// ye shes 'bral med ci la 'char// da yang sems dpa' chen po nyon// skye shi gnyis kyi bar dor ni// lung bstan rkyen gyi gdams ngag zhu// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bar dor ni// chos
242b1(rnying rgyud): gnas lags rtogs par bya// yul sems gnyis kyi bar dor ni// rgya mig la sgrib bca par \u0f7f// 'anyam bdag rjes thob ba dang ni// n+ya n+ta ga ye shes blang bar bya// srid bdag gi bar dong ni// sangs rgyas rgyal pa yo shas su// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la// @
242b2(rnying rgyud): 'a togs 'ang par phags// dayang 'dus pa'i ma na// danags pas ni dzin drug// ma gang nas ldan pa pad// sreg rtogs pa bteg bathos// gakho dag lung ban ma// thang snga gnyis pa 'byod bye bcang// rta chad gnyis pa
242b3(rnying rgyud): khyen gnyis pa kyi mngag ga/ bcang nga 'dzin pa yin pang dang sa// sang sa rgyas sems ldan gcigag t+yas// mtha ris ngan srong dran du song // 'khor bcos nyid dang ga/ rtags snong skyes shing ting 'dzin gas la// g.yeng brtson pa rkyen rgyas// phyog med pa ga yang rtsal// @
242b4(rnying rgyud): gas dang rtags med pa gnas// de la chos nyid mngon pa'i ba// bar shAng bya gyis mi tshugs ltang// rang sems snang pa'i ye shes ni// pa gyi ma pa'i chos skul// 'khor ba'i rnam tog gzung 'dzin med// wang drug rlung ngag gan skyes sa pa / nal 'byor dang sems sa
242b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma// mngal gyi zhib galags mtha' kyang // rang thung ye shes drags la gnas// khwa b+hags gan zil garnon ltang // chos sra sems la ngos yin pas// thag brgyad dgal ni zil gyis gnon// de byed 'khor ba ming yang med// mang thug mngal durdza la rdzogs ltar// lung ma
242b6(rnying rgyud): gangams ga na ma thag/ ti gnyis thas thugs pa da// gapa mang grangs sa rgyas na/ migs su pa// shu ldan 'as gra gsarnas ma nyi pa ma gyu// mi shes ngan pa 'dung ba gyung// dang rjes sa mi gyur la /
243a1(rnying rgyud): wang bstan// bar dungs pa 'dan rtags pas// dga'i shes pa 'di nyid la// ngas dan tsas slar gas la nyid// dus gsum ma 'gyung yin sa gas pa// dalab sa pazanang bton// rang shin sa tu mas thas pas// brjod du med pa pa rnas pas//

245b1(rnying rgyud): tshig la khyad yod don la med// dbyar gre yog don la gol// yog man cha nga yi gtam// ji snyed brjod pas nga mi rnyed// snang ba lha ru 'dod pa'i phyir// mtshan ma rags phyi nga mi rtogs// rdzogs pa zan po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klongs yangs kyi chud las/
245b2(rnying rgyud): phyi rgyud rnam gsum gyi 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das ma rig chos sku la// yul sems snang stong dbyer med 'dod// rtog tshogs bzang darda ltar gyur bskor//
245b3(rnying rgyud): bzang ngan 'byung phyir ma hA 'khrul// de yang blo gros dam pas nyon// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// skye med mkha' klong stong pa las// snang ba kun bzang rol par 'dod// gnyis med bde chen sras su bsgom// rtsol bas bsgom phyir a ru 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka'i/

246a1(rnying rgyud): sems su byas// bskams kyang yul la 'gyur med phyir// ji bzhin ma nor don dang bral// da yang rnga rje sems dpa' nyon// dpyad dums nam ma byas par// ston dus su ru 'dra ba bzhin// rang sems don nyid martogs par

247a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ thaH spyod pa'i las byas na// 'bras ba sdug bsal na 'gyur// zami shes pas brnangs pa bzhin// ngagag stong pa ma bslang nas// gzhan gyi chos la spang ba 'debs// ma ta ba'i dmyal bar ste// 'thung ma
247a2(rnying rgyud): shes nas 'pho ba bzhin// yid kyi spyod pa ma bsrung na// bdag du rtog pas gzung 'dzin skyes// khyi ma mun pa'i dmyal bar kye// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgyas med ngo mi shes pa bzhin// las kyi go rim ma shesar// gsang sngags mdzad stod
247a3(rnying rgyud): nyams pa yin// mthu dang byin drangs med par 'byar// mig med lam mi mthong ba bzhin// phyag gya ye shes ma gsalan// ye shes lha yi don rtags med// mchog gi dngos grub thos mi 'gyur// khru med tshuni mi grol bzhin// bdag da nga gzhan gyi don gyi phyir//
247a4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur na// gnas ma 'byongs shing bgegs su ste// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbang dang dam tshig la sogs pa// nyams par byed pa'i gang zad de// skyes bu ri lag pa bzung bsdum tsam// skad cig gcig la dmyal bar lung //
247a5(rnying rgyud): yi sdug bsngal brjod mi langs// de las 'jigs shing thar 'dod kyang // rang sems snying po ma rtogs par// ma hA yog man chad kyis// bskang bshags gzhung ngu byas gyur kyang // lta ba nyams pa bskang ba med// rdzogs pa chen po lta b.rI yang snying / nam mkhar
247a6(rnying rgyud): slong langs kyi rgyud las/ lha spyod nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' phul ba// rnam sa na lus dang mtha' bar// sangs rgyas yon tan 'thung mi srid// mtshan dang da
247a7(rnying rgyud): byed stobs dang ni// mi 'jigs tshos ni bco brgyad kyang // da ltar mi 'thung lus kyis bsgris// khyang chen snying dag gog nas kyang // ma ba cag par du 'drar mi shes// de bzhin sems togs rnal 'byor bas// lul 'dis che ba yon tad rnaMbs// de yang 'jur
247b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i spang pa nyin// klad lung thab dpon skyes 'dabs// nga ma drang ngan byed ma la// ma yo dngos grub thob 'dod pas// thun mod sman gyi b+h+yos yA// barbad lan pas rgyun thog dang // 'ams lus gsos bzag ces so// jug mtshan la sogasu na/
247b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur// bya bzhin 'phur 'byung nas kyang // rmi lam mngon shes phra mo 'ong // lha dang bgegs la dam par 'dzin// rang sems ma rtogs 'khor ba'i phyir// lus 'di phyi rol yul yin pas// gnas skabs 'bral med yod mod kyang // thabs sbyor mi
247b3(rnying rgyud): grol shin tu 'ching // de bas blo gros dam pa nyon// sems can lus dang ma thal bar// sangs rgyas yon tan tsaM las 'byung // lus bcas 'bras bu thob 'dod pa// shin tu gti mug smad pa'i gnas// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// bcom ldan 'das
247b4(rnying rgyud): kyang rtswa mchog tu// rang lus bor nas bar do la// 'og min gnas su mngon sangs rgyas// sems can kun la spros ci dgos// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkhanga' klong yangs kyi rgyud pas// lus dang mthal bar sangs mi bya bar bstan pa'i
247b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ma rtogs par dong 'khyams pa ni// thog mar 'khrul pa'i gzhi gnas kyis// 'dod chags gnyid dang 'jig tshogs rnams// sngar gyi lce ba blangs
247b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rtags// de phyir gzhiganas bag chags yin// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// ma rtogs tshe 'phos par do ni// sprin dang ling tog mun pa yis// chu ngur mig ni sgrib pa bzhin// ma rig ngo bo nyid sku bsgribs// mig phyung long ba'i bag chags bzhin// de tshe sngon
247b7(rnying rgyud): gyi gnas dran ste// gos dang gnyen 'dun dran pa 'byung // lus kyi mig bral 'joms nas sdug/ dper na 'dab chags mkhar 'gro yang // 'dod pa'i dbang gi snyis 'dzin bzhin// dbang po spya tshang 'phro ba'i phyir// ma rig dbang gis rkyen 'gyur 'drag/ 1
248a1(rnying rgyud): naba'i zhes rab mig ra tu// rdzas ga na pa skad kyag/ dul tsamam pan dan mad 'tham// bar du gnas sadan tan med// gzugags thad dgang yan pa// char sags sdug par nyan mang pa// thag stsol bal la/
248a2(rnying rgyud): sogs sa// dbang med grags kyis mngal du 'jug// lta ba'i shes rab mig zad rnyed// da yang 'das pa'i snying pa nyon// mngag bag chags rnam gnyis kyis// mi gas bzhin du skye ba'i gnas// rnam pa kyang drang las kyis rtse// mthong man nam
248a3(rnying rgyud): lag ma dbang mang/ chags pas pa lta ba n+tu/ namam na ma rnad pas/ srid pa par da'i gzugs brtan pa drug pan// denas 'das pa'i cog starnams pa// gan cin sems sbyiN+Dal pa sa/
248a4(rnying rgyud): sa mtshams bka' stsal pa// dpar na mun pa'i lhag rdzab // rad+ya ga san bajug pa yang // rtsis 'byung mjig tan gyis bzung // rten ma sa brgyud rim gyis kyi// mang rdzobab pa'i skyes pa ni// 'thab bzang mas 'azlas pabadan// 'jag rten bzu d+hA
248a5(rnying rgyud): myangs pa// zhan pa'i dbang gis sems la 'tsha // dbarnyan nu ba tshang na pa lan pas// dmyal gyis rnaMs mdza bzhin// brtsam pa'i rdzas su tan kyang sabs// rkyerga na 'theng thad pa med// dayang 'dus pa'i sno ma nan// dang po mas kyi na sa na/
248a6(rnying rgyud): de// rtswa tsun ngan bas bskyed pas na// min pa'i chos la ying 'angan pas// nyen mongs thams cad bskyed par byed// khams gsus 'bar ba'i mngon med// bar ma bag chags kun ga zhing// snga ma'i dzes su 'thang kyang cing// rang 'i nas can pa/

249a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ / yang mi rnyed pas// tha ma la 'di las btsal miH// gzugs grangs zab ma mo rnyed bzhin// drag la spangs pa'i ma rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// de nyid rtogs na rdzas su min// dper na zangs lcags la sogs la/
249a2(rnying rgyud): gser 'gyur rtsi yis thebs pa bzhin// rang gi sems kyi dug wa la// man ngag rtsi yis thebs pas rtogs// drug la sngags btab dpe bzhin du// dug ma bsal bar sman 'gyur bzhin// dgag bsrub med pa'i don gyis na// dug lnga ye shes ngo bor shar//
249a3(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin chen rnyed pa'i mis// 'jig rten so nam mi dgos bzhin// ma bsgoms sems kyi don rtogs nas// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i dus thabs
249a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// rang byung ye shes chen po yis// yin min dbye ba ngas bshad kyi// yid kyis nyon la legs par zung // ye shes ma yin rang byung de// sems can kun la yod mod kyang // ma
249a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs phyi na ye shes min// long bamig mkhan la rnyed 'dra// rang byung med pa'i ye shes de// gnas 'gyur ye shes lngar 'dod pa// rkyen gyis 'gyur gyir rang byung min// ra ga nag ser du 'dzin pa 'dra// ye shes rang byung ma yin pa// yid gnyis kun gzhi glo bur rkyen//
249a6(rnying rgyud): yid 'khrul phyir na gnyis ka min// ri bong rA yi kha dog 'dra// rang byung ye shes yin lugs ni// shes rab lhag mthong las byung ba// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung de// lung ldan rkyen gyis rtogs pa'i phyir// rang byung ye shes 'dzom pa ni// mar gyi yang thun
249a7(rnying rgyud): lta bur gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ reng byung gi ye shes kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun ring rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// phung ldan bla ma'i
249b1(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag gis// rang sems stong ba chos su ni// bstan na de ma thag tu shes// ma bstan par du shes mi sbed// nga yang 'dus pa'i snying ba nyon// rang rig ye shes 'od po che// 'gro 'ang med par 'khor ba brlag/ ma rig log pas ye zhes byed// 'a
249b2(rnying rgyud): b.ru bzlog mya ngan 'das// ye shes ma bsgoms lhun gyis grub// don dang mthun par nyam myong skye/ bsgom kyang de nyid ye shes skye// de phyir rtog parabatu gces// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ tha ma 'khor ba rang brlag tu bstan pa'i leng+ka ste/ nyi shu
249b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// yid kyi dran pas 'di skad gsol// nges pa'i don mthun gdams ngag gis// ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog gang // snang ba chos dbyings ji ltar lags// rang sems chos sku rdzi ltad ldad//
249b4(rnying rgyud): 'bral med mthun 'jug ji ltar spyad// gsang ba rnam bzhi'i gnang bkag gang // bsgom med la ni ji ltar bzla// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// nga yi chos nyid gnas lugs ni// sems can med pa'i gong rol du//
249b5(rnying rgyud): bag chags ma bsags lus ma blangs// sangs rgyas med pa'i sngon rol du// rtogs pa ma bzhag byang ma chub// 'khor 'das ma rig kun gyi gzhi// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dngos med sems kyi snying po ni// 'dus ma byas pa'i gnyug ma la// bzang
249b6(rnying rgyud): ngan rnam rtog gting nas med// rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po yin// ma rig med pa'i rang 'byung ni// mi srid phung po ga la skye// lus med chos su 'gyur med de// rang 'byung sangs rgyas yang dag yod// tha snyad ming bsang snga'i phyir// yod cing rtag par sgo ma 'dogs//
249b7(rnying rgyud): nga pa nyid pasang lnga'i phyir// ngal med par slar ma 'debs// 'azung bzhi ma 'brel rig pa la// sgrib byed med par rang gsal 'di// dus gsum gcig pa shes pa'i rgyun// mabyung ma skyes de lha nyid// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rang byung stsal skye 'chi me
250a1(rnying rgyud): #/ de kyir 'khong bad grangs mar// don ma rtogs pa'i sangs byas med// dkyang mngan 'das mamyong // rang gas lang nyid kun gyims// dayang 'dus pa'i blong bzh-in// dngos pa mdang sa nas mkhru' 'dra // mi 'gyu sa pas don 'dra// nga
250a2(rnying rgyud): med pas ma dang 'dra// don ma yin phyir dpe 'di bstan// ngo bo nyid kyi lha mchog ni// dngos po mtha' bral nyon mongs ldog/ stong pa'i mtha' bra ngo bo nyid// gnyis ka las bzlog chos rje mra// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// mtshan nyid kyi byas 'dra ba med/ rgyal
250a3(rnying rgyud): po gdung chang bu bzhin du// kha dog 'di 'dra mtshon mi nus// gdod nas dpe med chos kyi su// nang du bsam pa'i yid med de// nam mkha' lcag kyis byug pa bzhin// rig tshor rnam pa cir yang snang // dran pa nyid ni ye shes klob// yul gyi snang zag 'di nyid la/
250a4(rnying rgyud): nyi ma shar nas mun med ltar// da lha'i rang sems chos kyi sku// de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin// rang sems ye shes byang chub sems// bder gshegs snying po chos smras khyab/
250a5(rnying rgyud): yenas don dang mi 'bral ba'i// lung stan rkyen gyis rang sems rtog// nor bu rin chen 'od bzhin du// ye shes dag pa 'char nung med// 'khor ba dag gi mtshan nyid kyang // min pa tsam gyis mi spangs par// yang dang / don du mi bya'i phyir// dgag bsgrub med
250a6(rnying rgyud): patsam du bzhag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kun kyang // yin pa tsam gyis mi blang bar// sems can gdul gyir ma gtogs par// ched du mi bsgrub btang snyoms bzhag/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang spring / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rig pa ma
250a7(rnying rgyud): bslang ngo bo nyid kyi sku bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// spang ba'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa// rnam bzhi 'i phye la bar snang nang // gsum bral ldang du chos kyi dbyings// gcig las tha dad dngos 'dzin pas// 1
250b1(rnying rgyud): ma zer dang 'char dgas bzhin// dgag bsgrub med phyir chos kyid byings// da yang 'dus pa'i snying ba Sh+TAn// dred ma gdas thags chud par// zed pa zlog gta sa mdun bzhin// rdul dang gal sa ma chod par// Nabasgom don med pa
250b2(rnying rgyud): 'khyams// 'khrul pa las ni yul med kyang // 'byung ba chen po lnga nyid la// rang sems rig pa'i don med par// rang byung yin phyir ye shes min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gser dang ser po'i tshul bzhin du// byis pa tha dad zhen rtog
250b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa yod// de phyir yul 'di spang mi dgos// gyi yi 'byung bar sems sdud pas// zer mdzod snying po ma mthong bzhin// gnyis med sdang stong khas mi len// yul la rtsod phyir don mi rtogs// bden pa mthong ba'i dge slong ni/
250b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang longs spyod mi skud bzhin// gzhi la snang ba med pa'i phyir// yul 'di sems su blos mi sdud// me dang du ba'i tshul bzhin du// snang ba 'di la rang rgyud du// rang sems yul du 'khrul pa yis// bdag tu rtog pa'i zhen pa zlog/ kun du rgya
250b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i skyel ma bzhin// mthar thug 'brel ba med pa yis// ze dang gcig tu mi bsam pas// snang ba 'di la don mi bzhag/ nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na khyung chen mkha' lding la// chu klung gye na thur nyams ming // bar sdang khams
250b6(rnying rgyud): kun lam d+ha bde// dmigs pa'i sa phyogs lud kyis phyin// de bzhin snang ba ma bcos pas// hrI tshogs mdun na snang bzhin du// snad tsam nyid nas wang sdud med// zhon med rnal 'byor spyod yul la// 'khrul pa'i rtog pas gzhi mi 'gyur/
250b7(rnying rgyud): btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// nyi ma stu bu'i chos kyi sgra// tshig mi'i rtse ni ma 'gags pas// zhwa sngags pa'i nyi 'dra// ji gcig phyir dag ga srub med// de byer chos kyi dkyings zhes bya// rdzogs
251a1(rnying rgyud): pa chen po lba ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' mang yangs kyi rgyud las/ snang ba ma bcas chos kyi dbyings bstan pa'i lewa b+ha ti shu rtsa gnyis pa la// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal ba yang
251a2(rnying rgyud): chos srang sprod bka' stsal pa// nam smin lus dang bcas pa yis// tha ma la kun gzhi gzhi cha la// swa gyi rang bral chos spagasal// chu dngas rtog med dpe bzhin no// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag zab mo chos su ni// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med//
251a3(rnying rgyud): / nam tog mtshan ma gzhi nas med// nyon mongs ngar 'dzin rnams dang bral// 'phel 'grib skyon rnams dang gis med// de yi dang la gnas thabs ni// swa phyi gzhil med shes pas// sems can dus na chos kyi lnga// yid kyi yul du ma bsgoms kyang // /
251a4(rnying rgyud): nyung rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang gi thig le'i don ldan// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo tshad du// rim gyis bsgoms par ngas bshad kyis// gzhan du ma yengs yid la zung // tha ma rnal 'byor sgom pa pos// sde phyi med pa'i gnyug ma la/
251a5(rnying rgyud): ma 'gros ma bying rang lugs tsam// de la rgyun du ma yangs bsgom// chags sdang dbang gis 'phro gyur na// don dam dgag bsrub med pa'i phyir// rang byung snying po rang shar bas// ba mod nyi shar ji bzhin no// gti mug dbang gis bying ba ni// rang sems shes pa gzengs
251a6(rnying rgyud): bstod la// phyi rol yul la mi spyang bang // dbang po spyod bya lan du gzhug/ 'theng gi rnal 'byung skam pa pos// chos spyan ma mkhang la bral// de bzhin pa yi ye shes de// brjod med rgyun mi chad par sa// gal te byung tshong rtag chad rnams// nam rtog ye shes bsul
251a7(rnying rgyud): mang shes// mel shing bstan bzhi nas// de tsam nyid rnas bsgom pa gsal// rno lnga shes pa tshugs gyur na// thams gsum pa kres pa'i don dran pas// chos nyid ye shes gling dbyung // bras nang rin can gtar dang dra// dbang po rab kyi 'dzum pa la/ ta

251b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'bral rdzogs pa yin/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rang sems chos srur ngo sprod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// 'bral med spyod pa bka' stsal pa/

251b5(rnying rgyud): gsal thebs nas// ldog ka sad ka'i dus dag tu// de tshe chos sku'i don dran na// rin chen ga 'ur bcug pa 'dra// gshog rno rdul med tsha grang snyoms// mi 'dzub chu yi nya bzhin du// rmi lam 'brel thabs med par 'byung // tshogs drug
251b6(rnying rgyud): 'gags kyang chos skur gnas// de yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// 'chi kra bar do'i don dran na// gnad gcod sdig bsngal ci byang yang // 'jigs pa brgal 'dod mi bzhin du// tshad du dran pa shin du gces// nai ba ta yi mig gnyis 'dra// ca drod yod
251b7(rnying rgyud): la srog dang bral// rtsa med drod bcas bkrag ma nyams// chos kyi sku ni dran pa'i rtags// na tsha byung na smos ci dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbang po 'bring gi rnal 'byor pas// gzhi shes mngon du ma gyur pas// lus su zhugs kyang don dran
252a1(rnying rgyud): / gas pa su shA man nas sa sa da ga ma pa // me du dad nas
