252a7(rnying rgyud): srung bum thag stong bsgoms pa'i// bsod rnams de'i char mi yod// de byer dkar po'i chos spyod kyi// nyan bshad bkri ba dang 'dzin pa dang // mchod gtor la sogs gang byed kyang // sngon du 'gro ba mas byed kyi// tha mangs gsum sangs rgyas dpal//
252b1(rnying rgyud): a slar zhugs thams cad kyi// 'bral med yang ma lha chags dang // man dug rgyad don dang ngag lha// rtsal med 'bras bu' chos dang na// don ldan nal 'thor mkha' 'tshal// lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas// sra da mchod dga' gtung nga
252b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'jig rten sdod nang nga // bdud rtsi'i cha mchog ting zab gyur// de steng 'bru mo phyag papas// gser gyis gzhi chen por gyur// metog sna tshogs gtor bas na// 'dza' khring kyi ba phrag brgyar bsam// rin chen sna lnga brda rabs ni// rin chen ri brtan ma brtse
252b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// snying po rnam lnga blugs pa yis// mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs thob 'gyur// sman lnga 'bru lnga blugs pa yis// nad dang mu ge'i bskal pa thar// ltabs byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// mgron bzhir rim pas sgo mi dgos// de yang 'dul pa'i snying po
252b4(rnying rgyud): nyon// bsngo ba med pa'i bsngo ba ni// bla med mya ngan 'das pas na// 'jig tshogs dmyal ba yan chad du// bla med mchod sbyin 'di bsngos pas// sems can bsam pa 'grub gyur nas// lhun grubs la gnas par shog/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha
252b5(rnying rgyud): slong yangs kyi rgyud las/ phyi'i mchod gtor btang ba'i le'u b+he nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// nang gi mdzad spyod tshogs chen ni// phrin las rnam pa bzhi yi chos// don ldan dbang bslang byed
252b6(rnying rgyud): la sogs// tshogs mchod rim pa gang byed kyang // yid 'byed pa yi gnas dag tu// dmatshig sel med 'khor tshegs bcas// dkyil 'khor mthal gzhung bzhin du// ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa'i phyir// dga' ldan lha yi longs spyod dang /
252b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor ldan ma mo longs spyod dang // dgongs ldan 'brung gyi longs spyod rnams// yid dang dngas srabasags bsams la// snron du 'gro ba'i las byas te// gnas khang byin gyis brlangs pa dang // ting 'dzin zhal zas sring spyod nas// de'i chen /
253a1(rnying rgyud): bar bsgo ba dang // thugs dam bskul dang tshar bcad nas// gsang ba'i lha mos mtshams bcad de// rnal 'gyur nangs bshags byas nas ni// dkyil kha dang skyed dang dbang bsrung dang // don rtogs byin gyis brlab mi dgos//
253a2(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs sngags dang yig 'bras brlab// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yid kyis mdun gyi nam mkha' la// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // tha med khrag 'thung rigs lnga'i tshogs// rig 'dzin rje btsun bra ma rnams// mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas
253a3(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs nas// ci 'byor pa yi tshogs drangs nas// de nas rnal 'byor dad ldan gyis// snang ba gzugs kyi mchod pa dang // sgrogs pa sgra yi mchod pa dang // thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// ye shes lha la rdzogs par mchod// lhag ma rol la lha bshags dang
253a4(rnying rgyud): skye she dus kyi sngon lam btab// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' rten// de ltar tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs me'i// stong gsum sangs rgyas sar shes kyang // grong yul gnas la chags mi bya// ci spyong rgyal ba'i mdzad spyod kyang // 'ad 'jog yang thogs dbang mi gtang// rnam
253a5(rnying rgyud): sprin lus dang ma bral kyang // sems la chos su shin tu gusal// nyin dang mtshan mod dbye ru med// ci spyod rang byung ye shes la// ma chags dang du blang ba med// rtog pa skyon du 'bor du med// dka' thung tshul gyis bsdam pa med// gang yang blo yi rten med kyang //
253a6(rnying rgyud): 'on kyang mgo drang ba'i phyir// re zhig tsam du dkar chos spyod// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gsang ljags kyi tshogs 'bul ba'i le'u ste nye shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa mi 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal
253a7(rnying rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// srog ni rnam pa gnyis su 'das// mdog thar pa gang spyod pa// da yi bye breg ngas bshad nyon// thar ba mya ngan 'das pa chos// sems gsang lha nyams rang srog gcod// nyon mongs dbang du gyur bas na// 'dus
253b1(rnying rgyud): rdzas chas kyis ma bzung // de la rjes pas dab // dug tug par brtson no// mdog gnag na yon pa // lus can ma gnob cad ma 'gyur// ngan pabyung nas rang canananaHsa// nag mtha ba ma ga dun// dang /
253b2(rnying rgyud): sems can srog 'di la// lus 'di gnas skabs 'bral yod kyi// lus can srog ni bcad ma bya// gal te zhe sdang srog gcad na// rang sems ma rtog tha mal te// skyabs 'gro nyams mying dmyal bar ltung // skye bo bdun 'gyur sdig pa che// nga yang blo gas dam
253b3(rnying rgyud): panyon// nam mkha' me yis mi chog bzhin// de bzhin don rtogs rnal 'byor pas// skyob dpon su dgra la sogs pa// bskal ba'i zhing bcu bsgral gyur kyang // sgrib par mi 'gyur tshogs su 'gyur// ngo bo nyid kyi skur dran na// ma rig srog ni bzad pa'i phyir//
253b4(rnying rgyud): gi nang na dam pa'i mchog/ de dang mi 'bral mngon sangs rgyas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gzhan gyi mi dang mi ma yin// rgyud bzung nor ni dngos po'i rdzas// gsang sngags sgor zhugs rnal 'byor pas// rgya ba'i sems kyis blang mi bya// de phyir bdag nyid rdzas la
253b5(rnying rgyud): yang // ma byin blang sems dran na ni// yi dwags gnas su skye 'gyur gsungs// gzhan gyi rdzas la smos ci dgos// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// rgya mtsho sgyogs kyis mi 'gri ba ltar// don rtogs rnal 'byor gdang ldan pas// ser snas bcing pa'i rdzas rnams
253b6(rnying rgyud): ni// g.yo sgyu'i thabs kyis nor blangs la// bla ma dkon mchog rdzogs su 'bul// tha ma nges pa'i lung ldan gyis// de la gsang ba'i sgra lnga byin// de khyer ma byin blangs na grol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// gnas skabs 'brel pa'i lus yong
253b7(rnying rgyud): // 'chab baba' bag dgas pa phyir// yang rnams/ pa mkhyed pa byarangs// zas 'dzid med pan me gyur// khyis pas / thang ma
254a1(rnying rgyud): / d+hu// dbang rdo rje sems dpa' nyan// lus la po ma yod pa'i byer// sems can las kyi chags spya // 'khor ba'i 'bras thum stan na// nan pa na bad ba zugs paH// dbying sa byams dran// ya na
254a2(rnying rgyud): chos sku rang yin pas// de la skyon gyis mi gos phyir// thabs dang ltabs zin par bya// da yang blo gros dam pa nyon// bdag nyid ma yin gzhan dag la// chags sems tsam yang mi byal// dam chog sdom pasrung ba dang // rgyal rigs mo dang bslang
254a3(rnying rgyud): srung dang // bdag po can gyi bud med ni// rtsa ba yan lag ma tshig gi/ nyams par byed pa'i gzhi yin d+hir// ro myags ngu 'bod dmyal bar ltung // bag chags zhen pa'i rgyu yin pas// blta bsam zin rtag tu spang // zhen med chos su'i skye
254a4(rnying rgyud): par bshad// de phyir 'khor spangs rab tu gces// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'jig rten 'khor ba rdzun gyi chos// yod med skyon la dam par blta// ma rig 'khrul par the tshom med// mi bden rdzun par shin tu smra// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// 'du
254a5(rnying rgyud): shes bsgyur nas rang 'dod kyis// mi chos bla ba'i rdzun sogs zlos// rang sems bcos phyi don dang 'gal// de bzhin gyi rmod dmyal bar ltung // de yang rang sems rtogs pa'i don// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gnyis kas 'bras bu me
254a6(rnying rgyud): na// drig lnga rang grol rgyal ba'i thugs// rtogs la drang po ma bcos pa// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod de go bas// g.yo rgyu med pa dam pa'i don// de ltar rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkhad klong yangs kyi rgyud
254a7(rnying rgyud): las// gsang ba'i spyod pa bstan pa be'u sten shuH bdun pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po mes// ma sgoms 'brib med bka' stsal pa// sems nyid bsgom du med pa'i dpe// nam mkha' bsgom du sems dang bral// de bzhin sems kyi mas/
254b1(rnying rgyud): bArnamahA// rjes nyid spyad pa'i yul las 'das// sems kyigazhi shes bsgom mdags// don gnyis chog tu 'byung bar byed// nAg la ngan med zar ba 'bral// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun du 'bral me chos kyi sra// nyams kyang med pa nyam
254b2(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog/ ci yang yid la mi byed na// gol dang sgrub pa dag pa 'gyur// bsgom pa'i mchog tu de gsungs so// rnal 'byor spyod lam thams cad du// lta ba'i dmatshig chen po ni// mnor mi bcis dmachog gis// gr-i de las mi 'ad ngas/
254b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba rnams bye thugs dam yin// phyi med don la sems zhugs pa'i// nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor de// de las mi 'da' dmachog ni// rang rig chos spya dam pa'i mchog/ brjed pa med pa'i dmachog yin// bsung du med pa'i ngang du bajam// de nyid
254b4(rnying rgyud): dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// khyod lam rnam bzhi gang byed kyang // 'ching bar mi 'gyur grol bar nges// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// snying po chos su dang gas pa don// ma bsgoms 'bral med ye shes myong // rang sems shes pade tshogs pa// re shes
254b5(rnying rgyud): sa ni gzhan med pa// rngam pa rang sems chos nyid ni// de yang mi 'gyur rngab ston// ngag dang mdag gzhi gcig phyir// dus dang khyod lam thams cad du// gnyid dang bang dor bsgom pa ni// de ltar zhal le snang ba rnams// ma rtogs par du 'khrul pa ste/
254b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs na de nyid chos sku yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thig le ma btsal ldan gyis grub// ye nas rang byung chos spu ni// yul nyid sems su mi bsgoms phyir// sgom pa po yang med par 'gyur// gang gis gang la bsams shing bsgom// de
254b7(rnying rgyud): gyir gnas lugs bsgom du med// ma rtog thabs kyis ci zhig bya// dbang po rab kyis btsal du med// za ma la mi rtog gdams ngag med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba yang snying // nam mkha' gleng yangs kyi rgyud las/ bsgom du med par la
255a1(rnying rgyud): gzhil b+hi n+teb+h+yaHbrgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' bas// dang nan 'a byo pa ldan don du// bad/ mdz+wal// bde pang yid kyis 'di snang dpapa//
255a2(rnying rgyud): shes bdab rten thub dang // sdug bsngal ji byed rkyen thu dang // btang snyoms lhag mthong rten thub dang / slong rjes rkyen zung dang / rang grol rkyen blang dang / pas bshad dad
255a3(rnying rgyud): skad zhus pa 'dan gas nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka stsal pa// bde ba nang rnaMs phyir bstan pa// ga su 'dang ste// gang gang dag med bde ba dan// chos la bdag med da ba dang // 'dig rten meg po'i bdeng yin// de
255a4(rnying rgyud): na// yo ma lus kyi de ba dang // rang sems rtogs pa'i bde ba dang // thab sa zin 'brang gi bde // thabs med 'dod tshigadang // de yang 'dusanyon// kyi yongs/ dbarteb pa// zas nor dason po yongs spyod dang // 'dod
255a5(rnying rgyud): lnga la ci bder spyod// zhen pa'i dbang gis chog shes med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' rton// nang gzhi gnas bde ba ni/ gag bdag med 'gags pa ru// ma grol byin gyi gtams ngag gis// rdo lnga mi 'gag rang gsal lnga// yid lA lhag mthong
255a6(rnying rgyud): bzung // rkyen thab 'bral med ye shes yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po po na// chos la bdag / med bde ba ni// dbu ma sems tsam/ sgom pa ste// der mgol ba'i gdams ngag ni// bden gnyis sems su khrom bsdu// rig pas mi gdig rangs pa/
255a7(rnying rgyud): yul med shes par byung shes// yengs pa mi 'thung byed thub rnams// de phying 'bral med ye shes yid// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'jig rten mig yo'i bde ba ni// bsam gtan gsum sogs bde bde// zhen pa yid phyir 'khor ba'i rtsa// der mi go
255b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdams ngag ni// lung ldan gyen gyi gdams ngag rgyun// shan gyi dngos 'an la zlos phyir// bde bzhin med rkyen thub pa'i// yid ches gdeng gis zin pa'i phyir// 'gal rkyen mi 'byung chos srung gsal// de yang nan sems dpa' nyan//
255b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin longs spyod yul la zhen// der mgol ba'i gdams ngag ni/ yul rig par du bdag gzhan gyi// ngar 'dzin pa den 'dzin dam par ni// snang bar zhen pa med pa'i phyir// phyi yi longs pa'i rkyen rnams thub// de phyir snang batsho kyid byings// rdzogs
255b3(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i yang zhing / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bde la zhen med ye shes su chen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun reg ston pa chos rje yis// sdig bsngal ni bye dang ka' stsal pa// sem
255b4(rnying rgyud): can kun la gnas pa yi// phyi yi sdug bsngal zhi gyur pa'i// lus kyi sdug bsngal nad yin te// bzhi brgya rtsa gcig 'du ba bzhi// mi bde spu tshogs bskyed par byed// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nang gi sdug bsngal bdag gzhan la// byams bral snga
255b5(rnying rgyud): 'phrad dogs pa dang // yod skyong med tshol zhen pa kun// phyi yi sdug bsngal yin par gsungs// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rang lus na tsha bzod dka' ste// rkyen dbang mi gol gdams ngag ni// gang na blo yis ma bzung bar// bzod dka'
255b6(rnying rgyud): rang reg chos skur shes// sna phyi ma btang da lha yi// bde sdug bdag kyang chos skur gsal// sdug bsngal rang zhi ye shes 'char// yi chadakhe bzhi'i rkyen rnams thub// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gyi yi sdug bsngal rnam bzhi la// zhen pa rang gyud mi
255b7(rnying rgyud): galangab// yul sems par de'i gdams dag ni// nges den rngan pas rkyen mi tshugs// sdug bsngal yi shes dang tre shar// rnam rtog mi byung myo kyi hU~M// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyen// de dag sdug bsngal phyin ri gnyis// rtsab ma ga thos byas te// lung
256a1(rnying rgyud): / ldan gyen gyis ma rig 'jal// ye shes rang rig chos spar nas// sdug bsgral bya ba'i ming yang med// dadu 'thung rtogs bas mang na sangs rgya// rdzogs gcan sa lta 'i yang byung / nam 'a yangs kyi da las
256a2(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal zhi byed chos su rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste su bcu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// ma rika las byung btang snyoms la// lhag mthong rig pas bka' stsal pa// ba na sa madran pa
256a3(rnying rgyud): mas ni// zhi gnas ma rig gti mug ste// gang la blo yang ma zhugs pas// dge sdig gnyis sa lung ma bstan// de las bad tsam cha gra las/ lung ma bstan pa nam gsu' byung // 'de sdug myed pa'i chur ni gsungs// de nga ngadus
256a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin lung ma bstan du ni// mi gol ba yi gdams dag ni// thog mar rang byung ngo shes nas// marig med kyi des lung bstan// de phyir rang rig chos kyu rtogs// btang snyoms lhag mthong rig par sher// kun gzhi dag kyi rkyen byed pas// 'gyur med pa
256a5(rnying rgyud): shes chos kyi su// dpang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// btang snyoms lhag mdze dang byung de// shes pa gsal la ma rtog pa// chos su mig yo don ces 'di// de phyin lung ldan chos su gsal// gsal tsam nyid ma tub phyir// rang byung dag
256a6(rnying rgyud): med// da yong 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges pa'i lung bstan gdams ngag gis// dge sdig ma dran chos srur dran// de phyir lhag mthong rig pa la// thig le nyag gcig de la bya// rang byung snying po yul las 'das// sems kyi khyod yul ma yin gyir//
256a7(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas tshig la bsgom mi dgos// nor bu rin chen rnyed dang 'dra// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// tha mal shes pa btang snyolas 'di// kun bzang rgyal po'i dpe/ nges par shes// de tshe yul sems gnyis las 'das// rang byung chos su ji ltar gsol// de
256b1(rnying rgyud): la 'gal ba'i skyon mi 'byung // 'dus mabyas nAnam mkha' 'dra// rdzogs pa rtson po sgru pa pa yang skad/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ btang snyoms lhag mthong rigapas chen thub par bstan pa'i ma'un/ sa gcig pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa
256b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// rmi lam sbyong thim bka' stsol ba// rnal 'byor dam pa gnyid byung ngo // mi la ma dge sdig lung ma bstan// bag chags mtshams r-i lhas bstan pa'i// rmel ma sna tshogs 'dra ngus la/
256b3(rnying rgyud): klong zim shes par bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshe stod sngar byas gang rmis pa// bag chags rmi lam yin shes pas// de rje sa mi gcod don dran rtser// bag chags mi lam rang stong nas// ye shes klong thim rkyen bu'i tshe// 'di la ma
256b4(rnying rgyud): med mchod// gang dris pa yi mtshams sbyor bas// bgalA ti la du shes pa'i phyir// kun brtags med pa'i lhag mthong gis// mtshams myong rang 'i rkyed rnams nub// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'jig rten lhas byas lung bstan pa'i//
256b5(rnying rgyud): lam babrang ngan gang thung yang // bsru ba'i badrud du shes pa'i phyir// dam par gtud med gang bzhag pa// bsdu med rkyen thub chos srur gsal// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyan// rnal 'byor dam pa gnyid yog kyi// dge slog lung ma bsnyen par/
256b6(rnying rgyud): gang dmigs gang yang ma bsam par// chos nyid dang la gnas par bya// gang yang t+te ga pa ma zhugs na// bze ngan zhen pa dang zhi ste// ye shes grong thim rten rnams thub// de phyir res don gdams ngag che// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang gling / nam
256b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' glong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gnyid ye shes klong thim du rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i dad ldan la// kun reg ston pa chos rje yis// dug sde rang grol bka' stsal ba// nyi shar mun sleb med pa bzhin// wa
257a1(rnying rgyud): snyan ma ba dag / rabadog pacos su gas // ma / sa ga gsas// 'dus du nan// rnam su du / rnab rgya da dan mya ngan
257a2(rnying rgyud): bsal ba'i byer// zhe sdang rang grol rkyen rnams thub// rmi lam 'dod chags 'tshal med bzhin// snga phyir ma song dus de ru// pho mo 'dod chags ce spyod kyang // de tsam nyid na skyon mgos// da mang rdo rje sems dang 'anyon// ring chen po'i khar gyin nyad//
257a3(rnying rgyud): rnal chen po'i rtog pa 'chang // lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes kyis// dargyal rangs rten nu bkrol// lta ba mnor gde dge 'brang // gol sgrib rnyed pa chos su la// drag dog rang sa rkyen rngub phyir// bamol ni ti shwar 'dra// da yang 'dus
257a4(rnying rgyud): ngas don shes pas gti mug 'joms// rang rig dran pas zhe sdang brlag/ bde ba zhen med 'dod chags bral// yid ches 'dzin med nga rgyal grol// chos su dran pas phrag dog dang // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// don gyi ngo bo gnas lugs la/
257a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi skyon med pas// dug lnga kun brtags rang sa thol// de phyir chos su snyid por gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud pas/ dug lnga dang grol rkyen rngub bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//
257a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// par dor rkyen thub bka' stsal pa// des don rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus kyi tha ma byung ba'i tshe// skad ba kyi dang mched pa dang // snang ba 'gyur zhing thob pa'i dus// lung ldan nges pa'i
257a7(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag gis// bar dor skye ba mi len pa'o// rkyen rngub 'bras bu sangs kyis 'byung // de yang 'dus pa ji snying po nyon// snang ba 'gyur zhing spang ba dus// par dor lus gsum mi len pa'o// nges don gdams ngag don dran pas// gzhi gnas
257b1(rnying rgyud): marig med pa 'byir// gyen bzhis ma bskyed lus ma 'ad// shes pa chos su 'gyur med brtan// mngon shes drug dang rjes dran drug/ sangs rgyas sa ma yon tan kun// rdzogs pa med par dus gcig dogang // de d+hir rkyen thubs zin pas/
257b2(rnying rgyud): sangs la ye shes rgyas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang // sangs rgyas yon tan kun rdzogs phyir// 'gro don gzugs su dus gcig 'byung // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de chob shes snang ba las// ngag chags bral bas chags
257b3(rnying rgyud): snang ba med pas zhen pa grol// reg pa gsal ba chos sur shes// lus can gang yang med pa'i phyir// pho mo ma mthong mang la mi 'jug/ de phyir skyes mi len des// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas ni// rnam dag
257b4(rnying rgyud): gcig gcig la// nges don 'bras bu logs na med// drang don sangs rgyas grangs mang yang // mthar drug chos sku yin pa'i phyir// bsrub pa bas kyang rtogs pa gces// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkhang slong yangs kyi rgyud las/ srid pa
257b5(rnying rgyud): bar mdo la skye ba phyi ma mi len par bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// // de nas kun rig tul po la// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// the tshom gegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// gdams ngag rnam dbye ji ltar// 'khrul pa 'og
257b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags chen gang // theg le'i la shan ji ltar dgyi// nges par the tshom ji ltar bsal// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// lte sbom spyod pa 'bras bu yaM// dbye rnam pa drug rngub l-I// dbyeb
257b7(rnying rgyud): legs par nyon// lta ba'i ngo bo shes rab ste// mos pa'i gro se gang bzung ba// dbye ba dang gnas ngo bo ni// stong par khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra// nges tshig chos spar lta ba yin// go las mngag rtag chad gnyis// skyon ni yul sems pas da
258a1(rnying rgyud): / nga yang 'dus pa'i snying pa nyon// rnam pa'i ngo bo ma rtogs pa// dbye ba mthun pa 'bral med // tAl gyi mang medud med 'dra// ngas cho ga dbang po ma byedas pa// gangs khyed dang gyad pang// byas rgananas ban na
258a2(rnying rgyud): byed// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// spyod pa'i tshul ni ma bcos te// dbyer rig gsang mthun pa'i thabs// chom med thang chen d+har 'drag/ 'dra// des tshig shugs 'byung blung dor med// golas rang rgyud nyon mongs spyod// skyon na chos ba#
258a3(rnying rgyud): lazhen// nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'bras drangs pa'i gdeng dzin pos// dbyen gnas skabs mthar thug 'grub// rin chen tshun gyi yon tan 'dra// nges tshig bsdu med dang yid rjes// go las 'bad pa don med 'khyams// gyis 'thung dadags pa/
258a4(rnying rgyud): yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag dbye ba tha dad kyang // ma rig rmongs pa bstan pa la// ngo bo dang byung nyid 'di las// gzhan du g.yos pa rdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen po'i d+ha'i di yang snying / nam mkha' slotra yang byin las/ gabams dpa
258a5(rnying rgyud): dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u hi so wa pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' pa// 8 ga rtanas 'dun ngas bshad kyis// legs par zung la yid nyin// chos rnams kun zhig zhi shes pa // 'khor 'ad
258a6(rnying rgyud): bur 'khrul par shes// ri ngogs med pa gzhi shes rtags// mtha' drug rkyen bzhi 'dzin med pas// yid ces gded kyi don zin nas// lhan cig ma rig log pa'i rtags// thog ma'i rang byung ngo shes pas// dus gsum gcig tu shes pa'i byar
258a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i dus las log pa'i rtags// yul ni ma nges sna tshogs kyang // chos brgyad zhen pa med pa'i phyir// sun brtags pa reg log pa'i rtag du// phag pa rang du shes tsam na// sbrul du 'dzin pa rang sar grong // dpe las don du log pa'i rtags
258b1(rnying rgyud): don pa mi napas/ nam drame pa drangs dbral// 'bral badzang sa rab pa nags/ ma dag sred kyir 'barnapa sa thal/ thang dadaganyim sngags ngan drad pas// sngagapas 'dug pa ba nga dang / nas sa dang
258b2(rnying rgyud): ngas// bden gyi ba dang don byed// kye shA'i spab sa la log pa tags// zhes ngag dang sems rnying ba'o// blobrang ma yin gnas byas// shes dri ga dus pasum sde 'bur phyir// chad pa'i 'khrul pa lag pa gas// ngazung
258b3(rnying rgyud): / dngas po bral las 'das pade// sha ga nga sems snang blos/ bdag byibs medag sa/ rtag par 'dzin pa la phyogags// de yang 'byor gyi spyir hon// ga rten 'drul pa de dag dang / ga dang ga
258b4(rnying rgyud): ba// nam langs ldan pa med pa bzhin// de nyid rtogs pas 'khrul pa sangs// rdzogs pa chen po yang snying // nam mA khasha klong yangs kyi kud las/ 'khor bar 'khrul pa la~Mg pa'i tAg ste bstan pa'i le'u skyes drug pa //
258b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos dka' stsal po// mang 'das 'khril pa log pa dang / NiH/ mu ga sems tha dad ming dra bar// oM nas gzhug ma'i gzhi shes pas// 'grongan nyid rdzo na na// nyan thos ngo
258b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba sems su mi sdud cing // dod dpa skad cig mi 'dod pas// / sel 'grib med pa'i don rtogs na// sems cas 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// bden pa gnyis su mi ti/ zeng // yang dag stong pa mi 'dod pa ye shes
258b7(rnying rgyud): bral pa phog pa'i chags// yul med sems su mi 'dod cing // sngags dang yig na du yang mi skyed// radags dngos grub mi tshol bas// sde rog cwaya pag ga tadas// bded pa 'dod cing // ting
259a1(rnying rgyud): ram gyis mo bsgom pas/ rtsol ba med pa don rtogs pas// mthang du sprul pa log pa'o rtags// mkha' klong rol par ma dzar na cang // bdun na rnam sa// dang langs ma dgas dang chags pa
259a2(rnying rgyud): a nur 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// de rtags brgyad ldan skyes bu ni// mi yi lus la sangs rgyas sras// rig 'dzin gdung 'tsho ba sprul pa'i sgra// de yi yon tan brjod mi langs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i nang snying / nam mkha' slod yangs kyi cad las
259a3(rnying rgyud): theg pa 'og ma pa'i 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig stan pas bka' stsal pa// phyi nang ma bcos mya ngan 'das// myang 'das don ni chos kyi // chos kyi dmings na chos snga
259a4(rnying rgyud): dod// snying po 'bras bu ye shes su// snying po kun la khyab cing 'dras// thugs kyi nyingad khu yin pa'i phyir// thig le 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// kun 'a'ang rdo rje la rkyen gyis brlabs// tshig tu ma bkod thugs la bsrung / don gyi gting TI bstan pa'i phyir/
259a5(rnying rgyud): tshig nyung don la rdzogs pa yis// thig le la shan dbye ba ni// mtshan nyid btags pa'i thig le dang // gsang sngags gzhi yi thig le dang // rdzogs chen spyi yo thig le dang // yang ti thig le nyag gcig dang // re re la 'ang bzhi // dbang par
259a6(rnying rgyud): gtan tshegs kyis// 'bros la shan dbye ba yang // rtsal gyi sgo nas gsum bstan pa// snang ba chos kyi dbyings las rdzogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// btags pa ming gi thib le ni// mtshan nyid rdeg pa rnam gsum ste// dpa ma shes
259a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyad la// de pa ni dbus long g.yu rdo 'dra// gtan tshegs nges pa gang yin pa// bug ni tshogs brgyad sems su gcig/ le ni khams gsum yongs la khyab// 'gro sa srid pa'i yang rtse yin// go las skye mched bzhi lags// gzhi yi thig le
259b1(rnying rgyud): // gsang sdugs byung rnam pa gdun// yog gas 'dapags pa/ dnganas dang 'as // ga rtags sasag ston// / nan gnasu sa/ gdug 'ongs pa ga// 'das dus da yang dadag dang /
259b2(rnying rgyud): thig le bstan pa ni// gas rkyen ma da spem gzung // ra bdun pa 'i lung ma bstan// dpam ga pa ma 'dra// gtan tshogs nges pa gang yin pa// cig kun gtsu gzhug ma lta// ldan thams cad sems sa dang // 'gros ga 'tho sa pa med// des ba
259b3(rnying rgyud): par snying po nyon// de ltar thig le bzhi bstan pa// theg pa kan gyi sgo bstan phyir// shan gyi sgo nas bstan pa yin// don la dbyer med nga bdag nig/ rdzogs pa chen po lta 'i yang snying / nam mkhar klong yangs kyi hud las/ thig pa shadan zla
259b4(rnying rgyud): ma gyis bskyed pa/ denas 'dus pa lab rnams la// 'du rig sems kyi rtsal ba yas// labasgrubs pag la ga sangs// na rig pa nas smras// pa na pag gtan rgyabs kyis/ de kya
259b5(rnying rgyud): dgas ma / /
259b6(rnying rgyud): 'gros thig le phye ma'i rtsal// gzhi sa thig leb bzlan// ngo bo rang gi mthu dang bral// dben drag nyid sbyin gyi dang // gtan tshogs nges pa gang yin pa// thig ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bya// li ni 'gro drug yongs la chu ba// ye shes bran gyi rtsal du // ya
259b7(rnying rgyud): chen la bzan// nga bo sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa// dper na nor bu rin chen ladra// gtan tshigs nges pa gang yin pa// thig ni mnar drang po'i lam// le ni brdal ba chen po'i dang // 'gros thig le gyi ma'i rtsal// yang ti tshogs chen la bstan// yang me da
260a1(rnying rgyud): rang byung zhing // ngo bo thig le nyag gcig nyid// dpa ni nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// gtan tshogs nges pa ga yin/ thig ni bag chags skyon dang bral// lang+ge nyan mongs rnam par dag/ ngablo ma kun b.rang sangs kyis nyid// de yang
260a2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rkye nang med par theg le la// la dor 'das med par rtag gcig ma// snang stong med par bral zad// thams ca pag med srungs rgyas pas// steng 'og mthu 'ad bus med pa dang // byinang 'ator dung med pa / @#
260a3(rnying rgyud): le chen po las// gzhan gyi chos ni rdul tsam med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nga yi sku gsung thugasA la tshang // ye sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin las// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' las 'das// gzhan man chos sto byings kyi yang // rdzogs ni
260a4(rnying rgyud): ma med par rdzogs// 'khor ni dus gsum rgyal bar ldan// thams cad kun tu bzang po'is// skad cig rtogs pas mngon sangs kyis// rtogs thabs bzhi ni brnyed par zad// de ltas rte du 'byed pa ni// jig le ma yin 'tshal tshig yin// rdzogs
260a5(rnying rgyud): pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ thig le nyag gcig la la bzla ba'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor lo bka' stsal pa// bung lnga ya bcu bdun gyi gegs// rim par
260a6(rnying rgyud): bshad kyi yid kyis nyon// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhir gyur pas// rtag chad ma yin chos lur nges// snang ba nges med yin pa'i phyir// yul dang gol sa bcad pa gces// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang sems yul dang yul nyid sems// gnyis ka/
260a7(rnying rgyud): ma yin gnyis med min// tha da ma yin mi bsdu bar// zhon med dngasar grol ba'i phyir// snang ba ma btsas ches kyi dbyings// rtogs dang martogs khyad par gyis// sangs rgyas sems can rnam pa gnyis// sa sar ma yin gcig pa ste// gnas skangs 'bra ba ched
260b1(rnying rgyud): 'ang byug sod// las dang thugs ngo ba dang rtsol// gdams dag mod la pan mo sa// de yang 'khor sa ston// pa yang das 'byung ba rtag pa yin// gzugs pa gsu ba dang nga // ngag tad kyig 'a'ad// lugs ngan 'a rgya sa
260b2(rnying rgyud): nyams su blang thabs kyis// bsgom du yod med gnyis ka 'gal// yod par blo btags rtag par 'gyur// med par sbyang btab chad par 'gyur// dpyir nges don snying po ni// ma bsgoms bral med dgongs la gces// zung rdzi la 'dzi labya// da yang 'dus pa'i nyi
260b3(rnying rgyud): nyod// mnor nges pa'i lung chen ni// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis kyig zhi// nga bo nyid kyi kun pa dugs// mig yang ngan gyi rtogs shang bas// dan tan tshig tu 'byung bar byeng // nges pa yin lung du bzhadade// kun pa' dang mi byin rlabs kyis// rdugs nas sen du
260b4(rnying rgyud): gsung btung ba// tshig med nga rten rtags pa'i phyir// cog la brten nas don gongs// zam slob dpon khyad par rtse// de yang 'dus pa'o// bzhin// nyams myong yang med gnyis ka skyon// gang yang ni 'gal gdams ngag gi/ don gsal yul pa ma
260b5(rnying rgyud): yengs pa// nyams myong dam par nga mi bshad// dam rtag rnga ma la rdzo blang pa// btsas na thul pa'i zhiganas min// ma bac+doMs br-ikar la dgas med kying// bcas med rgyan pa thos phrang dgasal// mang chud nges don gang yang dzug// drung ba'i'adod la cad rje nga // ga
260b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i rabs la dang // nges pa 'don pa khyad par med// de yang 'kho gyi snying pa nyid// des don chos snang nga nyid la// yid med dag la ba med na meng // yod krung martogs sems can la// lung 'a chen gyi garnams dag s+ho// dekyir mngang rtsi 'brel ba yod//
260b7(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid 'khrul lugs blos bcos pas// ma rig 'khrul dong bden 'dzin kyang // yang ldan mar 'khrul gzhi la med/ dpyir 'khrul med dan 'di gces// bdud kyi gegs ni de la bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag 'ag ya gegs rnam mang yang // blo yis byas pa
261a1(rnying rgyud): thamasasadasas// bti dus 'ad ma khams grags pasam na/ sa / dasangs kyi lha pa gnas 'ag drang da/ nanas
261a2(rnying rgyud): la po la// 'dus pa'i dakhor byes 'di ga s+ho ga// trin le gcig du 'dus pa nyis// byed rlos rnaMms d+d+he sur rdzogs// galus skye pa 'i ltar med// nyamang shigs don dran gyi nga 'bru'o// munyan pa'i kyi'i pos bshad du gsal// de da dus pa da
261a3(rnying rgyud): gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// thig le gcig du rdzogs pa yi// rang sems snying po byar chub des// snying rje zla med don zin pas// sems babyed gong 'og de la rdzogs// dad pa sngon du dran byas pas// mi dmigs don lam bltas kyang /
261a4(rnying rgyud): nga rgod gnyis kyi rkyen bral bas// zhi gnas bsam gtan de la rdzogs// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// sgyu ma lta dung rab shes pas// rang bzhin med pa'i lhag matong rdzogs// 'jig rten grol bar don togs pas// sa
261a5(rnying rgyud): lnga 'dzin pa'i don med kyod// ren med pa'i bsam pa yis// sbyin pa de pha sal phyin pa rdzogs// mnor khrims las mi 'di'i phyir// / lus ngagra yid kyi las rnams kun// sti dge nyes byas mi 'byung bas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// zab la
261a6(rnying rgyud): che'i lta sa seMn yin pa 'i rnams 'ur// chos kyi datheng 'adz+ra kar shong bas// bzod par mkhol phyin pa sogs// ngo ny-id las 'bra' med byer// ched du me btsus na nyid// wA man pa yongs med pa ste// brtson 'grus pa 'phyin 'dzag
261a7(rnying rgyud): gzhi gang mahA/ r+the dpong // 'i de ldan tu rgyu ma da/ da las ma gsos pas// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// dad pal par bgyid gcod pa// sa rigapa rmongs byer/ kyis gdang gos thag cod pas
261b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de phyir yul gyi rnam pa la// stong spyad zhen pa med pa'i phyir// snang ba gang yang mi 'gog pas// thabs kyi pha rol gyin pa rdzogs// tshor rabs ston nas spangs par phyir// mi gnas/
261b2(rnying rgyud): zla med don rtogs pas// de lta nyid du rang yid ches// smon lam pha rol rkyen pa rdzogs// rang sems snying po rtogs pa'i phyir// ma rig sgrib pa zil gnon par// lus dag rtsol pa mi dgos pas// stobs kyi pha rol gyin pa rdzogs// 'khor rangs gnyi
261b3(rnying rgyud): med gong rol du// skye shi med par bag tshad de// byang chub sems la 'gyur med pas// ye shes pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// lta ba rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lus ngag don las ma nyams pas// rtsi na pyod pa'i dod zin nyid// tshogs chen ma lus de la rdzogs//
261b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po sbya 'i yang tha~Md/ nam mkhar mod yangs kyi nyung las/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams rdzogs par brtan pa'i phe snyen gcin pa na// @/ de nas dus ma tshogs rnams la// kun da rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// lam
261b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor don ldan gyis// yi dbang snying po sems nyid dod// chos nyid rig pa'i dbang thob pas// phyi nang dbang rnams de la rdzogs// lta ba nges pa'i gdeng zin pas// mi chog ye shes gegs bsal bas// rnam par rtog pa'i bgegs med phyir// phyi nang mtshams bcad de
261b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzegs// ye nas ngo ba nyid su las// bslang du med pa'i chos nyid la// ma rig rnam rtog sleb pa med// don gyi bshags pa de la gas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med phyir// yul dang dbang po mi 'byed pa// gnyis med rjen gyi klong chud pas// byin chen
261b7(rnying rgyud): dbab pa de ladzags// rang bring le shes na babyed // drug grang grol dan rtags pas// rton mangs badrud kyi chen po la// ni zhes rkyen rangs de 'dzegs// dbang po yul gyi rnam pa la// dngos po byung rba ba de// sa rgya mi chung dran rtsa ngas// dang
262a1(rnying rgyud): su // ga dang rab du gzhugs pa / dang sa dang du
262a2(rnying rgyud): pas// ma btsal ldan gyis grub pa las// ye shes lha rnams de la rdzogs// nga ba nyid kyi snying po la// sangs kyis sems can lha gcig pas// rgyud du byung med dang rig gler// sun drangs bsgrim pa del rdzogs// bzhi pa snang ba med pa'i gyur// rang ga dran rta
262a3(rnying rgyud): cir spang yang // spro med chos yid ci 'dung shas// drim gyis gnon pa de 'dzags// thams cad 'dres pa byed po lnga// rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i phyir// rig pa'i don 'drigs la dbyas pas// nan tan phyag tu de la rdzogs// dus dag par gyi rnam pa pa/
262a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'od kyis zin pa'i phyir// bskal bstod thams cad ye shes la// phyag rgya'i mchod pa de la rdzogs// ye shes snying po drung chung la// tha dang dngos po gcig pa'i phyir// sems dang chos su'i don 'byor bas// spyir grol mchod pa de la thogs// yengs pan-i
262a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dran gobs// na med par thag bcad phyir// yon tan thams cad ldan thub pas// mdzar byin smon lam de la rdzogs// sangs rgyab che ba'i yon tan rnams// da la nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir// yug srang thugs kyi don tshang bas// sa ba
262a6(rnying rgyud): spel rdzogs// dga' ldan lha dang 'byor ldan tshogs// nges pa'i stabs gdeng zin pa// snod bcud yenas tshogs yin byer// rdzogs kyi mchod pa de la rdzogs// bu tu 'khor bzang dang gi 'bred pa// da lhag meng ro/ cig/ 'di ran mang
262a7(rnying rgyud): sems la// lhag pa'i mchod pa de la jogang // bya ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mi bzung ye shes chen po la// rang gi reg pa byas la thebs pas// rga tang ma ma mdzad pa de la rdzogs// 'khorab kya ngan 'das pa chas// jig le gcig tu 'dus par gyur/
262b1(rnying rgyud): rang gi lus tshig la// dkyil 'khor bcu pa de la rdzogs// gtogs rnal 'byar chen po la// ye shes tshon brjong gi lus// ye shes kun grub ga sman pas// bka' nan lus bsrud de la thogs// yenas sangs rgyas yin par don// rang gi sems kyis shes
262b2(rnying rgyud): phyir// gnyis med don du sangs rgyas pas// dge ba gro ba de la rdzogs// chos kyi skub mnga' brnyes pas// tanathams cad rang las spel// gzhan don bya ba smos ci dgos// ye nas ldan grub de la rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam
262b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ drin las mdzod spod rdzogs pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das ma rig rdzogs chen la// po la spri med pa na pa yang // @#
262b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dgra yis don bstan pa// yid la ma bsdus go las med// de ya rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phyi ros yu kyi tha skad la// dam par zhen pa'i rtog pa yis// nyung tshor nges su ma 'brangs pas// 'jig rten phal ba'i sa 'i rgol/
262b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyi snying po 'di// dran rtog glo yi rnam pa yis// yod med yul du ma bsgoms pas// rtag chad mthang na dam gro la// lung rigs man ngag la brten nas// thos bsnam lte bas yid ches pas// shes rabazas mo'i don zin pas// lung du yang stan
262b6(rnying rgyud): grol// mdamigs pa la sgrogatad cing // go nam bkris bsal ba gyis// zhi gnas rol mkhyen pas// sems 'dzin pasam gtan sar mgol// phyi rol yul rje snang ba la// rang gi sems dang ma 'grol byed// rdo rje'i rnam shes mo dgang pa
262b7(rnying rgyud): shes med par de mi gol// dang byung rang snang 'di nyid la// sems kyi rtsol ba'i gnyen po yis// nam tog ma spangs rang de bas// nyan thos 'gog par de mgol// phyi rol rten 'brel bcu gnyis la// brten nas sems kyi nu pa yis// rtog
263a1(rnying rgyud): canabargol bas// rang rgyal sems su dpagal// yul med sangs su thos bsdus pas// don dam rang gi shes pa don// rang rig skad cig pa sgom pas// sems tsam lta bar du ma gol// yul 'di kun pa bras sus te/ ga
263a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs dag gis gzhag byas nas// mtshan ma stong bur me sgom pas// dbum gnyis su grol// ri dgas pas kyirtsol ba yis// dge ba ba du 'i snying po la// rdzu 'bras byen pa mi ltos par// 'dus byas gyis su ngagol// pa sa mas kho nga ti
263a3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i rkyen gyis mi 'gyur phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis la mi dpyod pas// las kyi dbang du de mi go pa// sod srung sems kyi rtog pa la// skyon yon gnyis su mi blta ning // mi tog dben pa'i yul med pas// za ba'i bam du de'i gol// ston 'angs gnyis la
263a4(rnying rgyud): brtad cing // tshogs gsags dam par mi ltangs// lam langs kyis mthung sa gyir// sang rje ba grod par ngo man pa// rdzogs can par ngas / nam mkha' slong ya d+hU las/ bsamag tan tu grongs me par ban skye ga
263a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal po des// 'dus pa'i 'khor la yang gsungs pa// chos nyid dag pa'i ngang las ni// rigs gsum dkyil 'khor ltar ma bskyed// dag gzhi'i ting 'dzin mi bsgom pas// kri ya'i theg par de mi go pa// ltab yo gar blta ba
263a6(rnying rgyud): dang // spyod pa kri yang spyod pa dang // rnam gnyis 'dzin par mi bsgom pas// u pa yang ni de mgo la// chos nyid dbyings kyi ye shes kyi// cho 'phrul lha yid rgyal rtsis// byang chu rnam tha mi bsgoms pas// yo ga'i sems dpar de mi go pa// phung po khams dang lde mche
263a7(rnying rgyud): // rtog thogs dgra rnams mang po yim// nam rtog sbyar dri mde sbyang ngas// ma hA mo gang de legs// las kyi phyag rgya gzhir bzhag nas// rtsa dang thig la bde nga yi// chags ces 'dzin pa ma bsgoms pas// chags pa'i lam du de mi go la// kun gni
263b1(rnying rgyud): dag gas shA ma dang // da ma na tam pa dag pa la// 'du 'thas sri nga dag med med pas// mthum ga ngamags// nga'adu das gtas ngam pas// sa dang ldan pa chos nams du/ sas mtshan dum dasus pas//
263b2(rnying rgyud): gyen du de mo gol// nal 'byung spyod pa rnam gsum gyis// zhum pa med pa'i sems nyid kyis// brtul zhugs phye nang mi dgos pas// de dogs spyod par de mi gol// snang ba dang gi thos byas pade// bral sems bsre 'i lta ba me/ med da pa
263b3(rnying rgyud): sa// phyogs can lta bar de mgos// rang sems snying po chos kyi sra// lta btogs pa'i don nyid las// de las bzhan du martsol bas// gol sring du ba'i ming med do// rdzogs pa ched po lta ngang nyid/ nam mkha' gling yangs kyi ltung pas/ gsang grag
263b4(rnying rgyud): go las med par bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tsho gas rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// srib pa dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dri ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis// ye shes chen por ngos 'dzin pas// skas
263b5(rnying rgyud): 'byed / ba pa de la med// dran pa zhag zhi sa rang gsal la// sa kyir rjes sum 'brengs pas// ra sems chos blangs zin pas// bsrung pa'i smos pa de la med// bu brtags mngag rkye byas pas// 'bral ba dag ga su ma rngubs de// pa
263b6(rnying rgyud): dngos med pas// phyogs spang sgrib pa de la med// kun bzang nyid kyi bkar nyid las// dra ma'i gdags drag margyad cing// sgrub nges pa'i gdang zhen pas// tshogs kyi sgrib pa de la med// de grus dbang dang drag po dang // sam te mi dgongs pa yis// den med/
263b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i do rtogs pas// 'aso grib pa de la medo// 'khor 'das ma sa ngam zin pas// me sgoms don dang po phrul byer// bachags migs stongs ldan pas// mdzad pa'i slob bde la med// rang rigartags pa nyan pa pa ni// sangs /
264a1(rnying rgyud): Ta/ dang mthun pa'i phyir// nges pa 'don la yid ches pas// com sgrib pa de la bad// de la rogs pa 'gro ba slob rnams// brgya dang brgyad du grangs mang yang // srong snang zhen pa gsum du dus/ de las gnan du rdzun na ga
264a2(rnying rgyud): pa chen po lta ba'i yang snyid/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ ma rig rtsol ba'i sgrib pa med par bstan pa'i le'u rtse'i lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams ma// kun reg rgyal pos yang gang dus pa// yang dag sems ti
264a3(rnying rgyud): nas chos su 'bral med phyir// nyams kyi rim pa lnga gsungs pa// dang po mkhang la nyi shar bzhin// ma rig sgrib pa med rtogs pas// rang rig chos srur yod ches don// tshig mthis ma reg rang gsan nyams// gse nga ltan ci yis rdegs pa bzhin// rkokra dang
264a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad du// lha ba sems kyi sems ted dgasal// rang rgyud zil gyis gnon pa'i nyams// skyes bu bya ba btang ba bzhin// spang ba'i gzugs sogs gang la yang // brta/ dpyad mA thas sgo sngags la// snga ngabachog nyid dang / de ldan nyams// 'byung ba rnam
264a5(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur ltar// yul gyi bde sdug sgra skad kyis// gnod med chos su mi ladu phyir// phongs pa dang sar grol ba'i nyams// rin men gleng du phyin pa bzhin// dus dang rnam ge thams cad du// ci dran lhag mthod rig par 'gyur // 'thung 'dug med phyir 'bral med nyams
264a6(rnying rgyud): de dag lnga ldan sangs rgyas nyid// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sprin las chad rkun 'bab pa bzhin// rang tud zhen med chags pa chung // gcig blar dga' la 'du 'dzi spong // g.yo ba las su rung ba'i rtags// 'bab chud la drag sboms pa bzhin// dang nga
264a7(rnying rgyud): shugs kyis ye shes gsal// 'khor ba'i chos la shin tu sgo// goms pa'i rtags chen yin par bshad// rgya mtsho'i gting ni mi g.yo ltar// 'khor 'das dngos po cir ma mthong // de phyir nyon mongs yul med pas// brtan lathob pa'i rtags su bstan// drang
264b1(rnying rgyud): bzod ldan dpe bzhin du// lus kyis bzod pa thob pa dang // gnyid kyi rtog pa choms pa'i phyir// gyi nang dbugs kyi rma snyoms pas// lag rten chos brgyad dpral ba rnams// bar dong mngon sangs rgya ba'i rtags// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong
264b2(rnying rgyud): yangs kyi rgyud las/ nyams dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// // de nus rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi don gyi phyir// yid la dran pas 'di skad gsol// 'bras bu yon tan gdul bya yi// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams pa ga
264b3(rnying rgyud): gis bskang // ca ba gcig pa'i bden pa gang // snang med reg pa'i rtogs dus nam// rtogs pa'i mdzod khrod ji ltar spyod// kun rig rdul pos lung bstan gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// lta ba nyams parko
264b4(rnying rgyud): thabs ni// nyes 'gyod yid la byas nas su// bla ma mkhas pa don ldan la// dbang rnams rim par nos nas ni// rang sems dpa dang rdzog don zhus nas// chud du mi gtong gus pa'i chos// lta bas sems togs ma brjed pas// rgyun du mi 'bral sgom pa'i
264b5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rtags ni shin tu gsal ba'i nyams// brtson 'grus ma yengs gus pa'i thabs// shes rab go ba dad pa'i thabs// rang sems gdeng ni 'gyur ba med// yul ni ma 'gags chos kyi dbyings// spyod pa ma 'gags khong khril med// g.yos med
264b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gis// brtse gdung chos byed mi 'gyod pa// rig pa so thub dgon pa'i mchog/ bag chags rjes med shes rab ste// rkan du gsal 'debs chos spyod yod// the tshom mi za bslangs pa'i tshad// des bskang gdeng chen ngas bshad nyod// rang bzhin du
264b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngo bo la// ming gi tha spyad 'dzin med pas// yul la mi zhen rang sar grol// bsam gtan btsal med nyams kyi gdang // phan gnod byed pa gang 'phrad kyang // byams skang gnyis ni skyes pa'i tshe// mnyam nyid rig bas gsal thebs na// blo dngos gnyis med nyams
265a1(rnying rgyud): du/ na / du nan na// na ku / ga na /
265a2(rnying rgyud): 'dug su mad 'byo sa pa da cha da/ sa sa la na pa 'don na gas// dgas zhugs ma lan
265a3(rnying rgyud): mi gted don ldan nal 'byor pas// dngos grub btsal med thams kyi gdeng // sems la skye shi med pa'i phyir// rang ga rten gnas ni ga 'jug kyang // skye 'gag/ med pa 'don la gnas// 'bral med dgongs pa nyams kyi ga deng // rtags chen gdeng ldanan la 'byor
265a4(rnying rgyud): pas// ci spyad sangs rgyas ye shes thugs// mi lus rin chen 'di nyid la// lha mes phyag 'tshal mchod par 'gyur/ rdzogs pa chen po lte ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi spyad las/ 2ba rnams pa bsnyungs pa'i tshod bstan pa'i le'u ge zhe 'dun pa'o//
265a5(rnying rgyud): dus 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ni// kham med pa'i bub na ma da// de yang gnan nas gcig las gnyis// gsul la 'brel yod gcig la med// bden mthong snang med rtogs dus yun// de
265a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gcig ni nam mkha'i mabo ngas tshar// med ni 'byung ba rnam pa wa// sdang srid kun gyi mes por snang // byi nang snod bsud de las 'gyed// gcig ni chos kyi dbyings su tshor// ming na chos su kun tA 'bang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mos por grags//
265a7(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i chos rnams de las byung // gcig ni ma rig mun pa tshar// med ni 'gro drug sems can te// chags sdang lngal longs spyod pas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de la spen// gcig ni 'khor 'das gong du tshar// ming ni jo banyid kyi sra// 'khor 'das rabs chad
265b1(rnying rgyud): yangams pa// dgas gad nas thugs// da yang da rdzasams dpa' don// rgabastan rnams kya'ang rag pa// rdzug tumacho par mnas kyang // sams la rtags pa yod pa gyur// don can ma ga ma pa mag/ sa ba nga sams cad// 'khor das
265b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis las 'das pa'o// sgrom du med pa yid las dran// rang sems steng po rtogs pa'i thabs// de phyir sems kyis sems rtogs nas// da yang dngos por cang ma mthong // reg pa ma shes chos thaM ni// dus gsum dag tu ste 'gag med// sngar pa mthong ba
265b3(rnying rgyud): dan mthang ba// thos nus pa khonar byed// ga rig pa 'don pa tha~Mng // / bcan mar mthong pa yang da// rin rtsen ma thang pong gar byung // dem man tan mkha' la 'ad// de bzhin dang sams dan nyid// mang ma du rang sems kya shA ga // rangagasal
265b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyan mi 'chad// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yad skyed/ nam mkha' grong yangs kyi chud las/ ngas pa'i bdan pa mthong bar bstan pa'i le'u ge zhe brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'jas pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rag sems kyi rgyal po yis// snang med rig pa bkal
265b5(rnying rgyud): sbal pa// tham pa'i nang gi mar me bzhin// lus kyi nang na chos lpags la// nang nas sgo lnga'i 'od sharabs// sdang bgrogs su 'ong bskam// de tshe na ma la lus 'di la// brten pa'i rnal 'byor las can kun// snad med rig pa rgyun ma 'chad// de ti sangs rgyas de las
265b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // de sems ma bcos dang gis gsal// gsal yang yul la zhen med grol// lus kyi nang na sangs rgyas gnas// de phyir lus la slad mi bya// dper na cang shes rta pho yis// yid kyis bsam sar lus kyis byin// de bzhin gang dran chos su ragasal//
265b7(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa nub pa bya ba med// ni phyir ci spyod ye shes la// daphel 'grib med pa rang sems rtags// dodon rtogs pa'i mchog yin pas// sangs rgyas kun dang dgangs pa gcig/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyan// dper na reg 'ang ma swa zhes ni// gang
266a1(rnying rgyud): na mnananan rardzu pa/ / lanas thags lags/ na dgas pa bas// sa ca
266a2(rnying rgyud): par gsangs// de yang 'dus pa'i gang po ton// dbar nanamamatha' ldings che no// bdag gzhan kun pa me sang bzhin// rnal 'byor so thub pagayo ci// golas med cid thang zang // dper na chug ted rgya mtsho'i gser// 'phral bu ra ba zhig kyang
266a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas mgos// de btsun don togs nal 'byor pas// 'khor bar gnas kya dgos pa med// de yang 'dras pa'i snying ponon// dpar nang bras kyi mchog ra na// 'gyur ba med par brtan pa // dbyar ma thung ma bsdus byas la// babyud chos nyid ma
266a4(rnying rgyud): brtan// de la rtog pas mi gos te// da nyi dang rtogs pa'i thabs// nis na tshogs med don po za// bsam pa cam ces 'thub pa'i mchog/ de yang 'dus pa'i snang ba nyin// rang sems rtogs pa'i 'bras byal// bstan te cig par 'ang gnam na//
266a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bran la zung med// rnam 'thab sas pa'i pa sa// baN+Dal pa'i don la me gnas pas// bzlas du dag padag nyid// de na ma ba du ni ldan pas// kyang 'das zhes ni de la thA/ rdzogs pa chen po pa'i bang zhid / nam ma 'ang rlor yangs na
266a6(rnying rgyud): las/ ska ma kyi ga pa'i rtogs dus bstan pa'i le'u gri ni dgu pa// nanas 'dus/ jenathor rnamasal// kun ga rgyal gis bka' stsal la// nga mi mdzad spyad chen po ni// mA me dgazugs spar byung bas ni// thams cad pal ces gnan
266a7(rnying rgyud): byed// ma ni med rig pa gsu gas ni// sangs rgyas partson pa rgyas par thogs// 9 mi gas dregs// tshar mengs kyi thams cad patha~Md// sang ga ma 'jig rten rnams ca ni// ngaseM zugs gnas pa mas ngangag// de yang 'ja
266b1(rnying rgyud): spang bstan// spos kyang ngal bslus kya dang // ngam su gsung zhugs las na// 'khor bzla ba gad nas med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyan// ye nus gnas pa'i gzhanyad ni// chos kyi lnga la thugs su bstan// dota rtogs pa'i la shes na// rje ru
266b2(rnying rgyud): kyai sum mangs spyo bugs// dran cig don du shes pade// chos kyim+bu mi sprul ba'i thugs// ngan sa na gzugs kyi phung po dar// longs spyod dogs pa tsas kyi sa// dbang po mi gags gas pa bar// mangs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs spod pa// bkral babyen/
266b3(rnying rgyud): yan lag gang yang ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skal pa'i sku// don ldan tshig tu brjod pa de// sprul pa'i skul chos smra'i gsung // dngos med chog dwagasal bde// sprul ba'i lha mo longs spyod gsung // tshig la brten nas don gabs// sbal ba'i mu yi gsung
266b4(rnying rgyud): phyir// da lta'i chos su kha mig can// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lus bral skad cig de nyid la// bar dor mngon sangs rgya ba nyid// mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs med pa'i phyir// kun tu bzang po gud na med// gzugs med rig pa'i ye shes de// dus gsum dang
266b5(rnying rgyud): tu 'gyur med pas// rgyal ba sangs rgyas chos kyi snga// lus ni ye shes chen po'i lus// thugs ni ye shes thams cad mkhyen// gzhan don ci bsam 'grub pa yis// gzugs sku rnam gnyis shugs las 'byung // de yang rang rang 'khor rnams las// gang gis gang
266b6(rnying rgyud): la ci rigs su// sems can bsam pa'i khyad par las// yid bzhin dbang po gang 'dod ston/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi tshad las/ yon tan gyi gdul bya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu tham pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor
266b7(rnying rgyud): rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rnams dang rig 'don tshogs// mkha' 'gro chos skyong dang ldan rnams// nga yi byin gyis brlabs/ sa// rang rang rtogs pa 'dir spros zhig/ de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams
267a1(rnying rgyud): / cad skyob// bamod rgyab 'khor 'jig rin chen mang // sangs rgyas mar ma mdzad rnams kyis// ra rang dgongs pa las langs nas// kaurim bzhin du rtogs pa brjod// kye med dag pa 'di nyid la// 'gag med rig par shar bas// gsal la ga pa
267a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub rgyan// ma bsgoms gol med chos kyi sgra// nges pa'i lung dang mthun pa yi// rtog pa'i ye shes ma 'gags gsal// brjed med rig pa 'di nyid la// ngos gzung med pas rang yid ches// ma btsal rig pa byang chub sra// kun gzhi gzhi cha de nyid las// rang gas
267a3(rnying rgyud): ngo bo bde chen klod // yid ches don la 'gyur ba med// gsal dran stong pa chen po la// bying rgod zhen 'don skyon bral bas// rang du bzhag pas ci yang med// de tsam nyid na lta sbom gcig/ snang ba med pa'i ye shes 'di// mya rkyen ma byas dang sems don// yin la dang sems chos su
267a4(rnying rgyud): gsal// ma rig rtog pa gdod nas sangs// shes pa rang lugs 'di nyid la// ci yang mi bsgom da lha nyid// 'du shes ma bzung don gsal ba// ye shes zang thal nyams med rtags// dngos med lta ba shes shing rig/ rig tsam nyid nas rang gis stong // rig stong gsal ste maza' dbus med//
267a5(rnying rgyud): thalags sa/ gas du ma du/ c-i // gas ga da/ mas / rtub pa 'du dpa/ mas swA / sa
267a6(rnying rgyud): / spang sred gsal la slong ldad med// reg pa gsal ba ye shes yin// phyi rol yul gyi snang ba yis// 'khor 'das mi rtogs leb// gnyen pos mi bsgom da sa nyid// rang byung de nyid chos sgra yin// rang la gnas pa'i don rtogs pas// ma bsgoms rig pa 'di nyid pa/
267a7(rnying rgyud): nang gsal gyi la ma yengs pas// rkyen bzhes mi shigs rdo rje 'dra// dngos med sems kyi ye shes 'di// gsapa la 'dzin pa dul tsam med// 'dzin med rig pa 'di nyid la// de la ched du bsgom mi dgos// chos nyid gnas lugs zhes bya ba// bye bo rang sems yin rtogs//
267b1(rnying rgyud): na// gzhan du mi bsgom da lha'i sems// de nyid las ni pogs mi 'don// dang po'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de rtogs chos sgra 'gyur med la// ma bcos dang gsal 'dzin med pas// de las gzhan pa bsgom du med// rgyun gyi gdams ngagadon rnyed pas// tha mal lus
267b2(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa yis// rang sems snying po rtogs pa'i phyir// da lta'i chos sru kha meg can// lus kyi nang na ye shes bzhugs// da yang kun bzang nges par gson// mai tri mthu chen thob dang ni// thugs rje can dang 'jam pa'i dpal// dri ma med dang phyag na nor// dga'
267b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang po rnams kyis ni// rang dang rtogs pa'i don brjod pa// da lta'i shes pa 'di nyid las// gzud 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// de la yid ches rig pa'i rgyun// ldan gyis grub ces de la bya// 'khrul pa'i rtog pa cing snang yang // don gyi dgag bsgrub ma zhugs
267b4(rnying rgyud): na// zab cing cha gra rtogs don de// rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa yin// snga phyi zhen pa'i yul rnams la// rtog pa ma zhugs yengs med don// bsgom du med par ye nas shes// de tsam nyid na rgyun mi 'chad// dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du// nga sems rnal du
267b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa la// rgyun mi 'chad du ye shes gsal// de nyid don la 'gyur ba med// skye shi med par rang gi sems// de rtogs bsgom du rdul tsam med// de nyid reg pa byang chub sku// ma bsgoms 'bral med bde ba'i mchog/ brjod du med pa'i shes rab las// dmigs/
267b6(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// ma bsgoms ye shes da lta nyid// 'byung 'jug med pa chun du gnas// rang sems snying po 'di nyid ni// ci yang ma bcos rang rig gsal// de nyid rang rig byang chub sems// de la mi btsal don la bzhag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas
267b7(rnying rgyud): de dag gis// rang rang rtogs pa brjod pa'i phyir// de don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dgongs pa gcig phyir ye shes mthun// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang spong / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa brjod
268a1(rnying rgyud): 'a ma byu gcig tu rnas das ma rnamams dpa'an// dadad pa dgas / bzhipa dpa 'a dang du thar// nga ta sa mdapas / byags ngas pa'adadas nas
268a2(rnying rgyud): dang las kyi sems// go ris bzhin du rtogs brjod pa// thog ma'i ye shes 'di nyid ni// dmigs 'dzin med pa nga gis gsal// dgag pa med la rig pa sno/ de las mi 'da' sangs rgyas grags// rin chen 'od kyis mun pa la ltar// rang sa mas
268a3(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i don 'dil// dran pa ma yin ma rig med// gang yang ma byas pa 'gyur med don// spos thal gzug ma 'i sems 'dil// golas lta bar shes pa'i phyir/ btsal nga med de yul las 'das// bcom du med kying khengs pa yod// 'angs ma byas
268a4(rnying rgyud): 'i bshes na// sbyin med parang gi sems// zhes byo rjes sogs 'on kun byer ni rang sar grol// dbye'i rang sems 'a byed pa// 'gag pa mad pas rig pa srung // ci srud nanalasami 'dang bar// srid pa 'din pa 'byung sa mas// sanan pa la mkhyes
268a5(rnying rgyud): / rgyu na / napa/
268a6(rnying rgyud): rnags / sonags pa byud / gal ma mi smras rgyunam/ na mongs sud ci ga pa da / sa gan/
268a7(rnying rgyud): bridasas pad med // sa rgyas pa gas gas pa// bye sems kyidas pa man// dmang dus pa na// rgya sa kyis// rang sa sa pa'i ba da pa// zhas mthong thul pa pa grags // ngas gangs sa
268b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med de// mtha' dbus med par rig pa gsal// gang yang ma spangs gnas su dag/ de nyid rtogs pa chos kyi sku// dad ldan rnal 'byor bdag cag gis// chos su rang chas don rtogs pas// nges pa'i lta ba'i gdeng ldan pas// rtsol zhing grub pa'i na
268b2(rnying rgyud): dang bal// re dogs med par lam du rtogs// de skad brjod cing gsal ba'i don// thugs kyi dgongs pa bka' stsal pa// legs so dad ldan 'khor rnams nyon// shes rab blo yis khyad par 'phags// tshig tu mtshon pa sna tshogs kyang // don la dbyer med
268b3(rnying rgyud): po gcig/ gcig la rtogs tshul kun gyi dang // don la 'gyur brdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / nam mkhang klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor gyis rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u steng gnyis pa'o// / de nas dus gsum sangs rgyas
268b4(rnying rgyud): rerig pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las 'khor// dad ldan la sogs 'khor rnams kyis// rang sems rtogs pa mngon gyur nas// dga' ba'i sems kyis yid rang te// kun tu bzang la 'di skad gsol// 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas da lta nyid// rang sems pa dang drug gis phrad
268b5(rnying rgyud): de phyir chos sru lha nyid// sems dpa' rdo rje dge ba che// 'dren mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad gsol pa'i don go nas// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsungs pa// sangs rgyas thugs kyis byin brlabs pas// dgongs pa ma lus bcung ba sdus pa'i/
268b6(rnying rgyud): mnangag tshogs med zhing khu 'di// gal te spyi rabs rnal 'gror pas// don 'di 'chad cing ston srid na// dad pa rab ldan pa rtson 'grus che// dul zhing gus par bla ma 'khur// dam tshig gzhung ldan dbang rnams rdzogs// blo rno chags med bzod pa che// gta
268b7(rnying rgyud): dang len chu dmigs na/ gdung ba'i sems dang mi 'bral zhing // phyi ma byang chub don du gnyer// dka' dgu bsngos nas zhus pa'i tshe// dus gsum sangs rgyas dbang btsug la// ging chen dam med shan par bsgo// rgyal chen bzhi ni mtshams par btsugs// gzhan
269a1(rnying rgyud): rnal ma byu// ga // na sa cang // pa staH// su // sa la// /
269a2(rnying rgyud): dang/ rtagadun chom m+b+ha nas+t+wa~M// mad papa 'dang la skran pa// 'a'adu sa na sa ba gams hA/ ma da du du gcug pa/ ldan c-i cing denasapa ma gan// zag dpag 'dzizhin rnams
269a3(rnying rgyud): des du ma dang nil// can ga pa mi pasan kyang // da na man drug gnal zhel// tham ston pa sa// dag khri ma mi / 'di bral can na mang dang // mdang ma nga can rnams 'byung / dum sa langs pa ma ldan \u0f7f/
269a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnam bka' cad 'byung // de byer shin pa kyang 'dags// rgyas srung yi pa byug drug ltag khang // lha 'arnam pa'i thag dkyil // sngon lam bta nas smras la ldan/ rdzogs pa chen po da yang stong / rnam mkha' stong yangs kyi cad las// snru
269a5(rnying rgyud): gtad pa'i la gleng gsam pa'o// rdzogs pa can pa sna yang snyi rdzogs so// rdzogs pa chen pa nga / ngas rgyam mams cad kyi dus panam mapa'i grang yangs nyind ces thag/ gser bya la shing ldan 'di/ dang ba na
269a6(rnying rgyud): sras/ rgyal bkun tu bzang po la bshad/ des rdo rje sems dpa' la bshad/ des dga' ba rdo rda la bshad/ des tham ze ba de mchog kyang po// des shwA mang ha la bshad/ das bi ma ma ja la bshad/ dam grang ting 'dzin bzang po la bshad/ des gter du sbas pa/ 'gram mo
269a7(rnying rgyud): gas ma 'bu// 'am mo shes snying bas bton nas/ des myang shes rab bachog gisas/ des shang kyi smon pa kyi grang ba legs rgyal bzin sa bshad/ des tham gtan drang ba la gnang // cug dgi malen pabasal pa rjid za bya mdzubartan pa la zhes
269b1(rnying rgyud): cing gtan la phab nas/ myang ting 'dzin bzang pos/ bram ze'i rgyud drug gdams pa dang bcas pa/ bse sgom stug por bcug nas/ dbu ru gzong phug mo'i brag la mkha' 'gro mardo rje rgyan gcig ma dang / badz+ra sA d+hu legs pa rtsal la gtad nas sbas pa rdzogs so// /
269b2(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ san+ti ma hA bud+d+ha sarba sa mA d+hi/ d+har+m+ma kA ya e ka sa mu dA ya ka thA sa mya tAr+tha rat+na gu Na sa mu da ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos su gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun
269b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung gi chud ces bya ba/ dpal kun rig chos kyi sku de kho na nyid ma nor bar rtogs pa'i don dang ldan pa de la brjod med nan tan rig pa'i grong du phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa'i dus gcig na// rang byung rig pa'i ston pa de// 'og men klong ga gnas
269b4(rnying rgyud): mchog na// nyid las mi gzhan rtogs pa'i 'khor// don gcig bstan pas mngon gyur to// de tshe chos kyi snying po de// bzhengs pa med pa'i ngang las bzhengs// rang rig ye shes 'gyur med don// brjod med snying pos bka' stsal pa// rang byung ba
269b5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag 'di// 'dzin pa'i yul med mtha' las grol// blo yis ma bcos don dang ldan// rtog med mnyam nyid chos nyid don// de skad don gyi bka' stsal pa// ji bzhin sems dpas don rig nas// rang gi yid kyi rtog bsal phyir// ting 'dzin dang la
269b6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad gsol// don chen sba ba'i seng ge khyod// chos kyi sgo mo bsam yas kyang // btsal med thug med brjod du med// de don bdag la bshad par mdzod// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// mnyam pa'i don las rab bzhengs nas// brjod med don du
269b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i phyir// don gyis byin rlabs bka' stsal pa// brjod bya tshig don dgos pa yi// nyid dgos 'brel bcas don ldan pa// rgyud rnams kun la tshang ba gces// de phyir nges don bshad pa yin// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ye nas gnas pa'i ngo bo
270a1(rnying rgyud): la// yan man brtags pa'i btsamar// rta gzal shes pa dang gnas kyang // ra dgas zad pa'adan yangasas// dand danams gsungs pa dang // dadus zan byungs bams dga' nas// nga bzhin las thad dgaH/
270a2(rnying rgyud): rang sa rtogs pa mngon par nas// ban papang rig pa'i ston pa sa// bden pa dgang sa dan 'di sa dgas la// dzadapral sa 'i rtags rnam na// bram zi me thang bshes pa// nan pa zed pa'i rig pa shang// gsang gtad mad pa nga ba / gas// dang
270a3(rnying rgyud): ces ni zhus pa dang // de sa/ bsam pa thugs cad de// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// de ltar rtogs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs bca sa gsam ma lum pa'o// sangs rgyas ji snyed gang bzhugs pa// chos nyid chos skar dgongs pa gcig
270a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan na sangs rgyas rdul nom med// de skad gsungs ma thag rten// de chongs gsums ngas kyis dang // rdo rje 'chang gi dag 'dzin dang // rgal sras stsal pa'i mgon po dang // dam btags mkha' 'gro sde lnga dang // dad ldan lha mi las can trama?/
270a5(rnying rgyud): khab len la ni lcags 'du bzhin// mos gus dad pas 'dus nas ni// las dang thugs rjes 'dus nas 'khod// rdzogs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos lha gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi
270a6(rnying rgyud): spyad pas/ dpedon chad drugasungs pa'i stong gzhi' phel dang por// de nas kun dag rgyal po la// 'dus pa rje gapar kunan chadang// rdon sems dpas den lus pa// sems can ma rig bsal ba'i phyir// gdul bya'-i'i bsam pa
270a7(rnying rgyud): khyad par las// ci rigs par ni bka' ba phros la// des don snying po bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i di na gas na bka' stsal pa// ngayis zin gyis brlabs pa yis// sangs rgyas ma lus 'dar 'dus pa// su med gzugs skur mngon pazhengs la// ga
270b1(rnying rgyud): med dag pa 'dan spogs pas// rang sams snang brtags pa'i thabs// rgyas nyid gnas lugs gang yin pa// rtog mang thugs rjes bka' ba kres la// sems can don du byin gyis rdzobs// denan ces rdo gsung ba dzidon// sangs thas pa
270b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' kun gyis kyang // gang zhig zhu bar ma spobs nas// mnga' bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// phyi rabs dad ldan don ched du// nges pa'i dgongs don 'di skad gsol// dus gsum sangs kyis ma lus kun// nges don mnga' bdag khyed yin pas// rtsol
270b3(rnying rgyud): bcas chos ni mthar bton pas// rtsol med theg pa mi gsungs pa// sngon gyi thugs dam yal lam ci// ma nor chos nyid bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni zhus pa yis// sangs rgyas thub chub 'dus kun nas// rang dang dgongs pa'i don bsdur nas// bka' yi
270b4(rnying rgyud): ba mang du bgyis// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// gzhi nyid rtogs pa lam gyi mchog/ de nyid mabral mngon gyur pas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas da lta nyid// skye ba gzhan du btsal me dgos// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma nor sangs rgyas dgongs pa nyid//
270b5(rnying rgyud): nga yis nga nyid bgros pa las// sangs rgyas sems can ma lus kyi// nga yi bka' ni bgro nus med// ma gsungs rgya cher bshad pa 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgya cher ma gsungs don de ni// yul la zhen pa med pa'i phyir// shes pa rang gsal rig pa la/
270b6(rnying rgyud): yid la dran dang ma dran pa// gang gi phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir// ma bsgoms ye nas 'bral ba med// gang yang yin phyir gol sgrib med// de yi yon tan brjod mi langs// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // rdo rje sems dpas don go nas// ma rig sangs pas chos spu
270b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas// de phyir rtogs pa mngon gyur// rang bzhin lta ba ga deng ldan pas// 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas da lta 'byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos su gcig tu 'dus par bka' 'gros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ bka' bsgo

271b1(rnying rgyud): de ma shes par lung ma bstan// de las 'khrul pas 'khor bar spen// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phyi ba mu stegs rnam gnyis dang // nang pa sangs rgyas khas 'cha ba'i// nyan thos rgyud lung yan chad kyis// gzhi nyid ma shes 'khrul pa'i phyir// bsgom go/
271b2(rnying rgyud): bdud bslus par dor 'thams// de yi ldog chos shes pa dgos// 'khor 'das ma rig nges pa'i don// bka' rtags lnga yi don bsdus pa// ngad ldan 'khor la ngas bshad kyis// rang gi sems la nges par chongs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rig 'dzin
271b3(rnying rgyud): grub thob bka' rtags ni// sras la rgyal sring gtad pa bzhin// lung ldan nges pa'i gdams ngag ni// slob ma dad ldan 'ga' la gtad// rig pa byin rlabs bka' rtags ni// rin chen gser 'gyur rtsi bzhin du// tha mal shes pa 'di nyid yang // rang rig
271b4(rnying rgyud): chos slar byin gyis brlabs// nyams su sbyong ba'i bka' rtags ni// bde ba snying la zhen pa bzhin// rang rig chos spur ngo spad pas// zhen med nyams dang 'bral mi phod// la zlo spyod pa'i bka' rtags ni// mar gyis 'o ma 'thungs pa bzhin// ci spyod 'bral med
271b5(rnying rgyud): chos skur shes// gol med la zlos don mi 'bral// 'bras bu mthar phyin bka' rtags ni// nor bu rin chen rnyed pa bzhin// chos rnams chos skur gcig shes pas// 'khor stongs sangs rgyas smos ci dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bka' rtags lnga ni
271b6(rnying rgyud): gcig shes na// rang sems rtogs pas gzhi dang phrad// de phyir chos su 'bral med lam// 'bras bu 'gyur med sangs rgyas yin// de yis de nyid mtshon pa'i dpe// mdzub mo la brten zla ba mthong // gdams dag la brten lhag mthong shar// don rtogs klong nas ye shes /
271b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro// rig po chos su rnam pa gnyis// tha dad med de nye bar tshul// don la dbyer med chos kyi sra// tu rkyen ma bskyed ye nas yin// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos lha gcig tu 'dus par bka' ba kros pa'i don/ rin pa tshe yon tan kun 'thung gi rgyud las/ gdams/
272a1(rnying rgyud): @/ dag rtsab gcig tu 'dus par bstan pa'i ma sgru bzhapas// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yas// 'dus pa'i chags la phan gdags gyur// kun rag chos kyi rnal pa la// bden pa'i dgongs nan 'das
272a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// 'khor 'das gzhi ni gang gis bgyis// ma rig gzhi ni gang gis btsal// de las 'khrul pa ji ltar byung // de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ye nas gnas pa'i gzhi nyid ni// skye ba ma blangs dus na
272a3(rnying rgyud): yang // rgyu rkyen ma skyes ye yod gyur// spro sur bral dang ma bral ba'i// rtogs dang 'khrul pa gang yang med// rig dang mi rig shan ma byed// yengs dang ma yengs ngos ma zin// rang rig had de tsam yod kyang // gang gi 'du shes ma zhugs pas// bya ba btang ba'i
272a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// 'dzin med don gyi ma zin pas// rang bzhin lus su ming btags te// gzhi nas ma rig med pa'i phyir// bag chags mgos 'khrul ma myong // rtogs pas ma bzhag sangs ma rgyas// gyi yi 'byung ba ma chags phyir// rgya dang rkyen gyis 'dus ma byas//
272a5(rnying rgyud): de yang 'jus pa'i sems dpa' nyon// rang bzhin gzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// rtogs dang ma rtogs cha med phyir// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis kyi gzhi// kun la yod pas gzhi zhes bya// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' bkros pa'i don
272a6(rnying rgyud): rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ 'khor 'das kyi gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// ji ltar 'khrul tshul bka' stsal pa// dang po 'khor 'das par do la// ji zhig ltar la yengs tshul gyis// 'khrul gzhi med las
272a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa byung // med las byung ba ya mtshan che// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgyun tsam ci zhig dran pa snyam// ji zhig dran dang madran gyis// gang blo mi 'jug don mi shes// ma rig gzhi ni lung ma bstan// 'khrul gzhi med pa'i 'khrul pa de// rang bzhin lus da
272b1(rnying rgyud): gya g+ha yis// mad las yod dran yud tsam byung // de nyid rang brjed rim gyis bslabs// de nyid dus mnyam lung ma bstan// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das gzhi ni ma shes byal// 'khor baji gzhan dayan kyang // ma guHmdu dran yod pa
272b2(rnying rgyud): de ma shes pa de kho nas// ma rig k+ko lnga'i rten byed phyir// 'khor bar skye ba'i gzhi ma yin// he nub nam ni ma sros 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' ba gros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi hud
272b3(rnying rgyud): las/ 'khor ba'i gzhi shes lung ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// ji ltar 'khrul pa bka' stsal pa// 'khrul gzhi med pa'i 'khrul pa de// gong 'og drug 'jom gti mug des// mA rig bstod pas rgya
272b4(rnying rgyud): mig la ling tog byung ba bzhin// lhan cig ma rig gsum du smin// de nas ma rig spabs nang nas// pho mo ma ning ma yin pa'i// chu 'dra gzugs nyid rdzus skyes kyang // 'jig rten me dang ma rig rgyas// bla drug lon nas pho mor smin// de sbyar 'bru drug
272b5(rnying rgyud): dug lngar skyed// de la skye ba rnam bzhi yis// 'gro drug sems can tshang bar byas// 'khrul gzhi thog ma de las byung // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// med pa la ni yod 'dzin pas// 'khrul gzhi las ni 'khrul pa byung // dper na mtho yor mer
272b6(rnying rgyud): d+ha~M// mni ma min pa yin// / dri zhig gar la mthong // de bzhin ga shes zhig snar// kau rkyen gyis bskyed pa yis// sems dang ga gzigs pacu ga zhi nga// de yang 'dus para'i stong ba na// med pa la na med par rtags// 'thub pa rnam
272b7(rnying rgyud): kyis shes pa las// rgyal ba kun gyis mi ma khyen phyir// ngas don gzhi la 'khrul pa med// gle bur sems las 'khrul pa byung // zag pa sbrul du 'dzin pa bzhin// de las skyes pas 'khor bar 'khyams// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyin// deSh+Tha
273a1(rnying rgyud): / !gang na gnas par bya// 'khrul gzha yad la kun brtags gsum// byang tshul ma shas gta mug gis// de pyir thog mtha' med par gnas// de nyid ma shes pa mar ni// ngam dan med pa sngags brdzun pan// chub bzhipa /
273a2(rnying rgyud): thar pa med// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bas ma thag chad// de phyir gdeng med rtag tu la byams// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ 'khor ba'i byung tshul
273a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags phyir// kun tu bzang la 'di skad gsol// phyin ci log tu blos bskur ba'i// mu stegs rtag chad ji ltar 'khrul// phyogs tsam kha 'dzin theg
273a4(rnying rgyud): pa dku// rang gi gzhi las ji ltar 'khrul// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// mu stegs rtag pa'i 'khrul dpe ni// sman ni dug tu 'dzin pa bzhin// dbye ba drug gi don mtshon de// ngo bo mi 'gyur
273a5(rnying rgyud): gzhi byas nas// kha dog dbyibs can dag tu 'khrul// log pa'i dka' thub dmyal bar ltung // rig pas brtags pas bdag ma grub// de nyid la zlos chos su nyid// de las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mu stegs chad pa'i dbye ba ni//
273a6(rnying rgyud): kha dag dbyibs med chad gzhi byas// sna kyi rgyu 'bras med par 'khrul// spar btab dmyal ba chen por lung // chad du min te rig pa yod// de phyir gzhi la go las med// rang byung ye shes slong na gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// spre'u 'dras log par khrid kyang ni//
273a7(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid rtag chad mthar mi ltung // bcos shing bskur bas gzhi mi 'gyur// de phyir lung ldan gdams ngag gces// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos skra gcig tu 'dus par bka' ba sros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ mu stegs kyi 'a
273b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal brtan par 'du sa bcad pa'o// / kun rag ston pas yang gsungs pa/ dzam don gzham rgyags satsam// thag dgu 'khrul par ngas bshad nyan// nyan thas 'khrul ba'i dbab na// snang ba thar gas yul gyig na// gang cag bdag ma nga
273b2(rnying rgyud): bdag yod// zhib phyogs gcig zar mi thob// lhag mthong med kyir lci bo dang // snang ba ska med don shes pas// zhen med yul snang chos kyi dbyings// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems can gan ga zhi'i rtog pade// gang ga shes dag skad
273b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod// rig pa rang kyang skad cig gol// rtag dang khyad med sgro 'dogs nor// chos su rang rig 'gyur ba med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbu ma pa yi 'dod gzhung de// ngo bo dngos med gzhi byas te// yul sems gzhig pas stong par 'khrul// ci yang med/
273b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skye mched lung // chad dang khyad med stong par gol// stong rig shes pas chos sku yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag mtha' tshig rnam gsum yin// phyogs tsam rtogs pas gzhi ma shes// de phyir nges don mi mthong bas// tshig tu bden te don pago/
273b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos su gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don/ rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal
273b6(rnying rgyud): chos su des// gyi rgyud 'khrul tshul bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' smig klu'i dpe bzhin du// dag pa chos nyid kr-i ya'i gzhi// bzang ngan gtsang sme dngos grub re// grub pa me thob byol song chu// gtsang sbas mi grol rtog pa nyid// spyod pa ma yin gzhi dag spa/
273b7(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yog rnal 'byor sems dpa' yis// dbyer med chos dbyings gzhi byas nas// byang chub rnam lnga 'dod pa 'khrul// bsgom pas mgrol 'dod khams lha// sems tsam pa dang khyad med gol// la sgo rig 'chos spar shes// de yang
274a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag gi yog rnam gsum yang // gzhi nyid ma nges blo 'gyur cing // nam mkha' dag la 'dzin pa bzhin// don la 'khrul par batshom med// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nas sugacig na
274a2(rnying rgyud): bgros pa nan/ rin pa cha yon tan kun 'byung gi tud las/ kyai'i 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i la'u ste bcub do// / de nas 'das pa'i tshogs rnams la// gan ga chos ky-i rgyal pa yis// bskyed rdzogs rnamags ma 'jal pas// don kya
274a3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' sprin dang khu rlangs bzhin// rnal 'gyor ma hA yo g.yas// bden pa dbyer med 'dod pa'i gzhis// rtog tshogs lha ru bsgom pas 'khrul// don med bgegs dang rA tAr lung // dbu ma dang 'dra 'bras bus gol//
274a4(rnying rgyud): la mi brtan rtogs pa'i mchog/ de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma nu mo gang dbye ba ni// kun gzhi mkhang klong gzhi byas nas// snang ba kun bzang rol par 'khrul// yod min med min skye mched lhung // mkha' klong dbum chad dang 'dra//
274a5(rnying rgyud): nyid yin// man ga a ti'i 'khrul tshul ni// spyi dang kha 'thams lung tshig spang // de dag go las rangs bshad nyon// rin chen gser skul mthong sngon bzhin// skye tsam la ni brten pa'i gzhi// mkhas su re nas tha snyad 'dogs// don med nam mkha'
274a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' tshol 'dra// tshig tu shes pas don ma rtogs// tshig rang don yin zer bas 'khrul// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// khang byams pa yis 'khrul pa de// snang ba sems rgyud gzhir byed// kun brtags ldan grub bcu ru 'khrul// 'bras bu mi 'byung log par
274a7(rnying rgyud): gol// gzhi dang ma mthun lung rigs 'gal// gzhi nyid ma shes skye bo rang // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshi ga zin phung gi 'khrul pa de// tshig tsam lung khungs gzhir byed// dgongs pa rnam gsum ma shes 'khrul// tshig tsam lung gis don mi rtogs/
274b1(rnying rgyud): mad danagamasangs sa// dayang dus pa gang btu// dngag tung bang ma na gagasapa// 'jar das gzhan mags pa// nyam b+han byas bslabs pa pan// dadang rba tu gdusas gdanas/ sangs sas bags da nga
274b2(rnying rgyud): bcos sragacig tu 'dus par bka' ba thos pa'i don/ rin po tshe yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs rnamags ma khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste badrugacig pa'o// / yang rdo rje sems dpa nyon// de dag 'phrul pa c+doM
274b3(rnying rgyud): phyir// me tog thabs kyi bsgom gol bas// lhag med ni gnas zhen pa las// bdud 'byung bar chad zhan las byung // yon tan skyon du ma shes pas// ba da 'byams par nges pa'i phyir// de yid bye bdas bshad nyon// gdum sang ga med pa'i lus dag di
274b4(rnying rgyud): tshig bkag rje gcig gang bsgom pa'i// rgyud lung man ngag bsgom pa de// 'khor 'das snang ba sems bslus nas// rig pas rtag chad mtha' bsal te// mi dmigs tsam la bsgoms pa'i thabs// phying nod gnyis kyi mtha' bas la nas// bdel mi rtog snying de tsam// de tshom
274b5(rnying rgyud): gdug na// mdag bzhin bgal nyal// bskam pa nga ga lnga skyes pa'i // byams dang m+b+hing rjes kyil sanan nas// dad pa dang ni brtson 'grus kyis// yang nas yang du 'arnam par byud// de yang 'dras pa'i snang ba tod// mthan dag thabs kyi spyod pa yang // 'og sa
274b6(rnying rgyud): sa da bstan nas// dge ga gnang byed par spyad// del ma dmigs don pa bya// btu rnam spod gsum ngom pa'i tsho// 'bras bu tshogs gtes namardzogs na// snying gnyis kyang nas sangs rgyas 'ad// de las lhag pa'i chos med med// gdo ga gta
274b7(rnying rgyud): ji tsam bsgom kyang bag med gol// nan tan rtsol bas ci 'bad kyang // ri dwags smyig tu bsgeg 'drar 'khrul// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thabs kyis rig pagyen brlabs pas// sman dang yi ge'i dbang gis 'das// rtsa dang thig la 'di bsgom pas// shes pa 'gyur
275a1(rnying rgyud): mad/ sanagagan
275a2(rnying rgyud): par bsgom pa gol bar bstan pa'i me ste badru gnyis pas// pan ga ston pa pa pa gdungs pa// rnal 'brang sta med nyams zhen pas// bdas tsa phrul ma na shes byung / sgom spyod nyams bdud// bar drubacadan
275a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzer bar 'a thams// de yang 'das pa snying pa nyon// de bcwog da dru gdams gagis// senas gsheng bdu med kyang // rang samapa 'khrul pas bdud byung // na gying mi bslang gdams gdags// da pa skad man+ta tha kun pa/
275a4(rnying rgyud): pa'od dang grag pas+thA// 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang bsgre ba'i na// re ra la ni drug drug tu// kye la bstan po sangs par byung // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// snying po 'od kyi bdu byu na// lha med mun las snang byung bas// dge sdig mthang ba'i
275a5(rnying rgyud): thugs// batha na paman dang na pa // rjes pade lhag ngas ga so/ gnasami 'brang ba can pa// dmyal ba'i gnas grangs sa sa ny-i/ des rgyas pa'i byung / gag pas da byungan// mkhye ma ska
275a6(rnying rgyud): nga // dga' bsang ma nas ting badzin babyung // bka' dgal chos brjod nga bar snang // lcibs gdang bad sma pras// d+habad+han rtag sang rjes meng thung // 'tsho ltang gsuMng ga me mar bde// 'jigs ping gzugs kyi bdang byed na/
