349b1(rnying rgyud): 'thabs kun btags kyis// lung tshig tsam langs 'cha' ba// de dag go la ba ngas bshad ston// mang ni tshi gtsam shes pa'i gnyis// mkhas smad nas tha snyad 'dogs// don med nam mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra// cig tu dang/
349b2(rnying rgyud): pas don mi rtogs// tshig nyid don yin zer ba 'khrul// de yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' nyon// kha 'byams dpa' bo'i 'khrul pa de// snang ba sems sdud gzhi ru byed// 'khrul pa'i dbye ba ldan grub bcu// 'bras bu mo 'ag
349b3(rnying rgyud): log par gol// gzhi dang mi mthun lung rig 'gal// gzhi nyid ma shes skye bo dang // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun brtags lhur ni 'khrul pa yi// phyi nang gsang sngags snang ba'i gzhi// bskyed dang rdzogs 'dod/
349b4(rnying rgyud): rim pa 'khrul// don ma zin pas 'bras bu med// gzhi la lha med pa skyed mi dgos// ma bskyed chos su ye nas yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshig zin lung gi 'khrul tshul de// tshig tsam lung la khungs byed pas//
349b5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa rnam gsum ma shes 'khrul// tshig tsam yang gis don mi rtogs// don med tshig gis dgos pa med// lung med don go ye sangs rgyas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dgra 'khrul tshul rnam bzhi yang //
349b6(rnying rgyud): yi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir// gzhi dang 'gal phyir don las gol// de phyir lung ldan gdams ngag dkris// kun tu bzang ba ye shes klong gi rgyud rin po che gser gyi yang ldan las/ rdzogs chen sgying 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u skye ba
349b7(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'khor gyi dang ldan don du yang // kun reg ston pa chosri rje la// bden pa'i dgongs don 'di skad gsol// 'khor rnams 'khrul pa ldog pa'i thabs// tshogs med rtogs
350a1(rnying rgyud): thabs pabashad du gsol// de skad klas pa'i don gas na nas// 'dus pa'i 'a khrung la bka' stsal ba// 'og ma'i 'khrul pa ldog thabs dang // yang ti nges don ldog pa gnyis// nga las bstan gyis legs par nyon/
350a2(rnying rgyud): 'og ma'i chos kyi 'khrul ldog zabs// gnyen po dang ni ye shes kyis// kun rdzob nyon mongs sgrib spangs te// don dam shes bya'i sgrib spang sal// tshogs bsngags pa yi sa nges nas ni// lam lhas bAcu rim bgrod te// pha ro
350a3(rnying rgyud): sa su su
350a4(rnying rgyud): ri dogs mtha'// rnam rtog rgyar chung 'khor bar 'khyams// de gyir sna brid tshes 'dis phung // kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ thag pa 'og ma pa'i chos kyis 'khrul pa mi ldog par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
350a5(rnying rgyud): kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// yang sdig rdzogs chen nges don gyis// 'khrul pa zlog pa'i thabs chen ni// lung ldan gdams ngag ldan pa yi// bla mardo rje slob dpon de// gdams ngag mkhas la thugs rje che// dam tshig
350a6(rnying rgyud): sa dugs
350a7(rnying rgyud): dang nges tshig las dang skal// rtags dang mthar thug kun rdzogs pa'i// rig pa thugs kyi dbang gsum ni// rim gyis ma yin cig car du// dad ldan gyis ni mnos gyur na// sde ba 'di yis sangs rgyas 'grub// de yi dam tshig
350b1(rnying rgyud): sa// / sa ga / sa// 'dun chu ma // ngag / dang dun / shu nga ga
350b2(rnying rgyud): 'brags grus sbya dus// dbyer ci ga drung das tshig ste/ chos rnams can kyi tha bra min// bzung ba'i dam chog nam lnga phyung // mang 'dod rlung ga nga na snying bsnang ba'i sakyig te// ma da pa 'byung dngas 'a
350b3(rnying rgyud): sang bar bya ba'i macig pa'i// 'khod ba bskyed pa rten gan ste// ma grangs par grol gyi srid// dpyid rtogs rnams kyis snang// gnang bar thu ba da mchog pa'aM// nywab gdang ldanarnams suH// nam ldan kyis
350b4(rnying rgyud): hU~Mgs pan mas pas kyang// de la sems dpang // gapa rgya med pa'i pa nas// med 'a 'i khongamag da // 'gar pa las slopa saskyed rdzun pa// de de ldan yin gyi ma la byu
350b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i nga ny-in// srid ldan las byeng sal bar 'jim// sa dan rgyud na pasbyin pa'i snod// rtse ma mi dzad dus 'dzin// man dag sbyong po brtan par gsangs// rtogs pachen pa sad ni thams nyid 'dus pa'i ming po pa
350b6(rnying rgyud): pa gas gi rgyu/ drin cig seM kyi yang ldan las/ rdzogs sa la rnal pa sdig pa rji bsgru brnyan pa'i le ga sum pa'idenas sems dpa' lag/ na dam sa na med du// ngan
350b7(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen pa la// 9/ dzas don gdams ngag 'dre na de rjes// rig 'dzin grub tho bka' rtags ga // rig pa byin gyisa'i ltang brgyag// dedon nyams sa ltar phyog/ mi sgra spyong pa'i ltar spyad// jis don chu dkyi bka rtags gang // ku ma na
351a1(rnying rgyud): @#/ ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'bral med chos las rab bzhengs te// ye shes rig pa'i klong brtol nas// snod ldan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rig 'dzin grub thob bka' rtags ni// dan
351a2(rnying rgyud): gyis brgyad dang byin gyis brlabs// brda' yis bstan dang tshig gis mtshon// sbyar rgyal sras la srid gtod 'dra// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// don gyis khyab dang rtogs pa yi// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis bstan pa'i// trail la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin
351a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can ma lus la// rang bzhin ngo bo'i lus kyis khyab// de phyir don gyis khyab par gsungs// de don rtogs pas brgyud pa yi// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kun bzang des// 'khrul ma myong la rtogs myong ba'i// gzhi dang ye shes dus
351a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam shar// de phyir kun tu bzang po bya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i gzhi// rang byung ngo bo nyid sku de// ma mdzad ma bcos rgyas ma bskyed// nam mkha'i mthongs su nyi shar 'dra// gdod nas ma rig skyon ma
351a5(rnying rgyud): gos// lung la ma brten rig cing rtogs// sangs ma rgyas pa'i rig pa la// rang byung ye shes de la bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gang la yengs med yang dag yod// glo sngar med pa'i rig pa ni// dus gsum gcig pa'i chos su la// /
351a6(rnying rgyud): rang la rang du chos skur shes// da lta'i rig pa 'di yin te// dus rnams kun tu 'bral ba med// sgo srur med pa'i rig pa gsal// ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya// klan bzang rtogs pa nges pa'i don// ming dang dpe don nyams kyi grangs// drug
351a7(rnying rgyud): gsum chos sku gcig la rdzogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de tshe 'khor 'das par dol// rgyu dang 'bras bu lung ma bstan// sems las ma byung sangs rgyas ni// rang byung kun tu bzang po bya// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/
351b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i brgyud pa bstan pa'i le'u sde bcu bzhi pa'o// // kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// nges don byin rlabs brgyud pa'i don// gang phyir byin rlabs dpe dang ni// sprul pa'i dgongs pa badz+ra' yis ni// tshig brgyad yon tan
351b2(rnying rgyud): bshad kyis nyon// sems dag rig 'dzin bskul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bka' bgros nges pa'i don// ye shes rig pa rang gnas phyir// byin rlabs sangs rgyas kun la shar// de yi mtshon dpe bstan pa ni// nam mkha'i
351b3(rnying rgyud): ga na/ na sa 'a spyod/ de / sa ldan dul // sbyin smram thags / dngas
351b4(rnying rgyud): de don dgongs pa rnam gsum gyis// bstan pa'i 'khor ni rnam gsum la// drang don ldem dgongs nges pa'i chos// 'dus pa'i 'khor la ci rigs bshad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po chos sku'i rtsa ba ni// rang gyur ngo bo nyid sku
351b5(rnying rgyud): dang // sa bcu'i 'khor la dgongs pas bshad// tshegs med des don rig pas go// de don nges par dbye ba ni// lnga bcu bdun gyi brda' bstan phyir// tshig tu ma brjod yid la rtogs// rig 'dzin sprul pa'i spyod yul yin// de yang
351b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dgongs dang rig pa rna bar brgyud// tshig gi sgron mas don go phyir// phyi rabs dang ldan rnams kyis go// de phyir sangs rgyas da lta nyid// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// skye shi gnyis kyi bar do la// kun tu
351b7(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i chos drug gis// dpe don rig pa nyams ldan pas// ma rig drug bcom bden pa mthong // tog gzhi la sogs bcu gcig gis// 'khrul gzhi la sogs dgu po yang // brlag cing stongs te 'khor ba med// de phyir gol sgrib
352a1(rnying rgyud): ming med do// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// lung bstan gdams ngag mngon bstan pas// de ma thag tu chos skur shes// rnam sbyin lus dang ma bral kyang // sangs rgyas sa la nges par 'gro// rdzogs pa chen po ngas
352a2(rnying rgyud): don 'dus pa'i yang snying kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud/ rin po che gser gyi phreng zhun las/ rig 'dzin grub pa thob pa'i bka' rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// des don rig pa'i byin rlabs
352a3(rnying rgyud): kyis// nges don gdams ngag bstan pa dang // mi rtog tsam du byin rlabs dang // thabs kyi bde bas byin rlabs dang // nyams kyi bdud kyis byin rlabs phyir// de dron dbye ba shin tu gces// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges don gdam
352a4(rnying rgyud): ngag rnam bzhi ste// dang po gzhi nges lta ba la// snang ba ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// go las spong ldang zhen pa ste// spong ba dug dang tsher ma 'dra// rang lus 'byung ba'i dug lha la// mi drang blo yis spong byed pa// gnyen po mi rtag bdag med du//
352a5(rnying rgyud): ched du sdug bsngal spong bar 'dod// nyon mongs ris su spong byed pa// rang la nyon mongs gang che ba// kha bka' gnyen pos spong bar byed// gnyen la nye ring byed pa 'dra// nyon mongs rgyu 'bras spong byed pa// dge bsgrub sdig spong 'bras bu
352a6(rnying rgyud): tshol// blang dor re dogs rtsol ba byed// 'jig rten so nam byed pa 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// spyad pa'i rtog pa bstan pa ni// yul sems gnyis med 'dod pa'i chos// thams cad rang gi sems su bsdu// yul
352a7(rnying rgyud): sems gcig tu 'dre mi srid// bu ram rang gis ro mi myong // sems nyid rang snang 'dod pa de// phyi nang sems kyi cho 'phrul gyis// snang ba ma nges sna tshogs pa// chu nang zla ba ngos zin 'dra// chos kun stongs par 'dod pa ni// rang gi
352b1(rnying rgyud): sems kyis phral gzhig kyang // stong par mang ba ci yang med// srin 'bras dri rab bsreg pa 'dra// chas nyid don ni gang drang la// sngang med brjod du med par 'dod// g.yo ldanan ne bas pa len// tshul 'chos can gyise pas dang 'dra// dayang
352b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying pa nyon// yul lnga zhen pa'i rtog pa de// dang po grub mtha'i zlos ma bsgyur// ma rig dbang gis 'khrul pa rgyas// 'khor 'das mi shes gti mug gis// dam shes pa phrad pa 'dra// yul la yengs pa'i rtag pa//
352b3(rnying rgyud): rnams ni shes pa rdzing // kha dog dbyibs kyi 'dod yon la// rtog pa mang bas spyod pa yengs// rma byas mdangs la blta ba 'dra// chos brgyad dam par blta ba de// bstod srad la sogs chos rnams la// dam par zhen pa'i blo 'dzin pas//
352b4(rnying rgyud): golas yin par nges// bu gcig pa yi pha ma 'dra// skye rga na 'chis mi 'jigs pa'i// ma rig blun po zhe sdang can// gzung 'dzin 'di yi rtog pas phyung // phyi ma dmyal bas mi 'jigs pas// rgyal pos bsgo ba'i gshed ma 'dra// de yang 'du
352b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po nyon// spong sdud zhen pa de dag kyang // gzhi la med par ma shes pas// 'khrul ba'i chos la bden 'dzin b+hir// snang ba chos dbyings gol sar gsungs// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ rjes kyi dbyings kyi go lus
352b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i lan ste bcu drug pa'o// / kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// snang ba ma bcos chos dbyings ni// steng 'og par gyi dbye ba'i phyir// chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// steng gi
352b7(rnying rgyud): dbyings chos skur gcig/ bar du ye shes sgyu ma'i dbyings// 'og tu snang ba 'byung ba'i dbyings// gcig la tha dad ngam zin na// 'gal ba med de kun ka'i dbyings// de lta snang ba'i chos rnams la// mi btag mi gzung mi 'brang bar//
353a1(rnying rgyud): smras mi dag ga rang yin pa// reg pa gang dran byings nas 'a// gang yang dru bcol yang / skur med pa chos dasbyangs yin// de yang 'dus par snad pa nyan// ga pa dang ma thal// ma'adren pa
353a2(rnying rgyud): klong na 'phyo// yin dang min gyis ci zhig bya// chos kyi dbyings zhes de la gdags// 'khrul pa'i rtog pa sa gzhi mi 'gyur// btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bstod// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rmad// rin po rje par
353a3(rnying rgyud): zhun las/ gol med snang ba ma bcos chos kyi dbyings bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rig pa ma bskrad chos spa yi// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyisra/
353a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu rkyen ma bskyed 'gyur ba med// 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' 'dra// de yi rtogs tshul ye shes te// bsgom smin sgo srur ma btags pa// kun bzang rang rig chos spur rtogs// ri bo ta la'i nyi shar 'dra// de yis de nyid mtshon pa'i dang //
353a5(rnying rgyud): maza' dbus mang pas nam mkha' 'dra// rnam rtog 'joms pas rdo rje 'dra// skye ba med pas A dang 'dra// de yi nges pa'i gtan tshigs ni// rang byung 'khor bar 'khyams ma myong // de rtogs da lta nyid du yang // mtha' bral mngon gyur bden pa
353a6(rnying rgyud): mthong // de yi ldog thabs nges pa ni// mthun dang mi mthun gnyis log pas// go la sgrib skyon gyis mgos phyir// sems las ma byang chos sur gsungs// de yi mtshan nyid nges pa ni// gang dang 'dra med yin pa med// yin ni/
353a7(rnying rgyud): da lta'i shes pa la// de la don kun gnas pa'i don// de phyir 'bral ba med pa'i mchog/ la bzlas spang blang med shes pas// skyon san thams cad med par dag/ de phyir dus 'dir 'bras bu 'grub// phyi mar sangs kyis spros ci dgos//
353b1(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pa ji snyeng pa nyon// chos dbyings chas lha gcig gi dang // rang byung rig pa'i ye shes de// nyi zla gzas zin dpe bzhin du// dan kun dus gcig yon tan rdzogs/ kun tu bzung ba ye shes slong gi chud las/ rig pa ma bslad rgya
353b2(rnying rgyud): kyi slar bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// ma bsgoms 'bral med bstan pa'i don// dang po kun gzhi shan gyi la// bar du chos spu ngos gzung ba// tha ma la zlos bden pa mthong // de
353b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po rang rig kun gzhi ni// snga phyi rtogs dang chos sku ru// lung ldan bla mas shan phye la// thams brten bcas ma bsgribs pa'i// mtshan nyid bzhi ldan chos sngar shes// go las ba'i tshod gdeng dang ldan// de phyir lhag
353b4(rnying rgyud): mthong nges pa rnyed// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung de// ngo shes don dang 'bral med phyir// rgyun du gnas pas sangs rgyas sa// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag bsgom pa'i dbye ba ni// gsal ba mi rtog mi g.yo ba// dbyer ba rnam pa dgu
353b5(rnying rgyud): dgur ni// rgyun du 'bral med gtan la 'bebs// de dag rtsa ba mdor bsdu na// sgo lnga gsal ba mar me 'dra// rig pa mi g.yo mtsho gting 'dra// mi rtog bya ba btang ba 'dra// de gsum chos nyid gcig la rdzogs// gang mthong dran pa ma 'khrul ba//
353b6(rnying rgyud): chos sru bos zin deni ldan pas// de phyir thig le nyag gcig la// ma 'dus pa ni gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa chen po des don 'dus pa'i yang snying / kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/ rgyun tu 'bral med kyi bsgom pa ngos
353b7(rnying rgyud): gzung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// rgyun du 'bral med rig spyod ni// dus ni bzhi gsum gsungs pa yang // spyi yi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir// tshig tu bden te don las gol// de yang

354b1(rnying rgyud): gyi lus lhag bsngal grangs// nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi la// ye 'grog 'khang pa rnam gsum yin// gdan lhag mnang dan gyis zin// de cha mtha' bral chos spar mthong // lus dang na tshag zhal med// sdug bsngal da nyid yul

354b3(rnying rgyud): detshe sdug bsngal sprul par shes// spyi yi sdug bsngal rnam bzhin// ma dag rkyen bzhis bskyed pa yi// nyon mongs bag chags bsags pas gol// lnga phye med shes gdams ngag gis// mtshan nyid bzhi ldan nyams su myong /

355a7(rnying rgyud): chung na sa sa
355b1(rnying rgyud): yang bstan pa'i la'u ste nyar gsum pa la// spyan rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// srid pa ba da rnam lnga la// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bar da dang // kun btags dag pa' bar dadang // gnas 'gyur lha yi bar da dang // rnam shes rdu
355b2(rnying rgyud): zhon par de dang // mngon gyur ye shes par da'o// ma rig bakhrul pa'i bar dani// rgya ni ma rig rnam gsam ste// gyen ni chags sdang gnyis kyis gal// galas bar dor lus gsum 'dus// sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su spong /
355b3(rnying rgyud): rgas sdug bsngal zad dus med// de las thar cing ldog 'dod pas// kun brtags dge rtsa 'dir byas pas// dge bcu sbyin sogs dad pas spyad// phyi mar 'bras bu 'dod pa'i blos// rgya mthun bag chags mthu brtas pas// lha dang
355b4(rnying rgyud): yi go'i phang tsam// smon lam dbang gis mtha' brtson kyang // dge ba'i stegs zad 'khor bar 'khyams// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyen// gnas 'gyur lha yi bar dam// rtogs dang lhags la dus mnyam nas// lha gsum gcig
355b5(rnying rgyud): la gcig tshang nas// 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas dus de nyid// ma rtogs lha bsgom rU trar skye// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rnam shes rlung zhon par do la// phyi nang rlung gi bde goms pas// phag mo la sogs 'pho ba bdun/
355b6(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal ye shes slar 'dod pa// thabs lam yin phyir nges don min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mngon gyur ye shes par do la// rgyu ni lung ldan gdams ngag ste// byin rlabs rjes dran rnam drug gis// ma rig sangs
355b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa rgyas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bur ldan// 'gro don gzugs sku shugs la 'char// btsal ba med par don rnams grub// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud/ rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/
356a1(rnying rgyud): pa bar dol skye bsdus mi len par bstan pa'i khe'u gnyar bzhi pa la// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyan// da ltar martogs byin brlabs pas// dbu ma man chad lta skam hA// 'khar 'das chos kun sems sa bsdus/
356a2(rnying rgyud): rig pas rtag chad mtha' bsal te// mi dmigs tsam la bsgom pa'i thabs// bying rgod gnyis kyi skyon bsal la// ting nge mer re rang gsal tsam// yang nas yang du goms par byed// mthun 'jug zabs kyi spyod pa yang // 'og ma'i cho
356a3(rnying rgyud): dang sgo bstan phyir// dge sdig shin mdangs phyed par spyod// de tshe don gyis zin par bya// lha sgom spyod pa 'dzom pa'i tshe// 'bras bu tshogs gnyis na ma rdzogs na// sgrib gnyis spangs nas sangs rgyas 'dod// de las lhag pa
356a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas med zer// ri dwags sdig zla ba stegs ltar 'khru'o// de yang 'dus pa 'i snyeng pa nyon// zhabs kyis reg pa byin brlabs pa// sman dang lag 'bru dbang gi dus// rtse dang thig le bde bsgom pas// shes pa 'gyur nas bde la zhen/
356a5(rnying rgyud): mi grol shin tu 'ching // mi rtog zabs kyis bde 'dod gal// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi chud las/ 'og ma'i bsgom pa gol bar bstan pa'i lde'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// / kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// lha med zhi gnas zhen pa la/
356a6(rnying rgyud): bdud byung bar chad zhen las blang // zil gcon gdams dgangs bshad nyon// rnal 'byor lA med nyams zhen pa// bdud kyi cho 'phul mngon shes 'byung // de tshe lha skom spyod nyams bdud// bar du bcad nas 'khor bar 'khyams//
356a7(rnying rgyud): bzlog don du gdams ngag gis// bco brgyad yon tan chen po ni// zil non rtogs dang 'bras bu yis// don ldan nges pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung // de yang 'dus pa 'i steng pa nyon// lba ba'i bdud ni rnam bzhi ste// snang ba 'od dang grag pasa?/
356b1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa gzugs dang bsdubartan// ra rab ni drug drug// d+h+rU dang zhugs pa nyas dmigs dang // bal gnan rtags dang 'bras bur dgasangs// spang ba 'dage bdud byung na// lta ba phran las snang 'byung bas// dag lpags thang dam d+ha
356b2(rnying rgyud): / zhugs// 'gro na bya man ting 'ang na btang // dngos med lhag mthong mi g.yodran// gzhal med pas gzha' tshon 'dra// dmyal ba'i gnas kyang sangs rgyas zhing // de yang 'dras pa snying pa nyon// zag pA sme yi bdud dru na/
356b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la skra dang chos ston 'byung // dga' bas ngoms zhing ting 'dzin btang // gdong bral bsdu zhing bdud dbang song // bka' 'gal chos brgyad 'khor bar lhung // lta ba'i gdeng zin sla dang bral// sgra spyan rtags me rjes mi 'bring /
356b4(rnying rgyud): ljang gsung gi 'char ma bad// 'jigs pa gzugs kyi bdud byung na// rmi lam dngos su 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mi dga' don bral mo chag byed// sems ngan tshe thung yi chad lgang // snang gzugs gzhol med par shes// snying po mad gas
356b5(rnying rgyud): nyam ming // de nyid thub drug sbrul slar shes// da yang 'dus pa ji skang po nyin// bslu brdzun gyi bdud byung na// dus gas mnyes legs ston pa 'byung // bden dang mI bden pa mkhyen// mngon shes rdugs pas zhe sdang ste// tshig las 'das
356b6(rnying rgyud): phying ldan mgrub// rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul par shes// den rtags ci sgras rgyal pa'i bka/ kun chu bzing ba ye shes gleng gi rgyud las/ lci ba'i bdud zil gyi sanon pa'i rtags dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i lo ste te drug pa la// kun ga
356b7(rnying rgyud): pas yang gsungs pa// bsgom pa'i bdud ni rnam bzhis// bying ba gsal bab bdud byung na// don mdanan tan 'bad nas bsgom// myos pa'i dbang gis gas la bapyod// gnyen pogs la badzidan dang bral// gnyed gsum bsres pas gti mug 'dun/
357a1(rnying rgyud): / chos nyid klung duganyad tham shas// sangs rgyas ye shes blar byed// rmugs pa bde ba'i bdud byung na// wang ldan chos spangs mazin// shes pa kun po lhag mthong med// bsgom pa byas kyang gti mug 'phel// rang ga ngan pang /
357a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes gsal// lta bas zin phyir bde bar shar// 'bras bu ye shes 'gyur med spong // de yang 'dus pa'i snying pa nyon// rgod pa mi rtog bdud byung na// gdams ngag med phyir 'dus par dga'// don btang nas ni mi chos byed//
357a3(rnying rgyud): zhen pa sna tshogs byed// sa gyi rig pa'i don zin phyin// ba mor nyi shar bzhin du stongs// gdeng zin chos dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ 'gro ba mi g.yo'i bdud byung na// don la goms par ma byas pas// reg tshor dran pa phra ma bya// don med du
357a4(rnying rgyud): yang yang ldang // mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs kyis zin// rnam rtog rang ni rig pa gsal// thams cad chos sgra 'bras bu mchog/ kun tu bzang po ye shes slong gi chud las/ sgom pa'i bdud zil gyis non pa'i rtags dang 'bras bu bstan par leng
357a5(rnying rgyud): b+he nyar bdun pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// b+ha ba 'du 'jo langs spyod bdud// nyams dgar zhen pa gnas kyi bdud// bslab pa'i yon tanagayeng ba'i bdud// 'khor ngan sems
357a6(rnying rgyud): dkrigs 'di da dang ni// de dag spyod pa'i bdud bzhir gsungs// de yang 'jus pa ji snyed pa nyan// dad+ma' longs spyod bdud dbyen// yan dag med par tshul 'chos byed// mi rnams ldan 'dod gzhanas mas 'dzin// don par bdag 'ang dazag
357a7(rnying rgyud): dag ltung // de dag dgar shes zhen pa chung // bu bzhin chags med don gyis zin// langs spyod rang grom rol par rtogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zhen chags gnas bdud dpying ni// thos chung mkhas chos nyams dga' bcag
357b1(rnying rgyud): gas 'an ma ya // 'drag rnaman ma ga 'anan pa gas// gnas pa ma thags pas cad zhag// bdag nagan lamad pa na// gang bajug par gadzin gnas// na su // gtan gang ban
357b2(rnying rgyud): sa
357b3(rnying rgyud): na
357b4(rnying rgyud): na pa sanan 'das pa'i yang snang / gan ba ba mi shes gang ga chud las/ smad pa bdud pa la skyes nan pa'i drug pa da bras zla brtson pa de la'u nywar brgyad pa'i/ de yang na rnasems dpa' nyin/ mas sto
357b5(rnying rgyud): sakla
357b6(rnying rgyud): gi rnyed pa pa med// da'ang 'dim pa'i pa/ mas kyi zhin pa bdu thA// martog zhan pa'i 'de ba 'byung // rab lang grub mdupas ma dam so// ngas ma zin pas pa' bskyen// phyag ma thod de pa'i gdeng du sa/
357b7(rnying rgyud): dus / sa /
358a1(rnying rgyud): / nyid ma bcos rgyan pa gnas// zhe 'dod med na tshul 'chos bral// 'dod med gdeng ldan 'bras bu'i mchog/ de yang rdo rjesams dpa' ston// brkam chags bdaba'i bdud byung na// 'dod chags dbang la byang chubar//
358a2(rnying rgyud): gi zhen pas 'dod chags sred// don du ma shes byang mi chub// rang rig don ldan dbang mi dgos// 'dod spyad rkyen thub chos spur shes// bogs med ye shes sangs rgyas yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yon tan phrag dog zhe sdang byed//
358a3(rnying rgyud): de la lan 'debs rmongs pa ni// mkhas la slar 'debs dmyal bar lhung // gzhi rtogs don la skur dang bral// zhe sdang rang grol chos nyid rtogs// de nyid dus na bdud med shes// nga rgyal sgro 'dogs bdud byung tshe// gang zag ldad phyir chos
358a4(rnying rgyud): larjod// ches cung byed cing bkA rgan byed// bsod rnams ches chung dmyal ba gyu // man dag gas dab+ha buMl+la gyis mnan// y-id ces rang rig don gyis zin// de nyi nyi bden pa mthong // de yid 'dras pa'i stong ba rgyan// dngag
358a5(rnying rgyud): du pa // ma shA las/ lca na kyi ni bco / ga mabyin pa na me skye dug zugs na brnam
358a6(rnying rgyud): zhun las// nyams kyi bdud kyi rtags dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pas bdag la gson// rnal 'byor nyams su myong ba'i bka'// don dang mthun par bshad du
358a7(rnying rgyud): gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyams myong rim pa rnam bzhi ste// sdang ba chos dbyings nyams myong dang // rang rgyud zil gnon nyams rtsong dang // des lung spyod pa'i nyams myong dang //
358b1(rnying rgyud): sna bgadong nan nyams cing // da yang dong sems dang 'atan// rlung bcos dbyings nyas sa rjo na// b+hab btung bya ma 'dra te// mthong srung gzugs phral sogs pa// gang mthor ldan cang dang yang // btab/ dpung ma nadu rgyan
358b2(rnying rgyud): tsam// yul ni bran ne long 'dug kyang // spong spad zhen par ma song na// chos dbyings gdeng ldan nyams kyi mchog/ de yang 'dus pa'i snying po tsun// rang kyad nyon mongs pil non rtags// bsgo ma thabs skyon dang brdzes pa'i thabs/
358b3(rnying rgyud): thun tshwad nyams dang rnam lnga ste// bsgom thabs lte bu'i kun la bsgom// skyon ni bying dang rgod pa ste// bcos thabs rab 'bring thu ma yis// dz+nyAn tshad nyams kyi tsho dadang skar// de don nges par la brgyan// gser 'gyur rtsi yis thebs
358b4(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// rtog dang mi tog thams cad du// rlung sems lta ba'i chos nyi dwa gsal// rang bya zil gyis non pa'i nyams// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dedon mthar byug rim pa don// gos kyi 'jam rtsub sna tshogs dang /
358b5(rnying rgyud): zas kyir mchog gang myong ba// glang d+ha na mthing bral chos srar shes// de tsam nyid na ye shes shang// yul nyid ma yin gang dran pa// chos srung shes pas yul dang bral// de tsam yul dang rig pa gnyis// gnas skapas mthar thug 'bye/
358b6(rnying rgyud): pa med// de yang 'dras pa'i snying po skyon// rtog pa mngon gyur gdeng gi nyams// yo goms pa brtan pa ni// cig cung rim gyis 'thung ba ni// shes rab blo mi khyad par las// lus ngag yid kyi nya mas rtags kun// rnal 'tshang/
358b7(rnying rgyud): pa la ngas par 'byung // de nyid rna la 'byor nyams kyi mazlog/ dad nga tha ma ma nasaslong gi chud pas/ rnal rtsor nyams su myong ba'i bag rjegs san pa'i leng kyi sa mtha pa'o// / des 'dus pa'i tshigs rnams pa// sman ga rton pas yang
359a1(rnying rgyud): su / par bags // zham la nan rna ma byas non// dang / 'dags pas+ho// gas pa nag dang sa nas da// ga sungs sa rgyas snang pa // dayang sa //
359a2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa// rgyal po gtan ma zin pa bzhin// lus nang thos kyi stan du gnas// dbyer mi 'bral gzungs dang lhan// ngag gi brjod che // dbye ni dgra pa'i bcwa la zhugs paskyen// nges pa'i don gyis sngon bral bas// ngag tu mang rnod mos sbeng gas la// seM
359a3(rnying rgyud): lo spyod pa ni// nags kyi de dgas pag phubs bzhin// shes rab rnam gas/ ma thag rjod pas// lhag mthong rig pa'i gang ngags na// chos kyi de la dmigs pan// no d+he gas ni thub pa bzhin// ga ldan rnams kyi gas thub pas// dam
359a4(rnying rgyud): dang ma thab ba// kun tu babang po yishes slong ga rgya las// ban la dmigs pa'i snong pa btsun pa'i man ma ga pas/ da yang ngas pa'i nga na// da seM na// da pa gdus kyis ba gsu pa bzhin/
359a5(rnying rgyud): dpral med chos slar shrIs// snang bas mi gnod pan ma nus// nang ge slo drogs gcod pa ni// mi shi spang la mi lcog bzhin// mtha' bral des pa'i gdeng gas paH// rang rig bden mthong byer mi myog/ gaN+DI pa kan-i sgo 'dogs chod skrod pa// gtid mad
359a6(rnying rgyud): 'dugs pa zug pa bzhin// ma rig sangs phyir yul dang thal// de phy-ir yid ches gded zhes zi na// lung gi blo na nas khyod spod na// nor stor sma la rnyed pa bzhin// dza don mad rgya sun partan nas// ngas don nyid pas chos skur rtogs// kun tu bzang
359a7(rnying rgyud): pa ye shes kyang gaspyang las// blo 'dogs tshod pa'i spyod pa brtan pa'i 'ong sas gnyis pa na/ popas dpas yang ltung / dugapatsun tsun gan byer// mi zhes rdzong babatsun drug sor// ngan ga rten pas thugs gsol// 'du /
359b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar la bka' phral ba// zas rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// khyi phrag bzhin dru gcang dum med// nan pan rtog pa bcas gyuran// yon tan drug ldan spyod pa'i mchog/ gas kyi thug pa bcom pa'i phyir// snron pa bzhin drung na dgugan// gtan na/
359b2(rnying rgyud): tan ldan bI// chags med yon tan mchog tu wAn// gzhan gyi rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// nga tsa med par thugs ston dang // gnyen la ldang ba byas sngar na// 'khor ngan bdang bsnom par ba 'phel// dam mi rtog pa gzhim pa'i phyir// braM ga na
359b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba bzhin// chags sdang gzhol med par zhes// dgra nyid chos srung shes par bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dringadag spyod pa gang snod dang // rigs spyod kun dbya ba ni// bram ze da ma chog 'gal ba'i phyir// lung ldan kun gyis rbA
359b4(rnying rgyud): rung // kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ rtog pa gzhom pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// gzhi shes blo dngos gcig pa dang // btul zhugs mchog dang bgegs med pa'o// ye shes
359b5(rnying rgyud): rang ga rangs bshad kyis// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// lung ldan gdams dgag zhi shes pas// ngo ba nyid lagro ldan phyir// gang yang chos sbyar rang gas la bsdu// 'dus mabyas pa'i rnam mkha' 'dra// blod ngos gcig par shes pa yis//
359b6(rnying rgyud): mthong nyid 'khrul med shes phyir// snang mthong gang dran chos spar shes// smig rgyu nam mkhar shes pa 'dra// brtul zhugs mchog gi spyod pa ni// mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu// chags sdang lnga la longs spyad kyang // lta ba rtogs pa'i grangs su 'khru/
359b7(rnying rgyud): lung rigs mi 'gal rgyud gnas dang // 'bol zhing zhi la 'jam 'dod pas// nges pa'i gdams ngag mgon// ma khas kyang rmongs pa sbyor ro rje// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bgegs med ye shes dang shar ba// rang gi rnam rtog yod kyi bar// bgags/
360a1(rnying rgyud): / gyi mthab la zad pa med// dngos su med byer 'khrul pa'i blo// mu stegs can la 'dra yod phyir// 'drer 'dzin skye ba ma rig pa// mo ma'i rdzun gyis glen pa bslus// dam pa kun gyis 'ang phun bton// yul dgrolas rjod bur na// bdu ma ngag sa
360a2(rnying rgyud): sbyar shes// gzhi la lha 'di med rtogs pas// phanAg nor bya ba ming yang med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag ye shes rang shar ba// kun brtags zad na 'dre rnams stongs// 'dri ni nyid 'khrul yin pa'i phyir// ri bong ral yod rtog 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po ngas
360a3(rnying rgyud): don thams cad 'dus pa'i yang snying kun tu bzang po mi shes slong gi d+h+yang / rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/ ye shes rang shan gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// dam tshig srung med ngas bshan
360a4(rnying rgyud): smra
360a5(rnying rgyud): bsal mi na 'dra// bsrung ba'i dam tshig lnga nyams na// marungs las rnams spyad pa'i phyir// ma rig mun pa ma sol pas// rang gi mig ni rang bton 'dra// srang ba'i dam tshig bzhi nya mas na// 'og ma'i sems babyed sbom zhig pas// khan mtho rnam gsum srung // brtson
360a6(rnying rgyud): rang chung pa'i med na 'dra// de yang 'dras pa'i snying po ton// de dag dmigs kyis dbye bani// ltung ba'i sgo gur lhung nges skyes// de yi sdug bsngal smos thag chad// las kyis tshe tshod brjod mi langs// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi khyad las/ matogs pa'i dmadzong //
360a7(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i ltung ba'i sgong stan pa'i le'u te so lngapa'o// de nas kun rig rgyal po las// mthar drug ye shis 'bras bu sogs// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don med du// mngon par sangs rgyas bka' stsal ba// lus med ye shes sgo lnga yis// thar ma mthong ba'i ni
360b1(rnying rgyud): // mnas gas rdzun rdzog/ sa gas/ na ma/ ngas pa dun pa pa pa lag sa s+ho// rgyabasapa ma pa'i sa zang/ na ba /
360b2(rnying rgyud): da dgongs pag bye// bcol med 'gro don ta bye// de yang rdo rjesams dpa 'aton// rnam sri phus me ye shes bu// rig pa gsal la ba mig can// skur ma mthing ba'i mi srid byengs la// zhing rnams sangs kyis shes slong // chos bla dad pa thar
360b3(rnying rgyud): rang sems rtogs pas thos sbar shar// ting 'dzin nas ni nyams su bsten// ngos cog nyams rtsong chos spang shes// de la bsgom pasla bya mi dgos// 'khor 'das gnyis sum bsams pa'i// lhag mthong dran pa'i ye shes la// maM brjed gzungs ldan rig pa'i sgra// gangang
360b4(rnying rgyud): rang reg sum khyab phyir// dus gsum sde 'gag med pa yi// 'bras zla bar do ye shes ldan// ma rig pag chags shes pa'i phyir// rkyen bzhis bskyed pa'i dbang mi 'gyur// phyir chibs la dres par 'gro// ldan grub mngon kyar dus der 'grub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i
360b5(rnying rgyud): sa
360b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang shing don rtogs pas// rang byung chos sul mig rgyan// ye shes sgo lnga gsal bar 'dus// theg gzhanas ngas gas 'dod pa ni/ blos byas rnam gsum des don med// datsor yang nyisangs rgyas kyi// 'bras zla bar do sangs rgyas rba// kun tu bzang ba yi
360b7(rnying rgyud): slong ba rgyad las/ dzis don gyi sangs kyis bstan pa'i len k+shi sa drug pa'o// / den bston pakun gis// 'as pa'i khor 'donag nga // de ma ni dus pa'i yang byung 'di// sangs nas kun gyis gsungs pa'i tsha// reg dzin rnams kyis thugs la rdzas/
361a1(rnying rgyud): // myong kun gyis gtur ltar bsrung // mkha' 'gro rnams kyis mig ltar nam// de byer rgyud 'di shin tu gzhan// de don man ngag rjes don 'di// log snyed chags zhen ma nges la// nAm yang bstan par ma gsungs so// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yang dag des don kyad bar
361a2(rnying rgyud): can// 'bras bu mngon 'byung nges pa 'di// sno ngan rnams lam gsang na// tshe thung sdug bsngal nad 'byung zhing // phyi mthar medang myal bar lhung // de phyir mi bstan snod ngan ni// bla mar mi gus dargyal can// tshul 'chos byed cing slob dpon spod// dpral ba med par gdams dga'
361a3(rnying rgyud): bka' chun byas nas yod tshul ston// don mgo bas chos la sdang // dpe rkun byas pas phyi thag thung // 'gran sems bcug pas mched dang mkhon// gnas lugs ma shes rang mthong che// nga rang mkhas zhes bla ma smod// sngon nas yod zer rdzun du sba// gzhan nas rnyed zer thabs kyis tshol// phyi nas
361a4(rnying rgyud): dbul zhes slob dpon byed// chos rjes bya zhes thabs kyis bslu// g.yo skye skyon gyis chos 'tshol la// nam yang bstan par mi bya'o// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// gal te 'khor gyis chos bstan na// phyi nang chos skyong kun khros nas// mnyes kha yigs sna tshogs 'ong // byas pa med par mi rnams sngar/
361a5(rnying rgyud): ser snas bsags pa'i rdzas rnams brlag/ rang nyid skyo 'bog sgur por 'gro// rgyal 'god chags nas gnas mi rnyed// phyi mar dmyal ba chen por ltung // de phyir shin tu gsang bar bya// de tshe des don yang snying 'di// gu lang gser bzhin mi nub tsam// snod ldan 'ga' la bstan pa las// snang dgra kun gyi
361a6(rnying rgyud): yul min// 'khor rnams nges pa de ltar zhog/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las// rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / bod kyi lo b+ho ba A tsan+ya dran pa ye shes kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa rtogs so// rdzogs pa chen po des don 'dus pa'i yang snying kun du bzang
361a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes grong gi rgyud rin po che gser kyi yang nun zhes bya ba/ shang pa cha chung ba ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi thugs dan/ bla ma gtan chung ba la gnang ga gtan chung bas 'brom zhang 'bang la gan ga / je bdun nar 'bar gyis// skye skom la gnang ba/ skye rgom gyis/ khyer pan 'od de la gnang ba'o//
